reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great CC cream! I love the coverage and how the formula feels on my skin but unfortunately the shade was too dark for me. I have light olive skin with yellow undertones (NC20/NC25) and the shade Light had more of a warm, medium tone to it- almost orangy on my skin. Apart from that that I love that this CC cream also contains anti-aging serum and SPF 50- a true multi-benefit skincare product. I would purchase this if it were available in my shade with a yellow undertone.   I received this product complimentary from It Cosmetics in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As a Lady of Color, I absolutely love this Product. It’ has done wonders for me. Sunscreen is needed & it leaves a nice matte clean look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the way this product glides on my skin and the finished results it leaves. However, it does not provide me with as much coverage as I'd like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am very picky when it comes to foundation, concealers, and BB/CC creams. I find that they are usually either very cakey on my face, or very thin and have no coverage.   I can honestly say that this product puts all those worries to rest! It has medium thickness, and glides on my face so smoothly, while having full coverage. It's impressive! It evens out my skin tone and doesn't make me look like I'm wearing a ton of makeup on my face.   I also use it under my eyes to conceal those dark circles, and on top of blemishes. I definitely recommend this product to anyone who wants good coverage on their face without the crazy thickness that a lot of CC creams have.   Don't hesitate and give this product a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample for my honest review and I love it! It is very lightweight with surprisingly good coverage. I wear this on low-maintenance days when I don't feel like blending too many products to achieve a look. Natural finish while covering up my tired eye bags! I love it and will be buying once I run out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: While the coverage is great, it stays pretty wet and sticky most of the day even after powder. It transfers very easily even after setting it with spray.  Also, it shows ALL my texture. Pretty unflattering.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Porcelain - very fair complexion with neutral peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation! It's a perfect match to my skin and the coverage is great. I have very dry skin and this doesn't cake up or get patchy at all - it just stays smooth all day and keeps my skin from feeling dried out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this! I worry about spf in my products and I also have never been able to find a cc cream that didn’t turn me yellow. This is the one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using the shade light for years. I recently purchased and it was at least a full shade darker or more and turns orangey on my skin! I thought I got a defective product so exchanged but that was the same as well as the tester. The other shades were bad matches and not good as well. SO frustrating and disappointing. Trying to find a new foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I apply this cc cream as my base. I love that it color corrects & has SPF 50+. I was worried as a WOC that this wasn’t going to be my shade, but as I applied it… it literally melted into my skin. It disappeared, but covered up all my dark spots.  I love this consistency too!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I hate this SO much. I keep trying it over and over again, but it always fails me. I don’t know what it is about this foundation that makes me look cakey. This foundation always melts off my face and going  into my pores and I look atrocious. My Charlotte tilbury setting apray does not even sit on this foundation either. It RUINS my look. Not to mention this foundation comes off my deface so easily and it stains all my clothes.

reviews.review_title: Better ones out there with more shades
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The foundation achieves a nice glow and covers blemishes well. 2 stars because IT IS SO DARK. Like deceivingly very orange and the tone does not match the swatches at all! I usually am a light.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color was a little dark, but I think it will be great for summer time. Love that it has 50+ UVA/UVB physical sunscreen in it.  It also has the good ingredients to help  hydrate my skin.  My skin is on the dryer side, even with a moisturizer it was a little drying.  But I think it would go on better w a primer.  The coverage is phenomenal.  Definable recommend and a little bit goes a long way  #BZZAGENT #Sephora

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Favorite foundation. This is full coverage but has a natural finish. Wears well throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s super full coverage and very thick and creamy, it gives you a clean canvas to work with and will last all day. It has a nice dewy finish, you can use less for a buildable look but it’s super super creamy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used the It CC+fair light a few times now and I don't think this is quite my feel. I am not sure if it is because this is just not my shade or the feel, maybe both. I felt as though my face was a bit sticky afterwards. I had to mix another foundation in with this to match my color and tone. This is not a bad product by any means, just not for me.

reviews.review_title: It's a nice product but not my fav
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good CC cream that actually has good sunscreen coverage (spf 50). The finish is natural and works well with other products. After a few hours, I can see the dewyness start to come through which is fine but I prefer a soft matte finish.  This shade is new for IT Cosmetics and I appreciate that they added new shades but its not neutral to me, it still leans warm on my very neutral but dark skintone. Its a nice product but not my favorite, I will still use it though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Works just as well as high end foundation, I love this product. Blends beautifully on the skin and gives a gorgeous glow. Long lasting.

reviews.review_title: A Must-Have for Any Beauty Routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: CC+ Deep Bronze 12ML is a fantastic product that I highly recommend to anyone looking for a quality, easy-to-use bronzer. The product comes in a compact size, making it convenient to take with you on the go, and the formula is lightweight and blendable, making it easy to apply and achieve a natural-looking glow.

reviews.review_title: Nice coverage but a bit heavy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My color wasn't an absolute match and that brings about a problem - it's a little hard to match yourself to the right color. I received a free sample. Especially if you know you're neutral but the neutrals are still too dark/orange. The texture was surprisingly thick but was easy to apply. The coverage was almost full and it felt like a true foundation. I would like to try my correct color just to see, but otherwise I think it's a nice product and i could see potential with thinning it out and blending it more with less.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I first tried the foundation color on I thought I had got the wrong color. I tested just a small amount to my cheek and chin and thought woah this is really dark, but I decided to fully commit and finish blending the color into my face. After I let the color set for a few mins, like magic it soaked into a beautiful color match. I finished my makeup and was really happy with the end result. The foundation stayed in play all day and didn't budge, it also didn't feel cakey or overdone. I would recommend if you are looking for a foundation that is med coverage or something you can build to full coverage. Just make sure to wash your skin well at the end of the day!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Ivory - very fair complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was received as a free sample. It goes on smooth and has great coverage. It doesn’t feel too heavy and covers all blemishes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The foundation feels lightweight and comfortable on the skin, making it ideal for all-day wear. Overall, I highly recommend this foundation to anyone looking for a full-coverage option that also offers added skincare benefits.

reviews.review_title: Just a Drop Is All You Need
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised after receiving my free sample at how heavily pigmented this product is. You don't need more than a pea-sized amount for your whole face. I used a beauty blender to apply it, but you could use fingers or a brush. It didn't smell like much of anything, which I appreciated because I don't wear SPF on my face due to the sunscreen odor. I like that I only need this product which claims to be both anti-aging, SPF, blemish coverage, and hydrating. I'm not too fussy in the morning when it comes to face prep, but I do like wearing something every day to even out my skintone.   This is an excellent product if you live in a very sunny area or spend a lot of time outside. The physical sunscreen doesn't absorb into your skin.  I would say to take your time picking out a shade because it looks exactly like the shade on the package, and it sits on top of your skin rather than blending into it. Also, get a good makeup remover because this stuff won't come off with just soap and water.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is very very thick. I got the color that was recommended for my skin tone, and it made me look like a tin-man wannabe. It's terrible. It's heavy, thick, and looks super greasy. Would not buy again.

reviews.review_title: A New Addition to My Summertime Bag
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Since using this several times I can honestly say it works as promised. It protects skin from the sun while covering well. I recommend it.  @BzzAgent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the coverage and the spf protection. Didn’t irritate my sensitive skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For my combination, sensitive, rosacea-prone skin, I am obsessed with how lightweight this product is while providing full coverage! It is a staple in my everyday routine. I absolutely love how it has SPF 50 as well, since we all need sun protection daily. Especially those of us with rosacea, you know how insanely important sunscreen is to us. This CC cream holds up extremely well even with over 90% humidity outside! I will say though, that the shade light - taupe shade with warm undertones is significantly darker than what is shown online. I attached a photo so you can see for yourself. I definitely suggest going a shade lighter than your usual shade or going in store to swatch and make sure you're getting your perfect match!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked this foundation because it gave complete coverage and has SPF 50+ and living in Florida that is very much needed.  It has vitamin E and helps diminish the look of fine lines and wrinkles. The only disadvantage was that the shade was a little darker than what I wanted.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - natural beige shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really hoping to love this product. I will say the product is creamy and glides on with ease. For me it just left my skin looking ashy and dry.

reviews.review_title: Good but not the best out there
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I will start with this is actually a really good foundation. When I first applied it, the coverage was amazing and I really liked the finish. I was truly so impressed. I’m giving it only 4 stars because longevity isn’t really there. This is good if you’re out for a few hours just running errands or something. It can’t be worn in the evenings if you plan on taking flash photography due to the SPF. I think because of the SPF, it’ll always stay at about 4 stars for me. A holy grail foundation for me is good for any time of day and for at least 12 hours of solid wear for really long days out.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Honey - deep complexion with warm golden undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This amazing product changed my morning beauty routine. Our mornings are insanely busy and I can throw this on and my flaws are perfectly covered. Voila! It is so smoothing and almost has a glow! Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed using this product! It's going to be my go to for Spring and Summer. I loved the coverage and the way it soaked into my skin. My skin looked flawless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: have the light tone and it looks amazing on me, the texture of this CC Cream is the best thing in the world, it feels as light as a serum and the best of all is that it has 50+ sunscreen which makes it fabulous.!! To all this add a phenomenal coverage, which can be built but really with a single layer it covers any imperfection very well, I am from oily to mixed skin and I love the finish, in case I want a more matte one I mix it with the powder and the result is beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was AMAZED by the coverage this provided. Very full coverage in my opinion. Probably one of the fullest coverages I have worn in a long time. It did not look or feel cakey/heavy/dry though. I am in my mid 30's and have slightly sensitive skin/ acne prone/ dry to combo skin type. I wasn't able to test this for very long or actually outside/working due to the awkward shade matching. But I wore it around the house for a while and had zero problems other than serious mismatch in shade.The shades online look and described to match my tone and typically other foundations described the same way usually do just fine, but this one was much darker. I couldn't even play around with it to correct with light concealer. It was just overly warm toned. I would've really liked to try this over a full day- esp while at work or in the sunlight, but It just didn't work out for me and Im a bit cautious to actually buy this in a lighter shade (there's only one more I think) without trying it first- due to the extreme warm tone. So I am slightly disappointed in this, I really wanted to genuinely try this because I constantly struggle to find a good foundation, and I know IT Cosmetics has amazing stuff. I received this product free for my honest review from BzzAgent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had the opportunity to try out this amazing formula. The makeup tube is simple and allows for easy distribution of just the right amount of product. The formula itself offers light to medium coverage that goes on smoothly and blends easily. It contains hyaluronic acid and other skin-loving ingredients that left my skin feeling plump and moisturized throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shade I was sent was off a build I had to doctor it up for my skin. I can say it was a nice smooth feel on my skin. I didn't have any irritation when used with my makeup primer and other products. I was able to build up the coverage on my under eye circles and any areas with hyperpigmentation. I have dry skin and this cream was not drying it felt really nice on my skin and was easy to work with. Lasted nicely throughout the day, was easy to remove at night. I would say as long as you get the right shade and it is able to work well with your  other makeup  products you will enjoy it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - natural beige shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Having used luxury brands for years, I'm picky about beauty products.  However, I gave IT Cosmetics CC+ in Neutral Medium 12ML a shot.  Always the skeptic, I wasn't expecting anything spectacular.  To say that I was pleasantly surprised is a vast understatement!  While my skin is in good condition, as a middle aged woman that has spent most of my life outdoors, it's definitely seen its better days.  The IT Cosmetics CC+ has a perfect spreadable consistency - not too thick, not too thin.  It isn't goopy, chalky, oily or watery.  It has the feel of a quality moisturizing cream and travels across your skin like an eager tourist with sights to see. The formula settled into the surface of my skin and by the end of the day, it was still in the same place.  There was no sinking into my pores and no feathering into the fine lines around my eyes.  In addition, my other makeup products blended seamlessly into the CC+ cream and were still workable.  Over the past week, I have played with the CC+ cream and tried different things with it.  I've discovered that it's easy to use it as a lightweight tinted moisturizer, and that it is also buildable for use as a full coverage foundation.  While I don't have dark circles under my eyes very often, I do use a concealer on those days where sleep has been elusive the night before.  I was able to use the CC+ in place of a separate concealer, and also as a primer on my eyelids for shadow to rest on.  In both instances, there was minimal creasing at the end of the day.  Also, after gym time, patting my face with a damp cloth seemed to reset the product and it was good to go for another couple of hours.  The last test was how my skin felt after removing my makeup in the shower.  The IT Cosmetics CC+ did not leave my skin dry as many products do.  Highly recommend! I received the IT CC+ cream in Neutral Medium 12ML from Bzzagent in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I know this foundation has been a staple in the beauty space for years however I have yet to try it so when BzzAgent gifted this product free in exchange for my honest review I was excited to say the least.  This foundation is average. It isn’t too bad but it doesn’t preform as the brand describes.   Firstly the shade range is abysmal. They have many tone options in the fair shade range but few options for any other shades leaving many tone gaps and even shade gaps the deeper the foundations go.  For reference I am NC 25 but this foundation’s Light shade was too dark/pink. In theory it should be too light for me. But the next warm toned shade was also too dark, and the step lighter warm shade was ghostly pink. I almost never have issues choosing or companies providing my shade so I was a bit shocked.  The foundation is a slightly thick but creamy consistency making application with a beauty sponge a breeze. The formula feels comfortably hydrating on the skin. I would describe this as medium buildable coverage, you can still see some of your natural skin through this foundation so if you are truly looking for full coverage you will want to skip this one. This foundation played nicely with all of my other cream and powder products without issue.   Unfortunately in just a couple hours the foundation began to oxidize and only became more orange throughout the day. My skin is dry and I rarely have this issue with any foundation.   This foundation seems like hit or miss, if you are interested and can find a shade match, I would encourage you to try it and see how it works for you.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - natural beige shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Foundation is light weight but buildable if you prefer full coverage. It has 50% SPF which is perfect for everyday use. I would recommend this product if you have combination oily skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very light weight feeling for amount of coverage provided! Blends well with the rest of my makeup and wears well throughout the day.

reviews.review_title: Covers dark spots and flaws and blends beautifully
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is awesome for it's hydration and full coverage, and works great for my 50--something skin. A small amount goes a long, long way and it doesn't get cakey. I dab a little extra over dark spots to make them disappear completely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s gives medium to full coverage. Not cakey at all and lightweight. Loves that it has SPF as well. It’s also hydrating.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Honey - deep complexion with warm golden undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think this product has the potential to be great but because the shade was so off it was hard for me to answer questions like blendability and wear. Overall I think it could have had potential.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A little bit of this product goes such a long way! I have some dark spot damage from aging and sun damage, and most of the products I've used before have diminished the appearance, but not totally hidden it. This cc cream completely covered it. I blend it with my moisturizer, and then I can go back and use a little bit more for extra coverage in problem areas. It's not too heavy, blends well, and provides great coverage!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Rich - tan to deep complexion with neutral peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Feels like a moisturizer! Melts into my skin and gives me a glow. Definitely will be my summer foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very easy to blend out. Stays put and gives a flawless finish. It's like you have nothing on.. I have sensitive skin but didn't bother me one bit. Feels amazing on your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has become one of my favorite products . The coverage is amazing and I love the shade range !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have another IT foundation I love, but wanted something with more coverage. This is perfect. I love the way it blends and the ease of building on top of it. I have dry to normal skin and this product works well on me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my new favorite products. I was a little worried that it might be cakey on some areas since I have combination skin but I was very happy with the results. It made my skin look dewy and smooth and lasted all day. I will definitely be buying it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am super impressed with this CC Cream from It Cosmetics. I use this daily as it has great skin ingredients and spf. It color corrects and blends nicely. It has a great formula that covers and lasts! The packaging is easy to use and store. It dispenses easily and a little goes a long way.  I received this product free for reviewing purposes.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i’ve been using this product every day for the past few weeks. this has helped cut down my makeup routines be due to the coverage alone. i don’t have to spend time trying to build up coverage or trying to get a smooth application. it stays put for most of the day - i wear makeup for at least 14 hours a day, every day. i'm not someone that likes to touch up their makeup throughout the day. with this product, i merely have to blot, about midway through the day. overall a nice product and extremely convenient. i know this will be perfect for travel!

This is a great concealer for all day wear. I have dark circles and fine lines with age around my eyes, this foundations does a great job making them much less noticable and it wears all day long.   Overall I am very happy with the ease of application and it wears very well. My foundation blended extremely well with the concealer as well which is always helpful.  I would recommend this concealer for tired eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff! It’s such a great application, very smooth and dewy. I wore it outside on a super sunny day and I ended up sunburnt on my shoulders etc, but my face was perfect! I wore just this without any other concealer or anything and I loved it.

reviews.review_title: Great coverage and love the SPF
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It cosmetics CC + cream is the best foundation I have tried. It is great coverage and the SPF 50 is a plus. I doesn't not feel heavy or cakey at all. It absorbs and matches my skin perfectly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I forgot that I was wearing anything on my face. It covered my blemishes without being heavy and feeling cakey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I received my shipment I was excited to try a new cc cream I'm always looking for something that low fuss and full coverage on days I just don't feel like doing a whole lot and this product definitely delivered the coverage was good and I didn't get super oily a hour later. The only th8ng I would fix is maybe going on shade lighter it was too dark for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was happy to receive this sample of IT cosmetics cc cream. It goes on smoothly and gives my face an even tone without spending a lot of time. It's great for those 'get up and go' mornings where I want to look a little put together,  but don't have time to do a full face of makeup. It has a nice scent, and this small size would be great for travel. SPF 50 is a great bonus. I'd like to go into the store to try some other shade options to find my perfect match.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I must first start by saying how great of a product this cc cream is. It glides on with ease.  It has SPF protection mixed in. Who doesn’t love that? However, I do not think they have my shade as I have to mix colors to get it right. That’s the only reason why I personally don’t feel like this cc cream is for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this cc cream although it had a few drawbacks. I apply all my foundations with a beauty blender, this one blended and applied so easily! Surprised me because the consistency is on the thicker side compared to other liquid formulas I use. Coverage is good, I'd say in the medium range, evens skin tone and covers redness. There is a slight pleasant citrus scent but it's not overwhelming and doesn't linger. The couple cons: the shade fair light is a bit too dark but I made it work with a lighter powder on top. Imo the shade range leans very warm, especially since fair light is supposed to be cool lol. Also I'd recommend a pore filling/smoothing primer since this seems to slightly accentuate my pores and texture. This won't replace a moisturizer imo, like most other products it can show up dry patches. However it's not matte so if you're oily you'll need to set it. Overall not a bad choice if you're looking for a base

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This will be the only foundation I use going forward. As a woman of advanced age ha ha, I need something that won’t cake or get flaky or try and I was having trouble with all foundations.  Until I found us. It feels like silk on my skin. It has all the flaws and I think even wrinkles. I’m a huge fan of this and I will keep it stopped always.

reviews.review_title: Great Product, but not Full Coverage
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried out the product a few times, and I actually really like it. I don’t typically use a lot of full coverage, especially in the summer time, but this is perfect for me and my vacations where I need both coverage and SPF. I would say it’s definitely more medium coverage than full coverage, so if you are looking for something that covers like foundation, this is not it. But the color match for me wasn’t bad and it still looks like your skin but better, which I really appreciate. All in all, I will definitely keep this product in the summer rotation

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: good color match, at first. formula quickly oxidized & felt greasy/heavy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite foundation. I’m 35 years old and have fine lines, redness and the occasional acne still and this foundation wears great. It really helps to neutralize my redness and conceal my imperfections. It has spf 50 in it which eliminates an extra step in my routine. This CC creams lasts all day and I feel like a little can go a long way. It’s buildable, but already has a good full coverage where I wouldn’t necessarily layer it unless I was wearing a full heavy face of makeup for something. I would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am not a fan of this CC cream. It has a good consistency, went on very smooth, it didn't have a bad smell. However, it didn't match my skin tone (which I'm not knocking stars off for since it was a sample online) and it didn't look good on my skin. It made my pores larger and gave me a peach fuzz look. I did try with and without primer then also added setting spray after but it looked the same for all. It did a good job covering my red spot but not a dent in my scar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product seemed to have good coverage and was smooth to the touch. It didn't feel heavy or cakey on my skin. Unfortunately, I picked a shade that was too dark for me so I couldn't use it thoroughly enough to get a better idea of exact coverage or length of wear. Picking the wrong shade and not being able to fully test it is the only reason I felt I couldn't give a higher star rating.

reviews.review_title: A must have in my routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving the results of this foundation. The coverage is amazing and flawless. Keeps my skin super soft and hydrated through the day.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: What I love about the IT color correcting is that is a sunscreen protector and I can use on a daily basis , and that’s a plus , is very smooth and it also does full coverage on my face it covers my red spots it works like a foundation ! Definitely I will be using it everyday

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked using it CC+ Foundation Light 12 ML. The coverage was maybe a little thicker than I typically like and use but it looked nice on. I felt it was a little darker than I expected being listed as light. I received a free sample to review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful full coverage. Not dry or cakey. Love that it's SPF 50+. I am using Neutral Medium. Doesn't look like I am wearing make-up. Covers my red cheeks and dark areas around my eyes. Just looks like I have flawless skin. Definitely will continue to use this as part of my daily routine.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product has nice coverage and a natural finish compared to other foundations I've tried.  The added benefits of SPF 50 are great. I received this product to try for free, but have been using it for years and will continue to purchase this foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good CC Cream that has medium but buildable coverage. It is hydrating, but for me I found that just meant it kept it from looking cakey, not necessarily provided a dewy finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I tried this out on my hand because I currently have a chemical burn on my face but it felt creamy and looked to be medium to full coverage. It was a bit too tan for my skin tone but I'm willing to give it a second try

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample in exchange for my honest review. Loved the thick creamy consistency. The color was a little dark for me but it had great coverage! All my blemishes and acne scars were completely covered.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - natural beige shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This CC cream is a good coverage, and also seemed moisturizing to my skin instead of cakey. It seemed like it was going to be my go to for a more natural look.My only complaint is that it seems to wear off after around 4-6 hours of normal wear. My face looks pretty bare before the end of my workday.

reviews.review_title: Goes on smooth and has a neutral smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It has a smooth texture. Not too greasy and not too watery. No smell which is great for people with sensitive skin. I ordered the wrong color and couldn't change it so I couldn't actually wear this. Product applies with no problem.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shade matches my skin so well. It goes on smooth and I really like that it has spf. I wish that the tube was bigger though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product but it just did not work out. I have gotten two samples and both color shades are extremely dark. This product unfortunately made me break out. I spot tested the product since i have sensitive skin and luckily i did.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product and it was good provided full coverage. The color was a little too dark so Ultimately I used it more to contour but I would purchase again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's like using a foundation but with nice ingredients that help you with your skincare, had a nice medium cover and for me it's perfect because I preferred medium or light cover for my day to day

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - natural beige shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. My skin looks so even toned without the feeling, and look, of a traditional foundation. It concealed any redness in my skin, and I loved how I could build up the amount I used to have a sheer look for the day with a heavier coverage at night. The coverage is so much better with this product compared to any other cc cream. I love that it has skincare benefits as well as an SPF of 50. My skin as been drier due to the cooler weather, and so I do need to use a lotion underneath the product. I think that in the summer time that wearing this alone will work! This will be my go to product moving forward!

reviews.review_title: Wrong shade name and not for oily skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First, the shade Fair is not fair, it's light so it's too dark for me. Second, it doesn't suit my skin type, wich is combination/oily. It's thick, creamy and never really self-set. Also, it's very perfumed and it's not that longwearing. So... I don't really like this product.

reviews.review_title: Would use again in darker shade!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I use this product for “light” makeup days and love the coverage because a little goes a long way for me, which gives a less cakey look. I was able to use it with my concealer and it mixed well with no issues but I think I would need to mix two shades to get my actual color because I got the Tan Warm through BzzAgent and it matches fine but isn’t a flawless match.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have found my new holy grail, the coverage is perfect, my skin looks amazing with this CC light medium cream on. I've never used a product that matches so perfect. It doesn't make my wrinkles look horrible like most due. I definitely world recommend this to y'all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product has amazing coverage without feeling heavy.  I love the SPF 50. A little goes a long way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve never tried a CC cream before and I have not used foundation since receiving this. It is so light weight and matches my skin color perfectly.

reviews.review_title: A must have for full glam
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Usually I am not a full coverage girl but it was my friends birthday so I knew it would be a long day. I was happy to have this in my collection the coverage didn’t feel cakey and it was so easy to blend out. I will say if you use this product a little goes along way. However I didn’t have any problem with the foundation breaking on my skin or budging. All in all I would definitely recommend buying this CC+.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can not say enough great things about this CC+. It is definitely the best on the market. The way it melt into the skin. It matches me perfectly. I literally look like walking filter. It’s so soft and creamy and spreads smoothly on the skin. I’m so in love. Hands down 10/10.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have never been so shocked, it was such a perfect match for my skin tone, I had to stop and do a double take!! It was super easy to blend and you don’t need a lot of product to cover your face fully. It didn’t feel like I was wearing make up!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Rich - tan to deep complexion with neutral peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Good product. It did leave a bit of a cakey/heavy aftermath but I did use it with other products thats not recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product for many years! it's always been my go-to. I prefer to apply with a makeup sponge and not a foundation brush. I did receive a free sample from Bzzagent in exchange for a review. I've been using it so long it was an easy task. I love that it has spf too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Bzzagent for review. I choose light medium thinking it will match my asian skin tone but it comes out a little bit orange-ish than pink. I'm quite disappointed at the color. However, it does provide some coverage and makes the skin look smoother. This is not my favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not only was this a perfect feeling product to the skin, but it was a perfect match, and a I got a nice clean looking makeup look

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Rich - tan to deep complexion with neutral peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The finish, coverage and performance are really good. I wish the undertones wasn’t as red for deeper skin tones however with some concealer I made it work. Would definitely recommend for dry skin but if you have oily I would steer clear.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Honey - deep complexion with warm golden undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s definitely full coverage. I tried this brand before and wasn’t sure the shade would match my skin tone. I was surprised it did, and a little went along way. It’s a great size so I’m definitely taking it with me on vacations

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff, but the packaging is way smaller then before and they upped the price to make it smaller

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this product in exchange for a review, but had been recommended it for years before. I’m a big fan of using tinted sunscreen, but they are pretty light coverage. This foundation being full coverage was great since it covered up my uneven texture. I was nervous that I would break out since it has a slight smell to me and I have really sensitive/acne prone skin but so far I haven’t broken out! Also I love that a little goes a long way and there are a bunch of shade options! The only slight issue I found is that my skin is a bit dry so it pills a bit but it’s a lot less than the other tinted sunscreens I use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately this foundation is not for me. I received the lightest color available (fair light) and it was about 2-3 shades too dark. I was very excited to try it as I am in the market for a new foundation since my former one was discontinued. I really liked that this one offers skin hydration as my skin is quite dry, and that it reduces fine lines. It does feel quite nice on, though I do not enjoy the scent it has. If they offered this in a lighter shade I would happily give it another shot. The finish is lovely, doesn't really transfer, and it doesn't feel heavy or cakey, so I would still recommend it if you can get it in your shade! I received a deluxe sample of this cc+ foundation in exchange for this post.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Only reason I rated 4 of 5 stars is because the shade is too dark. I would definitely use again but a lighter shade. So weightless on the skin yet the coverage is amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love how this sits on my skin, it’s not to heavy or greasy. The SPF is my favorite part and the color match is really good too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free of charge from Bzz Agent and It cosmetics, in exchange for my honest review. I have to admit I had tried this product awhile back and had marked it as a product I didn’t like. At that time I applied it with a beauty blender using the dabbing motion. It was too thick. This time I used my fingers and applied it as if I was applying lotion or sunscreen. As I was applying the cream, it appeared too dark (I was trying light). I kept blending it. In the end, it didn’t appear to dark. It gave me a nice color. It was creamy and blended well. I didn’t have a line of demarcation. There were no off putting scents. The full coverage cream covered well. It blended any discolorations. I tend to have redness in my Nasolabial folds, upper lip and chin. The “makeup” seemed to last well. I wore it for about 12 hrs and through a busy nursing shift, while wearing a mask.

reviews.review_title: Smooth coverage and feels good for my skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For me, I'm always on the hunt for the best skincare and foundation to provide sufficient coverage for my uneven skin. Sometimes those two things don't often mesh where I get great coverage but it'll make my skin worse. I felt that with the It! Cosmetics CC+ it felt like it was good for my skin like skin vitamins. As if it is a total package - on the external, it makes my skin look great but internally, it is actually great for my skin. I liked that it was a full coverage foundation with SPF but without that ashy or white cast that some foundations with SPF will leave me with. It is definitely further buildable for that additional coverage over redness or acne scars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a deluxe sample in the shade Tan Warm which is a bit darker than my skin tone (I’m a medium tan usually). Compared to other CC creams, this one has the best coverage imo. I have uneven skin-tone, texture , & scars. I like that it feels lightweight, has spf, and skincare all in one. Perfect for my long work shifts and lazy days. I highly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Goes on smooth and so easy to apply beautifully. It's not chalky or splotchy, and looks flawless with or without moisturizer. Great colors that look natural and evens skin tones -- covers up imperfections without looking caked on. And SPF 50?!? Wow! Stays put well enough that I don't notice any signs of sun exposure when I take it off at night. (I have melasma and my skin gets strange pigmentation with any sun exposure.)

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan Rich - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Talk about full coverage ! This cc cream delivers. I enjoyed this product overall although it didn't quite match my skin tone. It is moisturizing and very easy to apply. I also like the packaging. A little goes a long way which allows this product to last. Definitely recommend

reviews.review_title: Does what it should and does it well!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the texture of this product.  It goes on feeling velvety and gives nice coverage for my sun damaged, acne spot skin.  I also have a lot of allergies and this product didn't trigger any of them. I also love the added benefit of the SPF so I have to put fewer products on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this wonderful color correcting cream from it for over a week now and my first impression is Wow!! I am super amazed at how hydrating and light this full coverage cream feels on my skin, my skin can breathe and not only does it color correct but, it has 50+ SPF with UVA/UVB protection. This formula also is an anti-aging hydrating serum with biotin. After using this my skin feels and looks so much better, it appears to be softer and firmer. I like that this cream doesn’t settle into my fine lines around my eyes, it actually plumps the skin and just looks amazing. I used this wonderful cream with and without my makeup and I felt my absolute best especially without makeup on. The best part is I feel great about the SPF protection in this cream and I love that this stays in place even with the rain. I chose Fair Light and it matches my skin tone perfectly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product on my face as a foundation with a blending sponge. My face has red blotches in different places, so now I have to wear a really good foundation to help cover the redness. Otherwise, I look like I have sunburns. I was quite surprised how easy it was to apply the CC cream and how well it covers the redness. I think you can build the coverage up some more than what I used, but I love how well it worked for me. A really good thing is that I didn't have to use much to get medium to full coverage. This means that the tube that I have will last a good while for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you so much it Cosmetics for sending me CC+ Color Correcting Full Coverage Cream + Anti-Aging Hydrating Serum + Broad Spectrum SPF 50+UVA/UVB for free to try and review. I have used this exact brand in the past, and continue to use. However, when I signed up to review I can not remember how it was determined what color to send me. As the color that was sent is too orange on me. However, it goes on smoothly, I can apply it with my fingers or a brush which I used the later and you only need a small amount for the whole face. I do feel like I get nice full coverage all day, when I use this product. And I am glad to have the sunscreen protection as I am very fair skinned. The only draw back is it can transfer off very easily so be careful if wearing white. I have attached a photo of wrong shade and one of same product in a different shade that matched me better. I feel like this product is very similar to a lot of products out there, and the price is pretty comparable to others as well. I would and do use this product already and will continue, just not in the shade I was given as it did not match me. If someone is looking for a nice full coverage with sunscreen I would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Me encanta la calidad de estos productos una crema q te da color te hidrata y te protege del sol todo lo que buscamos chicas y sobre todo excelente para la que no nos gusta usar base.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved this CC cream on my face and loved how it blends. I was able to blend it with just my fingers. I don’t like to use a lot so I usually apply my regular sunscreen before this. The only thing I don’t like is that it contains denat alcohol which tends to dry me out and cause breakouts.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Deep - deep complexion with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like this CC + Neutral Deep 12ml for my face, and it does an amazing job at gliding on to my face to make it look smooth and soft. I like how it stays on all day. I like how it matches my skin tone, and provides amazing coverage.

reviews.review_title: Good coverage! But I got the wrong shade.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted CC+ Deep Bronze in exchange for an honest review. I love how light this cream foundation is. I don’t have to add too much to get the look I want. The coverage is full. I got it in deep bronze but it is a few shades darker than my skin tone. (Completely my fault, lol). Didn’t bother me because I usually get two shades anyways, one to match and one to contour. This shade works perfectly as a contour! Overall I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this foundation for a few years, I have tried SO many other foundations but always come back to this. I believe this is the best foundation for mature skin on the market. It has smoother coverage than the Armani and Estée Lauder. The finish stays fresh and dewy all day and does not settle into fine lines. The only thing I hate about it is the packaging. As you use the product the silver on the container starts to break off. The silver flecks get on my face, my sponge and on other make up packaging near it. I end up with large pieces of silver glitter on my face. Not Cute! If they fixed the packaging, this product would be perfection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this . It blended perfectly! Already recommend to a few friends.

reviews.review_title: full coverage in a little bottle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It is amazing how much coverage this product provides. The fact that it doesn't make my skin feel oily is a big plus for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed the CC+ Cream from ItCosmetics. It's s squeeze tube application which I don't mind. The coverage is light to medium. I could still see some of my marks peaking through underneath my application. But it left my skin looking smoother and more balanced. I love the fact that it has SPF50 in it so I can get protection and coverage in one shot. I noticed a white cast upon first applying it but within 5 minutes it started to disappear. I would definitely recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have searched for a cc cream that wouldn't be too heavy on the skin but also cover my acne or red skin and this has worked great! I find a little product goes a long way and if I use too much product it does become a bit cakey so I recommend using a little and concealer for anywhere that needs a bit more coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.  well i have been using this product every day since I received it. I live that the spf is in the product as it makes for one less step in my routine. the formula is very hydrating and covers well. Definitely evens out my skin tone and I truly love it!

reviews.review_title: A must-have in my makeup kit
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the  Light Medium Shade. It is a lightweight formula. My skin feels fresh as soon as I apply this product. The color is a little bit darker than my skin color, but it will be perfect for summertime when I get a little bit of a tan. It applies just like a cream and leaves my skin feeling hydrated. I am very impressed with this product. I will be buying my the shade that matches my skin tone, so I don't need to wait until summer to start using this IT Cosmetics Your Skin But Better CC+.

reviews.review_title: Need to find a different shade
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a color that was too dark for my complexion, but I made it work by mixing it with a couple other foundations until I achieved a good match. This mixed will with other foundations. I'm pretty sure if I had the right color, this would have been dreamy by itself. It has good coverage and a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This wears so beautifully. It will cover blemishes easily and as the day goes by this cc+ will look even more like skin with a dewy glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream has great coverage, goes on smooth and lasts for hours. It doesn't feel candy on my face and doesn't irritate my sensitive skin. However the shade is too dark but will be perfect for the summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually love the it cosmetic products! I actually use the cc cream and have never had issues but for some reason with this one, it was awful with my skin. It felt very cakey and looked way more orange on my skin than normal and this was supposed to be a lighter color. I will continue with my cc cream from IT, but not this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: IT cc cream full coverage in shade fair light was beautiful I love how well it looks on me it blends nicely has SPF 50 anti aging hydrating serum coved my imperfections well I really needed this it’s a benefit to owing this product does so many awesome things.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: At first I thought I wasn’t blending properly but after 2 weeks of use (fingers, beauty blender and brush) it leaves my skin patchy/flaky, accentuates my fine lines and what bothers me most… horrible pimples/under the skin sore breakouts only since using this, I’m so sad and insecure now :(

reviews.review_title: Lightweight color correcting full coverage w/SPF50
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lightweight super smooth full coverage color correcting cream with 50 SPF protection in Rich. I’m African American & this matches my shade ! This is the first color correcting cream I’ve ever used so I’m not sure how it compares to others ! It’s lightweight but provides full coverage as well as it has sun protection . It also comes in a portable tube . I would buy this . Would highly recommend to friends & family .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Terrible range of medium brown colors they have like 2 options but they are too yellow and the dark shades are way to dark. Great coverage but product is way to oily and never drys so you have to set it with another product.

reviews.review_title: Nice but too dark for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed the feel and coverage of this product but unfortunately the fair/light was a little too orange for me. I think a shade lighter would have worked.  I did not feel this was full coverage at first but you can easily build the product to the coverage you want without feeing like you have a bunch of makeup on. I sometimes want light or medium coverage and think I could adjust to make it any coverage I needed. Will definitely try again in a lighter shade if available.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Why is the lightest shade 3 shades too dark for me? I absolutely love the formula but this shade range is wack

reviews.review_title: Great coverage but drying for aging skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This did not work for my skin.  I purchased it as usual IT CC cream was unavailable in my size.  Great coverage but missing the wonderful skin nourishing ingredients the other IT foundations have. I am 46 and this started to ruin my skin. Settled into cracks and was very noticeable on my skin by mid morning. Had to return it. Ordering the CC+ Nude Glow Lightweight online.  I blend in a heavier weight foundation right after application to areas that need a bit more coverage.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product and would recommend it to others thank you it cosmetics!!!
