reviews.review_text: I use to LOVE this, and used it for 4 years! The formulas and colours seemed to have changed, the fair seems darker than what it use to be, and the product itself doesn’t sit on the skin nicely anymore, it’s very patchy and sits on the skin weird now. Super bummed because this was a staple for me!

reviews.review_title: Skeptical but turned into a vibe
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Tried it with primer, it was ok. Finally tried it with just a moisturizer underneath and it wore 10x better. Tried it with setting powder today and it looked even better. I use the foundation from this company but decided I needed more coverage. Overall happy with this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to love this but unfortunately it just didn’t work for me. Made my skin feel greasy and rubbed off very easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I have mature skin and it is absorbed into my skin and doesn’t leave a greasy feel. It covers my scares and helps even out my skin tone.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It Applies on nicely and the color matches perfectly… as I wore it through out the day, this would oxide and turns my face color into slightly tan .. i think the Lancôme feels so good tinted moisturizer is better than this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got to try this gorgeous cc cream foundation recently and it is fantastic! It goes on so smooth and you need less of it than you might think! Even better, my skin didn’t break out at all, which sometimes happens when I use products with SPF. I’ll definitely be buying this one again!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Honey - deep complexion with warm golden undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The shade I received was way way to dark however this brand and foundation is my favorite and the only one I use

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this, but found it way too cloying on my skin. It felt like it was thick and also that it was sliding all over the place. It’s been relegated to the back of my makeup drawer for SPF emergencies.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the cc+ cream full coverage foundation with special 50+ neutral rich is so nice. I love that it is light weight for being a full coverage. Also it blends easily and smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a more hydrating version of the oil-free CC+ cream, but this was the opposite. If gives a beautiful finish, but after wearing if creates dry patches and really breaks up. Would not recommend and going back to my old product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for the last two weeks and the results are beyond my expectations, it has the perfect coverage but it does not feel heavy on my skin at all, the SPF 50+ is perfect protecting my sensitive skin, I totalIly recommend this product to everybody, It is my new favorite addition to my beauty rutine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing coverage! I’m really obsessed with this foundation and plan purchase. Extremely easy to apply. Only need about one or two pumps to do a full coverage. The bad lighting picture below is ￼one pump.   only two pumps for half my face.

reviews.review_title: Loved how fabulous made me feel!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Loved how silky smooth it is! Covered my mommy dark circles! Blended well and was not cakey. Think I finally found my favorite foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Second time buying this product and I love it! You can build it up so it can be used as light coverage or full coverage. I work a 12hr job and my makeup lasts me ALL day, and no its not the primer, sometimes I don’t use primer and this CC cream does it all!!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan Warm - tan complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I would consider buying this product, only in a shade lighter. It goes on nicely and lasts throughout the day. No blotting needed after time passes, because it doesn't look oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The product goes on well but it creases A LOT and I noticed it would make my skin feel generally heavy and like it couldn't breathe. It would get super flaky and dry on my forehead and around my nose too. I couldn't wait to wash it off at the end of the day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If I could take one product to the grave with me it’s this. Great coverage, is good for your skin, won’t break you out, super hydrating, non irritating. This is one product I will always have in my bag. Cosmetics

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rich - golden brown shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good foundation for aging skin. I did receive a color too light for me but will purchase the correct shade.You get full coverage, anti-aging ingredients, hydrates, and a whopping spf50. The packaging is travel friendly and not bulky. It also smells good too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Insanely good foundation! Is medium coverage but makes it look like I’m not wearing makeup. I have gotten so many compliments on my skin and makeup in general when I’ve worn this product. Highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love love this foundation, the coverage is great, and it last long. This foundation stays on all day and it still looks great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It Cosmetics never ceases to amaze me with their products, and this CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation is great, and it's a huge plus that's it's got an SPF of 50+! I still like to wear sunscreen separately, but it's definitely a big plus for me! The coverage is really nice, not heavy, and doesn't crease. What more could a girl ask for?! It's a great product for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don't usually believe hype, but this product really did not disappoint. The last few years I've struggled with pustular rosacea, which has left marks on my chin and flare ups cause a lot of red bumps. I've been using Dermablend camo foundation combined with concealer and it's been not too bad. But then I really started looking for something to colour correct and this kept coming up in every Google search I did with my parameters. So I finally gave it a try, and was genuinely surprised by how great it actually is. It colour corrects beautifully, the colour match is bang on, it covers my rosacea marks and balances out the red when I'm having a flare up. I don't even need to use as much concealer as I did before. It's really full coverage for the most part.  I only gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because I wish that, for the price, the tube was bigger. Otherwise I'm very happy with this product.

reviews.review_title: GREAT COVERAGE FOR ACNEPRONE BUT NEED MORE SHADES
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Pros: Really love this stuff because I have sensitive skin & easily break out. This covers everything really well, better than my MAC studio fix foundation, and it does not irritate/break out my skin. Plus it has spf 50 !! Cons: it leaves a greasy shiny finish, (not good for already oily skin) and it’s really hard to find the right shade. I have exchanged it 3x already to find my color and now the color I’m using kind of has like a grey ashy appearance….. please do more shades!!!! I really love it tho still, after you put under eye concealer, some bronzer & setting powder it looks fine!

reviews.review_title: Great coverage but a bit patchy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok full transparency, the coverage was exceptional. And a little goes a long way. But…I have mature skin and found it didn’t sit that great on my skin, especially on textured areas. I tried it with two different primers and still had the same results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an overall staple foundation. Buildabke coverage, SPF, and doesn’t cake. Does start to transfer after a few hours but that depends on your skin type

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: if I could give this product zero stars I would. I wanted to love this so badly but this product made my skin look SO dry & textured even though I was sure to prep my skin with toner, moisturizer, & primer. It also settled into every line & crease on my face. unfortunately, I will be returning this product.

reviews.review_title: Absolutely a staple in my routine for sure.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from BZZ AGENT for my honest opinion. Well here it is. I really enjoyed using this on myself as well as my mother. We both agreed it is so weightless and comfortable to wear. You get the advantage of a full coverage foundation but in a CC cream formula.  I really enjoyed how it lasted on the skin as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is my holy grail – I use it everyday like a foundation because it finishes so naturally, and I love that it has SPF in it. What I love more is that it’s also hydrating. For teh best results, I lightly dust with setting powder and it locks in my face for the whole day. Its light, breathable and honestly incredible as an everyday CC cream!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: IT cosmetics is always my number one to go! I love the texture and how my skin looks like! It literally covers everything from redness to imperfections such as acne, moles or any scars. I would definitely recommend this foundation to all of my friends and family!

reviews.review_title: New favorite for full coverage days!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The IT Cosmetics Illumination cream is what I use on an everyday basis but I was looking for something with a more natural and additional coverage to use for special occasions so I was excited to be able to try out the CC cream! The shade Fair matches my pale skin perfectly and the coverage is buildable without looking cakey or settling into lines. SPF is important to me and because it contains SPF 50, I don't have to worry about applying an additional sunscreen beforehand and it contains so many ingredients that are just overall good for your skin such as Niacinamide and Vitamin E so your complexion looks hydrated and even whenever you wear it. I will probably stick to using the Illuminating formula because I like the highlighted effect but this is a great choice if you are looking for a more natural appearance.

reviews.review_title: dont love it but not too bad
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cc cream looked great when i first put it on in the morning, but throughout the day it looks cakey and enunciates my dry spots. I feel like its too full coverage for me but it has potential. Im  going to try the nude glow cc cream from this brand because its lighter coverage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time using this brand and product. After using this for the past week I found that it doesn’t work for my combo skin. It hugs to my dry spots and make my t zone oily. A little goes a long way. I recommend for normal skin or combo skin with no dry patches.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love how this blends so nicely and SPF. Wore at beach and didn’t have to add any sunscreen.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan Warm - tan complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this product for a little over 3 weeks and have really enjoyed it thus far. It’s easy to apply with fingers or a brush and provides medium to full coverage. I have noticed that there is an gray/ashy u derribe to it but once you’ve applied other makeup products over it, it looks more natural. The cream foundation stays put pretty well but after about 6 hours I start to look oily but I usually fix that with some face powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received the IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full Coverage Foundation in exchange for my honest review. I liked the concept of this product. I appreciate SPF being included and found it fairly easy to blend, however, I tend to have dry skin and although I moisturized, I had some dry patches after some time. It’s not quite hydrating enough for my dry skin. Overall, might be okay for some people but it didn’t work well enough for me to recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Product goes on smooth with good coverage. But literally any light touch to the face that this stuff comes right off. I’ve tried three different primers with several different setting sprays. Nope.. right off with the lightest tough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually wear more high end foundation so I was a little hesitant to try It Cosmetics CC Cream Full Coverage Foundation with SPF 50 plus but I am so glad I did! IT really does provide full coverage while still feeling light on the skin and breathable! I was pleasantly surprised and i will definitely be using this foundation again. The color match is sometimes hard for me because my light complexion usually ranges between light and medium and the perfect match is so hard to come by without adding highlights and powder but with IT foundation i can actually just put it on and go on those lazy days and still look amazing!!!!  I also love the slim bottle because it takes up less room on the go in your make up bag. You should give it a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: IT cosmetics is always my number one to go! I love the texture and how my skin looks like! It literally covers everything!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for a few year now. I love the coverage and how it glide nicely on my face. The high spf is a cherry on top.

reviews.review_title: Great coverage but not too cakey
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The first thing I noticed when trying this foundation for the first time was the fragrance. It is a very mild scent that gives spa vibes. It’s a pleasant reminder of IT cosmetics brand focus of makeup and skincare in one. The texture is creamy, and not too thick. It has great full coverage but is easily blendable. It wasn’t too sticky, and I didn’t feel the need to coat myself in powder to set the foundation. I’m so glad I tried this foundation and am happy to add it to my regular makeup routine.

reviews.review_title: Don't Buy if you have pink tones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really don't like this.  It turns my skin very yellow.  I naturally have some pink undertones to my skin.  After I bought it, I noticed that if you flip through the pictures of the models wearing each shade, you'll see that it takes them from having pink-ish complexions, to yellow-ish.  It also felt too heavy for me.  I'm trying to cover up a few red spots and age spots, but would prefer to spot correct vs having full heavy coverage.  Others might feel otherwise.  But mismatching skin types I think means that it's not for very many people.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rich - golden brown shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color I received from BzzAgeny was not a good match so I will just talk about the qualities and claims of the makeup. The physical SPF 50 can come off ashy on darker skin tones so I use a powder over it to match my skin tone. The formula is hydrating and very full coverage. If you use fingers to apply, expect streaks so plan to use a brush to try to buff out any harsh edges. I like it for everyday use but I wouldn't use it on a glam day!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan Warm - tan complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a full coverage foundation without having a heavy feeling on the skin. I applied it with a brush and finished blending with a beauty blender and it gave a flawless and dewy look. Highly recommend for those with dry skin looking for full coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is one of the best that I have used in quite some time. It is buildable to create a flawless finish. It already has a decent SPF in it, so it’s not imperative to add a sunscreen to your daily routine. I have oily skin, so not having to add another layer to my skincare is very helpful for the end result. I have found a damp sponge to be the best way to apply as opposed to a foundation brush, but a kabuki brush works ok if you don’t use sponges. The packaging is superb with a pump attached to a squeeze like tube. I absolutely love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Has been a long time favourite. Great for beginners and works so so well on me. However it is a little inconsistent, other people I know say they had issues. Definently try it in person before purchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as part of a promotion. The color was a bit too light, but it worked well as a concealer when I mixed it with a darker shade. The coverage is fairly sheer. I have very oily skin and I felt like I could only wear this CC cream if I applied a fair bit of primer beforehand. Overall, the It Cosmetics CC cream is a good product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product, but unfortunately it oxidizes a bit too orange for me and feels a little heavy. It does work as advertised; it’s full coverage, color corrects and is quite moisturizing due to the serum. Even though this should be my correct shade, I have considered trying a shade or two lighter, to see if it’s less orange on my skin. After applying the rest of my makeup, the foundation did look nice with a finished face, so it is a decent product, but it isn’t for everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was given this foundation in exchange for my honest review. With that being said I normally wouldn't spend this much on a foundation, however after using it for the past couple weeks I must say I guess the old adage holds true... you get what you pay for! I can never go back to my old drug store brand! This stuff is worth every penny! I don't have acne or scars but do have uneven skin tone and texture. This CC+ Cream covers all of it leaving me with the perfect even looking complexion, without feeling heavy! Plus the best part is the added spf 50! I can now skip the extra step of adding sunscreen to protect my skin which sometimes causes slippage with my foundation and makeup. I highly recommend trying this foundation!

reviews.review_title: So sad I got the wrong shade
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so sad I got the wrong shade for this product. If it had been the right one I would have been raving about it, it has a very nice texture and it doesn’t feel as heavy as I thought.   It comes with a convenient pump, nice packaging and in a plastic tube, it’s easy to carry and to store.   I have tested it on my hand and you can clearly see how when I wiped it off it left a shadow so even thought I wanted to use it as contour the color was really deep so I couldn’t do that either, and as a last resort I decided to blend it with other foundations I had that were too light and that did work beautifully but I am just sad that I couldn’t enjoy it as intended. I will buy in the right shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Scented which I don’t like. Oxidizes soooo orange. Pretty full coverage. Hard to wash off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I hate this foundation. It was recommended for my rosacea, but it is awful. Thick but doesn't fully cover at the same time. Primer does not help. Maybelline Fit Me works best for me, way cheaper. Won't buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I haven’t bought this product in a couple years.. but the have definitely changed it. It used to be sooo nice and matte but I find it a lot greasier now. Won’t buy again personally, as someone with oily skin I préférée the older version. If you are okay with a greasier feel you may like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Easy to apply and blend. Coverage is great, but does settle into my fine lines. The color was not a match for me or my daughter. I did like the way my skin felt while wearing the foundation.

reviews.review_title: Not dark enough- Please more shades
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I liked the consistency; definitely full coverage. I’ve never tried a tinted sunscreen before, so I was worried it would smell like beach, but fortunately it did not. I didn’t shade match correctly and ended up getting something that matches the parts of my body that see no sun rather than my face. However, none of the shades available are dark enough for my face. More shades please!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this product, full coverage without drying your skin. Help minimizing the skin pores and give it a perfect tone. It also very light weight and show your skin bery smooth.

reviews.review_title: If You Wanna Look Like and OOMPA LOOMPA
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Returned - the colour was awful as was the texture of the product.  Huge miss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think i chose the wrong shade, i feel like it was too light on my skin, but over all it was buildable to cover the redness of my face and it felt smooth and not heavy at all.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from bzzagent in exchange for my honest review. I really like this foundation. It blends very well and looks great on. It doesn't look or feel heavy.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rich - golden brown shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite products packed with skincare benefits. Easy to travel with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am very happy with this product. I am able to get excellent coverage with just a little amount used. I use a foundation brush to apply to get even coverage. It last all day also! I will buy it again  Highly recommend

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Honey - deep complexion with warm golden undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So unfortunately, I received the wrong shade for my skin (too dark) but I was still excited so I tested this CC cream anyway. The product itself feels great on the skin, not drying at all and really seemed to stay all day a little product goes a long way which is always a plus. I love that it contains SPF (very important). It blends smooth and easily. Will have to buy one closer to my skin tone but I can see myself adding this to my routine! But I can still used this as a contour which I don’t mind at all.

reviews.review_title: Would probably work best on dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary to test and review. The It Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ in the shade Light was probably the wrong shade for me. The undertone was too warm for my skintone, but shade aside it was not a foundation I'd recommend to anyone with a similar skin type (combo skin/sensitive). The foundation wore well for the first few hours, but within about 3 hours it would look super greasy around most of my face, to the point that blotting/dusting powder on top would make it look cakey/blotchy. There was also no saving the foundation around my nose, it would break apart and sometimes get blotchy within 2 hours of putting it on. I emphasize this as it is currently winter when I got this foundation to test out, which means I would not trust this foundation in the spring/summer if it's becoming greasy in the winter. However, this foundation might be better suited for dry skin. It's not the worst foundation I've tried, but I've used many that are better suited for my particular skin. It does look nice on application but did not wear well for me after trying it with multiple primers underneath that I trust, and a few times without any primer.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wonderful product.. I love it I was scared at first because I thought it really wasn’t my skin tone but it was a good match..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This CC cream is perfect. I've previously tried tinted moisturizers, bb creams and cc creams and did not like any of them. I thought that those products just didn't work with my skin and kept to my foundation. My skin type is dry but oily in the T zone. These types of products tend to just slip off my face during the day. I received this product for free and I was running low on my foundation so I decided to try it and I love it! I love that it's buildable so I can get the same coverage, if not better than my foundation. I like that it gives me this natural glow and my skin doesn't get oily. It's very nice and blends in well. I do suggest using a primer though and definitely a setting powder. Other than that I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This shade was too dark for my complexion but I did use it as a liquid contour and I was pleased with how blendable this product is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from BzzAgent in exchange for my review. I did not have a chance to fully enjoy this product because the shade that I picked online did not match my skin tone. I chose my usual shade and it was way too dark. My mom ended up using the product. She said that it was great. It was about a medium to full coverage and similar to a foundation but less heavy. If it wasn't for the shade being super dark I would have given it 5 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I took this CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ when I went on a 14 day cruise to Hawaii and Mexico which definitely worked for me.  I used only the foundation on my face when I went to Maui and my face with nothing underneath it or on top and my face felt a little oily with it. It did its job of protecting my face which I didn't get a sunburn.  The following day I used it with my other skincare and powder on top which my face felt much better when I was in Oahu. My mother even said my face looked different and a little smoother.  I recommend to use a powder on top so it won't get oily which worked well with my combination skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Honey - deep complexion with warm golden undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: excellent coverage, nothing heavy on the skin, I would definitely buy it. It seems that you have nothing on the skin skin is light

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I do like this product. I like the coverage and also how long it lasts on my skin. I did not like the feel/texture of it. It is definitely not a lightweight product it does definitely feel like you have foundation on.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Porcelain - very fair complexion with neutral peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for the past few weeks and I'm absolutely AMAZED by the coverage and how perfect it blended with my skin..  Doesn't feel heavy, has full coverage and has SPF 50+ sunscreen! I really liked it, is a product that you can use for your routine day to work or weekends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream is a full-coverage foundation with SPF 50. It provides excellent coverage for imperfections, evens out skin tone and leaves the skin with a natural-looking finish. The added SPF protection is a bonus, making it suitable for daily use. The formula is moisturizing, making it suitable for dry skin, and doesn't feel heavy or cakey. Overall, it's a great product for those looking for a foundation with full coverage, sun protection, and a natural finish.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan Warm - tan complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation provides great full coverage with the added benefit of SPF. It has saved me the step of applying sunscreen beforehand and goes on beautifully. The coverage is full without feeling like I'm wearing a ton of makeup!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a shade too dark for my skin, but know it would be perfect for the summer when I have a tan! However, I felt the foundation was too heavy and wet - which would make me not wear it in hotter months since I feel it wouldn't hold or start to come off with the heat and sweat. The coverage was okay since I have a lot of acne scarring. I just wouldn't recommend it for a day-to-day foundation because of that wet/heavy feel.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Honey - deep complexion with warm golden undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i really like this product. it provides full coverage with very little product. it also lasts the whole day, which is amazing.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Honey - deep complexion with warm golden undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the most moisturizing CC cream I've used. I love that you can just throw it on and go instead of having to layer your foundation on top of your sunscreen. It did get a tad oily but nothing you couldn't just powder or blot away. Over all i think it's a good product, especially for people who want a quick makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage of this foundation is fantastic. I have oily skin and this foundation pass the test of time. I work an 11 hour shift and I am required to wear a face mask. However, this foundation stays on my skin for the duration of the day. SPF is also a plus, because I tend to forget to put on sunscreen. My only complaint is that they need more shed selections because I have to mix to shades together to get my color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a complimentary gift though BzzAgent in exchange for an honest review. I love this CC cream for many reasons. The first would be the 50 spf. I also love the buildable medium-full coverage without it looking patchy. The shade I received would be a summer shade for me. It was a little too dark for me when I applied it. It goes on smooth and blends well. It has staying power! Not 24 hours for the full coverage, but my guess would be about 15 hours for that. The packaging is a pump tube, easy to use. If the pump starts lagging or not pumping out product, just give the tube a squeeze during your next couple pumps. I’m not wild about the scent but that goes away once applied. I would definitely recommend this buildable coverage CC cream! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage on this CC cream was CRAZY! I wasn’t expecting it to be as full coverage as it was! But baby you couldn’t clock any of my dark spots, so for me that’s a win. Not only was the coverage great, but the finish was flawless. I didn’t look oily and it left a natural dewy look. The color match was insane. It was perfect for my skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for a few weeks I love it! It keeps my skin feeling hydrated and the coverage stood on for the most part. It’s a perfect full coverage with spf. U do not need too much of it in order to get ur coverage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this for a couple of years now and it is still my go to. Evens out my hyperpigmentation and feels great on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s thicker than I thought, but the shade was a wee bit off, but it definitely is full coverage with a a smooth finish. The dispenser is super convenient to pump on a sponge or brush. I have combo/oily skin, so this very much needs a powder and setting spray. The price of the product is substantial (especially for the SPF amount and it being CC+ Cream foundation), but I wouldn’t use it in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So I've tried more than my fair share of foundations/tinted moisturizers/bb/cc creams, and until now I've always went back to using my old faithful IT Cosmetics Bye Bye Foundation - until now!! I'm 39 years old so I no longer have the most youthful skin, and have occasional breakouts, and this CC foundation covers any imperfections. It does settle in creases a bit, even with priming, setting, and setting spray, but I've not found a foundation yet that doesn't. Overall, this is the best and has become my go-to, especially on mornings when I'm running late for work and just need a couple quick brush taps to help even out my skin. Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely don't care for full coverage it almost makes me look like I cover myself and frosting. I definitely like the fact that it's clear sunscreen. With that being full coverage I think the tone may have been for summer more so than my winter color. My face doesn't feel dry or to heavy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation. I gives good even  coverage. I finally found something that will cover my uneven skin tone. I am going to make this my go to foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s all in one, from full coverage to hydration serum, anti-aging and sunscreen however, I just found it for a bit dry for normal to dry skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving the results, love it, best foundation i have tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This CC cream by IT cosmetics has a wonderful consistency and great coverage. It goes on smoothly and spreads evenly. You don't need anything but this product it's a one step face base.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am pleasantly surprised with this CC cream. I have tried many different BB and CC creams over time and had low expectations because of the others I've tried. I am extremely impressed with the amount of coverage this CC cream provides! It has much better coverage than any other CC or BB cream I've previously tried. Considering the amount of coverage it is not heavy or dense by any means, it is smooth and weightless. I think it will be a great go to when I know I'll be in the sun and I just might save it for sun use specifically! I definitely do recommend this product and I would buy it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Honey - deep complexion with warm golden undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Combination skin
Green eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this foundation to try and review. I really love the coverage and there is no patchiness. It feels really lightweight on my skin when I put it on. It blends beautifully. I love that there is SPF already in it so I don't have to put sunscreen on separately. It doesn't have a cakey look like some of the cream foundations I've used in the past.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product that feels so light on the face. At first I thought the foundation would be so sheer and not go on right but boy was I wrong. It was completely full coverage! I loved it so much! I am also acne prone and any foundation really flares up on my skin creating cystic acne. This foundation didn’t even do that. It made my face look luminous. I also get dry flakes when wearing some foundations because of dry skin but this foundation actually made my skin appear soooo beautiful. I recommend to anyone who’s excited to try it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have rosacea so I absolutely love the coverage this foundation offers. So much so that I looked into finding a better color match for myself, since the shade I received turns just a bit too orange on me. Unfortunately, that’s where this line seems to be really limited. I’m extremely fair and there just isn’t a correct undertone option at my end of the spectrum. Kind of a bummer, because it’s really hard to find this kind of coverage. It’s able to cover up all of my rosacea without feeling like I’ve caked 8 layers of goop on my face. If they expand their shades to include one that matches me I would snatch it up in a heartbeat!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After receiving a free sample to try of CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+-Tan Rich from BzzAgent, my first observation was that i chose the wrong shade. Had that not been the case, i realized that the coverage appeared to be effecient and effective.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation so much. I have used this for a long time, and it has never failed me. It looks so so natural on the skin and has the most skin-like finish while still having FULL COVERAGE. It doesn't stick to any of my dry patches and it lasts all day. I am super happy they have been expanding the shade range as well. I would highly recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first sunscreen with concealer that I’ve ever tried and I’m in love with this stuff! I e been using it for about 3 weeks now and it’s my new go to for sunscreen and concealer. It’s really like putting concealer and sunceeen on at the same time and it’s so easy. I use my fingers like I would with any other sunscreen. It’s fast m, easy, convenient and it makes me feel beautiful. I definitely recommend this product and I will buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a free sample and I must say it is amazing! Great coverage goes on smooth and feels good on your skin!! I have sensitive skin and this stuff is a dream!!! Try it you will not be disappointed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the most incredible foundations that I have ever used in my life. If you have never used it, you need to get to the store right now and buy it seriously, go buy it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the foundation! The color matched my brown skin. it was smooth going on and had great coverage using only a little amount of the product. It didn't dry cakey but instead stayed smooth all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this from bzzagent for free in exchange of my honest review  and I only gave this 1 star because I couldn't use it the shade came to dark for my skin usually I give the right shade when I sign up im thinking it was a mistake with a wrong shade I picked I was sad about it forsure but I'm thinking of giving it to someone that has the shade of skin to match

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: absolutely love this foundation it matches my skin tone perfectly! Covers up all my blemishes also. It even has anti-aging hydrating serum plus SPF 50 in it as well which makes it even better! Best foundation, hands down I will never use another brand!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow everything this product says it does yes it works yes it's beautiful yes it last long yes a little goes a long ways yes I got compliments yes it was a perfect match yes I highly recommend this yes I still put on my primer first cuz I like to seal in my look to guarantee I don't have to do a lot of retouch but I was impressed by this didn't smell I'm a heavy sweater and it stayed on I let it dry first cuz we're all foundation or anything that you might put on your face is going to come off a little light especially if you sweat a lot so you need something that's going to seal it together be it powder or a great primer it made my natural undertones come out yes I received mine for my honest opinion. Yes it's full coverage or likee I use for half just for around eyes and brow love it. So perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: There is lots to like in IT Cosmetics Your Skin But Better CC+ Cream including a SPF 50+ sunscreen which gives a meaningful level of sun protection.   There are some skin-treatment level ingredients in this including Hyaluronic Acid for hydration, Peptides to smooth and firm, and hydrolyzed collagen to plump skin.   There is also multiple botanicals, Niacinamide, Vitamin E, and SNAIL SECRETION FILTRATE. I love getting a skincare treatment level ingredient like Snail secretion filtrate in my daily foundation. It  makes skin look so much younger and healthier. It works on both my fine lines and my acne marks. It is rich in copper peptides, hyaluronic acid and amino acids so it hydrates and protects.   It is a full coverage level foundation suitable for covering acne marks and dark undereye circles.   The color correcting feature to add a brightening effect to skin without looking like a fake tan. If you are deciding between two shades, I would recommend the lighter of the two as it is highly pigmented and a small amount goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Well they send me the wrong shadow, but is still great. I used as a bronzer hahaha the texture is super nice super gently, a lot of color. The package is beautiful

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazinggggg foundation. Great coverage, feels good on my skin, and performs well day. One of my all time faves and will never not have this in my makeup bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Im in love with it foundation. It goes beautifully with my skin. The packaging is amazing.. I always wanted to try them. I’ll be using this product as one of my favorites. Complimentary thank you bzzagent and It cosmetics. So happy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation is great. It goes on smoothly and gives full coverage which is buildable. It does not leave streaks and stays on for the whole day. I love that it also has SPF 50+.

reviews.review_title: So many products in this little tube!!  My new go
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: IT Cosmetics never disappoints!! When I received this foundation, I was a little concerned because it was a good bit darker thank my usual shade.  However, now I wouldn’t be without it. Aside from the great SPF coverage, smooth formula, and all of the skin goofiness in this tube, I’ve discovered that it is also a great contour cream and lip base to enhance lighter shades!!  Who knew!!  And as I get just a little color in the spring and summer, I’ll just mix a little of this shade with my winter shade for a perfect sun kissed glow!!  I’m in love!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation, though it looked lovely on my skin, made me break out BIG TIME. I like this brand, I wear several other products, but this one I just can’t do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been looking for a good fit in my foundation for years and I think I have finally found it! Love the feel. Love the (very slight) smell. Love the blend. Love the color. My one “complaint” is that it doesn’t last as long as id like it to, but with a powder it’s just fine!as I’d like but

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My everyday foundation is the IT Bye Bye Foundation so I was thrilled to get a chance to tryI out the CC+ Full coverage foundation as a free product.  It shares a lot of the features I like about my usual foundation, but has a good amount of additional coverage.  It feels good going on and doesn't sit too much on top of my skin which I have trouble with with so many fuller coverage products.  This is why I don't typically buy full coverage foundations, but this one did an excellent job. I typically buy two different shades, one for winter and one for summer since I tend to get a little bit of color on my face despite my best efforts.  I tried the shade medium and it was perfect for my summer skin.  I thought it would be since that's the same color I get in other IT Cosmetics products.  That isn't always true within brands, so I was pleased.  I also think their products have great wear time and don't settle into my fine lines around my eyes which is a must! Overall, I really liked this.  I will likely stick to my Bye Bye Foundation for everyday, but use this for going out/special occasions when I want more coverage.  I absolutely recommend their products.  I haven't tried anything I didn't like from them yet!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time trying a full-coverage foundation. I was pleasantly surprised, the shade matched perfectly, the application was so smooth. My skin actually felt like skin, not heavy or dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: color correcting full coverage cream is anti-aging helps sunscreen although it was not my color for my skin I put it on to try it and it is an excellent cream to cover skin imperfections and it is not lumpy or sticky and does not feel like a heavy paste I recommend it thanks bzzagente for choosing me in this campaign

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Porcelain - very fair complexion with neutral peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: never tried a cc cream before. Amd when i got selected to use and review this cc+ cream full coverage foundation with SPF 50+ in the shade porcelain by bzzAgent. And this is magical! Having an open pores and acne prone skin its a perfect fit for me. It covers everything and gaves you baby skin like finishing very soft subtle look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this foundation non drying on your face it’s very much like my skin because the color is accurate to my skin tone. It lasts all day and I get so many compliments.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had the opportunity to review the new It cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50,  in exchange for a review, and I really enjoy the product. Like all of the It cosmetics products I've tried, it's moisturizing, goes on smooth, and seems to plump the skin. What surprised me was the coverage. It's full coverage, as promised, but doesn't feel heavy or cakey.  When it comes to products containing such a high SPF, I'm used to struggling with a whitish cast within tinted products, but the shade I chose blends right in to my skin. I'll have to try it again over the summer, but as an oily skinned girl, I didn't struggle to keep my oils in check, and it seems to wear all day until I take it off.      Overall, I like it and will  repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It made no difference to me. Definitely won’t see recommendations from me

reviews.review_title: So Close to the Perfect Foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was very excited to try this but the color of the foundation was a little darker than my skintone so it looked slightly off. The formula itself was nice and a little went a long way. It stayed put well with powder and didn't budge all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how silky smooth this product is. It's also lightweight and leaves a nice finish. It wasn't my correct shade, but I still tried it just to get a feel of it.

reviews.review_title: Holy grail must have, love it for years
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: (My color is Fair ivory btw.) Hands down my favorite foundation ever. I’m an esthetician and have tried tons of foundations but always come back to this its my holy grail have used for over 4 years . It stays put, I don’t turn into a greaseball with patches or caking in 2 hours, my skin looks flawless. I hate a dewy look and for me this is the best and stays pretty matte. Yes it’s thick but spreads easily covers any imperfections and lasts me for over a year. Don’t ever change the formula I love it. I’ve tried Dior, Shisiedo, Anastasia and so many but end up returning bc they get patchy/greasy after a couple hours. I’m 37, have great skin and get compliments on it, but as you get older foundation just doesn’t stay like it did when your 20s and you could literally wear anything and it would be great, when you get older it breaks apart and gets more patchy but NOT this one. I never leave reviews but this stuff is literally the best. Love it forever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this products. It's not my every day face products. It has the perfect coverage and it's doesn't feel oily or great and the blend is heavenly. I absolutely recommend. My shade was tan but it wouldn't allow me to post it with Tan selected as my shade even tho it's what I bought

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I liked the coverage of this product and how smoothly it went on. My only complaint was the smell. However, once it was on, I didn’t smell it anymore.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation (Deep Bronze).  The foundation's coverage was brilliant & gave my skin a natural looking glow. It didn't irritate my sensitive skin & lasted all day. Also, the included SPF is a bonus & saves me a step in my makeup routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I only use foundations with SPF and I love that this foundation contains SPF 50+-- a much higher concentration than many other foundations. This foundation is also a serum, providing anti-aging benefits which is a huge added bonus. This thick, creamy foundation provides buildable coverage that always feels lightweight on my skin. It provides a natural finish that doesn't oxidize and change color throughout the day and it also doesn't pill; both of which are qualities that are absolute prerequisites for me. I do find that this foundation takes a while to dry down and it continues to feel slightly tacky to the touch throughout the day. Additionally, this foundation transfers (ie: to surgical masks, scarves, clothes, etc.). Unfortunately, the tackiness and transfer qualities both continue to occur even when using a setting powder (something I very much wish didn't occur). Overall, I really like this foundation and haven't found any other foundation that even comes close. I will definitely repurchase it, time and time again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cc cream full coverage is awesome. It is very light weight and smooth.  It covers all my my blemishes well and has all day coverage.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Rich - tan to deep complexion with neutral peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay so let me start with what is great about this foundation... The tone is beautiful,  like a rich glowing hue! Full Coverage with one layer! Can definitely make it through a work day, but I wouldn't ask more of it than that lol. The only real con for me is because of the strength of the SPF I can't put it too close to my eyes, they will get watery, so I have to use it with another foundation. But that certainly won't be a problem for most people. So I say the pros out weigh the one con.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn't expecting much because I've heard not the best about other IT cosmetics cc creamos, but I really loved this one. The sunscreen coverage is my favorite part because sunscreen and makeup tend not to mix well, so this 2 in 1 product is amazing. It's definitely a staple.

reviews.review_title: Light and glowy and felt like skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was sent to me complementary of BzzAgent. I have combo skin, and my skin color is light medium neutral. I was sent LIGHT in this cc cream, and it was the perfect shade. I used one pump on my hand and dipped my IT Cosmetics Heavenly foundation brush into the cc cream, but by the time I was done applying, one pump was too much. I used about half a pump worth. It applied flawlessly, looked, and felt like skin! It's definitely a complete turnaround from the original IT cc cream I've tried in the past. This one melted into my skin, didn't make my pores look noticeable and over all, wore well throughout the day. There was a touch of creasing under the eye, but most likely because I don't use powder. If you don't like creasing under the eye, I'd set the under eye. Also, I'm 42, have fine lines and wrinkles under the eye, and this didn't settle in them surprisingly. I did have a dry patch between my eyebrows that it clung to slightly but was hardly noticeable. Overall, I was highly impressed with this product. If you like glowy cc cream that looks like skin, I'd definitely recommend you give this one a try! 360-degree turnaround from the original IT cc cream!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the product and the coverage it provided however for it did not last very long which was no more than an hour will try again on a not so hot day here in Fl to see better results

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Y'all this product surprised me. For it to be a CC cream, it wears well and is very full coverage. This is also a product that will last you a long time. I was initially scared at the size of the bottle, and I thought it was something I would need to refill frequently. However, when I was testing it out for the first time one pump of this fully covered one-half of my face. So 2 pumps a day to cover my face is this is the only product I'm using or less than 1 pump if I'm just trying to cover my dark spots or discoloration. I also loved how moisturizing this product was without making my skin feel heavy or oily. After applying, it left my skin with a satin feel, so not matte or dewy. Lastly, as someone who is working on their hyperpigmentation and discoloration, I really appreciate that this CC cream includes SPF. When I wear makeup, it's hard to know when and how to put on the proper amount of SPF. When I use the IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation it helps me not have to worry about that step of my skincare routine and feel like my neglecting my skin.

reviews.review_title: Love the coverage, but not enough hydrating
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry dehydrated skin and some redness on my cheeks. This CC cream gives me enough coverage to cover the redness without looking so cakey, but it does leave dry patches overtime if I don't hydrate enough or use the wrong sunscreen. It has thick consistency, but blend out very well. I find using beauty blender is better than brush or my hands. It would be perfect for summer time, but not enough hydrating during Winter time for my dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This CC+ cream smooths on easily and lasts well. It did not crease for me. It layered well with my other cosmetics. It was difficult for me to choose the correct shade online. I recommend shade matching in person.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Honey - deep complexion with warm golden undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this all in one product! It’s the perfect product and easy to use as I don’t have to worry about adding each item it has in it as an additional to my daily routine.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rich - golden brown shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually have no issues with IT cosmetics, so I’m surprised I have to leave such a bad review. Let’s start with the positives. The CC cream claims to double as a color corrector. The CC has sunscreen SPF 50, which is a huge plus. Now, true negative. I received the color rich. I’m African American, and holy smokes; the shade is nowhere close to rich. Looking at the shades online, the shades seem darker than in person.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Beige - very fair complexion with cool rosy undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage foundation has been a long time favorite of mine. It works well for my now mature combo oily skin all year round, just as it did years ago. What I really like about this is even though it states full coverage, it's buildable to your liking. You can mix it with a bit of moisturizer for a lighter to med coverage or go for the complete full coverage. Either way it gives a beautiful finish. Because I have larger pores, I do need to use a pore filling primer before applying or I do find that it can settle. I also find that what gives me the best results is applying this right to my face in the areas I want coverage. I spread it slightly with my fingers before going in with a dense stippling brush, give my face a quick spritz with some stetting spray and then finish it up with a sponge. As long as I lock it all in with some more setting spray once I've finished my makeup, it lasts pretty much all day.  The only area it does transfer regardless is the bridge of my nose where my glasses rest. That's a problem for me no matter what foundation though so it's no big deal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this foundation for a few weeks now and am so happy with it. Application is a breeze and it covers so well, even with my sensitive redness prone skin. I was pleasantly surprised by the coverage and the fact that it doesn't feel heavy at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you are looking for a flawless, full coverage foundation this is it! You do not have to use a large amount and it goes on super smooth. My skin looked fabulous and it covers all my imperfections. Unfortunately the shade I got was too dark so I can’t say a whole lot about long term wear but my overall first impression was stellar!

reviews.review_text: When I think Cc cream I usually think light to medium coverage but this reminds me of a normal foundation almost with face lotion properties. looks & feels good if you prefer more coverage!

Thin texture so the product is not overbearing to your pours.

I always had to set it with powder because it stayed a bit shiny. This It cosmetics CC cream has amazing full coverage! My acne spots are completely covered. The smooth satin finish is flawless and it’s not shiny! I don’t have to add powder to it! The SPF 50 is the highest in all the BB and CC creams I have tried and a little goes a long way. I absolutely loved this product and will continue to use it. Definitely a must if you are looking for matte full coverage.

As someone who has never used any foundation products from this line I wasn't sure what to expect, but I was actually quite impressed with this product. Not only does it provide wonderful coverage with a beautiful finish, a little goes a long way so you can get the coverage you desire without using excess amounts of product. I love that it also provides sun protection and lasts looking all day long once set with a smidge of setting powder. Even after applying powder products my skin looks radiant and hydrated, definitely gives a pretty, youthful finish which I love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: This IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation was a nice addition to my foundation rotation and collection.   It did a pretty good job at covering up my rosacea but it was still slightly visible. I think in order to cover it, I would have had to apply so many layers, it would’ve looked like I was wearing a mask and that was not what I wanted.   A little bit definitely goes a long way, and for me, using a foundation brush helped in the application and provided a flawless finish.   Personally, I need to do better in the color matching process because the color I selected was a little too light but with some tweaking I can still use it.   Overall, I think this is a good full-coverage foundation and if I had the perfect match, I’d use it again in the future.

I really need this for the summer because I always were foundation in the summer, even if I go swimming. So having the SPF in it makes me feel so much better about wearing foundation. With the SPF, it being full-coverage, and how the color matches so well with my skin tone, I have to give this 5 stars. I finally found a new foundation!

reviews.review_title: A must have all in one product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is an absolutely amazing product! I would most definitely buy this product again as it is the best cc+ cream that I have ever tried and I’ve tried lots of them. The only thing I wish was that it was the right shade for my skin although I can still use this as a base for the rest of my makeup I wish that it actually matched my skin shade and I would really like for it to actually be full coverage the first time applying it even though I baby build it up into a full coverage I would say that it’s more of a medium to full coverage instead of actual full coverage. I would most definitely recommend this product to my family and friends and they would benefit greatly from using it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have to admit, I wasn't crazy about this at first.  The coverage was the best I have found, and the color was a perfect match for my skin which is rare I find that.  After the first use, I wasn't crazy about the consistency and how it sat on my face or how the rest of my makeup went on after that.  I played around with it the next few uses and learned to let it sit after application and blending for a little bit to settle on my face and skin.  After that it was a night and day difference, and it instantly became my favorite foundation.  I will admit I'm not crazy about the smell of it, but it only smells just out of the tube. I will definitely keep this as my go to.  It hid everything I wanted it to hide just after one application where I usually have to do two layers of other foundation just to get the coverage I'm comfortable with. I would recommend to everyone!

I very much have been enjoying this CC+ foundation. It is a shade too dark for me however I mix it with a little concealer and it works just fine. This foundation blends so nice and it sets on the face and looks so smooth and flawless. I like light to medium coverage therefore I dont necessarily need a whole lot of product, a little goes a long way for me. It wears so nicely the entire time I have had it on and it feels great on the skin as well. I love the fact that it has SPF 50+ which is going to be so perfect for sunny days.

reviews.review_text: I didn't really like the CC cream foundation. The deep color was too dark for my skin. The shades seem darker than they look.  I tried to blend it in  but that didn't work either it kind of sat on top of my skin. It does give full coverage and had a nice creamy texture and i thought it would stay on. Seems like after a couple hours it gets dry or starts to come off but my skin does tend to get dry . Maybe a lighter color would be better.

reviews.review_title: Nice cc+ cream but not best value
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a tricky review for me to write because there were aspects I really liked about the it cosmetics cc+ color correcting full coverage cream but there were others that I really did not care for.  I received a tube of this product to give an honest review on.   To start I will say that a little goes a long way! The first time I tried it I dispensed the 2 pumps the directions instruct you to do. That seemed to be way too much. It was very creamy, smooth and spread well, but I definitely did not need one to two pumps. That day my face felt too greasy for my liking and seemed to look a little too cakey. The next day I used it, I ended up depressing the pump not all the way down to dispense about 3/4 of a pump, and that seemed to be a good amount for me. That day my skin looked and felt a lot better. It does have a scent which is hard to describe, but almost is like mild minty or menthol type of scent which  actually was not displeasing to me, and seem to fade rather quickly.   The fact that it is creamy and provides full coverage would definitely be a pro in my opinion. The 1.08 oz tube for $44 does not contain very much, but since you really don’t need much that would seem to be a pro. However, in reading the directions for use, it  says to re-apply every two hours because it is also a sunscreen. This would be completely unaffordable to me personally, and would leave me looking way too cakey, and not feasible to re-apply if I had a full face of make up on. If I am going to have to re-apply lotion every two hours I think I would just stick with the Cerave light face lotion with spf  that I was already using. That  has the same instructions  for reapplication but contains almost twice the amount of product for a price point of $19 versus the $44 price point on the it cosmetics item. If  I were just planning on using it as more luxury primer/foundation/cc cream then I may be willing to treat it more as a splurge product  or if I were to see it on sale or if I had a c

reviews.review_text: I really enjoy using the IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ because not only does it have benefits to the skin and offer protection, it just feels amazing. It's very hydrating, and even though I have combination skin in my t-zone, it didn't make my face any more oily. This CC+ Cream definitely does color correct but I would not say it's full coverage because it's thinner and lighter than other full coverage foundations that I have. reviews.review_text: 🧚🏻‍♀️ ✨ It Cosmetics CC+ Cream - Fair Ivory (W)  I received this product from It Cosmetics and Bzzagent in exchange for my honest review.  RATING: 4.0/5.0  ☀️ APPLICATION TIPS ☀️ Being light handed; a little goes a long way. Start with half a pump and only use more as needed. Press gently into the skin with a brush or sponge. I use the brand’s 115 brush.  ☀️ WEAR ☀️ I would consider this to have medium coverage. It feels lightweight and does excellent job of evening out skin tone. The finish is natural and leaves the skin glowing. I use a small amount of setting powder on my nose and chin to increase wear time. It will last 8 hours before requiring a touch up.  ☀️ INGREDIENTS ☀️ The formula is silicone-based, so keep this in mind if using a primer. Standout ingredients include snail mucin, hyaluronic acid, peptides, colloidal oatmeal, niacinamide, adenosine, and silk extract. There is a slight citrus smell from essential oils.  ☀️ COMMENTS ☀️ The shade range was expanded from 11 to 22 shades (still limited but a dramatic improvement). The darker shades use a chemical SPF to avoid white cast. There are travel sizes available. I tried the Fair (W) shade in the past and loved the formula, but I did not repurchase because it was too dark. Fair Ivory (W) is a much better match.  ☀️ CRITICISMS ☀️ Application method is crucial to avoid undesirable results. The formula is highly pigmented for a CC Cream and overuse results in a “cakey’ look. IT Cosmetics advertises this product as SPF 50, but no reasonable person would apply enough to achieve this level of protection. For this reason, I highly recommend using SPF under this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried a few It Cosmetics face products but my skin is picky about SPF on my face so it has been hit or miss for me but this foundation is phenomenal.  I have lupus and struggle with covering my redness and as I age the fine lines and pores are starting to take over.  I went from having to use multiple products on my face to just priming and using this foundation.  This product does the work of all of them, on top of how well it covers, the fine lines and pores started to disappear or at least have diminished making my skin looking and feeling so much better.  As long as this product is made its going to be on my face.  Fan for life!

Since receiving this product, she has worn it many times, even though it has been years since she's worn makeup. And she's received so many compliments over how beautiful her skin looks. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin with an oily T-zone and some dryness but I love a healthy glow. I don't like looking matte and dull and sometimes I can get away with foundations that provide hydration if I wear the right products underneath like a good primer or skincare that balances my complexion. At first this foundation was looking a bit too dry and cakey around my mouth and it would melt so quickly on my forehead and nose sliding all over the place. I have to admit I wasn't a fan except for the fact the the coverage was beautiful initially and the SPF was a plus. As I started using it more and more and changing my skincare routine now I love it! I think it is important to note that you have to have a proper skincare routine in order for a makeup product to work for your skin type. Still to this day I only get about 4 to 5 hours of wear with this foundation and then it starts to wear off, but it wears off much more beautifully and fades naturally without me looking like a grease ball. I use this as an every day foundation for me. Like I said I LOVE the coverage. I don't like to show my natural freckles much so this covers them well and also any redness and discoloration I have. It looks healthy on my skin. The color looked a bit darker on the tube but it actually matched me very well. I am a light-medium usually with yellow-golden to olive undertones. It has a nice scent that is not too strong but pleasant and it applies so well and quickly with my foundation brush with no streaks too. It feels very lightweight as I buff it out which makes it perfect for every day use, personally. When I am in a rush or need ro run a quick errand, this is my go to foundation specially because it has SPF in it!

reviews.review_text: I got this product from BzzzAgent to do a review on it. It gives a slight glow. It’s full coverage without being cakey. I definitely recommend this for all ages. It is also color correcting which I need because I have rosecsa. It looks beautiful for about 8 hours, 10 max. I do have one complaint. I need about 5 pumps to fully cover my face. I use a dense foundation brush and after I’m fully covered I go over it with a damp beauty blender to make sure there’s no lines and it’s fully blended, but I needed to 5 pumps for a product that is thick which shocked me
