reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like to take proper care of my skin and, honestly, I also like to pamper it. Generally, I don’t mind that my skincare and makeup routines have several steps, but it’s not always practical (or even possible) to take the time for all of the ideal steps. Even when I have to shorten my routine, there are some things that cannot be skipped. UV protection is essential, not optional. I also feel self conscious without a medium to full coverage foundation to hide acne scars. This combination full coverage CC cream and SPF 50+ sunscreen is my holy grail find! I’ve only been using it for a couple of weeks, but if it keeps working this well, then I am devoted for life.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive had a close relationship with anything It Cosmetics due to the quality & always positive outcome of every product I've tried before! I couldn't wait to give this It Cosmetics Your Skin But Better CC+ Color Correcting Full Coverage Cream + Anti Aging Hydrating Serum + Broad Spectrum Spf 50+ Uva/Uvb Physical Sunscreen a try! It Cosmetics partners with Plastic Surgeons & Dermatologists to develop their product line to give you a quality product. Thats a big win for me & only makes me want to buy everything It Cosmetics, & believe me I have a huge collection!!!  This It Cosmetics Color Correcting Full Coverage Cream is in shade Fair Beige. I love how the applicator tip twists giving me more movement. Having a pump dispenser helps keep things sanitary & for keeping in purse or traveling since theirs no lid to accidentally twist off. My first time using this product, I noticed a small amount goes a long, long way! One pump is more then enough for full face coverage. I wanted to apply this It Cosmetics Color Correcting Full Coverage Cream using different methods to see what gave me better results. I first tried applying with a beauty blender, & was shocked with the results! The texture felt creamy but also felt heavy on my face. It's like the product would lay on the surface of my skin & never absorb. And talk about wantjng to minimize the appearance of fine lines & wrinkles...This It Cosmetics Full Coverage Cream made my skin look years older!!!! I was able to see every single line & flaw since the product laid in my skin...talk about looking in the mirror & feeling depressed about yourself...  To quickly move on I wanted to try another method of application just with simply using my hands. I applied the same amount & began massaging the product into my skin. The results were a little better but I was still able to see a cakey residue on the surface of my skin along with some product that made my fine lines look more noticeable, which isn't the look I'm going for...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall, I was really happy with this foundation. I really enjoy IT cosmetics so I was excited to give this one a try. I have tried their other foundation which is amazing. Compared to that one and other foundations I’ve used, this one offered more coverage from the start. I also enjoyed that a little bit of product really went a long way. It went on smooth and evenly. They also offered many color options, so finding a match was a breeze. I would definitely recommend this to friends and family. IT cosmetics definitely does not disappoint!

reviews.review_title: Buildable coverage that benefits the skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When using a makeup brush, it applied a little streaky. I prefer to use a damp makeup sponge to get a streak free, photo finished look. I love that it's buildable and not heavy at all. It covers my redness very well while giving it a nice fresh dewy look. It performed and held up well on my sensitive skin and provides protection from the sun. The soft tube packaging with a pump allows for a good amount of product to dispense as well as being able to squeeze product out when running low. I am a fan of It Cosmetics and am happy that they have more shades available. I would definitely purchase again.

The only down side is the color I was sent to try for free from Bzzagent was way too dark so I could not wear it out for the day. I would buy it in my shade for sure.

The new shade Warm Tan is a perfect match for my skin. The formula does oxidize leaving the Tan shade I wear in the OG CC+ Cream Full Coverage Foundation, a color entirely too deep for my skin. I'll be wearing this during the winter months and switching to the IT Cosmetics CC+ Nude during the warmer spring months.
