reviews.review_text: I love the coverage, it's very complete, it doesn't take much to cover the entire face, in general, I loved it, and I wouldn't hesitate to buy it again. It also has sunscreen. I think we all should protect our skin

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan Warm - tan complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: IT CC+ SPF50 is great! This has full coverage, hydrating serum and spf. I love this because i have concern when driving, the sun tends to burn my face. So this gives me great protection. It is a bit thick on application. It has a pump to get as much as you need to cover. This shade is a good match for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how easy it is to apply and blend. The coverage is great and buildable. Love that is has SPF built in. I would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I chose the wrong color. Had this been the right color I would’ve totally loved this cc cream foundation. It’s full coverage, goes on smooth, and it even smelled good to me, though the scent was very light. I thought the color would match. It looked different on the chart I had to choose from. I hate that it wasn’t my shade. I was so excited to try it. I will definitely try it Again, but in a different color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this foundation. It gave me a full coverage and didn't look cakey. I blended mine with a stippling brush and it blended perfect without streaks. It has spf already so that makes this product even better. I like the packaging because it makes it easy to apply. I will repurchase in the future. It lasted me all day and only came off when I removed my makeup at night. It was my first time trying this brand and for sure it won't be the last. 5 stars no doubt.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a lovely foundation on the skin. The key to making it look good is that 1) you have to apply VERY little and 2) make sure you get a good shade. I think that people complaining that it's too heavy must be applying way too much. I also found that I do not need any type of primer with this foundation. And to set, I use a loose powder instead of a more full coverage powder foundation.   The benefit to owning this foundation is that it is perfect to use when you do not have much time to get ready. For me, applying by hand tends to work best. The warmth of my fingers allows the foundation to melt into my skin. I still get a bit oily, but I get oily with literally every foundation I've tried (and I've tried way too many to count).   Again, this can be a great product if you find a shade that matches and learn to apply way less than what you are probably accustomed to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great full coverage using a small amount of product with extra left over.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. I hate when foundation makeup feels cakey so this product does a great job of avoiding that. Lightweight and it has surprisingly good coverage. My skin can also be sensitive at times and get bumpy when using new products but I had no issues with this CC cream. Unlike many other brands, this shade range is pretty inclusive so I had no trouble finding my perfect match. My favorite part about this product though is the SPF 50 which makes it perfect for everyday wear. Easy to blend, easy to build, just a great product overall. 10/10 would recommend and I will definitely be repurchasing when I run out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ and I enjoy using it because it offers great benefits. This foundation provides protection for the skin and is great for many seasoned makeup wearers. I like that it is lightweight, easy to apply, blends well, and provides good coverage. This foundation leaves my skin feeling soft and also hydrated not too thick or clogging. I like that this foundation goes beyond color-correcting to include full coverage and anti-aging serum with mineral sunscreen all in one. I find that the IT Cosmetics CC + Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50 + has worked much better than other foundations I have tried, but I should have chosen Rich Honey instead of Deep Honey. It states that the color is warm which is correct for me but this seems to have a tad bit of red in it but I can work with that. I find that this product has excellent benefits for me owning it because it is Full-Coverage, SPF 50, and the Anti-Aging Serum is a plus. I have highly recommended it already to many of my friends because they love the way it looked on me.  I would buy this product in a different shade and the only other con I have is the packaging. I am not a fan of the tub the top gets stuck and then with the pump products you end up leaving a lot of product in when it doesn’t pump out anymore. I would love if this product came in a Cushion Form. I am thankful that I received this product to try for free and I am very happy to have found it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am very happy with this foundation. The coverage is wonderful...not too much, just the right amount.

reviews.review_title: Even but wouldn't say Full Coverage
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ Tan for about 2 weeks and here are my thoughts:  - I typically use either the Rare Beauty Liquid Touch Foundation or the It Cosmetics Nude Glow Foundation and build on top. I feel the Full Coverage foundation helps to cover up slight blemishes (I still needed some additional concealer) and does not feel as heavy as other full coverage foundations. I would definitely use this foundation if I wanted a good base for a night out or where I'm going to be photographed.  - I love that this foundation has 50 spf so I don't need to add additional sunscreen underneath. This foundation also comes in convenient packaging (tube with pump) so I can bring it on the go easily. This foundation blends really easily and was not cakey. - I would definitely buy this product but I think I would need to find the best combination of other products to use it with since some combinations left me dry. - I would recommend this to anyone that is looking for a not-so-heavy foundation that provides even coverage.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan Warm - tan complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ - Tan Warm.  It blends extremely well and even though it is a full coverage foundation, it doesn't feel heavy. It covers my blemishes and makes my skin look better overall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product a few times I feel in love with it. It blends well with my skin tone, applies smoothly, takes very little to get a good coverage…… Leaves my skin feeling silky soft with a little glow…….does not smear last all day and easy to remove at the end of your day…….

reviews.review_title: Great all in one product for everywhere use!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There was a ton of hype around this product. I love anything with SPF and knew I had to try! The consistency is pretty creamy. Definitely a buildable cream. Coverage is pretty full and the feel on my skin is not sticky. I rated 4 just bc I’m not sure my skin liked it too much. It did however leave my skin hydrated!! I have pretty combination skin and around my nose it was not settling right.   It’s a great product but I would highly suggest skin prep!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this foundation because I’ve liked IT Cosmetic products in the past & it’s been challenging to find with a high enough SPF and coverage for my pink undertones (my light-toned skin can flare up Rosacea-like so coverage is important to me). I picked the shade that most closely resembles my skin shade & it was still too dark. It had almost an orange-y tint to it - like crappy self-tanners that can make someone light skinned like me look like an Oompa Loompa.  It other words, NOT flattering. To add injury to insult, it was so incredibly DRYING.  Yes my skin is dry (particularly in winter) but I use moisturizer & had done so right before I put the foundation on. I literally had to use water to get the foundation to move around on my skin enough so I wasn’t so orange-y.  This product left my skin feeling extremely dry & flaky on top of the orange-y tint. While this product may work for some, I would not recommend for those who are fair-skin toned. So disappointed because I’ve liked IT Cosmetics in the past, but this one did not measure up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Overall I was very pleased with the product. A little goes a long way so it will last a while. I recommend using as little as possible to avoid the caked on look. Pleased that it contains an spf so I can eliminate a step from my skincare routine. It wore well all day with a primer underneath on my oily t zone. I blotted at lunch as I normally do. The only thing that could be improved is the shade range. I chose light and it is still a bit too dark on my complexion in the middle of winter. It will be fine for the summer months once I have a bit of color. Fair would have been too light. Overall it is a solid option and I would repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After sampling this product for the last two weeks I find it's a nice foundation but I wouldn't exclusively switch to IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+. Despite receiving the light variant, it does not color match my skin, too dark. It goes on pretty smooth with no clumps but does streak a bit. It did not blend well trying to prevent makeup lines.  IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ lasted all day with minimal lines showing at the end of my day.

reviews.review_title: If you use retinoids and have acne scars, buy this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I used this foundation to cover acne scars and to protect my healing skin from the sun while I'm on retinoids. This product offers the coverage I need to cover my scars and looks so dewy and beautiful on. I am absolutely in love. A little goes a long way and I would suggest using disposable beauty blenders if you have acne to prevent bacteria spread.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall, I thought this was a great foundation.  The Deep color matched my skin tone very closely and paired well with other makeup.  It also reduced irritation I have experienced on my face due to recent travel.  I would definitely recommend this to others.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Tan - light brown shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The good and bad thing about this foundation is that it isn't completely full coverage. It's a coverage I prefer but would not expect from something labeled full coverage. It covered redness on my cheeks and did ok at helping to cover some hormonal breakouts. It didn't emphasize my dry skin but also didn't really add any moisture. All in all, I like the it cosmetics foundation formula but wouldn't recommend if you're looking for a true full coverage foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love my new foundation! I have previously used. I've previously used IT's cc cream and really loved it, but this one is even better because it eliminates the need for a foundation! I also really like the very mild scent it comes with as well. The coverage is really good and I would definitely buy this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love! Works so well. I've never had something work so well with coverage!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation was easy to apply and went on smooth.  Not heavy feeling.  Great coverage.  Lasted all day.

reviews.review_title: Must have full coverage cc cream
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product a lot of products that say they're full coverage really aren't you have to build on them and then it looks cakey and thick this is truly a full coverage product it goes on really great it's long-lasting it's got a great smell to it it's not overpowering and you don't have to keep reapplying it you put it on once and it last all day with a amazing finish to it it just does wonderful for full coverage and looks great on it is a must-have it definitely covers better than any other ones I've tried and I've tried countless different ones

reviews.review_title: You can not miss this product!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I applied the it CC+Cream Full Coverage Foundation  with SPF 50+ every morning after I moisturized my skin, it felt It applied smoothly and it fully covered the redness and imperfections, what I like the most over other brands that I have tried before is that it already has sun protection so, I don't have to use another product for that. Beside that it doesn't feel heavy and a small amount is enough to make it work. I really like it, it has a great quality that last for hours. I totally recommend it to everybody.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked the coverage I got with this foundation, but after just an hour of wear my face looked dry and flaky. I tried on multiple occasions, but it always had the same effect. I wanted to like this foundation, but cannot recommend it. I'm not sure if my skin type wasn't compatible, but I don't have this problem with my other foundations.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did not get the full coverage look that I expected.  If you are looking for medium to a bit less…then this is the product for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was a great shade match for me. It was really easy to apply and I didn't feel like I was applying SPF. I think I need to experiment more with different primers when using this product in the future. After a few hours I felt a bit oily so I'll have to make adjustments to combat that. Overall I'm happy that this is available in more darker shades. I'm happy to have this CC+ cream in my cosmetics bag.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really really wanted to love this product. I have used itcosmetic face and eye creams before and absolutely love those to bits. Beautiful products. This foundation tho caused me to break out something terrible. I'm not sure why either I normally have no issues with breaks out when changing foundations or even face care products, I'm not extremely sensitive by any means but yet it was most definitely the foundation causing me to break out. Besides the breakouts the foundation itself had lovely coverage, it blended well and I felt that I didn't even need to use a full pump to get the coverage I wanted. It's definitely needs a setting powder on top because I did find that it doesn't dry or it could be that I'm nor a fan of a dewy looking foundation I tend to go for a more matte look. I didn't have an issue with oxidation through out the day and it was still looking nice by the end of my day. I just wish I didn't get the break outs I did   I recieved this product for free from bzzagent to try it and review

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s nice to the the skin it’s just for me after a while the oils started to seep through and it wasn’t the greatest looks . I’d definitely recommend if you’re not as oily as I am

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Beige - very fair complexion with cool rosy undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ Fair Beige worked so well. It went on smoothly, blended in easily, and lasted all day. It was very creamy, felt light weight and wasn't heavy at all on my face. The sun protection is definitely a plus to have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This CC cream has a beautiful coverage and I love it protectes me from the sun uv.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage of this product is impressive I’ve never had this type of coverage from a cc cream and to have the added benefit of such a high sun protection is amazing . My only issue is I think the color chart makes it difficult to choose a match . I ended up needing to blend a lot as my color match wasn’t accurate but other than that I love it and would definitely recommend but if given the opportunity please go in to a store to get a good match. Added pics in indoor and outdoor light .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked the level of coverage and it didn't feel too heavy. It went on smooth. The spf 50+ saves time, energy and worry because I don't have to worry about sun protection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed testing out this foundation very much. It wears beautiful for more than 8 hours. It blends beautiful and so effortless into the skin. You can’t even tell that it has SPF since it looks and feels like a regular foundation but it’s even better since it offers sun protection. It’s wonderful on its own but you can also combine it with other foundations. I used a variety of my go to primers and cream products and had no issues. It’s truly a great product and I love the coverage. I prefer to use a brush to get even more coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the way this foundation goes on and feels on my skin. For being a full coverage CC cream, it's super creamy. Super light. Not patchy. Last all day w/ primer and setting powder. Does not oxidize. I did notice after SEVERAL hours of wear (like 12 hours) it starts to separate and look cakey. But for majority of the day my face looks fresh w/ NO imperfections. Other products like bronzer and blush applies perfectly and seamlessly. I find myself going for this before my regular. SPF is also a MAJOR plus. I DEFINITELY plan on purchasing this in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love that It’s full coverage! It’s very buildable. It is on the thick side and it works best with a damp beauty blender. I have sensitive red skin and it helped so much to cover the redness! And it also didn’t emphasize my pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a free sample. This is an amazing product. It gave even full coverage without having to layer several different products. It not heavy like most products.

reviews.review_title: Skin care, sun protection and coverage all in one!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed using the IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+. It provides skin benefits, coverage and sun protection, all in one, that the regular foundations don’t. It is full coverage without the heavy, cakey feel, goes on smoothly, and results in a dewy, radiant, even looking skin. The formula is lightweight and leaves the skin feeling soft and hydrated, but not oily. The texture is really velvety. It definitely does color correct and hides scars. And With SPF in it, there’s no need to apply sun screen under the foundation. It is long lasting and lasts all day without a primer. Definitely a great foundation for everyday use. Highly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really do like this foundation. It was pretty awesome to see some new colors added to the mix since the last time I bought some. Prior I had to mix two colors but it was worth it. I don't normally do full-coverage makeup so I didn't use much of this at one time at all. A little definitely goes a LONG way. It was nicely buildable in areas that I needed it to be. It felt really nice on my skin and I couldn't even tell I was wearing it. The only thing I did not like was how it settled into the fine lines around my eyes. I'd buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am new to IT Cosmetics products. I received the foundation in Fair Porcelain and it is a well rounded product. I have red-prone and sensitive skin therefore I wear spf on my face daily. For extra protection, it’s great that this product really does provide full coverage while supplying additional spf coverage. The product blends well and not much is needed. Since I am prone to redness and have discoloration, I always want to make sure I have full coverage that stays the whole day.  This foundation does that without breaking me out. I like the pump applicator too, it helps me distribute the product evenly without making a mess. I recently bought the IT Cosmetics compact powder and the two go great together. :)

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Honey - deep complexion with warm golden undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It didn't feel heavy and was buildable. I wish it was more full coverage though

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Porcelain - very fair complexion with neutral peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has become my favorite step of the day, I love that it combines skincare and makeup. The coverage is amazing, I don’t even need concealer when using it, the texture feels great too, it dries out and it’s not tacky on the skin, really comfortable to wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had always been wanting to try this product so I'm so glad I was now able to. This is full coverage. It has a high coverage. With ingredients such as hyaluronic acid, niacinamide, and vitamin e, I was excited to try. I loved the consistency of the product, but I just wished the shade matched me a bit better. I would definitely recommend this  besides that.  Cons :  - it transfers easily  - wrong undertone for my skin  - more of my summer color  - Can't wear now.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan Rich - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how the cream was full coverage and covered all of my blemishes. I used with my regular foundation and I was very satisfied with the results. The only thing I wish I could change was the color it was a little too light for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used it for the first time and I just fall in love with it my skin looks hydrated and feels really soft I definitely will recommend it to my friends and finally. The only thing is that definitely will be exchange it for a lighter color.

reviews.review_title: I absolutely loved this CC cream
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so great full I had the opportunity to test & review this! I’ve been searching forever for a lightweight but full coverage CC cream that will simplify my everyday makeup routine!  First thing I found out was that a little goes a long way. It was creamy and blended really well with my skin tone. 100% a full coverage foundation, it gave a lot more coverage then I expected.  It is a buildable formula that covered my hyperpigmentation and dark circles really well.  I was impressed with the coverage it offered without looking or feeling cakey.  I also loved the added SPF 50, that doesn’t leave a white cast. I usually forget to put mine on so that sealed the deal.  It has an anti-aging, hydrating serum that leaves my face feeling hydrated and smooth. In the end you get a natural finish with a no makeup, makeup look.  It made my skin look like skin even with foundation on. CC creams contain pigments that specifically target discoloration. I would recommend this to anyone dealing with redness, acne scars, blemishes, uneven skin texture, or hyperpigmentation. I believe anyone who tries this for themselves will definitely find it worth the price.

reviews.review_title: for skin 30+ or wanting a dewy finish all day wear
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried other CC creams and they did not have good coverage. I’ve tried this for a week, on about 3 separate occasions. First I did one full pump and it was FULL glam coverage the last application of foundation only require 1/4 of that which still held up amazingly well with enough coverage and did not need to be reapplied. I think for women who were 30+ and need more of a dewy finish, especially during winter months, this is a great CC foundation full coverage to have. As it also has its anti-aging elements. I would buy this product and also recommend it to family and friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a pretty thick foundation. I applied it with a beauty blender and got really good coverage, but it looked a little cakey. It looked better with a damp blender but then the coverage is a bit lighter.  It has a shiny, dewy finish. I used powder to set it and that looked good too. This didn't emphasize pores or get deep into my lines beyond what's expected for my age. It did get a bit patchy as the day passed. It has a very faint citrus smell that dissipates quickly. I'm glad they added some more shades. I wanted to try this before but couldn't get a match.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has a great finish. Definitely full coverage but it feels lightweight also very buildable. I don’t care for the fragrance but it doesn’t last. Overall I like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this in exchange for my honest review.   Packaged nice, not damaged.  I used on my one hand for this review to compare to my hand without, covers nicely and doesn't feel heavy or oily. I really like the look when I use this on my days i go away. I would recommend this product for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+.  It is an amazing multi use product that makes my skin look and feel great and also helps to protect my face from sun damage. I love the pump dispenser for ease of use. The cream applies easily and smoothly and gives my skin a flawless and natural finish that lasts all day.  I’m thrilled that this includes broad spectrum SPF 50+ and an anti-aging hydrating serum to cut down on my morning skincare steps, saving me time and money with this amazing all in one foundation.
Great coverage it is thick but doesn’t look cakey. The smooth to apply and easy to work with.    I received this in return for my honest review!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have mild rosacea on my face and it has always been difficult to find a foundation let alone a CC Cream that will cover the redness. This not only covered it but it left a smooth naturally finish while having full coverage. I have dry skin and found that it worked best after applying a layer or moisturizer. It did not last as long as I hoped it would. By mid-day I found my nose and cheeks area to look a bit blotchy. I would definitely suggest purchasing in store where you can get color matched since the shade is a little off. I usually purchase shade light in other foundations but the fair porcelain worked out best for me.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Porcelain - very fair complexion with neutral peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this CC cream. It is medium to full coverage, which means that I can apply as much as I need depending on the occasion. It is also very long lasting without being cakey - I can confidently wear it to work knowing that I'll still look flawless at the end of the day. IT Cosmetics does not disappoint!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it spf plus a foundation it doesn’t get any better than this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the benefits of full coverage specially on those days where I didn’t get much sleep or my redness is acting up but have a hard time finding one that doesn’t feel like I’m wearing a mask. This one feels great and little goes a long way to cover up without looking caked on. I also love that it has spf in it which is something I wear everyday already and with this I don’t have to apply another product to my face. This is something I would definitely recommend to anyone who is wanting full coverage without that cake face feeling!

reviews.review_title: IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i love this product. it goes on smoothly and not thick and goopy like other foundations ive tried. it gives me full coverage without having to wear a lot of it. i would reccommend to anybody

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was super excited to try this. I tried suffer from hyperpigmentation and my skin is hard to cover. This provided the full coverage that I needed. It is very even. The color is spot on. I love the way it goes on. It’s very smooth and makes my skin look radiant.  After 8 hours of wear, my skin felt great and still looked beautiful.  This is one of my top foundations. I highly recommend giving it a try.

reviews.review_title: I enjoy the coverage but I'm undecided..
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time using this fan-favorite CC cream. I really enjoy the texture of this product. I really enjoy the medium to fullish coverage it has. The shade light is a little dark for my skin right now in the winter. I wear fairly light 03 in Bare Minerals. I can see why so many people enjoy this product. There are a few cons for me. I prefer mineral powder products on my skin. I found this CC cream to break up and look patchy throughout the day when worn with my usual spf underneath. When I tried wearing the foundation without any spf products it looked and wore much better. I personally don't rely on spf that is included in foundation for my sun protection. Having melasma has taught me that I need sunscreen and lots of reapplying especially in the summer. I don't hate this product but overall I feel it's a bit overhyped. The coverage is the star of the show on this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves a white cast on the skin not bendable , feels like a mask

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this CC cream foundation. It is definitely full coverage. It blends out so smoothly and nicely. I have dry skin, and this foundation works so well on me. It leaves my face feeling hydrated without being oily or greasy. It doesn't get cakey and has a beautiful finish. The SPF is great for being out in the sun and doesn't leave a white cast on my skin. I love that it comes in a pump style tube! I absolutely love this foundation and would totally recommend it!

reviews.review_title: Works great as a full coverage foundation!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is without a doubt a full coverage foundation, and it makes my skin look flawless without looking caked on. I also love that it has spf 50+ and it smells like tea tree oil, smells amazing and fresh! I love this stuff!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cc cream. Goes on smooth. Gives good coverage. Love how lightweight it feels. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is truly amazing. I was able to use this product scarcely but IT foundation provided complete full coverage. It matched my skin perfectly, it didn't smell clinical, it didn't enhance my fine lines, and I didn't break out along my tzone or jaw line like usually. It didn't feel greasy or suffocating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product, I'm hooked. The formula is creamy and flawless. It covers what I need it to but looks beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a fantastic product cover well and protects from the sun as needed daily. I enjoy this product is long lasting and budget friendly. Too bad this shade is too dark for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the coverage, the fact it comes in a pump. It does not settle in lines or exaggerate pores. I use it with and without blurring primer and i would use it both ways. I honestly have no complaints. It worked beautifully with a silicone based primer and with a non silicone based primer. I am very impressed i you can do brush or sponge both ways works great i prefer sponge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually use a lighter weight coverage foundation, more sheer than this. But I really do like this full coverage foundation more as a concealer or some hyoerpigmented spots I have. I love that it has high spf too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that a product. Aging skin needs full coverage and this foundation has it. It will cover most any blemish or in-even skin tone. I am in my 59’s so I need heavy coverage. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was able to try It Cosmetics CC+ Cream full coverage foundation with spf and I'm highly satisfied. The formula blends out great and appears a little dark at first but works out great. I appreciate that the formula doesn't have a white cast back. It's new to this formula and I really love it. It definitely helps to remember the sunscreen. Highly recommend and satisfied!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have previously used the other IT cosmetic CC cream and this new one doesn’t disappoint! It gives you a matte, smooth look without caking on and ofc the SPF is a really nice addition to it. I have oily skin and I don’t feel like it’s suffocating my pores. It’s full coverage though which I don’t prefer to use on a daily basis but with more in person events I am sure I will get much more use of this foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ - Tan Warm is an amazing multi-tasker - it hydrates, color corrects, has spf and also is good anti-aging serum. A small amount goes a long way.  It blends easily into skin and love the shade it just matched perfectly with my tan skin tone.  The best part is that it leaves a glowy radiant finish.  Love it and highly recommend it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Ivory - very fair complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really nice foundation. I would say that it has really high coverage as it helped color correct, helping with dark spots and redness. I still used a concealer for some acne spots. I love that its spf 50+ and has skincare ingredients. The foundation sits well on the skin with a satin finish.

reviews.review_title: Not the best for oily areas
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was okay for me. It had nice coverage, especially for the dark patches on my cheeks. It also had a natural finish without being overly dewy. But later in the day I saw some separation around my nose, which tends to get a little oily. I like that it has SPF but for me the 50+ seems like overkill. I'll stick with my Rare Beauty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love IT cosmetics, and this foundation is wonderful, it goes on even and so easy to blend ! I love that it contains SPF and has anti-aging ingredients in it ! It comes in a wide shade of skin tones ! It minimized the appearance of large pores and fine lines. The only thing I would change from this product is the  Broad-spectrum, I wish it was full-spectrum SPF, but it still delivers a flawless look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been loving this product. It is full coverage while still letting my skin look like skin and not like a mask. It last on me about 5-6 hours looking too notch and after 7 hours still looks good but starts to break down a bit(which I dont mind it’s expected with most products) Plus I love that it already includes SPF, it’s definitely a must have for the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This by far is the best CC cream on the market. It has a high SPF, full coverage . It covers all of my imperfections while not caking or drying out my skin. It is not to heavy so I never feel like I am wearing makeup. Just a great option for a foundation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from BZZagent for my honest review I received a color that was way too dark for me.  I have used other It cosmetics products in the past and I really like them.  I really like the way this product goes on and the way it lasts throughout the day.  An added bonus is the SPF 50 which i love because I live in Florida and like the added protection.   This product is easy to apply and gives great coverage.
This foundation is the one. It's light and smooth. Very very sleek. I love it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really nice CC cream, slightly fragranced, very silky and high coverage, matte finish. Super beautiful. If it was slightly less fragranced I would give it 5/5.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ is a fabulous foundation.  It is full coverage, but does not make you face feel heavy. I love that is have SPF already in it. I will definitely be using this foundation in my lineup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love how light and fresh it feels on the skin. The coverage is awesome. And the fact that its spf 50!

reviews.review_title: Got the wrong shade but worked well as a contour.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the wrong shade but tried it anyways but as a contour and it worked. I couldn't really say if it was hydrating because I only used a minimal amount as contour. But it stayed for hours and gave a natural shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great CC cream. It has great coverage and many shades to choose from. It blended well and its medium to full coverage. I also like that it had 50spf and great skin care benefits.  I have sensitive skin and this didn't break me out which is a plus in my book. I received this in the shade medium and it was a tad light for my skin but that's no problem. Next time I'll get the next shade up. I've already recommended this to my mom and sister.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Rich - tan to deep complexion with neutral peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this CC cream.  It provided excellent coverage without feeling thick or making my skin oily.  It provided long-lasting coverage and a skin-like finish.  I would highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received the IT Cosmetics CC+ Foundation in the shade Tan free to try from BzzAgent in exchange for my honest opinion. This Foundation is fabulous! You get full coverage without looking cakey. Like the commercials say your skin but better. It has a slightly citrus scent which I love! It covers all blemishes and wears all day with no breakdown of the product. Amazing it has 50+ SPF already included. So no need for an extra step of applying sunscreen. If your on the hunt for a new Foundation try this, you'll fall in love as fast as I did....lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can't believe how well it matches my skin! Gives me a natural looking dewy glow. It has just the right amount of coverage, doesn't even look like you're wearing makeup. I really like the way it makes my skin look and feel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: IT cosmetics have my trust in every product so far, and their CC+ cream with SPF 50+ is no exception. This is the best full-coverage cream with the highest SPF I ever saw in a beauty product 50+ and this is an elegant CC cream that everyone will ask did you change something? The texture is smooth and glides easily, I had this for 11 to 13 hours, and no need to retouch, no bad smell no eye-burning sensation, it is all makes it perfect. And a once high-quality packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This felt too thick on the skin for my liking. Didn’t wear well no matter what combo of primer or setting powder. Just didn’t mesh well with my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! Perfect for redness! Last throughout the day!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this foundation in exchange for my honest review. This product came just in time as I was searching for the perfect foundation. I have purchased IT. Products before but found that the coverage wasn’t exactly what I needed, etc. This product was amazing coverage and the shade was perfect for my skin tone. I really like the ingredients that it contains as I have acne prone skin. I really like this foundation and will deff be buying g in the

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this foundation for two weeks I really love it. It does leave me feeling a little shiny which is why I gave it only four stars. BUT, it covers really well and hides my large pores while not feeling too heavy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Couldn’t have asked for a better foundation. I love it when my sunscreen is added to my foundation so I don’t have to do that extra step. This full coverage is creamy and goes on well. I find it does not make my skin look oily or over done.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This full coverage cc cream is amazing. It gives you the look of full coverage without the cakey feel of full coverage. If you are looking for something lightweight and full coverage, this is the perfect product for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is full coverage. It has a high coverage. The only problem I have with this is it transfers

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had always been wanting to try this product so I'm so glad I was now able to. The foundation is definitely full coverage! It is thick which I am not used to so a little definitely goes a long way. I feel like this bottle will last me a couple years. I like my foundations to be runny and medium coverage so I'm not sure if I would purchase this again, but if you're into the full coverage it is a good option!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you are looking to get the most out of your money and an excellent product, then you MUST try IT CC+ (full coverage, color correcting, anti aging, hydrating serum, plus 50+ SPF UVA /UVB)  This color correcting cream is everything!! She's my new best friend! When it says Yourr skin but better, its no lying!! I have hyperpigmentation and some parts are very noticeable, but this cream works wonders for me! No more different skin tones and it wears like a dream! Its full coverage but it doesn't feel or look thick. It applies evenly and easily leaving no streak marks. The cream does not settle into my lines either which I hate. Nope I feel like the anti aging helps with that bc my fine lines are less visible, less deep, and more smooth. And my skin feels hydrated. The packaging is nice too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pros :  - Blend easily and nice consistency  - Only layer offers fairly good coverage  - Feels Hydrating   Cons :  - wrong undertone for my skin  - creases in my fine lines but was better after I set with powder

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to get this to sample, but when it arrived, I was sent the wrong tone. It was WAY TOO DARK for me. With that said, it did appear to be thick and provide great coverage, so much so that when I tried to wash it off, it took a lot of soap. I hope to try this again, next time in my correct skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was using the CC+ Nude Glow but I wanted a full coverage. I was lucky to be able to try this product and boy did I find a winner! It makes my skin look flawless. The coverage is amazing. It will easily cover dark spots and smooth out any skin unevenness. I normally apply with a foundation brush and the buff out spots around my nose, chin, or forehead to get a very smooth application. The product comes out a bit thicker than I expected but it applies so lightly! During each application, I'm always amazed by how light the product is. If it weren't for how great it makes my skin look, I'd forget I was even wearing anything. I experienced no white cast when taking photos. I sometimes forget to apply a sunscreen when using other products so I love that it's added to this foundation.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Foundation. It matches my skin tone and goes on easily with a sponge or my fingers. It provides great coverage so I can easily hide anything I want to on my face. It's not greasy or shiny and lasts all day. I highly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: With ingredients such as hyaluronic acid, niacinamide, and vitamin e, I was excited to try. My t zone is oily so this product would be good for me durning the cold months. I was shocked by the rich and pigmented full coverage. Not reading the product description, I was expecting a light coverage serum. The color was noticeably off to me. Too dark. Maybe I was heavy handed with it. My error. I’m determined to make it work solely because of the spf 50+. It’s hard to find a blendable high spf for my dark complexion. The foundation was easily transferable. I think my issues are easily fixable with less product, highlighting and powder for a full face makeup day. After a full day of wear, my skin felt nice and supple after removing the foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product works like a charm. My skin has become noticeably smoother since I started using it. It is easy to apply, and very little goes a long way for me. The spf factor is a huge bonus. This product is an all round winner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like this makeup; it’s medium to full coverage and it lasts. It’s not my top pick for under eyes but love it for anything else I want to cover.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for over a week now and hands down it's thee best. Too good to be a CC cream really! I mean the coverage is just amazing and it blends really well into the skin and leaves silk like finish. Highly recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so fortunate to be able to try the IT cosmetics cc cream and full coverage! This foundation covers every flaw and doesn’t make your face look dry! The look is a bit dewy which I normally don’t like because of my oily skin but this had the perfect recipe for just the right look. I highly recommend trying this foundation especially if you love full coverage like me! I have a lot of acne and acne scars which were blurred once the foundation was applied!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had tried this foundation in the past, but the lightest shade still pulled orange on me, so I had to return it, but now the shade range has expanded and I couldn’t be happier! The shade match was pretty much spot on and I loved how full coverage it was without being cakey or suffocating on the skin. My redness was reduced and pores were noticeably “hidden.” Even with a higher SPF, I had no problem with a white cast in pictures. My all time foundation has been discontinued, so I’m very pleased to have found a new favorite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really great all-in-one full-coverage foundation. It doesn't get splotchy, cakey, or streaky. It doesn't settle into fine lines. It has a dewy look that is very nice, especially in the winter when skin tends to be extra dry. It lasts all day. The all-in-one formula is especially great for vacation when you don't want to take your whole vanity with you.

reviews.review_title: A must have on any day you want buildable!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved using this product on days when I wanted the power to build the product and still feel like I was wearing nothing on my face! This became my go to very quickly and I loved it because it contained sunscreen and still made me feel covered! It works beautifully under other cream products and would recommend to anyone!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from bzzzagent. This product is truly amazing and hydrating. It covers imperfections and makes my skin look glowing!

reviews.review_title: Left my skin oily and broken out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used IT Cosmetics products and really loved them in the past, but not this one. The coverage was as expected and initially looked good, but my skin looked greasy/oily shortly after applying. I wanted to give it a few days to see if my skin would adjust to it, but I ended up breaking out really bad, particularly across my cheekbones and the hollows of my cheeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for about 2 weeks now and I love it!  I love the full coverage that it provides but if I want a little less coverage I just blend in a little moisturizer and it works perfect.  I get so many compliments on how good my skin looks and I love that it already has sunscreen in it which saves me a step.  This product goes on smoothly, doesn't pill up and lasts all day.  I will be buying more of this in the future!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it was a great product but I didn't get the right color to match my skin.  but it did go smoot

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this one and done product! It feels like skincare, SPF, and a beautiful foundation all in one. It's rare to find base products that offer such high coverage while looking natural AND providing good sun protection. It goes on smoothly and lasts all day even on my oily skin. I just make sure to set really well. Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ does what it says!!  The foundation covers fully but still fills light on my skin.  It stays on all day and has not caused me any break outs in the last 2 weeks of wearing it. I am a fan of IT Cosmetics and this one lives up to the name.   A little bit goes a long way for the coverage.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product. It gives me great full coverage without feeling cakey. It goes on smoothly. I love that my skin looks soft and moisturized because I have dry skin. It’s a bonus that it is anti aging and has spf, I don’t have to use more products.

reviews.review_title: it's a must in my daily routine.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: after using full coverage foundation for a few days I'm hooked,it's amazing and makes my skin feel soft and moisturized,and covers all my blemishes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using the IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ for about two weeks and I am obsessed. I am 48 with some fine lines and combo skin. I am amazed at the coverage. I do apply a light primer and with this particular foundation I found it applied best for me with a brush. I had no issues with it sinking into fine lines. This foundation for me was smooth and beautiful while protecting my skin with SPF. I will absolutely keep using this foundation as I am very happy with the results. Other products played very well with the foundation. I do use a light dusting of powder after application.

reviews.review_title: Would buy especially for the spf and coverage
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this for a few weeks now and I actually like it! I ALWAYS tend to forget to apply sunscreen & this has spf 50 WHICH…..leads into there’s NO white cast/hue! I was also skeptical because with some brands dark/deep aren’t really that. This shade was too dark for me (not by a ton) so I did need a lighter concealer to make it look natural

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product, I was very impressed! It made my face look great.  Very smooth, no lines.  I would truly recommend anyone try this.  It works great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is great! You need a minimal amount to provide full coverage. It goes on very smooth and blends well. Also the 50 spf is an added benefit. I usually put a tinted sunscreen on below my foundation but with this having a high spf I don’t need to do that anymore. If you are looking for a foundation that can be layered for light to full coverage and want to prevent sun damage, this is a great choice!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: IT Cosmetics foundation are my favorite ones, love the package with a dispenser, make so easy to apply the right amount of product, It has a natural finish and the shade match is perfect, my skin looks smooth and radiant. Blends in evenly with my skin tone and great coverage, this formula is flawless, happy to get to try this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Another hit for It Cosmetics.  The coverage is great and I love how it does not settle into my pores.  I can wear it all day and it doesn't melt away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved loved LOOVED this foundation. It left ma kin feeling so fresh and looking so clear. The color was also perfect! I put it on before work and it stayed all day! What a great foundation. It didn't looking cakey at all

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great product , is super moisturizer I recommend this if u are 50+ age !  Full coverage, great price

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried so many other CC creams and none work like this. It doesn’t provide “full coverage”, but the formula is so lightweight and hydrating that I’m okay with medium coverage. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tested the new IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ in light shade and I loved it. It blends very easily and effortlessly and has a nice buildable coverage. This CC cream not just provide good tint to the skin but also offers great benefits and sun protection. After application skin feels soft and hydrated. This CC+ Cream definitely does color correct but I would not say it's full coverage because it's thinner and lighter than other full coverage foundations that I have, but it does make my face look more natural. It's still a great foundation for everyday looks and those days where you want to use something not too heavy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this product daily since I received it and I like the way it looks on my dry skin! I’m glad there are new shades, the previous fair shade runs warm on me. SPF causes a bit of flashback so it’s probably best to not use this at night if you plan to be photographed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ - Fair Porcelain IS AMAZING.  I am really surprised with the coverage a little product goes far.  I will definitely add this to my everyday makeup routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After trying this product multiple times, I just don’t think it’s something I would reach for besides a rainy day or running errands, sitting at the pool etc.  While it has good coverage, it’s very tacky, transfers and rubs off. I tried pairing it with a primer and it made it worse. I really wanted to love it! I’m a makeup artist and there are many other better options at lower price points.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage is truly full coverage, lightweight and easy to blend. It works beautifully with other products including powders, other creams, and skincare items. The color match was spot on for me (Deep Honey). Works well for oily/combination skin types!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the consistency of the product, but I just wished the shade matched me a bit better. I would definitely recommend this  besides that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is light but offers  great full coverage. And a little goes a long way. I really didn't need that much product to get instant results. I'm an oily girl but don't experience any excess oil or separation and I love the fact that it's spf 50

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Really is full coverage, it covers everything and my skin looked and felt better. I work 10-12 hour days and it held up well. My skin didn't look oily or cakey at the end of the day.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Ivory - very fair complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received the color ‘Fair Ivory’. It comes in a 32mL tube. It pumps out easily. It’s easy to rub into the skin. I just used my fingers and massaged. At first the color had a slightly oxidized look, but after a few seconds it turned into a really nice full coverage makeup. I love that it contains SPF 50+ UVA/UVB protection. It also contains snail mucin, colloidal oatmeal, Niacinamide and Hyaluronic Acid. For my drier skin, it gave me a matte finish. Really happy with this cc cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This CC cream is really nice! One pump goes a very long way and it’s definitely full coverage. I like that it doesn’t have a strong smell or feels heavy on the skin. It wears beautifully for all the hours i’m at work as well. I do have dry skin and this is perfect, if you have more oily skin i'm not sure if this would be right for you. I definitely recommend trying this product!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Ivory - very fair complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was wowed by how it was full coverage but it still looks natural. Easy to work with and a little goes a long way. Perfect for any occasion. I wear foundation daily and I love how it contains skin care benefits. It don't break me out or cause any allergic reaction. Does need to be touched up throughout the day however. I feel like it starts to bunch up around dry parts of my face at the end of the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This CC+ is amazing I must say. It does the job amazingly and the added spf is a plus for me because my skin looks amazing and is being protected at the same time. It goes on beautifully and is a true full coverage. You don’t need too much and it doesn’t leave an overdone look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It Cosmetics CC+ cream has replaced my sunscreen, anti age serum, lotion and foundation. It has a nice buildable coverage that goes on well and feels nice on skin. I love that it has SPF 50 without the white cast, scent and feel of regular sunscreen. It is not drying or oily. Associate matched me to the light shade, which works perfectly with my complexion. Once dry, color stays put and won't rub off. Easily removed with makeup remover. Applied with fingers, then dabbed it with a makeup sponge to avoid it from settling on pores and fine lines.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is absolutely amazing. It goes on light and leaves a smooth finish. The color is a perfect match. It feels very light and I would definitely purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very pleased with my free sample of IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ Fair Beige!! Blends in evenly with my skin tone and great coverage! Doesn’t leave my skin feeling oily, it gives my skin a very light and natural feeling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review. I love how full coverage it is. It has a dewy finish and last all day long even through my workout after work. I would definitely recommend not only is it full coverage but it also will protect your skin from the sun

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great all-in-one, full coverage, hydration and SPF! Great packaging, it is always great to have a pump on your foundation. The coverage is great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best foundation for mature women- does not settle into lines and never looks cakey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product has an excellent coverage long lasting. Its easy to apply and its perfect for combination skin. Makeup looks natural but is full coverage. I recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try this but so saddened.  Every single pore and acne scare was almost highlighted. Maybe a primer under would work better but as a stand alone it made my skin texture look horrific.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received It Cosmetics CC Cream Foundation in exchange for my honest review. I was sent the shade Rich, which seems to be a little light for my skin tone. But when I apply this CC cream it blends nicely on my skin tone, feels very lightweight and doesn't streak. This is a full coverage foundation that blurs imperfections, but still looks like skin. There is a nice clean smell, and the cc cream foundation plays nicely with my other makeup products, such as bronzer/ contour. When I apply bronzer on top of the cc cream foundation, it gives me the right complexion. I didn't have any breakouts or white cast on my skin. This cc cream foundation stays on my skin all day, and there wasn't a huge transfer , once my face was sprayed with setting spray. Lastly this CC cream foundation has SPF 50+, which protects the whole face in the sun. And gets anyone in the habit of wearing SPF, without adding it as an extra step!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's feels like a second skin. It blended so well into the skin. It's really great and stays longer. Tested it on my cousin too and she loved how smooth her skin feels and looks. Great product for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This formula is flawless! It has a natural finish and the shade match is perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation applies so well on skin and it is not heavy despite being full coverage. It glides on skin initially upon application but after that it stays on all day. It is perfect for outdoor activities because my face doesn't get the sunburn effect. It did not clog my pores like some full coverage foundation tend to do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample, I choose the wrong color unfortunately. I however did love the formula and texture. Goes on extremely smooth and has the added befit of SPF 50+ to keep my skin safe. I would definitely recommend. I will be buying it in the right tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love  IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+. I’ve noticed a difference in my skin it looks healthier. I love the fact that it’s full coverage so it covers all my imperfections like acne scars and large pores. I also love how it has SPF in it. This is definitely something I will be using during the summer especially since my doctor has told me to always wear SPF because I have skin cancer that runs throughout my family. I definitely recommend  IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ and suggest anyone looking for a foundation to go out and but it you won’t regret it.

reviews.review_title: Love it! Beautiful! But shades darker than appear
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’d been wanting to try this for a LONG time, but the lightest shade wasn’t light enough for my fair skin so I was excited they came out with more shades! I got “Fair Beige.” I can make it work but it’s darker than it appears in the swatches here. But, I love this enough to get it again & then I’ll get “Fair Porcelain.” I have a photo of swatches of the It Fair Beige shade next to the 2 shades I have in the Elf Camo CC cream. Elf Light 203N was too dark & I had to use a mixer to lighten it. Elf Fair 125C works well for me. As you can hopefully tell in the swatches, the It shade is slightly darker than Elf 125C, but not as dark as Elf 205N.  This has SPF 50. But, I never look to my foundation to provide me with my SPF…nobody should. You’re never going to apply enough foundation to get the stated SPF so you should always apply a separate SPF. But, I don’t mind the extra layer of protection.   This is a thicker consistency, but creamy & glides onto the skin easily. It applies well with a brush & sponge. With a sponge, 1 thin layer gives medium coverage & a 2nd thin layer gives full coverage. With a brush, 1 thin layer gives almost full coverage (doesn’t completely cover my sun spots but close), & a 2nd thin layer over my sun spots gives complete coverage. It doesn’t look or feel heavy on the skin.   I have normal to dry skin, more on the dry side with some extremely dry areas. This has a nice finish, not completely matte but not dewy either. If I don’t give it time to set on its own (10-15 min) it transfers unless set with powder. If I don’t let it set on its own or set it with powder, I can’t apply powder products over it as smoothly as I’d like. But, I’ll usually just apply cream products instead so I get nice application & setting spray to set everything in place. It lasts all day without transferring/fading. If I have the time to let it sit powder products apply nicely & with setting spray it lasts all day without transferring or fading.

reviews.review_title: My skin in a bottle.. Just perfect
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly, that's all I can say. It's my skin, but better.  Radiant. Lightweight. Long wearing. Minimal transfer. No fragrance. And a little goes a long way. I didn't think I was a CC cream person but I am now!  (I also did recieve this for free but I'm totally buying this when I run out.)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product goes so smooth on my skin. It covers up all my imperfections without having to put so much on my face. It lasts long and  can wear it with my everyday activities. Will be purchasing in the future.

reviews.review_title: Did what needed to be done!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation. It matched my skin tone so well and gave me a nice dewy full coverage look that lasted all day. I love that it has SPF in it. It felt nice to know I had that additional coverage. It's durable but easy to wipe off when you're ready. 10/10 recommend.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Honey - deep complexion with warm golden undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The product is soft but it is very pigmented and unfortunately it was not my skin color so before buying you should try it so that you get the right color but I loved that its coverage is very good without the need for so much product so I recommend it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin

It lasts all day, doesn’t crease or settle into fine lines, is hydrating, and color matches my skin beautifully. This is definitely a keeper!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan Warm - tan complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation had a smooth finish. It provided full coverage for any spots and no visible pores. I like that it has 50 SPF provide the physical barrier. I need this kind of protection from sun damage. I couldn’t smell the SPF and I appreciate that because I don’t always like the scent. There is also no white cast. My skin felt dewy while wearing it, and I feel completely taken care of.

reviews.review_title: Good coverage and super light on the skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received the IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+  from @bzzagent and @itcosmetics in exchange for my honest review.   I liked it because it has good coverage, you can use it daily since it is not heavy, it is very light, in addition to having sunscreen .its packaging is good and it has a good size, If you have dry skin and you like your skin to look radiant, you may like this product. The tone I'm using is (tan wrm) I stay too dark I should buy a lighter one for my skin type

I did have slight burning regarding my eyes. This could have been due to a number of things. It is allergy season. It subsided quickly. Only real issue I have with it is that it seems to make my t-zone more oil than usual. It isn't something that a little powder won't fix. I recommend this product, and would purchase. I received this item free for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Beige - very fair complexion with cool rosy undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this and was so excited to try it. It was instantly patchy on my skin and separated immediately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I pick the wrong color.  Because it's nearly impossible to pick the right color online. So I can't comment on if the color match my skin.  No it didn't Because it was to dark. I can say.  I am impressed they had such a rich darker color for my melanated sisters.  Usually my skin tone is the darkest shade. I loved the bottle it came in.  The only negative is that it didn't stand up.  The pump it very convenient and mess free. It's easy to travel with also.  I didn't like the smell of the product. But once it was on my face.  The smell didn't bother me. In order for it to go on smooth.  Your face have to be primed. Once on, it's definitely full coverage. It looks like skin not cakey very natural. I didn't wear it out.  So I can't speak on how long it last.  It did wash off well. I'm going to try to use this as a contour next time.  Overall I would recommend this. Because of the benefits of having the sunscreen, anti-aging serum and color correcting built into the product.  This saves time and money.

reviews.review_text: If you’re searching for a CC+ cream this is it. It makes you think you’re wearing full coverage foundation but so lightweight and helps with sun protection. I’ve even told my neighbor about it.

It doesn't have an orange undertone so I much appreciate that. It was easy to apply with a blush or a blender and is convenient for those 5 minute makeup days.

I love that it is a pump top. I would highly recommend this to others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage of the product is perfect and blends well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Deep skin tone, Combination skin
