All in all, still an amazing product! It would probably be my everyday go-to if I had gotten the correct shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was absolutely skeptical of this foundation. After I tried it I was super impressed. Not only did it give me great coverage but it's hydrating and dried beautifully! You actually can't tell that I have anything on. I wear it daily now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_text: Love this stuff. It goes on smooth and full coverage too! It lasted all day with no issues!

reviews.review_title: Not for me, at least not right now...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was decent but it does not look as good as my foundation. It has potential though and I'll definitely give it another try in the summer when I prefer a lighter look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I tried IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+, and I have to say that I adore it.  My skin is oily, and I have not found a foundation I love until now.  When applied, it goes on very smooth and creamy.  Once on, it feels very light and provides full coverage—it covers blemishes well.  IT Cosmetics CC+ lasts all day long without melting, fading, or getting shiny.  I’m a tough critic regarding foundations and have been impressed with IT Cosmetics CC+.   As a newfound fan of IT Cosmetics CC+, I will repurchase this and highly recommend IT Cosmetics CC+.

reviews.review_title: not for me but could be for you!

I do love the idea of this for long wear everyday wear and for travelling. No need to set. Has amazing skincare benefits so one less serum to bring. I do appreciate the extended shade range for deeper tones.   I would reccomend this to someone new to cosmetics. I think all skin types; oily, normal, or dry could wear this w/ v easy skin prep.  Personally wouldn't buy as I prefer my full coverage special occasion foundations to not have SPF and to be in a little luxe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is so good its lightweight, full coverage! Love it because it does not feel cakey at all. Leaves your skin looking natural, I use this foundation in my daily makeup routine now! 10 out of 10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bounced around tinted moisturizers and foundations for years, until I found this one and now I am hooked. This is life-changing for my skin! My skin looks healthy and refreshed, this covers my discolouration and acne scars without clogging my pores or feeling heavy. Anti-aging serum is a bonus.
My new favorite foundation. I get so much compliments on hiw good my skin look

I love my IT cosmetics CC full coverage foundation. I am using medium coverage and it is perfect on my skin tone and last all day without coming off. I wear the foundation every day and love that it feels light and not heavy and cakey.

I love a natural look but sometimes you need more coverage.  I felt like I could use very little and sheer it out and then build where needed.  This lasted all day and felt great, not too heavy.  I love the packaging and find it easy to take on the go for travel or (red light makeup- guilty as charged).  Will definitely be repurchasing.

This is literally the best foundation I have come across! Finally! a product that does not lie about what it does. This is a full coverage foundation with SPF50. This will literally correct all your imperfections while giving you a satin finish. It really is a must half it retails for $44 which is not bad for a perfect make up day. Oh and did I mention it lasts all day just go ahead and buy it. Thank me later.

This is great product for achieving that flawless even skin for a no makeup look. I used a few small pumps and it gives great coverage. Also, it's doesn't feel cakey or heavy like some other ones I've used. It gives skin!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Rich - tan to deep complexion with neutral peach undertone
reviews.review_text: Lets just start by saying that this is a hard shade to match. The one that I got turned out to be like three shades too dark for me, but I still sample it around the house just to be able To fully review it. Now aside from it being to dark for me I can say it’s not an all day wear, but I did love how smooth it went on and also the protection it offered. One issue I did have was it did ended up breaking me out a bit, and was a bit oily. I really want to try it out again in my correct shade and also try wearing a different way and see if the outcome is the same (without face prep).

This CC+ Cream definitely lives up to the hype. It applies evenly and smoothly, providing hydration and full coverage. I've used other products like this that feel so heavy on my skin, so I'm very appreciative that this foundation is so lightweight I can barely feel it on my face. I love that a little goes a long way and how well it works at covering up imperfections while maintaining a natural finish. It's very buildable without creasing or looking cakey and it lasts all day. I would highly recommend this product and I will definitely be purchasing it when I run out!

I am completely in love with this product. I'm 44 years old and at this point, a product that is multiple products in one, is exactly what I need. It evens out my skin tone while hydrating and protecting it with sunscreen. It made my face look flawless and I am hooked! I have been looking for a product this good and this is The one. I absolutely recommend this product, it's a must have in my opinion.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan Warm - tan complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_text: I tried this product and unfortunately it was the wrong shade. However, it smells amazing and I can definitely see potential in the coverage it provides.

I really enjoyed this product. I have been eyeing it for a while now, so I’m glad i was able to participate in the survey.  It goes on smoothly and it is not oily. It’s very long lasting. I love the extra layer of sun protection with its 50 spf with no white cast. It did a great job at covering my red and evening out my skin tone.

It cosmetics really makes such multiple benefical products! Not only is this a color correcting full coverage cream foundation. It is a anti aging, hydrating serum with 50+ spf broad spectrum sunscreen! That is really impressive. They have a amazing shade range, for this comfortable foundation. It applies beautifully to the skin, lasts all day and is easily a full coverage or light coverage foundation depending on how much you apply. I am beyond impressed with this product! Couldn't reccomend it more. I did choose a shade slightly to dark for me, but that was a me mistake! Still is beautiful.
Great coverage. There is no way to test the SPF claims, at this moment. The pigment is  flawless. A bit goes a long way. The packaging could be a bit better.

I started using the CC+ Color Correcting Full Coverage Cream, which gives my complexion a bright and even appearance. It really does cover the imperfections very well, and I love the added bonus of sun protection. A little bit really does go a long way, so I just needed 1-2 pumps of product, then I blended it in with an applicator brush. The cream feels light going on, and feels light on my skin. Not cakey at all. I feel like my face had an extra layer of moisturizing.  Since it is winter in NY, there are not many sunburn opportunities but I still feel protected from UVA/UVB. The product comes in a pump tube applicator, which is so much better than the squeeze tube.   I’m happy with this brand and product because it does not contain bismuth oxychloride (I am allergic to that). Many make-up brands contain bismuth oxychloride, which made it hard for me to follow a make-up routine until IT Cosmetics came along.   I’ve been a long-time user of IT Cosmetics and I plan to continue using it for years to come, and I will definitely use the CC+ cream again.I would recommend this to my friends and family --

I loved this product after trying this product I must say it has been one of the most hydrating products I’ve ever used. Is full coverage and leaves my face feeling smoother and blemish free. It does not leave my face feeling heavy . I love that is spf I’m very impressed by the quality of this product . Already recommended it to friends and family . I highly recomendar this product .

I received this product for free through bzzagent in exchange for my honest opinion. Unfortunately I wasn't able to personally try this one out due to the shade being to dark for me; however I tried it on my best friend  for our girls night out dinner and when I say it blended in to her skin so perfectly it looked like her skin. It was easy to work with and blend out over her skin cover any blemishes and scars she had. She was able to wear it all night without drying or becoming oily and she absolutely loves it to the point that she has already went a stocked up on it.

reviews.review_title: A must have in humid and hot weather
reviews.review_text: I used this foundation on my last vacation where the location was hot and humid. I applied this foundation in the morning and it lasted through the day. I enjoy that this foundation is lightweight yet full coverage while offering sunscreen protection. It makes my skin glow and doesn’t leave a white coat or shade that some SPF makeup’s do. I would definitely recommend this foundation to my friends.

I’m surprised by how good the coverage is. It’s full coverage for cc cream. I don’t even need any foundation. Compared to other brands I used, these one is really one of my favorites. I have combination skin, it’s not oily or greasy at all. I will buy it if these one run out.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Bronze - very deep complexion with cool rosy undertones
reviews.review_text: I like that the color matched my skin  perfectly. It’s kind of shiny but long lasting. I love that this is full coverage but it doesn’t look like a ton of makeup is on your face.

I wasn’t expecting for this to actually be full coverage as it is a CC cream. I was pleasantly surprised and impressed. The tone is my only issue as it’s too red. Typically when brands make darker shades they assume that we all have red undertones and this was my only issue. Right shade, wrong tone but I can fix it

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Honey - deep complexion with warm golden undertone
reviews.review_text: I used this product for about a week and honestly I love it, it has great coverage and applied on really nice

reviews.review_title: Love that it’s full coverage plus SPF
reviews.review_text: I received this product to test try from BzzAgent, I would like to say thank you first off! I like the smell of this product and how smooth it goes on the only thing I wish I would of used a brush or sponge and not my hands as it stained a little. Second I may need a shade lighter as this one was a little on the orange side when I put it on. I do love that it has full coverage and SPF so that’s a big plus, because sometimes I forget to add sunscreen. I will continue to use though until I get my hands on a different shade. Definitely recommend!

I love all of IT Cosmetics products, so I was super happy to be able to try out this foundation.  If you are looking for light coverage, this is not for you.  This is for someone who is looking for FULL coverage.  It covered my freckled skin flawlessly, so I could see this being really nice for someone who has pigmentation issues or other skin discolorations that they would like covered.  The finish is more of a natural look, not dewy, not matte.  You can powder over it to set it and make it more matte if you'd like.  What I really like is the high spf in it.  A lot of us mature ladies need to watch our sun exposure and having the SPF of 50 in the foundation is wonderful.  As an added plus, it feels great on the skin!

I used this foundation to achieve a full face glam look for a fundraising event. This is the most full coverage foundation I have ever used. The color match was great and there was no white-cast. I love that it was easy to blend. Give this a try.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan Warm - tan complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff! It goes on smooth & absorbs into the skin well. It offers full coverage, all day & I love that it has sunscreen in it to help keep my skin looking beautiful
The it CC full coverage cream is amazing! The tube is sleek and fits in my purse. It dispenses the perfect amount of cream and it's so creamy. Love that it's SPF too! Highly recommend!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan Warm - tan complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_text: I might consider changing my foundation to this CC + cream.  So many great and beneficial things in this tube. Full coverage for sure! Loved that it has anti aging serum i always wondered why you can't mix this in with foundation i hate layering i feel that things can't be working efficiently. And also SPF 50!!! This is genius finally someone who is after my face goals.  The cream blended in smoothly without any problems the only thing for me is I'm so oily it comes through. So note to self will need IT powder. But if that's 2 things (SPF & serum) less i have to worry about in my facial routine I'm all for it!!!
I really wanted to like the cc cream but it was very thick￼. It accentuating the lines and imperfections in my skin. eventually by the end of the day it pulled and flaked.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rich - golden brown shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_text: I did not really get a chance to use this product as much as I would have liked, the color is a bit off, it is not as vibrant and yellow once on the skin, and it turns a bit gray. I may try using this under a different foundation if I run out of sunscreen.

This CC cream provided a nice buildable coverage on the days I didn’t feel like doing a full face if makeup. It does seems to have a bit of a more reddish undertone rather than peach but I was able to make that work with a bit of powder. This won’t keep me from putting this in my regular makeup rotation.
I received mine completely complimentary from buzzagent for review purposes only.  Easy to apply has nice coverage and build able. Lasts a long time. Definitely recommend

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rich - golden brown shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_text: This foundation has really great coverage for a CC along with the added plus of spf 50?? I definitely recommend!

reviews.review_title: All I can say is IT COSMETICS is IT
reviews.review_text: I received this product for testing for my honest review. After testing IT Cosmetics YOUR SKIN BUT BETTER CC+ Color Correcting Full Coverage Cream + Anti-Aging Hydrating Serum + Broad Spectrum SPF 50+. This cream is so good in covering my areas and the finish is flawless. I really enjoyed it. When I placed my finishing powder it looked as of I was not wearing makeup. Thank you again  IT Cosmetics for a wonderful product.

So, I tried it a couple times. It definitely takes just a little bit, I over applied the first time. It's smooth and creamy and covers well. It's buildable and provides a good canvas for makeup. I would say, its great to give it a go!

I received IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ Medium in exchange of my honest feedback. First I want to say that is the first time I use a CC cream thinking that I will not have good results. I used other IT products before and I liked them a lot and this CC cream was not the exception. This CC cream provides a full coverage, is anti-aging, has hydrating serums and 50 sunscreen. IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ exceeded my expectations. The shade medium was the perfect match for me. Now it is one of my must have products. I already recommended it to my friends and my family.

I love CC full coverage cream anti aging hydrating serum. It made my skin feel smooth like I didn’t have any makeup and didn’t feel greasy at all. I loved that it has SPF 50+ and kept my face feel hydrated too. That’s what I love about IT makeup. I am going to keep buying this I loved it too much. Glad I was able to try for free.

I received this product of IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ Deep for free to test and give my review.  I love the fact that this product is a full coverage cream + anti aging hydrating serum, and a brood spectrum SPF 50+.  This means it can replace several products with just this one if a person chooses to do so.  I would consider this a benefit of owning this product because it can replace several products.  I feel IT Cosmetics CC+ cream goes on very easily on your skin. The SPF 50+ is the best because sunscreen is very important. I was surprised that it isn't oily on my skin at all. I found this product stays on great because I was only able to remove with my makeup remover which is another plus because I hate buying products that come off easily.  The only complaint I have with this product is the color DEEP is the wrong color for me it too dark...I misjudged my skin tone but I will try again soon for the actual color to suit my skin tone in the future because I'm impressed with this product.  I would buy this product again in the future. I also would recommend this product to friends and family if they are looking for products to try.  Just make sure you make the right choice in color to use unlike me. Lessons learned.

reviews.review_title: Good Full-Coverage Plus Extra SPF Protection
reviews.review_text: Overall I think this is a good foundation. The fair beige is a good match for my skin tone, and I really like that there is added SPF protection in this product. It definitely lives up to the full-coverage claim, and I only needed a little bit to cover my whole face. The only thing I don't like is that it really seems to emphasize any texture I have on my face, even when using a very light layer. I have used other full-coverage foundations where I don't have this same issue. I think I could still use this as an every day foundation though if I do really good skin prep and use a light layer.

I usually go for a medium or light coverage foundation, but I'm glad I got to try out the It Cosmetics CC+ Cream, which is a full coverage. It has definitely changed my opinion on full coverage foundation. I chose fair ivory, and it was a little lighter than I expected,  but seems to work perfectly for my super pale winter complexion. I will definitely have to get a shade or 2 darker for summer. It is at the top of my list since it's an spf 50! It does have a fragrance that is almost like lavender, which I don't mind at all. My only complaint is that in the winter my skin is super dry, and it didn't seem very moisturizing for me. If your looking for a great summer foundation that includes a higher SPF than most, this is it!

Absolutely love this foundation! It’s full coverage but still light weight! It is also amazing that is has 50 SPF! it lasts all day and did not get oily on me. Hands down, one of the best products I’ve tried.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan Warm - tan complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_text: This is a great foundation. I love that it has SPF on it. The color is a little tanned for me, but it’ll be great for spring/summer. I just don’t think it is a real full coverage. It didn’t feel oily on my skin and it looked very pretty.

I've tried other CC creams and I just don't like the feel on my skin. IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full foundation just felt too heavy on my skin. The shade range they have is o.k. but I'd like to see more cooler tones. The color I received was Tan but it was too dark and too warm for my skin tone. It might have been a better match in the summer but I typically prefer to wear lightweight foundations year round. I like the SPF 50 for sun protection. It did not have a trace of a white overcast that sunscreens can have especially on darker skin. The coverage was good with  minimal creasing. But like I said it felt heavy on my skin and every time I touched my face it came off. I prefer a foundation with some staying power. I tried using a primer and setting powder with this foundation but again the feel was too much for me. I don't like having to reapply makeup through out my day. I prefer CC+ Nude Glow Lightweight Foundation + Glow Serum. I won't be purchasing this foundation but I would recommend to others.

reviews.review_title: I have found my new foundation
reviews.review_text: Over the last 30 years I’ve tried many products. Some were ok but I never found anything I was completely satisfied with. I have noticed as I’ve gotten older my skin has been changing, products I’ve used in the past no longer work for me. I came across color correction for full coverage cream and I absolutely love it! This was my first time using color corrective in aging age hydrating serum and nothing else compares.  I’m now over 50 and  as my skin changes with age I’m seeing I need a quality product like this.   What I love about this product is the color coverage. I live in Arizona which can get extremely hot in the summer.  I’m loving the SPF 50 clear sunscreen which is great for summer. After trying this make up I will definitely switch brands.   I would definitely buy this product. I’m glad I stepped out of my comfort zone and tried something new.

This is an excellent lightweight full coverage foundation with a high SPF and anti-aging serum.  It's very hydrating and long lasting.  It was easy to apply and very blendable leaving my skin looking very natural.  Also a little goes a long way
It goes on smooth and feels light on skin. I like the coverage and it last.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Honey - deep complexion with warm golden undertone
reviews.review_text: Love that I got great coverage on a light weight foundation and the added bonus of having SPF 50+  makes it so much better and one less step for me in my routine.

Glorious product. Ideal for dry skin. The illumination is discreet, nothing too bold. No oily residue on application or later in the day. I only use their concealer for my dark eye bags, as the foundation covers any blemishes. I love this foundation.

This foundation is GREAT! It’s weightless but provides great coverage. I love how it has SPF in it, I’m able to put my contour, blush, and concealer over it without it getting patchy or rubbing off. Best smooth, natural looking coverage I’ve gotten from any other makeup I’ve tried. This foundation is worth it, it’s AMAZING! I highly recommend this.

It goes on well. Right now I have acne and bumps on my face so it does not smooth out my skin perfect. It smells good. It goes on better with a sponge. The SPF on it is good. I would like it better if it was more natural ingredients.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Honey - deep complexion with warm golden undertone
reviews.review_text: I hate when my face feels heavy or sticky when wearing any type foundations or CC. IT Cosmetics CC+ cream foundation felt perfect. I didn’t feel like I was wearing anything on my face and I didn’t have to reapply it, once was enough. I had full coverage and looked natural

This foundation is one of my favorites! It goes on smoothly and blends well. I might choose a different tone next time but overall it wears well. I have some dark spots and puffy under eyes that I try to target and this covered those areas really well. I also love that it has SPF. Will definitely buy this in the future.

I love this product.  The color matches my skin tone perfectly.  It is smooth and creamy and spreads out very well - I used my fingers. I don't use a lot of makeup and do not care for heavy makeup.  My skin looks very natural using this product; almost as if I didn't have any makeup on at all.  It lasts all day and I will definitely be using it more.  Not very much sun here in Chicago at this time of year but I'm sure it does very well in the sun.

The packaging is practical, of good quality. This product is one of my favorites, practically everything in one place. Serum, coverage cream, sunscreen. It lasts all day on the face without patches or dryness. I recommend it.
Great product works perfect and great coverage in no time.

I love/use IT cosmetics daily, however, this CC+ cream full-coverage foundation just didn't work out well for me. Despite having the wrong shade, I really wanted this formula to work out because I prioritize makeup with 50+ SPF in it.  But once I dispensed some of the product I could tell that this formula was either not mixing well or was compromised by temperatures. The consistency of the foundation came out irregularly with what looked like unblended ingredients caught up in the formula. Once I mixed it up I started to lightly apply it around my face but noticed the formula dried pretty quickly.   Maybe I just got a bad batch? But this low quality was surprising coming from IT.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan Warm - tan complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_text: This IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ delivers exactly what is says. I am impressed at the full coverage provided but still being a CC cream that works with my skin. It does not come on cakey or oily. It works amazing by itself and with my skincare products as well as makeup. My only critique is the packaging. It comes in a squeeze tube but has a pump so my first instinct is to squeeze the bottle but I don't need to because you use the pump but it doesn't stand up because it's a squeeze tube. So you need two hands.

IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ - Deep Honey is a perfect 10 for me. It offers excellent full coverage and protection from the sun. I will choose a lighter shade the next time, but I was able to blend it into my skin well. Definitely, a must-have all year round.

After using this product for a whole week, I was so surprised on how well it looked on my skin! It feels and looks like I didn’t even have foundation on, and I got so many compliments!! It’s so natural looking, has such good coverage that is not heavy, has SPF!!, and it stays on the entire day- I am someone who has oil skin!!! If you are looking for something natural with SPF, and good coverage, YOU NEED TO TRY THIS!
This is an amazing correcting cream. I love that it is full coverage and has spf in it. Those are two major must haves for me. It is very moisturizing, my skin felt hydrated for hours.

I’ve been a long time fan of it cosmetics so I was excited to be able to try this foundation. I choose the medium shade because I felt it would match my skin tone best, however I think it may be a tad too dark but my skin has a lot of dark spots and hyperpigmentation. So matching a foundation to my skin correctly and it looking right is difficult. It does cover well and has a medium to full coverage and I tried to build it up we’re needed but it’s kind of cakey. It does feel super light weight on my skin and non greasy which I love. I would continue to purchase this foundation and maybe play with some different shades to see what matches better or use two different shades to help with the dark spots. I definitely recommend this for anyone with skin. It’s healthier for your skin than some other foundations I’ve tried and doesn’t cause breakouts. I’ve noticed my skin has improved greatly since switching also.
Wow! I'm loving this IT foundation CC+. It really cover my little redness on my cheeks.  I don't really need to much all over my face. I would buy this and I do recommend  this to my friends.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Bronze - very deep complexion with cool rosy undertones
reviews.review_text: my color came too dark so I used it to contour the skin I really liked the material and packaging

I have always been a fan of IT Cosmetics products! I have previously tried the CC concealer and loved it! I was so happy when Bzz Agent sent the foundation to try! It’s perfect for me! I’m 46, starting to show some fine lines here and there. And I have oily skin. This product is definitely full coverage. It covers all the redness and dark spots, doesn’t settle into my fine lines, doesn’t crease, is buildable, and my new go to! I don’t even need to try another foundation! I love that is has 50+ SPF, and such great ingredients for my skin. And the shade is perfect!

reviews.review_title: Full Coverage, Sun Protective CC Cream
reviews.review_text: My first impression of the IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ Light, is that the packaging is appealimg because of the easy to use pump. It dispenses just the right amount of product, so none is wasted.  This product has a nice silky texture, and is not at all greasy. It absorbs nicely into the skin, and feels nice. The color light seemed a bit dark for my light-medium skin tone,  but it works nonetheless. I used a damp sponge to apply, and it went on nicely,  although I did feel it looked a bit too dark for my skin coloring, and my taste.  Additionally,  I felt that it accentuated skin texture and fine lines.   Compared to other similar CC cream products I've tried, this one definitely provides the most coverage, and I appreciate the SPF 50 protection. I would buy this product for the times I wanted more coverage and simultaneous sun protection. I would recommend to my friends and family, because I believe it is a great product.

I really like using this product. Its thick, but very much like other Cc cream foundations I have used. I really like that it has a high spf and anti aging properties.  A little goes a long way. It does sit on top of the skin when it first goes on the skin, so it makes my pores look bigger, but after a while the foundation settles and looks much better.

IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ Medium is a great product. It definitely is full coverage and doesn’t leave my skin looking crepey. The instructions only tell how to use this product as a sunscreen and not how to use it for any of the other benefits it offers. I would suggest changing that, as not everyone is proficient in understanding certain makeup uses. It goes on smoothly and blends evenly. I would recommend this product. I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Honey - deep complexion with warm golden undertone
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of CC+ From Bzz , and the opinions stated are my own. I choose the Fair but I received Deep Honey super deeper than my skin tone. But my honest review is still very nice product and hope will receive correctly one for my skin tone to try it.
I love this foundation. It’s by far my favorite. It goes on so smooth and gives great coverage. It’s so natural looking too!

I have tried other iT products and so far this one has been one of my favorites.  I love that it has high SPF protection, you don’t see that in many products. Full coverage is great. It’s smooth and light weight.  I will definitely buy this product and Yes I would recommend this because it’s a great product and very affordable. I will post my reviews on my personal social media account as well

Your skin but better; is so true. My skin is better. I have added this to my everyday makeup. It covers my darkness under my eyes, the redness on my face and blemishes. It is truly hydrating but not oily. It lasts me all day. My skin is not any longer flaky and dry looking. My picture shows with it on the left side of my face and the other side without.

I'm going to be honest...when I first tried this I was not fond of it AT ALL! It looked cakey and casket ready. I took it right off. Fortunately, I talked to a few friends about it and someone suggested to let it set for about an hour or 2. I did that and OMG I LOVE IT NOW! Word of advice, A LITTLE GOES A LOOOONG WAY! I put too much on the 1st time. The 2nd time around I started with the smallest amount and built it up to the coverage I liked, which was very minimal. My fiance came home one day and said my skin looks really clear :)

I’m so glad I was chosen to test this product because it is wonderful! I’m almost 52 and there’s times Zi want full coverage and WOW is this IT! it glides on effortlessly and stays on ALL day without it being cakey! It’s not matte but has a great healthy sheen to it. I absolutely love this formula and will continue using it! I would definitely recommend it for a full coverage foundation.

I must say I am disappointed that I did not get the right shade for myself. However the Foundation went on like butter and was definitely full coverage. It was recommended to use a foundation brush to apply which is exactly what I did. Unfortunately bc the color wasn’t a good match it looked ashy on my skin. I will definitely recommend giving this a try but just make sure you have you correct shade. The foundation did darken a bit after wearing so setting is definitely recommended. I’m going to give it another try hopefully with my correct shade and see how it goes then.
Let's start by saying the color i received was not my color. As far as the product, it has a pleasant scent but seemed kinda thin to be full coverage. The application was just decent.

This is a good lightweight foundation. CC cream is usually more of a tinted moisturizer but this is more of a traditional light, liquid foundation. It blends well, the shade is just right for me. It's not completely full coverage but it's not cakey and it has a nice natural, dewy finish. Good everyday foundation.
I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review- I was surprised on how full coverage this cc cream was! It’s gives off a beautiful coverage I love that there is spf 50 in it

I really loved this foundation! To begin with, it has spf 50+ so it's a super plus, the coverage is super excellent and the tone is perfect since I struggle a lot with my skin tone and it doesn't have oils, so it suits my face Super matte all day! Just as you apply the foundation, it stays on you all day!  It goes a long way, with very little foundation I cover my entire face and it's very light, I didn't feel it at all.  I have acne-prone skin and my treatments are sometimes very aggressive and with this foundation does not break out pimples or irritate me

This is a wonderful foundation plus it is SPF included it is very pigmented the shade I put on in this picture is dark and not my natural shade but I was able to blend this out and use very little to create a bronze effect I enjoy this and it will last me a long time please purchase get in your color or if you're going to shade darker you can use as bronzer.

I’ve used many foundations, tinted moisturizers, BB & CC creams/foundations from high end to drug store brand’s over the years. Though I did love a few I’ve tried over the years, the IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ in Medium really impressed me!   I’m 43 with combination, sensitive skin and I have light-medium skin tone with redness on my cheeks and across my nose, and I have dark circles. The foundation went on really nice over my skincare products and didn’t settle in my fine lines , wrinkles and next to my nose like so many do. I love that this foundation is buildable for a medium to full coverage application, I love the tube it comes in for easy dispensing. I love that it’s skincare , a CC cream , SPF and foundation in one that’s really affordable. It covered my redness on my cheeks and nose , and hid some of the darkness under my eyes. While trying this product I didn’t use any concealer , powder or setting spray just to see how it done on it’s own…honestly in the picture below I was just getting ready for bed and in my Pajamas getting un-ready so I could show how it looked after about 10hrs of wear. I feel like I definitely need to buy the IT Cosmetics Bye Bye Under-eyes to get more coverage for my dark circles and sometimes puffiness, but don’t feel like I needed to touch-up the foundation. Overall I absolutely love this Foundation , complexion products went on nice over this foundation, in the picture I only have blush on ,but when I put on bronzer it went on nicely as well. I would highly recommend to family and friends.

I’m always looking for a good foundation that has SPF to protect my skin and is full coverage. When applying to my skin it glided on easily and smooth. Very easy to blend to my skin. I have combination skin and thought it last pretty well. It is a little difficult to remove so you have to use a makeup remover not a wipe but a liquid. Overall great product

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rich - golden brown shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this product but it did not work well for me. The shade range was way off even though I had to mix it with another cream to get my right shade. It turned orangey after having it on for about ten minutes. On the other hand, it blended great even though the wrong shade.

This product is absolutely amazing for those that prefer full coverage without the dryness that usually comes along for the ride. It applies beautifully and dries to a satin finish, I only set certain spots on my face with powder, as I liked the look otherwise. The fact that is has a high SPF is a plus. It also lasts through the workday without breaking down. Would definitely recommend this.
Super smooth application. Felt very light on my face. The application was a slightly greasy for me, but I attributed that to the spf. No need for any concealer. It’s a go-to for an all day look.

IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ in Light has been the best foundation I've ever used on my sensitive, reddish prone skin. The foundation is easy to use, spreads and covers quickly - and lasts all day long. I love it, and use it daily without fail.

This cream was a perfect match to my skin color. I absolutely loved it. It’s way better than the cream I’ve been using, it lasted me all day. I would definitely buy it recommends my friends buy it as well. I got so many compliments on this cream.

I received this free from BzzAgent and IT Cosmetics in exchange for my honest review.  I liked how this looked when applied.  The full coverage looked great when applied with a foundation brush.  The look was flawless.  I was happy it had sunscreen in the formula.  The only small issue was my skin did break out slightly after using this, but it was still a wonderful product.
Love this stuff! I don't have to use concealer with it! Great stuff!

reviews.review_title: Really good with a good skincare base
reviews.review_text: It is definitely full coverage and blends out easily. I expected the skin care benefits to be better because I found it to cling to my dry patches and crease after a couple of hours. I tried it again but with a good skincare base before applying and it made a big difference. It lasted all day and looked smooth, no creasing this time or dry patches. Would recommend

I LOVE that this foundation has 50 spf sunscreen. I haven't used one with that much sunscreen. This is great because I'm currently using skin care products that make my skin very sensitive to the suns rays. Also it is very skin like and covers my hyperpigmentation well. I highly recommend.

I found this foundation to be a great match to my skin and blend seamlessly. It offered great coverage without the need for much concealer. It lasted all day and didn’t settle into my fine lines or make me look older, which is a problem for me with some products. The only problem I had with it is that I found it to be drying and it left some dry patches on my skin by the end of the day. It would be an excellent foundation for someone with oily skin. I have dry skin, so it would have been great if not for that. I’m unsure I would buy it due to this but it would be excellent for normal to oily skin.

Although the color was a little dark for me I still have to brag on the coverage which is amazing. I smoothed a bit on and immediately could see a big difference in my complexion. This makeup gave me coverage like none other. It's like a second skin

This foundation really took me by surprise. I love it. The coverage is great and the color blends well with my tan skin tone. This foundation also last my entire work shift. This foundation is definitely at the top of my list to purchase more when I run out.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_text: Such great coverage, my skin looks flawless. Not as light as other CC creams I’ve tried, but I usually enjoy a full coverage for full glam makeup days/nights so this would be great for that. Wouldn’t likely use it for daytime as much because I prefer less coverage, but that’s only a personal preference. Overall it’s a really great product!

I got this product to review but I only got to tested for a short time because my eyes get irritated with Sunscreen but other then that I think is a really rich cream foundation for me is a medium to full coverage, easy to take off and skin does feel hydrated

The first time I used this, it looked…not great. I applied it with a brush and then ended up going over it with a dry blurring sponge and it was wearable. I chalked that up to the face cream I had put on, because it seemed to smear, and that’s what the face cream felt like (Tatcha dewy skin cream - first time I used it.) So the second time I tried it, I went with one of my favorite primers, and it looked perfect. It also built up nicely with no streakiness or cakeyness. I loved how it looked. The third time I used a different primer, but was also one of my go-tos. Again, it looked ok but wasn’t great. This seems to be a product you have to baby, and will only look good if paired with the right primer. For someone who wears the exact same pre-makeup skincare and primer every day, and it works with that, then you’re golden. I switch mine up depending on what my skin needs that day, so it’s going to take more time to figure out for someone like me, and I won’t be able to wear it with certain primers.  But, with that being said, when it’s the right base, it’s fantastic. It looks natural, even built up to a full coverage. The primer it worked great with (for me) is the pink elf power grip. I’ll also add that the shades match the description very well. I chose mine online and ended up with a perfect match.
im not a full coverage girl but i don’t mind this one. it’s full coverage yet light weight. i barely feel it on my. it feels like nothing’s there. the added sunscreen in just the icing on the cake

Where do I even begin to start? I absolutely love this foundation! First off, It doesn't settle into my fine lines. I love the the way it makes my skin look. It doesn't have a chalky finish. My skin looks dewy. It does an AMAZING job of covering things like blemishes and imperfections. The coverage is buildable which is so awesome and yet it's lightweight. I don't feel like I'm wearing a mask. Plus it lasts ALL day!

My skin is looking flawless and feels good.  It’s a true full coverage foundation.  I love that if I have a blemish it covers it out evenly.  It’s an SPF which is so important.  It’s definitely my favorite foundation.  One I’d recommend to people.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Honey - deep complexion with warm golden undertone
reviews.review_text: It is very buildable and blendable. It is lightweight and leaves my skin looking glowy and it looks very natural. It evens out my skin tone very well also.
I’ve been using this for years and absolutely love it! Not only is it foundation but it’s also skin care! I forget to put sunscreen on so this helps with protecting my face as well as cosmetic.

after using this product for a couple days i approve it actually leaves your skin feeling super soft it sets really good it doesn't cake up which is good my only complain is that it turns a bit darker through out the day

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan Warm - tan complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try the extended color range and luckily there was a good match for me with Tan Warm. The original Tan was way too orange but this works well and the coverage and SPF is amazing. I think they may have reformulated since I last tried it and it works much better for my oily skin now. Great foundation for everyday use.

I am loving this cream full coverage foundation with SPF 50+. It goes on smoothly and blends in effortlessly. My skin looks amazing and you cannot even tell I am wearing makeup. I also like that the SPF does not leave me looking ashy or grey as some other product do. I love it!

lam in love with the CC+ foundation. This makeup looked great on my skin tone and it offered great coverage. I have small dark spots on my cheeks and they were almost totallv invisible!!. The packaging is great and the foundation is just the right size to carry around I even like the smell of it. I would definitely recommend this product to someone looking for great coverage!!
I saw so excited to try this foundation out. I love that it has SPF yet it it still so lightweight and lasts all day. Color was a perfect match. Its my new fav addition to my morning routine.

reviews.review_title: Wrong shade, but used as a contour.
reviews.review_text: I received a shade way darker than my actual skin tone. I hated to see it go to waste, so I decided to use it as a contour. It went on smooth and didn’t cake into my fine lines. A little definitely goes a long way.

reviews.review_title: My go to foundation! Absolutely LOVE
reviews.review_text: So usually I’m very picky when it comes to foundation, I don’t consider myself to have difficult skin but I know what I like and what I don’t. This cc full coverage  foundation is AMAZING! I honestly didn’t think it was going to give a full coverage like the bottle said but it did! And with just a little it literally went a long way! I have naturally red cheeks that I’ve always been embarrassed about and I love a full coverage foundation to cover my red cheeks. (I know most people are like “WHAT, YOU COVER YOUR NATURAL BLUSH??”)  yes I do because I was always bullied as a child for having blushed cheeks 24/7 so now I love to cover them up and apply a small amount of blush so I don’t look too pale. This cc/foundation is my NEW GO TO!!! I absolutely love it and the way it makes my skin feel. I think the thing that I love the most is that an only used a small drop and it covered my entire face! So you get your moneys worth for sure. I already have recommended to my family and friends! This product was given to me in exchange for my honest review.
Usually when I buy a foundation for my skin I always look for SPF especially since I like going out in the morning. SPF is very important to protect my skin from the sun. It’s very light weight

I bought this product a few years back, and loved it for casual occasions. At the time I preferred a full cake face daily. After COVID , my skin , and makeup regimen have changed drastically. Less is more. I have super sensitive skin now due to allergies. Plus new cracks to add to my mature skin. Neither are very forgiving on a matte finish product. I am thrilled I came back to this hidden gem. The coverage is exactly what I want.  It applies evenly with no fuss , and cancels out redness while evening out skin tone.  I typically apply one layer, two for problematic days. Leaves a healthy satin finish  perfect for winter months. My skin hasn't looked this hydrated in ages, it's been a God send!  It last til the end of my day which is something no cc cream I've tried before has been able to do. The SPF is an added bonus. I highly recommend it will not disappoint.

My first impression of the cream was that I liked the fact that it incorporated coverage with sun protection. I put it on first  thing in the morning after using a daily moisturizer. It was a little thick and I was initially concerned that I wouldn’t be able to blend it easily. However it worked fine. Being that it is listed as a CC cream I assumed it would be thinner though. Once on, it covered my blemishes well and lasted throughout the day. Overall, I thought the product worked well. I would definitely use it again in the future.

IT Cosmetics full coverage foundation is amazing. It provides full coverage but feels very light on the skin. It lasts all day without creasing. I love that it has SOF in it as well. It’s once less product I have to put on. I highly recommend IT cosmetics foundation. While it has a higher price point than drugstore brands it’s worth it. It’s like getting two products in one and looks great in the skinn

My Blown away by this foundation, I have tried a lot of foundation with spf but nothing ever gave me the coverage I needed to be the perfect pair. This however has everything you could ever want in a foundation. SPF 50, Medium to full coverage and very buildable and fragrance free. Price point is right on board if anything it’s a steal for what amazing quality you are getting. It last for hrs and I have no issues with it becoming oils or it’s creasing throughout my long days. I would most definitely be sharing this will my friends and family.

I used this foundation for about 2 weeks and I was impressed with it's performance and feel. I have oily combination skin-I didn't need to apply a moisturizer prior to applying this foundation so that was a plus for me. The wear time for me was 12+ hrs and even afterwards it still looked good. No oxidizing and non irritating, the color was exact and it was soothing to my skin. Definitely 5 stars

I typically purchase a deep neutral foundation, but this color was a bit darker than I needed (I shouldhave gotten deep). It does, however work perfectly for contour. Although it was too dark, I applied it completely to test the overall formula and I really like it. I'll be getting a lighter color to get the full look/effect. It is very lightweight and creates a beautiful base.

I was super thrilled to finally try this CC cream. It did not disappoint. I have normal to dry skin with some hyperpigmentation. It has a high spf which is a plus, and did not dry my skin. Lightweight product with amazing coverage. Takes very little product to achieve a smooth even foundation. This does not compare to any other CC cream I have used, and considering replacing my old foundation. I have recommended this to family and friends.

reviews.review_title: Love the lightweight formula and full coverage
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation. I use it like a BB cream. It’s lightweight and full coverage. I’m in Arizona and this foundation doesn’t make me sweat like others.

This CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ gives me radiant natural finish. It goes on smoothly and doesn’t need much blending. The pump is so convenient, it dispenses just the right amount of product. It is full coverage. It comes in a great range of shades. I found my perfect match a light warm shade. It contains SPF 50+ so I don’t need sunscreen separately. I don’t need to use moisturizer with this foundation as it’s hydrating. It lasts all day long and I don’t need any touch-ups.

I have been using this product for over than a month now and hands down I’m completely sold to this. Too good to be a CC cream really! I mean the coverage is just amazing and it blends really well into the skin and leaves silk like finish. I used just a cleanser and moisturizer before this product and yet results were amazing!! Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: Changed my opinion of CC creams
reviews.review_text: I usually don't use CC creams because they make my skin look horrible and flaky and so do many foundations. This cream went on smoothly and easily and did not flake my skin, crease, or look uneven. Like, my skin looked really good. Its full coverage. I really like this. Unfortunately,  I chose the wrong shade for myself. I chose something WAY darker. It's my own fault but I can't use the tube I already got so it was a waste. I will definitely be buying one in the right shade so I can use regularly.
Great coverage  Good size  Smooth and duesnt small bad

I received the IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF in Deep Bronze. I am always cautious to try foundations because I am scared that the company will not offer colors for darker skin tones. I was excited to see that UT Cosmetics has a wide variety of skin tones and offers many deep skin tone options.    The deep bronze matched my skin amazingly. On my first application I only colored half of my face and was able to clearly see that the product matched. I was also able to see that my discolored spots were covered despite a light application of the product.  The product was easy to apply. I only used my fingers for quick coverage on the go. I would probably use a sponge if I was going to blend the foundation with additional products or was using a blush or contour. I like that a strong spf was included. That limits the number of products that I have to layer onto each other.   The coverage is not matte. My skin was shiny after application. I look forward to seeing how long the coverage lasts without creases or if it will need to be touched up throughout the day.

reviews.review_title: Great Coverage and stays in place all day!
reviews.review_text: I was thoroughly impressed after trying this full coverage foundation! I had been brand loyal to only one foundation for the last 4 years, and I’m so glad I branched out and gave this a try. It did not leave my skin looking oily or dry. It felt perfectly balanced and blended well with my other makeup. The coverage was long lasting too, I didn’t have to reapply or touch up in the evening. I would totally recommend this to my friends and family!

reviews.review_title: Its amazing.. Except a shade off
reviews.review_text: With Dry and sensitive skin it really is difficult to find a product that works for me. But this foundation is amazing. Suits my skin. Skin dint breakout. Gives medium to full coverage. Easily blendable. I dint have to use concealer or color corrector. Not cakey. I just need to find the right shade. Its just a bit orangey for me. Now that i know this products works for me, I can easily figure out the shade. Love it!!

I received this from  Bzzagent in exchange for my honest review. Absolutely love this formula! Not only is it ultra creamy and blends in like silk, it leaves your complexion looking flawless. A plus is that it has 50 SPF! What a wonderful addition to such a wonderful product. Once I applied it to my face, I didn’t feel sticky or my skin didn’t look cakey or feel heavy. A little goes a long way so buff it in for a perfect look! You are going to love this!

I'm very self conscious of redness on my face and the rough, bumpy areas close to my jawline. For these reasons I always choose full coverage foundations. I have tried so many different foundations and none have provided sufficient coverage until now. This CC cream has a thick creamy texture and a little goes a long way. It gives me phenomenal coverage and I love everything about it. It does a fantastic job concealing the redness so it's hardly visible. It also helps give my skin a smoother textured and even tone. It's such a great multitasking product. It's 7 products in 1 which not only saves me time but saves me money. I'm able to omit steps in my skincare routine and reduce the amount of products I purchase. I really appreciate incorporating SPF 50 in the product to help protect my skin from harmful UVA/UVB rays. I love that it doesn't feel heavy, or appear cakey and that it's long wearing. I have combination skin and have noticeable dry patches.This cc cream keeps my skin looking hydrated and moisturized without appearing oily. It even gives me the loveliest glow. I'm so impressed with it that I've chosen to replace my current foundation with it. If you need a superb full-coverage foundation you need to try this cc cream. You will not be disappointed.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Mocha - very deep complexion with cool red undertones
reviews.review_text: I will first state that having the wrong shade might be affecting the review slightly.  I have a feeling that is affecting my happiness with the overall look.  BUT...the coverage is nice and easily blendable. The formula was slightly greasy on me, but I have oily skin.  I  will continue to use it with the correct shade to see if my opinion changes.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Honey - deep complexion with warm golden undertone
reviews.review_text: This cream foundation was really good. I used my beauty blender to apply and it blended in very smoothly. It was lightweight and didn't feel and look like I was wearing a lot of product. There were hardly any pores visible. My only issue was that I needed a slightly lighter shade to match my complexion better. Other than that it's a really good product with good coverage. I would purchase and recommend.
This CC+ cream is perfect for me. Looks like I am not wearing anything but my own skin. It covers my brown patches and gives great coverage.It is a fantastic product.

After using consistently for one week I was highly impressed with the results. I have combination skin that becomes extremely oily and this foundation kept the shine under control all day. I also have psoriasis and did not experience any irritation after use. Also a little goes a long way to provide full coverage. I would highly recommend!

I am in my early 50's and find that foundations that used to work well for me, don't work so well on my aging skin. I have found that this CC cream works really well and does not settle in my fine lines/wrinkles nor does it emphasize my pores. I also love that this cream has great SPF coverage. This cream does not go on too heavy, nor do I feel shiny or greasy and it lasts throughout the day. I would definitely recommend to friends.

The application is smooth and easy. The product is so light but still manages amazing coverage. I usually go in-store for makeup because I'm afraid of getting the wrong color (especially as a POC woman), but this product blends beautifully. Not too oily or anything like that, and I appreciate the added SPF. This cream feels quality, and I love it more than some of the pricier foundations I have. Keeps my skin feeling healthy. Would definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_title: My skin but a shade off
reviews.review_text: I really liked this CC cream-it felt light on my skin compared to most foundations that feel heavy to me, and there wasn’t a pore in sight!!  I had one problem though and it was kind of a big one-my skin had an orange tint after applying to my whole face.  I think it might be that I had the wrong undertone so I’m going to have to do some experimenting to determine what the issue is.  I hope it’s a simple wrong color problem because I do like what this product did for my face and I’d love to be able to add it to my daily routine.

This foundation has great coverage and is easy to blend in. It’s light weight and does not feel cakey!!  It is buildable, there were days were I just went in one time with my blender and on night our I did a second pass for fuller flawlesss coverage!   I would recommend and will continue to purchase

First and foremost, I am a huge fan of IT products. I've liked just about every item I've tried out by this brand. This new Color Correcting, Full Coverage Cream + SPF is no exception.  Although slightly darker than my skin, my mistake, it blended in seamlessly.  No white cast, no need to mix or layer.  It has a very slight sunscreen smell.  Goes on dewy and dries down matte.  Two drops are literally all that's needed for full coverage. And, I didn't need to use a color corrector first to cover my dark spots. I would definitely buy this.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_text: I wasn’t very happy with this cc cream foundation. I used a brush to apply it the first time and I felt like it stuck to every pour and wrinkle on my face. Next, I tried it with a damp beauty blender and was having the same problem, however it did seem to blend out a bit better. The color was also a little off, my complexion is light with cool/pink undertones and this appeared to be too dark and a bit orange for my complexion. As for the coverage it was more of a medium to full coverage foundation which is OK if it doesn’t stick to every crease, crevice dry patch, and wrinkle you have on your face. I work 10+ hours a day and by the end of the day my face looked like a greasy mess. The cc cream had begun to slip off my face which only seemed to highlight my pores that much more. This cc cream may work better for someone with dryer skin. Overall, I would not buy this CC cream foundation.

reviews.review_title: Must have in my daily routine
reviews.review_text: I think it’s my new favorite bb/cc cream!!!! It’s glides on without any patchy ness and because I have dry skin it’s amazing since alot of products cling on to my skin and form a patch! I love that it has anti-aging properties plus the SPF!!!! We often forget to wear especially in the winter so it’s such an awesome thing to have it combined and it’s a good amount of 50 which not a lot of makeup products have. There is no cast and I am a deeper skin tone (Indian skin)

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_text: This magic formula hits the mark ever single time for me! I love that it contains sunscreen, is long wearing, and provides just the right amount of coverage for my preference!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Mocha - very deep complexion with cool red undertones
reviews.review_text: I love this product because it's pretty easy to spread and covers my entire skin. I like how my skin looks after using it. I recommend it

I was drawn to this cc cream for the SPF and rave reviews. It goes on creamy so I was hopeful. Unfortunately not long after applying a small amount, I saw how it oxidized and dries like paint. I was still hopeful that it'll melt into my skin after a while like my other concealer. But after a few hours, it still looked like paint, made my face feel tight, crackly and had a white cast. I returned it the next day.
I like the product after using for the first time. It blends in very well with my skin. I like it doesn't have to much fragrance in it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_text: I love IT Cosmetics CC+ it’s a full coverage foundation using my makeup brush it blends smoothly and is the perfect shade for my skin this foundation is very creamy and it has SPF 50+ sunscreen protection .Thanks IT Cosmetics for a beautiful foundation !

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_text: I like it. It blended out nicely. I have sensitive skin and I haven't seen any breakouts. Love that it is full coverage and has SPF.

This is now my go to. It has replaced everything in makeup draw. One it covers everything with very little product used. Two it blends in so well like butter. Lastly it last all day with out touch up. I love it.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful but the color selection is off
reviews.review_text: This is my first IT cosmetics face product. The color selection is off to me in the darker range. Everything is a bit too red. The color I have is also way too dark for me, so I haven’t worn it outside.  The consistency is beautiful however so I really wish I could have found a match. It’s a natural skin like finish and just radiant but not greasy looking. I also wore it for a bit without acne so that’s good too.  I would recommend overall to anyone who can find a color match.

I gave this a try for a week during our many temperature changes here in Miami. I have absolutely no complaints! The product performed extremely well. IT supports those time when you must hurry up and go! Serves all day flawless wear.  I just has to dab my nose twice [with rice paper], no touch up. One of the trial days my day started at 6am and ended at 11pm; my face was still flawless. I really enjoyed using IT!

reviews.review_title: Full coverage and long lasting - use sparingly
reviews.review_text: Great coverage if you're looking for full coverage. I'm more light to medium coverage so go really easy with this foundation and apply with a sponge. Long lasting

reviews.review_title: Amazing CC Cream from IT Cosmetics
reviews.review_text: I have found IT!!   It CC+Cream Full Coverage Foundation with SPF 50 is now in my tool box! This amazing cream does it all; no need to apply concealer, or extra SPF to your makeup routine. A little bit of this CC cream goes a long way and does not wear off as the day wears on. I wear this for work, dining out and running errands.  I was lucky enough to try this amazing product for free in exchange for my honest opinion through Bzz Agent. This IT Cosmetics CC Cream is just another reason to love IT Cosmetics!

This product exceeded all of my expectations. Not only was the shade a perfect match to my skin tone but it was very easy to blend out. It made my skin look flawless while still looking like skin. I didn't have a cake face with this nor did it exaggerate any texture, fine lines or wrinkles. For me the added sun protection is a plus too! I am so glad IT cosmetics listened to the critics and expanded the shade range to include us with deeper complexions. This has now been added into my weekly line up for foundations.

I have oily skin and this wore quite nicely on my skin. It is full coverage but can be made a bit less if you just apply less product. The shade was not a perfect match but should work better in the summer time. I was able to mix it with a color corrector and make the shade work. It worked nicely with my cream products that are from the drugstore. Lasted nicely through the day for me.

Ehhh, not sure how to feel about this. On one hand it’s not nearly as thick and uncomfortable on the skin as other “full coverage” CCs. However, when I had it built up to only a medium coverage it was already sitting on my skin looking like a mask. To me, the benefit of a BB or CC is that it should look *natural,* and this definitely does not. If I built it up to full coverage it would probably look even more waxy.

I always buy this product for my 55 years old mother and she loves it! It does'nt crease and hydrate the skin all day long. I love that the SPF is IN the fondation since my mom isn't a big fan of adding another layer. I don't know if the anti-aging serum have any effect since she layers this fondation over her anti-aging moisturizer, but overall she's very satisfied!
I’m really satisfied not to heavy on my skin and gave me a natural finish. The only thing I’m not so sure about is as times goes on my skin looks a little oily and I don’t have oily skin.

I was given the opportunity to try the IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ - Deep Honey and I can say it is now one of my top 3 favorite foundations. It's affordable,  the coverage is great,  it doesn't cake up or feel heavy, breathable, easy to apply and the overall outcome was flawless!

This product does offer awesome coverage, but after a couple of hours my face broke out all over. I loved that it has SPF and that the full coverage is amazing, but it just wasn't for my skin. As I'm getting older my skin is more sensitive so that may be it too.

This foundation/CC has a fantastic full coverage, dewy/sating finish, and an amazing color match. The fair shade is perfect on my NC20 (ish) very neutral complexion. I did have to use primer, powder, and setting spray to keep it in place, but it did last well through the day.   I took off a star because the pigment clings to dry skin and pores with serious intensity. It also takes a bit of work to blend without streaks. Beauty blender was the best tool for application.
I absolutely love this foundation! It makes your skin look beautiful. This hides all my imperfections, still looks natural, and blends in beautifully.
This product has been one of the most hydrating products I’ve ever put on my skin 100% recommended.

I was very excited to try IT Cosmetics Color Correcting Full Coverage Cream. I have several friends who use _ IT Cosmetics products exclusively and they rave about them. I literally used this product the very day I received it! As soon as I opened the product, noticed the fragrance of the product, while not overwhelming, it is certainly unpleasant. I prefer products with little to no fragrance. I applied this product over moisturized skin and a primer. The shade was slightly darker than the current product I use but seemed close enough to work for me. The product applied easily; however, within just a few hours the product had begun to oxidize on my skin leaving an orange fake tan look. Within eight hours the product began to separate and look patchy.  know IT Cosmetics to be an expensive brand and the performance of this product was very disappointing. I would not use it again and I Would not RECC omens this product to people.

reviews.review_title: Lightweight, Full Coverage, But Quite Oily
reviews.review_text: apply it, but it oxidizes quite well. It's extremely lightweight at first but surprisingly very full coverage. But it gets oily so quickly. I'm already an oily person, but it does get ridiculously oily ridiculously quickly.

This foundation is full coverage but not heavy. It absolutely covers all imperfections, redness, blemishes, etc. The foundation is not fully matte, it’s has more of a satin finish. It leaves the skin looking smooth and healthy. The shade range has plenty of undertones you are more than likely to find the perfect match.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Honey - deep complexion with warm golden undertone
reviews.review_text: I have completely replaced my foundation with this product. I wear it for casual wear, and out at night to weddings, parties, etc. This product has lasting power for long-wear, and I love that it has spf in it as I'm based in Florida. I highly recommend this product! Your skin will thank you!

I absolutely love the coverage of this beautiful Foundation. Even though it says it is full coverage I find that it still shows some skin through the coverage but just enough to make it look flawlessly natural and beautiful. I love how it erases any imperfection but doesn't look too packed on. I will definitely recommend this Foundation to friends and family and anyone in between. This is my number one go to from now on! Thanks so much Sephora love you all.

This product is great for year round wear. The only problem is selecting the right color, the shades have always been off. The coverage is great as it can be worn sheer or full coverage and lasts all day on my oily skin.
This is my first IT cosmetics product and I am very impressed how stunning my skin looks with this CC.

IT cosmetics Cc+ cream full coverage foundation comes in tube shaped but pump top design which is easy to use and no wastage of the product it is very easy to apply and gives a good coverage in just 1 layer and its very good because it cover all steps in one. It is good to wear on sunny day as it has Spf50+ and skin looks nice and even and it improves my skin and give it healthy moisturing feeling.I will definitely recommened this to friends and people who are looking for make with skin loving ingredients and flawless skin.
I really liked the feel of this foundation. Other foundations seemed very watery. This full coverage is so moisturizing. It felt smooth and not oily. Thick enough to make you look flawless.

I love the coverage of CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ - Deep Honey. I used less of it than my normal brand to cover my whole face, which was great. I didn't like that it stayed shiny because I prefer a matte coverage. The second time I applied it, I used a matte spray over it to try to help, but it was still too shiny.

This product is a cult fave for a reason. It's lightweight but still gives full coverage and melts into your skin as you apply it (I used a sponge). I have oily/combo skin but I was happy to see that the foundation wasn't separating on my nose or dripping down my face by the end of the day. Super natural finish and completely evened out my skin. A big plus that it has hyaluronic acid in the formula!

Keep in mind I am 39, my skin has seen better days. I am in love with this foundation, this is so easy to use with its push pump to make it fast and easy to apply on skin. I only need a little bit and it covers more that I thought. Smells good better than I expected, since most foundations don’t smell good. Feels so smooth and not greasy but moisturizing enough too. I love it. Definitely recommend it to everyone. I love that it even has a high volume of sun protection of  SPF 50+

This could be my new favorite foundation. SPF, full coverage, and great finish. I’ve used this product for 5 days and so far so good. I’m a very oily person in my T zone and I always worry about how glossy I will look after makeup application and I’ve been satisfied so far. Pro tip - a little goes a long way!

I love full coverage makeup due to suffering from Telangectasia (broken blood vessels) and i have heard about CC creams but i never thought it would cover my face well. I tried this and it it extremly beautiful on my dry skin, covers 90% of all my red veins, and leaves me feeling fresh and beautiful. It is not cakey at all.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Deep - deep complexion with neutral undertones
reviews.review_text: Pleasantly surprised with the color match and coverage. The addition of SPF is great for skin protection. This formula feels lightweight and little bit of product goes a long way. This foundation melts seamlessly into my skin and I did not notice any white cast on my face. There is a natural, hydrated finish. I would purchase in the future and would recommend for friends and family to try.

I really liked this cc+ cream foundation . It covered my big pores and the redness I have . Its full coverage but without feeling like you have a ton of makeup on. It’s great if you have oily skin like I do it also lasted all day on me. It has a smell of an orange but the smell goes away fast . I would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_title: Have to try one that it’s close to my skin color
reviews.review_text: I can’t review much in this product unfortunately I got a much darker shade than my skin color all I could say is that the color very pigmented it’s very creamy you do not a lot of product it’s a full cover foundation.

The IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream tan is a nice color that blends well with my skin. I was surprised at first because the color looks darker than what I expected, but when I applied it to my face it blended well with my skin complexion. This was easy to apply, and I looked much better with it on. I like that it has SPF 50+ and is an anti-aging hydrating cream. I like this cc+ tan color and will definitely keep using it.

I received this IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ from BzzAgent. After applying this cc cream I was amazed how lightweight, breathable, and hydrating it is. I’ve applied this with a blender and brush on separate days and either one applies easily and blends nicely.  I love that it’s full coverage that covers imperfections, it wears comfortably giving me a natural look that lasts all day which didn't crease or get patchy. Overall it’s a great product even though I received shade Tan which is too dark for me now it’ll be great for my Summer time tan.

I really enjoyed this cream foundation! A little goes a long way, so it’s a great value. It gives very good coverage and lasts a long time. It applies smoothly and gave my skin a hydrated appearance. However  by end of the day it’s very oily on my skin. Overall I look forward to using this more!

I've been using this for a little while now and like this CC cream a lot.  It provides a medium coverage with glowy finish.  My skin is combination normal to oily so I usually powder to set it in place but it still looks pretty glowy even after powdering.  When I powder, it doesn’t crease and it lasts up most of the day without using a primer.  I don’t think I would be able to wear it without powdering because it does feel a little greasy and heavy if I don’t.  It does get a bit shiny after 6 hours of wear but when I take it off it leaves my skin feeling hydrated and it doesn’t break me out so that is a plus.  I like that I can sheer it out using a sponge for lighter coverage.  I wouldn’t use this for any special occasions because I would prefer something that could stay on longer with more coverage and without having shine break through, plus the high SPF could cause flashback but I would recommend it as a great every day coverage product that is super user friendly and provides a little extra sun protection.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing i love the Full coverage it has and lasts all day .. I love that it also has SPF 50+ I highly recommended

The CC+ cream had a lot more coverage than I expected. The foundation had a heavier coverage than regular cc creams I’ve tried. I liked that it left my skin feeling hydrated. It did need a bit of rubbing in to blend. I just wish I had gotten the correct color so that I could have worn it out and seen how well it lasted all day. (I got a shade 3-4 times darker than me) The overall coverage was great, definitely better than my regular foundation.

It works but a little goes a very long way. Use too much and the results are less than stellar. Like that it has a clean finish. No stickiness. I have combination dry skin and this doesn't make my dry patches flaky, if anything it acts as a moisturizer to those areas.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_text: It was unfortunate that I was sent the wrong color to evaluate but I still put it on to see how well it worked.  On my finger I noticed no oily residue around the product and the texture was smooth, not milli. The coverage was excellent despite the fact the color was way too dark. I would have liked to wear it all day to see what it truly was like.

The coverage of this foundation is not what I expected it's better. I compared it to the makeup I already had and it is giving a superior quality over the most expensive brands I have. It lasts long and gives full coverage. Another plus is that it blends well with my skin. I would recommend this one.
I love this product! The IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation is definitely my new favorite foundation! It apply so smoothly and has great coverage!

I have to say this is my new favorite foundation!  I love this full coverage & spf for this foundation.  I like they've added new shades.It goes on effortless and is build able, not cakey. Covers some sun spots I have perfectly.
Its good but if you use too much it can look very cakey. It makes me very oily so i need oil blotting sheets when i use this
