Worked well on my combination skin. It only looked heavy when I messed up and used too much. I have also used in various seasons (summer and winter) and it performs well. I prefer setting with powder but it also looks good without it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Mocha - very deep complexion with cool red undertones
reviews.review_text: The shade I got was a little darker than my skintone. I used it to contour and I loved it.

Received It CC+ cream from BzzAgent in exchange for my honest review. I didn't receive the correct shade for my skin, but still decided to write a review after testing it. It covers really well and leaves a moist on the skin. I'm always interested in the CC cream containing Spf and this cream is perfect for people who like minimizing their makeup process.
I love this stuff! It’s super lightweight and feels moisturizing but also provides a full coverage! Would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Tan - light brown shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_text: When I use it, it doesn't suit my skin tone very well, I think there should be more colors to suit more skin types.  but it suits my daughter.  I will buy again if my kids want.  but won't buy it for me because I don't think it's very meeting.  I will probably buy it again if you guys have new products

reviews.review_title: Smooth finish, great protection from the sun
reviews.review_text: This cream is so easy to apply and feels so good on my skin. It has an SPF of 50+, which is amazing protection from the sun. It’s very hydrating as well but the shade is too dark for my skin. I’ll definitely use it for the summer.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan Warm - tan complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_text: The foundation is good tan was to dark for me and when you 1st put it on it feels heavy on the face i also did not like how it stained my clothes it does stay on all day but feel you  need to wor on the shades

This foundation cream has amazing full coverage! From the first application stroke of the brush on my face, I immediately noticed how it blended in and covered my blemishes. And it doesn't take much product to get a great coverage either. The shade was just a tad bit off from my complexion, but I can't deny that this product is amazing & I would definitely run to the store again if it was the perfect shade.
It’s a good cc cream / foundation.  I love how easy it goes on and can provide full coverage with lightweight and nourishing.  Highly recommended!
I’m in love with that! It’s really moisturizer, has sun protection and is full coverage. It’s a lot of benefits together. And it’s not heavy! My skin looks so natural. I recommend it!
This is exactly what I was looking for! I love the full coverage & I don’t look like I’m wearing makeup at all. Highly recommended!!

I received the foundation from IT Cosmetic to try on but unfortunately  the shade I received was to deep for my skin color. The packaging and texture of the product is very good and it is a shame that I could  not test on my skin.

reviews.review_title: Great foundation coverage that includes SPF.
reviews.review_text: Very good coverage for having an SPF. Does not smell like sunscreen like other brands that include SPF. I now use this for my everyday foundation.
Love this product. The coverage is just right! Not too cakey. It blends in just right!

This CC cream + foundation was ok, definitely not full coverage as I had to layer it to cover up my dark spots and red skin patches.  It did however blend in quite easily and seamlessly.  one thing I hated is the fact that it stained my shirt and jacket with a simple touch as well as my hands, very transferrable !

I really enjoyed the scent on this product.  It was full coverage and easily buildable. It didn't leave any orange tints and a little goes a long way. I highly recommend this velvety soft cc cream! I can't love it more.
After using this product for a few weeks I'm so loving it..It will most definitely be a product that I continue to purchase!!!

I like to consider myself a tinted moisturizer/CC cream connoisseur and this product here is nothing short of amazing. It isn’t heavy on the face but offers buildable coverage however the first coverage is enough for a light coverage. It settles in and the finish look is like second skin on a great skin day.
I love the way it feels on the skin and it's very pigmented, makes for good coverage.
I really like the CC foundation. It was very matte on my face and didn't leave any lines or creases.It goes on so smoothly and was very lightweight. I didn't even feel I had anything on my skin.
I received as part of a promotion for a review.   Unfortunately , the shade is way too dark for my skin tone and so I cannot review it .

I really wanted to like this foundation. The match was perfect for me. I used it with primer and setting spray but it still transferred all over my fingers if I touched my face. Maybe it was just me but it didnt work out very well. The coverage was buildable and full and covered which is what I always look for in a foundation due to hyperpigmentation but the staying power or transfer resistant just was not there. I would not recommend this for myself but would recommend it to someone else who might want to give it a try and see if it works for them as all skin is not created equal! I appreciate the chance to review this product that was sent to me.

This is truly one of the the best cc creams out there  The coverage is insane plus rhe protecfion  it offers. Whenever I wear any it cc cream I get compliments from people. I am on the oily side so I must powder and use a mattifying powder in certain places.
I absolutely love this product It blends in the skin very well. This is literally the best foundation I have ever used. I definitely recommend!

Love this IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ Fair Beige . It covers my whole face with just a little dime size portion of the product. Blends amazing into the skin while leaves beautiful and soft skin afterwards . I will definitely purchase in the future and highly recommend it.  Much better compared to other products I've tried in the past.
Great coverage and I love that it goes on so smooh. A little goes a long way. Definitely will keep using

I feel like this is one of the best foundation/CC creams I've ever used. From the packaging to the blendability, there's not much to dislike. I was pleasantly surprised to take off the lid and find a pump dispenser and not just a squeeze tube. I only needed a few drops to have perfect coverage of red spots and dryness. This color was a little darker than I expected it would be, but it blended very well so it wasn't a major issue. I'd definitely recommend this to a friend, but I'd suggest they do a color match in store first.
It’s a great cc cream/foundation and blends easily and it has SPF perfect! It’s lightweight and feels great on my skin covered my imperfections. My new favorite!

reviews.review_title: Great for an all day foundation!
reviews.review_text: Will never use another foundation for work again! The SPF alone sold me but being able to wear a foundation for 8+ hours that is full coverage AND has skin benefits is a dream. I have very dry skin and this doesn’t stick to my dry patches and my skin feels hydrated the entire time! Because of the SPF I wouldn’t recommend it for nighttime if you’re taking photos otherwise it’s amazing!
Applied well but appeared cakey after a while. I loved the new pump instead of a tube.  It is not a good product for me.
This foundation covered my sun spots and blemishes better than other foundations. It goes on smooth. I love that it has sun protection.

This product is an all in one miracle.  I was sent  free in exchange for my feedback.  I love how easy it goes on and how natural it feels. It provides full coverage that is also nourishing.  The only thing that I didn't really know how to do was select my color. I wish there was a way to find this because this product is really great.
I love the full coverage while very lightweight. It does get a lil oily so I use finishing powder on top. This is starting to grow on me and becoming my everyday use.

wasn’t sure about this one.  It seems like a lot of sunscreen products are oily.  And a lot of cream foundations are heavy. This CC cream was none of those things.  Package instructions said to apply with a foundation brush.  I really liked the finish. I’ve also been applying with a triangle puff.  Works very well also.  It gives good full coverage.  I put it on before concealer and didnt need it in a couple spots that I usually do.  It lasted all day pretty well.  I did set with powder.  It didn’t oxidize smear or transfer.  The color looked natural on my skin.  I liked it a lot. I

I was given a free trial of the IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ from BzzAgent. I can tell you that after a week of use, I was immediately impressed. The coverage and non-cakey appearance are impressive. It does a great job of hiding my redness. It doesn't have a heavy scent, which I appreciate. I'll definitely buy this foundation again.
Perfect for my everyday look. I go for a more medium to full coverage look. You can easily get that with this foundation. Blended very easily. Stayed on for hours!

I had never used a CC cream before and was a bit hesitant to try it but let me tell you this CC cream is more than what I expected. It was very easy to put on and feels very creamy when using. I have alot of hyper pigmentation on my face and sometimes do not want to wear my full coverage foundation so I have been using this CC cream and I love it. It doesn't cover up everything completely but it covers enough for me to feel comfortable. Plus the color I received is  the perfect shade for my skin tone.

I have been using the cc cream for the past 10 days and I can strongly say that the product has a great coverage it smoothed all unevenness on my skin. I can visible see that my skin has become softer and is well moisturized. This will be my go to product considering the benefits and the ease of application.

This was thicker than I expected but does give great coverage. It is a matte finish and seems to hold up well. It didn't smudge and smear. I love that it is SPF. My only complaint was I don't think I matched the color up well as it seemed a bit light for me. It does moisturize nice without making my skin feel greasy. It holds up well under stress/sweat
using this as my foundation for a few days, and love it so far...  I love that it covers those annoying age spots without looking cakey. I found that a small amount covers perfectly.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Deep - deep complexion with neutral undertones
reviews.review_text: Was a quick and simple swap and the shade is beautiful.   But it went from matte to cake which wasn't ideal.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan Warm - tan complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_text: This is exactly what I was looking for! I love the full coverage & I don’t look like I’m wearing makeup at all. Highly recommended!!
I love this foundation.  My only regret is I wish I had gotten a shade lighter. It blends in the skin so well. I think this is the best foundation I have ever used.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Rich - tan to deep complexion with neutral peach undertone
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! It left my face feeling smoother than ever! It's not oily and it covers my dark spots great. I would 10/10 recommend.

I love IT cosmetics because it has full coverage and it covers any dark spots, scars and acne and blemishes too. It's very soft and creamy texture. It protects you from the sun, it's two in one product.
I absolutely love this product. It’s full coverage without making you feel cakey . Having SPF in the fountain is definitely a plus ! Especially here in Arizona .

The CC cream is pretty great so far. I like that there is multiple shades available, so I am able to use two to make my perfect match. One of my favorite things about it is, it's an SPF 50 that also doubles as a foundation. So I’m protected while looking my best. The best part is that it doesn't dry my skin out and it doesn't irritate my sensitive parts of my face. It can be used for medium to full coverage and could almost be considered a matte finish. I can use my brush or a sponge  to apply it smoothly, even my fingers with no issues. Great product, would recommend for anyone looking for a higher spf foundation.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Bronze - very deep complexion with cool rosy undertones
reviews.review_text: I was sent this product to try and just knew I wouldn’t like it but surprisingly I love it!! It gives my skin a creamy glow and I love how lightweight it is. This is it!!
After using this product I felt that it had full coverage even though I was sent the wrong skin tone I mixed it to create my shade but it is great for contouring if you buy it too dark

I have never really been a fan of It Cosmetics’ foundations/complexion products, but they have definitely made progress. I would still use an SPF under this, but the pigment coverage is great! A little bit goes a long way. It would definitely take me a while to go through this, but I think I would purchase this.
I’ve been using every day since I got it! I love the coverage, the finish, it’s not heavy on the skin and you just gotta love the skincare inside it!

After using this product the over the past week, I have to say I’m a big fan! It really works to color correct and provide full coverage. The spf is an added benefit that I’m excited about for summer! My face is flawless when using this product, my mom couldn’t even tell I was wearing makeup, the shade match was perfect for me! Will be adding this to my staple products.
After using this product after a couple of weeks. I love it. It goes on smooth and covers my blemishes. It doesn’t dry your skin out.
When using this product it goes on smooth, natural and full coverage

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Bronze - very deep complexion with cool rosy undertones
reviews.review_text: I have finally found my perfect coverage. IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ - Deep Bronze Is the perfect shade for my skin. This will be my new go to foundation.
For oily or combination skin I truly don’t recommend the product. But if you have dry skin this product is for you.

I had high hopes for this product but was let down. Unfortunately, the color was nowhere near my skin tone so I looked like a ghost after application. At first, I assumed it was just the SPF but after several applications (and crazy stares) I knew it had nothing to do with that at all. Because I have a deep complexion most foundations don't have colors that match my skin tone. While I'm use to that and thankful for skin inclusion from brands this one just isn't right for me. The only reason I'm not rating it lower is because I ended up give the product to my daughter (she has a deep caramel skin tone) and it seemed to be a color match to her. It cover quite a bit of her acne scars. Maybe if I had the darkest shade the results for myself and review might be different.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_text: I was really impressed with this product. It didn’t have a heavy scent, which is my biggest complaint with other products I have tried. It feels great on the skin and the coverage is amazing!
This product matched my skin perfectly and covered my dark spots remarkably well. I don't usually use a cc cream, but I will from now on.

This is perfect for every day wear. Added bonus that it has spf in it. We always love the products that include the good stuff, right? It glides on easily and stays in place. I do still set it since I have oily skin.

reviews.review_title: One of the best foundations out there!!
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical about this foundation at first because the color seemed a tad darker for my skin but even when I used just a bit it completely covered every single blemish and left my face looking so flawlessly. I usually stay away from spf foundations but this one won me over because you don't even smell the spf and hey it protects your skin while looking good.

At first I thought the shade was a little dark on my skin tone, but I used my concealer to blend and lighten a little and it was perfect! It’s smooth and blends very well with my other make up. I really liked using this instead of foundation!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Honey - deep complexion with warm golden undertone
reviews.review_text: So, my skin is a deep bronze and I was so excited to try this product, especially considering that it has sunscreen in it. However, it did not match my skin tone in that it was super chalky looking and left a grey overcast that everyone else noticed, too. Maybe I should have gone a shade down, but it didn’t blend well on my brown skin.
After using this product I feel like the coverage is great for everyday wear. It gave a natural look which is what I like.
This CC cream gave me a flawless finish. It has become my go to in my foundation routine. It is very easy to apply and is forgiving for those of us who sometimes skip primer.

As a busy mom, sometimes all I want to do is look decent! This CC cream is great for days where I just want to look out together with little effort! I love thays it's high coverage and it makes all my faces flaws disappear! A little goes a long way! The spf is also added bonus! My face did feel itchy after a few hours so for me that has combo skin type this would not be an ideal all day cream

great product, i love how nice of a coverage it gives me. it takes time to blend in but once you figure that out it looks great. it is a thick product but at the end it does what is says. i would totally recommend getting it
It’s a everyday day wear. I like that it has spf in it. I’ve been loving tinted moisturizer as to regular foundation. Very light weight. But i do it get a little more oily than normal.
I really love how this foundation goes on. It’s got enough coverage to look natural yet cakey. I also appreciate they’ve got a variety of shades for POC.

reviews.review_title: Loved the coverage wish I got a shade darker
reviews.review_text: Great coverage, I should have chosen a darker shade. It was way too light for my complexion. What I ended up doing was was mixing this with a foundation I already had and it made a bigger difference. This is also long-lasting so if you’re looking for a nice coverage and buildable this is it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_text: After using this CC+ Cream Full Coverage and I'm in love with how flawless my skin looks. But at the same time it's not a heavy foundation so I don't get oily or breakout .
Very beautiful! Absolutely great coverage. Very creamy and smooth formula. Loved it!

This full-coverage foundation reduces the appearance of acne scarring, wrinkles, redness, dark circles under eyes & large poresall while giving you a luminous, supple, flawless-looking complexion. Some people may not like the fragrance, but I think it is refreshing--a light citrus fragrance. Your Skin But Better CC+ Cream is an award-winning color corrector cream that works beautifully as your full-coverage foundation, hydrating serum and SPF 50+ physical sunscreen. I love it I really do! I am already telling all my friends about this one!

This applies nice and smoothly on my skin and doesn’t feel cakey at all. I barely know I’m wearing anything because it just feels like moisturizer. I can put on just a little at a time for buildable coverage. When I apply it full face it covers up all my blemishes, imperfections and freckles. I love this even more than the original! Definitely will continue using it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan Rich - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_text: This is a light but full coverage CC Cream. It doesn't smell or feel heavy with the SPF coverage. I have super oily skin yet it didn't make my skin more oily nor dry. The tone was a really great match for me! I will definitely purchase this product in the future.

I didn't get quite the right shade but the product still disappeared into my skin once blended. I could go a shade or two darker. I have very sensitive skin and there was no irritation. Coverage was full but still looked very skin like.

I love the tube and how easy the pump applies to fingers, brushes, sponges, etc. It is great for any purse. A little goes a long way with this formula. It is buildable but one layer covers most of my freckles and discoloration. I use 2 layers on sun spots. It did not pill with my primer or other make up and lasted all day (even in the shower). It goes on dewy but dries naturally, and I love that there’s 50 spf in it. A++

I love this product! This works to cover skin better than my dept store foundation. A little goes a long way and it blends well for a smooth finish. I also love the spf amount. I plan to use this daily and feel naked without it!

I was pleasantly surprised at how easily I was able to match my color as I only saw the colors online. Very buildable coverage. Non-drying but make sure you set it properly. If not it will transfer easily. It did not break me out as others have.
This coverage wasn’t too bad, was a medium coverage for me. felt pretty light on my skin. This would be a good summer go to. I wish there where more shade options avl
It's a light but full coverage CC Cream. It doesn't smell nor feel heavy with the SPF coverage. The tone was a really great match for me!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Deep - deep complexion with neutral undertones
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately, this shade is too deep for me, however, I have a fair review of this product. This is a nice natural, full coverage cc cream. I have oily skin and I believe this goes on nicely on my skin. I have hyperpigmentation and prefer medium coverage, so 1 pump definitely helps achieve that. Unfortunately, if I do not powder down my face and use a mattifying primer, then I find myself blotting every 3-4 hours with sine transfer. Although, I do find this to be hydrating, so I’d definitely continue to wear this out in the cooler weather. I’d recommend this cc cream for those who like a hydrating, natural glow to their skin.

The foundation is great. It blends well with my skin and has a very moisturizing feel. The cream covers a lot of blemishes, I just had to put a bit of concealer to cover some marks. The best part in my opinion was the spf, it is hard to find foundations with this much and not feel too heavy. I like to layer it with my innsfree sunscreen to be well protected. I like that the brand included more foundation shades because I wanted to buy it earlier but couldn't match my tone.

reviews.review_title: A must have for your makeup routine
reviews.review_text: This was the first time I tried the cosmetic color correcting full coverage cream and I have to say I’m pretty impressed. So opening the package I noticed the little tube and how the lid squirts the foundation out which I absolutely love makes it easier to get the foundation out.  Squirting it on my skin a little went far with 3 squirts covered my face.  Has a light smell and did it’s job I will definitely recommend this.

I have been loving using this CC cream! It goes on smooth and looks great throughout a full 12 hr work day. I love the fact that it has an anti aging serum and SPF included... at age 38 I take all the help I can get.It is easily blendable and lightweight. I will be using it again.

I received this foundation from BzzAgent and It Cosmetics in exchange my honest review. I used it several times over the span of a week or so. I wasn’t totally impressed with the full coverage claim but perhaps I needed to build more. I just hate feeling like I have a ton of makeup on. I did like that it smells so clean and doubles as a sunscreen. Always a plus! The color matched me pretty well. I also like that it sets very beautifully and lasts for hours at a time. My face felt light and never greasy. These are musts for me. I would definitely purchase this product in the future and I recommend as well. I feel it covered my blemishes well especially with a little color correction as you’ll see in my video. Overall a great product. Thanks so much!

I immediately fell in love with this foundation as it has many of the qualities I look in a foundation. It provides full coverage and it does a great job hiding blemishes and making the skin tone look even. The result was a flawless and smooth texture without any smudge or oily residue. It also gave good hydration to my face. My face looked radiant and fresh. To top it off, it also contained a great amount of spf, which is very important. I highly recommend this foundation due to the results I obtained. It is my go to foundation to use every day.

reviews.review_title: Not my favorite but a great foundation
reviews.review_text: Very nice full coverage. I think the sunscreen may be causing the streaky look if not blended well.

Although I chose a shade (or 2) darker than I needed, I absolutely LOVE this foundation and will purchase in the correct shade. It is light and goes on the skin so smooth! This is definitely the best foundation I’ve ever used.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan Warm - tan complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_text: I'm not sure this would be a go to for every day, but I will 100%  be switching my foundation out for this during the summer. I love that this is SPF 50. It's so light and evens out my skin tone so nicely. It feels so light on my skin and doesn't crease. I have combination skin but it didn't affect the oiliness. It didn't flake on the dry patches, which does often happen with my usual foundations. I definitely will use this during the summer or days I'm more active because it's so light but gives nice coverage and I love the added benefit of SPF.
This gave me the full coverage that lasted all day that I needed. It went on smoothly and didn't need a lot of touch ups.

This CC Cream is seriously what dreams are made of! It has the coverage of a foundation yet is a true CC cream and so dewy and luminous. It lasts all day and blends into the skin so well. What’s nice is that they added more shades because before they didn’t have fair enough shades and I’m very fair. I also tried this out on my mother who has older skin and it was BEAUTIFUL so this CC cream is amazing on mature skin. I highly recommend it!! The only downside is the price. Especially for makeup artists who want to add this to their kit and want multiple shades, even though it would be worth it.

This CC Cream is seriously what dreams are made of! It has the coverage of a foundation yet is a true CC cream and so dewy and luminous. It lasts all day and blends into the skin so well. What’s nice is that they added more shades because before they didn’t have fair enough shades and I’m very fair. I also tried this out on my mother who has older skin and it was BEAUTIFUL so this CC cream is amazing on mature skin. I highly recommend it!! The only downside is the price. Especially for makeup artists who want to add this to their kit and want multiple shades, even though it would be worth it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rich - golden brown shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_text: Shade was not a match but coverage was full. Creamtmy texture.
I love this! It glides smoothly over my skin. I was also pleasantly surprised that it was my shade. It’s full coverage and I love that it provides sun protection.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Honey - deep complexion with warm golden undertone
reviews.review_text: I love this product, I love the fact that has 50%SPF and I don't have to apply any extra it has full covers and the skin feels super hydrated after.

This is probably one of the better CC+ Creams on the market that I have used. I would buy this product and recommend it to family and friends. It leaves my skin flawless; I have a little hyperpigmentation and it covered it so well. It wears all day and is very lightweight

I prefer skin tints and to use concealer to spot cover imperfections. I was pleased to see that IT Cosmetics CC provides both options in one product. The CC cream was very lightweight on my skin and looked natural and skin like. To spot conceal I used a very small amount and it covered a dark spot completely. I love the easy application of a tube pump applicator. The color neutral rich is new and was still warmer on my skin than neutral. I mixed in a small amount of blue foundation mixer which cooled it down and the color matched perfect with my skin.
Super pretty natural finish and it makes my skin looks like skin! 10 stars from me!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Honey - deep complexion with warm golden undertone
reviews.review_text: Love this product. It goes on light, makes my skin look smoother. Helps cover dark circles and acne. Don’t need to use that much to cover full face. Love the added sunscreen since I usually forget to put some on. Lasting coverage.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan Warm - tan complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_text: I was very impressed by the coverage and blendability of this foundation. It left no dry patches and did not look cakey throughout the day as most full coverage products do. My favorite thing about it is the high amount of spf it contains and that it can be used as a daily product.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Bronze - very deep complexion with cool rosy undertones
reviews.review_text: Great coverage might’ve gone down one shade or just save this for summer when I’m a tad bit darker but overall I love a good CC and this one has excellent coverage, win win
I have been loving this foundation. It matches my skin tone perfectly and provide the coverage I was looking for

I have used It Cosmetics CC cream foundation for years and I have recommended it to all of my close family and friends. I have suffered from all different types of skin problems. The biggest issue I've had is dry patchy skin. No matter how much I moisturized I could not wear foundation without it getting flakey until I discovered the It Cosmetics CC cream. It isn't thick enough to cause dry patches but it isn't oily either. It's the perfect formula for my skin. It wears great throughout the day and provides the perfect amount of coverage. I would recommend this foundation to anyone who has had a hard time finding their holy grail foundation.

reviews.review_title: Not greasy and it ia full coverage
reviews.review_text: I received this in return for an honest review. I love the coverage it is full coverage and not heavy or greasy. I was a little hesitant about using this because everything I put on my face is always oily feeling or heavy. I have yet to find a lightweight full coverage make up until today. I’m very picky because a lot of things are too heavy for my face. I sweat a lot, so this is perfect. I do recommend it.

Cosmetic products always have a good start with me when there’s SPF in it. I was not expecting this coverage though, it covered all my imperfections and still did not make me feel like I had makeup on. I’ll definitely be buying this product and recommending to my friends!

Love using this product as my foundation. It goes on easily and does not make me feel made up! Yet it evens out my skin tone for a great look... I love this CC+ cream because this product answered my prayer. I have been looking for something to cover my imperfections that would still look very natural. I have dry skin, but lately, I have been having really dry skin, especially around and at the side of the bridge of my nose. Having said that, this product has been helping my skin to look hydrated, especially on the mentioned part of my face. It prevents my nose from flaking and looking hydrated all day long without looking oily. This product is full coverage and buildable without looking cakey. In my opinion, using clean fingers is the best way to apply it. Since it is a CC+ cream, I strongly recommend setting it with a powder.
Very positive experience with this product, very upscale ingredients and great results, excellent coverage and long lasting. Effects, I will definitely add this item to my basics .
I got this in a shade that wasn’t mine, I had to use mixing pigment to be able to use product - product is okay, price point is not my cup of tea. Easy to blend but I don’t see a difference.

This is my new favorite foundation! It’s so lightweight, hydrating and full coverage to cover up my acne scars. It really doesn’t feel like if I’m wearing anything and stays perfectly all day. I love that it also has spf50+ in it. Overall it’s a beautiful foundation thats great for my dehydrated skin  so I highly recommend!!

I received the IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ - Tan Warm to try for free in exchange for my honest review. Due to the cc cream and sun block protection, I was eager to try this foundation, but what really won me over was the improvement in my face after application. My skin's color was even throughout, and whatever flaws I might have had were completely concealed. Not even loose or compact powder was necessary for me. The fragrance was the only thing I didn't enjoy, but I could live with it because of all the other advantages, so I'm still rating it a 5.

Upon first dab of foundation on my skin I was excited and hopeful that I had finally found the perfect match to my skin tone. But as I started to spread it out it seemed to darken a bit. I’m not saying it doesn’t still technically match but it makes my face look more tan than I would like. I have the medium coverage version in tan rich but somehow this looks a bit darker. Maybe that’s just because of the coverage difference. But other than that I like it. It smooths the look of my skin and mostly covers my blemishes. Haven’t really found that magic that truly covers my dark spots but this is still a great foundation. I think I would like to try the matte finish next time. The natural finish makes me “glow” too much so I think I look greasy or oily but that’s just me.

Thank you BzzzAgent and IT Cosmetics for my free sample in exchange for my honest review. First my holy grail foundation is Estée Lauder Doublewear. I have been wearing that foundation for over 29 years and normally when I try other foundations, I am disappointed. I have mature oily but dehydrated skin with dark spots, freckles, and hyperpigmentation and fine lines, smile lines. No texture, but enlarged pores on my cheeks, so a foundation has some challenges to work through. This foundation was a pleasant surprise. I like the foundation has sunscreen, but I still use my own prior to using this for more coverage. I like the squeeze tube with a pump, it makes traveling with it easy.. This foundation has a scent of sunscreen. I received color light beige which is a bit too light for me, but I still used his looking to see performance. I can truly get to full coverage with this foundation better than my Estée Lauder. I tried this on my face.. one side straight out of the pump on bare skin. The other side with my full routine with multiple serums, moisturizer, sunscreen, and primer. This clearly needs primer at a minimum. The side on bare skin settled into my pores, smile lines, and looked shiny and cakey at the end of her day. The side with all my skincare, I was shocked how good it looked, no settling into smile lines and did good job on my pores. Using this as a concealer with fine lines, not a good idea on either side, it settled right into all my under eye fine lines. I truly enjoy this foundation and makes my pores look great and even gives my skin a youthful look. The coverage is truly full compared to Estee Lauder with less product. I use two pumps to get full coverage on the entire face. I do have to set this foundation because it never dries down on me. I want to try this in Texas heat, NY winter this held up with no issues. I will purchase this in the correct color. What I have done is mix this with my Estée Lauder foundation to make it blend into my skin bett

I was selected to try out It cosmetics CC+ Color Correcting Full Coverage cream-In exchange for my honest opinion. The product went on so nice and smooth when I applied it, using my foundation brush. It color corrected my skin and did a pretty good job at hiding my imperfections. It's got SPF 50 and Anti-Aging hydrating serum. My skin has stayed fresh and hydrated. The formula lasts through out the day for me. Also alittle goes a long way, but if needed, for a hard to cover area-The CC cream is definitely buildable. I can't wait to try other products by IT cosmetics. I love this CC cream, no doubt.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_text: This was definitely very high coverage. But my skin felt so good! And not heavy, and I loved that I could sheer it down too!

reviews.review_title: Definitely would try again with right shade match
reviews.review_text: This is the best cc cream I ever used . My problem is that it as the wrong shade match which is my fault cause I can’t shade match online at all. It was too dark so I would have to wear some foundation on top toof it to lighten it up a bit

IT Cosmetics has done it again. I love their new shades & I love how their formula and texture feel on my skin. My skin feels hydrated despite that it’s full coverage. It doesn’t look cakey so that’s also a BIG plus.

I got a lighter shade than my skin but i still love it. I am not into full coverage but can if i need to. I use this more for a medium coverage and super love it! And plus who doesn’t want a make up with skincare benefits. I love that you can look beautiful and at the same time be protected from the harm the sun can cause to your skin. I sure would recommend this product just make sure to choose your exact skin shade. Very buildable and light weight. Just love it! See attached photo taken with natural light and no filter just a medium/light coverage.

I received this complimentary from BzzAgent to try and review for my honest feedback Thank you!  I only needed to use a small amout a little goes a very long way. It has a thick creamy lightweight texture that applied smoothly and gave me full coverage, layed evenly on my skin and dried to matte finish. It's a great full coverage foundation that won't come off until I take it off which took repeated washing almost like it's waterproof. I like it's SPF 50+ I like to protect my fair/light skin as much as possible.  I recommend if you want full coverage that will last all day, I have combination skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_text: This is the first CC cream I’ve tried. I got my usual shad but this seemed a shade too dark for me during the winter, but with the high spf it will be perfect for spring/summer. A little goes a long way. It blended easy with a beauty blender and totally evened my skin tone. It had a lot more coverage than I expected. It didn’t crease and felt like nothing on my skin. I did notice during the day if I touched my face there was transfer.
The tan warm matches perfectly to my skin tone. Its so easy to apply and blends easily. I love that it is full coverage and contains anti aging serum. With just two pumps im able to cover my face.

It feels like I’m not wearing anything on my face. Super lightweight and perfect especially on the days when I just want a bit of coverage but not feeling caked on. Lasts all day and it’s just perfect for me

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan Rich - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_text: It’s definitely a full coverage cream. I would definitely recommend. I will actually use this one now. I like how it comes in a tube but still has a spout like it’s in a bottle. I do have oily skin, it’s not matte but I can’t complain for it being a CC cream. I will be using when I don’t want to use a full foundation.

reviews.review_title: I will most definitely buy this again!!
reviews.review_text: After using this product, which I will most definitely buy again, it kept my skin less oily, stayed on all day with no retouching it, and my face felt hydrated all day.
I have used this product before just a different shade! Love both colors! Leaves my skin feeling hydrated, flawless. Long day wear!

I have been using IT cosmetics for years. But this CC cream really peaked my curiosity. I purchased it and was so happy after the very first to use. It helped to balance out my skin tones and felt like silk on my skin. IT is an amazing product that I've never had a complaint with. It does everything it says it does and more. Hides a multitude of sins and makes you look amazing. I highly recommend.
I've been wanting to try their products for years so I was pretty excited to discover they're offering products in darker shades.  It's very lightweight  practically melts onto the skin.

The product appears much darker when you first put it on, but it blends in well. I had to mix it with a lighter concealer my match my skin tone. I love that it has such a high SPF, this makes me feel better about adding that layer of skin protection. It does have a fuller coverage than other CC creams I’ve tried, which I like

I’m in love with this foundation!! Here’s the goodness: 1. Color Correcting - balances out my dark spots and freckles. 2. Contains SPF - you can never have enough 3. Full coverage - This is definitely a thicker consistency, so a little goes a long way.  4. Anti Aging Hydrating Serum - Wow! Besides everything else, IT gives us this!!! Niacinimide & Hyaluronic Acid!  If you want a full-coverage foundation good for maturing skin, this is the one for you!

I love this CC foundation because it protects you from the sun but also it's has full coverage. I love it because when you put it on it's not like other foundations that you can see it and it's not dry. You can see on the picture I have it on and it looks natural not like other foundations.

They did not lie when they said that the foundation is full coverage! A little bit really goes a long way with the foundation and I found that I didn’t have to do much for it to blend out. I love that natural finish because it gives you a no makeup, makeup look. Also, it didn’t crack or crease throughout the day. This is a great foundation for anyone going for a natural look.

I  have used IT Cosmetics before and I do love a lot of their products. I was really hoping to love this as well. The color match was great- the packaging was sleek.  The formula however when I put it on my face felt dry and cakey- not at all what I expected. I tried with a blender sponge and my fingers.  After about half hour it settled into my pores and my face felt tight.  Maybe this will work for other skin types, but for me it was a no.

AT first I thought I had gotten tyne wrong color but as I was blending I realized it literally just took on my skintone like a second skin.  I sweat a lot and decided to test this out for a New Years Eve at a party and let me tell you even though I was sweating, drinking and dancing up a storm.this foundation was still in its place at the end of the night. NOW as far as coverage goes it covers the little spots I have on my face very well and the little break out that was starting(cause you know your skin likes to act up when your trying to go out somewhere.) It felt like a concealer and foundation at the same time, but without feeling like my skin was suffocating underneath it.

reviews.review_title: PUT ALL OTHER FOUNDATIONS ASIDE AND USE THIS!!
reviews.review_text: I've really seen a huge difference in my skin!! I do my makeup daily so trust me when I say I can see an improvement, my skin feels softer and I swear some of those fine lines under my eyes aren't there anymore!!  THIS CC CREAM HAS ANTI AGING SERUM IN IT & THEN SOME !! 🏃‍♂️ 🏃‍♀️ 🏃‍♂️ 🏃‍♀️

It Cosmetics foundation is buildable. But the foundation color that I received wasn't a match for my skin. So, I had to take a lighter foundation and mix it slightly with the IT Cosmetics foundation and that seemed to do the trick.  It gave me a full coverage it had SPF in it it was a light creamy texture to it and I believe a little bit goes a long way for this foundation. The only reason I gave it a four was because the match wasn't suited to my skin tone.  Overall, I would recommend this to everyone that needs a great foundation that lasts all day and well into the night.

I tried the IT cosmetics full coverage cream foundation in the shade Medium. It was the perfect match for my skin tone. I love the fact that you only need a small amount of this product, because it goes a long way. I sweat a lot and this foundation didn't budge! I was happy about that. It is very full coverage and it covered all of my blemishes. I also love the fact that it has sunscreen in it. It is so lightweight, I felt like I wasn't wearing foundation at all. I absolutely love this foundation. This one is my new favorite go to foundation. Out of all the others I have tired, this one goes above and beyond my expectations. I will definitely recommend this to family and friends. And I will be buying this foundation as a new addition to my daily makeup routine.

I am totally blown away by this product I have been using this as my daily foundation. It’s seven products in one. It’s definitely full coverage. It lasted me all day. My face looks smooth and light. It comes with a pump so it’s easy to apply  to a sponge or a brush whichever you prefer.

Feels lightweight and leaves my skin feeling hydrated.  Love the SPF. I find the coverage buildable. Minimal touch ups needed throughout the day. It gives nice coverage. I would definitely recommend this product.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan Warm - tan complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_text: I received the IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ and I’m loving it!!!  It blends well into my skin and lasts all day!! Not cakey at all!!!

This product has quality ingredients plus great coverage! Easy to use and comes with a pump dispenser. Blends out very nicely, I use it for contouring since I didn't receive the correct shade for my skin. Works out perfectly for me!
This product has great coverage! It dries matte but has a luminous touch to it. The thing I didn’t like was that it’s very transferable with the slightest touch. It’s very moisturizing.

I am usually not a big fan of CC creams and instead opt for a foundation because CC creams often won't give me the coverage I actually need. The IT Cosmetics CC+ cream however gives me flawless coverage while also hydrating my skin, removing the redness and color correcting, and providing an SPF of 50 (which is very important to my rosacea effected skin that is very sensitive to the sun). I love the fact it fully covers my imperfections and the often overwhelming redness without being too thick or completely covering all of my freckles. It is truly amazing and provides a natural, flawless everyday look. I swear, this cream is magic!

reviews.review_title: All you will need in your everyday routine!
reviews.review_text: This is truly all you will need in your face and neck for your everyday routine! It has skincare ingredients, impressive spf and buildable coverage. The formulation is very elegant, moisturizing and a lovely coverage. I have oily skin and my trick is to use translucent powder before the CC Cream and this make it last all day and not get oily. I also love to mix it with other foundations because it really improve their performance. I would recommend this CC Cream a 100 percent to everyone! Try it, you deserve it and you will love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely in love with this full coverage SPF 50 foundation. It is perfect for my skin tone and it feels fabulous going on and lasts all day. I highly recommend it.
This is great for a quick simple makeup look. It matches my skin perfectly and just looks like skin so I don’t need much or anything outside a lip gloss and maybe some mascara.

reviews.review_title: My new fav foundation! Absolutely stunning on my s
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm totally impressed with these cc cream, I didn't believe it was full coverage but wow was I wrong! It's so beautiful on my skin, love it! It's full coverage dewy comfortable and lasts all day when I set it! I will be buying my winter & summer shade!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the way how the foundation applies on my face. It goes smooth and evenly so easily. The color I have is also very close to my skin color and having an SPF to the coverage also satisfy me regarding sun explose. Over all perfect for even a beginners as it applies easily and evenly.

reviews.review_title: A must have in my daily routine !
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m in love with this product . It worthy every penny. I can’t live without my CC cream now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love using this foundation for the full coverage. Skin stays looking glowy. Doesn’t cake up and really easy to apply. Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for about two weeks now and it has hydrated my skin so much my skin is so soft I have never had my skin so soft from a full coverage foundation cream and it has SPF UVA 50+ sun protection is needed in Florida and this amazes me. I can’t say enough about this product it also has a anti-aging hydrating serum that leaves your skin feeling so soft and in minimizes the wrinkles and this foundation is an oily at all. This product is way better than the other products out there it is the IT  product to go to.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great CC cream for daily use - light enough to be breathable while still covering/blurring imperfections and proving UV protection. Very much a your-skin-but-better product - if you need heavy coverage this might not be for you, but for a more natural look this is perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this a couple of weeks ago from #BzzAgent in exchange for my honest opinion.# It was #It CC +Cream Full Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+.I didn't think I was going to like it but I actually loved it.It went on smooth and easy.And it didn't sweat of or smear For me that's an A+. I'm going to start using this instead of the brand that I have used for years.I will definitely recommend this to my family and friends.Thank you for sharing this wonderful experience.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Bronze - very deep complexion with cool rosy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obviously it's not my tone, but I love the pigmentation. I'll use it as a contour with a little bit of product, it covers a lot

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time using a CC cream so i didn’t know what to expect, I liked that it gives more coverage than a lightweight foundation and with it’s anti-aging benefits and Sun protection it’s a win, I just wish it had less of a greasy feel.

reviews.review_title: IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundatio
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Frist time trying the  IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+,   . It’s light weight, full coverage and contain SPF. It wears well through the day even with my skin being oily. Goes on very easy don’t cakey. I would recommend

reviews.review_title: A great addition to my makeup bag
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If you are looking for something with full coverage this is a great product. I would recommend to friends and I would also purchase. The reason I have four stars is because the shade unfortunately didn't match my skin tone. The product went on smooth even though it's full coverage. I mixed it with a darker shade and it was chefs kiss lasted all day long.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful Even On My Oily Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is actually a really lovely CC cream.  I have naturally oily skin and I’m always concerned that a foundation is going to break down in my T zone or that my entire face will look oily after about an hour.  To my very pleasant surprise, this foundation held up beautifully. I glides on easily and doesn’t look cakey or heavy like many other full coverage foundations do.  I also love that this is made in the USA!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Really lightweight, completely full coverage, great quality cc cream. Works well over moisturizer, a little difficult on dry skin. Would definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation feels heavy on my face. My face could breathe a little under it. The color matched my skin very well. It went on smoothly and evenly.  If your skin is on the dryer side it might be good for you.

reviews.review_title: Love the full coverage and skin matching
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've started using this foundation for just a couple of weeks now. And it's silky and smooth when applying to my face. The coverage lasts all day. May face is oily. And most foundation doesn't last all day. But this does. It doesn't cake on my face. I recommend this foundation for dark skin women. It's color matching is spot on.

reviews.review_title: A high end dupe for the ELF CC cream!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was given this to try for review purposes, but my thoughts are my own. This is the CC cream that you want in your arsenal! Full coverage? Yes! Satin finish? Yes! High SPF? Yes! Long lasting? Ehh, not on me. It is also finicky with what you layer with it underneath. I have oily skin and even in the winter time, it is that way. Day 1, I used my Bobbi Brown Vitamin Face Base and Mehron Colorset setting powder and nope, slid right off after 2 hours. Day 2, tried it with the La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair UV SPF30 Moisturizer, Milk Hydro Grip Primer and the Mehron Colorset powder, got a good 5 hours before touching up. Just to test a theory, I tried it just with the Milk Hydro Grip Primer to see if it just works without a moisturizer or anything like that to assist it and I got a solid 7 hours out of it. So, that tells me it works best by itself with a primer. I found a beauty blender/sponge gives the best smooth and effortless application, but a brush also works as well. Great option for the everyday gal or guy that wants that all in one hard worker that looks good for work but also for the busy life as well! But, I do think that the ELF CC cream (which I do own as well) is a great inexpensive alternative if you cannot get your hands on it!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Rich - tan to deep complexion with neutral peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This a great option if you want a decent amount of lightweight coverage that hydrates your skin and protects from the sun. It blends in very well and I love that it has a pump for easy application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have never tried foundation from this brand before. I really like the focus on SPF and skin protection. I thought the coverage was full without being too heavy, it was just right.  The pump top applicator made it easy to use and apply.  I will definitely try this product again, possibly choosing a slightly different shade to best match my skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked the it CC+ Color Correcting foundation that I received to try out.  As a person with some sun damaged skin and few dark spots on my face, I found this covered it up and gave me a great base for the rest of my makeup. I also found that the makeup lasted on my face all day.  I really liked the way it made my face feel and maybe it was just the SPF 50 but I felt that after using it for a week, my sunspots started to fade a bit. I would definitely buy this product myself and recommend it to my friends and family.
I really love this product. I enjoy the coverage it gives along with the spf 50 protecting factor. this is a product i can definitely keep in rotation, in my regimen. i recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cc cream. It blends really well on parts of my face that are more moisturized. The dryer parts of my face might need more moisture. The screen covers enough and still looks natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is the best cc ive ever used !!! i actually have used the cc from elf which is only 30spf and compare to IT’s which is 50! The shade was a bit darker for my skin but i was able to mix it with my foundation and it still works perfectly fine and IT DOES THE JOB !! it make my skin look the smoothest it’s ever been . i do have acne scars and so far it’s very much covered all of it and it applys so smooth, it doesn’t even look cakey at all!!! i would definitely get this ASAP!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of IT CosmeticsCC+ Cream Full Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ and have used it for 10 days now. I have very sensitive skin and eczema on my face. Therefore I am very cautious with new products. This foundation is my new miracle. It covers all my red spots all day without irritation. I never want to go without it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was not expecting it to be so close to foundation, so I was a bit skeptical. I wear full-coverage foundation, but was interested in all of the skin-care benefits of this product. It has phenomenal coverage and is buildable. It feels really light on my face. I am able to leave it as is, or add concealer and bronzer/contour if I’d like. You do not need to put powder over this, where’s foundation, and other BB and CC creams require a bit of powder to stop from creasing and shining. As far as wear test, it held up my entire workday, which is from 8 am into the evening. I have combination oily and dry skin, more so on the oily side, so I hate shining. Hyaluronic acid helps with oil-control by keeping your face moisturized, not needing to produce as much sebum, and it helps to hydrate dry skin.  I would definitely recommend this product to my friends and family who want something to make their face even-toned, light, and great skin-care benefits. If you are a full-coverage foundation-wearer, this pairs well with foundation! I used it alone and with foundation and I enjoyed both looks! But if you want this product to replace foundation-looks, I would say stick to foundation because BB and CC creams are not meant to be as full-coverage as foundation. They are meant to have greater skincare impact than coverage. This product does cover up scars ad I have melasma, which is extremely deep hyperpigmentation that is symmetrical on the face. Something that covers that is a great product! I would recommend to users who wear makeup daily and those who want a makeup look occasionally.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I liked this CC cream as it is better than others I have tried before. It is easy to apply and build upon. It does not crease. The high SPF is a major plus for the sunny times I am outdoors. I do not have to apply separate sun screen. It overall works well on my combination skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation. I like full and natural coverage. Excellent option because it includes 50 SPF for protection. So important! Great options of shades. It doesn't feel heavy. I recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a fan of some of IT Cosmetics products so I was excited to try this full coverage CC+ cream. If you’re looking to get this, I gave it a good trial. For reference, I have dry/combo skin with some fine lines and wrinkles (I’m 43.)  The cream itself is fairly thick but still spreads/applies well. I used a brush to apply and 3 small pumps gave me full, but light, face coverage. I was able to build it up as the dry-down is really slow. I didn’t get any pills from the product underneath as I was applying more, either.   One thing I didn’t like was that it moves a bit too easily. If I apply a little too much pressure in an area, the foundation will move/come off as it didn’t seem to dry down at all. This foundation *definitely* needs to be set with a powder. It will also settle in lines if not set immediately over any wrinkles/creases.  The finish is a satin, so if you wanted to apply without setting and don’t have any lines to worry about, it will be dewy but not greasy-looking. I like that there are skincare ingredients and also the SPF 50!  The color/undertone match was pretty darn good. I am a fair neutral so I have a hard time with color and undertone matching. I chose Fair Porcelain and it was light enough for me without going too pink or beige. (I tried an IT Cosmetics powder foundation years ago and their lightest shade was still too dark, so bravo for expanding your shade range!)  To wrap up, I have to say that I liked the full coverage and the color/undershade was pretty great so I will for sure be using this one up (making sure to apply/set, apply/set).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! It is perfect for both when you don’t want to wear a lot of makeup and for when you want to go out full glam. Although it’s a cc cream, it’s full coverage. The shade match is impeccable as well! This is one of those products that I will without a doubt be repurchasing in the future. Worth every cent!

reviews.review_text: It Cosmetics makes some wonderful CC creams.  I was so excited to try the new CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ when I was gifted by the brand and BzzAgent. I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.  Upon my first use I was a bit disappointed.  I felt like I could see every pore, line and imperfection in my face. I also felt the coloring of the Fair Ivory shade was too yellow for my skintone..  After some trial and error I think I used a bit too much of the product that first go around.  Now if I use a minimal amount and leave off my primer I have found it to work a bit better.  I still have to blend, blend, blend to achieve the desired look. It gives a full coverage effect and provides sun protection as well.  My skin feels great as it contains hydrating serum too.  I like the pump style tube that the product comes in.  Now I am careful not to use too much product and to blend as I go. It is an ok foundation/CC cream, but I prefer other products from It cosmetics. I would buy another variety instead and would not necessarily recommend this one although I would recommend the brand overall.

reviews.review_text: I was sent it cosmetics cc cream to review. I am not being paid to share my honest opinion. My first impression of the foundation was it felt lightweight and a little goes a long way. As I applied the cc cream I noticed it didn't smell bad also. So my skin type on my face is oily/combination so my go-to is a matte look. My suggestion is if you are like me and enjoy a matte look get blotting paper or matte translucent powder to help accomplish that effect. Compared to some other over-the-counter creams I enjoy the durability of the product It really lasted all day during my physical activities. I would recommend you to buy it. If my review has helped you and you would like me to review more with or for you it's Badgaljodi on all socials 🫶

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is perfect for me.  It is full coverage, hydrating and stays on all day.  I like how it gives me a dewy finish and hydrates my skin.  Since it is full coverage I like to use a damp makeup sponge to apply the foundation so it doesn't look too heavy.  I have the shade Medium, but it is a bit too warm for my skin tone.  I typically use cool toned foundations.  However, this shade will be perfect in the summertime for me. Plus the SPF 50 is great.  I use other IT Cosmetics products and I am happy to add this foundation to my collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you buzz agent for sending me  the  IT cosmetics CC+ cream        This is IT cosmetics color correcting full coverage cream. This CC cream is supposed to be full coverage on the skin and is an anti-aging hydrating serum. Most excitingly, it is SPF 50+. The coverage did not disappoint! It applied to my skin well and did a good job at covering my dark marks. It wasn’t to oily or greasy and kind of dried down a bit after application. I have no issues with the foundation and the coverage itself. What I am concerned about is that this foundation states it is flammable. Why is this foundation flammable?? I have never heard of that before. I love IT cosmetics but What is in this foundation that makes it flammable until dry?

reviews.review_title: A must have for complexion & SPF protection

reviews.review_text: The shade medium was too dark for my complexion. However, I absolutely loved the creamy texture and coverage. It was also too yellow for my skin tone. I just dabbed it into my skin with a beauty sponge and was so impressed and felt like I had a clear complexion finally! Use moisturizer if your skin is crepey and blend with a beauty blender. I broke out terribly after using this, and I noticed the ingredients had several types of oil, dimethicone, etc. I usually break out from silicone, but maybe this has to many different types of oils. I will try again once my acne heals, but it's been a week and the acne is still clearing up. I hope it wasn't this CC cream because I really like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation

I even used a good setting spray and that helped some but it still transferred a bit. As long as you don't hug anyone or anything this foundation is awesome. There are many shades to choose from and seems like they keep adding more just to make sure everyone's perfect shade is available. I love this because I feel no one should have to buy more than one shade and mix and match just to get their shade. This is a very buildable formula for medium to full coverage. reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Beige - very fair complexion with cool rosy undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This has the moisturizing properties of a CC cream but the coverage of a foundation; it's definitely a hybrid between the two and it was really the OG product of its kind.  I used it years ago but at the time the shade range was very limited and there wasn't a shade that matched me well.  Fast forward to now and IT Cosmetics has expanded the shade range so that more people can finally try this!  There's now a color that actually works for me so it's been fun revisiting it.   It's a slightly thicker formula that applies equally well with a sponge or brush and it WILL absolutely provide coverage.  I see this working better for those with dry skin (like myself) than for people who have oily skin simply because it does also provide more hydration than a lot of formulas.   It can look a little heavy if overapplied so less is more with this.  It meshes well with my typical powders, cream products, etc and it provides a little bit of extra SPF (which some people will appreciate, others won't) in addition to the daily sunscreen that I use. Overall it's a solid formula which is why it's stuck around for years and years and while it's probably more suitable for some skintypes than others, it's definitely worth trying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this foundation! It's full coverage without the   cakiness. It covers my dark under eyes and lasts all day without creasing. I definitely recommend this foundation!

reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this IT Cosmetics CC+ Foundation! The coverage of this is full and it lives up to it. It is so easy to blend, it offers great coverage and it has anti aging skincare and SPF 50+ sunscreen, I love an all in one product. It covered all of my redness/ blemishes without clinging to any dry areas. It behaved wonderfully with my normal skincare, primer & makeup without pilling or separating. It didn't look cakey and the coverage lasted all day without needing to be touched up. It's perfect for quick everyday makeup but also works with special occasion/glam looks. I think it would work for most if not all skin types. 10 out of 10 recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed using the IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ not only does it have benefits to the skin and offers protection but also feels lightweight and leaves the skin feeling soft and hydrated. The only issue I had with this foundation is that the color Rich that I got was too dark for me, it left my skin looking orange. I have been using this as a base and then a lighter foundation on top to highlight and cover a bit of the orange color. I did try this alone and it just feels amazing, it's very hydrating and even though I have oily skin it didn't make my face any more oily. I am normally a neutral/beige shade and the shade Rich will work great for me during the summer. This CC+ Cream definitely does color correct but I would not say it's full coverage because it's thinner and lighter than other full coverage foundations that I have. It's doesn't completely cover acne scars but does block some of the color of scars making it look more natural skin. It's still a great foundation for everyday looks and those days where you want to use something not too heavy. I would say this has a satin finish that makes your skin look like skin even with this foundation. I recommend for anyone as it also offers SPF! I am actually purchasing a lighter shade just to use now during winter months and using the Rich shade for summer.

This cream makes my skin look natural because it’s lightweight and doesn’t clogged my pores. The SPF 50+ is helping on protecting my skin against sun damage without leaving a white and thick film like other SPF creams. I also love the pump which helps me on using the exact amount my skin needs,two small pumps goes a long way. reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

This is NOT a full coverage foundation, it's not even medium coverage, it's LIGHT coverage, so light that I basically see no difference in my skin with the foundation on, all the skin flaws are still showing clearly through it. However, it doesn't have that stiff feeling that high SPF products usually have, it doesn't leave my face feeling dry and pinched, so it gets points for that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked the IT Cosmetics Full Coverage CC Cream Foundation with SPF 50.  The formula was thick and not runny and applied evenly to my skin.  The foundation provided fulll coverage and looked natural on my skin.   It was long lasting and felt comfortable on my skin.  I also liked the fact that it had SPF in it to provide protection against UV rays.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation provides excellent coverage with the 1st application. I did not have to layer or go back for more to get the coverage I needed. I often have to do that with other so called full coverage foundations.  The formula is smooth, hydrating & has a slight greasy feeling when first putting it on. BUT what is amazing is once you have it all blended there is absolutely no greasy feeling at all. My feels smooth, my pores had disappeared & I had a nice finish. The finish is definitely not matte but it is not dewy either. It is what I guess I would call slightly dewy.  I did have to do quite a bit of blending with a brush & cosmetic sponge to get the foundation even all over my face. The color I chose (light) was a tad bit orangey for my liking so I really had to blend around my hairline, etc. to get it evened out & natural looking. Once I did that it looked great. I may choose a slightly different color or tone next time.  The foundation stayed put all day. I was amazed how great it still looked when I went to wash my face at bedtime. This is almost never the case with even high end foundations I use.  The 2 only negatives to the product are…  The 1st is a very slight odor when you first put on the product. I am assuming this is the SPF. It goes away rather quickly once you start blending & in no way did I notice it as I wore the product throughout the day.   The 2nd is I have acne prone skin & I am very sensitive to foundations, serums, etc. When I used this foundation I broke out around my mouth & nose. This is what happens when my skin says I don’t like what you are putting on me. I decided to ride it out & my skin cleared up in a couple days & I am no longer breaking out. So, I think my skin just reacted to the change in product.   Overall, this is an excellent foundation that provides great coverage. I highly recommend trying it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed how it looked on my skin and covered my hyperpigmentation. It didn't last as long as I'd like on my oily skin though. But I guess l'd need a more matte primer

I am super fair and have a hard time finding anything to match my skin tone without making me look orange or too washed out. The CC cream went on  thick but blended very well to hidr discolorations and small blemishes. It left a very dewy, non cakey look to my skin. I also have age spots on my hand and it was amazing how this CC cream made them disappear. I am in love with this stuff as with all It cosmetics. After opening the package, I was impressed with the simplicity of the silver and black CC+ packaging. I was even more excited to see that I was sent the color deep which seemed to match my skin tone pretty well. However, I quickly learned the top just pops off instead of having to be unscrewed, but, on the bright side, it only took two full pumps for the product to start flowing. Upon application, the product applied smoothly with just my fingerprints, while providing a medium to full coverage, with just one pump. However, the shade was a bit too dark for me in the winter time and would be a better fit for my skin tone during the summer months. Overall, I really like the product and would recommend this product to others.

It blends into the skin beautifully, and my skin doesn’t get oily nearly as fast as normal. I also haven’t noticed any new breakouts since starting to use this. My only warning is that I would shade match in a store as the online photos are a bit misleading. Other than that I have no complaints about this foundation and have already recommended it to others.

The coverage is definitely plenty for me, but I could have probably used more product if I'd wanted a more perfect look. The feel of the product was a little too moist and heavy for my combination leaning oily skin, I usually prefer a product that dries down more and is more budge proof. It also had a bit of a look at me, I'm a layer of makeup look, but it might just be that the color is a tiny bit too light for me. Overall I do like this product and will continue to use it, but it's not quite my HG. In the pics, one is of my bare skin and the other is with just the foundation and no other products.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Porcelain - very fair complexion with neutral peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hey Beauties!   #ItCosmeticsGiftedMe their fabulous new CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+!   Discover IT® CC+ Cream with SPF 50+ is the #1 SPF Foundation in America and your multitasking color correcting cream! Now with an extended shade range! IT’s your full-coverage foundation, hydrating, anti-aging serum and broad-spectrum SPF 50+ sunscreen all in one!   Infused with skin-loving ingredients like Hyaluronic Acid, Niacinamide and Vitamin E.   CC cream provides hydration while instantly camouflaging the look of skin imperfections like acne scarring, wrinkles, redness on skin, dark circles under eyes, large pores and uneven skin tone for flawless-looking natural coverage!   To be able to extend their shade range, they worked with plastic surgeons and dermatologists to introduce clear SPF 50+ in their new deepest shades. Now, a wider range of skin tones can achieve complexion perfection plus sun protection—without the white cast!   Key Ingredients: Hyaluronic Acid~ Helps hydrate, visibly plump and minimize the look of fine lines & wrinkles.   Niacinamide~ Helps minimize the look of discoloration & promotes even-toned, radiant skin.   Vitamin E~ Helps soothe and nourish skin.   SPF 50+~ Provides broad-spectrum sun protection.   I'm absolutely loving the fantastic coverage of this new CC+ Cream Full Coverage Foundation. My skin looks flawless. It doesn't show any of my redness, yay! It's not heavy even though it's full coverage. It actually doesn't feel like you have anything on. It applies perfectly whether you use a brush or sponge. I'm very pleased with this product.   Products Shown: @ItCosmetics~ CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ in Shade Fair Ivory
