reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am delighted with this CC cream, the first time I used it my face was clean and I had nothing on and I was surprised at how good my skin looked, my skin looked smooth and hydrated, it was easy to blend and the color it was perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! This product has been around for so long and I understand why it’s still a class favorite! It has sun protection, medium/full coverage, and looks like a second skin on the face! I think the only thing I don’t love is the slight scent this has but it goes away once on the face!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: IT cc+ cream full coverage foundation with SPF 50 is seriously magic in a bottle . I love how smoothly it goes on my face leaving me with a flawless complexion. I have a very fair complexion and I burn easily so the SPF 50 is an awesome bonus . What really made me fall in love with the foundation is that even after hours of wearing it my face still looks smooth not cakey and it did not settle into my fine lines and wrinkles . It just glides over them leaving me looking younger .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this CC cream it's really good and it also full coverage for me i like that it has spf 50 which it protects me from the sun. I love that it came out with more color now more people get to enjoy this lovely CC cream. I highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from a free sample program. I was very impressed with the cc cream not only is it skin care in a foundation, but it has amazing coverage, and sun protection! It lasts all day and well into the night, without taking or creasing, or settling into fine lines or pores. Also, the shade range is amazing. I found the perfect shade that matched my exact skin tone. A little goes a long way, and it gives you a flawless application. I have normal to dry skin, and it did not get flaky nor patchy. I definitely recommend this 100%!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wow this really covers every blemish that I have on my skin. It goes on very smoothly with a brush and is definitely full coverage. I feel like a little bit of this goes a long ways because if you put too much on, it can look cakey. I do plan to buy this in another shade that would match my skin tone for the summer so then I have one with a tan and one with out. I highly recommend this, you won’t regret it.

reviews.review_title: Cuts down my mooring routine! Love an all in one!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love everything about this CC cream. It's creamy, has SPF and gives great coverage without streaking or caking. Has an anti aging serum it literally can half the amount of products I need to put on in the morning. All they need now it to come up with an eye cream and concealer in one. Love the way my skin feels after multiple uses and while I try to wash my makeup off nightly I somehow don't feel quite as bad when I forget to take off this CC cream. Stays on all day and works great with my powder blush and highlighters.

reviews.review_title: Color Did Not Work for Me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very excited to try the IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation. I didn't have any issues with the claims to smooth skin, reduce visible pores and enhance appearance. The product performed well on those levels. However, the color was just awful for me! I'm not sure if I just selected the wrong color for myself or if the hue of the product was wrong. I couldn't see the name of the color on the package (the writing was far too small) but I think it was Deep Mocha. My complexion is medium brown. When I saw a photo of the colors, the product appeared to be the right one for my skin tone but I was mistaken.  The color, which I thought was a nice, rich brownish tone, was much more reddish—almost burgundy and it looked that way on my skin! There was no way I could leave the house without blending it with other colors to make myself look less clownish.  Overall, I’m not sure if I’d try this product again. The shade was so glaringly off that I’m not sure if I’d trust trying any others. There are many other foundations that work better for me at a much lower price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product at the first moment I put it on my face. It is light on your face looks smooth and definitely offers full coverage.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan Rich - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This Product Works A Little Too Well. Completely Covered My Tattoo. Light Fragrance And Very Great Coverage. The Spf Is Definitely A Plus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this product complimentary from Bzzagent. Sadly i got the darkest color and i can not use it but i do know a friend that will enjoy it ! For sample purposes i did apply it on my hand and can tell you that the product provides a full coverage, not very thick and smells fantastic! It was very easy to remove with a makeup cloth, does not leave stains. I love it, and would gladly use if it was my color!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the look and feel of this product! It provides full coverage and feels supple on my skin. I also love the fact it offers SPF protection. I highly recommend this product and I have decided to add this to my daily routine. Try, you will not be disappointed!

reviews.review_title: My new go to cc cream

reviews.review_text: I cannot recommend this product enough. The coverage is flawless and smooth. No cake feeling and left my skin feeling hydrated and soft. The coverage is perfection and the added spf is a huge bonus for any skin type. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_text: After using this product for the past couple of weeks I’m loving how my skin feels and looks. My skin feels more supple and hydrated. The foundation goes on so smooth and I’ve gotten great coverage. A little product goes a long way. . I love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried a million and a half foundations by now but this one ranks in my top 3. It does have full coverage, high SPF, great blendability and smells nice! As with all of IT Cosmetics face products, it tends to run dark so order a shade .5 lighter than your regular tone. The texture is perfectly creamy and blends so well. Love this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is officially my favorite! Perfect light coverage, but buildable. My new go to!  Doesn’t leave me feeling greasy or cakey.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation. It is perfect for all ages but especially middle aged/mature skin. A high spf, and hydrating qualities without being too greasy. Leaves me with a satin finish after brush and dewy with a sponge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. The fact that I get a full coverage products along with the SPF my skin needs. It has a smooth application and looks beautiful. I will be getting this product in a darker shade for summer time.

reviews.review_title: I love doing makeup using this new product for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love it, it has good coverage, I highly recommend it, super soft, light, durable, I love this foundation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favorite! It makes my skin look so smooth. It stays on forever, even without setting spray or primer. It is definitely full coverage but extremely light weight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I appreciate the packaging of this foundation. I love a good pump bottle/tube. The shade was a bit yellow for me. The coverage was definitely medium and buildable. I prefer a more sheer/natural finish. I was able to get the coverage a bit more sheer by using less product and a damp beauty sponge. It also worked well with a liquid highlighter blended in with it to give a more dewy finish. Definitely a high quality product and the SPF50+ is a bonus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cc+ cream full coverage foundation with SPF 50+ is my new favorite. I love the fact that it contains hydraulic acid and sunscreen and best of all that it’s a full coverage. My face looks flawless when using this, my pores are much less visible and my skin looks smooth. It corrects all my imperfections like no other product has, and I haves tried many. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_title: Perfect addition to my beauty arsenal
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this product!  As a woman of color, it is difficult to find a foundation that works and looks great on our skin. Now I have finally found one that matches my skin tone.  Having SPF 50 and great anti-aging moisturizers as extra benefits is exciting.  You only need a dab and you get full coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: receved IT Cosmetics cream full coverage foundation with SPF 50 +-Deep  free from BZZAGENT.This product has amazing coverage. It looks natural and doesn’t give you that caked powdery look. It is better than other brands I highly recommend it

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Honey - deep complexion with warm golden undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Deep Honey shade is darker than my skin tone, but it still blended in well using a wet sponge without darkening my complexion. Blending is definitely the key! It looks like it has a bit of an orange undertone out of the tube. I like how this foundation felt on my skin, very light. It did not cover my under eye darkness.  It does transfer onto clothing. A setting spray or powder should help that. Wearing a primer under it might also help. It was not drying, and felt good on my skin all day. It's buildable for more coverage. It has a light smell but nothing flowery or over powering. A little goes a long way. One drop spread over my whole face. I think the price is too high for this size tube. It's nice to have the SPF 50+ in it. Overall I would purchase this again. Nice to see more inclusive shades for women of color of all skin tones.

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! The shade matches my skin tone perfectly and I love the healthy glow that my skin has when using correcting cream. Most products that have SPF added cause me to break out but not this one. Highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

While it does go on your face beautifully since it's light weight I did have to put a bit more on my cheekbone area to cover some blemishes. At the end of the day I was a bit oily but thats because I have an oily T-zone. That's even with me doing my normal prep skin prior to applying this foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the coverage this product provides!  Only a small amount of product is needed to enhance my complexion and I don't need to add sun protection because it's SPF 50!  IT CC with sunscreen and color is a Multi Purpose guru product.   My makeup bag is lighter and my finished look is less time consuming!

reviews.review_title: Checks the boxes from minimalist to full coverage!

reviews.review_title: Full coverage with a silky finish throughout the d

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a scar by my lip from a recent surgery that is a deep purple color ,this color corrector works wonders in hiding it and also at the same time protecting it from the sun. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product it’s lightweight and full coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very surprised by coverage of the CC cream it felt light weight but the coverage was amazing wasn’t shiny on my skin . It wore most of the day perfectly but I also prep and prime accordingly to my oily skin so I use a few products before makeup and powder . I have another IT cosmetics product it’s a cc concealer which I love so I’m not shocked I love this product would definitely recommend ! I love it has all those added benefits and a decent sized bottle . It did smooth my skin and covered up a lot of redness on my face giving me a flawless look. I legit did not have a white cast on my face that other bb and cc creams kinda give you along with that nasty greasy look… I did not use flash. Also after a couple of hours I was oily on my normal spots like nose and where my glasses sit on my cheeks and putting powder on top did not make me look cakey. I did enjoy this foundation and will continue to use .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

It will match my skin perfectly though in the summer months. It covered up my under eye and even did quite nicely on my dark spot on my cheek. It didn't dry my skin out or look cakey. I am really happy with this product and will look into purchasing a lighter shade. I love that it has sunscreen in it. It applied easily. I have no complaints.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage could have been a little more than what it was expecting and it made my skin look really splotchy and dried out especially around my nose but that could have been that my primer and the foundation just didn’t mix well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received IT Cosmetics CC+ Full Coverage Foundation sample for free from BzzAgent sampling program.  First, I want to say this foundation came at the right time for me.  I love how this foundation made my face feel and look after wearing it throughout the day.  My skin didn't look greasy nor did I have the experience that I had too much foundation on.  It made me look natural which I really liked.  I have used other foundations that had my face looking greasy and looking not natural. This foundation help keep my skin hydrated throughout the day, and the anti-aging hydrating serum it has in it really did the job.  I also liked that it contains a high content of SPF, which is always a bonus to have when wearing foundation. I have used this product for about a week and I will continue to purchase it after the contents have been used up.  I cannot forget to mention all the compliments I received this week while wearing my foundation.  If you are looking for a full-coverage foundation that isn't heavy, makes you look natural when wearing it; along with having an anti-aging serum in it. I would suggest you give IT CC+ foundation a try.  You will not be disappointed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed trying the It Cosmetics CC Cream. It was very full coverage but also left my skin glowy and beautiful. It lasted all day long too. I apply it with my fingers at first but then use a blender to pat it all in for a flawless look. I like the ingredient list having a lot of hydrating skincare benefits. This is a winner for me!!

reviews.review_title: I loved it, I had not tried a good cc cream
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I thought that since I have oily skin, the cc cream would not suit me very well, well so far I have used it inside my house since today I did not leave the house; the tone turned out well and is manageable when applied either with a sponge or I loved the brush, I recommend it, I only used one layer and I liked it, I will continue to try it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! Full coverage but isn't heavy nor sticky. It leaves a matte finish that's great for my oily skin. Saves me from retouch for hours. It stays in place even with my mask on, doesn't crease on my smile lines and most of all, it doesn't break me out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is simply the best full coverage foundation I've tried. It fully covers my redness and lasts all day without feeling caked on or shifting at all throughout the day. The pump packaging is so convenient. I apply it with a damp blending sponge, and the coverage is so great I don't even need to follow up with concealer! I have combination skin, but somehow I never get oily with this foundation. I usually reach for drugstore makeup, but this product is worth every penny! I wear the shade light, and it blends so easily and beautifully. I recently wore it on our trip to Walt Disney World, and my makeup stayed flawless for over 12 hours a day! It also didn't break me out! Double bonus!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a great foundation/CC cream. It's lightweight and blends so well! It's long lasting and doesn't look awful after a long day at work. My skin feels soft and not dry or greasy after a day of wearing.  My skin can be sensitive and get break outs when I try new products or switch products, not with this one! I highly recommend getting this now!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately, I got the wrong color BUT the formula is everything!! Super quick to dry and one pump is all you need for full face coverage!! The formula blended very smoothly into my skin leaving a matte finish and perfecting any imperfections. I was really shocked by how quickly it seeped into my skin. Will def be getting my correct color!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This does have great coverage but use very little. I noticed too much made my skin look cakey. I put on moisturizer beforehand and use my sigma f80 brush to buff it out. I noticed with it cosmetics it takes a bit for it to settle nicely on my skin but in the end it looks beautiful. It covers my redness and broken capillaries around my nose. I suggest using a dense foundation brush or a damp sponge. I use a translucent finishing powder (lightly) to set it. It lasted around 6 hours on me but faded slowly after that. I'm curious how it will hold up in the summer. In the winter for me it works.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try the It foundation, I had seen all the commercials and reviews but for me it was a let down.I really liked the container and how it dispenses,you control thr amount you need easily,the color was a perfect match for my skin and it did give me great coverage but after applying I noticed my skin looked really dry and my pores was way noticeable,so while I liked the coverage I won't be using again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love cc+ cream full-coverage foundation, it blends easily and gives you full coverage with color correcting. It's very lightweight and has SPF 50 so it's plus. I love dispenser its makes easy and don't waste any of the product. I will be definitely buying this product and will recommend to friends and family.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is AMAZING! It's truly full coverage and goes on flawlessly, doesn't feel gunky or heavy and also protects your skin! Definitely worth giving a try if your on the market for a new foundation.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rich - golden brown shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: CC+ Cream Full Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ goes on smoothly and hydrates my skin. A little goes a long way.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The tagline on the box is 100% spot on. 👍👍👍👍👍  As I’m learning to age gracefully, I find that  I want my makeup to look less like makeup and more like my natural skin. The IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream corrects the uneven tones of my skin and gives me full coverage without looking cakey or accentuating my fine lines or pores. I can apply it thinly for a gorgeous daytime look or build up the coverage for a night out. I liked it so much I skipped contouring altogether.   It’s most definitely my skin, but better!  Big thanks to BzzAgent and IT Cosmetics for giving me to chance to try out and review this awesome foundation!   #bzzagent #itcosmetics #itcosmeticscccream #gotitfree #productreview

reviews.review_title: A Great Addition to My Makeup Bag
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for the last week, this formula provides excellent full coverage and you could still see my freckles. It goes on smooth and doesn't feel heavy on my skin. It doesn't look caked-on my face and visibly smooths out any lines and dark areas. I find this foundation to be a good cover when I'm out of my other products. I would definitely recommend to friends.

reviews.review_title: A must have product in your beauty toolkit!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for the past few days, I can say it really is full coverage and a little goes a long way. The dispenser gives enough product to cover my entire face with one pump and ensures you don’t dispense too much product at once. I love the smooth consistency of the formulation and the dewy coverage it offers upon application. I noticed no odor to the product which I like very much. It truly is a full coverage product and I couldn’t be happier with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been looking for a new every day CC cream/foundation. Because of the moisturizing and sun protection qualities most leave my dry skin feeling too oily and slick with no coverage. This is PERFECT! I had great coverage and my skin didn't feel oily after application

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so happy that I found the IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+. It's a great full coverage foundation that applies very easily, it is not heavy and does not make your face look caked, it covers blemishes and other marks very well, and I really like that it comes in a tube with a pump.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - natural beige shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am never a fan of cc cream. But I thought to give it a try for my daily routine. I can't say I like it very much but it has its pros and cons.  Pros: it blends easily. Doesn't make your face look cakey. It stays  for long. Cons: it's not a full coverage.  It makes your skin dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like how well this product protects my skin from the sun. It's a little thicker than my preferred foundation and doesn't match my skin as well as I'd like. However, it really seems to keep harmful rays from penetrating my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite! This goes on wonderfully and is my perfect color! This is the best cream! It’s way better than Clinique! I definitely will keep this in my daily makeup routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really fell in love with the wear and outcome application of this foundation. NYE was my first time trying this particular foundation and I am blown away I’d give it 5 STARS

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this product for a few weeks now and I really love it. I love how creamy it is and the  amazing natural glowy finish it gives my skin. I also love that it has buildable coverage that doesn’t make your skin look cakey. I really prioritize my skincare so I absolutely love that added spf protection. The shade range is also very inclusive. I was never a fan of cc creams before because their shade range is usually only for people with lighter skin but this cc cream has so many options for all skin types. I will continue to use this product and will definitely recommend to others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Im so sorry but this is the worst Foundation I have tried in my life right next to the Fenty Beauty Pro Filtr Foundation,  It sits on every pore and every fine line , does not matter how much skin prep I do it looks like a heavy unblendable mask , just horrible and patchy. No no and No

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Bronze - very deep complexion with cool rosy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Although I'm sure this makeup is wonderful and I would love to be able to use it for a long time to test it more thoroughly,  I was given the wrong color. I am in no way as dark as deep bronze, therefore I feel I'm unable to give a full review. Thanks for the opportunity and I hope I am able to test more in the near future. I was gifted this foundation in exchange for my honest review from bzzagent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage from this is hands down unbeatable. One pump is all it takes to cover my whole face. It’s dreamy and creamy! It lasts throughout the night, it doesn’t create at my nose or under my eyes. I highly recommend this for anyone else who wants that full coverage look

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like that there is a product that can be used as sunscreen as well as a foundation. I would probably buy this product in future but a different shade. The shade sent to me was way darker than my complexion. I really liked the pump for a tube. Generally you see those for bottles only. I gave it 4 stars because it is really transferrable. If you hug someone, be careful because it will be on their clothes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My skin looks and feels amazing with this full coverage CC cream. My skin feels hydrated and is protected from harmful UVA and UVB rays.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is truly a blessing if you need full coverage color correcting. It gives the total coverage you need for that boost in self confidence. While it is handling its CC duties it also has am anti aging hydrating serum that lessens the look of age. Just when you thought that was good enough, boom! SPF 50+ UVA/UVB for sun protection. I saw results pretty quickly, after just a couple uses. It's my skin, but better!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am a light to medium skin tone, with no acne and normal skin; so I went with the color medium, the color is spot on for me. I did feel like it was a bit thick and it set into my forehead lines, but I buffed out as much with a beauty blender, it is easy to blend out. I think the best part is that it does last all day and it is worth a purchase and try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in deep honey and the shade match and coverage is so good! It’s very moisturizing and have some great hydrating skincare ingredients so no need for heavy creams prior, a lightweight moisturizer is perfect and of course it had spf50 so no need for sunscreen which I absolutely love! This looks like my skin but better, it literally covers my dark spots and leaves me with glowing skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is Deep Bronze that is a  SPF 50 sunscreen combined as an anti-aging , and full coverage formula.   It went on smooth, creamy,  blended into my skin perfectly , and no harsh smell at all.  I definitely recommend this for those wanting a full coverage color correcting cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ is a multitasking color correcting cream that gives me full-coverage foundation, hydrating & anti-aging serum, & an SPF 50+ sunscreen, all in one! It provides my skin the hydration it needs while camouflaging my skin imperfections like my acne scarring, fine lines and wrinkles, the redness on skin, dark circles under my eyes, large pores and uneven skin tone!  This is the best coverage I’ve ever used with my skin looking flawless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This product is better than most products I have tried very good coverage. Some benefits you will have owning this project is that it's full coverage and it's very lightweight and it has sunscreen in it so that's a plus. I would definitely be buying these product. I will be recommending this to friends and family so they can try out this product.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for my 43 years skin with melasma
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok, from someone who has melasma, I have to say that I struggle A LOT trying to find good coverage with a more natural, skin-like finish. The coverage of this product is quite amazing and on my 43 year old skin it sets itself, no powder needed to make it last all day. Easy to apply (I use a flat kabuki), is light weight, a little goes a long way, especially if you don't have much to cover, it has SPF 50 so it will help prevent melasma from getting worse. The only downside I can think of, is that the mid tone is a bit dark for me, but other than that, it's perfect!

reviews.review_title: I like a matte finish “IT” won’t let me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: While this product has legit 2 pump for your whole face coverage I like a matte finish “IT” won’t let me my photo below is one hour after application complete with setting powder and spray. Other foundations I have no shine all day same coverage maybe this is due to the the extra SPF. But If you like a dewy look and highlight this is the one for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ in Deep Bronze is awesome I LOVE IT!!! it matches my skin flawlessly and gives complete coverage my skin looks amazing!!! It’s a miracle in a tube! I will forever use this cream since it has anti-aging hydrating serum AND spf 50+ clear sunscreen added.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I typically don’t wear makeup especially foundation as I don’t like the heavy feel of makeup but this CC+ cream has converted me to a makeup lover. I am in my late forties with dry skin and minor age spots. Firstly of all the shade was perfect which is a first for me and it blended well in my skin leaving a dewy glow finish. I felt 10 years had been knocked off my age and it did not feel heavy or like I was wearing makeup. I also loved how my skin felt and looked like I had the JLO glow. I received this product as part of a campaign in exchange for my honest review but will be repurchasing it again as it is very rare to find the perfect foundation especially one that exactly matches my skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: In comparing this product to other similar products I’ve tried in the past, I would say it feels lighter on my skin. This product leaves my skin moisturized and fully covered. I will buy this product in the future and recommend it to my family and friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After applying my foundation i was so shocked how full coverage it really is it did not leave my face cakey nor cracking literally love

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly I’m not crazy about this at all it’s so cakey since it’s full coverage just looks extremely heavy on the skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Since the first time I use this product I noticed the difference on my skin, it has a good sunscreen protection of 50 and has skin care ingredients to uneven skin tone redness and dark spots, it also contains hyaluronic acid, to keep skin hydration, my skin is glowing, it’s very light weight it’s more like a moisturizer this multitasking CC ceeam it’s amazing and everyone who wants a coverage bit also wants to improve the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles this is the perfect product for them

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this 3 in one foundation , anti aging serum and sun protection.  My skin color looks even and more smoother after using it. My skin looks glowing and don’t look cake or feel heavy . Just smoother and a little shiny. Absorbs fast and don’t let any residue just a nice tan color . Very recommended for everyday use .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wish that the shade would have been a good match for my skin because the product itself felt incredible! Nice, creamy, even coverage yet still looked dewy and so moisturizing. There was a scent to it but not bad. I love the SPF all in one application.  I need to have my shade match corrected so I can wear this out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved how well the IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ - Tan Rich blended into my skin. I do feel like it has nice buildable coverage and does well with my combination skin. I really love the fact that it includes SPF! Will definitely be making this a summer staple.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Rich - tan to deep complexion with neutral peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I especially love that this technically isn’t make up. It’s tinted moisturizer but meets all of my makeup needs! And super impressed they have my skin tone. I use Rich and won’t change it for anything else

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE the idea of CC creams but never had much success in finding one that truly worked for me. This CC cream is incredibly light (you WILL forget you have foundation on) and easy to apply. I chose a tone that was a little too dark for me, which is why I did not give it 5 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is like having a second skin. My face looks absolutely amazing. The product looks flawless yet so natural.

reviews.review_title: Better than I expected for a CC cream!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really impressed with this CC cream.  I have used the IT Cosmetics Bye Bye Foundation in the past which provides full coverage. With this being a CC cream I wasn’t expecting much coverage but I was wrong. This not only proufull coverage and makes my skin look great (healthy & dewy) but it actually smells quite pleasant compared to other foundations. Highly impressive and will replace my prior foundation with this one now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received my IT foundation from bzzagent, the color I received is a little bit darker than my skin color so I used it to contour my face. I was fascinated with this foundation, it lasted all day and I loved how my face looked. I already bought one of my skin color and I will continue using the darker one to contour my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Full-Coverage Foundation with SPF 50+ in medium shade, great for those who prefer a more natural look.   I have a medium to med-light, (not fair), skin tone with a warm complexion and combination skin which is showing the signs of aging.   I prefer using a full coverage foundation with long wear time and a shade that is complimentary to my natural skin tone ans complexion.   This shade, of MEDIUM, compliments my natural skin tone and blends seamlessly, leaving me with a gorgeous natural finish! It is warm undertones and a so soft shade!  With over 20 shades to choose from and new ones being added often there certainly something to make you say oh lala!   This Full-Coverage CC+ Cream with SPF 50+, is actually moisturizing. It  hydrates my skin without being oily and is not a heavy on the skin beauty product.   It gives my skin, the coverage I want, without having the dreadful cakey  look or skin smothering feel. All of my other cosmetics apply smoother, without leaving unwanted creasing or settling in the pores. I have to mention the SPF 50+ protection that this CC cream alone offers my skin! Highly recommended & extremely impressive!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is for anyone who loves a flawless effortless look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Full coverage and deep rich tone! The foundation goes on very smooth and stays out. After applying there is a nice and smooth feel to the skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Porcelain - very fair complexion with neutral peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation feels good on the skin and it is not cakey, oily or sticky.  Once you put it on your face it dissolves quickly while giving your skin a nice feel.  It is not greasy or pore clogging like other foundations I've used in the past which caused me to break out with lots of pimples and even create excess oil. I have oily sensitive skin so this was good for me.  It is also breathable on the skin and face which is very important while it protects your face and skin from uv rays and it also makes your skin look flawless and like a perfect canvas.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty full coverage and light weight on the skin it’s a good product good for daily wear

reviews.review_title: love an all in one product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation! It's perfect as an all in one product I love that I can get skincare and SPF in my foundation. I had tried it previously but the shade was too yellow, the expanded shade range is perfect if you are fair with cool undertones fair beige is a great match. This wears beautifully and makes my skin look so healthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cc cream. I like the fact that unlike other creams or tinted moisturizers it’s full coverage. I also love the fact that it has spf in it. It gives my skin a glow and looks hydrated. The color matched me perfectly!

reviews.review_title: Colors don’t match the name or skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this product, but the shade “rich” is everything but! As far as coverage and consistency goes the product is a dream! Covers all of my dark spots, but it does not match my skin tone and leaves a white ashy caste that makes me look like a living dead person. I would recommend that the company goes back through this product line and rename the shades. Otherwise customers might have a hard time finding their match.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Mocha - very deep complexion with cool red undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really would like to try my shade so I can leave a better review, as I received this product as a complimentary sample from bzzagent. It really feels like a good foundation.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Honey - deep complexion with warm golden undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My new favorite foundation because it contains vitamins and spf 50+ that prevents wrinkles. The cream applies smoothly to my skin and covers my large pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I sincerely recommend it because it has excellent coverage and also provides hydration and softness on your skin and above all helps you take care of the sun's rays

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product has a great coverage and lasted all day long but after only one use clogged my pores and made my face breakout.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m usually picky when it comes to foundation but the @itcosmetics SPF 50+ foundation is exceptional and it doubles as an anti-aging hydrating serum. I love that it doesn’t leave my skin oily and gives a clean natural finish unlike other products.  It’s long lasting and not cakey. It’s blends in well  and the fact that it’s got good coverage and  just a little goes a long way sold me out. It’s not heavy and the pump makes it a lot easier to use/apply.  Overall it’s a great product ,I will definitely buy again and I highly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing coverage. It gives you an all day wear without the feeling of having anything on.  The color given to me wasn’t my match but with some bronzer I made it work. Great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Application was easy to apply and blendable. I wish I had gotten a lighter skin tone one that’s the only down fall. It was too dark on me but I loved it! Scent is good and looks great I used for contouring because since it was too dark on me but I am not disappointed. Was definitely full coverage it is amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The texture is thick and creamy, doesn’t run and stays in place. It’s quite glossy looking and smooth so say goodbye to uneven skin tone. This is a full coverage foundation with SPF, while being full coverage the formula is still lightweight and hydrating illuminating the skin while giving you that even texture that makes us all feel so good. I would highly reccomend.

reviews.review_title: Great coverage for my daily routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this product for a week and I love this product because it light weight and have excellent coverage and it doesn’t break my skin out or nothing..I also recommend this product to all of my family and friends to try out this product

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Mocha - very deep complexion with cool red undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product. Lightweight and full coverage as I was looking for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest review. This is a very full coverage cream with shiny finish. I wanted to love it because of SPF coverage, but it's extremely opaque and shows every pore, hair and wrinkle on my face that I didn't know I had. The color is very orange yellow as well. I got Light and it was not a good fit at all. See the swatches on the back of my hand, a small pump was spread over my whole hand with opaque coverage. If it's a good color for you then it could be a holy grail for some, but not for me. My skin has large pores and some light smile lines and this serum only made them look worse.

reviews.review_title: This Foundation Is Exactly What I Was Looking For!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this foundation and love how it makes my face look flawless, radiant and healthy.  I love that this cream has SPF 50+ so that my face is protected against harmful UV rays as well as an anti-aging serum to hydrate, decrease the appearance of fine lines and illuminate.  Because my face is starting to show signs of aging (uneven complexion, dull skin and age spots), I prefer a full coverage cream but it can be hard to find one that doesn’t appear cakey and that isn’t too thick.  This foundation has the perfect balance of full coverage to camouflage my skin concerns while also being lightweight, natural looking, smooth and creamy.  This foundation lasts all day long and looks just as good at the end of the day as it does when first applied.  It is my new favorite CC+ cream!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am an Asian so I can’t use this color on my face! I gave it to my friend! She loves it so much! She said it is perfect and her face looks beautiful! It’s better than others that she used! I will recommend it to my friends! Thank you for gift sample!

reviews.review_title: Will definitely try again in the correct color
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this item to try, unfortunately it was too dark for me so I could not use it however i did try it anyway and it definitely provided great coverage and provides long lasting wear.. I know because it took me a couple of makeup removing wipes to remove fully lol!

It is full coverage without the heavy and sticky feeling, SPF 50 which is really great and packed with all the skin loving ingredients we all need. My face feels hydrated, fresh and blooming!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I thought this product was great! As soon as I applied it to half of my face, it went on smoothly and I couldn’t tell which side had foundation on! It was crazy! I also liked the spout with the tube. Unique.  (disclaimer: I received this product for free in exchange for an unbiased review)

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Porcelain - very fair complexion with neutral peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I have been using this foundation on and off for years now . Living in Las Vegas the extra added SPF 50 protection is a must especially during the summer. It gives excellent coverage,natural finish but doesn’t exaggerate fine lines,wrinkles. I have combo skin so i always set it with a little bit of powder. For me using this foundation the key is to apply it with a damp sponge for a flawless finish. This foundation will always be in my top favorites .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It is a full coverage foundation along with being very blend-able  and creamy when applying. I also enjoy when foundation have spf because it is another barrier of protection against sun damage and aging.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - natural beige shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I gave this product to my mom and she love it sooo much!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a ton of acne scars from countless of breakouts I used to get during my pubescent stage of my life. However, I realized that most of the time, it actually accentuates the texture of my skin instead of covering it up. I really appreciate that this color correcting cream by It cosmetics definitely is full coverage as it claims but without emphasizing marks or bumps on my face! I also find it really easy to spread across my skin and I only use one pump to cover my entire face. If there’s one thing I don’t like about this product, it does have fragrance and it smells minty. Other than that I already love this product as it is lightweight and not cakey! I can see myself using this for my everyday product!

reviews.review_title: Amazing full coverage and smooth skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was very surprised at how great this product is. When I put it on, it instantly smoothed out my pores and evened out my skin tone. It has amazing full coverage without being too much or looking caked on as you dont need alot of this product.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin

I took before after pictures of my face and the after were taken at the end of the day plus I had worked out as well. I think this foundation will work amazing once my skin isn’t peeling and buy the correct shade. Thank you for this sample.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin

Running errands shooting content etc

Compared to my Fenty foundation i was using at the moment I say it’s better for me. I will be buying and recommending this product cause it’s love at first try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Shade range has been expanded but still somewhat limited due to lack of undertones. This is a thick and heavy feeling CC cream. It's a full coverage foundation. I don't think it looks natural and up close it's candy. Not a fan. Not sure why it's so popular. Perhaps, higher quality and higher cost products aren't being compared by rude or due customers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

I recommend this to anyone wearing foundations.

The color blended seamlessly into my skin  and didn't sit in my pores. If you're looking for a full coverage, creamy foundation, I recommend It cosmetics.

It’s hardly noticeable unless you look closely, so I wouldn’t mind using this product again.

reviews.review_title: New found holy grail; a perfect shade match!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Years ago, I remember when this brand debuted and all the gurus were talking about this foundation; I tried a sample of it and I wasn't that impressed... fast forward to 2023 and I don't know if they improved their formula or what but the coverage is miles better and the finish is just beautiful.  For the price; you get incredible skincare benefits; sun protection (a definite must for me) and an array of shades to cover most skin tones... it was always hard for me to find the perfect match and this foundation has it (I wear Fair Beige) and I'm really light with pink/rosy undertones; this is the closest I've gotten to a perfect match; even with my beloved Tarte foundations; this is miles ahead when it comes to undertone for me.  Coverage wise; I would say its a high medium but can be built to full coverage as the bottle would suggest. The wear time for me (given my oily skin) can last me the 8 hour workday if I set with powder; otherwise it will last me for about 6; sometimes 5 depending on the humidity in my area and what I'm doing. I would recommend setting with powder unless you have very dry skin. This is a very moisturizing formula luckily so your skin will definitely feel nourished.   It doesn't oxidize like so many foundations can do; and if you want a great alternative to Charlotte Tilbury; this is the foundation to get. It's very similar to foundations that cost triple the price but it covers better. If you don't want to pay the full price though; they offer this in a convenient travel size which is great and very affordable!  A little bit goes a long way; I use about two pumps for high coverage and about one pump for lighter coverage; sometimes I'll mix in a glowy primer and then apply it so I can get the light coverage but still get that pretty glow I want.  Overall, this is a great foundation. It's a great gift I received and it's definitely one that has become a holy grail for me. Get this! you won't regret it :)

It works fine as a foundation if you want to go through the extra effort, but it’s honestly the worst of both worlds in terms of CC cream & full coverage foundation. I recommend mixing it with a light moisturizer and/or using it for spot coverage if you’re going for a fresh-faced look (which is why I’d bought it).   Also, be sure to wash off every ounce of this stuff if you have any kind of acne. Like, double cleanse even if that’s not your thing. Knocking two stars for those reasons. Would give four stars if it wasn’t marketed as a CC cream on the packaging. It really does provide coverage & I love how the formula feels. Whatever the heck “CC+ Cream Full Coverage Foundation” is supposed to mean just translates into “We tried!” in application though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: MAJOR ACNE Breakout from this CC cream.  I loved everything about it - the coverage, texture, color match.....until I broke out - forehead, chin, sides of the face, near the hairline. I usually only get 1-2 pimples every few months, so it was definitely this CC cream.    It's cost me hundreds of $$$ in professional peels and skincare to remove the last remaining clogged pores, forming pimples and HQ 4% to then remove the hyperpigmentation of said acne.    I noticed something was up when using a cleansing balm, usually high-powered cleansing gel still wouldn't remove this CC cream and I used toner on a cotton pad and had a ton of residue still on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Living in Arizona, this is my go to in summer with 50 SPF. I use full sunscreen first then put light amount of this foundation on…little goes a long way or too much looks caked on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and this is my favorite foundation I've ever used. It has a nice herbal smell, covers beautifully, and it feels just like my skin. I only need one pump for my whole face, which I think makes the price tag worth it for me. I'm sold!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: tbh it's the best foundation I've ever used. but worth the 38$..... idk.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Made me so oily, even used two different setting powders :( Literally returned it. Not recommend for oily skin at all. Didn't go onto my skin smoothly, it looked like paint smeared on, like it wasn't blended into my pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product for how it applies, feels, and lasts. Love that it is SPF50. The colour range is terrible though. I need an option for fair skin with red undertones - fair light is too tan/yellow

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product makes my skin look flawless and not cakey. You only need a little bit, I do the tinest amount at the center of my face and whatever is left I spread it around, which is usually not much. I use my fingers because it helps it melt the product and look more natural. I receive compliments every time I wear this. I will be forever purchasing, especially now that they have light and fair shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this CC+ cream! I saw it on social media and thought there's no way it can deserve all the hype but I was totally wrong! It's got great coverage and feel and so far, 5-6 hours on, no touch up needed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product a few times,  I love the results!  You don't need allot.  A little goes a long way.  It fully covered all my blemishes with a flawless finish. Found my forever cc cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It took a minute to figure out how to not use too much, but so worth it. the coverage is perfect don't need any concealers and the SPF isn't too shiny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite besides Armani Luminous Silk. I’m a Charlotte Tilbury head so I tried Beautiful Skin Foundation to switch it up and went right back to this. Great for uneven skin tones and has spf.

reviews.review_title: Instantly dries my skin and is way too thick.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love it, I really did. But it fell short. First off, I got the wrong shade and that's on me. I am lighter complexion olive skin tone, but this color made me look yellow. Coverage is great and it's very thick. However, it's very drying. It settles in my pores making me look patchy, textured and in increased the visibility of any small lines. On the plus side it color corrected the redness. But even with skin prep, moisturizing and hydration, when I apply this product it instantly dries my skin out. Sadly this one will look better in the trash bin. If you have remotely dry skin, this may not be a good fit for you.

reviews.review_title: My old tried and true foundation!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a sucker for trying the latest and great in all foundations, but there’s a reason I always go back to this one. This just melts into my skin and provides the exact coverage I need. And bonus - it has SPF!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I only use a few small dots on each part of my face and sometimes even that is too much! This product has so much coverage and blends beautifully, regardless of the brush, sponge, or any product placed below/on top of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely awful, avoid this at all costs!! This is so greasy and yet somehow makes my skin dry and textured?? Definitely save your money, its not worth it. I will be returning

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was going to write the most awful review for this product - I just didn’t understand the hype at all. Well, after many failed attempts, I finally figured out how to apply it and…this product is AMAZING!! Great for covering acne, acne scarring and redness. I put under my foundation and it just creates the most even skin tone. I bought the IT brush to apply but it just doesn’t work for me. Instead, I use a slightly damp beauty blender to apply it and blend it out. Start in the area that needs most coverage and start fanning out from there. Less is more and it’s completely buildable. Let it dry before putting anything else over top or before setting if that’s all you’re putting on for the day. Lastly, I find the shades a bit darker. For instance light-medium is my go to everywhere else but was too dark for me in winter. I’m finding light is a shade I can get away with in all seasons, especially with foundation over top. Give it a try but be patient with it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging on this is a nightmare.  I was excited to dab on a little CC cream and go out for my birthday, but the cap was stuck, then the entire pump came off, spraying cream everywhere.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not as expected, poor shades depicted...wrong shade, tone, and color, not even close to online palette.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the product but the pump stopped working after 3 uses and I can’t even remove the pump to get to the product that way.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this CC cream! I have dry skin and have been of tretnoin for over a year. I use moisturizer and sunscreen before putting this on- I just love the extra spf it adds. Did not settle into my pores.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_text: Provides full coverage, but very thick and feels heavy. Settles into wrinkles and fine lines, not my favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Best foundation great coverage lasts forever   . . . . . ……… xx

reviews.review_title: Wonderful for any environment you work in
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I work outside 10hr a day, and I LOVE this it keeps my sensitive/reactive skin protected and moisturized all day…while my white Irish skin is now tan from the summer (for the for time in my life)….my face is still supple and not sun damaged at all, where I work there’s ALOT of dust and airborne pollutions that dry my skin out even with our required PPE….I’m usually covered head to toe in dirt and or mud at the end of my day…but my face still feels protected

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product ! My main problem was getting it opened. I twisted and turned and pulled and finally the whole thing exploded all over the place￼￼￼. I had to bring it back to the store to get a new one .  The girl said she saw it a lot with this product￼ that one I couldn’t get the top off The girl said she saw it a lot with this product
BEST foundation I’ve ever used. So easy the apply and looks flawless on the skin! 10/10 recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m giving this three stars for full coverage sun protection, and it didn’t cause breakouts or irritation. On the flip side, it tends to feel very heavy. Unfortunately, I had to return this since the pump did not work and the product sputtered around, going places I didn’t want it to go! I would have kept it if not for the faulty pump.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked the matte cc cream but my shade light medium always seems to be out of stock so I thought I would try this one.  The first thing I noticed was the smell. It’s not a pleasant smell,  almost smells like it has gone off. It doesn’t last but yuck. The second was that formulation showed every flaw, creased and didn’t last throughout the day. The third is I suddenly started to break out on my chin. I’m not sure if it because of this product but it happened as soon as I started using this. I was very disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i love it so much it’s makes your face looks natural

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My absolute favourite foundation. Gives the perfect natural glowy finish and stays put (even after dancing away at my outdoor summer wedding). I prefer to apply with a damp beauty blender for a better finish than a brush

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff, I’ve been using it for years. But my most recent purchase, has me so disappointed. The tube is smaller! What’s up with that. I mean, I’ll obviously still buy it because it’s really great stuff. But if your going to make less product, charge less to. Medium buildable coverage, and can’t go wrong with SPF.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wish this stuff worked for me because I desperately need a good CC cream and this is always the #1 suggested.  First, it made my skin look orange. I have pale, combo skin that’s red around my nose and cheeks. This stuff definitely makes my skin look one color, but unfortunately that color is yellower than the rest of me. My biggest issue is how horribly oily it made my face. I’d prep with primer and set with my favorite setting powder and/or setting spray. No matter what, this stuff would slough off my face within a couple of hours. I could press my finger to my nose and you’d see a finger sized circle there.  The coverage and color correcting is top notch. Everything else is horrible.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Being that I’ve use this product almost every day for the past few years it’s probably time I write a review. It used to be hard for me to find a foundation that I really liked, my skin is more on the dry side so I’ve always wanted a foundation that will give me a little glow while also giving good coverage and lasting power. I had never found a foundation that I would buy after using the bottle up until a girl came into my work and her skin looks so flawless I had to ask her what she was wearing. When she recommended this foundation along with the it cosmetics powder I went to Sephora right after work and bought some. I have fair skin with a neutral/warm undertone and always had trouble finding a shade that wouldn’t make me look either yellow or too pale. The lightest shade in this range has always done the trick and gives a healthy color to my skin and pretty glow while looking very natural. I’m so glad I took that girl on her recommendation, I’ve use this foundation ever since then I always buy a new bottle once I’m out. I’ve recommended this foundation to my sisters and a few friends and they all love it too. I get compliments all the time about how I have naturally beautiful and even skin, which isn’t true at all but this foundation really makes it look like I do. I also have very breakout prone skin and this has never given me a problem. I can’t see ever switching foundations after using this one, I love it so much

reviews.review_title: Not for those with acne scars
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It turned me orange. Also not a nice finish if you do not have smooth skin. I have acne scars and this settled in all the wrong ways accentuating the damage instead of blurring it. Hard pass for me.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this product, especially to help cover my redness/ eczema that has been insufferable but it just turned me grey. I also found the dry down too cakey and matte, settling into lines and dry patches. Just not the right product if you have super dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best CC cream I’ve used! Has great coverage for a CC cream and I am used to using foundations… this plus a concealer is all I use now.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this product. It stays on all day without any need to reapply, does not make me break out (most other tinted moisturizers do) , provides amazing coverage without looking heavy (still have a nice glow but don't need any additional concealer), has really good SPF coverage which has been great in the summer (no need for additional sunscreen) , and is quick and easy to apply. My only complaint is that the shades all seem a bit off.  I have tried many and never feel like I'm exactly nailing my skin tone which I have never had an issue with before.  I noticed other reviews mention this as well. That said, it's close enough and wins in every other way so I will continue using it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the formula, the finish and the benefits of this cc cream. I really fell my skin looked better after having this cc cream. They don't make this light enough for my skin tone so when I wear this I look like a pumpkin! Needs a much better shade range! This cc cream would do so well if the company invested in bigger shade ranges! Such a shame!

reviews.review_title: Not my favourite but at least it has SPF 50+
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Extremely thick and doesn't exactly give you the most natural finish. Settles into creases and gathers a lot on dry skin. Not the greatest longevity of wear either. I would never have purchased it again BUT you really can't beat the 50+ SPF, so here I am, coming back, time after time. I've literally been using this product that I'm not even that fond of for years because I can't find anything with better SPF.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m so disappointed because I liked this product but it made me break out so badly. The shade was a little orange but as sumner progressed, I think it would have been ok

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t use anything typically besides a little bronzer. So for me this is as heavy as I’ll go with the foundation.   It feels pretty lightweight.  Only reason I’m giving it four stars is I feel like it can smudge off easy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I actually like IT Cosmetics a lot... especially their Bye Bye Under Eye concealer (the illuminating version). I also like their Bye Bye Foundation (which is not sold here). That being said, the CC cream is VERY heavy compared to that one, despite LOOKING very similar. It's also very drying compared to that one as well. But my biggest issue with IT Cosmetics are their SHADES. In particular, their light shade. As others have stated, this is NOT LIGHT. This light will ONLY work if you are self tanning. But the bigger issue, is that it's also very GRAY. Notice that they give it away in their OWN description by saying it's taupe. Look up the shade taupe. It says it's a gray-brown color. NOT very flattering! I like their Light Medium better, in the Bye Bye foundation in particular, but sadly it oxidizes too pink/orange for me, even though it looks great when I first put it on. But at least it's not gray like their light is... not as dark either! But a lot of the darkness in this shade stems from it being too dull/gray. So unless IT Cosmetics can get their act together and start making more REALISTIC shades, I won't continue to buy foundations from them. Also, this foundation (as well as ALL their products) are nearly IMPOSSIBLE to get out of things. Literally it can't be done. That's why I've resorted to using disposable makeup sponges when using any of their products. So that's another thing to keep in mind. And if you DO attempt to get this out of a brush or sponge, you will need about 4 different cleansers and even then there will likely be residue. Yes, it's that bad!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This matches perfectly toy skin tone. It covers my hyperpigmentation flawlessly. I am so happy this product exists!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love how this product looks when I first put it on. It stays looking amazing until about 4-5 hours in and then it begins to look bad. It is a very heavy, full coverage foundation. I miss the old IT Cosmetics foundation that this one replaced - in my opinion, it wore better. My skin is not oily and I have tried multiple methods to get it to wear better with no luck.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s really your skin. But 10000 times better. Natural finish. Doesn’t cause my skin to break out. Am hooked.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves my face very greasy. Not flattering color. Very disappointed. Had to return

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - natural beige shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely worth the hype! Goes on smooth, lightweight, easy to blend. Will buy again and recommend to friends and family.

reviews.review_title: this product is worth a review
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: so i honestly have never written a product review but i feel this product deserves it. i have looked for years for a good foundation. i like something lightweight but will cover. having a natural looking face is important to me. everytime i went in to find one it was either too oily or super minimal coverage. i honestly used the nars creamy radiant concealer for most of my face because it was the only product i trusted to give me the look i wanted. until i found this product... quite honestly forget the spf and the anti-aging components because those are just additional benefits that make this the best foundation ever but this product is amazing. full coverage in the areas you need but doesn't change the way your face looks. doesn't get super oily after hours of use. great product. really recommend. :) will be purchased again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Shows texture and clings on to dry patches.  I love the SPF in it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the coverage of this CC cream. It’s the perfect colour, perfect consistency and my new favourite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product on top of my normal routine and Milk primer. I got light and the product was insanely dark and orange. I would 1000% recommend going lighter. I have combination skin and I noticed this product separated quickly and left orange patches on my skin. It made my skin feel greasy and created acne in my T-Zone. Definetly not the product for me. Even when I tried mixing the products with some of my favorites (charlotte tilburry) it still ruined it. No other word to describe the texture besides greasy.

reviews.review_title: Doesn’t stay on or mix well with other products
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
