reviews.review_text: I bought this cream with high expectations! The hype over this product had me rushing out the door to try. I do love the coverage, and the shade matched me perfectly. However, I could not get this cream to stay on my face for the life of me!! I tried primers, setting powders, you name it! After only a short while I found it just moved around my face, and caked into my fine lines and wrinkles. This product does not play nice with any other product that I’ve found so far. I will not be buying this again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This guy is holy grail status - will never be without and the compliments I get are endless - perfection!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The colors are way darker in person. It would work fine if you can find your right shade. I bought the color light I'd definitely go for fair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is the best I’ve ever used!  It is so light and creamy. And it great for mature skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample size in my monthly Ipsy bag and am I glad I did! I've used Lancome Teinte Idole for the past decade and the minute I used this product it was a no brainer...I ordered the full sized product! It has the full coverage look with a light, creamy feel. The CC is great for the unevened areas where I have some redness caused by scarring and I've noticed an improvement with fine lines and wrinkles that come with approaching the big 5-0! Love love love It! (pardon the pun! Lol)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t get the hype. It’s too think, overly fragranced and just sits on the skin. Not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of this recently. I really wanted to like it but I just don’t. I found it made my skin feel tight and dry. It looked cakey, settled into fine lights, drew attention to dry patches, and oxidized. On top of that, it contains snail secretion which is not a selling point to someone like me that aims to use truly cruelty-free products (shame on me for not looking into the sample before using it!). I’m sure this product works for others but for my skin (which is mature and leans on the drier side) it just made my face feel uncomfortable and looked the opposite of “anti-aging”.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how much coverage this gives and the natural, skin-like finish. Would definitely recommend going a shade lighter than you think though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Makes my complexion look pasty and old. have to add water to it to thin it down some as too expensive not to use. Think the salesperson should have checked to see if the color and texture was correct for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Repeat buyer! Love it! Always get complimented on my gooey skin (I don’t set with any powder). I use concealer over pimples and that’s it! It’s amazing coverage. Will never be without it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my holy grail product as far as bases go! I’ve been using this for several years. It is not full coverage, however you can build it up. I love the glow it gives me and it has SPF which is always a plus.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this CC cream; it's my go-to for my problem areas. I use a cpap, and it sometimes leaves red marks on my face. So, between that and the occasional other imperfections and uneven skin tones. Also, I love that it has a high SPF, as I put it on the two sun spots I have on my face to help prevent them from getting worse!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favourite all around foundation yet!! Minimal effort great coverage, not heavy. Lasts longer.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have the mini in Light. This is by far the best foundation I’ve ever used, and I’ve spent years trying all sorts of formulations and shades. It’s the only foundation that’s genuinely creamy and does not streak and does not end up looking dry and crusty like all other foundations I’ve tried. I can usually get away with a tinted moisturizer looking already but this one is the perfect step above that and never looks thick. It spreads great with a brush which is my preferred tool.  Light is a great shade for me but I might try the one lighter.

reviews.review_title: Amazing, beautiful, light, but not for hot days
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Light coverage(but you can build it up a little with more than one coat), gives you amazing glow, easy to apply. Bloc pores so be aware that you might get extra shiny on hot days.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rich Honey - rich ebony shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great foundation, even though they only have 2 shades for dark skin.  Great coverage, and I love the sun protection built in.  Perfect for summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As a man, I feel way more comfortable using this to give my skin a quick reset for imperfections and uneven tone. It works amazingly well, even after sweating a lot.  There is a learning curve to using it. A little goes a long way, especially if you have a beard.  I literally use less than half of a pump and apply it with a sponge. Applying it with a fluffy brush colors your beard!   Great product. Thanks for an SPF 50!  I have a smaller version of this in my bag as well to really during the day a little bit.   The cream doesn’t crease, which is very nice. If applied correctly and with the right amount, it looks extremely natural. People are always surprised I use a CC Cream.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this make-up because it lasts and has SPF in it so I don't have to worry about forgetting to put that on.  The color is great and it lasts all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Light coverage as it’s a cc cream. It’s perfect for me, working from home and not putting on a full coverage foundation. I am 39 with dry skin. I prep before I put ion my cc cream or my Tom Ford foundation with a small amount of moisturizer first. I tend to grab CR magic cream. It was a game changer by adding moisture to my skin before applying anything to my face.

reviews.review_title: So orange, i look like an umpa lumpa!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It lightly covered my freckles (not complete coverage). My skin was wrinkly after it dried (not moisturizing enough as a single product, would need to pre-moisturize for skin to be supple first before applying).  The match appeared good in the bathroom, but once I was in natural light outside,  the shade had an orange tint (the kind you want to avoid because it looks tacky and like a fake tan).  I really liked it for the SPF protection.  I will buy the light shade and blend it with this neutral medium and see how that goes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: When first applied on the skin, it looks amazing. The coverage was more so medium than full. I really wanted to love this product as it was so expensive but I found by the end of the day my skin looked patchy and scaly. I don’t even have dry skin and after 5 hours of wear i end up with dry patchy flakes all over my face.

reviews.review_title: Makes me feel like a better human
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried everything and this is the absolute best. It transforms me into a natural beauty with healthy plump skin. Plus SPF 50. 50! Put it on with a damp beauty sponge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Accentue mes pores c’est dommage car j’aime beaucoup les ingrédients. Je ne vais pas racheter ce produit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favorite foundation!!! It has flawless easy to work with buildable coverage! It is very lightweight and does not look caky on even after hours of wear.  I have used many foundations as I get a lot sent by brands, but this has been by far my favorite throughout the years!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First, the color - I got Fair Light because these days the lightest shades are for that really porcelain tone even though I'm incredibly pale but this was too dark for me. Level up if you're in doubt between shades.  The coverage - Full coverage and a little thick but can be made to spread more easily with a dab of cream.  Texture - Looked ultra cakey on me despite having moisturized. Hydrate your skin well. SPF & Benefits - Can't say as I had to wash it off immediately.   All in all it's not different enough for me from Maybelline's Ultra Urban Cover Full Coverage SPF 50 at 1/4 the cost.   Sorry IT Cosmetics.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried so many different foundations, cc creams, bb creams, skin tints, etc. this is by far my favorite. It has great coverage, blends perfectly, makes my skin look flawless, doesn’t feel heavy, stays all day, and never makes me break out like all other foundations. Been using for years and I haven’t found anything else that comes close to this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is actually really good. I’ve used so many different foundations and concealers, but this does a good job on its own so you don’t need anything else. I have dry skin most of the time and it doesn’t make my face look cakey or make the lines look more obvious. The only thing I don’t like about this is they seemed to have changed the formula for most of them and the shades are not the same, also the silver part of the tube starts to peel off and gets all over the fingers and in my cosmetic bag

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I mix two drops with my sunblock and it gives me a nice coverage with a dewy finish. It’s very natural but a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am NOT someone who writes reviews often. Around the time I turned 40, I started getting fine lines. My make-up either sinks into those lines and makes them more noticeable, OR it slides off my face in a few hours regardless of primers. I was on a mission to find something good for aging (Armani, Tillbury, etc.) and this is PERFECT. It stays put ALL DAY and it looks very natural even though it is full coverage. It does not sink into my wrinkles at all, my skin looks even and absolutely flawless. I have gone 14 hours without needing to touch up. I am so thankful I found this. I was about to give up completely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this for years and I definitely won’t be stopping anytime soon. Great coverage, easy to apply, love that it’s slightly moisturizing and has great SPF. This evens out my skin tone in a really natural-looking way. I love it! I do find that I get shiny by the end of the day, so I use the IT Cosmetics powder on top and that does the trick. Go for it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Best foundation I ever tried . I was looking for something lighter but this looks so natural and flawless that I actually love it ! I have such oily skin and after a long day my skin still looks good !

reviews.review_title: Full coverage foundation that looks natural !!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best foundations. Full coverage but looks very natural. A little goes a long way. Lasts for a long time. SPF coverage is amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For my sensitive/ red/ combination skin, this cc cream worked really well.  I only need a small amount, it doesn’t crease, and wears long.  I use it with their primer and loose setting powder. Because I use a small amount, I definitely still need other sun protection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I suffer from acne rosacea and I use this for a full coverage foundation and is the only 'foundation' that completely covers my redness. It gives me more full coverage than others I've tried and leaves my skin feeling hydrated and not cakey. Only negative thing I'd say is that throughout the day it can cling to my dry flakey patches but any foundation would. Having hyaluronic acid, niacinamide, colloidal oatmeal and a high spf in makeup is a dream for rosacea. Highly recommend!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Keeps my skin hydrated and protected! Great coverage and nice dewy finish
Be sure that ur skin is well prepped and hydrated before applying it after putting a primer.  I apply a little amount with my hands and then tap it with my beauty blender, it's perfect

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I think at some point they changed the formula. When I first bought this, it gave my face a dewy glow and was amazing. Now I find that it dries out my skin and sets in any fine lines I have. I may try one of the different formulations and see if that works better. I still would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like it but it sets into my fine lines. Oddly the nude glow one does not. The color of the nude glow one was also a better match for my skin with less yellow in it. I will use this one as a concealer instead. I am 46 years old.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff. Perfect light summer coverage. A little bit goes a LONG way so this tube will last quite a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is so flawless I thought it was going to break my skin but not at all. The color match is great and so light on my skin while full coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gave me awful breakouts all over my face. Will be returning!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried A LOT of foundations, bb creams, cc creams.. everything - this is hands down the best I’ve ever used. It’s not cakey, doesn’t move and last ALL day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a constant repurchase for me! The coverage is fantastic and it is packed with skin loving ingredients! What the company needs to do is make more shades for different undertones! I always buy Fair, which is the lightest, but the undertone is “warm” and is too yellow, but I try to make it work. They need a Fair- Neutral-Cool as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect purse-sized necessity! I love that this shade was one of the easiest matches I’ve been able to make online- And I get complete sun coverage too! I buy the larger size for home, and have this small tube for areas that really need sun protection to be reapplied.

reviews.review_title: My search for the perfect CC cream continues...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to LOVE this product...like, really love it. But, I only like it -- most days. It's definitely more along the lines of foundation coverage, which means like some foundations it can build up and become a bit streaky on dryer skin. I don't recommend it if you have very oily skin, or overly dry skin.  I also recommend going a shade lighter than you normally would. I am not the palest person, so I ordered the light colour the first time and it was WAY too orange. It made it look like I had loaded up on bronzer. I didn't want to give up on it just yet, so I ordered it in fair and the match was MUCH better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really good stuff. I use maybe a half a pea size at most on each cheek and blend with a damp beauty blender (I like a very natural look). This stuff is great. Just make sure you moisturize before applying. It oxidizes, so try before getting. You may need a lighter shade than you think.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first I received it as a sample but it was perfect for my skin, so I bought it! 10/10 don’t hesitate and buy it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this. I was uing using Kat Von D good apple but I love raising far more. The shades are far darker than other lines- make sure you order at least a shade lighter. I love the finish. It's glory without being sparkly.  I used 2 coats last weekend and did 5 hours of yard work and didn't have to touch up at all when we went out that night. My skin is on the dry side and it works so good for me.

reviews.review_title: WAY darker than appears on site!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage on this is amazing but the shades are WAY off! I wish I read the reviews before ordering, The shade I got looks completely different in the image. It's so dark in real life, it looks more like medium soft beige. From the other reviews my closest bet would be the fair ivory with warm undertones. (Which my skin has never been fair with other foundations or creams)I'm going to order and see how that goes otherwise I would not recommend this just based on color...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this product. It matched my skin tone perfectly & the coverage is just what I wanted while still giving me a natural look. Also a little goes a long way with this product. Will definitely be repurchasing! Some days I just use this without my foundation because of how great it is.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have “older” skin and it makes my face look Dewey.  I start with my moisturizer, then face primer, CC cream with a sheer foundation over it.  It blends well and doesn’t look heavy.  I use a lightweight finishing product to complete this process.   I find that with any type of foundation or cream that you have to lightly brush it in with some type of setting product and be sure to blend it well.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very flawless look but I would recommend setting the product afterward with some powder. It does easily transfer but otherwise great product.!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage was great. I didn’t even feel like putting concealer on under my eyes, however, after a few minutes of wear, my fine lines were very prominent and texture emphasized, despite having moisturized and primed beforehand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i was very impressed with the coverage from this product, but it does not set into skin. if i were to just lightly touch my face, the product would transfer right off my face onto my finger. wouldnt reccomend this i have used much better

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my holy grail, everyday, if I were on a deserted island product. This gives me a nice, healthy base. It evens out my skin and covers discoloration. It doesn’t feel too heavy and my skin feels so good after wearing this. I’m not sure how this would be for someone with a lot of texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not happy with the color much darker then expected

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this CC cream. I just wanted something to even out my complexion while still looking like skin. I was colour matched by a Sephora employee and she nailed it on the first try. Meanwhile I had been struggling for months trying to find the correct shade of concealer and foundation. I appreciate that this has spf in it, and has a natural finish. It even did a good job at covering my under eyes, I just pressed what was left over on my brush under my eyes. The tube appears to be very small but one full pump was enough to cover my whole face AND neck. Have a light hand and build as necessary! I pair it with the Fenty cream blush and cream bronzer and I find that it stays in place very well. (I apply those with my fingers). 4 stars because I find that this does settle into pores and under the eye creases, not horribly but it does require some tapping after a couple hours. I’m looking for a primer to hopefully counter that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product! Perfect for someone that wants a glowy, light coverage. Not heavy at all-A little goes a long way! Still Buildable and easy to apply, and you can’t beat the added SPF. Perfect. I have some acne scars, light eye freckles and slight rosacea and this covers beautifully.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is lovely.  Full coverage, pore blurring, SPF luminous and smells and feels like skincare.  I like it more than Dior and that says a lot!  Probably not good for oily complexions.  I'll admit that I *sometimes fall asleep wearing makeup and my skin never breaks out Idue to the skincare properties the product claims to have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Never thought i would hate a skin base as much as this. It was beautiful on initial application, BUT THEN after setting it with powder, as i was doing my brows it started disappearing on areas i was touching while doing brows. Like literally disappearing,so youre left with that spot without foundation EVEN after setting it. I’ve never had this problem with any foundation/cc cream before. Like no matter what I do whether i set it with powder or use a setting spray it still disappears the moment u touch it. So imagine wearing a mask with that. Really wanted to love this because of how many people swear by this but no thanksss

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this in two shades, light medium and medium. Both of them work well for me, the coverage is fantastic and I have not had any breakouts due to this cream. I do have very sensitive skin, and I’ve had no issues using this product as of yet. I’ve used it for maybe more than a year now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff but PLEASE make a lighter shade! I have very very porcelain skin and this is still way too dark!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I feel the need to right a review after using this for a few weeks since receiving. I have to admit I was skeptical since there are so many negative and 1 star reviews. I am very fair and in many foundations I experience “orange face”, however with this it blends very well into my skin tone and no weird tones as others have described. Coverage I would describe as full coverage and it’s long lasting, even in Arizona heat. With a primer and setting spray it lasts all day, plus you have the added benefits of sunscreen and moisturizer built in. I am incredibly picky about foundation and have sensitive skin and I really like this product and will reorder when I get close to running out. I also have very sensitive, acne prone skin and have had no break outs with this.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really hated this stuff, SO CAKEY and thick.  Did not look good

reviews.review_title: For everyday wear and zoom calls
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good colour correction while still showing some of my natural skin and imperfections. It’s definitely a natural look and finish which is good for every day wear.  Formula applies smoothly. I’ve only worn it for 6 hours max and mainly indoors. It lasts well without getting greasy or caking.  I apply a cetaphil daytime moisturizer under it and that’s it.  Colour matches well but I’m not sure if I’ll need another colour if I tan during the summer. I’ve had to do this for full coverage foundation but maybe this IT formula means I can wear this all year round.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so disappointed with this product!   Used ITCosmetics shade finder on their website and they recommended light medium. Even in the photos of models on their website who are wearing this shade, it looks pretty fair, which I am.   Once the product arrived, I tried it on and it was SO orange. I looked like an oompaloompa.   I also don’t get the hype around this product. I have perioral dermatitis and was hoping this would be a great product for my skin. Unfortunately, for over $50, I would definitely not recommend. I have an $8 foundation that looks better than this one.

reviews.review_title: Love it! Low shade diversity though
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product!! I use it as a moisturizer + sunscreen + serum + makeup + concealer, and it doesn’t clog my pores at all. I wish this came in a lighter shade, but I like it enough to use a shade that’s a little too dark for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. I’ve repurchased many times. A high SPF in a foundation/cc cream is important to me, and this is the best I’ve found. High coverage with lots of skincare benefits. Also a little product goes a long way. I have some fine lines so it does sit in them by the end of the day, but I haven’t found a cream/foundation that doesn’t do that. Also leaves a nice dewy finish. Will continue to repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This separated, emphasized my texture and clung to my dry patches horribly. Do not recommend for dry skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Light weight yet full coverage. I love that sunscreen is included, 1 less step in my morning routine. This is definitely a repeat purchase for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really really like this product! It goes on the face so nicely & I don’t have to use much so it will last forever. My skin is very dry & I have quite a bit of redness and this hides the redness and does not cling to dry patches. After wearing it for 10+ hours my face looked good & there was minimal flaky foundation spots on my face. My only complaint is that the shade range is awful. I’m very pale and I have to self tan for this to match the rest of my body.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Favorite foundation with SPF. FYI- Not sure if the packaging is just different now but content sizing is definitely not the same. Regardless, I will still be buying this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The shade range is terrible. The lightest shade is wayyyy to dark for me and I wouldn’t consider myself crazy pale. I also found it to be very heavy and dry feeling when I tried it on my hand in the store. I’m surprised considering it is such a popular product they wouldn’t make more shades as the lightest shade isn’t even close to fair.

reviews.review_title: Pass if you have light, porcelain skin tone!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As much as I love combining found in foundations with an SPF, this IT CC+ was an enormous disaster for me.  I do like love a great deal of IT products nut I looked like an orange Lumpa after applying this!  First and last time I will ever use it!!!!  I will admit that I do have porcelain shin and tts fair that I purchased many years ago does not make me related to the Drumpf family OR the Lollipop kidLL

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you have a sensitive skin but still want a full coverage, I totally recommend this cc cream. I have a sensitive/atopic skin but this never irritates my skin. It is buildable and has spf 50 which I really love, too. However if you are really sensitive about fragrance, this might be not your choice. It has a little lemony scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow - I’ve never seen a color for a base described as taupe…and taupe it is!  It has a very nice consistency and light coverage so I’m trying it in another shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really do like the formula, I love how buildable yet natural it is, all the while having SPF 50,  however, I do worry about the colour selection. I have fair skin, and therefore picked the lightest shade but it is still much too dark for me. While my skin is pale, it's not that pale either, and yet the lightest shade seems dark on me and creates yellowish-orange lines when I try to blend down my neck. Overall, love the formula, and hate the shade. I really hope they do expand their shade range soon.

Gorgeous and very buildable so you can use less for sheer coverage or build it up to full. Very glowy and looks like skin. I blend it with a sponge and use moisturizer + hydrating primer before applying

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this because the bye bye redness was such a great product I assumed this would be as well. So wrong. Went on thick and caked up. Broke up throughout the day and two days later completely made me break out. Returning it to Sephora asap

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s amazing, i keep coming back to buy it. It truly makes my skin look and feel the best it’s ever been.

reviews.review_title: The product I didn't know I needed
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been trying under eye concealer for a while. First I tried Nars, then KVD, but they both creased and looked dry by the end of the day. While I was returning the KVD to Sephora, I found a sample of this and it was AMAZING. I didn't realize it was a foundation, not a concealer, but it was so good that I went back to Sephora and purchased a whole tube! It doesn't create crater pores that even Nars was causing. It lasts all day and doesn't irritate my VERY sensitive skin. Natural finish so you don't look cakey. Buy this product, it's worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Fairly good product, but I feel like there’s better ones out there

reviews.review_title: Amazing coverage with a natural looking finish
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go-to everyday face product because it’s dependable and I know it’s always going to look good. This wears really well throughout the day on my skin and honestly just looks better and better as the day goes on. This product along along with the nude stix bronzer is such a pretty combo. They blend together seamlessly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been buying this product for years! It is amazing for acne prone skin. Never broke me out! It gives you full coverage (buildable) with a natural look. I only give four stars bc it has risen in price & they give you a smaller amount than before. Also, very hard to get your exact skin shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve never retuned anything to Sephora, until this! It made my face look like textured drywall. I tried a few different application styles in case it was me, but it just looks terrible. I was hoping for a luminous, dewy, light coverage moisturizer and got spackle from the hardware store instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Me encanto, muy buen Tamaño y no es completa cobertura, perfecta para el diario

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this for years!! Just set it with some powder and ur good to go!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I bought the mini of this March 2022, and unfortunately the tube I got expired 03/2021 as you can see on the picture. I am so disappointed, will definitely be returning. Also the SPF is coved with a sticker, not sure what to make of that…

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Make a fairer shade please !!!! Love the product but my winter/spring/fall complexion is paler than the lightest shade. We are the ones actively looking for this high spf product. Great coverage, finish!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product as my everyday foundation. You can make it from medium to full coverage depending on your method of application. I love that it has the spf!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First off their lightest shade “fair” is way to dark it’s literally a medium shade NOT a fair shade. I love the formula but I can’t buy this product anymore bc it makes me look ridiculous n orange, bc the fair shade is literally way to dark. IT COSMETICS PLZ MAKE ACTUAL FAIR SHADES so I can buy your foundations

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the formulation of this product a lot, but the colors are not good. I first bought the Light, but the taupe color makes it look so gray on my skin. I look sickly when I wear it. Then tried the Light Medium, which is supposed to be a pink beige, but it looks very peachy, almost orange-y on my skin. I'm definitely returning this. Though it has good coverage and neutralizes reddish areas and softens dark spots, I can't wear it until they do a better job on their colors.

reviews.review_title: Not for the pale, disappointed in messiness
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like how it has spf. Another review said if you are very pale avoid this product and I agree. The lightest shade still left my skin looking too beige, not porcelain. It also transfers like crazy so if you want anything long wear this isn’t good for that. Don’t go hugging someone with a white shirt!! Also not a big deal but the silver branding will scratch and rub off easily. I returned it. It also felt a bit cakey for a cc cream, didn’t really melt/blend into skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really hopeful about this product, since it got such great reviews! While it covered really well, the finish looks oily and fake, even with a dusting powder over it. Won’t be purchasing again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have purchased the CC in 2 different shades.  The color match and range of shades is very limited and terrible.  I really wanted to love this but the claims that these shades matches multiple skin tones is not right.  Plus the oxidation goes horribly wrong making me look orange.   I am shade EL double wear 2N1 and there is NOTHING here in a neutral that is acceptable to my coloring.   Even though I do like how this cream feels on my skin giving it a fresh natural look.  The color ranges need to be revamped.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately, I was really let down by the color. Their light is way too dark and orange. There is no way anyone with light skin (not fair, just light) could wear this color and have it look normal - and at this price point, that's very disappointing. For the particular skin issues I have, the texture was nice and I could probably combat the potential oiliness with other products. But due to the color, there's absolutely nothing I can do to make this work. If they had a much larger color range for this product, I could easily recommend it to people that have dry skin. But as is, it's a huge gamble unless you go in person to pick some up and see if any of them will match you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Color was SO ridiculously orange. I had to take it off almost immediately. Returned within a week. So disappointed in the color because the coverage and feeling on the skin was great! Such a let down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s like orange, sandy, gritty, glop. Used twice and looked embarrassing. Avoid

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing coverage!  I don't recommend as much for an actual full face of makeup, as it does smudge a bit so doesn't blend well with concealer or eye makeup, but it's PERFECT for a natural no-makeup look!  Covers up dark circles, spots and makes your skin tone perfectly even.  This plus a lip tint and some blush is my new every day look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Voir photo ci-joint   J'ai un teint rosé . Je n'ai pas trouvé de teinte adéquate et a mon sens, j'ai fais un mauvais choix de teinte, trop jaune je crois.   Sur la photo, le moins 'jaune' est la teinte de mon anti -cerne que j'aime beaucoup de la marque Clarins.   Bref, je debute en maquillage ou du moins, javais l'habitude de magasiner aleatoirement en pharmacie avec beaucoup de deceptions .   Produit somme tout vraiment eclatant. Je vais continuer a l'utiliser quand meme le temps de me reorienter vers un autre produit.

reviews.review_title: over hyped and not for for pale skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If your quite fair skinned don’t bother trying this. Even the lightest shade will leave you looking orange. The coverage is full and quite thick to the point where you can really it sitting on the surface. Didn’t like it and returned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this product for 5+ years! Love the light yet full coverage it gives. The sunscreen is a bonus. Highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_title: Better than many, but not perfect!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: On first application, it looks amazing. It smooths out imperfections and has enough coverage for red spots. However, throughout the day, it slides with sweat (even with powder) and cakes at the same time, so I need to check-up on the makeup frequently. I will say, I have not yet found a foundation or CC+ cream that works perfectly with my skin. This one does a decent job overall, I would still buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have dark, oily, acne prone skin. I got a tester of this product from Sephora just to confirm the color selection before purchase. I thought it was a sure thing given the description and most of the reviewers.  Then after I confirmed the color choice, I figured  I’d use the tester for a couple more days before I buy it. Sadly, by the 5th day of daily use, my skin started breaking out. I immediately stopped using it. Then the following days the break out worsen, my skin has uncomfortable and somewhat disgusting texture. I’m sooo disappointed and upset. It’s been 4 days since I stopped using it and every day the condition of my skin is worse. I hope it wears of sooon. I concluded that this is not oily skin nor acne prone skin friendly product as claimed !

reviews.review_title: Love the product but will not buy again
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this CC cream but I will not be buying it again.  I just opened a brand new tube and, once again, I am struggling to get the product out of the tube.  Once again, it will be necessary for me to cut the bottom off the tube and then deal with plastic bags to protect the product.  This becomes a messy, tedious task and travelling with the tube in this shape is difficult. So, I will not be buying this product again.  I will be searching for a similar product with a better delivery system.  Any suggestions?

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not at all like the bye bye foundation. This one is thicker and not as even. Used fair light as with the bye bye foundation but it was yellowish in its appearance. Returned.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received a sample of the Light shade. Like many people said, this shade is waaaaay too dark. I use BareMineral's matte loose powder in Light which is a perfect match for my East Asian skin. This CC cream's shade is quite a bit darker than that; I would call it more like golden beige/medium.  That said, I like the formulation. Good coverage, lightweight, absorbs quickly but slow enough you can blend well. Does a good job covering acne, pores, and redness. I don't think I'll be able to find a shade that works for me, but if I did, I'd buy it.

reviews.review_title: Best full coverage for sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best full coverage foundation that hides all your flaws. I’m 40 years old with sensitive skin, so I’ve had a difficult time finding a full coverage foundation that doesn’t irritate my skin but can still provide the full coverage look that I want. Not to mention it lasts all day.  I’m only giving 4 stars because I feel like the price is a bit high.

reviews.review_title: full coverage that stays in place
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super thick, full coverage. Exactly what I was looking for. It does get a little oily, but maybe that’s because of the SPF? It stays in place really well all day. I typically set it with Laura Mercury setting powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I hate this thing. I feel like it's beautiful when I apply it but after a couple of hours, it breaks. Plus, it is heavy on the skin and does not set well. I don't understand the hype around this product.

reviews.review_title: this is a tough one to match
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love using this to run errands and day wear not long lasting or for photos. I feel like this looks better in person than I’m photos definitely. I am a pretty pale baby for a Latina. I normally wear light foundation but this matched me to neutral medium and that was wayyy to dark for me. I then got a new one after a year and purchased the light but that is still way to dark on me and I wear a 2n1 In Estée Lauder double wear and 185 in fenty soft matte. I hate looking orange but I love the way this makes my skin feel and it doesn’t irritate or cause acne for me just wish the shade range was better. I think I’m going to try adding an adjust pigment to it to see if I can make it work and try the shade fair next which is crazy that it’s the lightest shade. I am neutral skin toned too so things go super pink Or super orange on me if they don’t match. For skin prep I wear glow recipe watermelon moisturizer underneath and then go in with it cosmetics primer for pores and Hydration. I think you can prob get away without primer but I’m extra like that and feel that it helps my foundation look and last longer. I also use Charlotte tilbury powder when I Want to stay dewy or I use hourglass powder. Laura Mercier gets too heavy and also Causes acne for me. I then spray with Charlotte Tilbury setting spray and it holds well but be ready to be dewy with this cc cream. I wouldn’t  recommend this for oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly will buy this FOREVER. It’s got SPF 50 so I only wear a pump of this CC cream and use a foundation brush to blend and it’s been life changing!! My skin is much better in terms of smoothness and this never oxidizes on me (not sure why others have said it does) and isn’t an oily mess or cling to my dry patches. I have combo skin. I loooove this and I currently use medium (I am East Asian) so curious if I should try medium neutral since its new? Anyway I love this but beware that this if full coverage so one tiny pump/squirt for your whole face is more than enough!! I don’t even use concealer some days unless my eye bags are super dark. Seriously nothing beats this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really expected more from this product. Doesn’t set in the face at all, so along the day you can see the hole product moving trough the face and leaving you patches. Other thing that I disliked from this product is the odor, smells like perfume. Waste of money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i have dry skin so i bought this because of all the skin loving ingredients in it. i prepped my skin with my normal routine and a good moisturizer, and it initially looked superrr good. but i got to work and after about 4 hours i noticed it really accentuated my texture, dry spots and it just made my skin look kinda gross. i’ve never had this issue before with any other makeup products, and i set and prepped my makeup properly so i’ll have to pass on this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Tiene buena cobertura, pero no es la mejor opción para piel seca, se hace parchuda.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this and immediately ordered the full size as soon as I tried it. I go for the natural look and this looks so natural on my skin. I'm in disbelief at how perfect it is! I used to use a tinted moisturizer but now I realize that wasn't enough coverage. This covers everything and makes my skin look perfect, but it seriously looks like I have no makeup on. Love it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is beautiful, and the coverage is amazing. The texture is perfect to mix with almost anything: sunscreen, a moisturizer, a serum- lovely. Unfortunately, the shade range is awful. The lightest shade is four shades too dark and too yellow for my pale complexion. This isn't a new customer observation. I don't understand why IT doesn't upgrade the shade range and undertone issue with this product. It would be good business for them. Go figure. As is, I can't use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I begin with a skincare routine that includes a wash, toner, serum, moisturizer and primer. I then apply this with a brush and follow up with a beauty wet blender to get rid of streaks and such. I set with powder. It covers my rosacea well, doesn’t feel heavy at all. It’s natural-looking! I haven’t noticed that it oxidizes. I added a photo with one layer (one pump each half). You can build up if you’d like!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thick consistency and not enough shade ranges for lighter skinned people. Thought this would be a good gift for mom because the spf built in, it was definitely a let down. Stick with Korean CC creams, they are sooooo much better!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: They sent expired sample!although the coverage is very good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this with a sample and it was perfect, purchased full size and was much darker than sample. I had to repurchase a lighter color to mix. disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately it oxidizes. It was a great color to start love that it has spf and it’s light weight with good coverage but after a few hours on it starts to turn orange.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Looked forward to trying a free sample and it was horrible. Very cakey and hard to blend it felt like coating my skin in tar. I suppose the positives are that it’s very full coverage, like rolling on latex paint. Doesn’t budge once it’s on either; it took me forever to wash off and water sort of beaded up on my skin, so I guess if you wanted this substance on your face for some reason you might appreciate that.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to make this product work because it was everything I was looking for. But it didn't deliver. Yes, it has excellent coverage. But my skin was an oily mess within 20 minutes. At the same time, it didn't feel hydrating at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not the holy grail product that I expected. I was reading so many reviews, even watched videos on YouTube and it’s always „up there“ in rankings. So I gave it a try but am not too pleased with 1) the shade. It seems too dark and orange for me. 2) it separates after a while 3) feels heavy and greasy on my skin. I continue to use it as I spent a lot of money on it but I won’t re-buy this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, i found out that the less product the better

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried so many foundations and CC creams, and I consider this one my number 1!! It's very smooth on the skin, and very full coverage. I also noticed huge improvement on my skin after using it for a while now. It works well for day and night. I use it after moisturizing my skin and I set it with the Laura Mercier setting powder.

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not experienced when applying makeup and made the mistake of applying a little too much the first time!  I like the coverage of this product and it gives my skin a nice, natural finish.  Make sure not to apply too much at once, else you might run the risk of looking like a mannequin (which happened to me the first time I applied this).

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it!!! Tried it on for the first time and so surprised of the outcome. Thank you so much for the ladies in the chat box in the app that recommended this. So happy with it. Covers my acne and it looks so smooth on my face

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like the name of this product is misleading: it is a FULL COVERAGE foundation. Aside from that, it is an excellent product, especially if this is what you're looking for. I wouldn't say it's long-lasting as by the end of the day I can see it rubbing off, but for evening/short events, it's perfect. I also find that my skin looks better after wearing it, which is usually not the case with makeup.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - natural beige shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the idea of this product and I finally tried it after years of considering it. I have dry skin but it gets oily after a while. This product is just very weird the way it goes on my skin. It separates so bad in the middle of my face. I tried it on my leg and it does the same exact thing and just separates badly. The color is also very weird. It goes on my shade but oxidizes very badly so within minutes it’s very dark and kind of orangey so the tone just does not work for me. It’s not the worst CC Cream I’ve tried and the coverage is really good. I just wish it dried down better and the color was more accurate.

reviews.review_title: The color Light is more of a Medium!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beware- it’s dark! Has an orange tint and oxidizes throughout the day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It’s kind of just okay. I think there are definitely better foundations out there so this one doesn’t really do anything special for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm really surprised the Light shade is marketed as light, as it is definitely medium.  I wear light shades in all foundations, and this one is way too dark for me.  For comparison, I've included an image of this CC cream next to IT Cosmetics Your Skin But Better Foundation in Light Warm 23.  There's no way I can get away with wearing this one.

reviews.review_title: No matter how many I try, this is always The One
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had used IT Cosmetics BB cream for a couple of years faithfully, but recently decided to try a few that people rave about. None of them compare. I have pretty good skin, but this makes it flawless without feeling cakey or overly shiny. My true holy grail.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good full coverage moisturizer. It has lots of great ingredients but it does go on thicker and sits on top of the skin more than some others. It can also get cakey easily if not applied with fingers and can cling to dry spots and settle into fine lines. I have been using it for a while and I do think they might have changed the formula. Still a great product, just enough issues that I've decided to start looking around for other options.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE THIS. It is too dark for my skin tone (IT PLEASE EXPAND YOUR RANGE) but this still deserves 5 stars. I have very dry skin and love the way this looks. I don't know how it works with acne so keep that in mind if you try it out but it feels so good on the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I truly wish I could give this CC cream 5 stars. It's very hydrating and doesn't cling to dry skin, it  has a nice dewy but not oily finish and feels pretty light on the skin. However, it REALLY oxidizes. When I first put it on, it seemed to be a good match to my skin tone, however after a few minutes it turns into a orange/peachy shade. I don't have a pink undertone so the oxidization of this product is really visible on me.   If you have combination/dry skin, with pink/peachy undertones this would be perfect for you.   P.s Ive noticed from other reviews that even their LIGHTEST shade oxides to a tan orange - so watch out for that!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sat on top of my primer and would wipe itself off if ANYTHING touched my face. Would result in splotchy skin and aged me terribly (28f) DO NOT recommend

reviews.review_title: a little goes a long way!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best one Ive tried and I love the spf 50. It gives my skin a flawless look, I’m an RN and work long hours on my feet. This holds up. I will say if you put on too much it looks thick. Figuring out the right amount was key, for me it’s about a half pump. I’ve worn this for years and will continue to do so!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the finish! It’s dewy but not greasy, keeps your skin moisturized and protects from the sun! Its also pretty high coverage in my opinion. Note that the shades run darker!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a foundation replacement as Tarte has been out of my shade for the Rainforest of the Sea water foundation forever now. Given the reviews here, I expected waaaaay more of a natural look. This formula looked almost chalky on me, and I used a damp Beauty blender with a small amount of product. My setting powder hated it, as well.   I have combo skin, and I can tell this would be brutal on dry skin. Bummer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So apparently this is everyone’s favorite CC cream. Did the formula change or what? It’s extremely cakey and even if I applied the smallest amount there would be transfer from my face to my phone. I hate it, fingers crossed I can still return it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Waned to love it, as it has it all - full coverage, hydrating, anti aging & spf. Looked great on the skin, great colour match - but it broke me out in tiny pimples and caused very red itchy skin. Sadly had to return as my skin did not agree with the ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was super excited to try this because of the high SPF and nice coverage but when I got it it was not fair at all. I'm usually within the first three palest shades for foundation so I figured the lightest shade here would be great but it's so dark on my skin. I thought if I tried to blend it it would be better but it wasn't at all. DO NOT get this if you're pale!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation turns orange after a few hours of wear, I’ve tried a few different shades and they all seemed to do it. It also settles into fine lines and wrinkles really badly. I don’t have many fine lines but this foundation seems to eventuate them. I have dry skin and this foundation tends to look greasy and sticks to my dry patches. I wanted to love this foundation because it has spf in it but it just didn’t impress me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! It feels really nice on the skin and leaves a beautiful glow. I love that it has SPF and gives really nice coverage. Definitely would repurchase!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this formula and product. I have been using it for over 3 years now. It gives me a full coverage look without feeling heavy and the lasting power is amazing. Important not that even the fairest shade is very dark (in comparison to other brands colors). There isn’t a fair enough shade for my winter skin so it only works for when I use a self tanner or mix it with another product to lighten it up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like how easily it applies and how little I need to cover my entire face. It has a natural finish and doesn't feel too heavy on the face, but it has pretty decent coverage. CC creams usually don't have any coverage at all, but I find this one has medium coverage at least. It's my current favourite as a base for more complex fun looks. I don't think the skincare products in this do much for my skin, but that's not what I look for in a base anyways. I don't use primer with this and it lasts all day on me when I wear it out. It does transfer on my mask though so I only wear disposable ones when I go out. There is a scent and I don't mind it too much, but I wish it wasn't there. I have dry, sensitive skin and it doesnt irritate it or look too drying or glowy on me. I do have an extensive skincare routine so my skin is always properly hydrated before any makeup. All in all it's defintely one of my favourite bases.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Due to the popularity of this product, I wanted to like it. But. It was terrible on my skin. It basically slid off my face. I tried it with primer, setting spray, setting powders. It would not stay on. It almost looked like it rubbed off my nose after an hour. Had to keep reapplying it. Will not purchase again.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Closest thing I’ve found to a foundation that my skin will tolerate. Good coverage, makes my complexion look very even and soft. It is a bit drying around the eye and mouth area if I wear it a few days in a row.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this since it was sold on QVC—not even in stores at Sephora or ulta. I have to say this is forever my holy grail. I have very dry skin and I never get flaky or have dry patches. I ALWAYS get compliments on my skin when I have this on. Plus I love having 50spf, I wear SPF anyway but it’s nice to have a little extra.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finally found my holy grail foundation! Coverage is full yet buildable. A little goes a long way and it doesn’t irritate my sensitive skin. Doesn’t look cakey or get shiny on my oily skin either.

reviews.review_title: Blendable and great coverage if you use it right
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think most of the bad reviews are just people using in conjunction with too many other products that aren’t compatible with this. It has a LOT of skincare ingredients so it works incredibly and feels great. Use on well moisturized skin and skip the heavy makeup primers and you will be obsessed with this stuff too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! Provides great coverage & doesn’t look cakey. The coverage is buildable and blends out really easily. Perfect everyday foundation, definitely a new favorite of mine. Highly recommend!!

reviews.review_title: you’ll never need another foundation again
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favourite product! I used to struggle to find a foundation that gave good coverage. I recommend using moisturizer before & setting powder after. Looks like my actual skin- I’ll never buy anything else!

reviews.review_title: Not for women with dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I read great reviews on this product and as the product says for women 50+ thought I would try it. I was disappointed. I have dry skin with some fine lines and found that even in small lines it seemed to sit right in the lines and actually make my face look like it had more wrinkles than I did. I had even applied a good moisturizing face cream prior to applying the foundation and it just seemed to enhance my wrinkles.  I ended up taking it back to the store and will try something else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used this, loved it, and then thought I’d try every other brand on the market….only to come back to this!! This CC+ cream is so natural looking (I have dry skin, so sometimes I’ll add a drop of oil to a pump of the cream and it’s the PERFECT mix - so natural, looks like I’m not even wearing makeup!). I just started using it with the IT primer, it lasts allllll day - best combination ever!! I’ve learned my lesson and won’t be straying from IT again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I asked my attendant what foundation they had on they showed me this: a buildable, skincare focused and SPF CC cream. It does not act like your usual terrible BB/CC cream because it goes on and stays looking like butter. Buy this NOW

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love this product it covers up what I need it too but is super lightweight

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it. I’ve been using this for several years now and it hasn’t disappointed in terms of the formula. It doesn’t fully cover dark spots but it makes your skin look better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think this is a great quality product and it is hydrating with excellent coverage but, and big but, is that it’s very heavy on the skin and over-the-top dewy. I’m not sure if it still has snail mucin in it but I think that contributes to the heavy texture. It’s good to try out here & there but I find it too much for everyday use.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this CC cream! it gives good coverage but still feels dewy and fresh on the skin. The only problem I've found is that it doesn't last super well as it'll start to get patchy and come off in places after a long wear, but again it's a cc cream and not a foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Medium to full coverage, very natural/ glowy finish. My new favorite! Feels lightweight on the skin. High SPF protection. I have acne prone but dry skin this does not break me out and leaves my skin feel hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes a long way! Excellent coverage for a CC cream and feels super light on the skin

reviews.review_title: girl, don’t do it, it’s not worth it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this out! For the spf, the coverage, and long lasting effect! The reviews were mixed but I decided to try it out for myself!  At first, it’s not as light in shade as it appears to be. It was acutely orange. It does go on very nicely, I would say it’s medium to light coverage, it’s buildable though.   After a couple hours… my face was ✨ S H I N Y✨ It was as if I put a bunch of oil on myself!  It creases badly as well has fades within 2 hours.   I would not buy this again or even recommend this to anyone except maybe someone with extremely dry skin.   (First pick is clean fingers, second is a single swipe of forehead)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got the shade light to medium with pink undertones and it was supposed to be on the cool toned side. Well this was straight orange, so I went to sephora to exchange it and seen all the colors in person. Even within the medium range all the colors were either orange or yellow. I enjoyed the formula, but the shade range Is worse than the drug store. In my entire life I have never seen anyone with an orange undertone, so for a company to produce this, makes me believe they are cheap and uneducated. They should market this as a color corrector and not an actual cream or foundation. I’ll stick to my classic tarte or Bobbi brown!

reviews.review_title: the foundation i always go back to
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i'm in my late 30's and my skin appreciates the coverage and dewiness that this foundation provides. for me, it looks better when i apply it with a foundation brush versus a sponge; it also lasts longer with a setting spray.

reviews.review_title: Made packaging smaller… same price, same fl. oz?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not sure if IT cosmetics thought people wouldn’t notice, & I know that shrink-flation is happening…. But the bottle I bought 6 months ago is about half an inch bigger than the one I just purchased today…. But the bottle does not list a less amount of fluid ounces of product. So what’s going on here? Also, the shade range is atrocious. I am a natural red head with fair skin & pink undertone. There’s only 2 shades to choose from for a pink undertone which are extremely tan. NOT “light” or “fair” whatsoever….. I can make it work in the summer when I’m a bit more tan but in the winter they are entirely too dark & orange. Anyone with a porcelain skin tone cannot wear their lightest product. “Fair” which is listed as an “ivory shade” goes on tan…

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unwearable! I have light skin with pink/cool undertones and even with one of the lightest shades it appears very dark with a hideous orange tint. The coverage and formula is great but the shades need major updating.

reviews.review_title: shades are off- but a beautiful finish!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So, I love almost everything about this foundation. The coverage is high, which I don’t wear every day but for special occasions and photography it’s great to have. It blends very nicely with a sponge. The wear is long and it’s a nice finish that’s not too dry but also not terribly shiny.  However - I’m a very fair skinned person. The lightest shade available, supposedly “fair light,” is incredibly orange on me. It’s probably 3-4 shades darker than my skin tone. So I either need to have a fake tan for it to match me, or I have blend it all the way down my neck and even my chest sometimes. I don’t know how they can call that FAIR LIGHT.  So, If they offered more accurate shades, this would be an A+, amazing foundation.  I know they are able to go that light, as I also have the “your skin but better foundation” in a fair and that shade is a perfect match.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I mix with a 1/3 moisturizer. Goes on evenly—no time and effort to blend it  in. Doesn’t settle into pores. And it looks like skin, not makeup. When I’m using this foundation, I can skip concealer. Love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used this product almost everyday for about 2 years. I used to have very oily skin which is why I loved this product, but am finding my skin becoming intensely dry. My forehead, no matter how much exfoliation, Dennis Gross Alpha Beta wipes, moisturizer, or what time of the year it is, is extremely dry. Peeling even. It’s been this way for about 8 months. I’m starting to think it must be this product and the ingredients in it.   Other than that, the tone of my skin is absolutely beautiful when I wear it, but I think I’m going to move toward using a BB cream for the sake of my skin health. My forehead is so dry that it appears there’s a wrinkle in my glabella region and the makeup has only been amplifying it.  Wonderful product for the first year but it may be time to move on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: usually a shade “fair light” would be perfect but I would have to go with the lightest shade for this product. love it though feels very nice with good coverage

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This didn’t work for me. I wanted it to because it has good ingredients but it was way too heavy for me, and while it technical covered everything it made my skin look super textured. Just not for me. I have some other it products that are really good - like their blush. This one was just way too thick and heavy for my liking.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
