reviews.review_text: Super full coverage and added benefit of sunscreen!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: greasy, no coverage. Probably will not try this brand again for anything.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Good coverage and felt light on my skin but did settle into pours and looked cakey right after application. Tried different methods of application (hands, brush, beauty blender dry & wet) and always use Urban Decay finishing spray but couldn’t get it to look good on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes a long way. Love it for just quick outings, gives a very naturally dewy look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Although I did a shade match in store and liked the colour, this product oxidises and transfers like crazy- didn’t know I looked like an oompa loompa until one of my friends pointed it out to me. I wouldn’t recommend this to anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Omg this product is amazing! It blends well on the skin and made me look younger, healthy and glowy.. a must have. Highly recommended

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: How are you as a makeup brand in 2021 going to have this crappy of a shade selection? Someone needs to take notes from Rihanna...

reviews.review_title: It was fun while it lasted
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved it for 2 days. Then the pump stopped working. I’ve fiddled with it for days. Will give up and toss it this weekend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to finally find a cc cream with spf in it especially this much.... but I am so disappointed. The shade shown in the pictures is way off from what it actually is. I am fair skinned and thought this shade would be perfect, however it is so dark I don’t even think I could use it in summer. I read the reviews saying the same thing I’m saying now but hoped for the best since it was too late to cancel the order and I really wish I looked at them more beforehand. The undertones aren’t even pink like it claims I’d say it’s closer to the yellow side of neutral undertones. Very disappointed :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not a fan of the think formula. The shade is a lot darker than I thought, the difficulties of light/medium to medium because you never know how it looks until you try it. May be okay for summer. Coverage is as expected.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It Cosmetics' CC+ Cream with SPF50+ is the perfect anti-aging foundations. It gives you the sunblock that is needed and you can adjust the coverage by applying it lightly or heavily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! I use it in the summer or winter months and it works well even with my oily skin. I like the dewy look so this is just perfect. It has amazing skincare ingredients and spf which is a plus.

reviews.review_title: full coverage and safe for sensitive skin!!!!
reviews.review_text: my skin but better!!!!!! this is amazing, it has good skin products. gives you that hydrating glow. amazing on my skin. safe for sensitive skin and acne prone skin. this is full coverage!!!

reviews.review_title: Pas assez de choix de couleur
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: J'ai pris le produit le plus pâle et il est beaucoup trop foncé!! Au moins 3 shades au dessus de ma teinte, It Cosmetic, do better!!

reviews.review_title: More coverage than average CC cream!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn’t expect to love this product as much as I do. I’ve never been one for tinted moisturizers or CC creams because I always felt I needed more coverage but wanted to try a “quick” foundation alternative for work. I was so surprised over the coverage yet still feeling light and like my skin! So far my fave application is a damp beauty blender and I love that a little goes a loooong way. Most CC creams I feel I use double the amount to get the coverage I need. I have combo skin but drier in the winter and this has been great. Not getting oily at all mid day. I got medium and it works for my winter tone but I’ll def need something darker in the summer. I also feel like it’s been making my skin better with my added skincare routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t understand the hype behind this product. I received  a sample card with my Sephora order and was excited to try it out for consideration to purchase. I used the lightest sample shade, “Light.” It was so yellow and dark. My skin didn’t look better at all. It looked like I was ill and had jaundice. I was too embarrassed to go out in public like that so I toned it down with micellar water and used another foundation that was a better match for my skin tone. From reading the other reviews, I don’t think even the lightest shade would be a good match for me. I hope IT will work on its shade range for this product and hopefully I could try again at a later time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: No makeup look! Just fab! On my second tube and will definitely buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like this stuff a lot, but I ended up returning it because I was looking for a tinted moisturizer. The girl suggested this, but it’s definitely a foundation. It has great coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is magic!!! I have severe redness and blemishes and this stuff worked so well. I havent worn make up in a year and was worried it would come out dry and caked.  I’ll attach a photo of me without (in bathroom lighting) and a photo of me with the It Cosmetics CC cream in natural lighting (portrait mode used) it’s a huge difference! It did get a tiny bit patchy after 5 or so hours but that didn’t surprise me, it was hot where I went.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I haven't touched a drop of foundation since I found this 4 years ago. Glorious. Perfection. Where were you my entire life?!?!?!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have never had as many compliments on my rosacea dry skin as I have since using this. My only complaint is even the lightest shade will oxidize yellow on my pink skin.  This is my fave foundation.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Too dewy and didn't set, it ended up melting on my face. Other than that it felt good on my skin and was a   good coverage and color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The finish is kinda nice, which is unexpected given how thick this cc cream is. I'm usually more of a light-medium shade but purchased fair-light after consulting a rep at Sephora. This shade was SO orange and still too dark after application and did not improve after oxidation. I don't understand the hype as the shade range is really disappointing.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So light and natural looking. Blends easily and evenly.

reviews.review_title: lightest shade too dark and yellow
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really looking forward to this product as I have heard great reviews about it, but even the lightest shade was too dark for me. I really never even considered myself as having that fair of skin, especially in the summer, but the lightest shade is for warm undertones, which I am not, so it looked very yellow on me. I was very upset, because I really wanted this to work for me. Wish they would come out with more inclusive shades. If it matches your skin, I think the consistency was very nice and good coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Tryed it because of the hype. I'm so disapointed. It is hard to blend for a CC cream, my skin look dull and shiny, my pores look enlarged and it sits in my creases. It's the first time I hate an item enought to consider a return

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For years I have searched for a foundation that offers full coverage without looking cakey or overdone. This cc cream by IT cosmetics is IT. It blends right into your skin, leaving a natural looking coverage that somehow masks imperfections (even on bad skin days) while still being hardly noticeable. Also, most foundations cause me to break out after a full day’s wear, but this one actually seems to improve my skin at the end of the day. I haven’t used any other foundation since I bought this one 2 years ago. I switch between shades depending on time of year and sun exposure.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing coverage! I use this as my everyday cc cream/foundation because it really does look like “your skin but better.” Just one thin layer will cover my dark under eyes and uneven skin tones. This also lasts the entire day for me. I will note that the colors do run a bit dark if you’re on the paler side. I have the shade Fair Light, and I know it will definitely look a bit off during the winter months. I also think the shade description “ivory pink shade” does not exactly fit. I think it leans more yellow in reality. However, I will make it work because I love the finish so much!

reviews.review_title: Seriously don't get why it's so famous...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I hated this thing so much that I just created a Sephora account so I could complain about it! Heard so many good things about this product that I dreamt about it for a long time! Now I really don't get the hype. That product made my skin look so oily, and transferred on anything that would brush it. I have rosacea so I would just look ridiculous by the end of the day with my red nose. Also, it oxidizes quite a lot. Please, save your money!
My friend had tried this and recommended it to me, yes, this foundation make my skin really smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product on and off for many years now but keep coming back. I do not know what it is about this cc cream (basically a moisturizing foundation) but it makes my skin look extremely healthy. This does not emphasize texture and does not cling to dry skin patches on the worst of days. And on top of it all, this makes my skin glow. I don’t know what witchcraft this is but I always receive comments when I wear this and people ask me if I have Botox or who my esthetician is. I would recommend testing in store because the colors don’t necessarily match the description online, but if you do find the right shade this is a 10/10 holygrail product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cc cream is totally worth the price. It’s buildable coverage so I can wear a full face if I want or just a small amount for every day. I’ve had this one tube for two years and it doesn’t seem to expire. I’m about to run out and I’m definitely going to get another

reviews.review_title: Orange city! not for fair skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used the shade match test and it advised to try the Fair Light shade. Upon first swiping some of the product on, it looked like it would be a good match. When blending out, the product quickly turned orange! It also clings to dry spots, giving the effect of some sort of sickly pumpkin. Will immediately be returning. This is definitely not for fair skin tones. I'm not sure if the formula would work with any tone if they have dry skin. With such a limited shade range, no true fair shade and no true dark shade, it feels like a rushed job.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this CC+ cream and I love that it has SPF 50+! I like the natural look it gives me and it doesn’t feel heavy on my skin or dry my skin out! It does a good job at evening out my skin tone! It’s nice that it’s still buildable for fuller coverage when I need that! I use this instead of heavy foundation! The only down side is that it’s a small tube for how expensive it is but for me it’s worth it!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I think it is great overall. I was looking for a light makeup but more coverage than some other tinted moisturizers and this has done the trick.

reviews.review_title: Lot of air in the cream package
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The cream was not full, it has air inside and coverage wise I didn’t like the product too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was surprised by how much I like this it makes my oily textured skin look beautiful and even all day and I didn’t find it heavy at all and it didn’t crease for me either. Like on a day when I wake up feeling ugly and like I look rough & tired this product makes me feel beautiful and look well rested and bright! Highly recommend if you have oily skin like me!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One day after using this my face was terribly broke out. Gave me pimples

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It has REALLY strong smell, coverage is a bit caky and not the right color. In summary, Not a good cost-benefit product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was raved about so much I had to jump onboard and try it! And boy was I disappointed.  It’s thicker, and it feels heavy on the skin. It causes me to get crease lines and appear very oily (continuously applying powder and I have combo skin). Also oxidizes.  Would not recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage, nice finish but the Color is GRAY on me, I look like a vampire every time I wear this foundation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin , after putting moisturizer well ,i apply it and it turns amazing after setting it up with powder lightly

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I hate wearing foundation in the summer (and year round too) and this is only thing I wear now when I want coverage but dont want a heavy feeling. it is very light on my skin and  thanks to a friend's recommendation I've used it for almost 4 years now

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great product for complete coverage-I bought it but it's a little light for me so I have to make sure not to put so much on and then use my darker powder over which works. For the first time use tiny amount because it spreads and cover good

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cream was light, matched skin tone and covered dark spots. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. I used to always use a very heavy/high coverage foundation and needed a change - This cc cream has been perfect. It has a good amount of coverage (and very buildable!) while still being super moisturizing and light weight feeing. Lasts me all day and blends out really nicely with cream bronzer/blush. I have re-purchased several times!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was super happy to try this CC cream but I was disappointed in the end. I mean it cause on nice but I feel like it over casts on my skin, it looks like  I have foundation on. Also, I have really pale skin so the “Fair” shade is STILL to tan for me :/ Over all a good product but if you are looking for that natural finish, you better skip ahead and stick with Korean BB creams. I know I’ll be going back to my usual import.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Got a sample and was pleasantly surprised. Actually pretty good coverage. High medium coverage. But I got very oily throughout the day with it.  Good if you want something to put on with coverage and spf. Not for going out ect

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Its an excellent foundation, great coverage, Stays long and keeps skin hydrated. Would certainly recommend

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Tan - light brown shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It’s to oily and not full coverage even when I put primer and setting spray so overall I rate it a 2 out of 10.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Needs one colour lighter! I am pale but I still have a bit of colour and the lightest shade is too dark for me. One shade lighter would be great for the ultra pale, redheads etc. Love the formula and SPF though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yes!  This CC is the best.+ SPF50 a plus!  Natural finish. HIghy recommanded !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only daily face coverage I will use. it does not cake on and it provides full coverage. I love that it has a higher spf than other makeup. the color looks like it's super orange but it works and blends so well on POC. I do not need a color corrector on my lower face using this product. It can be matte or dewy depending on your finishing powder/spray. It is not drying and does well on aging skin. Lasts a very long time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so impressed with this!! I have extremely fair skin that's kind of olive and after using mineral sunscreen that makes me a little too pale I put this on and I have normal color!! It stays on all day with no touch ups! I used almost no undereye concealer!! Did not come off under my mask!! I am just so impressed I threw away my Nars tinted moisturizer that made me look yellow and greasy. This stuff is my new every day necessity! Love

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE THIS CC CREAM! Very natural and beautiful finish, the only CC cream I will use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Nice coverage but needs to work on shade range. The sunscreen being mixed in made my skin a little itchy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really don't write much reviews but this one worth one. This foundation does NOT blend in your skin, and it makes your skin looks worse than it really is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best makeup I have every had. Hands down. Having fair colored skin and a touch of Rosacea, it was hard to find a makeup that could cover my redness, people thought I had blush on all the time. This right here is the one, what is best it has SPF 50+ in it as the sun is not my friend. I will use for a life time as long as my shade/formula is available.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best products I have ever used on my face. The coverage is amazing and radiant. I have been using the IT cream now for about 3 years and don't even bother with anything else. Typically I buy the illuminated version in the summertime. This is truly my go to foundation/cc cream and I recommend it to everyone! It can seem too heavy for some, however I truly believe they are probably using too much product as a little dot on each cheek (smaller than a pea!) will do!

reviews.review_title: Perfect for any look any time!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased this 3+ times.   Works with literally everything for me - sunscreens, creams, face oils, makeup brushes/blender, hands(fav!), etc.   I use less than a pea size for my face & neck. Absolutely love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this for mother and now I want to get it because it so good. It gives you coverage while also giving you glowy skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I say this is full coverage it really is! Makes me skin also still look like skin will being super full coverage. The only downside it starts to separate when only hours have gone by. I say wear it on days you can’t doing anything too active more for less activity. But I still repurchase this because it’s awesome

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Want to like the CC cream.  Product is too chalky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Holyyyy molyyyyy I’m telling you it does what it says. All my dark discolouration is gone and I don’t even need concealer. It feels like your applying on foundation but blends so smoothly like a cream. This is what I use everyday at work and it has me glowing.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My first time using a CC cream and I love it. I bought this in-store with 20% off (yay). It's great when you don't want full coverage, like during the daytime or under bright lights. Subtle and makes skin look even. Will be buying again!

reviews.review_title: holy grail!! a little goes a long way
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I keep coming back to this after trying other products. I learned that small dots on the face then blending it out is the best way to apply. A little goes a LONG way with this. If you put too much it will be cakey and heavy.  This is one of the best products on the market.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I would HIGHLY recommend this foundation. You may need to set it with powder but my skin has improved so much using this. It also has SPF which is an added bonus! :)  Get a lighter shade (by 1-2 shades), than you'd usually purchase for a perfect match.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start by saying this Had amazing coverage. On the first day I used it A few hours after applying I noticed I looked really greasy but that was fixable with powder. That night I took my makeup off and washed my face and noticed breakouts on my chin and for head. I know it takes some time for your skin to adapt to new products so I continued to use this product for about a week but the breakouts continued on the forehead and chin , so I took a break for a couple Weeks and then decided to give it one more try so I did use it for another week and the breakouts returned on the chin and forehead so I had to stop using it. For reference I use the too faced born this way foundation and have used this for years and have never had any issue with breakouts or looking greasy so it must be something in this product that caused breakouts :(.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best foundation I have found for dry skin. It is full coverage and lasts all day. I love the dewy look without looking greasy.  I have tried Lancôme, Giorgio Armani, bare minerals and I think this is better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This comes across as way too yellow—definitely not ivory pink with cool undertones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: if full coverage is 100%, this coverage would be around the 70-75% range. it takes a while for the product to settle unless you use a powder. just as some of the reviews, a tad disappointed as it oxidizes slightly to a shade darker though not orange but more sort of an in-between shade darker before the next shade. PAO = 6m.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This makeup is moisturizing and covers my redness well.  Good color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think this product made me break out A LOT. It’s also really cakey and doesn’t feel very nice on the skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The lightest shade was still far too dark for my fair skin. Disappointing, since I like everything else about the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Probably the best foundation ive ever used. love the coverage personally and it lasted all day paired with the Milk Makeup primer. I took 1 star off because it goes on a little darker than I expected especially for lightest shade but the finish is beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was a really great CC cream, it lasted throughout the day and I love it has a built in sunscreen. It’s a bit heavy so I only needed 1 pump. The product definitely goes a long way. It’s also full coverage and it’s totally buildable. It goes on really smooth and didn’t feel or look cakey on my skin and was really hydrating. I still needed to use primer though before applying.

reviews.review_title: Not For Fair Skin With A Cool/Pink Undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: To the person who described this color as an “ivory pink shade with cool undertones,” this color is a complete fail! I normally use Dr. Jart Premium BB Beauty Balm but I wanted to try something with a tad more coverage and SPF to get through the sweltering hot Texas 100° days and 52% humidity. I found this CC cream to be very sick and I looked orange. Not only was the color orange but my cheeks look like orange peels because you could see my pores which are typically pretty small. It also made my skin look dehydrated and it’s actually very healthy. The color is too dark for a true porcelain skin tone. I’m 58 years old with combination skin and this product made me look older.

reviews.review_title: Great texture, but the color is a bit dark
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have really dry skin and I love how this product goes on very moisturizing, doesn't crack, and doesn't settle into my lines even after a full day of wear (with mask!) The only downside is that the Light is a bit too dark and warm for my skin, and I usually get shades in the Light range. It definitely looks darker than it does in the product images.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product.  I've been using this for at least 2 years.  Love the coverage because it is not too heavy.  Also, the SPF factor of 50 works very well.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this foundation, especially because of the extra SPF, but it dried out my skin within the first 5 days of wear. It was harsh on my skin and made my my pores and fine lines look worse. I did not look cute.

reviews.review_title: SO HEAVY looking, settles into pores and lines
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I want to love it. If I was only judging by putting it on the outer triangular space of my cheeks, it's great. But WOWWWWW this stuff is HEAVY coverage and definitely emphasizes pores and lines. I have normal skin, with dehydration but NOT true scaly looking 'dry skin' with fairly TINY pores and no wrinkles and uh... I felt like I was in clown makeup. So, with needing SO little, I can't imagine the SPF coverage was at 50, since you need a lot of product to make that happen. The 'finish' was good but honestly it was just so thick and dense and my pores looked massive after an hour. Such a bummer. Will return.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you have acne/problem skin this product is for you. It doesn't make you break out and it is VERY full coverage while still looking natural. SO GOOD.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a very uneven and red skin tone, but I like to use bb and cc creams in the evening at home just to not hate my face so much. I sometimes wear them under total coverage foundations. I purchased this along with a full coverage long last full foundation, and have NOT used the foundation. This has AMAZING and flawless coverage, and off this one product I’m considering switching my entire makeup line to this brand. Flawless finish, I sweep it over my face with my fingers then use a beauty blender to finish. I have never been more impressed with a skin care product

reviews.review_title: Not if you like minimal coverage
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Nice product however it is not for anyone that likes minimal or little coverage with their foundation. It is very thick and just looks caked on; I thought I used a minimal amount but it was just noticeably sitting on my face and was not flattering. If you are looking for a full coverage cream I would suggest trying, otherwise I would keep on looking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is very full coverage and felt extremely thick on my face. Was hoping this would be more of a light tinted moisturizer but it is definitely not. Don't buy unless you're ok with a thick cream. Tried to return but past the 60 day mark so stuck w/ it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was in a Sephora store, wanting to buy a tinted moisturizer with SPF that's been discontinued so an employee recommended this. It was OK at first, but noticed by mid-day, my skin was shiny and felt as if my skin couldn't breathe. Two weeks later, I noticed bumps around my mouth and chin. This was the only thing that changed in my skin routine so I can safely deduce that this is what's causing the bumps. I will be returning this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this product!!! I have a very sensitive skin with eczema on the face and I was struggling with make up drying out my skin and not covering up all my redness. This product is hands down the best product I’ve used so far! The cover is amazing and it feels so light on my skin.

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product can be very full coverage! I find myself just needing half a dot to cover my whole face which is great for summertime. I go back and forth on how I feel for this as I have been using this product for about a year now, sometimes it wears really well and other times it looks caked on which is something I am still trying to find the balance between. I love how it has SPF included in the product. I think it is a great start foundation for someone who wants to work towards wearing a full base that has buildable coverage and know your skin is protected.

reviews.review_title: Must have for blemished and discolored skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love, love, love these CC creams. I have a lot of blemishes and acne spots on my skin, but just a pump of this covered them up completely! And it doesn't look cakey. I wish they would make a line without SPF so they would wear better at night. You can have a light/medium coverage if you use less product and apply with a beauty blender, or you can build up a few layers for excellent coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is simply the best base product on the market. If you have acne/texture and foundations tend to settle into them or crumble up by the end of the day, this will not do that. It looks JUST like your skin with a hint of glow (oily gals, beware) and wears away like a dream. Nothing else compares to this!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I no longer use foundation - this is all I need! It was great coverage without being too heavy on my face. I've seen an improvement in my skin since using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had really high hopes for this CC cream foundation when the light foundation I used for years was discontinued. I am lazy at best when it comes to skin care, but I’m in my forties and getting annoyed with signs of aging popping up, so I sought out a multitasking product. I found the ease of IT’s one product CC cream really drew me in. Unfortunately, their lightest shade was too dark for me. How disappointing. Widen your shade range, IT! You’ll have a customer in me if you do, and I’ll be loyal to a fault if it works as I’ll be too lazy to change.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had such high hopes due to all the reviews but this is so patchy on my skin and doesn’t blend no matter what I do. So disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new Holy Grail foundation! It has a thicker consistency which is a little odd for a cc cream but the coverage is amazing and it makes your skin look absolutely incredible! Even though it has a thicker consistency it feels lightweight! It is not drying and leaves the skin looking very smooth and supple! If you’re debating this product, give it a try!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: amazing coverage! doesn't get cakey! blends out well w either brush or sponge, and works well in layers if needed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really do love the formula of this CC cream but the shade range is really frustrating. I am pretty pale and especially pale during winter. The colors are so much darker than the pictures make it look. I really wanted to love this but the lack of options for anyone with super light skin or for people of color make this pretty rough for me.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Goes on smooth. Blends well. Good coverage for being lightweight.

reviews.review_title: Dilute the CC cream with a face moisturizer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I agree with the other reviews that say this product is to dark for fair skin tones. Here's what helped me: mix a small amount of the CC cream with your moisturizer on your finger tips, then apply. The dilution of the CC cream makes it more sheer, less thick, and lighter in color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to love this product so much but could not. This is not a cc cream it is straight up foundation...and not the lightest one. They wanted to compensate the white cast by making the shades darker that they need to be , but still the white cast is HORRIBLE... The color range is crazy poor and emphasizes all of the skin imperfections. The only good point to highlight is how it is confortable on the skin , even though it is not lightweight it stays on the skin really well without moving or adding shine nor feeling cakey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product, I tried it for about a week but ended up hating it. The coverage was great and I got several compliments on my skin, but it was so heavy and oily! It slid all over my skin and after about 2 hours it began to crease and smudge. It rubbed off on everything and everyone, and it was so thick that after 3 days my makeup brushes were so funky I couldn’t even use them. It was nearly impossible to get out of my brushes. It definitely clogged my pores because within one week I had two breakouts, which I have not had in many years.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm very pale and was hoping this would match me skin tone - my tanned summer tone or regular tone - but it unfortunately is way too dark. I thought I actually picked the wrong shade it's so dark. I got the second lightest shade and it's completely off from the pictures on here. The formula feels great and it covers well but other than that, not good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Makes my skin super oily. I would recommend this for someone with dry skin complexion.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product.  This product gives full coverage but doesn't feel like you are wearing a lot of makeup, which I like.  I love that this is a CC cream and has SPF.  My skin has had fewer breakouts after I started using this foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If your oily like me this cc cream/foundation works well during the cold weather. I love how makes my skin feel. I typically use half a pump for my entire face and neck. I like the coverage since I tend to get PIH from acne. However during summer time after a few hours it makes me super oily. So I will only recommend using this during the colder months. If you live in a hot/humid climate and are oily like me this won’t work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has great coverage and with spf 50, I wish I could love it but even the fair is too dark for me. If there was one shade lighter I’d buy it again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely LOVE this CC cream. Such great coverage!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good for mature skin because it is very dewy and doesn't sit in pores. It is FULL coverage. It has a strong lemon like smell and didn't really set with powder. I will keep trying it though

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my second time buying this item, but this time I am very disappointed due to the bottle only having half the product and the half being air and it's even hard to get product out the bottle. It is very expensive for only half the product and it was better when I got it from amazon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for years, nothing I've ever tried compares to this. I get so many complements on how my skin looks flawless. Everyone I have recommended it to loves it as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! I went in wanting something with more coverage than a normal BB Cream but not as thick and heavy as foundation. This is it. has great coverage and leaves my face feeling so soft. I do not have a lot of spots or blemishes on my face though. my under eye bags, however are slightly darker and this also helped brighten it up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It applies nicely and I want to love this but I don’t. It doesn’t hold up well throughout the day (combination skin that is sometimes dry). It transfers and smears easily even with setting spray. Will not repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this product. I have recently broke out with hormonal acne from a switch in medication, and this CC cream has definitely helped me to keep my confidence while I try to get it under control. My skin is dry and this cream glides well, even over the dry/broken patches. I pair it with the Hydro Grip Primer and it works wonders to cover up my scars and red patches. Plus it has SPF 50+ which is a bonus!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Here we are 7 years after I discovered this product and it is still my favourite. I tried so many tinted moisturizers (including It Cosmetics liquid version of this) but this is still my go to. I use a drop of this and spread across my skin with my fingers, result is natural and almost undetectable. I use another drop on areas I need more concealing. The reason I keep coming back to this cream is because results are consistent, it always looks nice, doesn’t make my face look oily or dry, doesn’t breakdown weirdly throughout the day and plays nice with ANY sunscreen! I think I figured out how this manages to always look the same, it’s because it is a cream and not a liquid. It already has built in skincare in it that makes it glide across the skin. Whereas liquid formulations are so thin they are affected by the type products you put under them, oil vs oil free moisturizer, mineral vs chemical sunscreen, primer etc.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was not expecting to love this. I was going on vacation and wanted to give this a try since it has great SPF snd its full coverage. Oh my gosh it really is lovely. I will definitely wear it anytime I know I’ll be outdoors. This is legit full coverage and lasts all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: oh my gosh my skin looks good and feels naked and I love that part soo much but I'm sooo sad that it isn't really my shade. I can fix it by applying a very yellow pale foundation so it blends more into my natural skin color at my neck. It also runs a bit dark..  I ordered light like usual but it is too dark. I'll need to order the lightest shade to try it out but I wish they had more shades soo much. I need me light golden olive. I'm definitely too warm for this. I think pink undertones are very lucky because this foundation looks like it'd match them. maybe peachy neutral skins too but definitely not my yellow. that being said, I'm 31 and I don't think you can see it in my skin with this stuff. I definitely look younger.

reviews.review_title: Bought light by accident. Fair must be good
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Light is very tan or orangey, get fair if you’re light, shouldn’t have that chalky white colour some lightest shades have in other lines. The fairest shade is what I should have gotten but I’ll mix my colours to get something right and see how and if it works with my skincare and primers so I don’t have to return it since it does minimize pores and upon first use seemed like it could be a good product. As others mentioned the spf is blocked out by a silver sticker on mine aswell. I did want to return it based on that alone. I’ll honestly try it but I’m skeptic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have tired setting it so many different ways but just rubs off my touching my face, also has a strong smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Do not use if you have acne prone skin. Looked great during the day but made me break our horribly after a couple uses.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff! Offers sun protection and great, buildable coverage that doesn’t look overdone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After my skin cleared up I wanted to start using CC and BB creams for a more natural look. I had my eye on this product for a whole now but after reading some of the reviews I wasn’t sure if I should buy it. Finally I saw it go on sale and thought ok now is the time and I got my summer shade in Tan. The coverage on this thing is incredible, I barely had to use any product for my entire face and it looked beautiful! I was so impressed and thought this was my new holy grail. I wore it out later that day to go out in the heat and having to put a mask on top of it as well and I’m so impressed to say that it did not come off of my face at all! When I got home it looked like I just did my makeup and I had it on for 7-8 hours. It really is a great product and I would highly recommend it and honestly give it try despite some reviews that were negative because it really is beautiful on the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this, but sadly, after trying the two lightest shades, I must conclude this isn’t for me. Way too dark and noticeable contrast with my neck. It’s a shame because I do like the product, overall, but there was just no good option for my skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This skin-loving, color-correcting full coverage foundation

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not a fan of this one.  I picked it up during quarantine and so was unable to try it on comfortably in the store.  When I got home I found it was way too opaque and almost pancake-makeup- like.  Didn't really blend in with my skin tone. I understand that the opacity is probably due to the sunscreen, but I felt it really made my skin look heavily made up and, frankly, old.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The sales attendant was very professional and understood my needs. Somehing very hydrating with SPF in It.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This CC cream is a bit on the thick side, however, it’s a really nice and smooth CC cream with great SPF! It’s not super heavy on face nor lightweight. The coverage is medium to full. It stays on nice and doesn’t get oily and doesn’t get caky; I just set it with a setting powder which I always do with every foundations. It didn’t clog my pores nor gave me any breakouts.

reviews.review_title: Good if they have your color
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this after hearing years’ worth of hype. I finally bought it a couple weeks ago and was disappointed to discover that even the lightest shade is too dark for me. I’m not super pale, so this was a big letdown. The coverage is nice, although it can get a little dry, and the formula is definitely great given that it has SPF and it feels good on the skin. But this definitely won’t become my go-to product simply because the color match is off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only thing that smoothly covers my acne scars, and very decently covered my acne when it was at large. Only thing I would say is that it can get cakey really fast both otherwise? The coverage is amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This works so well on my combination skin. You only need a tiny bit to blend it out and works like a dream using a damp sponge. I use this as a creamy concealer too. My skin looks dewy and even, you’ll need to setting spray or good primer to keep it from melting but I use those products regardless. This is the one I always have on hand while I test out other brands, but always come back to repurchase. It’s so versatile that I don’t need to swap out in winter or summer. I can’t love this more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not sure why this product is so popular because it is very irritating and not flattering. It caused me blemishes and I never break out but this product caused that. The fragrance is horrible too. It never settles in skin, it’s like a mask that does not dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff! I apply serum, eye cream, sunblock and moisturizer and then 3 light dabs under the eyes, 1 on the nose, in between the eyebrows and on the chin. Set with setting powder. I cover the tube in packing tape because the silver packaging flakes off and gets on my skin. Super annoying but the tape wicked helps! I do it with my oil of Olay face wash too!

My adult daughter & I visited the Santee store & the employees were extremely helpful as she is deaf & with a mask on, it was difficult to communicate, but the gals were so patient & helpful & the product is just a perfect match for her skin tone & she loves it

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I finally tried this and was amazed at the coverage, which I had read a lot about. I didn’t need concealer, and barely needed powder. It felt good all day with practically no shine, and no flaking or dryness. If you like a full coverage look, this is for you. I’m sad at the lack of shade range on both ends of the spectrum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't like this. Its full coverage w an SPF and doesn't show your skin through. I read a review that said it was pretty lightweight and more like a BB/CC cream. But its quite thick and sits on top of the skin rather than feeling light and blended. Whether or not you like it depends on your preference for full coverage or semi.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the fair light shade and it was very dark on my skin and i mixed it with another foundation and it was fine. overall, it’s a good foundation. i will probably repurchase and buy a different shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Product looks so good on paper, but slides off your face. I love the benefits of this product, but no matter what I have tried I can’t get this to sit nicely on my skin for extended wear. And by extended wear, I mean more than 10 minutes. This product transfers, breaks up, sweats off. Ive tried different skin prep, different times of the year when my skin is more dry type, powders, setting sprays, everything. It just won’t sit nicely on my skin and stay there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Yikes, I love that it has SPF 50 but that's about it.  The color is orange and far too dark for my porcelain skin.  It sits in fine lines and cakes even if my skin is moisturized.  Will definitely not repurchase.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 100% my top fav! The great coverage, great color and easy blended. Even if you would like to reapply to do a touch up, it is great also! I would really recommended it to everyone! I have purchased 3+ of this product. I love it so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've bought this twice, and wanted so badly to love it (great coverage, great SPF!), but it is just ATROCIOUS on my skin. It totally breaks up on my skin and looks terrible within an hour or two. I've tried all sorts of skin prep, from various primers (silicone-based, oil, whatever I have on hand), just moisturizer, to applying to completely bare skin. Nothing has resolved this and since it's so med/full-coverage, you can really see the patchiness between the product and my skin when it breaks apart.  Wanted to love but cannot. (My skin is dry/combination: no real oiliness, but some dryness and a few zits on the go most days.)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased shade light and it oxidized into an orange colour before I could set with powder  PROS: high SPF content, pump design is hygienic CONS: narrow shade range, makes pores more visible, makeup creases

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My go to for years, I’m obsessed with the coverage and texture

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best SPF 50 foundation out there. Blends so easy and smooth. I ordered the sample size in medium to make sure it wasn’t too heavy or oily. Even though it says full coverage I think its more like medium which is what I wanted! Love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Now It’s my fav I love it, work’s great and it’s full coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the full coverage this offers but the lightest colour available is way too orange. So disappointing,

reviews.review_title: ingredients indicate presence of forever chemicals
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to LOVE this product as a holy grail but I have checked the ingredient list against the list of chemicals found to contain high amounts of PFAS and sadly this product contains multiple of them.  iT- please change your product to use cleaner ingredients for our skin and environment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Worth the price. Love the natural look with just a tiny drop of it. I use it almost every day just to even out my tone and it’s amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Amazing for dry skin. Just a lil blends in all face

reviews.review_title: Lack of color options that work
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The quality of this product seems nice, but the color is not even close! I got “fair light” and as a pale redhead with pink undertones, this is WAY too dark for me. Back it goes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I normally buy the Matte version of this, however decided to try this one for a change. I like it alot, great coverage, blends well and my skin looks so much better since using the CC creams. This time though the SPF was covered on the package, I'm wondering if there is no longer SPF in it, or just this version of the CC cream by IT cosmetics? The SPF was an important component for me so I hope it has it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have medium skin tone and got the shade medium. The undertone is way off. I like that it has spf and doesn’t leave my face super oily. I mix it with my Estee Lauder double wear foundation in the shade Ecru and it is the perfect shade. For me. I like both but still not sure about this product alone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have repurchased many times. It's semi-sheer coverage so you can mix it with moisturizer or SPF for a lighter look or finish it with a pressed powder for fuller coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product really is light weight and feels like nothing on your face. I love that it has SPF so my skins protected, Ive always had acne and extremely sensitive skin. This cc cream hasn’t caused it to worsen and doesn’t irritate my sensitive skin, it covers my redness and it’s perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this and asked for the lightest shade,.. due to Covid and odd store hours, I could not exchange it for the right color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I picked this up in hopes that it would be a good foundation mount for perioral dermatitis, as recommended on a news article that I was reading online… needless to say none of the shades are a good match at all for lighter skin tones, too dark.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: J’aurais voulu aimer ce produit, surtout qu’il a tellement de commentaires positifs, mais ce n’est pas le cas: je n’aime pas la texture qu’il laisse dans ma peau. C’est difficile a estomper et ce n’est pas naturel. Je suis déçue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly don’t get the hype around this products. It’s not smooth at all. It kinda falls apart after a few hours and looks AWFUL up close. So a waste of money. The only good thing about this product is spf50 but I’d rather use a tinted sunscreen

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: WOW. I have been a diehard fan of the Supergoop CC cream for about 10 years until they recently changed the formula. My aunt suggested this because she has used it for quite a while and always gets compliments. I used it for the first time today and it had made my skin glowing with a good bit of coverage that has lasted through a day of work and sitting outside in Texas humidity. I can’t necessarily speak for the anti-aging benefits yet but this is without a doubt my new diehard CC cream!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am always looking for a concealer that is smooth and doesn’t make my face look fake and caked on. I have tried 5 other brands and this one gives me the best coverage. I also love that it has SPF in it as well. This gives me good coverage for an all over application!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I have very sensitive skin so I was a little hesitant to try this out. I love the full coverage natural look it gives, my skin feels so soft after I use it too. The only thing is that I wish they would expand their shade range, 12 shades isn’t enough!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very disappointed because the SPF 50 doesn’t seem to be effective. I love everything about this cream except the fact that it doesn’t provide the sun protection that it claims. I have used other spf 30 or higher face sunscreen for years and those would protect from sunburn, this doesn’t. Very disappointed because I don’t think I’ll buy again.

reviews.review_title: Fair isn’t fair anymore; it’s orange
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this product for years. I loved it. The shade was a perfect match for me. I started a new tube this morning and it’s significantly darker, and turns orange when it sets. It’s unwearable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This CC cream is great because I don’t have to buy a concealer. I’ll apply my base coat then dab it under my eyes and on blemishes. 2-in-1 product for me! And who doesn’t love the 50 SPF?!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I actually purchased this threw the It Cosmetics website because it was sold out on here . I have had many CC creams and they where all more of a tinted moisturizer when I tried this one I fell in love . I have Melasma so  I have dark spots on my face but the worst part is you also get a greyish tint to some areas of your skin usually above your lip which I have and it looks like I have a mustache . I use amazing skin care products which all work but they won't get rid of it 100% anyways . This is they only product that completely covers it . I used to use La Mer Soft Fluid Long wear foundation which is over 100$ and it worked but did not completely cover , so this CC is my Holy Grail . If you suffer from hyperpigmentation try this because it is truly amazing and a little goes a long way . I had my sample size for 3 months using it 3 to 4 times a week

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Just got this in the mail because i’ve always heard how good it is and I’m shocked with how little there seems to be in it???? Not sure if Maybe i got unlucky with the one I was sent but it seems vert flat and like half empty?? Disappointed considering how damn expensive it is

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best cc + cream I used ever. I will buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited for this product because of the SPF content it had. To my surprise, when I received the product there were silver stickers over the SPF 50+ text on the box and product. I’m assuming this means the product no longer has the SPF in it which defeats the whole purpose of buying the product for me.  I also patch tested it on my face and it oxidized SUPER orange. I was so excited for this and was unfortunately let down by it. :(

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - natural beige shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Full coverage, protected from the sun with spf 50 and natural looking skin? How is that possible? Must grab for your everyday face

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Matte finish so if you're looking for something dewy, this isn't it.  Doesn't break me out. Medium to full coverage, has SPF 50.  Can be a little dry/cakey on the skin if you don't properly work it in.  I've been told beauty blender helps but then you lose some of the SPF protection.  Otherwise, very happy and will continue to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So disappointed in this.  Not only is the lightest shade available still too dark for my skin, but this cream is heavy, hard to blend, and sits in every little wrinkle, pore, and fine line and makes them more accentuated - the opposite of what I was looking for!  Also, it's extremely difficult to wash off!  Will be retuning immediately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am honestly so glad I bought this!! Was a little hesitant at first. There are new skin tints and cc creams coming out all the time. I was using the born this way matte foundation before. I knew I wasn't happy with it for a reason. I am now switching from my old foundation to this! It matches my Skin Perfectly. Makes it look and feel like I barely have anything on my skin. Doesn't make my Oily skin worse. The staying powder is pretty great too. I also love the pump style. I live in Arizona so this is going to be my go to in the summer. It looks so much better on my skin than full coverage foundation. I guess my great new skin care routine is helping. I have gotten so many compliments when I wear this. People say my skin is glowing and looks healthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing! It doesn’t really look like I’m wearing makeup. It just looks like I have really great skin. Which I’m totally fine with. Mix in a couple of drops of DE d-bronzy and a little concealer under TVs eyes, and you’ve got an amazing glowing complexion. Also, I’ve never had a foundation that was a more perfect match for my skin tone! I think that’s the thing I’m most stoked about! Coverage is pretty dang good for a cc cream. My only complaint is that I do notice it starts slipping of my face after about 8 hours. But I also haven’t tried setting it with a spray or translucent powder. I’m sure that would make a big difference. But this cc cream is going to definitely be my go to makeup for all the casual days the spring-summer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Probably the best CC cream I’ve tried! A little goes a long way, especially if you use a brush instead of a beauty blender. It matches my skin tone perfectly to the point where it just looks like flawless skin. I love this formula because I hate thick, cakey foundation - especially in warm weather. I’ve worn this in 28 degrees celsius + weather and have worked out for an hour right afterward and the makeup still looked flawless! I used the Make Up Forever matte velvet concealer on top of it to cover any blemishes/dark spots.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The glitter in this stuff gets on all your clothes. DONT buy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used this product a few times and I haven’t figured out exactly how I feel about it. The first time I tried it I was surprised with how strong the scent is and by how this shade pulls kind of gray. I applied it with a beauty blender and the gray tint wasn’t visible after that. It give me a lot of coverage I wasn’t expecting from a CC cream, but I like more coverage from foundations so I didn’t mind that. I’ve been using this product with the milk hydro grip primer and throughout the day this foundation just breaks up and looks really cakey. I really want to like this foundation and maybe it isn’t working for me because of make current skincare routine or maybe I need to try a different primer with it. I’ll keep playing around with it to see, but I am disappointed that it looks so unflattering on me right now.

reviews.review_title: Doesn't last all day on me even with setting powde
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I do love this product, and the shade is a dream come true for me. However it lacks staying power.

reviews.review_title: A CC Cream that works like a Foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It has good coverage and the shade is a perfect match to my skin. I also like that it's nourishing to the skin and a little goes a long way, it conceals most problem areas and corrects unevenness.  I just add a bit to my face-blend, then touch up any remaining problem areas with a bit of concealer and done. It melts into my skin and doesn't feel heavy so it works for me, but if you are in search of light coverage this might be too thick for you. I am very satisfied with it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just fabulous. Easy to apply, great coverage, oil free...

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've repurchased this so many times - it has a lot of coverage, easy to work with and has great staying power. I also love that it has a pump!

reviews.review_title: First Time My Mom Complimented My Makeup
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok where shall I start?  Shade range: below average n the reason why I didn’t give this 5 stars. I got medium but the undertone is a bit of a miss. Cc Cream: pretty tricken good, the coverage is a chefs kiss, the spf is the cherry on top, the way this sits on my combo dry skin without even primer wow wow wow. I’ll continue to test it but so far loving it actually excited to get an excuse and wear this again. Also I’m on differin so skin is extra dry rn (flaky even) but this looked great! I recommend only if you have a shade match. My mom actually approved and she hates when I wear any form of foundation/cc/bb cuz she thinks it doesn’t sit well on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When it arrived it had stickers over the ‘SPF 50’ on both the packaging and tube, so I came and saw that a lot of people had the same issue. I emailed customer service and was assured that the product does have the specified SPF as in the item description. The colour did have a bit of an orange tint but overall it is fine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So, maybe if my skin was a perfectly even canvass this CC cream would have worked out, but it seemed to clump around my fine lines, dry patches, etc in a way that made my whole face looked parched and crusty. This was with moisturizer and primer.  I've tried a few different application methods and even different primers but this CC cream always coagulates in this bizarre way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it, it's so light like you have nothing on.  It also covers my minor blemishes and hyrates my flakey patches of dry skin here and there.  It also improved my skin as I kept wearing it.  A definite favorite out of all and I love my bare minerals but this has won out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly not mind blowing and I have had better it’s meh and for the price definitely would not recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I came on here to specifically tell everyone I spent 3 hours in the sun today and I’m so burnt to a crisp you could food a full breakfast that feeds 7 off my body with the heat it’s giving off. But my face?? Untouched. Because I was wearing it cosmetics cc cream. That SPF 50 is no joke. It saved my poor face from the damage. Love the finish, love the product, and trust me the SPF is a lifesaver for saving that youthful skin from the nasty sun! Just buy it girl, I’ve never found a better foundation with that high of SPF

reviews.review_title: Lightest shade is wrong tone for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a cool undertone, but fairly light is too dark for me. I end up wearing fair instead, but it it is too yellow. Please expand your shade ranges so I can find one that works for me. Otherwise, it provides great coverage and lasts most of the day.

reviews.review_title: pretty good - here's how it works for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really love that this foundation has SPF50, especially for use in the summer. I did find it a bit cakey though and it took some experimentation to make it really look great. I feel my best when I know my makeup looks good in person. I don't care too much for how it photographs to be honest. This is what I do to make this foundation work: Prep the skin with a face oil, then use a bit less than one pump of this foundation and blend out with a wet beauty blender (foundation brush just made it so darn cakey for me. oh man). When done blending out I'll use the clean side of the beauty blender to sheen out the areas under my eyes or where I have more visible pores because these areas I found would look the most cakey after the foundation dried down. Spray with Mac Fix+ and tap in Milk Blur stick with fingers in the areas I don't want to be super shiny. I gave one less star because the colour selection is really not that great. Fair is a too dark for me in the winter, but luckily I use this foundation for summer.

reviews.review_title: Full Coverage and Good for Your Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been a long time staple of mine! I love it as an everyday foundation for easy full coverage and SPF. It also doesn't break me out. If I am using a more medium coverage foundation and have some hormonal break outs, I'll use a small pump of this to amp up the coverage on those problem areas while still looking natural.   My only issue is that I wish it came in a fair neutral tone. It's pretty warm which I just blend it down thoroughly to combat, but some more undertones would be much appreciated.  Also, I have an oily T zone, and if I powder that area, I'm matte all day for those of you who might be oily and considering this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this by accident.. and I love it. Idk how it lasts through the day, but holy moly is it ever full coverage. Like a foundation where I actually don’t have to use concealer underneath for those red spots. Very impressed!
