reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Looks great at first but separates a lot during the day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The fair ivory shade is much darker than shown on the website. It’s very orange, not a match for people with pale skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the idea of this. I don’t mind the smell but find it a bit medicinal. The colour “Light” looks quite orange on my fair skin. I do find this a bit streaky and hard to blend but could just be the colour that I’m struggling with.

reviews.review_title: Not like it used to be.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used to absolutely love this product. This and the luminous one. Ever since Jaime sold the company the formula seems to have changed. It now is streaky and settles into my lines, never looks great and smears off my face even though I’m extremely dry. I also found now it emphasized my dry patches. I was excited when the added new colours so everyone could try it but now my colour is off and if the formula has changed like I think it at least it seems to be, then everyone isn’t able to experience what the hype was about. So disappointed. Every foundation I have loved gets reformulated or gets discontinued.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I liked this on a pre covid world, but it seems to have lost its ability to stay. I’ve noticed more and more that the product shifts on my face where my mask sits, and it’s settling in the fine lines on my forehead.  I used to love it, but I feel like the formula has changed; I’m on my second tube. Will be trying something different next go around.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this foundation! Feels amazing on the skin, blends super well and isn’t cakey at all. It gives a very covering, matte finish. Only complaint is that there aren’t many color options. I’m very pale and the fairest shade is too dark for me (champagne problem much lol). Other than that, great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this CC cream for so many reasons. It has amazing coverage, makes my skin look flawless, has high SPF, is long lasting, and a little goes a very long way. However at some point they changed the formula and now every shade I try is orange. If it were a better match for my skin I would use it forever, but I have finally given up trying to blend it - the is no way to transition away the orange.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using it cosmetics foundation for a few years. I recently bought the shade Fair…because my older ones had expired. I looked at my face in the mirror 2 hours later and i looked Cakey and super dry…..especially next to my chin areas…I did use a light moisturizer before putting this on…(the farmacy gel cream) maybe I’ll try it without but ugh…I don’t think I will be repurchasing…I will stick with the Josie Marian spf.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this formula, I can’t believe how well it works for my skin. I’d seriously given up on finding a hydrating, almost full coverage product that I didn’t have to set with powder. I love the coverage I’m still able to get and I use the tiniest amount. For anyone saying it’s too heavy, you’re probably using too much. I used a pea size dot, applied with my fingers, didn’t use ANY powder, had this on for about 12 hours and my dry skin looked flawless all day. It looked like I wasn’t wearing any make up too. I was shocked. Love the ingredients too and added SPF. Can’t imagine anything better for my skin during these coming summer months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a natural glow but slightly uneven tone and was looking for minimal coverage that would fix that but this wasn’t it. It mutes my face and makes me look ill. I am probably not using the right shade but then again the shades are very limited and pale. I also found that it only looks presentable when applied with a damp blender. I do love that it has zinc based spf which is why I bought this, so I will use it when I need daytime makeup until I run out. Probably better off using a good sunscreen with tinted moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is NOT a CC cream. It does not not color correct, nor is it light weight and skin like. This is a Foundation, and very full coverage. i bought it with expectation that it would make a good light tinted CC cream, but it's very heavy and not natual looking at all. I still like this very much, because it's very pretty. I would use it for events, not every day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i’m actually amazed at the coverage!!! I thought it was going to be cakey because of the full coverage, but it went on super smoothly and my skin looked awesome.   after about 8 hours the foundation had begun to separate around my nostrils, but the rest of my face still looked really good. I’m oilier there than the rest of my face though, so I wasn’t surprised.   I’m a perfect match for Fenty’s 120 shade in foundation and the fair was a pretty good match! i was worried because people were saying it was too dark but it looked okay on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thick and difficult to blend in and looks cakey. Returning this horrible foundation.

reviews.review_title: Nasty consistency. Worse makeup I’ve ever tried
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nasty formula. It pills and looks awful. I read similar reviews and assumed that those people didn’t moisturize their skin but, no, it’s the makeup. This foundation made me see wrinkles and lines I didn’t know existed. It pronounces your pores. It’s really the worst foundation I’ve ever tried. Going make to my Laura Mercier, which makes my skin glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing cc cream. Full coverage without being too heavy. I recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: great product overall! It is pretty thick but I understand because this has SPF 50 (which is awesome). My skin is still a little dry from the colder season so it does look a little Cakey but I’m sure once summer rolls around it will look much better! I did go a shade darker than my skin tone and I’m very happy with the match. Overall, I’d recommend this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Really wanted to keep this product as the coverage and appearance on my skin looked great, but unfortunately even their lightest shade was too tan for my fair complexion. Really wish they would expand their shade range, and at least reconsider their shown swatches/descriptions, as the Fair color looks like it would work for me, but then the actual coloring of the cream is so tan and dark, I could never wear it since it would have an odd cut off of foundation color at my chin line (see photo).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Man oh man I wanted to love this product. Sunscreen, pore blurring, amazing ingredients, and all in one product? Sign me up!   Spoiler. I didn't love it.  I tried to. I tried using it with primer, without primer, after moisturizer, with a brush, with my fingers, with a beauty blender, and nothing worked to make it look like I hadn't caked this stuff on like grade 8 me circa 2008.  Even worse, it went into fine lines I didn't even know I had - which is not optimal when I put it on for my 27th birthday lol. It went patchy on my dry spots. It slipped off where I was oily. It made my pores look HUGE. And, in florescent lighting, it made me look orange. Want to see an unflattering picture of this stuff in natural light? It's attached.   I wanted so badly for this to be the holy grail in my daily makeup routine, in which I have worked so hard on my skincare but still need a little coverage. I wanted to ditch my $10 foundation for a CC cream with all the benefits that my drugstore foundation was missing. Unfortunately, if this is my skin but better then I definitely don't want it.

reviews.review_title: Great ingredients and lasts all day
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only foundation I use. I've tried others like Too Faced and Urban Decay, but they either look cakey or don't last me all day. This one lasts all day and has a great natural finish. I used a mineral powder around my T-zone which gets oily throughout the day, because this is more of a dewy finish. Would highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this, but am returning it and going back to the bare minerals tinted moisturizer with spf. Even the lightest color is not light enough for pale skin. It also tends to cling to dry skin and fade off of other areas by midday- causing a patchy appearance. Very thick and it goes on well initially.

reviews.review_title: Cakey and set on my dry patches
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really want to love this product since many people love it. Unfortunately, it emphasizes all my dry lines and patches on my skin, making my skin looks more dull. I like the light lemony scent and the application, just not how it looks on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for something that was a little bit more full coverage than a tinted moisturizer and Michael (at the Studio City, CA location) suggested this product. So far I'm loving it! It's buildable and feels light on my skin, which is exactly what I was looking for. And the fact that it has an spf and an anti-aging serum in it is a total win win! Highly recommend this CC cream. :)

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s fabulous, the coverage is great, it hides any imperfections and stays on all day and doesn’t smudge

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wish there was a wider shade range. I go between fair (winter) and fair-light (summer), but the fair shade leans slightly too cool for my skin.   It has good coverage (medium) and leaves my skin feeling dewy and healthy. It can get oily looking over the course of a day, but I tend to use it quite sparingly just in areas of discoloration.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Make more shades with neutral and warm undertones. I do like the formula, product is full coverage and has lots of beneficial ingredients for skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just yes. Love love love this product! Covers all my redness and blemishes perfectly while feeling super lightweight. I apply with my fingers and it goes one seamlessly!

reviews.review_title: Formula and tone change!! Buyer beware
reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my go-to for years. The only formula I like. I restocked this week and the shade fair is ORANGE? I thought I purchased the wrong one but nope.. same order and type as always but now it’s extremely orange

reviews.review_title: Great if you like full coverage
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great product, BUT I would not say that it is just an everyday cc cream because it is pretty full coverage. It feels more like a foundation. Its still nice and makes your skin look radiant, but I don't reach for it as much since I don't like the full coverage look. If you do, then this product is perfect, plus it provides pretty high spf

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is Beautiful on the skin! It wore nicely for 6+ hours .. it gave a good amount of coverage and didn’t feel cakey on the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It looks like it should be smooth, and it doesn’t smell...but no matter how I apply, it’s super cakey and definitely rubs off. I wanted it for SPF but I decided to buy Ombrelle face sunscreen instead, and look for a different CC cream. So disappointed...not cheap!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This covers the redness of my face wonderful. You only Have to use a little and it covers my whole face. Not to mention it stays on all day (even after taking my mask on and off)! Great coverage but still natural. Love it.

reviews.review_title: I use this on the daily
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use this on the daily. I love that it has SPF built in along with a bunch of other great things! The CC cream is buildable allowing you to choose medium to full coverage. The product has a lemony-lime smell. I love this product!

reviews.review_title: Shade is Not Right for Me But Prod Is Great
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Despite not having the right shade, I have to give this product 5 stars for several reasons: (1) Spf of 50 with mineral sunscreen..This is probably why it's a bit thick (not friendly to blend with your fingers) but perfectly fine with a sponge (2) lasts a very long time...I've never done an official wear test all  I know is I feel confident with this all day into the evening (3) Absolutely no reaction with my sensitive skin, which is a great thing (4) Very good coverage but doesn't feel too thick on especially once you blend it in...Like I've used thick foundations with similar coverage from MAC & barf will never go back to that! I love CC creams & BB creams for their breathable nature & this one is great considering the SPF is mineral & high Overall would recommend....I wish it were a bit more luminous and maybe a bit more skin-like but considering the other positives, it's definitely a win

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, I really do. I fell in love with the easy-to-wear formula, spf, and substantial coverage while still feeling like skincare. Fair used to be a great match for my light skin (Mont Blanc in Nars for reference) but since I last bought it three years ago (that's why it's in such poor shape), they've changed the shade of Fair and now it's much darker and more orange. I was shocked when I opened the new box because I thought I ordered the wrong shade- the lack of range in their shades is inexcusable at this point with other brands having a full spectrum for more skin tones, especially because this product is full coverage and the colour is really visible on your face. I have a soft spot for it because of the fantastic formula and the fact that it was the first foundation I purchased but what's the point if there isn't a shade that I can even wear? I mean, if you get the chance to swatch and find a shade that matches you, then 10/10 recommend. I for one will be returning this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've always been one to not fall onto the trends but I am HERE for this silk haircare trend. These scrunchies are AMAZING!! They don't leave deep dents in my hair and when I take my hair out from the messy bun it is not a tangled mess. 100% would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am hesitant to say that this is the best foundation/cc cream but it is by far better than anything else I have tried before. The coverage is *chefs kiss* amazing and it set and stayed really nice on my super oily t-zone. I always use a primer and setting powder on my t-zone and sometimes that can tend to look a little cakey... with this there was no cake at all! My only gripe with this is that it can feel a little heavy on warmer days and it is a little orange for me. (that is 100% a me problem, I have yet to find a foundation that is not either too orange or too pink on my skin)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The color “light” isn’t light it’s more medium in my opinion. They need a better shade range but i love this CC cream. It’s the only foundation I will use. I have oily skin and acne prone and this doesn’t cause any acne. Love that it has sunscreen

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I think the bottle I purchased might have been a defect. The oil separated and it became very 'gloopy' and often comes out as just pure oil. Based on other reviews this isn't a normal issue, but super disappointing for such an expensive product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've purchased this three times already, and needless to say, I am thrilled with the results. I never used any foundation-like product before this one because they all felt too heavy, and I would break out right away. But this CC cream leaves my skin very hydrated, and I love the subtle no-makeup look. I use just a tiny bit under my eyes and around my nose to cover my pores, and it looks great. Honestly, besides my skincare products, this is all I put on my face.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff. It goes on smoothly, it makes my skin look flawless and it lasts all day. I took one star off because the name is misleading, I would definitely call this a foundation and not a cc cream.  Also, people don't use enough foundation to get full sun coverage with foundations that contain SPF so it tends to give people a false sense of security.  You really do need to be wearing an SPF in addition to this product because you're probably not getting enough coverage with this product alone. Other than that disclaimer I love this product so much and definitely recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage, stays on while I swim and exercise. Great value and quality product. If you’re going to wear sunscreen anyway, why not choose to have flawless looking skin as well. ❤️ Thank you.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: wrong color purchased.  Heavy consistency. Again if I could just get Sephora to correct my Color IQ information

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this tinted cream so much, I've been using it for years and it is still my favourite!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Tan - light brown shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My all time favorite cc! I have medium color skin and neutral tan makes my skin more tanned and glowing. I love IT cc! I haven’t tried any other products they have but I already bought my third bottle of it. Please never change the formula or the range of colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I tried sooo hard to love this product after so many great reviews. I even got 2 different colours for winter months and summer but it just not working on my skin - gets into my pores, cakes up, gets into my lines, transfers to fingers, patches up. It does everything that I don’t want it to do. I’m really disappointed because I love the idea of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Will never go without this product again. Even helped to even out my skin tone with the peptides inside. I use a brush for a lighter coverage and my fingers for thicker coverage or problem areas. I buy two shades and mix them so I can match my color through all seasons.

reviews.review_title: Works well where there's no fine lines
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have really mixed feelings about this product. I got a sample of it, and I LOVED it. It matched me perfectly and it gave me that extra bit of coverage. But, it does NOT help fine lines. They get all creased and it's not good. So I finished the sample but kept it away from my fine lines and it was great, especially on my nose and cheeks. I would buy more but this size is way too big. A little goes a long way and it would take ages for me to use a size this big.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this sooo bad! It felt like it just slid right off my skin. It creased in fine line on my forehead and had no staying power. Maybe it would be good for a different skin type but if you like FULL Coverage I would not recommend this.

reviews.review_title: The formula feels super cheap, like a dolls blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I typically find cream blushes are meant to leave you with a glow but this one doesn't, it's more mattifying and you really need to build it on your skin. The colour also isn't super great for light skin... kinda makes you look pale.   Would not re-purchase. There are definitely better formulas out there.

reviews.review_title: could not get past the smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this and think I found the right color but when I tried to use it the smell was so off-putting. I think it was supposed to be a citrus scent to combat a typical sunscreen smell but it just didn’t work for me. I tried it one more time and couldn’t imagine spending a day where my whole face smelled weird. I wish this was fragrance free entirely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Thought I'd give this a try after the Sephora employee recommended it to me. This CC cream ended up sticking to all the dry spots I had and did not cover blemishes well at all. Overall really disappointed especially for how expensive this is. Will not repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The fair shade is too dark for fair skin. The product has a mid cover but the shade range is really bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This CC cream is excellent. With a little amount of product on your face, It can give great coverage to your face, while also lasting the whole day.

reviews.review_title: Go a shade lighter than you think
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Much darker than advertised. The texture is also very matte and doesn’t blend well on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This covers so well, literally every blemish disappeared when I wore It CC cream.  No more having to use tons of makeup products to cover those small flaws with It CC cream you literally only apply a small amount and it goes a long ways.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased the fair light because it says it's ivory pink with cool undertones. None of that is true! It's not fair, it's not light, it's not ivory pink and def not cool undertones. It was so tan and yellow. I doubled checked the tube and the box to make sure it hadn't been packaged incorrectly. Also, it smells so bad. Even after washing it off I can still smell it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's nearly impossible to find a cc cream/foundation with a high spf, so you would think It Cosmetics would really own this line with a PROPER SHADE RANGE. It's almost infuriating how they are completely wasting such an obvious opportunity in the beauty/skincare world. The swatches are 100% LIES. Fair......is medium/tan at best......no ma'am.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have mature skin, and my goal is to NOT highlight fine lines, and sun damage! This CC cream works beautifully! It covers for a natural finish, and blends easily with a foundation brush...doesn't cake, or slide off, even over serum, face oil and sunscreen...I bought the Illuminating version in the same shade, and I mix the two together for the perfect glow...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had a sample of this which I loved and used for several days - once I had used it all up I spent the money to purchase the full sized product. I am so disappointed. The product clings to every last fine line and imperfection on my face amplifying them and aging me about 10 years. It also feels incredibly heavy and comes off just by gently touching my face (even after using my normal prep and finishing process). I would not recommend this product. There are better CC + SPF combos out there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and hormonal acne. I was recommended this CC cream at Sephora SO MANY times by the people who work there and finally bought it..... it is the most cakey and drying product I have ever used on my skin. Definitely do not recommend and I'm very confused how this has won so many awards lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I usually use the oil -free matte version, and when I ran out, on a hunch I decided to try this instead, and I'm so glad I did! I was really taking a chance spending $39.50 on it  because my skin is oily and acne-prone and I was worried I would have breakouts and then be stuck with it. But so far, no worries! No breakouts, and it looks and feels great on my skin. The tube will last a long time, because you only need one pump to cover your face. It is very full coverage, so I recommend using a damp sponge. I spread it over my face then go over it with the sponge, but you can try dotting it on. I especially love how it even almost completely obscures my dark undereye circles. I can't overstate how much I love this stuff! One caveat...you're going to need more than a makeup wipe to get your face clean. I recommend a oil-based cleanser like Go-To's Fancy Face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was just horrible. Same goes for the concealer and brush which after the first cleaning I discovered was mouldy. If you’ve got oily/combo skin DO NOT USE! It will make you look like you’ve applied oil to your face and no amount of setting powder will absorb the shine.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: by far my fav, 10/10 am buying again and it lasts forever

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Worst cc cream I ever used. It makes my face to look old and sick! I do NOT recommend!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the wrong color! it's too dark for my skin. very full coverage without that foundation look

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn’t like it. It has chalky consistency and felt like I had something on my face all the time.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Light coverage at its best!  This will be my favorite now for a NO MAKE UP look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this CC because I needed something with a sunscreen to wear while working. I work from home now and don’t feel the need to get super made up but I still wanted something, plus I sit in front of a computer for several hours a day and wanted something to protect my skin. So this CC found it’s way into my cart, I use one pump and apply it with my fingers on top of my Charlotte Tilbury Hollywood flawless filter and my skin looks beautiful!! It’s not too dewy and makes my skin look way healthier than it is, it also makes me skin feel really soft after wearing. I wasn’t expecting to love this but now it’s a staple in my daily routine. If you want something super quick and easy this is definitely it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is full coverage but by mid day clung to my dry patches in my t zone, my skin was properly prepped as usual. I didn't mind the smell and texture, just not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product looks nice on and is very popular so I was excited to try. However, they do not have a light enough shade for me. The Fair and Fair Light are too dark for my skin tone. I am NC10 or NC15 in Mac.

reviews.review_title: not good for Dry combination skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry combination skin, this doesn’t work for me. It’s really creasing and cakey. It may be good for oily skin type. Sometimes I use it because SPF 50+

reviews.review_title: great product if it has your shade
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, and I would buy it again and again if it wasn’t for the shade match issue. I’m a neutral to pink undertone light skinned white girl, and this product has always been slightly too yellow for me. I’m trying new products for that reason. If they come out with more shades, I’ll be back in a heartbeat. For reference I’m a NW20 in Mac products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my holy grail foundation. I have it in almost every shade for every time of the year. Provides wonderful coverage, works great with other products, and leaves me skin looking gorgeous without that foundation look. Even when I use other foundations, I always find myself reaching back to this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cakey and drying  Worst foundation + sunscreen ever

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Works great! Bought it for light makeup to wear on my trip to Disney World

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I ran out of this and bought a new tube only to find it now oxidizes and looks orange. They must have changed the formula. So sad to have to return. This was one of my fav foundations.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the coverage, but feels very thick on skin and texture is awkward

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve suffered with rosacea since I was a kid and this is the first product that’s helped completely cover up my redness without drying out my skin too much. A little goes a long way and it’s be pliable and easy to work into the skin. Of course I do notice it wearing off onto my mask and find myself having to apply it again halfway through the day, but I’ll be buying this again!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - natural beige shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes a long way for full coverage, creamy delicious texture, plus SPF 50 makes life so easy. Do I think it’s long lasting? I’m not quite sure yet but my guess is it wears nice for long enough, at least for a mom of 3.

reviews.review_title: Good for dry skin but orange
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage is perfect - to get it even more sheer I mix with a cream/gel moisturizer and it keeps my dry skin hydrated all day and doesn’t move with a little setting powder on top. I can see why this wouldn’t be a good pick for anyone acne or oil prone however . My biggest concern is that it oxidized within 20-30 mins on my face. It is good for summer coverage but not winter .

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for everyday light and stays in place. Covers my imperfections without covering up to much of my freckles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used this product for years. I opened a new tube and the colour seems off.. darker/more orange. This was my go-to! Devastated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don't get the hype. First of all, the shades are off. They run dark and oxidize badly. Soooo much coverage too... Does not hold up well throughout the day. Just a big no for me. I would never buy this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the coverage but hate the texture/finish. Too dry for my liking, makes small acne bumps and dry spots more prominent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Good, but fair isn't fair enough; it seems more like a light to me. I would need a paler shade because I'm out here looking like an orange.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this product a little of this goes a long way. It has more coverage then I expected. I like to use a buffing brush to apply this. I love that it’s very lightweight,  I’m oily so I use a little loose powder on top and my skin will just end up looking a dewy which I actually like. I defiantly agree with other they need to have a larger selection of colors !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Didn’t work for brown combination skin. I applied it with and without primer + moisturizer. It caked and creased real bad. Made my pores look even more prominent.

reviews.review_title: can we get more of a shade range ?!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Extremely disappointing that this is the lightest available shade. This colour is very orange and I had to return it. I couldn’t even exchange for my proper colour as this is the lightest shade they carry with ALL of the CC+ lines. I am disappointed as I have heard great reviews on this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was the first CC cream I ever tried. I have been using it for years and I would definitely recommend! HOWEVER, I do agree with the other reviews that the shade range makes no sense. I am very fair skinned and the lightest shade is still about 1-2 shades darker than I am. It looks like it would match my skin color based on the pictures posted for this product but there is something off with how the shade actually shows up on my skin. I used this CC cream with the Bye Bye Breakout acne concealer (which also has the same problem with the shade range just FYI). I try to use this more in the summer time when I am slightly tanner than normal but I think overall, it is a great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was color matched but was given 2 shades darker. Now i have to go specially to return to the store.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best for my dry skin.  I've tried many foundations and this is the only one that works for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I finally decided to give this product a try after all of its hype. First off let me start by saying I never wear makeup. As an esthetician, I believe skincare is more important than covering up your beautiful skin! This seemed like a perfect go to no makeup/makeup product, but it truly is deceiving. The color selection is awful in my opinion. They’re so orange, even the light shades are too dark. I got the shade “light” and it looked so unnatural. After trying this product for 3 days I began to break out all over and I never break out! If you dig into the ingredient list you’ll be shocked. Let’s just say they’re not good ingredients for your skin. Also, this just did not blend to a nice finish... it just kind of separated through the day and made any imperfections look worse. There’s definitely betters products on the market! Personally I love the Illia foundation serum, it’s beautiful and actually has good ingredients for your skin. If you have sensitive skin, please don’t even bother with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The formula itself was lightweight and creamy and felt nice on the skin BUT the colour was wayyyy too dark for my skintone. Luckily I have a friend who self tans and was willing to buy the product off me. It's a shame because as a pale auburn haired girl I got excited over the idea of a spf50 foundation. Oh well maybe in the future they will make a lighter shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is horrible because of the following:   1. It creases   2. Transfers   3. Doesn’t cover blemishes and redness  4. It gets in fine lines   L’Oréals foundation is a MILLION times better then this and it is less than half the price!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product itself is actually quite good. It’s soft and not heavy but I wouldn’t recommend for oily skin. It doesn’t last long on the face either. Their shades are horrible I’ve tried multiple and none have fit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Even using the tiniest amount, it looks really gross and cakey, and enhances every little flaw, fine line, and dry patch on your skin. I’ve tried multiple times, it always looks terrible, and I can’t wait to wash it off. I LOVE the IT redness cream, so had high hopes for this, but this product is the worst.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have light olive skin and the shade light matches perfectly upon application but it does oxidize to a bit orange (it works ok for my skin but may not work for others). I mix it with a face oil as it is a bit thick and hard to blend on its own. Provides great coverage but I don’t find that the foundation lasts more than a few hours. I will probably try the matte version of this to see if the staying power is any better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this CC cream. It goes on effortlessly, gives buildable coverage and a little goes a long way. The pump dispenser is a definite plus for dispensing small amounts or larger amounts without a mess. Love the age-fighting ingredients and the subtle scent of cardamom! Try the oil free version if you’re oily. I love this for my dry skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The product itself is great, it offers coverage for redness and smaller irritations without having to wear makeup for the day. It’s also buildable and melts into the skin well over time. I took one star off because the silver holographic decorations on the package itself actually wears off over time onto your hands to the point where I found myself “sparkling” with silver in direct light one day after reapplying with my hands. I covered the package with packing tape to stop the wear off, but it definitely isn’t the ideal user experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have fair, dry , rosacea/acne prone skin.  I bought the shade “fair”.  Pros: moisturizing, feels pretty lightweight, good coverage, I like the pump, smell is OK (smells like a citrus essential oil), didn’t irritate my skin, not super long lasting but gives a natural finish Cons: the worst colour range. I understand it’s a CC cream, but it’s pretty full coverage. If it’s not a good match, it’s very noticeable.  Overall: will repurchase but I’ll have to use in summer when I have more of a tan

reviews.review_title: Full coverage but lacking color options
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For a CC cream this product is definitely full coverage which I was not expecting. It blends well but definitely feels like your wearing a full coverage foundation so if you’re looking for something lighter or more natural looking then I would skip this. I have sensitive skin and this formula did not break me out or cause irritation which is nice but it’s a bit matte for my dry skin. I’m taking away two stars for the color range, I purchased the lightest shade and it’s still pretty dark with a very yellow undertone. Probably won’t repurchase but will try other options from the brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this foundation.  I bought it online and chanced the colour match.  At first I was unsure re the colour, however a little goes a long way!  It is so blendable and doesn't cling onto any fine lines or dry spots.  I will be repurchasing!

reviews.review_title: Great color correcting for red undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for 6 weeks now, and it has great color correction for my red undertones. I usually use Mac Studio Fluid Fix, and wanted to try something not as thick. I like this much better and the pump is a huge plus for me. It also does not break me out, which I felt happened with my Mac foundation. I use a beauty blender to apply and use a sheer powder on top for daily use. I always moisturize before applying makeup, so I don’t have issues with the foundation settling into pores or lines, and it doesn’t look cakey. I read the low rated reviews and was surprised by others’ reactions, but to each their own. I’m a fan and would recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this, the consistency and scent were great but the colour was way off. I am fair, so I went with fair light, thinking it would be a good match. Tell me why, when I took it out of its box the colour on the label compared to the one on the tube was way off! Then as I applied it, the colour was a deep almost orange. Mind you in the photo attached I wasn’t done blending but I saw no point continuing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Too thick, too greasy. The lightest shade is still pretty dark, looks oily and heavy on the skin. I have dry skind but even for me it was too much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this CC cream, it's my go to for my daily makeup routine. It's light and moisturizing and gives just as much coverage as foundation without feeling heavy. And SPF 50? Amazing for preventing aging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is amazing!! it really is just skin but better. This lasts so LONG and a little goes a long way so you don't have to use much product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had to throw away my Nars tinted moisturizer since it expired and decided to replace that with this instead since everyone raves about it. I have to say I don’t get the hype AT ALL. The coverage is meh but it goes on weird and really dries the skin out. I’ve tried a brush, beauty blender, and my fingers and find it streaks no matter what you use. I use an occlusive moisturizer underneath and my skin literally flakes off by mid day. I will not be returning it but definitely will not buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this I got it in shade Medium Tan. It looks so natural, I can wear it out and no one will be able to tell, it looks like my natural skin! It covers any blemishes and evens out skin tone while not being too heavy on the skin. The only thing I don’t like about it is how it comes off easily on my fingers. I’ll put setting powder everywhere and then setting spray but if I accidentally touch my face I’ll get whole fingerprints of makeup off my face. So if that could somehow be fixed, I think this product would be perfect.

reviews.review_title: Nice but not worth the price tag
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Nice CC cream. Little goes long way. Bought the mini size to try. Will not be repurchasing. Not worth the price tag.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream has been one of my all-time favorites for years now. It works wonders for me and does exactly as it claims. I have super sensitive skin, so I am extremely cautious as to what I put on it. After using this product, I noticed the redness on my skin reduced, along with less frequent breakouts. The ingredients in this CC cream are incredibly good for the skin. It has SPF 50, Collagen, Peptides, and Hyaluronic Acid. It has amazing coverage and gives a beautiful and natural dewy finish. I get so many compliments when I wear it. The application is very quick and it blends very well. For me personally I noticed I get the best results when using a sponge to apply it. I can use it throughout all seasons because of how moisturizing it is. Although it is pricey it is worth every penny. The product lasts for a long time and a little bit goes a long way. I have nothing negative to say about this product, it is perfection in a tube. I recommend anybody who is  looking for an everyday medium to buildable full coverage without worrying about it being a heavy foundation to get this CC cream no matter what skin type they have. Trust me, you will love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Texture agréable, se fond parfaitement à ma peau et à sa couleur. Le FPS 50 est un plus pour protéger l’épiderme du soleil. Merci à la cosmeticienne Sephora pour cette judicieuse suggestion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff SLAPS. I have dry skin and eczema, and live in Florida(very humid) and it's so hard to find a foundation that is moisturizing but doesn't melt off during the day. This foundation has great coverage for how lightweight it is, and covers up any eczema flare ups I have. On top of that, the zinc in this product actually helps heal and soothe my flare-ups. I put it on with my fingers, and apply a little bit of powder in the morning and it's good for the rest of the day! Please do not stop making this foundation or I will lose my mind.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It looks great for the first few hours but by mid afternoon/evening it really looks cakey and patchy. I'll use it in the morning for casual days where I'm not too concerned with how I look at night. I also like the SPF.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I can’t believe it ! This foundation is amazing ! I have a very dry skin with some redness and I’ve been using the MAC water drop foundation for more than 5 years, but this foundation is the best !! My skin looks so good !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Oxidized to two shades too orange, and it looked cakey. Do not use more than the size of a pea for your entire face or you will look like a carrot. Really wanted to love this product and liked how it felt on the skin, but hated the way it looked after wearing it for 1/2 an hour.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this made me hate my face because it covered it like a mask of jelly or something sticky. i got fair light and im not the lightest person out there by any means.... and idk if it oxidized or something but it was orangey and looked like i rubbed tanner on myself. bleh. returned. i liked that it had considerable spf in it even though i couldnt leave the house in it (bc it was ugly)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: every time i wear this i get compliments that i’m glowing! this is my go to ESPECIALLY in the spring and summer months! absolutely beautiful!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favourite foundation by far, and I will purchase again. The only beef I have with this product is that if you have oily skin (I do around my nose) the product really starts to look greasy and comes undone. HOWEVER that is only after a ton of grease not right away - would probably take hours until so.

reviews.review_title: 1st tube was great, 2nd tube made me orange
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVED my first tube of this stuff. I loved the coverage, loved the feel, loved how easy it was to apply, and loved the SPF. The color matched my skin so well. I ordered a 2nd tube when I'd finished the first and it's like it's not even the same colour. I'm not sure if I got some kind of a mis-tint or maybe my tan just faded from summer? It turns me ORANGE. So I have no idea what happened, but I'm really disappointed because I loved this. Maybe if my tan comes back in the summer time I can wear it again...

reviews.review_title: My Go-To for Great Coverage and SPF
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product and have been using it for years. It has strong sun protection and great coverage. The feel of it is dewy like a lotion and then it sets and feels light. The high pigment can rub off easily on clothes if you don't use a setting sealer on top, which I usually don't.

reviews.review_title: LOVE LOVE LOVE this, best foundation I’ve found
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product and always get so many compliments when I wear it on how good my skin looks, that I glow.  I have sensitive skin and prefer fuller coverage without a cakey look. This product fits the bill perfectly. It moisturizes and looks natural, while providing full coverage. And it doesn’t irritate my skin. I will add that the colors seem to run darker; I am usually a medium beige and wear light in this.  After initially buying a medium color online that was too dark, I used the Sephora shade finder to find my perfect match and it worked. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love it, it looked like foundation not CC cream and sat on my dry patchy areas between the eye brows in an hours time. I returned it sadly.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is way darker than it looks. I did shade finder and the girl at the store said this was good, but I’m like looking really orange in this. I really like the product but maybe go a shade lighter if you don’t want to look like a Cheeto

reviews.review_title: Heavy foundation beware of a cakey face....
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was really disappointed in this foundation. It is very cakey and feels like it weighs my face down. Also please don’t touch your face as it transfers to your hands and makes a mess all day long, even with setting powder. The only plus is it was a nice color match to my complexion, but I would not purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This (for me) is better than any foundation I’ve ever used. I’ve used Dior Backstage, Makeup Forever, Mac medium coverage foundation and after like 4 hours of wear it’s ALWAYS looked patchy on me until now! This is the best coverage I’ve ever had without any weight. So blendable. Doesn’t make me look patchy or greasy. I have sensitive combination skin and I’ve never used a better product that works with my skincare routine. Obsessed.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ehhh... it’s okay... oxidizes like crazy and definitely not the best shade I’m a light skin gal, and usually to okay with fair or light and I feel like I have to mix them both. Still not the right color.. and definitely not worth the spf. You need a table spoon to get the spf to even work!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great stuff! Great coverage. Don't need to use much to get a full face. Doesn't dry out skin. Blends really well. 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is THE BEST full coverage foundation I have ever used. No need to use concealer with it, and a little goes a long way. Will definitely repurchase this

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My ultimate fav make up! It is so creamy and makes skin so dewy ! Love it .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like it for the most part. A little goes a long way, and too much can make it look cake-y.   After 8 hours, it started to clump up visibly. When I accidentally touch by face (i.e. brushing bangs back), the product visibly moves on the face. Noticeably. Maybe setting powder would help increase longevity, but I didn't like how easily it 'lifts up' from my face.  Overall 3/4 because it looks great for the first few hours of application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I guess if you're looking for full coverage this is great, but I went in asking for light and was recommended this product. It went on SO heavy, and looked cakey from the get go, I didn't even use one pump of it. I washed my face as soon as I got home because I couldn't wait to get it off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Buying online is killing me - look at color swatches, read their description of pink  - it comes and is Yellow    Gave it away

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried so many different foundations and CC creams from drugstore brands to expensive luxury brands. This is by far this is the best I have come across. I have dry uneven skin so many times either the product is too drying and looks caked on or it does not cover very well. This product not only evens out my skin, but it makes it look healthy and flawless. I was skeptical given the price point and not having even heard of this brand before. It takes a lot to impress me and this definitely did just that.

reviews.review_title: Everything I Ever Wanted in a CC Cream
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the holy grail of CC creams ...   In the summer I always wear the Illumination version of this CC cream and I'm obsessed... so I decided for winter to try the OG... and it did not disappoint...  creamy, buildable coverage, glowy finish without looking greasy ..   I apply with the Heavenly Luxe Complexion Perfection Brush #7 (which if you don't have... what are you waiting for?) and its absolutely flawless... looks airbrushed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great consistency and coverage, love the pump and the slim packaging. I think this is more than generous amount of product for the full coverage that it is. Easily apply one small pump for my entire face, blends and sets beautifully. However as others have mentioned it does oxidize several shades. I bought the color Light, and it looked quite orange. I am by no means a Fair complexion, so I was taken aback by what I was concerned to be a shade I would have to pair with a bronzer. It really is an awesome CC and for the popularity and time on the market I would like to see a better shade range.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty good! Really high coverage for a cc cream. It does oxidize on me. But all in all, good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product soooo much but it does sadly make me breakout! It's perfect for all over coverage and is super easy to blend and apply. It doesn't lead to dry or patchy finish after a few hours of wearing, which is important for dry skin. However it does make me breakout, and as an acne-prone person that is such a bummer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely hate having anything heavy on my face so this product is almost perfect for me! I love that it also includes SPF and some healing actives. I usually apply it with a beauty blender. I wouldn't say it has the best staying power as it can transfer a bit or move around as the day goes on but it's great for everyday wear when you want to look put together but not cakey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a new foundation and my dermatologist recommended IT Cosmetics as I have rosacea. The coverage was good and easy to build to what I needed.  While I love that it had a high SPF, the shades just didn’t match quite right for me. If they had extended shades and I was able to find a better match I would buy this right away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely stunning product and applies beautifully with a beauty blender or a brush. Love to layer this for more of a full coverage look (I’m usually a very light coverage girl). Perfect for a night out or every day wear. I’ve seen many friends use this and finally decided to try and it is definitely worth the hype. Would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My only complaint is the color range. Even though I chose the lightest shade it is still a bit orange on me. Other than that it can be medium/full coverage!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I almost didnt buy this product based off the reviews but ultimately wanted to try it myself. I was nervous about the shade choice as lots of reviews mentioned it being far darker than expected. I bought fair as im usually always porcelain or light. Im actually really happy with the match, its basically bang on, so thats a positive. My initial negative is how drying it actually feels. Ive only had it on for a couple hours now and my face feels tight. Even with my moisturizer on underneath. Its also the most full coverage tinted moisturizer ive ever used. The other negative, as many other reviews mentioned, this really highlights any dry spots on your skin. I have combination skin, with drier patches above my eyebrows and bridge of my nose and this is doing those spots no favors. Lastly, one thing i do like is how a little goes a LONG way. I put a full pump out and used maybe half. So i do feel the tube will last awhile. Not sure if i would repurchase as i like a bit lighter of a CC cream, but i will use this one up for now.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Natural redhead here - it has been a chore to use this product up. I spent the first week using this thinking that it was just my fault, that I couldn't figure out how to diffuse it because I’m the one who’s not good with makeup, it’s MY skin that looks bad not the product, etc. But this formula is just NOT my preference. It's way too full coverage for everyday/casual, it's not dewy enough, it’s way too dark and yellow to be the lightest shade, and it dries my skin out. I'm interested in taking a sample home of their other CC+ formulations once I’m finally rid of this thing, but the fact that they don't make a shade light enough for ivory skin with pinky undertones means I have to diffuse the product with another mineral sunscreen that would give me whitecast on it's own, otherwise I end up looking like an oompa loompa with a muddy yellow demarcation where I try to blend it into my neck. I don't like to waste product though, so I've been trying to use it up for months now, mixing it with sunscreens and oils to give it a dewy finish. I cannot WAIT until I'm finished with it. But huge pro for those who love it: it will last you forever.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m on my 4th or 5th bottle of this. It’s my go to for every day. I love that it has spf and the coverage is buildable. It goes on a little wet, but sets beautifully. I use nothing to set it and it looks natural and lasts all day.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the texture and coverage of the CC cream, I just did not ask to enjoy it as it should because the undertone of light medium is Pink and it looks strange on my skin (I have a warm undertone) the advice when choosing the tone did not work very well  in the shop

reviews.review_title: very good coverage I just married this product lol
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very good coverage it’s like a foundation. I first got the Matte but I didn’t like how it looked. This one is more moisturizing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 3 stars cause it’s a good shade match, but I find after a few hours it starts to look Cakey. Coverage is great.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this product goes on very easily and provides excellent coverage. It blended well and stayed on all day.

reviews.review_title: Good all day coverage and a natural finish.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. It feels great on my skin and has good coverage. It spreads easily so a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all I opened my package and expected it to be smaller. So glad it was bigger than I thought it was going to be. And I thought the color looked too dark/grey but when I put it on my skin it looked good. I like the way it feels and smells. It doesn’t feel heavy, and is medium coverage. Not full coverage like it says so that’s why I’m giving it 4 stars. Sad that it will expired sooner though because of the spf 50. I don’t really wear foundation everyday so I might not use all of it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best foundation I have ever used! I’ve never had such a good color match with foundation. On days that my skin is irritated and red, I build up the coverage and the redness is gone without my face looking cakey or feeling heavy. It’s worth the price tag and I’m already on my fourth tube! Great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this it’s so good! It is so lightweight and creamy!!! I use it as an everyday cream. I love that it has spf and isn’t greasy at all. It’s overall just amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blew me away the first time I tried it! It's definitely a lot more like a foundation, I was kind of looking for something more sheer but it instantly replaced my full coverage foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not a huge fan of this product I find that it feels quite sticky and heavy on my face. the smell of sunscreen is quite strong and I feel that it clogs my pores. colour matches fine it just isn't for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff, but I find it only works if I apply it with a sponge. Using a brush or my fingers resulted in oxidized disaster. But with a sponge, it has a skin-like, slightly dewy finish, perfect for my dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to buy this and wanted to love it, but just couldn't.  It feels heavy and doesn't blend well.  I thought it would be an easy application for days I don't want to put on foundation but still want some light coverage with SPF, but it somehow goes on thick yet doesn't provide any coverage.  Not a winner for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Easy to use, easy to layer, looks good for everyday too. AND has SPF!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is nice, I love the coverage I get, just wish the shades matched better. I’ve tried multiple shades and they’re all just a little off, either too dark or too light. This shade is the best match so far, but still too dark for me. Definitely need more shade options.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was hesitant to try this product because I don’t put anything on my skin with oil in it. I use the oil free version but my colour was out so gave this a try. To my surprise this has to be the first product with oil in it that didn’t break me out or cause my pores to get huge. I think this has a better more even application then the oil free version. It did a great job of blurring pores and imperfections and scars. It didn’t oxides. The only downfall is with the oil free version I can pull off a whole day wearing without using with a primer. This one I do have to use a primer or I get oily and there is transfer (minimal but still some). Overall I’m happy and I will finish off my bottle. I’ll probably reorder the oil free one next time as it will be closer to summer and warmer weather but I might stick to this version for winter months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Super sad that the colour wasn’t as described or as it appeared on the box. Very nice coverage and my face feels great and I think it’s very wearable. I hope I can exchange it for the proper shade match! The colours are much darker and more yellow than they appear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok, I really do like this product and how it looks on the skin but all of the colors are too dark for me. I can make it work if I wear a turtleneck but that’s not exactly practical. I really hope that they come out with a better shade range. For reference, Charlotte Tilbury Fair 1 and Fenty 110 work really well for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Over all I enjoyed this product! To me it felt full coverage and I bought it for the summer time so wish it wasn’t as full coverage!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ehh. Not super impressed. The texture is weird and slimy and oxidizes super quickly. Would not recommend.

reviews.review_title: Miracle product, unless you have hormonal acne
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a 5 star product but I took off one star for 3 reasons. I loved it because it gave me a dewy glow and made my skin look so even with a little bit of product. It neutralized all my redness and most of my acne/acne scars HOWEVER,  1) I have hormonal acne and it was flaring up my chin acne. It was a double edged sword, it did such a great job of covering it I never would've guessed the serum was inflaming it (derm made this observation while putting me on Spironolactone, and acne didnt leave until changing my makeup, so she was right)  2) made my fine lines on my forehead more noticeable and rubbed off on collars of jackets   I still think the CC cream is magic, just not for me and my skin right now

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product - cc cream with spf50 Caused me to break out. Seems thick on my face. Won’t use again.

reviews.review_title: Looks good at first but then goes downhill
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited about this product bc I had tried it at friends house and it seemed pretty good then. But after buying it and using it a couple of times these are my main takes:   - Very thick and heavy yet somehow doesn’t cover anything.. - Goes into all pores/lines and makes you see wrinkles you thought you didn’t have.  - Makes face look oily, at first it’s a nice glow but after a while I just looked dirty.   Good things are that it smells amazing and is very hydrating. Sad that this didn’t work on me bc it looks amazing on other people hence why I would still recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this product. I have bought it twice and continue to like it. I have dry skin and it makes my skin feel hydrated and I would say on the very thin line of dewy/oily looking but I don't mind it at all. I love that it has SPF too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: WOW this stuff is great! It blends, blends, blends. One tiny pump and a good brush is all you need, and it stays, and it looks great in photos.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE THIS!! Not quite sure the negative reviews about this product.  Maybe they are using too much.  I think its wonderful and I won't use anything else.  I mix 1 pump of this and 1 pump of liquid foundation on the back of my hand and use a brush to apply all over my face.  It lasts ALL day.  Plus I receive comments how much better my complexion looks.  I have rosacea and it completely covers it all day long!  Thank you IT Cosmetics.

reviews.review_title: Shades are Different than Several Months Ago
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This used to be my holy grail foundation, but something is amiss with the shades of this foundation nowadays. I held my new Fair Light shade up to my old one, even did a swatch test, and the new Fair Light is several shades darker now. Being their lightest shade, I now no longer can use this line. I'm devastated since this is the only foundation I've ever found that doesn't break me out :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately this didn’t do it for me. I’m glad I was able to try a sample before purchasing. Although this color was a great match for my skin color, it missed the mark for hydration. My skin is very dry. I applied tarte sea serum and h20, my skin was visibly plumper, fine lines were slightly diminished. Once I put this cc cream on, my skin felt dry again. Some flakiness around the nose and middle forehead on exfoliated skin. I wouldn’t recommend this for dry skin.

reviews.review_title: Too heavy for no makeup days!
reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ll give it credit for coverage. But however, this is way too heavy and cakey. Definitely would be considered a foundation more than a cc cream 100%. Plus very messy and the shade range I did not appreciate. The shades that were supposedly neutral were too yellow. Don’t waste your money guys. But a sephora employee recommended a tinted moisturizer that changed my life!! I definitely recommend the clinque hydrating tinted moisturizer has great, buildable medium coverage and it’s cheaper. Very light and lasts all day.
