reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favourite foundation of all time! Almost full coverage, buildable, and makes your skin look super healthy. And after I take it off my skin feels good and I don’t get any breakouts! The only con of this foundation is that the shade range SUCKS!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It covered so well and blended flawlessly! One of the best foundations I have used!

reviews.review_title: easy to use and good coverage
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how easy it is to use this product. It's super no hassle, blends SUPER well and has buildable coverage. It usually lasts the whole day without looking cakey.

reviews.review_title: easy to use and good coverage
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how easy it is to use this product. It's super no hassle, blends SUPER well and has buildable coverage. It usually lasts the whole day without looking cakey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cant love this product enough. I was in the haunt for the perfect visible light protection (iron oxides )  without being heavy on the skin like a foundation. I am MAC shades NC42/NC44 and this TAN is just perfect. Truly my skin but better. It covers my acne post inflammatory hyperpigmentation and feels hydrating. The only thing to note is that this should not be used as your regular sunscreen. In order to get the SPF advertised one would need to apply at least 4 layers (not worthy). Just apply your regular sunscreen and this on top and it would be perfect. I will definitely be repurchasing other products of this brand.

reviews.review_title: Need a lighter shade than what is offered
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I definitely agree with other reviewers who said this line needs a wider range of shades. The lightest color was too dark for me, especially during winter quarantine. It doesn't cover my acne scars, which I don't mind since it is a cc cream. It's nice and dewey and overall corrects some of the redness on my skin. But man, it'd be great if it actually looked like it belonged on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never usually write reviews but for this product I had to!!! After using the shade finder on the Sephora app to find my shade (my first time buying foundation/cc cream online), I was prepared to have to return this product because it was the wrong shade or not a good fit for me. All the other cc creams I have tried have been too thick/washed me out! I initially tried out a generous pump of this product and realized: a little bit goes a loooong way. After blending it out with a foundation brush, I was shocked at the color match, soft blurred appearance it gave my skin, and that it was generally lightweight! As someone who doesn’t wear foundation/likes lightweight options, I am so pleased with how wearable this product is. I even did a moderate intensity workout without any creasing or melting! Although up close I did notice a bit of my skins texture more than usual, in pictures and from a normal distance away, my skin looks flawless! So worth it for all of the added benefits!! My skin felt very hydrated despite the full coverage finish. To add a bit of dewy-ness to my complexion, I sprayed some Mac Fix+ on top to set.

reviews.review_title: Just kinda meh. Pick a shade lighter
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought as part of a gift set (Your complexion perfect - winter 2019). Was slightly disappointed at first. It feels (to me) thick for a CC cream, heavier than most of my foundations, didn't spread very well and only medium coverage. The color light was almost too dark for my summer shade. Was hoping for a bare hands apply and go powder free look for summer and did not deliver.  HOWEVER, applied with a lighter hand and a blender spritzed with setting spray it goes on nicely for a sheer/medium coverage for a non drying and not too matte look. (though I wouldnt trust what spf level it ends on)   Over all, I still use it in rotation for a soft no makeup summer look. But would probably consider trying another product before buying again.

reviews.review_title: Desperately need a wider range of shades
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the coverage of this cc cream. Works wonderfully with my dry skin and to cover my acne scars. The only thing that I’m disappointed about is that the lightest shade of this cream is too dark for my fair skin. Because of this, I’m only able to wear this during the summer when my skin gets more sun. Such a drawback because I’d really love to wear this cream year round. To IT Cosmetics... please make a wider shade range to accommodate both lighter and darker skin tones.

reviews.review_title: Got the wrong color, but I love it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I have neutral/warmer fair to light skin. I ordered “light” and I REALLY DISLIKE the way the color looks on me. It made me look less alive almost and I realized it’s a taupe shade. “Taupe” is a grayish color and I just really did not like it. However, I LOVE THE FOUNDATION overall. I actually just reordered it in “Fair” and am going to give the light to my friend to see if it will work for her. It looks pretty/soft when applied with my sponge, and it’s very long lasting. I found it does accentuate a bit of the texture on my skin, but honestly it’s not that bad. Plus with the skin benefits you can’t go wrong. I recommend giving it a try!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: wore this for New Years Eve. Love it. Great coverage and great tone. My husband even noticed the difference. Totally covered my blotchy skin. Makes me look younger

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this product!! I always get super cakey around my nose area with ANY foundation I use except for this one! It makes my skin looks so great and I’ve gotten so many compliments while wearing it! I also love that it’s infused with good ingredients and SPF so I feel less bad about using foundation on my skin all day! It’s also full coverage and lasts all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is honestly amazing!!! It glides on so easily, the coverage is pretty good for a CC cream. I don’t have much complaints about the product itself, the reason I gave 4 stars and not 5 is because I have super dry skin during certain months and this product tends to latch onto those dry patches on my face.. I tried the illuminating one although I didn’t like the SUPER dewy look it gave me. Other than that, it’s definitely a product you should try!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wouldn’t recommend for sensitive skin. I tried it and make my skin irritated and red.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Fair light is DARK! And orange!  I’ve never met a fair/light skin person with this colour skin.  Overall cakes me out and emphasizes my dry skin and pores. Will be returning

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: What a Disappointing product for my very dry skin. This thing is real cakey foundation for dry skin...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage for a CC cream! I didn't even have to add concealer to my post acne marks. Covered all flaws like a dream. It is super thick, so I hope it wears well throughout the day. You only need a little. So far I'm super pleased about the coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: that product is bomb! it help a lot my skin, no more breakout. Also, it's smell a little bit lemon and is very smooth application. I bought a second tube! lovin' it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For the color fair, this is too dark for my skin. I’m not sure what color I’d use since that’s the lightest. The coverage is ok, but I prefer Nars concealer.

reviews.review_title: Use with a damp beauty blender!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When I first tried this product using a brush I absolutely hated it. Looked very casey, emphasized dry patches and wrinkles/lines. Was not moisturizing at all. However if you apply with a damp beauty blender it is such a GAME CHANGER. It thins it out a bit and applies so much smoother and more natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a good foundation but one downfall the silver packaging begins to shed and it gets allll over my other makeup and beauty blenders.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This sets beautifully, but it's super heavy and not suitable for fair skin tones. It's too dark and even orangy on pale skin.

reviews.review_title: If you are looking for clown make up, this is it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this product to replace Physician's Formula Super Color Correction Care Powder which is now difficult to find.  I searched the internet to find a comparable product and this IT product kept coming up.  This product was also recommended to me at a local ULTA store so I purchased it.  This product is basically just a tinted sunscreen.  It is dry, cakey, and heavy. It has no color-correcting properties at all.  It didn't smooth or even out my complexion.  I am not sure where all the good reviews and recommendations are coming from.  I found this product to be more like clown makeup. I would not recommend this product to anyone.  It is a total waste of money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: beautiful, buildable. thin in out with moisturizer or layer it to use as a concealer. fair is perfect for very pale girls with yellow or beige undertones. so nice to find something very fair without pink or blue undertones!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product is nice and creamy, but has a slight smell thats not great but also not horrible. I can't speak for how it feels on the face, since it was made obvious that the tone was not pale enough for me upon swatch testing. I have pink undertones to my skin, so thought the fair light shade would work. I was wrong and will be returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Anti-aging. - strong no on that one.   It’s very cakey.   It seems to emphasize wrinkles.   My cheap BB cream does a significantly better job and giving my skin a youthful appearance.   I waS extremely disappointed at  this overpriced dollar store quality crap    Don’t waste your money !!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has become my holy grail product. l Light coverage that I apply sparingly with my fingertips to even out my skin tone. Gives a beautiful, natural glow, and creates an even skin tone without feeling or looking like a foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the smaller size to try it out and was blown away by the coverage and the feel.  I love it.  It really does what all it says it will do.  I'm hooked.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: just a really really good full coverage foundation. always my first choice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow this stuff is DARK!! For being a shade for fair skin, it was almost a medium shade in color and was straight orange. There’s no way someone with fair or light skin could use this shade without looking like a clown. It also somehow was super cakey while not actually providing any coverage. I was super disappointed in this. I’m giving two stars because it didn’t have a smell which is super rare and really nice in a skin product.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has really good coverage if you are looking for full coverage. Definitely can hide redness and blemishes. The fair color was kind of ashy looking for me and I have a neutral skin tone so it didn’t quite look natural.  My biggest issue with it is that it really stuck to dryness and looked cakey and unnatural. It’s probably good for someone who has oily skin but it didn’t work for my dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is My go to! After years of searching I found the best one!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this stuff. I keep trying new foundations but always come back to this. On me it doesn’t settle in to any fine lines and doesn’t look like foundation even though you can build it up for more coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely didn’t feel like a bb cream. Too heavy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it!  Best match I have ever found for my color, does not dry my face and it can be used in many ways.  From a full coverage foundation to go to work to a light coverage just to go to the beach so that I can still look cute while protected by the SPF 50 that it has.  A winner and my new favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sinks into lines. UGH. One star for having SPF in it. Reminder, SPF expires, so make sure you use it all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: She’s thick! And I don’t mean Thic in a good way. Feels absolutely gross on the skin. If you regularly wear heavy foundation you may like this. But, for me I couldn’t handle feeling like I was suffocating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product now for years and I do love it! However, I’ve tried different formulas of it and I find the shades are different in each formula (ex: the shade fair in the oil free formula was much darker than the shade in the original formula) which is kind of confusing!  It is quite thick for a CC cream and very full coverage however you could totally apply it different ways for different coverage levels.  The SPF protection works amazing, it doesn’t leave my skin feeling thick or cake-like and it stays on alllll day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am Middle Eastern with light brown skin, my mother begs me apply foundation because I'm so pale, I agree and I have yellowish tone. This product had me at SPF! Creamy texture (cakey look and feel but in a good way), blends smooth with a brush, provides full coverage, I don't have to use any under-eye product, the Medium Tan gives me a great Matt look while making me radiate. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This GAVE me wrinkles. Well not actually— but it created the look of them on my face. I’m 25 and don’t have any wrinkles, but somehow this stuff sinks into lines I didn’t know I have

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Went on super smooth and long lasting . Wish for a little more coverage though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: tried it for a year by mixing stuff with it, it's got aight coverage and it doesn't cause breakouts. BUT its pretty terrible for bad for dry flakey skin with texture though. 10/10 would not buy again

reviews.review_title: need to at least try this. you’ll be in love.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: not sure why i waited so long to try this but this is now my holy grail! terrific coverage but does not feel heavy or cakey. a little goes a long way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this foundation. The ingredient list is fantastic & the SPF is a great bonus. However I have normal/oily skin, and I found this to slip off my face. I looked super oily after only an hour. Also, the shade was DARK. I went with the lightest and I still looked orangey. The lack of shade choices really is a bummer. It’s too bad, it has so much potential.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing coverage! I switched from Dior Forever. This CC cream definitely has great coverage. If you love the dewy, hydrating look and feeling, this it IT!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a cc cream it has the best coverage. Yes, it is not es light as standard bb/cc creams, but neither as heavy as foundations. The only improvement i wish for is color range, because light ones are not really light ones and are going to yellowish undertones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Awesome coverage and SPF! Helping me preserve my youthful glow and the scent is pretty nice too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love this product!! its so dewy and full coverage. i wear it almost every day. only down side is shade range is kind of limited. the lightest shade is orange on me as i am really pale. i wish they had more shades for woc. sometimes it cakes w certain think powders so beware of that! but overall the formula is really nice and im a big fan, just wish they had more shades :))

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! Great coverage and lightweight at the same time! Highly reccomend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: amazing! it's hydrating and covers the redness on my cheeks just enough. I have dry skin so it's good but it could be a bit greasy for oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The shade matched me fairly well. You do need to use a decent amount if you want fuller coverage. In the months I have used it, I feel it is a good half day foundation. If you aren't doing much, it will last a good few hours. But more activity, especially outdoors, will cause flakiness and streaking (at least for me it did). Overall, I like it because it doesn't feel like I'm wearing anything.

reviews.review_title: Love for summer hate for fall/winter
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this foundation a few months ago and I absolutely adored it in the summer months when the natural oils on my face mixed perfectly with it leaving me with a nice natural finish. I don’t have dry skin, I feel like my skin tends towards the neutral oily side but this fall / winter as my skin was slightly more dry the foundation started caking around my eyes and nose. NO GO! But for summer months and oily skin types who like a fresh natural yet full coverage look, this is definitely a star in my books.

reviews.review_title: Perfect amount of dew for dry, eczema prone skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I personally love this cc cream.  It is perfect for my dry, eczema-prone skin.  It has my skin looking just slightly dewy all day long.  It is really the only coverage I have found that covers my eczema prone areas all day as well without accentuating them.  I find I have to use less concealer and it doesn't settle into wrinkles as much as liquid foundations do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Out of all these foundations, BB and CC creams I've used, this is the best one. It gives as much coverage as a medium to high coverage foundation. It is light. The texture and the way it blends is amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finally finished the product and writing a review for this.   Way too greasy. I have oily skin and this makes it so much worse. By the end of the day I’m a complete grease ball. Any makeup on top of this will slide all over. I like the convenient SPF though when I get lazy.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Ok.. I’m very very very picky about my foundations.. I hate 90% of the ones I’ve tried. I was looking for a slightly dewy full coverage foundation and if that is what you are looking for - this is perfect! If your looking for an actual cc cream/tint, you are probably NOT gonna like this. There is nothing “your skin but better” about this even if the tube wants to tell you that. But that’s totally fine by me bc that wasn’t what I was looking for (surprisingly - if you are looking for a beautiful light coverage true “your skin but better” tint - try Pixi skintint.. it outdoes every high end tint I’ve ever tried, it seriously looks like skin, it’s gorgeous!) My only issue with this foundation..oh god, the shade range is a nightmare. The fair is pasty white on me, fair light is the closest but way too peachy..and light looks dark taupe on my skin. So if I want to use this on a regular basis - I need to mix fair and fair light and it’s still a tiny bit off. If this was really just a tint the 4 shades wouldn’t be a big issue cause it would be sheer and workable, however if you are going to make a full coverage product - the shades matter and 4 just doesn’t cut it...but I definitely see myself reaching for this for the winter!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I actually really love this product! looking for something that had coverage and spf that I could mix in easily with my moisturizer for work from home, coverage but natural days. this is it! it literally makes my skin look completely natural with a subtle luminous sheen that looks healthy and vibrant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Its my first experience buying an expensive brand of foundation. I realized how good this product was AFTER finishing all off! It doesn’t have a strong scent like the cheap ones tend to have. It goes on well with a sponge and don’t need much of it. Pricing is a factor, hence the 4 stars. I would buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It went on really nicely, felt hydrating with an matte finish. Within 5 minutes of it on my face areas of my face (nose, cheek, forehead) dried out and flaking. Tried multiple times to make it work but unfortunately had to return. Loved the way it looked for the 5 minutes after application, very disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this foundation for years and have always received compliments on my skin. I’ve tried other foundations- Nars, Hourglass, L’Oréal but my It Cosmetics and the new Huda Faux Filter stick foundation are my absolute favorites.  This CC cream provided excellent coverage and makes your skin look flawless! Be sure to prep with a primer, dust your primer with a translucent powder, apply foundation with the Heavenly Skin brush or a DAMP beauty blender. Then apply another round of translucent powder with another damp beauty blender by dabbing and bouncing on your skin. Perfection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: By far the best product I've used for coverage. I was using an expensive foundation previously and thought of trying someone new. I love the light scent, great coverage, but not cakey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product leaves a glowy finish, a great amount of coverage and makes my skin look flawless. Couldn’t live without it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Only rating this foundation 2 stars for a few reasons, the biggest reason being the SHADE SELECTION, I’m not even super pale and “light” was too dark for my skin and oxidizes so baddd, for this reason I will be returning. Reason #2 is that it kind of looks cakey on my dry skin? It gets 2 stars for having SPF in it but that’s pretty much it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so greasy. Not transfer proof at all.  Just a giant mess. I've never been so disappointed.  However if you need something super quick this is high coverage. Just NOT worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is literally the only foundation that works on my dry skin!! It looks so dewy and I love that it has SPF 50. It’s super full coverage so I only use a half of a pump and blend it out so it’s more of a medium coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you want a natural coverage this is for you! And a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is VERY dewy. I did set it with powder and it still left me with a very satin finish. My skin is combo, oily in the t-zone & normal everywhere else. I didn’t notice that it made me any more greasy. After about 8 hours, I only had some shine around my nose and even then I didn’t mind it. I would suggest baking if you want a more matte finish. But I do love this for every day/running errands for the colder months. I don’t think I could use this in the summer, it may be a little too greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation was long-lasting on my combo skin when I put a generic translucent powder and UD's All Nighter over it. After 4 hour mark I had to use blotting sheets around my nose (but I didn't mind). This isn't fragance-free but I didn't notice the smell was strong or sensitize to my skin.  I have to put 4 stars due to the fact that there isn't enough neutral shades to get my exact shade match (I don't want to waste time or money on a foundation mixer).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this because I had a huge breakout on my eyebrow area due to waxing after quarantine was over. On that aspect, it really helped since it has a high coverage and a little goes a long way when applied with fingers. The downside is that my face became super dry that I now have to use face cream to moisturize it. The color is very on point with my skin color and it really is a good option for a color sunscreen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The cc cream will be oxidation few hours later. The color will become darker. 氧化挺严重

reviews.review_title: Truly full coverage, but way too thick/heavy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is truly full coverage, but for that reason much too heavy for my skin and preference. If you are looking for something that is only going to even out your skin tone, this one might be too much. It was hard to blend too because it is so thick, personally not a fan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If I could give zero stars I would. I can’t understand how this could work for anyone.   You CANNOT blend it. It is extremely thick. The formula will emphasize every pore and patch of dryness you have. It makes your skin so cakey - I felt like I was wearing halloween costume makeup. I have tried it 3 days in a row using different techniques of application and different products underneath to see if it would help, and no. It is literally the worst foundation I have ever used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a repurchase as it’s one of my all time favourite formulas...however, I may be mistaken but my last ones had a fragrance that I loved and this one does not have any!!! Is it just me? Still love it but am missing that smell!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s ok. Not long lasting retrying a tube that’s been sitting for awhile with new routing for winter dry skin. Personally hate the smell but it goes away. Normally use Estée Lauder foundation that I love but has been a bit too dry for me as the seasons change this year.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My holy grail forever. Not only is it good for my sensitive skin but it does also color correct a undred percent my red spots. Looks beautiful and natural (especially if you blend it with a beauty sponge),smells amazing.  A tube lasts a lonnnng time and you dont need a lot of product to cover any imperfections. I don’t think i will go for any other foundation type of product ever again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Literally the best product I ever got from Sephora. I don’t even need to use concealer or color corrector or anything else. This product is perfect and covers every little acne scar, pimple, redness, veins etc. It blends easily and a little goes a long way and it’s still full coverage. I highly recommend this product it is worth the money it’s so amazing! And I’ve never felt this way about a product before

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Go a shade or two lighter than usual. I tried Light (the third shade I think) but it was more like a medium. WAY too dark. If you're like me and sit kind of between shades, definitely go a shade or two lighter rather than lower.   On the other hand, it did a good job coverage wise. I have a lot of acne scarring and it covered it pretty well (though I color corrected and concealed as well).   It's a little greasy, but I have dry/combination skin so it actually worked really well for me. It DID melt under my mask a bit, but other than that it's a pretty good product!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage is great, but this stuff rubs off on everything! I use a primer before applying, setting powder, and setting spray but it still rubs off more than anything I’ve ever used. The colors are also kinda off in my opinion. They’re all very warm undertones but they look almost ashy. It’s particularly noticeable in photos. I’m on the hunt for a better color match with staying power.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wish I could give this product more stars because the formula is amazing but the shade range isn’t good! I got the lightest shade called fair and I wouldn’t consider it to be fair! Please make more shades for both lighter and darker skin tones so everyone can enjoy this great formula!!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product. Its the only thing I use for foundation. Good coverage, not too heavy or cakey

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am giving this foundation 4 starts out of five due to the limited shade selection. Be careful as the shade is darker than it seems. I really love it and will purchase again. I don't like layering foundation, moisturizer and an SPF as it feels and looks like quite a lot of product on me. If you would like to have an all in one solution, this is the one. Can' really comment on the CC capabilities as I use other products as well. But as an SPF with a mid-full coverage, I absolutely love it. Will likely go for a shade lighter next time.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - natural beige shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It is extremely greasy for oily skin. I have experimented it with several primers and powders for over a year. Same old same old: greasy and shiny. It eventually went to trash bin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Whatever shade you THINK you are - go a shade lighter. It's a lot darker than I expected and it does oxidize. HOWEVER the finish is amazing and it makes my skin appear smooth and beautiful! It really is a great product once you figure out your proper shade. A little bit goes a very long way (a full pump is too much I find). If you want more coverage, it builds well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite, favorite CC cream I have ever used! If you are someone who loves that glowy dewy finish then this CC cream is definitely for you. I love how it makes my skin look and it doesn't crease at all. It is great coverage but isn't super cakey and heavy which I love. It's just the right consistency! Whenever I use this product people always compliment my skin!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really don’t like the consistency. It’s so thick and honestly pretty greasy. I do have oily skin however most CC creams don’t bother me because they’re still pretty light weight— most are thicker than BB creams but not to the point that I feel like I’m adding three layers of make up on. My foundation was more lightweight than this. And also, despite how heavy it felt, it really didn’t do much in hiding my redness from current pimples or acne scars. I will say the only positive was that it didn’t protect my skin and I could skip my sunscreen wearing this.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not a great for people of color. I’m Haitian and Cape Verdean. Medium/deep skin tone with neutral and golden undertone mix. Rare beauty 370N (although that shade is too golden for me). Sephora matched me to neutral tan. I chose to go with Tan as the girl representing neutral tan did not look like me. TERRIBLE. Both suggested shade and self-picked shade were completely off. Very very ashy. Comes out much lighter than the bottle. I don’t know if it’s because there is sunblock in it which gives a white cast or what. Would not recommend for people of color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really, really wanted to love this product and had such high expectations from all of the great reviews! Unfortunately, it didn’t work out for me. First off, the color selection wasn’t fantastic, I’m right in between the 2 lightest shades, and found that after several hours it does oxidize, regardless of the color I applied. It does go on very nicely (a little goes a long way!), it’s so smooth, and is certainly full coverage. Beautiful, radiant, dewy finish. But that didn’t last, as it did separate and made my skin look very oily by the end of the night. I had to pop out with a mask on while wearing it, and when I got home and removed my mask, my entire nose was missing the cream. Maybe if your skin is more on the dry side this would las longer for you, but I don’t think this is the best product for oily or combo skin types. For the price, I just expect more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this for years and I love it!! Doesn’t feel heavy and honestly manages to cover most of my acne. Stays on even with a mask on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Only thing I can say is awesome!!!!!!!! I received a sample from a clothing company though I haven’t changed my foundation in 31 years always happy with the results for fun I decided to try it and had to have so I was googling away and was so happy to see ifs offered in Canada and the price is very fair!

reviews.review_title: Great consistency but few shades not not long wear
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There are few shades available, it was impossible to find my exact shade. I personally didn't like how this product became on my skin after wearing it all day long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I originally bought this after the tarte bb cream I use became out of stock. When I got it, the color that supposedly beat matched me was completely differently so I had to go in the store to change it. Now I have the right shade, but it’s heavy and doesn’t blend well and I have to keep adding powder to remove the shinnyness. I am not a foundation wearer so I like something light, that’s not cakey but this wasn’t it unfortunately. I don’t like it so I’m taking it back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product but I find you need quite a heavy moisturizer underneath so the product doesn’t show every wrinkle or fine lines. I’ve been using this for years and also find it stays put when you’re participating in outdoor activities which require sunscreen.

reviews.review_title: More like a full coverage foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not my favorite. This product is really thick and looks like a full coverage foundation. I wanted a CC cream to wear for days that I didn’t want to wear a full coverage foundation. I thought it would look like my skin but better but it just ended up like I tried to put a full face of makeup on. Gave it 3 stars because it has good coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product overall, especially the fact that I don’t need moisturizer or anything underneath—one step saves so much time in the morning! I will say that it looks and feels a little cakey in the Tzone by the end of the day, but that’s not uncommon. It lost a star for me because the shades I’ve used don’t really match their descriptions: I started with Fair, as I usually need the lightest shade of anything, and it was close but a little too warm/yellow to be a perfect match, so I ordered Fair Light hoping for a pinker/cool undertone like it says, but it still looks pretty warm to me and is a lot darker than it looked like it should be—how is there such a big difference between Fair and Fair Light?? If I use a really light powder it mostly evens out, but I will probably go back to the “warmer” Fair when I run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Like most of the reviewer‘s I can concur that it is full coverage which I need with my acne and redness however it is very thick   Initially I was extremely impressed by the coverage but now after using it for a week I feel like it’s too thick and there’s no way to thin it out  Also have found that it is good for about half the day but in the afternoon towards the evening it starts to really appear cakey and it creases especially under the eyes    This is unfortunate because I found the coverage to be quite good under the eyes early in the morning and I have very dark hereditary circles and I was hoping to use less under eye concealer but given the reaction it has over the course of the day I’m better off to use concealer.  I think that adding powder probably makes the heaviness worse but at same time feels like needs to be set   Even though I’ve got this jumbo tube and only about a single pump is required for the entire face I’m not planning to return it but rather use it in small doses and use my regular foundation in other areas of the face.  And all the side effects been occurring from use is that my skin is looking very dry and patchy after I remove my make up which is extremely unusual because I have oily skin.  I read the list of ingredients that I couldn’t see anything that would cause this and I’m wondering if it’s related to the sunscreen? Usually sunscreen  makes me break out so I’m also waiting to see if I get an increase in acne from using this product

i have really dry skin and this looks good for the first few hours and by the end of the day my face is an oil slick. this has never happened with any other foundation before. coverage is good but it’s also really heavy... i think it’s the sunscreen in it. there are sunscreens out there that feel way lighter even under a a foundation. i read reviews about the heaviness of this CC cream and i still decided to give it a shot because i dont mind other full coverage foundations... but it’s actually too heavy for me haha

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff for covering my acne it’s a super thick high coverage and the fact that it has spf 50 from MINERAL sunscreen is very good and important  The only bad thing about this product is the awful shade range and even the lightest color they have is very yellow  Will definitely be purchasing the color tan to match my fake tanning next summer

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: was alright. nothing special. I would day its not worth the price. just mediocre

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage and doesn't break me out! Though it feels a bit heavy on my face.

reviews.review_title: Doesn’t live up to the hype! :(
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted SO MUCH to love this! No matter what I tried it just looked cakey and collected in my pores. I tried with skincare first, with primer, with and without a foundation brush. Nothing made it wearable. It collected and got congealed around my nose and sat on top of my skin. The color was good, but that’s about all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this in an IPSY glam bag. I love it so much. I've had the hardest time finding something that doesn't get cakey. This has a nice moist texture, feels great on my skin. It has a wonderful coverage that I just love. 5 stars all around.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The best cc cream its beautiful and the shade is very adaptable

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sweepstake!!! Amazing product with needed SPF. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty much always looks good on my skin, except in extremely cold/dry climates.

reviews.review_title: Had to give it a second shot, but...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had to give this CC cream a few tries because the first time I used it, I swiped it on with a brush and I didn’t like it at all. The second time around, I learned my lesson. I moisturized before applying and swiped it on with my fingers and beauty blender pro. After that, it came out beautifully and covered my post acne scarring wonderfully. If you apply too much however, it will kind sort of caked on. Less is more. If you follow that rule of thumb, this CC cream is beautiful. I’m always a fan of tinted moisturizers, CC creams, and foundations with SPF too. It always helps.

reviews.review_title: it’s not just a CC cream
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was searching for a high SPF Foundation for a long time. It works perfect on my face, covered pores, and the colour is natural.  But not long lasting (less than 10hrs)if you have a party aft work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 10/10 recommend this product. I have a lot of texture on my skin from acne scarring and this is the only product I’ve found that doesn’t highlight the scarring but evens out my skin. It provides a lot of coverage and moisturizes my skin. I can also make it more matte by adding a powder foundation and matte setting spray or I can make it a more dewy finish with no powder over top. This is a great product for anyone with acne prone skin or scarring.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love CC+ cream! starting using it a few years ago and I feel like it does actually improve my skin. it goes on great. I have used it in the matte finish as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! Such a natural foundation choice that still provides a good amount of coverage.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Works wonders for my face and has 50+ spf! What more could ask for

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very heavy for a cc cream. My face looked patchy and caky.. it didn’t blend smoothly into my skin. I dont not recommend if you have dry skin.. Otherwise the finish is nice when you first apply it but it doesn’t last all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It’s absolutely disgusting.The second ingredient is snail excrements.Don’t buy it unless you don’t mind putting snail mucus on your face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: horrible product. it looks patchy and makes my face looks ashy. color selection is limited.  almost impossible to blend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. Hands down my favourite foundation.

reviews.review_title: It's got it's perks, and some Drawbacks too
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This CC cream has a lot of good qualities, but it also has some drawbacks.   I'm impressed with it's coverage quality. It worked great on my healing acne scars and dark circles, but it's VERY thick. A lot of reviewers are right when they say a little goes a long way. The finish is very soft and dewey, but it does come in matte finish for those who want it.  The first real issue I took with it was how hard it was to wash out of my makeup brush. I had to wash it three times to get it all out. I started to skip using it in favor of my fingertips so I wouldn't ruin my favorite foundation brush.   I also found the product to be a little drying. I generally have combination skin, but it would sometimes make my face feel tight.   Overall, I like the product and use it when I don't feel like doing a full face of makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fantastic product and great full coverage foundation. A little goes a long way when using this product. Covers acne scars and dark marks and makes my skin look flawless. Don’t even need to use concealer. Great product, been using it for the past 3 years and will continue to use it. I always use the Dr. Brandt Pores No More pore refiner primer with this foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had to return this product for a different shade but I love the product. I exchanged my fair light for light medium.  I was really surprised in person to see the shades; fair light and light medium were both listed as having pink undertones but you never would guess it by seeing the product in person. I love the coverage for an SPF product. I still use concealer with it but it’s great. Makes my blush and bronzers go on smooth. Wears well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing CC + SPF cream!  Every time I wear it even I am amazed at how well it looks.  I have Melasma and the coverage it provides is amazing.  Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this because my favorite cc cream was out of stock and since this was so highly rated, I thought, why not? Well, I hate this. It feels heavy. It feels cakey. It doesn’t blend right. It’s dry and not at all creamy. Very disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If I could score it a zero I would.  Hated it. Greasy, came off on everything.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was super surprised at the coverage, but good surprised. I have hyperpigmentation and this covers it without any concealer & the SPF is a plus

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: was heavy and made my skin dry.. ..............................

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall I really liked this product. It definitely has coverage and a little goes a long way and I thought the finish was beautiful. BUT! I have fair skin with a cooler undertone and both of the lighter shades did not work for me at all. Fair was too warm with hints of yellow and Fair Light which sounds like it would work was too dark. I was so disappointed with their shade selection. Otherwise I would give it 5 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Disappointing. Doesn’t blend well. Drys my skin out and is cakey. Definitely would not buy or recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this product, it applied seamlessly to my face, my absolute favourite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my go to staple for years. Its full coverage, matte, stays put, smells nice, and lasts all day. I have very sensitive skin prone to break outs and I have never had a break out from this foundation, even after sleeping in it. The SPF is fantastic too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Got this CC cream recently and like it so far. I put 4 stars as it's a bit thick for my skin but overall its a good protection skin with a full coverage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite foundation. It’s FULL coverage and I make sure I’m very moisturized before and I only use a tiny amount. It covers my rosacea and I love that it has SPF.

reviews.review_title: How amazing is this CC cream?!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had heard about IT Cosmetics for years now but it wasn't until recently that I decided to try their products. I finally caved it and bought their CC cream and I am beyond impressed.  I have never tried a CC cream before but this applies so smoothly! I love the idea that this is not quite like a foundation but still has great coverage. I'm so happy to find a CC cream that works on my first try!

reviews.review_title: Love this, first CC purchase and hooked!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage, stays put, smells super refreshing and clean. So many color options!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Light color is not light at all, it's quite dark and ORANGE.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was WAY more coverage than I wanted... it’s more like a full coverage foundation with a great SPF but the list of ingredients and the fragrance made it a no go for me.

reviews.review_title: It Just Doesn't Get Any Better
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Where oh where have you been all my life?  At last I have found the perfect foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: SOOO DISAPPOINTED!! Are Sephora employees paid more to recommend/sell products by certain brands etc?? I specifically said I wanted a LONG WEAR Foundation. I said I love Dr. Jarts BB cream but it doesn't last all day. I mentioned I had rosacea and the sales clerks both agreed this would be perfect.This has barely lasted 2 hours on my face with primer.....100% should have gotten the Armani Foundation that I was talked out of buying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve noticed pretty early on that the silvery-grey material of the packaging has been peeling right off and getting over all of the other products in my makeup-bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Terrible heavy and colour all wrong. Wanted to love it but didn’t.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product's formula was way too cakey, sticky and pale. One of my least favorite products I have ever purchased

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a sun screen with foundation and cake across this product so give it a try.  This CC+ cream does not only come with a SPF50+ protection but also provides a very good coverage.  I have a scar on my face for 15 years and it totally covers it.  Love the product and will definitely re-purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is so good. Flawless. I’ll be using this forever. Try it. You won’t regret!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good coverage and smells good. Very light on the skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the coverage and the spf. Super hydrating. a little bit thick and can build up in smile lines and get greasy near the end of the day. Pulled a little pink/ orange on my asian skin, but i'd buy again for the coverage, formula and spf. Rare to find full coverage with spf over 30.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Such an amazing product. I have tried so many cc and bb creams and none were the right shade and they all dried out my skin. This one doesn’t do that. I prefer this to foundation most of the time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the holy grail of all makeup products (in my opinion of course). I can’t put into words how much I ADORE this product. This is one of the only things I can say I’ve bought at least 5 of. Whenever it runs out, I’m running to the nearest store to buy another one! Now, I love makeup, it’s so much to play around with it. However, that being said I don’t have time to do a full face all the time. I love wearing makeup as frequently as possible though and this is always used. It works so nicely for a natural look because it’s so light and not heavy on the face yet you can also do a full glam look with this too because it’s full coverage! It’s the best of both worlds! And it has skincare and SPF? Swoon. Don’t hesitate. The BEST!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I keep buying it because I can’t find anything better. It glides on and looks so natural while covering up skin imperfections like I’ve been airbrushed! I try other foundations and this is the best.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: More of a foundation than CC cream, but my FAV foundation. This is my daily go-to. I apply with a damp beauty blender and a little goes a long way. I have combo/acne prone skin and around my mouth & nose can get very dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product! A little goes a loooong way, trust me! Goes on really smooth for a nice smooth full coverage. Although it’s full coverage, it isn’t thick at all. Feel like I’m not wearing makeup at all, feels very natural!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: good coverage, feels light on the skin and has a high SPF I would recommend for a light cover

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this CC cream because I heard such amazing reviews for it. But honestly, my hunt for a solid light foundation continues. One major issue I had was trying to finding a color match to my skin, which usually isn't very difficult. For some reason even their light shades are extremely dark for fair skin. Additionally, the texture it leaves on the skin is not something I prefer at all. It seems to highlight my skin imperfections. I am rather let down by this product overall.

reviews.review_title: A no go for me, sadly!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this foundation so much as everyone was raving about it but, wow the finish on my skin is so gross... It just emphasizes my pores and looks SO cakey (Normal/dry clear skin with only a bit of redness for reference). There is also so much transfer when using this, it never feels dry. Not to talk about the shade range... it's lacking. I've been trying samples at Sephora in the hope to find the perfect foundation, but it's my least favorite. The lemon scent is also weird for a foundation, but not disgusting. I also tried the illumination version and it looked like I had glitters all over my face.. not for me!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - natural beige shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a pretty good product if you are looking for something that provides full coverage. I have used IT for years. This product is super wet, so I must set it with powder. I'm glad that they added more shades (years ago there were only a few).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the coverage and it’s not too heavy on skin! Big plus factor is the SPF!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Product reviews are not always reliable; but for me, this is a product that lives up to much of the hype.  I have dry, mature skin with some discoloration from sun damage and inherent blue undertones showing more.  This cream effortlessly gives a nice coating of camouflage without looking or feeling masked or heavy; I was surprised the first time I applied it.  I purchased it more for tennis - I can lightly cover some discoloration and it lasts longer than other foundations - but I find myself using it more on a daily basis as it is easy and a fast to apply several products in one.  I highly recommend-

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this is my ABSOLUTE favorite face cream. I absolutely adore it. I have dry and sensitive skin and it doesn't irritate it at all. it looks wonderful and I've gotten so many compliments on how flawless my skin looks while I'm wearing it. I definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_title: pretty good product but not perfect!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A little pricey but half a pump is enough for my whole face.  It also feels quite heavy/cakey on the face but the way it looks is so airbrushed and amazing!! It's hard to believe that one product can do so much!  I put this on without any moisturizer underneath and I think it does not totally replace a good moisturizer. I do love that I don't need to put on an additional SPF 50+ product.  However, my only real problem with this is the shade range and initial cakey/drying feeling.   I wear estee lauder double wear in ecru and the sephora app told me that the fair light(ivory pink) would be an EXACT match. It was not the right shade at all. The undertones were not neutral like my foundation and it ended up being too dark, but I made it work with some setting powder. There needs to be more color options.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product originally in one of my Beauty Box subscriptions and it is so amazing and I haven't stopped using it in fact I just ordered a new tube from Sephora. The consistency is very creamy but very blendable I would recommend a primer and maybe a light powder just to blot if you have combination to oily skin. if you're looking for a very natural CC cream this is perfect

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finally gave in to the hype, even though I've used the same BB cream for years. The IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream is beautiful, creamy, and has great coverage. Love the SPF coverage as well. I use this on the days where my acne is really acting up, and I love the feeling that it's helping my breakouts while also covering up. Feels glorious to apply with a brush too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this using the color match feature but it was too light/and yellow. I then purchased the Medium, and that was perfect! Very impressed with the coverage, and love that it’s SPF 50!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was assisted in finding my shade for this product and I ended up with the shade tan. Idk if it was the undertone or what but this product made me look so gray. One of the worst products I’ve tried and for over $50 is a joke. Much better foundations at Sephora!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down the best CC cream out there. I struggle a lot with acne but this gives me flawless skin in just minutes. It's so easy to apply and lasts all day. I've been using for probably 2 straight years and I couldn't be happier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it so much. A guilt free foundation that protects and boosts your skin as you use it. A little goes a long way. I’m a drugstore girl but I’m happy I paid extra for this, it’s worth every penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i started using this after finding out that they discontinued Urban Decay Naked foundation.  matching my color was so off,and now i look pail in all my pictures.

reviews.review_title: Blends beautifully matched my complexion perfectly
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love ... matches my summer tanned skin perfect ... blends seamlessly and sticks around for all day wear ... will be buying the lighter shade for this fall/winter ...

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my ride or die foundation. I absolutely love it and it’s the only foundation I have found that doesn’t brake me out or look shiny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best CC cream.  Love all the ingredients in this (niacin, peptide, collagen etc.) and love that it has spf 50.  In the summer when I'm tanned, the Tan color is a perfect match for me.  When I start to lose my tan in the fall, I switch to Light Medium and when I'm at my lightest in the winter, I use the Light.  The colors give my skin a flawless finish, never cakey, very natural looking.  I quite often have strangers and friends ask me what kind of foundation I use.  I like how this isn't as heavy as foundation.  I used to us Smashbox's CC Cream, then it got discontinued.  Boy am I glad I switched over, this is amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This didn’t work for me at all. It made my skin look very oily and enlarged my pores. Transferred easily. It does have good coverage. I’m 33 and have combo skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It didn’t oxidize on my face which is good. But it doesn’t meet my expectations while I prefer a natural finish. It also look cakey and didn’t stay long on my face.

reviews.review_title: This Educator Loves The CC Cream!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely the Best! This is the best foundation/ CC cream that I have ever used. The holy grail. I am 45 and it makes my skin look flawless on my Zoom sessions with colleagues and students. I bought the IT brush to use, and I am so happy. You don’t need allot to cover entire face. I just received the luminous one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this when I want a bit more coverage. I only need about half a pump to go my entire face. I put a bit on the back of my hand to warm it up a bit, dot it over my face and use a Kabuki brush to blend out then use a beauty blender to even it out. I finish it off with just a bit of LM setting powder in my tzone and it lasts all day in the Texas heat!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use this product almost everyday and it is great for an everyday natural look, but it is definitely buildable if you are looking for higher coverage. It has a very natural finish without looking greasy or cakey and blends into the skin easily. The only reason I didn’t give this product five stars is because I wish there was a larger shade range.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my holy grail everyday makeup! I don’t think I will ever switch! I love the added spf protection. It is build able which means I can wear it very light to just even out skin tone or I can get a flawless finish for events if I build it up a little bit more. My absolute favorite cc cream/ foundation

reviews.review_title: Could not find a shade match
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Medium Tan was too light. Tan looked complete grey on my skin - it was way too neutral! I’m very reluctant to even try Neutral Tan, if Tan made my face look dirty. Two stars for the nice consistency and fresh, fair scent. Otherwise, super disappointed in not being able to find my shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is literally the product that I never leave my house without. The way it oxidizes and sets in adjusting to your skin tone is so beautiful! I use this when I go run errands, go to school/work, go shopping, and even to the beach! I HIGHLY APPRECIATE THAT THIS FOUNDATION HAS SPFFF PROTECTION because us ladies really be out and about 24/7. This foundation literally radiates you’re inner beauty and you will be glowing inside and out. Definitely try the duo of both the IT COSMETICS FOUNDATION + CHANEL POUDRE UNIVERSELLE LIBRE NATURAL FINISH LOOSE POWDER. Thank me later, youthfulness will wrap you with open arms with this bomb duo!

reviews.review_title: Best Purchase In A Very Long Time
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What can I say, I love her!!!! I’ve been looking for a foundation that gives natural coverage and honestly she’s great. I’ve tried a few other foundations such as the Armani Beauty And Nars  Sheer Glow but this is the winner. Three reasons why: the product itself is easily applicable with brush or beauty blender, doesn’t feel like I’m wearing a layer of make up but it still has a great coverage and lastly, the colour medium is actually a real golden/olive colour not just a yellow undertone. Anyways I’m happy about this purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use to LOVE this but something changed. I used the fair shade and it was very pale and now it’s way too dark and orange...Yuck! Even the consistency is different. This has to be reformulated. Anyone else notice a difference? Please bring back the old formula and super pale fair shade that is actually fair and neutral.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: For what it is it’s pretty good. Good coverage but it is a cream so it does not “set down” and it will slay a tad shiny. If you’re really oily don’t bother. If you’re normal to dry this could be your jam.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: best CC cream i've ever tried! I got this recommended to me by a Sephora Employee and i'm hooked. It provides amazing coverage, while not feeling to heavy, I apply with brush then smooth with a beauty blender.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my fav foundation-related products. I love that I was able to find a shade that perfectly matches my skin tone, the ingredients are clean, the finish is dewy but not greasy, it has good coverage, sun protection, etc etc. I took away a star because it's one of those products that does not last very long on the face and reapplying can make it look caked on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this foundation/cc cream.  I apply with a beauty blender and it's a great alternative to foundation, plus the SPF is a huge bonus.  My only issue is that the shade Fair (the lightest option) is too dark for me so I can only use it when I have fake tan on, but I tan at home pretty often during the summer so it's ok.  Wish there was a lighter shade for winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this for years and definitely recommend. I’ve got my daughter using it as well. Great that it mixes skin care, coverage and sunscreen!! What more can you ask for? It is not full coverage but I’d say definitely a strong medium, I can still see my beauty marks and darker freckles. It does have a sunscreen smell but it goes away after a short time. It’s easy to put other cream as well as powder makeup over. It does transfer a small amount but I’ve used this daily even on Caribbean vacations and I will forever repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the travel size of this, just to be sure i liked it. And i definitely will purchase the full size to use for certain circumstances, but it's not bulletproof for every occasion.  The shade range is lacking, and i have no idea how they have not expanded the shade range with this product being out for so long... I purchased Light and i can just barely get away with it during summer. For reference i'm always in the light, yellow undertone category (mixed asian, tans easily, pale-ish in winter), my holy grails are Estee Lauder double wear in 1w2 Sand (winter shade), and loreal infallible fresh wear in 420 (winter) and 425 (summer). I have oily and acne prone skin with scarring. This covers everything beautifully with just a small amount applied with a sponge (dont use a lot). One layer and i'm satisfied for everyday wear, HOWEVER it does get oily and wear off throughout the day, even with a good setting powder, and it's definitely not mask-proof, as it will transfer. But the finish looks natural, and it looks great for the first few hours i put it on.  I like this product for super quick makeup days where i want SPF and good coverage, its good for running errands or casual days. But don't expect this to be bulletproof on oily skin. In terms of shade...Light IS orange leaning, so if you dont have warm undertones, def go down to a lighter shade. In winter i will have to mix or buy a different color. Overall, this is a good product for someone looking for a quick and easy foundation for casual makeup days.  Also for anyone between this and the MATTE formula, the original looks way better and applies nicer, but the other one does last longer (but it's extremely matte) AND the light shade is not orange..so something to consider.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In the past, I’ve always used powder foundations - I’ve found anything liquid to be too messy and time consuming (and I’m a makeup in ten mins or less kind of girl). I was looking for something with SPF in it to protect my fair skin during the summer and now this is my go-to everyday product! I absolutely love it. The coverage is totally buildable and one pump is more than enough for a gorgeous and natural look.
