There’s also no strong scent like a lot of foundations I’ve sampled before, which is good because I’m super sensitive to scent. Overall it’s amazing and hasn’t broken out my skin at all, which is a miracle in and of itself as I’m prone to acne. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This CC cream has an excellent coverage and I'm impressed how long it lasts, cause it spreads so well on my face! My number 1 CC cream! I'll always have one of this with me!

reviews.review_title: Great texture but doesn’t matches my skin tone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the trial size last month and Unfortunately It doesn’t matches my skin tone I am one shade lighter than this one so I will try to the fair tone. BTW It feels amazing on skin I am dry skin and It doesn’t feels like I was using no makeup at all , and makes your skin looks flawless . Therefore I’m giving a try to a fair tone

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wonderful foundation but still too dark for me. The “ivory” is if I got a spray tan

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! I haven’t touched foundation since the first time I used this. Provides medium coverage, easy to apply with brush, sponge or hands. It does wear as the day goes on but reapplying doesn’t make it look or feel cakey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best foundation. I did not burn while wearing this on  Face . Doesn’t make me breakout or feel heavy on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Favourite CC cream!  I have tried other brands and I found them too oily or left weird streak marks on my face. This was easy to apply and stayed on all day with great coverage that wasent too obvious I had something on my face. Love that it is also spf 50.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My all time favorite foundation. I like full coverage, and this does the job. I’ve looked for others to replace this, and haven’t been able to find anything close. Used with primer and setting spray, this stays on quite nicely. I highly recommend giving this foundation a try if you’re looking for a great full coverage foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really like this products! Even better than the more expensive ones I bought before. Think I will really become its loyal user.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product for an everday natural look. Goes on smoothly and lasts all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: IM OBSESSED WITH THIS PRODUCT! EVEN AT A 47 YOUNG MY SKIN STAYS SMOOTH AND PROTECTED ALL DAY WITHOUT HEAVY FOUNDATION!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this product because of the coverage this provides and not to mention an SPF 50. I am normally a sheer to medium coverage person and this is borderline FULL coverage. I need only the smallest amount which is great because I won't have to repurchase. This is my second time using this product. The first time I bought it I bought it in Light medium and that was a bit to dark, even when suntanned. I purchased the light and its okay but I think the next time I am going to purchase a shade down.  The shade range is difficult in this product but not a huge deal for me as I can use less product/wear bronzer (if using a lighter shade). All in all a great product. Great to travel with because it is in a tube and an easy peasy put together look for traveling when you don't want to spend too much time on your makeup.  I gave 4 stars because of the shade range which I am having difficulty with and also the smell! The smell sometimes gets to me but not a deal breaker.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really good product. It’s great for summer, even though it’s heavy, it stays on all day and provides full coverage and spf protection.   I wasn’t sure about it at first because the texture seemed weird. It’s thick and creamy, and I found it hard to blend (I tried it first with my fingers). Now I’ve started applying it with a foundation brush and then I blend it with a buffer brush to make it look really natural. I absolutely love it now. I’ll definitely be buying it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m writing this review on behalf of my mom who I bought it for as a gift. Her usual foundation was discontinued and she had not yet found an adequate replacement. She has skin that is prone to discolouration without sun protection applied, so she had to have a full coverage foundation that also had a decent amount of spf. I recalled this one off of a friend’s glowing review and convinced her to give it a try. She loves it, the coverage is amazing, the SPF 50 is a lot higher than most foundations on the market have to offer, and it feels lightweight on the skin. There’s definitely a reason why this is such a favorite in the beauty community!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My favourite foundation...goes on very smoothly - I would definitely recommend this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Too thick and the colour was not right, even though I chose the lightest shade it was still too dark for me.  Unfortunately, I was unable to try it in the store or else I wouldn't have bought it in the first place.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My HG foundation product. The only reason for not giving 5 stars is that I feel like the shade range could be a little more extensive. I have extremely fair skin so in the winter this product - in the lightest shade - tends to pull a little orange on me. However, it wears beautifully and that’s probably why I keep repurchasing.

reviews.review_title: Hydrating but not for warm tones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Used to love this a few years ago when the bb and cc cream craze first started, but the shade tan was always too dark (tan, pink tone) and medium is way too light. I'm a medium olive tone. Recently I ordered medium tan thinking it would solve my shade problems. It's also so pink/cool tone. Makes me look ashy. Doesn't work for warm skin tones. Had to return it. And it gets pretty greasy. There's better bb and cc creams on the market (high end and drugstore).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing for summer. Works well with benefit Pore professional matte primer. Not oily but gives a nice dewy finish. Love the SPF in the product.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination/oily skin with a very oily T-zone. This moisturizes the drier areas of my face and doesn't add a ton of oil in my T-zone. I use this in the place of moisturizer and foundation in the summer and then add powder and setting spray to set. GREAT coverage with a natural finish and good SPF. It's a pretty viscous formula, but a little goes a long way and doesn't feel too heavy. One of my favorite products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Looking for a new foundation for the summer bc of how tan I get, got this cc cream and the shade matches perfectly! I was outside in the heat in this and my face looked flawless in person and in pictures! Love!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My holy grail cc cream! Love it so much its my go to it keeps my oil at bay and it doesnt break me out. Best cc cream ever definitely give it a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is like the holy grail product for a busy girl. It has nice medium coverage, moisturizes, and high spf. Makes my morning routine so much quicker and gives my skin a natural radiant even look. love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Accentuates all lines pores and texture. It’s very heavy and if you touch your face comes off on your fingers. It’s ok in low light when my skin is really bad because it covers everything but good lord in sunlight it puts about ten years on you. I’m 43 but have VERY good skin. I’ve babied it my whole life and this stuff makes you look wretched.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is super smooth, velvety, and beautiful! It lasts all day and feels light and nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the finish on this cc cream, it’s so glowy and skinlike. Gives you a flawless complexion, however It does blend out and dry lighter than it appears so i recommend you go a shade darker.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First, the shade range on this product is horrible—IT Cosmetics do better.   I don’t know if the formula changed, but it started looking really cakey on me the last time I bought it. Colors skew orange in the lighter shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m gonna write the most honest review I can think of for people looking to buy this product. I’ve been using it for years and truly love it, it has great coverage, skin care benefits, SPF and has a very natural finish. However, this product is on the heavier side which is why I don’t use it on a daily basis and just stick to a tinted SPF. I highly recommend it, it is the perfect daytime foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the formulation of this cc cream, which leaves me with a perfectly flawless complexion. It doesn’t seem to move around even when I work out! Love the fact that it’s spf 50 and has nourishing ingredients. I little seems to go a long way and it really does feel light- weight - my skin but better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this product while ago it’s really nice, it covers, looks natural and I’m loving the SPF that comes with it.  BUT it is SO heavy.  It’s not light and airy - you can feel the mask on your face.  It’s the only reason for 3 stars.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample and have been using this mainly as UNDER EYE CONCEALER for a natural coverage. Since it provides full coverage a little bit goes a long way. I love that it's HYDRATING so my undereye doesn't look dry by end of the day. SPF 50 is another huge plus for extra protection. It has a LONG list of ingredients including many plant oils/extracts with an EWG score of 5 (medium hazard).

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the coverage of this CC cream!  Have great coverage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have gone through so many brands of foundation. Being biracial, from Hawai'i, with combination skin, it can be so difficult to not only find the right shade, but something that looks natural and has enough coverage to go out or to the beach - this is the best stuff! I barely have to use any of it. I use a Bobbi Brown foundation brush, because they were my go too. But this stuff works wonders. I pair it with a Nars concealer if I need a little extra coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This shade was supposed to be my exact shade its not its lighter like winter time shade and it shows my pores omg and it has an annoying smell like oranges its so annoying

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this, so badly. I love other IT products. I love that this has such a high SPF as I have been battling correcting hyper pigmentation/sun spots for months. I love that it offered more coverage, since I'm not all the way there in loving my skin yet. The color matched great, but I have large pores on my cheeks & you could always see the color sitting in my pores. I also had trouble getting it to absorb. I tried applying with my fingers, a brush & sponges, you could always see it streak of it sitting on my face. I am a bit of a make up noob still, so maybe there is a trick I haven't learn. Mega sad it didn't work for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A perfectly smooth, light, and protective tinted CC cream. I bought this for an outdoor wedding that I was in. It did not move or crease, despite it being 90F degrees and lasted from 11am-11pm!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smears on Like butter doesnt sink in your skin at all. Very drying and burning! The fair light was very orange on my skin and showed every imperfection will be going back! But I hate wasting Time on products so dont order this bc it's not the same as it was a few years ago. Also smells like strong desitin. Its

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot say enough good things about this cc cream! It makes my naturally red, sensitive skin look even and glowy.  This has never caused me to break out or clogged my pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Would give it 0 stars if I could! I am a dark brown  woman and the deepest shade did nothing for me but made me ashy! Please do better that’s is not the darkest or deepest shade call it what it and stop misleading customers.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've had acne-prone skin for years which has resulted in some pretty extensive facial scarring. This is one of the only cc creams (that I've tried at least) that not only covers my blemishes, but feels nourishing and breathable for my skin. The additional benefits of SPF and anti-aging components elevate this product even more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought a wrong shade for my skin and came back to the store to the exchange it  for a darker shade and they refused to change it .

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is IT! I’ve finally found a product that is a true match to my complexion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nothing special. It feels a lil cakey. Coverage is good, shade was perfect match. It did make my nose look patchy and it grabbed to some dry spots even though i moisturized well and made my pores look huge even though i put a smoothing primer on. In pictures looks nice and from far away, up close not to good. (skin routine is the same and always works good w other foundations). Wouldnt repurchase again though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage and leaves a smooth surface. It doesn't gather in your pores.

reviews.review_title: great ingredients, good coverage, not long-lasting
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this brand and the formulation of its products. The CC cream is no exception. I found a very good shade match and enjoy the lighter-medium coverage as I have freckles and anything too heavy looks too cakey/fake. It's a nice, light, protecting product for the summer although it does not stay on all day and definitely requires reapplication, especially if your day includes sun exposure/sweating etc. It can also be streaky at times so I usually apply with a foundation brush and then blend any steaks just with my fingers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My low rating mostly has to do with the fact that the color pictured for Fair Light is *completely* different than the product you receive in real life. When I first opened my package, I thought they’d sent a different color by accident. I’m fair-skinned with pink undertones, and typically go for whatever the lightest shade available is. I picked the Ivory Pink tone instead of the lightest this time. However, this tint is much better suited for someone with olive undertones.  I tested the cream on half of my face then let it sit for 20 minutes before comparing how it looked in different kinds of lighting. It's orange-y on me and looks as if I'd caked it on, though I was considerate to use very little product. I was eager to try this out because the reviews were mostly positive and really hoped it would suit me, but this CC+ cream is just too foundation-like and I think the shade advertised was lit incorrectly. If you enjoy a more dramatic look though, this could be a great tinted SPF for you! The packaging is useful, and the pump dispenser makes it easy to keep things tidy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample through Ipsy originally and loved it to so much so got a full size product from sephora. Sometimes it left my skin feeling dry but I realized I just had to use my fingers instead of a brush or a sponge. It is a great product and doesn’t leave my combination skin feeling oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is too thick and heavy for a CC cream, which is supposed to be fast and easy to use. It sits on top of your skin and looks like spackle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I originally wanted a tinted moisturizer because my skin was looking really good and I just wanted a little coverage for the summer especially a cc/bb cream that has spf in it so I thought this would be great. So I used the shade finder and it said this was my shade but it’s too dark. It settles into fine lines and I think it’s breaking my skin out because all of a sudden I’m getting a lot of pimples on my chin and in between my eyebrows. I even got one on the cheek which isn’t really normal for my skin. I really wanted to love this but it’s just not what I expected at all. Won’t be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first CC cream I can confidently say matches my skin tone perfectly, while providing medium coverage without having to build the product immensely. It is light enough that I can apply it with my fingers.   I find that applying moisturizer (I use the Algenist Ultimate moisturizer) as well as a primer (BECCA filter) provides plenty of grip. I also use the Laura Mercier setting powder on the politest parts of my face and find this CC cream lasts me throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Drys my skin out so that I’m peeling in patches by the middle of the day. I even tried applying only a tiny amount mixed with moisturizer, but it still has the same effect. Also dislike how cakey it looks on my skin, it shows like a heavy foundation and gives me a definite “she’s wearing makeup” rather than a natural look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wore this CC cream for all 4 north American seasons before writing this review. It's good stuff. The SPF in the formula somehow works better than layering sunblock under a regular foundation. It's super creamy and I found the coverage to be light and that suits me just fine. It can also be built up for more coverage. I would highly recommend this if you live in a sunnier climate than I do because it really goes far to protect the skin. This product really shows it's worth in the summer. In the winter it's not especially drying so it gets bonus points for that!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had a sample of this product from Sephora and I really enjoyed it! You can definitely get this to be full coverage, however, I prefer a lighter coverage for a CC cream so I tried to sheer it out a bit during application. It has a natural, slightly dewy finish, but I just set with loose powder in the places that I would normally get oily and it was perfect. It wore well throughout the day, and I'm definitely considering this when I need a new CC cream!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have the light medium and light and I mix  70/30 (light/darker) to get close to my skin tone. But light works very well when I’m pale.. it’s not extremely light . and for spf 50 this is great. The darker shade did oxidize a bit so I am only keeping it to mix with my light shade during summer . Moisturize well underneath.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super drying and cakey looking. If you have slightly dry skin this is a definite pass. I initally put it on after moisturizer and it clinged to the dry patched I occasionally get by my nose and in between my brows. So I though I would try again and use primer and setting spray after, treating it like a foundation and still the same. It doesn't blend and the color matching link is not accurate. I use Nars and Mac foundation and used the color matching link and it said fair light would be my shade but it is way too dark and you cant blend it out. I had high hopes after reading the reviews but I had to return the product.

reviews.review_title: Not suited for an online purchase
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Had problems with shipment. They sent the samples and not the main cream. Took it back to the store and the clerk told me that she could not help me in the store and I had to speak to the online rep. Coming to the product, i ordered the Medium tan as I have south asian brown skin  This was three shades too light.  The darker tones shown in the color match picture look too  dark for me. also I didnt see full coverage.  I used it without sunblock. It would have been even lighter and whiter with sunblock and would not match my skin tone at all

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: really thought I found THE cc cream and had high hopes for this product. Alas, this is not for oily skin. The colour range is limited. The product applies thick and accentuates imperfections. The price is insanely high for a cc cream!! I ended up returning it.

reviews.review_title: A M A Z I N G
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation really surprised me. I have never tried CC creams so I wasn't really sure what I was expecting, I lean towards medium coverage foundations and this defiantly has really impressive coverage. I have redness and texture and I noticed that it covered everything with only one pump! I was pleasantly surprised. I have dry skin but I do not like using illuminating foundations or dewy ones because I would much rather hydrate my skin with creams and serums so this was perfect! altho I did notice that I used this when I hadn't put on my moisturizer before hand and my dry patches were kind of noticeable, but that was my fault.  The longevity is also great! 8-9 hour wear without touching up!! Side note- I have such a hard time finding a good shade in any foundation for me this was an exact match! I have an interesting skin color, I am a POC but more on the lighter side so its hard sometimes to find a good undertone but this was perfect, I am so impressed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best foundation ever.  Very full coverage! My only complaint is I wish there were more shades, the shades are also on the dark side but an awesome buy!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you have fair or cool toned skin this isn’t for you. The color swatch on the box (and online) was at least 3 shades lighter than the actual product, which is much darker and warmer/more orange than advertised, which in my case was the lightest shade available; so buying a lighter shade isn’t an option, AND it oxidizes after application so no amount of finessing could make this shade work for my skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is great, i swear by it! I put aside my foundation and now only wear the It Cosmetics CC Cream and it’s a true game changer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: does not work with my skin at all. this makes my texture look even worse and the shade was a little orange.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall, this is my favorite concealer/SPF combo that I have tried to date. It has a nice creamy texture and medium coverage, and has good staying power throughout the day. I do find that it creases a little under my eyes however, so I use a separate under-eye concealer for that area.   The only thing I will say is that if you have oily skin, this might not be for you as it is a more dewy and less matte than other concealers I have used. However, it works great on my combo skin.

reviews.review_title: Contains Snail Excrement and Not Cruelty Free
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am so disappointed in this product. It contains snail excretion. I didn't think to look for that before buying it. SO gross. They claim this product is cruelty free. I reached out to the company to ask how they get the snail excretion (which I still find too gross to put on my face) without cruelty. Months have gone by and no response. I returned it to Sephora. I'm surprised that we're still in the stone ages of wiping excrement from insects on our face. I'll stick to plants and other alternatives.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love this product.  it really covered all my flaws and gave me an airbrush finish to my face! and it doesn't feel to heavy to wear its very light and you don't even know your wearing it !! Its my go to foundation 100%

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: doesn't matter how I use it, with or without primer, it makes my pores more visible and the color gets very dark.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favorite foundation! I hate their Your Skin but better foundation, so I was nervous about this one.  But I LOVE IT! The coverage is amazing and finish is so skin like! It doesn’t look cakey! It looks best with a damp beauty sponge in my opinion!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love that this has sunscreen in it and it smells great. It can get very messy and get stuck under fingernails if you touch your face while it's on. Great coverage and staying power.

reviews.review_title: Love it, need to find my shade!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really really like this product. It’s full coverage, goes on smoothly, and doesn’t break me out. My only problem is that I have yet to find my correct shade. ShadeFinder has not been helpful at all.  I’ve had the light medium shade for a few months, but now it is too light for me. I will be using medium over the summer now that I’m tanner, and see if that works. Maybe light medium is just my winter shade...

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Good coverage but feels like I am not even wearing make up! Also stays on all day and the SPF component is very effective. Worth the money over other less expensive tinted moisturizers or CC/BB cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the packaging. Its light weight, simple, and easy to see how much is left. I found the formula to be pretty thick. There wasn’t a lot of color selection. I bought both this formula, and the matte formula in the color Light. The shades were very different. Unfortunately, this cc cream settled into my fine lines and clogged the pores on my forehead. Will not repurchase.

reviews.review_title: Looks like a mask on face
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After hearing great things about this CC cream, I decided to give it a try. I’m not a big fan of foundations or BB creams and usually use CC cream due to its light coverage and feeling. But this CC cream is absolutely too tick -more like a BB cream- and looks like a mask on my face. I find it too powdery and matte. Not recommended for dry skin, as it will dry your skin even more. My boyfriend hates seeing this product on my face and tells me I put too much make up on everytime I apply it. I tried to love this product applying lots of moisturizer under but couldn’t. I would not recommend to people with dry skin who look for a natural and light CC cream.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - natural beige shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. I go between this and la mer foundation. I read a review that it can turn orange in oxidation after hour- I think she should go to a more yellow lighter shade? But I never had that problem. My skin looks natural and beautiful with it. I prefer it over la mer tbh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited about trying this, but it's so thick and leaves white dots on my skin (from the zinc?) I tried mixing it with moisturizer and that helped a bit but it still felt heavy on my skin somehow. There's also a bit of fragrance-- would be better if scentless

reviews.review_title: Oxidized and made me look orange
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product was very easy to blend and looked natural on my skin for about one hour. However, after an hour, it oxidized and made my skin look dark orange. I really wanted to like this product, but the way it oxidized was a huge deal-breaker for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. So little is needed and it glides on so smoothly. Doesn't make me feel cakey at all.

reviews.review_title: My Favorite Foundation of All time
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I keep coming back to this foundation!!! It's really the best I've ever tried. It's not too heavy, it goes on well over fine lines, it helps remove redness (I have Irish skin), it goes well over acne and most importantly it has a high spf (because I have irish skin and work outdoors!!!!). A little actually goes a long way too! I've used this with a brush and a beauty blender and it works great with both tools!!! I love that there is a makeup that I can run around in and protects me from the sun. It also lasts so you don't have to retouch. I have very pale skin and the ivory works perfect!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product so much. I just use one pump to cover my whole face using my hands. Gives enough coverage for every day with a light powder to set.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After makeup sets I do see smooth skin, however the color is yellow for medium, it is thick, and has an interesting smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this CC cream! Great coverage and love that it contains SPF already.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not a fan.  Very heavy and doesn’t apply well.  Very disappointed and it had good reviews.

reviews.review_title: incredible sunscreen replacement, not daily use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed the full coverage because my skin is bad lately, but unfortunately it was a little too dark for me and looked unnatural. It is shiny, feels a little greasy but has it’s up sides too - great coverage and high spf. I’d use this in place of sunscreen, but definitely not daily. Returned to try the matte version, hoping I have better luck with that one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My secret to SPF and coverage when i go camping LOL great product! I have a lot of hormonal redness on my face and HATE how it gets during summer time. Bought this baby last year and love it! I don't get sunburned or have a grey cast, great coverage and who doesn't want an easy product to throw on when camping for a slightly elevated look LOL. Another thing to add is that i don't get overly oily like other CC/tinted moisturizers.   Took a star off because i do agree with some reviews about how this can get cakey. I just make sure to really work this into my skin or mix it with another sunscreen to dilute the coverage and cakeyness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t love the shades this comes in and I find it very greasy. It has really good coverage, but that’s not what I was looking for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: By itself and using the recommended IT brush for application, this was horrible, zero stars.  It set and splotched on top of my skin and would not at all go onto my nose.  However, when I mixed with with my Peter Thomas Roth CC cream and used a wet beauty blender, the mixture is amazing and I love.  Long story short, I would not ever use this product by itself and the way it is recommended, but if you have the time and energy to play around with it, it may work

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very confused because I buy this all the time in light and have always loved it. My recent purchase the same shade looked extremely orange and heavy - super awful !!! Did they change the colours and formula ?!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i was hesitant to buy because i’m a full coverage, matte foundation kind of person! if ur debating, definitely buy. replaced my foundation! full coverage & makes your skin look beautiful. like it says, your skin but better! i wear it everyday for work by itself, if i’m going out i’ll wear it underneath foundation . LOVE LOVE LOVE! this is my holy grail, i cannot get over it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing!!! I’m so late to the game!! Ive been using Mac Matchmaster foundation for years and I just tried this! Full coverage, lightweight, and goes on super smooth!! Very long lasting!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this before going to Mexico and absolutely loved it! It treated my skin and I didn’t break out which was a huge bonus! Love it looks natural

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a full coverage CC cream, a little does go a long way. I’m able to use one pump for my whole face. It has a slight scent to it. I’m super impressed with this though. It is really light for me right now as it’s summer and I tan but I mix it with a darker shade of CC cream to make it my summer shade

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried both the Light and the Fair Light shades. Same old story, really. Light was too dark and Fair Light is too pale. But, with a bit of powder/bronzer, I can work with either. A word of caution though, a TINY bit goes a long way. The consistency of this formula is thicker than any other liquid foundation that I’ve used. A full pump of this product is way too much. The product goes on super thick, cakes within seconds, and settles into fine lines you didn’t even know you had. I use, maybe, half a pump and blend it out with my beauty blender. Using a tiny bit of product really does give a nice, even finish that even my husband complimented. Having said that, the shade range is severely lacking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Did they reformulate?! This used to be my go to holy grail product. The tiny bit I have left in my old tube still goes on light and makes my skin look flawless and airbrushed. The last one I bought cakes and dries up and piles on my face so I got one more thinking it must have been a bad tube. Nope, same thing !?!? Returning the newest one and really sad I have to find something else to replace it with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The colour is legit orange. I am Estée Lauder double wear 2N1 and this is medium to dark tone. It was smooth and hydrating for sure but the colour is definitely not light

I really don’t understand what all the hype is around this product.  I’m 44 and have dry skin.  I tried every application method imaginable, and it still looked horrible on me.  It looked cakey and accentuated every little bit of texture, fine lines and wrinkles I have.  This performs more like a foundation than a BB Cream.  If you want a good BB Cream try Missha.  It looks way better on the skin and is half the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had been looking for a foundation for a long time. I thought it would just be another disappointment but I am so pleased I decided to invest my money in it. I am an older woman and it's very hard for me to find a foundation that doesn't settle into the wrinkles. And the color was absolutely perfect. I highly recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My go-to foundation. It does what it claims. I wish IT would come out with a much lighter version of this for lazy days!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This felt and looked so thick! Showed all of my pores and settled in by my nose, under my eyes etc. Even with setting powder it rubbed off on my hands, clothes etc. I tried it one more time using a foundation brush thinking it was the blender I was using. The same thing. I got this because I don’t like to wear full makeup to work just something to even my skin tone. I’m in healthcare so it is also just easier then regular foundation.  I’m going back to Tarte!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this foundation! It’s really good for an older person with some wrinkles and dry skin. It is very moisturizing!

reviews.review_title: Too Havy and gets super dry
reviews.review_buyer_description: fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is unlike any cc cream I've used, and not in a good way. It's super heavy like a medium foundation, and powders up super dry after application. I am somehow both sweating right now and yet it looks like I have cakey lizard skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this. =( I got the lightest shade but it's way darker then it looked online. It was a tan, orange-y shade and it looked like I had a bad fake tan on my face. So I can't use it. It's too bad since I loved the way it went onto my face. It didn't look cake-y and looked more natural. I just wish they would make one that was actually fair/ pale for us pale girls. =(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is easy to apply and blend. The coverage is nice without that caked on looks. It feels light and last all day. This doesn't dry out my skin either and is very soft to touch.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great foundation if you are not looking for full coverage. I have freckles and I this does not cover them at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: although i got the wrong shade, i mix this tinted moisturizer with the nars and it's absolutely gorgeous. for me, this is light on the skin and doesn't feel cakey at all. and it's not a foundation, so don't expect full coverage, it's only enough to brighten your skin up so you don't look as tired.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this in a deeper shade for spring break (which was then canceled). Now that I have a tan I was so excited to use this product this summer. So disappointed!! For starters, this “CC cream” is the heaviest foundation I’ve ever owned. It’s very hard to blend out and after a few hours starts to crack on my skin. I use my hands to apply CC and bb creams and I tried that with this product and my husband actually said “hey babe don’t be mad, but what’s wrong with your face?.” I have to use a damp beauty blender to make it look okayish - but isn’t the point of lightweight foundation for ease of application and natural look?? Makes my face feel cakey and dry all day. I did love that it has spf 50 but it’s really unwearable for me, and I have pretty clear and even skin to begin with. Hope I can still return this.

reviews.review_title: Not what I expected from Sephora..
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just received this is the mail today. USPS handled it with care because when I received it and opened this CC cream the top had the pump part stuck and when I took it out and got my hands full of concealer in the process I tried to stick it into the bottle part with the concealer and it would not stay. When I put the top on it the pump part gets stuck again. Thinking about returning it honestly... I’ve held Sephora to such a high standard.. this is truly saddening. Thankfully it did not spill everywhere because it easily could have.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a product I’ve enjoyed for years. I’m 31, and am someone who alternates wearing a lot of makeup and then lighter makeup. I feel like while this product is definitely medium/full coverage baseline, it’s easily manipulated to be lighter or fuller depending on my preference that day. It can be hard for me to find and exact shade match, but once again I like to mix base products so grabbing a mini medium and light and mixing them together isn’t a big deal for me.

reviews.review_title: Acne and breakouts like I’ve never seen before!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product, the coverage was awesome and I liked its staying power. Unfortunately it makes me break out horribly. I am 46 and have never had any like this EVER. Usually I will get a few pimples on my chin with my cycle, but this was unbelievable. My cheeks were full of pimples, I’ve never had a cheek zit in my life. I’m so disappointed, I really wanted to love this brand. I can’t believe it took me 3 months to figure out it was this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you're looking for a lightweight foundation, this is it. But I wanted something more sheer and this is not it. I've been using Dr. Jart's CC cream for years but heard good things about this. It is very thick and has a makeup/foundation effect. But I don't need to use as much concealer with it which is a bonus. I won't be repurchasing

reviews.review_title: Can only use by itself IMO
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this for summertime, I was highly disappointed when I set it. It had a beautiful glow when I first had applied, but it was moving. my upper lip and nose was blotchy and moving so I decided to set it and I had to end up taking it all off. once I set it, my face looked so dry and patchy and I have oily skin. I've never experienced a foundation like this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite foundation product ever. I prefer a no makeup makeup look and this is perfect. Not matte, not overly dewy. Just perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When i first swatched it on my hand it was trump orange and i was so disappointed that I ordered the wrong colour. Ive never order any kind of foundation or CC online because im so hard to match but once I applied it to my face it was so perfect. It was incredible how it blended so fantastic into my skin and it really shows my natural skin tone instead of the red tomato I usually look like. Its super easy to blend and a little goes a long way. I was told to use a beauty blender and that was the best advice. This is now my favourite go to for everyday wear i was needing something with SPF and this is the perfect item

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great foundation! It’s spf 50, has anti-Ageing benefits, lasts all day and is full coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is good, the coverage is enough for, like coverage, but when i got my order of this product, the SPF50 broad spectrum was covered, even on the box the SPF50 was covered lol Guess i got the product that didn't have Sunscreen in it. I have combo skin and this worked enough for my skin, after sometime though, it started to come off a bit my skin is weird some days it worked well and some days it didn't, but wouldn't give it a 4 nor 5.

reviews.review_title: worth it for light everyday makeup
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i've been using this everyday for the past year and honestly it's become a staple. i don't go bold for everyday makeup because i usually don't have time in the mornings but this product is so easy and effective. it has pretty good coverage for a cc cream and people can't even tell i’m wearing makeup!!!! to me it really looks like how i want my skin to look naturally.  i have dry skin and i find it very light and hydrating as well. the only lil problem i have is that it creases under the eyes but powder will easily solve that problem. price is a lil steep but it lasted me the whole year and i used it almost every day so i’m impressed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shade matches so well, but it actually emphasized my texture and fine lines. Mind you, I’m only 26. It also transfers very easily. If you want a full-coverage matte, go with Fenty Pro Filt’r. I feel like this has the same heavy-ish feel on your skin, but fenty actually makes your skin look perfect. This looks so bad. My maybelline fit me works way better than this.   I originally tried this maybe 2 years ago, and wanted to give it another shot. Going to make another return. I’ve tried this with different primers & lotions. I really wanted this to work. Even did it with my hourglass veil primer, and this foundation/cc cream still managed to make my imperfections come out worse than my natural skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought this would be able to replace a moisturizer w sunscreen but I still need a moisturizer underneath. The product is really thick and I did break out initially but I can't be sure it isn't the mask wearing too.  I got the medium and is a little orange but I do like the finish and it really tones down redness. The scent was a little off-putting at first but I don't notice too much anymore. I am still working on the best application process and I think a brush followed with a damp sponge and a little powder and I feel more presentable for a zoom call.

reviews.review_title: Good product but shade selection is bad
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am East Asian and have fairly medium light skin tone but I have to use the Medium Tan shade. This concerns me because I have fairly lighter skin tone and even I have to use a shade that is considered medium so I cannot imagine how difficult it is for those with darker skin tones to use this product.  Aside from the shade issue, the product is really good for everyday. It lasts pretty long and I have worn this on vacation many times. It seems to be fairly sweat-proof and water-proof. The coverage is super buildable but feels lightweight and looks pretty natural. The SPF 50 is also a huge selling point.

reviews.review_title: Good coverage but super creasy and oily looking
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had really high hopes for this foundation after reading reviews and because I love this brand. The coverage is really good...but thats about it. I dont have an oily skin by any means but this foundation makes me look extreemely oily even if i use a mattifying primer and powder. It also gives me a lot of creasing around my nose and clings to my dry patches. Within 3 hours of wearing it it looks terrible. Definitely not worth the price in my opinion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A thick formula but blends well.  However, I don’t like the finish as it looks heavy and has an odd shine.   After a few hours of wear, the pores become quite visible and products sits on top of the skin instead of blending in.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this CC Cream. It works well alone as a tinted moisturizer, or under foundation. Not heavy or greasy unlike some others I've tried. Perfect for the summer, and definitely my daily go-to year-round.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very oily. I have dry skin but this foundation is like putting oil to your face. It make me breakout a lot and I never breakout.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this. Honestly it’s just okay for me. I love that it has spf in it but its so patchy on my skin. I’ve tried to build it up but it just ends up wiping away. Ive used a damp beauty blender and a brush but I get the same results. I moisturize and exfoliate but nothing has helped this foundation. I won’t be repurchasing.

reviews.review_title: Everything I need in one tube!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My youngest daughter introduced me to this product. While it may seem pricey, it replaces facial sunscreen, primer, concealer,  and foundation. It blends easily, evens out my skintone, and makes me look better. I wear it every day, even if I don't wear any other makeup. The pump controls the dispensing, and a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t love wearing foundation everyday, so I bought this after a friend suggested it and after viewing some videos online. I liked that it had spf 50 and a good amount of coverage. One application and I was hooked! It goes on beautifully with my beauty blender and I find I don’t even really need to use my concealer afterwards, but then again I don’t like using a lot of product. That was the great thing about this product as well - one pump gave a good amount of coverage for my whole face without feeling cakey. Will definitely be my go-to everyday product for sunscreen and coverage.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff - it's easy, it has good coverage- my skin likes it -  and SPF!! My only complaint is I wish they had a few more shades but it's close enough - great for travel too!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I think I got a color a little too dark but that doesn’t take away from how amazing this product it! It really covers up my blemishes without it making it look like I’m wearing a lot of makeup. Very smooth!

reviews.review_title: Light to full coverage as needed.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage without the caking look or feel.  I have transition from Natural being to Golden beige to transition into spring.  I dab my sponge in tepid water then put the cream on sponge around the cheeks, chin, nose then forehead.  Then I light blend across hair line and down jar line.  Leaves smooth no cake look.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rich - golden brown shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The infomercial promised to cover dark spots and blemishes. It does not live up to its promises.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my second time buying this cream,ordered it online but when I received it ,says expires in November 2020.Disappointed as I got this on discount and customer service said I can return it but would not get discount if I repurchase as that coupon was only one time

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my most repurchased base product ever. I have very dry and sensitive skin and this does not feel extra drying or break me out. On vacations it’s the only “foundation” I bring. I wish there was a wider colour range to include all skin tones. For me personally, the fair colour is a touch too dark in the winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Works pretty good for minimal make up looks, does provide full coverage - although I have freckles so full coverage is never an actual thing. Sometimes can look a little Cakey around the nose and eye creases (crows feet)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this.  I read so many good things about this CC cream.  Like a few other people... I guess my skin can't handle this formula.  It would peel off my skin as soon as out it on...even after exfoliating.  I have   1 foundation from Lancome and 1 BB cream from Mary Kay that do not do this.  I tried it multiple ways for multiple days.  I couldn't get it to sit right on my face.  I would have returned it, but everything was shut down so I just gave it to a friend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for everyday use! My new favorite CC cream of all time. The product works as a full coverage with only a little bit of product and lasts all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have super fair, freckled skin. My preference is definitely a tinted moisturizer as I do love my freckles.   This was incredible with just enough coverage but not too heavy. It stays in place and I have no problem with cakey-ness or creasing.   I love that it's SPF 50 so now I am not struggling to find a sunscreen that will slide and run into my eyes on super hot days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this once instead of the matte since my skin has become dryer, and I'm verry happy with my decision. Very nice finish ; Sufficient coverage for a summer daytime foundation ; Does not have the usual SPF scent

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Yes, it is thick. However, it works!!  You need a light touch with it and just a fab of moisturizer and you’re good. I love how long it lasts and that it doesn’t deep into my wrinkles. I’m 52.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This CC cream is my go-to! It has great lightweight coverage with a nice finish. It looks very natural and has a great smell. Love that it also has SPF 50.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finally they made a color that suits my tone best. Light-medium was too light and medium was too orange. I swing from fair to tanned with an yellow undertone and suffer from some blotchy redness from zits or exfoliating. This color looks most natural and covers all that nice. BUT be warned, this is very hydrating so better for more dryer or combo skin. I only get dry around the eyes and if I'm exfoliating I need some love. But this is on the greasy side but it does sink in if you use just a little and put some setting powder on top. I don't mind the greasiness because of all the good skin stuff in it and it doesn't irritate my skin or cause breakouts. But mainly its the high spf 50 for daytime that I need along with the coverage. Wearing sunscreen alone gives a white cast or no coverage so this is the best option to look normal with sunscreen as I've had so many lasers I can't leave the house without it. The matte version isn't as greasy and I have that too, but it's only spf 40, so I save that one if it's not as bright out. Using your fingers to apply is not the best I find, same with the sponge. A brush for cream foundations works best. I got the It Cosmetics one new on Posh for half price. If you are already really oily, you may hate this, but just know it's doable if you're willing to be patient and work with it. It's not full coverage but close. I wouldn't get the Illumination version unless you want to look like a very shiny disco ball. I think that one is better suited for mature skin past 50. It's just too much shine in my opinion when this one already will be unless you use setting powder. But don't get turned off by this review because it's so good for your skin, like the less thick spf 30 version by Bareminerals complexion rescue. But that doesn't have as much coverage as this or spf. If you use this everyday it does tend to run out quicker so you may want to consider getting the matte version as well for those less sunny days so both last longer.

reviews.review_title: Wanted to love but a hard no
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When you first apply it its full coverage kinda, and then it starts to look more natural and really nice. Once you wear it for awhile though it starts to crease and look cakey. It completely separated on my skin. I tried it with and without a primer. I tried setting it with powder and setting spray.. still no luck.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Product dries your skin and gave me a rash. Not recommended for dry or sensitve skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Initially I really liked this product. The colour matched perfectly, it was easily buildable, giving off great coverage and it had a really nice finish. But as I began to wear it more I noticed some flaws. The product would crease, i.e., in the eyelids, and looked cakey around my mouth and cheek area. I tried swapping different products in and out of my routine before applying the CC cream and applying less of the product but no matter what, the product never seemed to completely set into my skin. This gave off the appearance that I was wearing a layer of product on top of my skin instead of blending all together and looking natural as that is what I was striving for.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was very excited for this product after hearing suck great things. I have dry skin and love a thin coverage cream for the face. I was expecting this to moisturize and sit on my skin nicely, however it is very thick for a cc cream and sits on top of my skin exaggerating texture. The only way I am able to use this is mixing moisturizer in.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered and tried this product for the first time the other day. I love the coverage and the way it sits on my skin. The only thing I would say about this product that some may see as a negative is that it stays extremely tacky. I would recommend a setting powder or spray.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a worst CC cream I’ve ever tried, why? Because it’s like a mask with over full coverage and caky on your skin, that you feel there is something heavy on your face an you can’t breathe. I work for Armani and I definitely prefer Armani CC cream that is such a smooth, natural, wonderful cream with Spf 30.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for years and it is my favorite. I have extremely sensitive/acne prone skin and this product actually treats those problems as it provides coverage. For best results, use a good quality foundation brush (It’s foundation brush is excellent) or a damp beauty blender to apply this foundation. I use Urban Decay all-nighter setting spray to make it last all day. QVC offers this product with a free brush and more color options. This product is multiple skin care products in one. You can skin moisturizer and sunscreen when using this.

reviews.review_title: An awesome addition to my make up routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. I have a lot of hyper-pigmentation on my face due to aging and this not only hides the imperfections but works to prevent them from getting worse. This is the only CC cream I can wear without needing foundation too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have no idea why this product is heavily marketed to people with rosacea as some sort of soothing and calming solution that not only covers redness but doesn’t irritate it—which in my experience couldn’t be further from the truth. Plus, it’s incredibly misleading to sell a product with lemon peel fairly high up on the extensive ingredient list along with other fragrant essential oils that are KNOWN irritants to sensitive skin. Every time I tried using this it would sting a bit upon application and wasn’t very comfortable to wear as it felt cakey and would not only cling to, but also accentuate, any dryness on my face and I’m not talking about severely dry, flakey skin but just any kind of normal surface dehydration most people get. The shade range is also appalling as it assumes everyone from the fairest to the darkest women of color want to look orange. DO NOT choose your shade based off of the product photos you see here as I made the mistake of thinking even if it turned out to be a little darker, that the lightest shade fair would work for my skin—wrong, it looks so much darker and more orange both on my skin and in the actual tube. Horrible product that made my rosacea even worse after wearing it and left me feeling that awful, but very familiar, sense of having gotten a small sunburn on my cheeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was one of my fav products when I started wearing makeup more consistently about 5 years ago. The coverage is great and the color ranges have improved over the years. As I’ve branched our to different types of foundations, I have noticed this product application is inconsistent on my skin. It’s patchy at times and sometimes too oily and heavy feeling. Just not a fav of mine anymore as my skin needs have changed and become more oily in my t zone and chin area. Would recommend to someone just starting out on makeup application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've had a lot of trouble finding a good foundation or concealer for my skin, as I have severe eczema and scarring. For reference I've used Clinique, The Body Shop, Makeup Forever, L'Oreal, Smashbox, Fenty, PÜR, Cover FX... And this is all I can remember (LOL) of all those Smashbox and Cover FX were the best for me, and the others made me break out. That said I wanted something less heavy but still effective. I did a lot of research and this product was by far the most hyped so I thought I'd try it. First of all, the color match is the best I've ever had for a foundation. Secondly, I didn't dry out at all and I didn't break out either! My skin feels moisturized and healthy and the coverage looks natural and light, even though it does cover some scarring. I definitely recommend this product for those with dry skin and wants medium to heavy coverage with a natural finish :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best foundation ever! Leaves a natural dewey finish that I have received compliments on. Truly full coverage - I no longer feel the need to use concealer. Lasts all day and blends great with skin. I apply with a beauty blender. SPF and anti-aging benefits make it even better!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first SPF foundation product that hasn’t completely broken me out which is fantastic. It can be applied with your fingers, brush, or sponge. It’s so easy to spread and apply evenly whether or not you have moisturizer underneath. It has a slightly dewier finish so I like to powder areas that get oily and tend to move which helps a lot. It’s really easy to use as full coverage, or apply lightly with moisturizer to diffuse the product. If I could rate this a 10 I would because it just makes my skin look so perfect, smooth and pretty. It’s genuinely given me more confidence with my skin. I don’t feel like I’ll ever need to try another foundation product as long as this is on the market.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It’s pumps very controlled you can squirt very tiny spot to a lot, it pumps out creamy, however where I didn’t appreciate was it dries and sets very chalky, for the price this profits needs more work. It t cosmetics, Pls don’t charge with the high price and be so mediocre. Product shelf life is very important. Since I bought it knowing they had replenished, but I wouldn’t recommend until they work on the formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it's very greasy.. super duper greasy.. almost chalky.. very hard to blend. definitely not the product I was looking for and quite expensive for being so greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. Great coverage. I use a pressed powder foundation over top and I love the way it sits on my skin. Layers nicely and gives the skin a very healthy dewy shine. I get compliments on my skin all the time when I'm wearing this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Comfortable, full coverage, but still looks like skin. It lasts all day and still looks good after a 9 hour shift. Love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for over 3-4 years now and it is still my holy grail. It adds the perfect amount of light coverage/sheen to a few of my redness patches on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have never tried CC cream before this and I LOVE IT. I was looking for something natural and would leave me iwth a dewy fresh look and this does just that!! LOVE LOVE LOVE it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Rosacea does a number on my face color, plus irritants that inflame it. This covers very nicely with no problems with irritation. Putting a powder over it really was too dry for me. So I spritz a dewy setting spray over it. You can really build it up for how much coverage you want, also.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately the colour was not a good match for my skin tone as The CC cream had a red hue to it. When I put it around my nose area I found it really brought out the dry skin I had from a recovering blemish. One positive thing was it was very water proof. So water proof I couldn’t get it off my arm with plain soap and water... definitely need make up remover for this stuff. Debating if I should try a lighter tone or a new product all together. Will definitely be sending the light medium back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wore this almost everyday for two years. I really like it... It doesn’t irritate my skin. Protects my skin from the sun. It does a lot better with my break outs compared to thicker foundation. Little breakouts but better than regular foundation. Covers a lot, looks natural. I ended up changing foundation when I ran out because my environment is sunny and I sweat in the sun a lot. I have to wipe my face all the time. I switched to a matte product to try something new.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm only rating this so low because it didn't quite meat my expectations. I will say it has great coverage, but not as easy to apply. Really got moisturize before applying, as it creases in lines and dry skin. I assumed it would be like a moisturizer where I could apply with my fingers, but I will only be using a beauty blender. However, a little goes a long way with this product which is nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok if you have ever wanted to try this, just buy it. Seriously, do it. I don’t understand how, but this applies onto my skin like butter and literally blurs dark spots, acne scars, redness, etc. All while looking very natural! I only have to use less than a full pump for my entire face INCLUDING blending down into my jawline/neck. I will probably try the matte version next as I do get a bit oily on my forehead, but I am in love with this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely in love! This is full coverage and is the first time I found something close to Chanel Lumiere (which was discontinued a few years back). Definitely give it a try! Also has the SPF in it but I also put my own on through out the day as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product!!! It has everything in one and it works perfect!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Its not the worst foundation but there are so many other ones for the same price that are better. It felt greasy and it broke me out really bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really enjoyed this and had heard good things so I was glad it lived up to expectations I have dry skin and this didn't make it look dry or cakey like I have had happen with some foundations  Would definitely repurchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Never using foundation ever again!! This CC+ Cream is my new go-to. It makes your face look so smooth and natural almost like you don’t have any type of cream on your face while also feeling sooo light! A little goes a long way too! I love it :))

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was running very low of my NARS foundation and while I thought it was pretty good, I wanted to try something new. Since we are approaching summer, I wanted something with SPF and ultimately chose this foundation. I think I have just found my new favorite foundation! The consistency is maybe slightly thicker than a normal foundation, and the coverage was medium coverage, but once applied it did not feel heavy or thick on the face. I found that one pump of product was just slightly too much for my face. The finish is more of a dewy look, or for those who don't like it, a shiny look. I don't mind this at all, and if I want a more matte finish I just use a tiny bit of setting powder. This is a really fantastic product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
