reviews.review_text: Eh. Weird smell which is typical for anything that has SPF. And i used the shade finder but it didn’t quite match perfectly... there were more pinkish tones than I would have liked/expected. Didn’t really blend that well.

reviews.review_title: Great price, still leaves me shiny!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: While I struggle SO hard to find foundation, this one is the best I've found so far. It doesn't clog my pores, but gives great coverage and is super easy to layer. It lasts for a few hours, but I am usually VERY shiny at the end of a workday. Surprisingly, the matte version of this made my skin even more oily than this. I have been able to mix it with various bronzing drops in the summer, and tend to mix shades in the winter so that I can always have the proper shade. The price point is pretty great for a higher end foundation.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love this product -- I have been using it for years. it isn't full coverage, but I love that it is light and you can see my freckles. it is also buildable and layers well. I like that it isnt a runny formula like other light coverage CC and BB creams  i love that it has SPF too !!

reviews.review_title: Great buildable foundation for dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation! I use it along with the It! Cosmetics Heavenly Luxe #7 brush (the dual ended one from Ulta) and I get the most incredible finish. It is a little too warm and dark (I received it as a gift from my mom) so I just add a touch of NARS Sheer Glow in Siberia, plus a drop of the CoverFX Custom Enhancing Drops in Celestial for glow, and it’s the perfect combo. I love how comfortable this foundation is to wear. It’s got super buildable coverage, and while it feels moisturizing, I don’t need to use a ton of powder to set it. I have been getting compliments constantly on my skin and it’s primarily thanks to this CC+ and brush.   I use the Maybelline Baby Skin primer and moisturize well before applying makeup. I have dry skin generally and use a moisturizer that is compatible with silicone based makeup (current fav is Tarte Drink of H2O). I’ll attach an unedited photo so you can see the finish I get from this CC and the Heavenly Luxe #7 brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this product, as I heard people rave about this on social media. It left me disappointed. It is so thick and cakey for dry skin. I applied it both with a damp beauty blender and buffing brush, and it was so hard to spread on the skin. It looked obvious that I was wearing foundation. Lastly, it looks horrible on yellow undertones. It may better be suited for pink undertones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The product is great for dry skin, it's on the dewy side. A little goes a long a way. The only down side is it's easy to accidentally make this look cakey. Also the shade range could be a lot better

reviews.review_title: Best Foundation I've Tried So Far
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite foundation! It makes my skin appear smooth and even without looking cakey at all. It gives me medium coverage and doesn't feel heavy, and it doesn't pill with my other products. Once I set it, it stays in place all day.  I have sensitive combination skin, so it hydrates my cheeks, but can make my nose look shiny sometimes. All I have to do to fix that is use a powder or setting spray!

reviews.review_title: Great Shade Match & Application, Issue w/ Creasing
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This colour is the perfect match for me and I love the way this applies when I first put it on, but after a 2-3 hours it settles into the lines around my mouth and under my eyes and it looks gross. Every time I try to put my Laura Mercier translucent loose setting powder on top of the CC cream to  prevent the creasing, I end up looking cakey (and it doesn't help with the creasing issue). I wish I could've loved it the way other people did, but this product just wasn't right for me.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is pretty eh for me. I don’t like how limited their shade range is and I don’t like at all how thick this product is. I’m not sure if I just misunderstood what a CC cream is but this is a foundation consistency for sure. It’s pretty much impossible to blend with a brush but I still use it every once in a while with a sponge so I can blend it out and make it a thinner layer on my face. If applied with a brush it is pretty much automatically full coverage. Also tends to look super cakey at the end of the day if I sweat at all.  I’m probably going to keep giving it a shot every once in a while since I have about 1/3 of the bottle left but it’s not my favorite at all and I won’t repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Tried this out because I’ve been looking for something to replace my foundations! I love the full coverage of foundations but hate the cakey look and the breathe-ability. This CC cream gives off the coverage of a foundation but the lightness of a moisturizer. Super build able and the pump and tube is nice for pushing the product out. Love this and highly recommend! I wear am light-medium skin toned with yellow/neutral undertones and went for the medium shade and it’s perfect.!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this for 3 years and it’s my favourite foundation! Also great that it has spf.

reviews.review_title: Heavy and not for oily skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Its too bad I didn’t see there was an oil-free matte finish kind of this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely beautiful. This stuff makes my skin look flawless whether I use it as a foundation with concealer and powder or just on its own for those ‘no makeup’ days when I just want to even out my skin tone. Applies beautifully with a brush or beauty blender, smells so good, hydrating, very natural looking and love that it has SPF!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best foundation! I used to use Younique foundation which had 100% coverage but then I tried this...it’s so dewy and I’ve gotten so many flawless compliments since purchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately I purchased the wrong shade for me, but even though the shade is a bit dark, it blends well and I have been able to use it mixed with another foundation. Nice natural finish and the added spf is a great bonus. I love the formula and can't wait to get it in my proper shade soon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got hooked on this CC cream after trying a sample. It is somehow thin and hydrating but provides really good coverage! And the colour match is way better than other brands (I use fair light). I love that it is SPF  50 but I still use SPF underneath to be safe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It has good cover for pores and very light speckles. But after like 3 hours it turns a bit dry on my skin, leaving some lines...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered this in Fair Light since the picture looks like it is actually fair with a pink undertone. IT IS ORANGE. I tried different cc/bb cream and this is by far one of the worst one in term of shade match. Truly disappointing. I am white as paper and there's no way I can wear this, even a tiny bit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got shade light gifted to me for my birthday back in February and it was way too dark for me. Now that I'm getting tanned I've been using this as a concealer on top of my pimples and works amazing. I love this for no makeup look after a day in the sun!

reviews.review_title: Makes you look cakey and oily
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation looks so heavy, it starts creasing right away, and makes my skin look so oily. I wanted to try it because it had great reviews but I would not buy this product or recommend to anyone.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use this as an everyday foundation for work!! Great coverage, and doesn't dry out my skin! Definitely good for everyday wear!

reviews.review_title: Great texture and blend-ability with SPF.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this product as an SPF-filled summer alternative to my usual NARS Pure Radiant Tinted Moisturizer (Alaska or Finland). I do like this product - my skin seems happy and it doesn't flake or drip off during the day. It is more opaque than NARS, so I have found that it looks like I'm wearing more makeup in pictures, but overall it is a nice product that blends well and is a nice alternative to laying sunscreen then makeup. I will likely keep both in rotation, depending on the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a skin condition called Vitiligo which creates an uneven skin tone due to lack of pigmentation in the skin, this foundation is amazing! Not only does it protect me from burning but it covers all the unevenness on my face! A little bit of this product goes a long way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this foundation! It gives great coverage and Love that It has SPF in it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i really liked this and felt like it had the perfect coverage for my every day look. my only issue is that it’s too dewy for me (i have combination skin that’s more on the oily side during the summer). i mixed it with a mattifying moisturizer, which helped a bit, but plan to try the matte version now that my tube has run out. fingers crossed that it works just as well and without the dewiness!

reviews.review_title: Where have you been my whole life?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I just want to preface by saying that I have NEVER written a review and I am a total skincare junkie. I'm constantly trying new makeup and skincare products, and like most people, you find some items you absolutely love and ones you never want to look at again. But even with products that I've enjoyed, I've never taken the time to write a review. Guys... when I say this might be my all-time favorite makeup product, I'm not lying! I was skeptical at first, because I thought the CC cream might be too thick. It's thick that's for sure, but a little went a loooooong way and coverage is lovely. They pack a lot of punch into a pump of this stuff. Anyways, I've applied with both a brush and my hands, and I love both application types. It blends like a dream! It doesn't sit on top of my skin like some foundations or face products do. I feel like my skin almost drinks it in. Some reviews stated that they thought the product left them matte looking or feeling. I have had the opposite effect. My skin looks so hydrated and dewy! And my skin doesn't feel heavy. Idk, what else to say besides: just buy the dang cream. Protect your skin with the SPF and look like a queen wearing it. It's definitely my new summer skincare product!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The color is off. I bought the light and its a few darker than me. I'm more a taupe color so not sure how this would work for lighter shades. The coverage was decent but it did emphasize my wrinkles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: OMG this is UNBELIEVABLE.  I do wish it gave me a dewey finish...I feel like it finishes very matte-like, which I don't like.  BUT the coverage and feel is incredible and lightweight.  Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is too thick. The BB cream had better coverage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My holy grail year round. I started using it as a summer foundation when we went to the water park. It was so budge proof that it made it's way into day to day wear. Four years later I can't live without it because no other BB or CC cream I've tried offers as much coverage with this amount of sun protection. If you live in a sunny, warm climate and have normal, dry, or combo skin you need this in your life.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't see any difference after using it, I also find it has a lot of perfume in it. If your skin is sensitive to breakouts after using products with perfume in it, I would not recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My neutral medium was running out, so I went to order online and there was no neutral medium existing anymore. Since I still had some light left at home I opted for Light Medium. But guess what. It's lighter than my light! Very stupid. I'm between light and medium so I like to mix these two, so now I'm out of my neutral medium and I have two light lights! So disappointing. For this reason I'm giving a 1 star rating.  (I would recommend this product only if the colour suits you, it's still an amazing product, the only foundation I want to put on my face, but just in the right colour!)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell and the way the formulation feels on my skin but the first thing that struck me was how very wrong the colour match was. Way too light. This made my skin look ashy and brought out ALL of the imperfections on my skin. It REALLY highlighted how much I need to resurface some areas. Didn’t play well with my setting powder. I really, really want to love this, especially for the price I paid and how long I waited for this to arrive in the post. I’ll give it a week or 2 but I think I’ll either buy a slightly darker shade or move on to another brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this, it’s very fully coverage so I use it for a night out or whenever I know I’m going to be taking pictures. However it took me a while to find the right shade I kept having to go back and exchange for lighter and lighter till I finally took the lightest shade and it’s perfect. And In the summer I usually get pretty tan and would consider myself medium and it still blends nicely and with a bit of bronzer it looks perfect.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This broke me out and also the shade range is horrible.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly don’t know why people love this product so much. I have used maybelline cc creams that were better. This one sits on your face and is super noticeable. It highlights any imperfection and dries out my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Favorite foundation ever! Been using it for years and will never change! A little goes a long way and it feel so smooth and moisturizing to the skin. It also has a sunscreen in it and helps prevent aging! Love it! I’ve also tried the illumination and matte ones which are both great but I like the regular one the most.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't like wearing a lot of make-up, so this is the perfect amount of coverage for my daily routine. It leaves a natural finish so that my skin actually looks like my skin but better. Sounds cliche but this is the only product I've found that truly delivers on that promise. A minor downside is that my skin is a little on the oily side, so it does get a bit greasy throughout the day, but it's perfect during the winter. The formula is flexible so that you can apply with a brush or your fingers. Even though it says full coverage I wouldn't recommend it as a full coverage product & I personally don't use it as such,.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice coverage. I like to use it with a dust of translucent powder. My color was light. I’m fair with red undertones in my cheeks

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really want to like this. Unfortunately it’s a pass for me. I felt like the product just sat on top of my skin and no matter how I set it, it would slip and slide. I looked like a grease ball by hour 3-4. It also accentuated my pores and creased around my nose. No thank you!

reviews.review_title: Photographs beautifully, looks bad in person
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Photographs beautifully, but it looks dreadful in person.  It sits on my skin and looks thick and cakey, and never absorbs or dries down.  It transfers like CRAZY, I could never wear this with anything that comes anywhere near my face -- I wouldn't even wear my white headphones with this stuff.  I returned it because it's too expensive for a foundation that I can't wear in public.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite foundations. It’s full coverage and I like the idea of the added sun protection. I have oily skin, and the oils will get through, but nothing some powder can’t fix.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cc cream feels so luxurious to put on. It provides light coverage and sun protection at the same time! 4 stars instead of 5 because I think this shade looks more yellow on my skin than it should. Perhaps a different shade would be better for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my holy grail! I have very sensitive skin prone to acne and I have always struggled with finding a foundation that matches my skin tone plus doesn't cause breakouts. This actually does the opposite! If I wear this all day the next day my skin feels amazingly soft! It does make me have a little more shine throughout the day but you can always just blot it away. I think I've been using this CC for probably 3 years now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really didn’t like this product at all. It’s wildly expensive for how much product you get. And the product itself is subpar at best. It felt like it completely just sat on top of my skin and a couple hours later I just felt like a greasy mess.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had such high hopes for this cc cream!!! I read reviews, and I have their under eye concealer which is a perfect shade match and my HG so i ordered this right away in fair light, because I’m pretty pale with freckles and light hair, but I based on their description and pictures I felt comfortable ordering fair light. The joke is on me!! The sticker on the top of the packaging looked like a good match for skin but as soon as I saw it and pumped it out onto my hand, it was so much darker!! I did a stripe on my jaw to see the colour and i honestly laughed because it was just so ridiculously different from its description. I gave it to a friend with a much darker complexion. I really hope they come out with true light shades.  Such a shame.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first foundation-ish product I've started using (makeup newbie) and I love it!!! I have combination skin with acne and scarring and this truly covers EVERYTHING!!! It also has the perfect finish—dewy enough so that you have a nice natural glow (instead of the flat, dry cakey look) but not too oily. I definitely would say this is more of a foundation than a BB cream, so if you're looking for something really light that you can apply with your hands this probably isn't for you. The only thing I would note is that sometimes it starts looking cakey when I put on powder blush/highlighter, but this could just be me. Overall 10/10 would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So I bought this twice, returned the first; lightest was too yellow & the next one up is the right undertone but too dark.. sigh. The formula is pretty good though, it's a bit patchy on dry spots and since it's too dark I've been mixing it with my Tarte sea water foundation which thins it out to a perfect consistency and color, so I made it work. Wears well all day without touching up and gives really good medium to full coverage even when I mix it and the finish is natural & lovely.. just hoping for more shades/undertones in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING CC cream! I was honestly surprised how light and natural this cream looks on my face! This will be my new go-to instead of actual foundation. Absolutely love this product and wish it came in a bigger bottle for this price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can’t even explain how many foundations and cc creams I have used over the years. I am a former Sephora employee and SWEAR by this. It is great for any skin type and gives you such a healthy long lasting glow. It smooths out imperfections and a little goes a long way. I did take one star off because I think the shade range could be better. Not only for fair skinned people, but darker tones as well. It is super frustrating trying to match clients when I was an employee and hyping it up when there is like under 10 shade options.

reviews.review_title: No makeup look PERFECTED with this!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new every day foundation. medium covers such a wide range of tones your safest bet for sure. I'm obsessed. looks like real skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing! I received a sample awhile ago and finally picked it up to use it and was so impressed. Definitely ordering this full size after I finish my bare minerals cream.  Really goes on nice and smooth

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry, sensitive, textured skin. I was searching for something that would offer good coverage with looking as natural/non-cakey as possible. THIS IS IT! This looks so natural, and has great (!!) coverage. I think the packaging is also cute and innovative, if your'e into aesthetics, like me. And, it smells good, if you're sensitive to scents like me. It's also gentle, if you have sensitive skin like me... The cherry on top--SPF 50! I've purchased many tubes now, and have no plans of changing to another base product. I definitely recommend (to anyone)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Easy to apply and stays long with powder. Compare to other BB or CC, it’s covered well! I’m going to repurchase again.

reviews.review_title: I wanted to like this so much but...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It feels decadent and smells citrusy which I loved but the actual wear, no matter what I do, looks ratchet. It fills my pores with the “polka dot face” look and it irritated my sensitive skin, making my eyes water and dry out the corners. It kills me because the glossy finish and coverage are wonderful but it really looks horrible on my skin. I prefer Laura Mercier oil free tinted moisturizer which offers a lot less coverage but doesn’t accentuate my pores or irritate my skin. I recommend for less sensitive skin or skin types with smaller or less visible pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best ever... My go to, I would not recommend this if you have oily or acne prone skin you maybe find it thicker and you skin maybe look disgusting...

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best full coverage foundation I have ever worn! Doesn’t dry your face out and it stays on all day. Love this product. I recommend this to anyone of age. I ever wear this as concealer sometimes when I don’t want a full makeup look. The one that I have now has lasted me at least 3 months and it still has more product in it but I need to switch out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really, really like this product. This is my first time using a CC cream and I think I might be converted... it’s lightweight, sinks into the skin effectively and looks flawless. My skin is happiest using oils and serums so the fact this has so many beneficial oils is a huge plus for me. It looks good on AND you gain benefit from it- win/win for me. I use it with the Burberry luminous fluid base primer and blend with a beauty blender. It blends well with concealer, contour and bronzers. It has a glowy finish while not being too much. You definitely need to set it with either a powder or a spray, it does crease under my eyes and around my nose on its own. I wonder what it’ll be like in the summer heat/humidity but I feel like asking as it’s set well it’ll be okay. Would 100% recommend to those with sensitive skin who need some benefit to their coverage as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really nice cc cream and I love that it has spf built in! It’s perfect for spring/summer. My only complaint is that for being the lightest shade, fair is still a little darker than my skin tone. Would enjoy a few more light options with undertones taken into consideration. Overall, performs well universally.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is so full coverage and lovely you’ll never go back to a regular foundation.  I’m obsessed and will keep one of these on deck for the rest of my life.  I love how easy it is to use, the SPF, the coverage, the blendability... A+ all around great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a trial size of this because I have been wanting to try a CC cream. This was terrible!!! It’s so thick! The texture is very thick and caky. It was way thinker then my foundation! I found that the colors were off as well. I got the fair tone and it was still too dark.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've repurchased this product about 5 times! Seriously the best. The dewy one in the pink bottle is also amazing. I love that I don't have to think about SPF either! I'm always asked what I'm wearing when I wear it. Very buildable, but also good coverage overall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Thankfully I bought a mini size for a trip  Perhaps this CC cream contains great ingredients but it feels so sticky on the skin. Not for me at all.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! Best CC cream I have ever tried. It has great coverage and never makes you look cakey. It lasts a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: By far my favorite foundation! It is so natural looking and has a pretty matte finish yet a bit of dewiness, I have tried so many foundations but this one doesn't make my face look dry nor cakey. I use the shade light and it is perfect for my skin tone. Medium coverage but you can definitely make it full by applying a little more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great, feels great..looks great in the mirror but will wash you out no matter what, I guess it’s bc of the Hugh spf content. I find that it made me look dull and older. I have medium gold tan skin tone. I tried two shades and still returned..not for women of color in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is BEAUTIFUL. You can build up to a full coverage while still looking pretty natural and glowy. Really nice for dry and sensitive skin. It is pretty fragrant but I don’t find that it sticks around. Took away a star because the shade range is just.....OOF

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Way better than I expected! This goes on so smooth and looks so natural, lasts me all day without any setting powder or spray. I was pleasantly surprised that the “Fair” shade is actually light enough for my skin. Definitely my new go to!

reviews.review_title: Formula change- drying and chalky now
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to LOVE this and told everyone how amazing it was. It didn’t clump into creases, looked natural and was light on skin. NOW and for the past year or so that is completely different :( it is almost chalky, dries out my skin and is very noticeable. They must have changed the formula. So disappointing. I thought maybe there was just a bad batch. Nope. I’ve purchased multiple times since noticing this and all are the same. What prompted me to finally write this is that a friend mentioned the same thing. She has also used for quite some time and noticed a clear change. This tells me it’s not just my skin, it’s the product. Don’t buy this, unless maybe you have rather oily skin and like the look of noticeable makeup on your face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. But the shade is terrible. I don’t know why it’s grey...if they could correct the shade I would love the product but I had to buy the Fenty foundation and return this one.

reviews.review_title: It is my skin but better
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Foundations are not my friends. My skin is dry to oily combo. This foundation provides full day coverage say 10 hours. I do not re apply and use this as my winter foundation because I purchased in the fair light. I can see the benefits of color correcting, full coverage cream and anti aging and hydrating serum. I typically do not purchase with spf bc it dries my face or it makes me sweaty but this formula works.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite foundation for lighter coverage days. Sometimes I stray away from this but I always find myself running back. It’s the perfect foundation for a natural look and it has amazing benefits!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not only was I not able to find a matching shade for my skin due to a lack of shade range, I also looked at the ingredients and was shocked to find snail secretion filtrate in the top 3 ingredients. NO THANK YOU

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I can’t even review this product appropriately because there isn’t a shade that would be appropriate for me as a woman of colour. Please at least pretend you care, and add a few more shades to choose from and acknowledge us. Thanks.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was so hyped about this product because of the reviews  and also one of my friend told me it was working great for her. Such a dissapointment... It looks like a heavy fluid, making all fine lines way more visible. Also I got light shade and it gives an orange color after applying. One of the worst CC/BB creams I've ever tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute fave. I have EXTREMELY sensitive and reactive, acne prone, combo skin and this does wonders for me. It never breaks me out or ever caused a reaction of any sort. Its extremely blend able, even if you have any extremely dry spots, and can be as full coverage or light coverage as you want it to be. Its not mattifying, but rather gives you a nice, healthy glow. I always recommend this product to everyone!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it's okay but in my opinion Laura mercier is so much better. Don't buy this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: People rave about this, but I genuinely hated everything about it. It irritated my skin, and it definitely isn't colour correcting. Anyone who thinks this is full coverage definitely doesn't have anything that actually needs covering. If you are even the slightest bit oily this will be a huge mess. A huge waste of money for what it is.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very full coverage for me, however I found this collecting on dry patches and caking throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is an actual dream. The coverage is PHENOMENAL and it’s light and not drying! I can’t even stop raving about it. My MIL is obsessed (age 66) and I’m 32–and we have very different skin types. Great product!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - natural beige shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This CC cream gives a decent coverage for being lightweight. If applied correctly with a damp beauty blender, it will give a dewy finish. I top it with IT's loose finishing powder. I feel it has also helped with my breakouts. It seems to help heal and lighten scars. (not immediately) I have been using this for a few years. Wear everyday in the winter months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is NOT for anyone who has remotely dry skin. By the end of the day there were flaky dry patches all over my face which doesn’t happen with any of my other foundations. I gave it multiple chances to make sure that’s what was causing the dry flakiness and it was definitely this.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Literally the best foundation. Stop looking. I like to cut it with a gel primer for a light, but color correcting perfect finish. None of the crazy expensive foundations can even touch it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been searching for a product that moisturizes my face as well as provide me with a good everyday sunscreen and this product does just that. I love the way it blends and how natural it looks on the skin. However, I am pretty upset with the shade range.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It has a good coverage. I dont really use alot of this product, 1 pump is too much. I just put it on my dark spots. It does gets darker during the day though and it cakes sometimes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Can't say enough good things about this CC cream!!! - the packaging is great, easy to use and control the amount of product you want to use - a little bit goes a long way with this product = good value for money  - the name is really accurate, it really does look like my skin but BETTER. Love the way it refines the imperfections in my face without looking like I have 10 layers of makeup on trying to cover everything up!  - long wearing and buildable to your desired coverage  - first received as a free sample (which lasted for a whole month of continuous use)  - purchased the full size in December 19 and it barely looks like I've made a dent in it (nearly everyday use!)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love Love Love! It was not what I expected from a CC cream. I though this would be very sheer, but it is more a medium coverage. It smooths out my complexion, while still allowing my freckles to show through. It's nice and light. I do set it with a powder, as I get a bit oily otherwise.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok so i tried this CC cream , because i wanted to try something different than a foundation. Its an okay product, it is not full coverage as it claims to me, i have to apply a little more so it can really be full coverage and hide my acne scars or blemishes. I am not a big fan of the smell. One time while getting ready i applied on my face, then my boyfriend came to hug me and he was like what is that weird smell? and it was this cc cream. But overall its not bad, i would say its light to medium coverage, feels light on the skin. This would be perfect for someone who doesnt like wearing a lot of make up, that wants something light on the skin. I don't understand all the hype that this cc cream is getting but its probably because its better than other CC cream. I wouldnt buy this again, i would go for a foundation.

reviews.review_title: Amazing but should have more shade options
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. It lasts all day and gives a luminous finish. It has the perfect amount of coverage, too. I have freckles and this product will cover the lighter ones but let most of them see through. I have bought this product at least 3 times however, I wish they had a broader shade range. The light is too dark for me and the fair/light has the wrong undertones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just bought this and love it! I wouldn’t call it full coverage. It is a light or medium coverage. It feels very lightweight and nourishing. I love how natural it looks. At first I thought it would be too dark when I opened it but when putting it on it matched well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best foundation I’ve ever used! I have combo skin, and use this more as a tinted moisturizer, I put a drop of MJ dew you and use my clean hands to apply. I find that even if i do have problem spots on my face it covers enough and it is a treatment because of the Niacinamide and other great ingredients! The smell is a lemon scent and I love it! And the consistency is more of a light cream and isnt runny. I find the warmth of my hands help the application and then I use a Beauty blender after my concealer and I find that any makeup product I use, the cc cream is very adapting and looks like skin! It along lasting and I’m always happy with my skin at the end of the day when I wear!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry to combination skin that doesn’t really break out but every time I wore this I got clogged pores, under the surface bumps and very bad milia. I gave the product multiple chances but it just didnt work. It also made me look greasy 2-3 hrs in. I don’t really understand the hype. This product was a big disappointment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me tell you... this product was the only thing that covered my horrible acne while before during and after Accutane. It has such a nice consistency, and was very hydrating when i had super dry flakey skin. It even did pretty well with texture too. I tried sooo many foundations and i LIVE by this one. I had huge pimples and combination oily + flakey skin, and this product did the best at covering up the texture AND color. It lasted all day as well and never ever made me break out. Honestly an amazing product and i cant find anything better. Side note: i have very sensitive skin and this worked great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product so bad! The coverage of it is really nice and it applies so fast, but it creases and feels so heavy and wet on the skin. Also the shade range is not the greatest..I tried a couple and they were either too light or too dark. Just didn't seem to work for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The silver part of this packaging disintegrates and goes all over my other products. This is so irritating day in day out that it’s enough for me to not want to use a perfectly decent product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: purchased the color light initially which was way to dark( I'm fair skin with a cool undertone redhead) I exchanged it for Light and it still has a orangey base to it. I use it very sparingly dotted on my face. and it gives good evening and coverage. however i wish it had a better color match for me. but overall a decent product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved using this product while I was in transition from having acne and having monthly chemical peels. It really helped me get rid of my blemishes and dark spots from my previous acne. I used this and Kiel’s Dark Spot Serum together daily. Perfect concoction for days everyday coverage. SPF was also a plus.  Although I wish it was a bit less oily. I just opted to mix it a little with the serum and it was the perfect amount of moisture.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yay! I found a foundation that doesn’t make me look busted after a few hours! I have combination skin and most foundations tend to separate in conjunction with my oil - but not this one! It’s very buildable so you can go from light to caked up in about 2-3 rounds. It has a natural dewy look which I appreciate - I don’t like matte looks. I went one shade darker cause it tends to go on the lighter side. This foundation makes me look good despite wearing it for up to ten hours a day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Terrible formula, terrible company. I worked at Sephora at have tried almost every complexion product in store. Definitely the worst of all. Waste of money, most people have complained about breakouts as well. Company is awful too.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not the best, instead of it soaking into my skin through the day, it cracks and is splotchy. The color also doesn’t match my skin and wasn’t sure what the Sephora employee was doing but it also makes me look like a ghost....

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolute perfection. Literally one pump filled my whole face full coverage but doesn’t look thick or cakey. It’s smoothing and brightening perfect for every day or even into night. Amazing price point for the amount of product especially when one pump fills a face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: been using this for 2 years now. grate fir summer. good coverage. definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this foundation. Very natural looking, smells amazing like lemons. Can get a little oily, can feel dewey though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: but not so much on other things! I loved the look of this CC cream and can see why it receives raves reviews, but it didn't stay on well for me. I tend to have dry skin that soaks up makeup, but not this product. It would come off on anything that remotely brushed my skin... clothes, people, my nails, etc. I couldn't wear it clothes shopping for fear of being that person smearing makeup all over a shirt, I'd have to be super careful hugging other people so it didn't transfer to their clothes and forget any light colored gel mani's because they would be completely stained by this cream (and unfortunately learned the hard way on a vacation!). Not to mention it felt like I was removing mud from my face when I went to take it off at the end of the day. I found YSL and Lancome have products that work a lot better for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have now been through 4 tubes!!! Love this product so much, I never break out with it and it covers up any blemish so effortlessly. 10/10 please try it, this “foundation” is my holy grail.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It crumbles like a cake, makes your face look wrinkly and old. I didn't like it, went back to store and I was told I didn't blend it good enough and didn't apply lots of moisture underneath I asked them to do it for me and same result if not worse. I just hate it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Just got a sample, and tried it today... I'm 100% ordering the large size, I'd wear this instead of foundation anyday. I have sensitive, acne prone skin, scars, etc.  It was lightweight and made my skin look flawless... I am impressed.

reviews.review_title: disappointed in the marketing not product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It was marketed as a cc cream, and I expected that but this was, to me, a full coverage foundation. I would recommend it to people who are looking for a full coverage foundation with SPF but if you're like me who was looking for a semi coverage cc cream avoid at all costs. I will be returning my foundation

reviews.review_title: Surprised by the good reviews. Not for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really want to love this product but it was just MEH. It smells really bad and just does not go on well at all. It gets stuck to even moisturized skin and would come off so easily even using the it cosmetics foundation brush. Also, the packaging looks so cheap and barely sticks to the bottle. It's expensive for what you get. Not for me.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was so disappointed after all of the hype. Left my face feeling greasy. I don't recommend this at all.... will stick with smashbox cc/bb cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using YSBB for 3 years and love it!  It does get a little oily throughout the day- but nothing a quick blot can fix.   I went form wearing Double Wear everyday - to just this CC cream. My skin is much happier and I can save my heavy foundation for speical occsaions or going out!   Love it! My only home is more a demi-matte version.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this product! Even having an oily T-zone, it’s one of my go-to foundations! I love this especially in the winter since it’s hydrating, and a light layer in the summer since it has SPF 50. The shades are great and kind of just adapt to your skin tone. It’s not the most long wearing foundation, but I love it anyway!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've purchased this a few times, but won't be again. it was highly recommended to me by several people. I love it for the SPF and how amazingly it counters redness. But it feels heavy on my face,  I've tried applying with fingers, brushes, blenders, with primer, without primer and it always looks streaky like it's sliding off my face.  Halfway through my second tube it started making my face very red and itchy. I stopped using it for 3 weeks and then bought a fresh bottle as the open one was several months old, but the new one is just as bad. Hopefully I can return it once the stores are reopened.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t typically write reviews, however after trying this product I absolutely had to share. Omg this is incredible, it feels like butter going on and my skin looked absolutely flawless, not shiny also not dry. This product also contains spf 50+. I will be re purchasing this item for the rest of my life.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, I don't normally use anything heavier than a bb cream but this has amazing coverage without feeling too heavy. I use my fingers to apply it as I think it gives a nice dewy finish, definitely perfect for a summer glow

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited for this but it was way to dark for my skin tone. I chose the lightest shade and it was no were close to my skin tone. Other than the shade color it’s very good and full coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this. I'm on my third one, and will continue to re-buy. Coverage is great and it doesn't cake or settle into my lines like every other foundation I've tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have very dry skin and found this made my skin flaky still

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones

reviews.review_text: I fell in love with this IT CC cream a few summers past. I just LOVE it! I like to have face color that is buildable but doesn’t look like a toddler had a fun time. I switched and use a Lancôme liquid that I liked, and current I have Laura Mercier foundation, also. But I go for the IT one every time! If I’m traveling, one bottle has moisturizer and SPF while being a makeup that isn’t finicky’ blend with your hands, a brush, a sponge....lots of voices!!! They are continually working to ensure that their great products appeal to the multicultural needs of all people.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_title: Amazing but- Need more options for lighter shades!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really love this foundation. Full coverage which is perfect. Nice to see makeup with such a high SPF level. Only concern I have with this foundation is that there needs to be lighter shades. I use Fair and it is still too dark for my skin. I pair it with another lighter foundation from Smashbox and then mix it together to use it. Otherwise, awesome foundation just needs more options for lighter skintones!

reviews.review_title: Love love love, such a natural glow!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I struggled for years to find a foundation that fit with my combination skin (dry forehead and oily nose). I tried about 10 different foundations from Sephora (Becca, Too Faced, Urban Decay, Clinique, etc.) but all of them creased or separated within an hour of wear, would wipe off of my nose area, or dry out my face. This is the only foundation that I found to be long-lasting and rarely crease/separate. It has such a natural finish to it and definitely brightens my face. I love that it has SPF 50 in it. I wear it all around Las Vegas in the summer in 40+ weather. It doesn't melt off and I don't burn. It's the perfect medium coverage foundation for summer and winter, as it is super hydrating and brightening as well. I've been using it for two years now and wouldn't switch to another. I also find you don't need a concealer with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is the best! I am super pale and wore this in 40C degree weather in the Sahara Desert in Morocco and in the deserts in Egypt and Jordan and didn't burn AT ALL. I wore 60SPF on the rest of my body and this alone on my face, no extra sunscreen. It kept me protected from the sun all day, with excellent looking skin. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favourite everyday foundation. It is the perfect 'your skin but better' product. It is light, but also provides coverage. It also lasts very long, as one pump goes a long way. I also love that it has SPF 50+. This product gives an amazing healthy look to the skin. If you have oily skin, I would suggest using the oil free formula, as this might increase oiliness.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - natural beige shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for two years and love how easy it is to apply to the skin. It is not a full coverage which I love and it has SPF in it which is a huge bonus!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: Works Well For Sun Lovers And Sensitive Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted something multifunctional and this fits the bill. I have chemical and sun sensitive skin. This product really does the trick. It’s not just a tinted moisturizer. It’s an actual CC cream, which is great for my uneven skin skin tone. With the SPF 50 and long wear I can wear it anywhere, even hiking. It lasts all day. I only feel it sits on top of my skin a bit instead of fully blending. However, to be honest I’m not sure whether it’s from the cream or skin care products. On the plus it’s a major value. There’s tons of shade options so it was easier to find one that matched my tone. I bought it in July and literally just bought a new one 8 months later!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Way cakier than i wanted it to be. But all the shops were shut down by the time i went to return. Bummer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Actually wasn’t expecting to buy foundation when I walked in the store. They were doing a promotion and I got suckered into buying after a free application. Figured might as well use it and ended up loving it!! Didn’t realize what I was missing. Amazing coverage! A little goes a longggg way. I got this tube around 5 months ago and it still hasn’t run out and I use it every day. It also did amazing wonders for my dry skin. No issues with extra oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is literally my second skin. It’s so smooth. The color correction is great and it’s buildable. I’ve tried so many different products even high end products because I like to alternate products but in the end this is my holy grail product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I used to stray away from CC/BB/tinted moisturizers because I thought the coverage wouldn't be enough for my acne/hyperpigmentation...until I tried this product. A little goes a long way and it completely covers my face with a medium coverage. You can definitely build this up to full coverage if you want. I don't see myself going back to foundations after this because I love the coverage, how light it feels on my skin, and knowing that it's not clogging my pores. I love the fresh, clean smell as well. The only reason I'm not giving it 5 stars is that I do have oily skin, and if I'm sweating or wear it for a full day, I do notice it breaking down on my face (mainly around the nose area).

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Literally feels like nothing is on my face. One or two small pumps goes a long way. A natural look, great for everyday use.

The worst part is I got the light shade which is a lot darker than the colour swatch on the packaging, so it doesn't match my skin tone. This foundation may work for others, just not me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

However, it does make my skin feel nice and soft! I mostly use it as a tinted sunscreen rather than an alternative to foundation and definitely WILL NOT WORK as a concealer for under the eye. It's better as either a skin treatment/sunscreen than it is for makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT my skin is alittle dry not acne prone not oily so I don’t need a lot of coverage so this is perfect for me. It glides on well, ive gotten compliments on my skin about it. I’ve compared it with other foundations like Fenty and this product works way better for me. Would buy it again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good ingredients, easy to work with, evens skin tone well. The only issue is it can get cakey as the day goes on, especially for those who have dry skin. I have tried to combat this with a setting spray, but it makes my skin look oily...what to do???

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: super dark. not for fair OR light skinned folk like myself. i usually wear a y225 (marble) in makeupforever ultra hd foundation which they said have nothing that comes close to matching but i figured id try the light anyways. it was very orange and at least 2 shades darker than my skin. and im not even THAT pale. i cant comment on longevity but i will say that just swatching it on my arm it felt very thick and heavy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a little heavier than I expected. Went on nicely but I found that I could tell I was wearing foundation which I don’t love.

reviews.review_title: Terribly dry and patchy, worst foundation ever use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

I have tried many different brands of foundations and NONE of them, not even drugstore foundations, are as bad as this one. What a waste of money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The best cc cream I have used . I have sensitive skin and it has never irritated me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

Very smooth and natural application and appearance on skin. Good for non acne prone skin, I suppose.  I would have liked it, if it did not block my pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: But why is my skin better with IT

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried a few different brands of foundation/spf type creams as I only like light make up and want sun protection and this one is by far my favourite I have found and I plan to rebuy. Has a nice smell, looks smooth and apples easily. Love love love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: fav foundation so far. Just finished my first tube so I'm repurchasing asap. Definitely recommend especially if you have dry skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this CC cream. The shade fits well with my skin tone, love the texture and is easy to apply

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: can’t seem to match my color correctly, this is my third time repurchasing and have yet to find the perfect color. i suggest you use a shade or two lighter than your usual foundation!

reviews.review_title: worst cc cream I’ve ever tried
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Went to sephora and was told my skin is very dehydrated, combination skin. Loved the Peter Thomas Roth’s Skin to die for CC cream but it was discontinued! Said I wanted something that would give me a similarly dewy look and moisturized feeling.  Was recommended the IT Cc cream Matte(?!?! why tho. -_-) and that I should moisturize a bunch. Have since moisturized and gotten a new cleansing routine and my skin looks and feels much much better. UNLESS I APPLY THE CC CREAM. I waited to decide on whether it was my skin or the products until my skin was not dehydrated. The Matte did not work, dried me out so much and slipped off within a couple hours.   I went back and was recommended the original. The original still caused /highlighted dry patches, and slipped away / into my pores within a couple hours. Looked great at first, then made my skin look SO greasy and SO dry at the same time next time I looked in the mirror. Tried with oil underneath, less awful but still similarly dry and patchy effect.  I’m tempted to try the illumination one but think I’ll try anything else. Can’t return it at the moment either because of the pandemic -_-

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a good foundation for sensitive skin! However it oxidizes within two hours and doesn’t suit your real color. After a few hours it cakes up and looks blotchy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the CC cream! I haven’t worn foundation since I started using this. I have repurchased it four times now. I tried a more expensive CC cream but ended up coming back to this one because it’s just the right amount of coverage.   My only complaint is the tube. The silver part of the tube comes off on your hands. So if you are putting it in with your fingers you end up with silver flecks on your face. It’s very annoying. The tube has worn off on every tube I’ve had and was the reason I tried switching brands.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing. I have stopped using my Nars concealer completely because this is so effective. I have really bad redness and discoloration and this does the trick. I love it and highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to love this so bad. It’s got amazing coverage, moisturizing and lasts all day. BUT, made me break out everywhere. My once flawless skin is now two weeks after stopping, still battling this breakout.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: one of the best cc creams that I have used so far, there's a little oxidation but not as drastic. I have been using this for 2 years now and it's a great for everyday use

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely one of my best purchase from Sephora. It covers my pores and instantly gives me clear, natural looking skin. There are days when I have random red marks on my face and this CC Cream gives it that instant fix!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this, feels natural and light. I love that it looks like a better version of me without looking like I am wearing anything at all.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super moisturizing, long lasting, easy to apply! A little definitely goes a long way. Great if you are wanting coverage not wanting to use several products. That said, I have two complaints -- the cc cream makes my face look oily and it easily comes off my face when touched (e.g on my phone or fingers). I recommend pairing with a setting powder.  That said, its great if you are on the go or not wanting to spend a lot of time doing make up.

reviews.review_title: Out the door life changing product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Life changer. I’ve tried many CC creams and foundations and this is the perfect product. Such full but light coverage and I will be using this product forever. I can just leave the house with this and I’ll be fine. I have acne prone skin and very sensitive and this has been helpful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I would say it gives more or a medium coverage. Which I like as I find it looks more natural, awesome if you need something quick in the summer as applications is very forgiving. I have worn for 9 months now and my face has never come close to a sun burn. At the end of my work day it is greasy but not to often itchy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A small amount really covers the whole face. Light texture, covers well, and doesn't feel oily or causes face to become oily later.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My everyday foundation. Coverage is great. SPF is perfect. Couldn't be improved.  Even used this as SPF/foundation/skin care for 15 day hiking trip in Nepal--no sunburn and my skin looked great! All time favourite product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Coverage is good; leaves your skin oily all day and does not set. I tried it with a setting powder on top + setting spray, and within a couple of hours you can see the makeup has moved. I tried this as an option for clean at sephora + SPF, and was not satisfied at all with this product. Will be returning once stores open up again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I keep rebuying this because the product itself is nice, but the packaging is atrocious. You have to be extra cautious not to touch the silver parts of the tube, they rub off easily. They desperately need to fix this issue.  Will not buy again, on the hunt for a new cc.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rich Honey - rich ebony shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This brand is certainly not made with women of color in mind. You can’t find a complexion match with only two options for women of color. I am medium tone and I have tried both options and the range just isn’t there. Moving right along...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It was fine at first but after a month or so, I noticed that it had a drying effect on my face; I started to notice lines that were not there before and made existing fine lines more pronounced.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this a year ago after a Sephora makeover.  It honestly makes my 48 year old skin look better than it EVER has.  Over time I've noticed my skin feeling smoother as well.  I absolutely love it and highly recommend it with one caveat - during the summer it melts off my face and makes me look like a heatwave hit Madame Tussaud's.     I just switch products during hot months.   The rest of the year it's glowing skin and sun protection here I come!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been searching for a CC cream that is medium coverage with more of a matte finish.  Enter IT CC cream with SPF, and I was in business!  I love the coverage this foundation gives me.  I am almost fifty, and this foundation looks very natural even with fine lines and wrinkles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage but this foundation is not suited to anyone with oily skin. Initial application goes on great but it appears extremely oily within an hour

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love it, since it’d be great to have some light coverage with so much SPF, but unfortunately their lightest shade is not anywhere close to light enough for me. 3 stars cuz I’d probably use it if they had my color. If you’re not super fair-skinned like me, it may work for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good covering but natural result. Glowy Finish and easy to apply

reviews.review_title: Bad for skin essential oils... beware!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: At first I thought this was the best tinted moisturizer/BB cream/foundation, period. Very natural looking yet has pretty high coverage. Dewy finish, good holding power. Honestly it's the best my face has ever looked with makeup. Sadly it started to irritate my skin after a few wears and broke me out. I know it was this product because it was the only change I made - and I reattempted to wear this several times with the same result. My skin is sensitive to fragrances and essential oils (most peoples skin is, you might just not know it yet!). As other reviewers have pointed out, this product contains a high concentration of essential oils. Pretty shocking that the founder of ITCosmetics apparently has rosacea and purportedly designs products for rosacea sufferers. One of the main 'rosacea rules' is to avoid essential oils and fragrances! Very dissapointing, ITCosmetics. I wonder if the founder actually has rosacea or if she is just making up a marketing gimmick?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really does cover up the dark circles under my eyes! My favourite now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that this has SPF 50 mineral in it! It does not irritate my acne prone skin. I mix about 1/2 a pump with moisturizer to get a sheer coverage because this really is full coverage! When mixed, it looks very skin-like and natural. Pairs well with cream and powder products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ok, so there are pros and cons to this foundation.   The good thing is the coverage is really nice and a small amount goes along way. Finish looks nice on the skin. Has natural spf.   I started using this and after wearing it for a couple hours my face started feeling tight and dry. I couldn't figure out what I was doing because I didn't think it could be from this product. Fast forward to the tube being almost gone and my skin being wrinkled and dry. I took a break from using this and improved my skin a bit and used this again for 2 days and bam my skin felt dry and tight once again! I had thrown out the package so I went online to look at the ingredients and saw there was a number of citrus oils high up on the ingredients which are very exfoliating to the skin! Essential oils should only be used in skin care in low percentages or it can irritate the skin.  I've been working to repair my skin and I do think my moisture barrier possibly could have been comprised when I started using this but it made it way worse continuing to use it.  Shade range is bad. Everything was way too orange and dark for me even with a tan. Had to get a lighter shade but it was the end of summer so I knew my skin would lighten.  Need more neutral and light olive colors. Overall good for most people. Just be careful if you have dry or sensitive skin. If they took out all the citrus oils it'd be great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have major texture issues from acne scars, and this is my fav product to cover them up without looking cakey or matte. The routine that I’ve found works best is: 1) Apply Niaminacide from the The Ordinary, no additional primer is needed 2) Let it dry, then apply the CC cream with a damp beauty blender 3) Finish it off with Urban Decay setting spray. I then pat a little powder under my eyes and around my t-zone. You can use less product and an extra damp beauty blender for lighter coverage, and the opposite for fuller coverage!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
