reviews.review_text: I haven’t actually tried this product properly, because they don’t have a shade light enough for me! I would love to try, IT Cosmetics, please expand your shade range. You are severely limiting your amount of customers by having such a poor shade range.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s ok but doesn’t seem like a great match for my face, even with primer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! It is moisturizing, has great coverage and doesn't get too greasy throughout the day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Takes small amount & stays on all day. Will go with a little darker next time.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I hate it. It’s heavy and I use a very small amount. By the end of the day it’s sweated off and my skin looks oily.  I just wanted sheer coverage to get rid of redness but not cover my freckles. This isn’t good for any of that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I can’t say enough good things about this product. I’m 48 , and have tried soooo many products that promised solutions for mature skin ... and failed. I was hesitant to go to a bb crm because I had asked for more coverage than the current product I was using (HD) .. she assured me to give it a try, I was grateful I listened ! I’m no pro , rarely used makeup anymore , but this product amazed me so much , I’m doing it on the daily now . It’s so user friendly, easy to build , no creasing , cracking or cake face feeling . She warned a little goes a long way and she was correct ... I only need half the amount of this product over others I tried. The coverage is perfect , exactly what I have been looking for since I turned 40! So impressed!

reviews.review_title: Good product -- not for me in general
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It seems like a very good product -- it goes on well with a brush and buffs out beautifully. For me personally, it's a little too opaque -- I like a more transparent look -- but, hey, it's SPF 50, I think the opacity is part of the makeup doing its job. There will be days I definitely use it, but most days I think I'll got with a lower SPF.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation! Smells amazing and gives me great looking skin. A little goes a long way

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: J’adore ce produit. Hydratant avec une couvrance modulable qui laisse un effet très naturel. Achetez l’original chez Sephora, ne vous laissez pas charmé par le prix des imitations qu’on retrouve sur des sites chinois, c’est incomparable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product. The high SPF was a huge plus for me having pale skin and the actual texture of the cream is really nice. However the shade looked terrible on me and looked orange after application. I went into Sephora to try on the lightest shade they have and it was still too dark and orange coloured.  If they could make some lighter shades with a cooler undertone I would definitely get this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly, I wanted to love this because I follow a few adult beauty bloggers who rave over this but this is worst foundation I have ever used. I have pretty good skin, only the occasional small breakout, even texture, no dryness or bumpiness. But this made my skin look HORRENDOUS...as in, I truly look better with no makeup on at all. My boyfriend even made a comment on my makeup for the first time ever...  I tried applying it 3 different ways, with my hands, with a beauty blender, and with a Tarte brush and they were all so bad. I’m attaching a picture for proof. Like I said, I don’t have any issues with dryness or uneven texture but on my chin and forehead, no matter how I applied it, this is how it came out. I don’t understand. It makes me look like I tried to put foundation over a flaky sunburn. Back to my cheap, trusty drugstore foundation I go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The best full coverage foundation ever I would recommend to everyone. Absolutely amazing

reviews.review_title: Worth every penny! Long-lasting and natural!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a guy who’s trying out makeup for the first time and I love this product! At first, I was hesitant to buy it because it was out of my price range but once I saw how perfectly this shade blended into my skin, I just had to get it. It made me look so airbrushed and so flawless. I was shook! My friends couldn’t even tell that I had makeup on because it looked so natural, yet I was so radiant. The first time I wore it was when I went out clubbing with my friends. It stayed on all night, despite all the dancing. A little smear here and there but nonetheless, my face still looked great 5 hours later. And that was without a setting spray, too. Overall, I think this is worth the splurge. You get what you pay for and a little bit of product goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage, not cakey.  A little goes along way. Lasts all day and stays on through hot flashes, haha

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. Good coverage for my brown spot. Perfect for working mom that doesn’t have time for makeup

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So the cream itself works great with my skin. Bu, the color is rather yellow on my complexion because I am pale and burn easy. I bought the lightest possible and have to extend coverage down to my collarbone to avoid harsh makeup lines. My skin doesn't seem to mind it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had to give this one 3 stars because I’m not sure if I liked it or hated it. At first, I thought it was a great foundation when first applied but throughout the day, my skin looked like a hawt mess. I love that there was SPF, but there are more affordable foundations that perform better than this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this CC cream. It has great coverage and protects against sun damage.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Broke me out really bad. I can see it's being nice for someone with clear skin. If you are acne prone I suggest looking for something else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don't even know where to start with this one. The smell. It's strong and medicinal, because of the addition of Eucalyptus oil - which is an irritant and does not belong in a product that goes on your face. Second, there is a lot of citrus oil in this stuff, which is also bad for your skin (phototoxicity). Third, but most importantly, I was advised to use only a scant pea size of this mixed with serum or moisturizer for the best application results. Newsflash: you cannot get SPF50 coverage using a small amount of this or any other sunscreen. It's a fail all around

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This CC+ Cream is amazing! I don't like to wear makeup often and when I wear this product I don't even feel like I'm wearing foundation. The coverage is also really good. I highly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I thought this went on smooth and then I read the ingredients..... snail secretion. On my face. Why. Yuck.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! You do have to set it because it slips around easily but that’s not a problem. My skin always looks flawless and hydrated when using this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for something with light coverage that would give my skin a lit from within look. This was not it. The coverage was quite thick and chalky with a matte finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If i could give 0 stars, I would. Only reason it deserves 1 is because it does cover. HOWEVER, I had zero acne to cover UNTIL I used this. In less than 24 hours after putting this on, my entire face broke out. I’m not typically prone to acne. Never have been. And now at 28, my entire face is annihilated. Do not buy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This seems to be one of those things where it works super well for you or not at all. For me, it works really well - I'm very pale and most foundations, tinted moisturizers, etc look yellow on me. I went into a Sephora to get shade matched and this one is perfect. I apply with a beauty blender and I've had several compliments on my skin, including from my dad yesterday, which says a lot because he notices NOTHING. I got a sample of the concealer and I'll go back and grab that too because it brightens up my eyes a lot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Nice product great for vacation, unfortunately left me with tiny pimples all over my forehead and chin!

reviews.review_title: I REALLY wanted to love this..
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: When I ordered this online, I was so excited to try it - but that excitement was short lived! I love the consistency of this foundation, and although it's full coverage, it's not too cakey on my skin. It goes on beautifully.. but does it stay on? NO! Within an hour, the foundation around my nose is almost completely off, and if I dab my forehead, all the foundation comes off. It's very blotchy. I don't have super oily skin, so to see the foundation just basically melt off my face shocked me. I tried it with primer, and that made it so much worse. I really wanted to love this foundation, but it let me down BIG time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I never thought anything would replace my Lancome Skin Feels Good, but this has. I use a beauty blender and my large pores disappear, but not looking filled like some foundations do and my skin looks fresh all day. I used the quiz to find my color and it's perfect.  It's illuminating and I haven't had the glitter that some talk about.  I set it with Bare Minerals fair to light invisible bronze and use a Jane Iredale contour powder kit. I am pleased with the results. No tired looking face at the end of the day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation because it gives a great glow and my face stays moisturized. The coverage I would say is medium and you can somewhat build it up,but if someone is looking for a high coverage foundation then I would not recommend this to them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My go-to foundation. It's a bit thick so I mix it with a few drops of Dr. Barbara Sturm Glow Drops and WOW, buttery, radiate skin. Love it!

reviews.review_title: oxidized so bad! color is awful
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is supposed to be the holy grail of foundations for us in our 40s. So I was super excited to try this product and I wanted to love it so bad. The formula is good for older skin, has good coverage but the color is just awful. Tried several different shades and finally wound up with “Fair” which looks good while applying in the morning then an hour later I see myself in the mirror and it’s all oxidized and orangey looking. The color just gets darker and darker as time goes by. Total embarrassment! Won’t buy again. I guess it’s Back to the drawing board for me. Still looking for my holy grail foundation.

reviews.review_title: Try a sample before buying it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Started to use the foundation a month and a half ago and my skin combination changed completely; it became very dry, with few pimples (I never had in my life pimples). I really recommend you to try a sample before buying it. I was very happy to find a product with SPF 50 however very disappointed my skin couldn't handle it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: wanted to live this, good.coverage but not worth it for the drying Cakey finish

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a genious product in my opinion. It is a CC cream yet the coverage is wonderful. It feels nice on the skin and the SPF is 50! I only where it in the summer time when I know I am going to be outside a lot. It is also great at re applying quickly if needed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this! It gives a very flawless completion. Use alone or under foundation. It also has a high SPF, and kept my skin safe for 5 days in Hawaii!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this 2 days ago as it was recommended to me by a Sephora employee (Kitchener ON).   I hadn't purchased a higher quality foundation in years but had previously used Estee Lauder Double Wear. Originally that is what I had gone in to ask about because it had been years, and my skin has changed drastically in those years (Rosacea

reviews.review_title: For once a shade that matches my skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is honestly way heavier coverage than i normally prefer, but somehow it manages to do it without looking unnatural. And it's the one brand I've found with a shade that matches me perfectly. It also doesn't settle into my fine lines and emphasize them like so many other brands. It's nice to get even color without having to sacrifice texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a wonderful product! It’s moisturizing, it does protect from sun and makes my skin look nice and healthy. My skin is oily so I do have to powder it and I would recommend using a concealer if you have blemishes because even though it covers well, it wears off spots during the day. I love to use it on days when I don’t wear lots of makeup. It doesn’t last all day on me but I still like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow this foundation is incredible. Doesn’t look cakey and stays on my skin all day. 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As I am 50+ and looking for a good foundation for aging skin; it was recommended to me by a Sephora employee; so I purchased this foundation. I am hugely disappointed; it wasn’t what I was looking for. For me it was a waste of money because I find it thick, heavy and feels like paint.This foundation would be good for someone with a lot to cover up ( like a tattoo).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best foundation I have ever used. It gives flawless coverage. It truly looks like you are not wearing coverage. It is excellent. Go easy it covers completely with very little it’s concentrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I actually bought this for my mom and she loves this foundation. She has damage skin by the sun and she loves how this foundation covers that and also hydrates her skin and keeps it protected.

reviews.review_title: Great product but the shade fair is too dark!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The actual product is wonderful so far, I have very dry skin but it looks very smooth and does not settle into my lines or dry patches! A little bit goes a long way BUT I have very fair skin, very porcelain white with cool/pink undertones but the fair shade is very dark on me. It looks much darker than the picture and almost orange on me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve found the new perfect cc  I don’t have to wear make up anymore. I have combination and sensitive skin but this product does not cause any reactions and covers the redness in my face. It’s also long lasting and doesn’t run after 9 hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have yet to find one that is perfect for my summer colouring, but this feels so good on the skin, covers up any redness, and blends well.

reviews.review_title: Good for a sunscreen but greasy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It applies thick and heavy. I had hoped it use this as my new foundation but it looks too filmy. Still better than other tinted sunscreens I’ve tried though. I haven’t found the perfect one yet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you have great skin and like natural, medium-full coverage, this is for you.   If you prefer light coverage or have textured skin, this is NOT for you.   If my skin is looking clear and healthy, this goes on beautifully but I rarely want that coverage if my skin is looking like that.  However, because this does go on a lot less heavy than most full coverage products, I will keep using this even though I don’t love the appearance. One star knocked off because while I appreciate the expanded shade range, the undertones are still off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dries out my skin and makes it look chalky and flaky, will not be buying this again. Love the idea, but there are better tinted spf’s out there.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First and foremost, I finally have a color match.  It is a bit thicker than I was used to but blends very nicely.  Since it’s hydrating I hope there is some wrinkle improvements but I have only been using it for 4 days.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've repurchased this 3x. It is full coverage and a little goes a long way but it's lightweight and long lasting. I find that it adjusts to my skin tone pretty well so can wear it year-round.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I purchase the wrong shade: medium is too dark for my skin tone but anyways: the product does a great job: my skin color is even, beautiful, flawless. The thing is: I must moisturise my skin before applying the cream - it lacks moisture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product - great coverage, and applies very smooth

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: great product! I've repurchased multiple times. very thin and doesn't feel heavy at all! this foundation literally looks flawless and is very dewy looking if you don't set it with a powder. would deff recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely LOVE this!! I only use half a pump for my entire face and I love the full coverage it gives! Perfect for a natural makeup day filled with sunshine!! I will say, it does slide around after like 10 hours of wear but keep in mind it’s a CC cream and not a foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love it because the coverage is great. But it only emphasizes my dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. I got the shade fair it it seems to be a perfect match. The consistency is the star here though. I have relatively dry/dehydrated skin and this is the perfect just slightly dewy, while STILL looking flawlessly skin-like. I dont like to set it down really, but it is so realistic to what skin normally looks like, it's amazing. Most BB/CC creams are virtually ZERO coverage but this one has a strong medium-full coverage I would say, WITHOUT looking cakey or overly heavy in the least. Truly my holy-grail. If they were to EVER retire this CC+ cream, I think I would lose it. lol

reviews.review_title: CC  Cream with SPF 50  IS THE BEST PRODUCT EVER!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have never ever been a makeup person and I never thought a tinted moisturizer would work and in my color, but it works. Most products are itchy or to thick, this feels easy and light while providing amazing coverage for most of the day even though it's mentioned to apply every two hours. It's definitely long lasting. It's also easy to wipe and wash off at then end of the day. Best product I've ever used and I am glad Sephora has my order history saved so that I can order it whenever I need to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this.....needed to love this but nope, just another foundation in a long line of foundations that make my skin look horrible.  Over 50 with dry skin but don't get me wrong, I cleanse, I moisturize, I exfoliate.  I look after my skin but ever since I hit menopause I can't find 1 single foundation that does not settle into

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After being steered more than once to try this foundation, I finally decided to try it as I was told it was a really hydrating formula. Unfortunately I really hate it and will be returning the product. Colour wise I don’t find that it is quite right. I am normally a pretty standard ivory but I find the fairer options for this product too dark and a bit orangey. My bigger issue however is that I find the product incredibly drying even with a moisturizer and primer. My skin flaked by mid day and after the second day I broke out on my chin area badly (which is unheard of for me at age of 43). The foundation makes my skin feel tight and is not at all comfortable to wear after a few hours. I’ll be going back to my Clarins foundation or trying another brand.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this product after reading all the good reviews.  But it turned out to be the worst CC cream for my skin type.  It fills all of my pores and it dries my skin out so badly :( I tried to mix it up with moisturizer but still too dry for me.  I purchased this product from somewhere else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I use this foundation everyday. It goes on nicely with light coverage, but is also good if I want to use powders on it. I brought this on vacation with me and it actually works as a sunscreen as a fair person I didn’t burn.

reviews.review_title: Nice but wondering about Collagen Source
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice product but wish they would clarify the source of the collagen (vegan or bovine or fish).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful application, only takes a little, covers my redness, lasts till I take it off. The compliments just keep coming! Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: An awesome tinted moisturizer with SPF. The colour is a good match to my skin. For a more natural look, and to extend the product, lately, I have tried using less of it and adding moisturizer to blend it together. It creates an even more sheer look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I want to love this, but honestly I’m having the worst time finding a foundation that isn’t washing me out, cakey, Or filling in my pores. I have a great skincare routine, use primers, but my aging skin is so finicky that I’m losing hope.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It seems to dry out my skin to the point I can peel the flakes off, but it may just be the Alberta winter.. otherwise it is great. I usually use half a pump for my entire face and it provides full coverage. If you use the full pump it gets a little cakey. I also find that using my fingers to apply works better than using a beauty blender.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Better skin! Perfect coverage, not too thick or light and adds moisture. Love this product, great for dry skin.

reviews.review_title: Either huge hit or huge disappointment
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a professional makeup artist and esthetician so... I’m pretty picky about foundations. In my opinion.. this CC+ Cream is either a huge hit or a terrible disappointment. I tried this foundation numerous times over the last 2 years before finally loving it. I found that if your skin has any issues with pores or texture, this will not work for you whatsoever. Each time I tried this foundation when I was dealing with big pores and texture I absolutely hated it. On the opposite side.. when my skin is in incredible condition with no flaws I’m OBSESSED with this foundation! If I have no skin issues.. this product makes my skin look like porcelain and I get complimented everywhere I go on how amazing my skin looks. One other tiny issue I have is that the shade “fair” is still too dark for me so I mix this with another foundation so I can still have the flawless complexion this foundation gives me but the color I need from the other foundation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After reading and watching so many rave reviews and videos on this I decided to take the plunge and buy this. I played with this for about a week and a 1/2 straight and i tried EVERYTHING: sponge, brush, less product, different primers/setting powders/sprays. No matter what I did my face would just look cakey and aged and gross. I have oily/combo skin so i thought that after a few hours my natural oils would help but it just *refused* to melt into my skin, it would just sit there on top of my face and it was just heavy which is a rare thing for me to feel! It didn't help that I got the wrong colors twice (but that's my bad lmao) so I would look super pale on top of that. :(   I finally gave up and ended up giving it to my mom as a bonus V-day gift. The day after my last attempt I used a $10 colourpop foundation and I was suddenly reminded of what a good makeup base is supposed to look like. Really bummed it didn't work for me bc it smells really nice and its worked for so many people with all kinds of skin types! Ah well c'est la vie :/

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have large pores, and instead of smoothing my complexion this product settled in and brought attention to my pores and aged my skin. Not right for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful coverage, flawless finish, last all day. HOWEVER, I am very pale and even the lightest shade is too dark for me. I only wear this in the summer when I tan a bit, otherwise, it’s very clearly the wrong shade. If it came in a light shade, I would probably wear this foundation year around.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this. I don’t use it as my everyday makeup because I prefer something that lasts 16+ hours for long days since I get ready at 6am. However, it lasts pretty well and I probably could. It’s my go to makeup for weekends and easy summer or spring days. It applies beautifully with fingers, looks natural, and I don’t find it to cake or settle majorly into pores. My only gripe with it, aside from the lasting power (which I can’t fault it for since it’s not marketed as long wear) is the colour range. Even the lightest colour is too dark and orangey for me, so I have to add a drop of light foundation into it. I’m pale but not completely alabaster, and surely this would be an issue for a number of people. Hopefully they’ll expand the range on the extreme ends for those with very light and very dark skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Holy Grail product! Love the natural SPF and the colour always matches. When applied with a beauty blender it looks like skin and evens out skin tone so well. I’ve never been one for foundation so this was a perfect find. Really lovely balance between tinted moisturizer and cc cream. I use it as a concealer as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: THE BEST PRODUCT EVER!!!!!!!BUT.... their colour range is truly horrible. First there are not many shade ranges to choose from, and the lightest colour isn't even light, they have weird undertones to the lighter shades. If they have better colour ranges this item would truly be in every girls makeup bag, sad

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been on the hunt for a good foundation/ tinted moisturizer and was hesitant to try this out because of its full coverage claims (I’m into lightweight products). I finally gave in after seeing so many rave reviews, and I definitely don’t regret it. My skin is really dry and sensitive and so far this has been working well for me. It can cling to dry patches if I don’t do enough skin prep but it covers my redness like a dream! It has a dewy finish but not greasy looking. I wouldn’t say this is full coverage at all, more light to medium but you could definitely build it up. My only complaint is the strong fragrance and lack of shades, even the fairest one is still a little too dark for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In general, I like this cream. It covers well without feeling caked on or heavy. The slight lemony scent is nice. I didn't break out from it (and I am very acne prone). The only thing I would recommend is that you test the product out at the actual store vs using the Shade Finder feature online. I did that and the color I got was too light...so to make sure I didn't waste the $50  I spent on this, I've been blending it with my previous foundation. FYI, that foundation is what shade I had used when I used the Shade Finder feature (L'Oreal True Match Sun Beige translated to IT Cosmetics Neutral Medium...and that's too light!!)

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: very disappointed. i have rosacea and sensitive skin, i was hoping for good coverage plus sun protection. coverage was light, the product creased beside my nose and settled in my pores. no smell but the feel on my skin was heavy/ greasy. i had to return.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I personally am a huge fan! I love how easy it blends in with my skin, that is has moisturizing properties while having SPF to protect my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Doesn't last long at all. Made my skin look dry and dull. Cakey in creases.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a ginger so I have bet pale skin so even the lightest colour was way to dark for me and it even oxidized on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like this product! But I wouldn’t say it’s my favourite. It does have pretty good coverage, And I love how it makes my skin look! However I find it doesn’t look great after a day at work. It also it rubs off very easily and leaves marks on my winter jacket, hats, and scarves. However I will most likely be repurchasing for going out on weekends or shorter periods of time.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It was too heavy like a full coverage foundation is.   I was expecting a more airy light coverage. It provides great coverage it’s just too heavy for what I was looking for.

reviews.review_title: Great as long as you don't have dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly love the coverage this product give me. The scent is nice. I have to use very little and it feels quite light. BUT it does have the tendency to point out every flaw your skin might have, IE dry patches, peach fuzz and creases, even with a solid primer. I honestly had no idea my skin had so many small flaws until using this product. That being said once I fixed those small flaws it looks incredible, and lasts for quite a while. It's def not a winter foundation due to dry patching but now that it's getting warmer and less dry it looks amazing, it's just unfortunate that I can't use it 4 months or so out of the year.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage of this stuff is amazing. It smells amazing! Absolutely love it!!

reviews.review_title: Go-to, easy to wear, glowy foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this foundation for two years because I just keep going back to it. I try to find better but end up liking this more than anything new that I try. It is medium coverage with a beauty blender, and is perfect for someone who wants a natural glowy finish rather than matte. This is NOT matte. Very hydrating. I prefer using this in the summer as it melts into my skin and just looks very natural. I wouldn't recommend for someone who has a lot of dryness as this might cling to dry patches. Also not hugely impressed with the shade range.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had extremely high hopes for this product after reading and hearing amazing reviews, but I was very disappointed. The makeup is very cakey and made my skin break out so bad!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A daily staple! Love this product for a light, dewey look at work! It is a little shiny so I would recommend putting some sort of setting powder over it.

reviews.review_title: Disadvantages after six months of use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I first tried it in mini-size and really loved it. Now, I am halfway through the full-size bottle and notice more cons: 1) The lightest shades appear darker in person. 2) It oxidizes and gets even darker over time. 3) The coverage is closer to a foundation and requires proper blending every time you put it on. 4) It doesn't work well for oily parts of your face: the coverage wears out after a couple of hours of wear. On the upside, it is still a good light coverage option and it has great glow-like properties with very minor creasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Makes my skin look textured in areas I usually have no issues with. I noticed that in my forehead it would separate and look super caked. Then my cheeks looked like a shiny mess. It was very strange and not for me. I have combo skin and I feel like it made my flaws stand out more. No thanks :(

reviews.review_title: did not live up to the hype
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: In spite of mixed reviews, I thought I'd give this product a try (after all, who hasn't seen the info-mercials proclaiming it's greatness?). It did not work for me. I returned it. First of all, the color was anything but light, and I did not care for the way the texture looked on my face. Also, it definitely felt like sunscreen, and I HATE sunscreen that feels like sunscreen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wish this could come in a lighter shade, as I still find this a little dark for being a fair shade. I really like the coverage it gives as it is a true medium even thought it is a CC cream, and it truly does look like your skin but better. I found it to be buildable and decently long lasting throughout the day. It definitely needs a setting power as I found it to not dry down very quickly. I do recommend a setting spray as well as I found it makes a difference with he lasting power and ensuring it would not transfer. I preferred a beauty blender for application as it sheered it out slightly and made it more even as it is a bit of a thicker formula. Overall, I really like the look this CC cream gives me and the way it makes my skin feel. I just REALLY wish there was a lighter shade as the lightest one only works for me in the summer now ):

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Tan - light brown shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Is one of the best products i have used, i recommend it and will buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is pretty good but not amazing. It provides good coverage at first but doesn't seem to look as good after 4/5 hours. I use it sometimes for going out in the evening but don't really like to wear it to work. I also find if your skin isn't really well exfoliated then it will find any dry skin patches in hurry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this foundation. I was using Chanel previously and just felt that after 5 years, I wanted to try something different. Originally, I applied it with a foundation brush which I found applied it way to heavy. Once I started to use my bare fingers, I really began liking it. My husband comments on my skin constantly, saying that I’m radiating; that’s good enough for me!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_text: I was looking to cover a few dark spots the girl in the store helped me select this. It doesnt accomplish what i was looking to do .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am still on the hunt for an awesome foundation for my combo skin with large pores.  This is the lightest shade available and it was still  too dark for me. I first applied it with a sponge and it looked so awful on me about 2 hours after application.  It was extremely cakey looking and it looked like I had slapped on about 3 inches worth.  The next day, I tried applying it with my fingers only, working on a single section of my face at a time.  I used the smallest amount possible to prevent caking but still achieve some coverage for my rosacea.  Once again, it looked awful about 2 hours into wear. I returned it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was hopeful for this one but I’ve been using it (trying to stick with it as much as I can) since November and just have to admit that it’s not for me. I’m prone to dry, flaky patches so I exfoliate often. Even so, with this CC cream the patches seem to be worse. It’s very odd. Coverage is good. The shade is a great match. I wanted something just to even out scarring and spots and the flakiness only appears where I use it. I switched back to my Fenty foundation for a bit and didn’t notice issue there. Switched back to this just to make sure and the dry patches returned. I was worried it would leave me too slick and shiny but it’s somehow the opposite.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn’t like this product at all, it drys almost at once when i apply it and it leaves my skin looking likes it’s dirty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After seeing so many positive reviews about this cc cream being very hydrating and one of the best “foundations” on the market for dry skin, i bought it... Honestly, it’s extremely full coverage like it covers a lot, so if you like that then this is for you. however no matter how little i apply, it looks cakey and very dry on my skin. It clings to dry patches and makes my forehead look terrible and my nose! Never had an issue with any other foundation either. Also, after blending it all out with a sponge, I notice that my cheeks look like they lost coverage like it removed the product. don’t know why that is. I use the shade Fair Light which i believe is the lightest shade & it’s so yellow . I’m not a fan of this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can't live without this stuff. A little goes a long way, so it lasts forever, and it provides perfect, natural coverage. It brightens your skin instantly and smoothes everything out. If I had to pick only one make-up item to wear daily, this would be it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’d been searching for a full coverage foundation that didn’t make me break out. After spending a ton of money I found this one! It sits great on my skin, doesn’t make me super oily and lasts all day (and them some). The added SPF is a bonus!  A little goes a long way so I’m spending less on foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Pour les personnes aimant la couvrance totale. Un peu lourd, mais hydratant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Originally purchased because of the high non chemical SPF.   I didn't expect to see the dramatic change in my skin texture.  After 1 month, my skin was clearer, softer, and plumper.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This works really well for me! It gives me full coverage without being cakey. It stays on all day and the color match is the closest thing to my actual skin tone. I would agree with others that this is not a 'lightweight' foundation, but also I don't think it's trying to be that. If you want lightweight, look elsewhere. If you want full coverage, definitely try this one. I would also agree that the silver coating on the package does wear off, which just isn't what I'd expect at this pricepoint, but more so with drugstore makeup. All in all, I love this product and love that there's 50 SPF. Anything lower than that is useless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great all around coverage for day-to-day use.  I have sensitive skin which tends to get drier in the winter.  This product did not irritate my skin.  In fact, left it looking flawless and dewy.  Definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product but it’s difficult to blend in and it’s a super heavy coverage. I was expecting it to be light and have added moisture but instead it felt like I was wearing a mask :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Need to return, initially it’s ok when I put it on. But it clings you any piece of dry skin even on a good skin day . I use vitamin A and not sure if it just isn’t reacting well but this is awful. Cakes up and slides off by end of day, my skin looks better without it.

reviews.review_title: LOOKS LIKE A MASK AND CAUSE PIMPLES
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Literally don’t understand why so many people like this foundation. First, the coverage is awful. On my face it looks like the mask. Secondly, it clogged my pores and awfully broke me out! At the beginning I thought that maybe the reason was not in this foundation, but after a week without using it my skin cleared up. I decided to gave it one more chance and again it broke me up so hard!  So, if you have acne-pron skin NEVER try this foundation

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Tan - light brown shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used it for some time now, it's a great product for coverage, it's just a bit cakey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product does color correct and looks nice, at first. When it says you must reapply every two hours, it means it. It wears off very quickly. I'm not sure how I'm supposed to be reapplying this every two hours...that's insane. I used a setting spray and it was a little better but still wore off. Not happy with this product, disappointing for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My HG cream. I find it medium coverage with one pump, with a radiant finish that covers redness, uneven tone, and pores. Love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product isn't my favorite, but it's not awful. It gives good coverage but I can definitely feel it on my skin and it looks pretty heavy.
The lid takes the pump completely off every time you try and take it off. Trying to put the pump back on wastes a lot of the cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this CC cream based on the recommendation of a coworker. There's a lot I like, such that it comes with a high SPF so that's one less product I need to think about in the morning. A tiny bit goes a long way. I probably use less than a pea-sized amount to get good coverage all over my face. I also find that the light medium shade is a great fit and flattering for my skin tone. It doesn't dry out my skin or cause any breakouts.  However, I've used about half the bottle over several months in both summer and winter weather and will probably give up and switch to a new product. The problem is texture is thick and never blends seamlessly into my skin. It sits on top and has a slight cakey look, making my pores stand out even when I apply very lightly. Disappointed this didn't work for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a CC cream, I expected this product to provide some moisture and to be lighter/less cakey than it was. However, it was drying, difficult to blend out, and I didn't like that it was scented.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This color matches me perfectly!!! It is super light and full coverage!!! It’s been so hard finding a color that matches my skin and after trying almost everything I FINALLY found IT Cosmetics!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i’m an esthetician and this hands down the greatest product i own! it’s full coverage, blendable, & SPF?! i use it every morning and it stays all day & it dries with a natural dewy glow! 11/10 would recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product. A little goes a long way and provides fantastic coverage. It covers all of my flaws in a natural not made up way. It's so light feeling and workable that you would never know it's SPF50 which is awesome. Definitely a must try

reviews.review_title: I wish I could buy this product for every woman!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin which always has some issue going on (ocasional dermatitis, dryness, oily spots, acne). This is the first product which made me feel like it was making my skin’s overall appearance 1000x better while also providing excellent coverage. Not too oily, not too dry. One I applied it with a foundation brush and saw its amazing results, there was no turning back for me. I got a sample of it from Sephora, and the first couple of tries applying it with my fingers and a sponge were much less successful, so I nearly gave up on it! (Thank goodness I didn’t).  I’m also a fan of the Bare Minerals gel cream, but THIS product offers much more coverage for when you need/want it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product so badly so I am very disappointed it did not work with my skin. During the winter months my skin is combination to dry and this foundation clinged onto my dry patches. Also, I found that it is not long wearing and breaks down very quick. Unfortunately, I will be returning this product.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. HOWEVER, the silver on the packaging starts to flake off and has gotten all over my other products in my makeup bag and ALL OVER my hands when I use the product. They really need to change the quality of the packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my second time giving this one a try, I wanted so bad for it to work, to be able to be outside one vacation/camping and be protected from the sun with great coverage of the red on my cheeks? I love the coverage and the feel at first.  The first time I took it on vacation by the end of my 7 day trip my face was incredibly dry, flaking in large patches, irritated and overly sensitive, but I thought it might be something else.  Took it recently to Mexico, after 3 days of use my skin began to get very dry, continued use resulted in extreme skin irritation, red and flaky patches and skin around my eyes was swollen for days after I stopped using. A quick google search I wish I had done sooner shows how classically irritating many of these ingredients can be, not to mention how some of the oils naturally react to sunlight and can actually cause burning! It took me days to recover after this last attempt, and I am sure it was this product this time. Really a shame, wanted to like it, but as my face still burns a little, I have tossed out my remaining product and will not purchase from this line again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin in summer and combination to dryer in winter. This one has outstanding coverage while gives you a natural finish. In winter time I don’t need extra spf cuz this one has very high UV protection. Love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve never found a bb/cc cream that worked for me. I have very frustrating skin; for the most part, it’s dry but a little oily on my T zone. Very red, very sensitive and worst of all, I’ve got eczema.   This CC cream is so lightweight it looks like skin. It helps even out my skin tone and doesn’t make my skin break out or dry.   It’s a great, easy foundation alternative for lazy days or when I’m running late, and looks perfect throughout the day.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried and failed with other IT CC creams. I am done trying. This was initially a great color match, felt nice on, though did kind of make a few pores stand out, but was otherwise smooth with a slightly dewy texture. I didn’t use any kind of primer or setting spray like I normally would to test the formula without variables. About 2hrs later, I looked blotchy and like I had large fry patches where the foundation had settled and turned slightly orange-toned. I looked like I had that rock skin condition from Game of Thrones. At a distance, perhaps not noticeable, but anyone within 5ft would see how weird it looked. I was at work. Hard to stay only visible at a distance. After removal, my skin was fine. There were no dry patches where the makeup had settled. Weird stuff for me, sadly I am done with any further attempts from this brand and will be returning.

reviews.review_title: Works for sensitive skin types and rosacea
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great with my sensitive, fair skin with rosacea.  Not too oily, but doesn't dry out either and an easy step to protect my face from the sun.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE!! Blends amazing. Doesn’t feel sticky like some SPF.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love! It was great while applying but after about 5 mins, it would make my skin look beyond dry! I would have to cake my face with another foundation or bronzer to make me look like I didn't just throw baby powder on face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this in a set not expecting much because I've never found a BB/CC cream that worked for my skin needs. I struggle with acne, dryness, and I often need foundation and/or concealer everyday to cover up blemishes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this for the first time several years ago based on rave reviews from both beauty editors and my sister! The formula is like none other I've tried, it's thin and sinks right into skin but has amazing coverage. Someone also commented on how great my skin looked (currently suffering from a rosacea acne flare up) because they didn't think I was wearing complexion products! I have combination skin that can get dry around the perimeter of my face in the winter, but I always prep with loads of hydrating products so I haven't experienced the patchiness others have noted. Sometimes, if I don't have any sever discoloration, I can wear this alone with spot concealer. I'd highly recommend this for an everyday no-makeup makeup look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried all 3 it cosmetics cc creams and this is the BEST one by far. Please do not buy the oil free blue tube, it’s bad for dry or oily skin and doesn’t help your pores at all. And the illuminating purple tube is beautiful but only if you have small pores.  This silver tube is the best for all skin types. It’s great for my combination dry and slightly oily skin. It doesn’t rub off easily and I love that it moisturizes and colour corrects. I also love the lemony smell.  I use the Sephora mini pro brush to blend it. I was told by a Sephora employee that’s better for this type of foundation than a beauty blender.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the coverage and feel of this. It is a bit oilier and shinier than some foundations, so it might not do well with all skin. For me, it’s perfect, especially for the winter dryness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: more coverage than you’d think. hydrating and dewy but lasts all day. covers redness and acne!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has beautiful coverage, beautiful finish. However, it doesn’t last on my oily skin. It started breaking up after about 5 hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely in love with this product. I use it in the summer and when on vacation, it’s a perfect substitue for foundation when I don’t feel like using heavier makeup. It makes my skin glowing, its coverage is very light, but just enough to smooth the skin out and cover small impurities. It’s hydrating. The only downside is that it wears off quickly if no primer applied

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product broke the first time I used it, the lid completely broke off and it was super disappointing considering the price of the item.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used this product for years and before today would rate it a 4 star, minus 1 star because it oxides and the color scale is not accurate. I usually wear a spf 30 sunscreen under all of my foundations whether they have spf or not, the it cc cream included. Today I was in a rush and just put this on and I put on a pretty thick layer too! In one hour of being outside in not so sunny weather my face was noticeably darker, my sun spots darken up fast unless I wear sunscreen. As I have worn just spf 30 sunscreen on my face in Hawaii without getting darker, of course I reapplied but after like 4 hours, I am pretty confident that this cc cream does not contain the level of spf it advertises. I will continue to use it because it’s convenient and I like the coverage but I will not trust it to protect my skin from sun damage, definitely not spf 50.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful natural coverage.  Doesn’t dry out my skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: What more could you ask for? Better version of your skin and never feels or looks caked. Pls buy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this!! One of my cult favs, I’ve tried the other formulas but found this one to be exactly what I’m looking for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A lot higher coverage than I was expecting and doesn't sit well on my dry skin, will be returning. In search of something a bit more dewy and light coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can't fully express how much I love this product. It blends amazingly but doesn't make my skin feel overloaded. It also has a really nice glow to it that makes my skin look healthy and young. I will buy again!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is wonderful! I’m in my mid to late 30’s and starting to notice the first signs of aging. I was looking for a CC cream that would give me light coverage and wouldn’t settle in the fine lines I have around my eyes. This really exceeded my expectations and it’s definitely worth the price. I’ll definitely buy this again and again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I hate this so much. it made me a greasy slippery mess. But it was full coverage for the first hour. Then it all slid off my face.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - natural beige shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this CC cream because it had really good reviews. But I hate it. It’s cakey, it makes me really oily and slips off face. Wouldn’t recommend it.

reviews.review_title: It's true - Your skin but better CC
reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best CC cream that I've ever used.  Provides great coverage and sun protection. I went to New Zealand for 3 weeks and had no sun burn or redness at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely my go-to foundation. It has a ton more coverage than I was initially expecting and leaves you with a dewy glow. You never get the patchy dryness that some foundations leave behind and the formula feels weightless.   I love how high the SPF is and make sure to use this with sunscreen all year round and have never had an issue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Blendable and buildable full coverage. Does not settle in wrinkles.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this product! I usually use matte foundations and really liked Este Lauders however I wanted something with a little more radiance. This is the answer, great coverage without looking cakey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this CC cream. Expedites my morning routine substantially. One step and I'm done - full coverage, sunscreen and a healthy glow. Full enough for completely coverage but gentle enough my sensitive skin has never had an issue even when I have committed the cardinal skincare sin of sleeping in my makeup. I do notice a bit of shine after a few hours of wear but I don't mind this effect so that has never been a problem for me. I also noticed in the first few months this product seemed to improve the overall health of my skin. When it comes to CC cream this is IT for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Needed a small foundation for traveling and was recommended by a Sephora employee. Really loved the coverage and natural look. Just bought a bigger size

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just love this product, easy to apply, feel really light and no more imperfections.

reviews.review_title: It wouldn’t stay put on my (oily) skin :(
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I want to start by saying I loved this product- the colour, the coverage, the feel, the smell, etc, however I have oily skin and it would shift throughout the day and you could see spots where it moved. I would get lines of foundation on the oily parts of my face :( At first I would just blot my face and powder it and it went back to looking fantastic, but I couldn’t justify having to keep checking on my face to see if it needed to be touched up again. I think this product would be fantastic if you have normal skin! I know CC creams aren’t typically recommended for oily skin, but it looked so beautiful on the lady at Sephora and when it tried it in the store it blended so beautifully that I just had to try it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rich Honey - rich ebony shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. As a woman of color, it is difficult to find a foundation that really compliments my skin tone. I get compliments all the time on my make-up and part of it is because of this foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this product. I’ve purchased it numerous times and wear it daily. I love that it’s spf 50 and comes in so many shades

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage, smells nice and colour matches well. I expected this to be a lot more moisturizing though. It feels more like a normal foundation than like a tinted moisturizer like I was expecting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had previously used this CC cream and reordered another. I use my fingers and it applies beautifully. Between the application and the SPF 50 I was a convert.  I have recently taken to moving toward “clean” products and since I had the product box in hand went over the ingredients. I was shook by the second ingredient: snail secretion filtrate. I am sure this ingredient has some skincare benefit; I am a capable person and could have easily googled this. But, in my quest to go “clean” I returned this since I had not opened it. To be honest, I might have returned it anyway - clean or not. I do not like snails. That said, I’d still recommend if you can get past snail secretion filtrate. It is a skincare foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It shows your pores. It shows your pores. It shows your pores. Most of foundation or cushion foundation doesn't have this issue. Had to return it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation, although some may find it too thick. It kept popping up when I searched for foundations for 50  year olds.  The foundation has good coverage, high SPF which I like, and it lasts.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - natural beige shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very smooth Not heavy Lasts easy during the day Shades available are easy to match to the skin tone

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the finish of this product SO much but ALL of the light shades are too yellow for my skin. All of the undertones look yellow on my cool toned skin. I love the formula but they need some cool-toned shades so I can go out not looking like a smiley face french fry. I would recommend this product only if you have warm-toned skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: hands down favorite foundation. love it immensely.

reviews.review_title: needs a wider range of colors
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Obviously, this line needs to expand the color range. That's just a given at this point. But, oddly enough, they just so happen to have the best shade matching color I've been able to find for my fair warm skin. I've been using this for years though and keep coming back. It's easy to blend and layer and wears well throughout the day, both summer and winter. If you're lucky enough to have a color match, definitely try it out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect perfect perfect it is one of my best products ever

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this after reading great reviews. While I did like the coverage, the color broke down and oxidized throughout the day. It was also so pink on my skin. I was really excited about this but it doesn’t compare to the foundation I usually wear so I decided to return it. I posted a photo, you can see it separating on my skin after just a few hours

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Tan - light brown shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best product in the market The brand is absolutely committed to have quality and affordable products I will love to try more form It cosmetics

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I needed a foundation that had a sunscreen in it. I previously would put on a separate sunscreen and then put on a foundation. The drawback to this product is it needs to provide more coverage. I have uneven skin colouration and I need something to balance it out. I found this product made my skin look rather sallow. Also, if I put on too much of it my skin looks chalky. Still on the hunt for that perfect foundation that meets my needs.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok probably the best foundation I’ve ever used!! I have dry flaky skin and other foundations had never sat on it well. It would crack but this CC cream is SO moist and light!!! It doesn’t crack it doesn’t continue to dry my skin either! I apply it with a damp beauty blender. Also LOVE the fact that I don’t even need a concealer anymore with this stuff. AND it’s a sunscreen too! How much better can it be??? You have to buy this if you have dryness issues for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cakey. not worth the money. was super dry and thick to the point where it emphasized imperfections and clinged onto blemishes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The product made my face look pasty. My skin looked very dry. Hated this product and I should have taken it back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this but it doesn’t work for me. It extenuates my pores and dry patches even though it looks quite oily when applied. It does cover quite well though. I won’t buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely worth the money...and it is easy to apply...if your looking for a BB cream I would recommend this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite CC cream. Even better than any foundation. The only thing I can put on my face on my worst eczema days so I don't look like a monster. LOVE IT ❤

reviews.review_title: But it already - from a fellow makeup virgin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: For someone who does not do makeup this product helps me a lot.  I just apply it whenever I have a work event and it has SPF so it does double duty.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Use this as a full coverage foundation. It's thick enough to give me the coverage I need. Not a great color line so the color is slightly off. Tends to get oily and sink into my creases.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Got this cuz im lazy to put many layers on and always in a hurry to get out in the morning, but was pleasantly surprised with the results. It has pretty good coverage, brighten skin-tone, not cakey or greasy (I've pretty dry skin). It is a bit pricey for the amount though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly pretty overrated. If you have actual acne/discolouration the coverage is really terrible, and doesn't last more than a couple hours. I found it irritating for sensitive skin, and if you do try it I don't recommend doing what they say and skipping your skin prep, you'll still need it. You can definitely get better light-weight products, and for better or comparable prices.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loooove this cc cream. Perfect for everyday wear, as you can quickly apply this in 5 min. However, it doesn’t cover acne scars or hyperpigmentation so you’d have to go back with a concealer over it. Will always have this on me, definitely recommend!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage is amazing without being too thick. It last almost a full day without fading. I really liked this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have terrible redness on my cheeks that has always been very difficult to cover. I would always have to put two to three layers of make up on to cover it.. then I found this!! One pump of this covers my entire face and leaves a glowy finish. I get about 3 compliments a day on my complexion and is literally just this product. I don’t use anything else on my face anymore because it is that full coverage enough. HIGHLY RECOMMEND

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product.  It is exactly the correct shade for me.  It covers the redness & is moisturizing.  I have sensitive skin & it never irritates my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: TRASH colour range! Even with the darker shades it's ashy and in no way natural looking. Yes, their foundations do come in a wider shade range however its the spf formula that many south-east Asians, Latinas, and people of colour are looking for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation, such a nice clean feel to the skin and looks so natural for an everyday look. You don't need much unless you want to layer it. However, it does come off rather easily which is why it's better for everyday use. I use Estee Lauder double wear if I have a night out. Would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product. Mom doesn't wear foundation so she prefers this for weddings and social events.
