reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Good coverage, love the strength of the spf. But not a smooth application. Looks very thick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the finish I love how much coverage I love the spf I hate the color range.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I decided to switch from BB creams to CC cream and this product was recommended. The deep was too dark and the Rich Honey which should a shade light was ashy. I have to mix it with a foundation to get a prevent ashy look. I feel disappointed that they don't have any shade that address different undertones. Having a great SPF is amazing however I am disappointed in the shades. Will definitely not be buying again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is not great for dry skin. Really settles in and made me look tired and older and no glow! Good coverage if you need it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely a go to when pressed for time, take it from someone with kiddos, & a husband that can get ready faster than Clark Kent lol. It makes me feel like I’m serving full face, when technically I’m not, light & worth the small investment.

reviews.review_title: Nice for a casual day.. but doesn't last long
reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It is perfect for the daytime, very natural looking but with all the right coverage... the only issue is it does not last long,, maybe 4 hours.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Gets cakey and starts to melt off my face within an hour

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Disappointing and cakey...but better for night time ironically since it’s SPF 50!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite cc cream. I love that it doesn’t make my skin feel super dry, plus has sunscreen and has great coverage! This is my go-to when I need something fast. I also like this one better than the Illuminator version of this same product... that one was a bit too glittery for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good everyday CC cream I go back and forth between foundations but always come back to this! I often give makeup to my mom to try and she replaced her favorite foundation by cover fx for this.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smooth and quite moisturizing. It does not blend well and comes off very easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff! It covers everything but it’s so lightweight and smooth. Paired with setting powder and setting spray, it looks great all day! It’s definitely my new favorite product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product because of the SPF but it just feels greasy, never seems to set and smudges throughout the day. Also it is scented with lemon which is definitely not good for sensitive or irritated skin.

reviews.review_title: Great sunscreen; makes you look washed out though
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall this product has great sunscreen in it. However, if you're not lightskined, then this will wash you out. I got matched at a store, took this on vacation and put it on. It looked too cakey/ overdone and it washed me out. I let my mom, who is a shade lighter than me try it, and it washed her out too. Overall, great sunscreen, but too much coverage and not great for colored people.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This my go to foundation for every day. Super easy to apply, blends like a dream. Has great coverage, never looks cakey. This product lasts all day on me. It makes my dry skin look dewy. In love with this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product as cover up, SPF and moisturizer!!! My skin feels and looks amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing coverage!  Excellent, long lasting foundation. I’ve tried many foundations and this one is the one I will always stay with.

reviews.review_title: I rarely leave reviews, but for this I have to.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is so amazing. This is my first high end foundation and I am certain I made the right choice. It’s so beautiful. It leaves my skin looking luminous and natural. I can’t believe the finish on it. It’s not cakey at all and yet covers my imperfections. It does not highlight my problem areas, instead conceals them.  The coverage is buildable, and it smells like sunscreen. The smell isn’t bad though, in fact I really like it. To me it smells like summer.  I really enjoy this and I’m sure I will rebuy.

reviews.review_title: Hard to find a color match
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the fair / light as I am very pale online, but it was pretty dark for my skin. I was going to exchange it for the only lighter shade, but even that was too dark / yellow for my complexion. Heard many great things about this foundation too and was looking forward to using it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - natural beige shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The neutral medium is darker than I thought it would be. I don’t think it covers as well as it is advertised.  The foundation comes off to easily.

reviews.review_title: great option for coverage and SPF
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage - more like a foundation than a CC cream - but still feels light on your skin. Be really sure of the color you get, tends to run a little oranger than you might expect.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very good coverage, but looks a little dry around my eyes and on my forehead. Not the widest shade range, but I really like using this under concealer to hide blemishes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I think this is a great product. I was trying to save time in the morning with my makeup regimen. The primer, concealer, makeup blend , set  etc.. was crazy long!  This product is really all in one! The color is a great match with my skin tone and provides full coverage ( even over moles and birthmarks) without a concealer. It can be blended with fingers only , but I do use a brush to finish up and then powder to set.  Lasts all day and controls oil. Seems to also provide good sunscreen protection. Overall saves me about ten minutes in the morning and $50 in not needing other products. Yeah!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this CC cream! I typically have dry skin, so having a moisturizer is crucial for me. I find that this product feels light weight, but offers really good coverage. You also don’t need to use a lot of product to achieve good coverage. I also love that it lasts all day, even when sweating. I highly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking to switch from a fuller coverage foundation to a CC cream and the lady at Sephora recommended this product. At first I loved it - a CC cream with really great coverage but soon after I began to HATE it.   #1. It transfers so easily. If you touch your face it transfers to your fingers instantly. I gave a relative a hug the other day and saw it on his sweater - super embarrassing. #2. I am blonde with fair skin and a neutral undertone. In Estee Lauder's double wear I am 1N1 but even the lightest shade of this product is too dark and makes my face look muddy. #3. It does not last throughout the day. I have combination skin and work 8 hour days. I do not like to have to touch up but it is required with this product. The cream would move around in my oily areas and cake around my dry areas. Wouldn't even last me 6 hours - even with a primer underneath.  This product has great coverage for a CC cream, but too many drawbacks for me to buy again. Would not repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smelt good. But super wet and easily transferable. CRACKS AND SETTLES SO MUCH!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I seriously love this stuff!!! I have melasma, so sunscreen is super important, especially living in Florida. I use a setting powder on top of this, then I'm good to go all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product has the most unique smell. If i were to describe it, I'd describe it as if a coconut-lime scented candle had a scoopable texture.  makes my skin look like a second better skin too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One pump goes a long way. And this product is definitely for the ladies that love a light natural look! I especially adore how this product doesn’t cause my skin to break out like regular foundation does. It’s a handy product for when bb cream is not enough yet foundation is too heavy for your skin. No “cakey” look and no glaring pores!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never had sensitive skin in my whole life.  I’ve been able to pretty much wear/try any sort of makeup with zero issues - until I bought this.  After 3 days of applying it, by the 4th day when I started applying it, I got this very weird burning sensation under my eyes and on my cheekbones!  When I got the makeup off, my face was red in those areas!  Took 3 days for it to calm down. Even washing my face during that time was painful!  I have no clue what ingredient is in there to cause that, but I will never buy another IT product again due to it!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing Product!!!! I can’t say enough about this product. It is simply amazing. I was so happy to find the perfect shade for my skin. The other benefits have been icing on the cake. My face never looked or felt better. No more breakouts, no more dryness, and lasts all day. I use s primer with this and a finishing spray. I switched from Laura Mercier because I wasn’t happy with the color. I love this product!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It has such amazing coverage compared to a tinted moisturizer or BB cream and does not budge or fade at all throughout the day! I think it works best for covering up redness/uneven coloration, but not necessarily for texture or acne. I've found that the product can appear a little cakey (like other reviews said) over uneven skin/pimples, especially if you use a brush, but applying it with a damp beauty blender seems to help a lot. I don't own any foundation anymore since I discovered this, and it has become a holy grail for me whenever I need to wear makeup for special events.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE. I have been using this for about 2 years and it's perfect on its own for a low makeup day or as my foundation when I do a full face of makeup. You don't need to put a powder over it if you want the dewy look or you can powder it. I also love the 50 SPF. I take this everywhere with me to reapply if I'm outside all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Goes on like butter and lasts all day. I switched to another foundation once and I came back to this one fast!  I'm a mom and I need a fast go to and this one is it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: coverage was great and looked natural upon application, but the formula got dry over the course of the day.  Even worse, it gave me painful cystic breakouts a few days after I'd wear it.  I tested this by switching on and off with a different foundation I'd been using, and the breakouts stopped when I stopped using this product.  It may work for others, but I wanted my money back so this got returned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best foundation I have ever used. My skin is sensitive combination, with my dry spots being VERY DRY, so most foundation that claim to be great for dry skin, or even claim to moisturize, still end up looking flaky. This truly is the only foundation that looks natural and even. It actually does moisturize my skin as well which is a bonus. Shade range is awesome, because generally I am the lightest colour of any foundation, IF they have light enough, but It Cosmetics actually has even lighter than myself, and I think it's amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried so hard to like this CC cream but it was honestly a dud. Despite its great reviews, it was so cake and made my dry spots look even worse. It was way too thick and did not look good on my skin. The Laura Mercier tinted moisturizer is 10x better than this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! It provides full coverage but doesn't feel too heavy. The bottle isn't too big, but you don't need to use a lot of product. I use about half a pump or less each time I apply. I also have really dry skin year round and this foundation leaves a nice natural finish. I do wish it was a bit more moisturizing, but it doesn't leave my skin feeling cakey while providing lots of coverage, so it's fine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A really good foundation! It has really nice coverage for any breakouts that i might have. It leaves a really natural finish on the skin. I have combo skin and it does get a little shiny towards the end of the day, but is nothing crazy. I love this and defiantly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had such high hopes for this product but it fell short entirely. Not only do they not have a decent tan shade for golden undertones that doesn’t come out looking greenish, but the application is full coverage, matte, and cakey. It felt awful on my skin and like it was clogging my pores throughout the day.  I have dry, sensitive skin, and this did nothing to help that. Was not the least bit moisturizing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: J'adore ! C'est le meilleur fond de teint que j'ai essayé. En plus avec une protection solaire c'est parfait ! Plus besoin de mettre une crème de jour avec protection sur mon fond de teint ! Attention lors du test : la couleur en mettant juste 1 goutte sur votre main et la couleur une fois étendue sur votre visage est différente. Il faut vraiment voir le produit étendu et fondu sur la peau. Demandez un échantillon chez Sephora !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is very thick and high coverage compared to other CC creams. I use a tiny amount and apply it with my hands. Really like the natural finish it gives you

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product does not seem particularly moisturizing, yet made me super oily. It broke up on my skin, settled into lines and oxidized, with or without setting powder.

reviews.review_title: A staple in my daily routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve purchased this product a few times now. I love the amount of coverage, it looks very natural, like “my skin, but better.”  My main skin issue is that I have fairly dry skin, so I love that this product is moisterizing and my skin doesn’t look flaky by the end of the day. I also don’t need to use any setting powder with this, which is nice as powder can often enhances the look of dryness on my skin. Easy to work with, I can sweep some on with my fingers quickly in the morning, or build up a few layers when I need more coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage was just right for me. I typically wear a tinted sunblock, and this provides more coverage than that, without being cakey. I did feel like the undertones in it were a little bit off for me, but I still liked it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is such an amazing CC Cream! The way it applies and wears through the day I am beyond amazed. I have extremely oily skin and it wears for 8 hours without a touch up or getting greasy!  Why I'm giving 3 stars... everytime I wear this product, by the end of the day I have at least 1-2 new breakouts.. I know it is because of the oils in the ingredient list and I am acne prone.. but I'm so devastated over it. I would advise if you're acne prone to many not use this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. I have dry skin so I moisturize my skin well and then I use tiny bit of it. Work perfectly. My skin look so fresh and even.

reviews.review_title: Retinyl Palmitate mixed in with so much stuff
reviews.review_buyer_description: auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Felt dirty on my skin and the range of colours wasn't at all easy to find one that worked. Think it's trying to be too many things in one... Personally I'll stay away from makeup containing Retinyl Palmitate. That level of resurfacing is fine at night, on locations where you specifically want it. All over your face, in the day time though - my skin wasn't at all happy, and made me look more wrinkley (which improved within a day or 2 of use, so not just an age thing).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combo skin that I have to treat like its dry so it doesnt get irritated and overcompensate with oil production. This is certainly not for dry skin. I used 4 different primers, and no matter what it looked patchy on my skin and added years to my appearance. u really wanted to like it because of the antiaging ingredients but it just isn't for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beware if you have sensitive skin or prone to acne. It breaks me out every time I use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color did not match exactly and it make my skin look flaky. I stopped using it because my face did not look clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I get sooooo many compliments when I wear this foundation! Pros: moisturizing, after an hour or two, it really sinks into my skin, dewy look. Con: the only con I have is that I have to be kinda careful on my skin prep. If I moisturize too much or don’t let it sink in too long, the finish isn’t right and can have cakey spots. This can happen with any foundation, though, I just find that it’s more of a risk with this since it’s so moisturizing. I wear this to work every day in a business atmosphere and feel like it looks very nice without overdoing it. I’ve bought more refills of this than any other foundation.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! Light enough feel to wear all day but good coverage and SPF (what a plus) to smooth out complexion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best foundation I’ve ever used! Great coverage, never looks cakey or feels heavy. Love the satin finish. I work 12 hour overnight shifts as a nurse, and this foundation covers up my stress-induced acne and doesn’t budge all night. Have repurchased multiple times now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recommend this product to everyone! If you're looking for a barely there type of look that just evens out your skin tone this is the product for you! It's not cakey but it doesn't build so if you're looking for full coverage you might want to look somewhere else. I am obsessed with this (the shade range is slim tho for darker tones).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very heavy cc cream and too thick. It comes off on my cell phone screen and on someone’s face when I kiss them on the cheek. Very embarrassing that this CC cream always transfers on others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! Totally waterproof, perfect match, so little needed that it's going to last forever!

reviews.review_title: Best foundation with full coverage   SPF 50
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite foundation ever!  it’s good for your skin and protects your skin at the same time . I suffer from hyper pigmentation and I can tell it’s helped block UV rays after , specially after my IPL laser treatments !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been watching tons of reviews of this product in YouTube to figure out if it would be good enough to cover my hormonal cystic acne and I finally tried it and IT IS AMAZING. I mean seriously, this product is a dream and it covers my acne really well. While it isn’t completely full coverage, it covers enough of my problem areas without putting much effort into doing so. I’d say I have combo skin and this is a little more on the dewy side

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this leaves a beautiful glowy finish. Great coverage even with just a thin layer of product! I only need to use one pump, sometimes even less. It lasts throughout the day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good coverage, feels great on (use a brush!). It does give me a slightly dewy feel if I dont use a powder afterwards. I really do like it tho and will repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking full coverage and non drying foundation for everyday, and this foundation do that!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best base I've ever owned.  Takes 10 years off your face!  Love it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this foundation!! This is the perfect coverage all seasons of the year! I have used this with the tint as well, and it’s just perfect for my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is unreal! I use to have really bad acne so I want to hide my scarring. This product is FULL coverage, I only need half a pump for my full face and it covers everything completely. The bonus is that it's SPF 50 and that it's colour correcting so that eventually my scars will fade. All in all if I could give this 10 stars I would!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is definitely what I was looking for. My favorite foundation so far!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fantastic product!! Hides my scars and corrects colouring!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by FAR the best foundation I've ever used. I have combination skin, so finding a foundation that doesn't make my skin over oily and flaky has been a huge struggle for years. I've been using this for about 6 months and I have zero complaints. I'm in love!! Amazing coverage, no flakiness, matches my skin tone perfectly, it doesn't fade or melt into creases and a little goes a long way. I'm so happy to have found this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can't say enough good things about this product. It covers so nicely and evenly. My skin looks flawless. Covers redness well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Mixed feelings on this one. Has good coverage and matches my skin tone quite well, but it seems hit and miss with it's staying power. I originally got a deluxe size which stayed on through work outs and full nights of partying, but with the full size it seems to disappear from my face faster every time I use it. I've also been experiencing more breakouts since I started using it, but it's also gotten colder where I live recently so it could be unrelated to the cc cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation!! Perfect for my “older skin” takes the redness away and gives me a smooth complexion!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best products ever. It is so hydrating, and I love the coverage. I wear this every day for work, and it's a lovely, light cream that gives great coverage!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lightweight but long lasting. Full coverage. Doesn't feel oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's great! It doesn't collect on my dry spots. It covers very nicely! Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used BB cream and foundation in the past. but wanted to try this out due to a lot of rave reviews I've seen on Sephora and other places.   I'm so glad I did! This is my go-to and I don't even bother using foundation. I love that this has a high SPF and still provides coverage that doesn't seem heavy. I highly recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this CC cream for a few weeks and feel like I'm ready to review it. I do like the amount of coverage that this CC cream provides. I had previously used the Laura Mercier Oil-Free Tinted Moisturizer, so this was a step up for me in terms of coverage. I have faced two issues with this cream, however 0- first, I can't seem to find the right shade for my skin tone. The Light is the closest I could get, but it's too yellow for me. Second, this cream is too dry/drying for me. I use a primer (Tatcha The Silk Canvas) and I moisturize often and heavily, but this CC cream makes me look dryer than I do without any makeup or with any other face makeup. Not a fan. Perhaps this works for people with oilier skin or people with different skin tones than mine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought my third tube yesterday. After i put it on, i immediatly realized the formula has changed. It is cakery, cling to my dry patch, look unatural. Bring the old formula back, this one is going back to sephora.

reviews.review_title: I love it but not a long wear foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the fact that the product is good for your skin and easy to apply and completely covers any imperfections instantly the only down fall about it is that it doesen’t last all day and not transfer proof.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Nice coverage but it’s a weird, flakey mess on my skin. I exfoliate before applying this and it still looks weird. It looks almost as if my face has mold on it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing! It does the work of multiple products in one and it does it well. For being a full coverage product, it is not heavy or cakey. It goes on well and it truly lasts all day. I am so in love with this product and I am beyond happy I started using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had heard a lot of good things about IT Cosmetics so I I was eager to try their CC Cream. It went on well but I’m a few hours it had taken on an orange tinge. I was greatly disappointed. By the end of my work day it was noticeably orange. I do not recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My everyday go to product, works just as great as foundation because it provides full coverage. Feels great on the skin, lightweight and easy to apply, the only reason I’m giving it 4 starts, is it tends to make my T zone a bit oily after a couple of hours, other than that, if you’re looking for something you can use everyday, it’s this !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love, love, love this foundation! I've been using it for three years now. I have tried others but keep coming back to this one. It's easy, low-maintenance, and when applied correctly provides great coverage and looks natural. Tip: I get much better coverage and my foundation lasts longer when I use it with my primer (HOURGLASS Veil Mineral). Together they do a great job of covering imperfections without looking cakey.

reviews.review_title: Not good for someone like lightweight bb cream
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very easy to get off, feel thick on the face. More like foundation than cc cream

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this everyday, it’s great for a minimal layer or to build on. First purchased a trial size for a trip to Mexico - the SPF works wonders and stays on throughout the day. I know...because the rest of me was burnt but my face was just fine haha. Great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin and larger pores, so I have a tough time finding a foundation that helps keep oil at bay and doesn’t settle into my pores. This foundation certainly fits the bill. I am matte most of the day (~8 hours with minimal blotting) and it doesn’t settle in to my pores. On that end, this is a brilliant product. However, the color range is abysmal. I typically wear a fair/cool foundation. This product pulls extremely orange/dark and it’s especially obvious on my jawline no matter how intensely I blend or how little product I use. It’s a shame because the coverage is so great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It is probably the best CC with SPF I have found in terms of not feeling heavy or oily. However I used the foundation matching tool online that sephora offers (based on your colour in another brand) and it totally gave me the wrong shade. I don't live anywhere near a sephora so its hard for me to go in for a colour match. I ordered fair/light hoping that it would be ok because the description sounded just like my complexion (pale/fair, cool tones/pink tones) and this was VERY yellow on me. I applied it twice in different lighting/settings just to be sure it wasn't the lighting the first time I tried it. I wanted to love this.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have severe rosacea and this has some awesome coverage. It doesn't stick to my dry spots. It can be a little hard to get it even but I find dabbing a beauty blender over it settles it in.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: By far my FAVOURITE face product. I always get so many compliments when I use this. For a CC cream it still has pretty good coverage. It covers in a natural way and leaves you skin looking healthy. I’ve repurchase this 3 times and it lasts pretty long as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Have to really moisturize and use a good hydrating primer first. Good coverage. Like the light feel of it versus a full coverage foundation. I now reach for this over my usual foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is perfect. Literally the best i have ever tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i got this in my IPSY deluxe bag & its the best liquid foundation ever. it goes on so smooth & has amaizng coverage. most days i dont even need concealer because of how good it is & the color is perfect. a little goes a long way & last all day (even in the phx summer heat).

reviews.review_title: Blends Well on Asian Tan Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's my first bottle. I love, love it so much. This CC cream does what it claims. It provides full coverage without giving cakey effect on my skin. My skin tends to be oily in midst of the day, but this product stays on. What I like the most is it blends well on my asian tan skin and have natural finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly I find the colours to be quite pigmented so I couldn’t find a shade that meshed well with my skin. It’s perfect for wearing to the beach or on an outdoorsy day. It also transfers easily onto clothes which I really didn’t like. It is my go to for vacations because it’s so light and protective but not for every day life.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this CC cream, it’s an absolute game changer!!!  I’ve been using it for a little over a year now, I’ve converted several of my friends to it.  I truly don’t understand how ppl can say it’s cakey.  I’m a flight attendant and my skin is super dry, which is why I love this cream, it’s hydrating.  Now, I always apply a moisturizer beforehand, which everyone should do regardless.  But that’s the only reason I could think why people would say it’s cakey?  Anyway, absolutely would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Please improve your packaging It Cosmetics - I don’t need a bunch of sparkly paint pieces all over my makeup bag and hands

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely obsessed!!!! Never buying foundation again. I have extremely acne prone skin and I’ve been using the Odinary products with this CC cream whenever I want to look a little more together and it’s doing wonders!!!! I say it lasts about 6-8 hours before reapplication

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I can’t praise this product enough!  A little goes a long way to cover and protect my skin. I have gotten so many compliments on my skins healthy look. People don’t believe I am wearing any coverage.  I am forever user. Can’t live without. Buy with confidence.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to love this foundation (lightweight, easy to blend, made my face hydrated, glowy and healthy/glorious). I bought an new bottle since my other one was 1 year   old and it made my face hideous (patchy, dry, unevenly covered). The fair foundation color even changed (darker and more pink). Also, the formula thickened and is more sticky. I'm so disappointed and in grief. :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Je recommande vivement ce fond de teint. Très bonne couvrance.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's a good foundation type of product for people who don't love foundation. It looks really skin-like and beautiful. Under different circumstances I would've liked it, but A. My skin is too sensitive and it did cause a little bit of burning, maybe because of the lemon scent. And B. The lightest shade is still too dark for my pale skin so it just looked a little orange compared to my neck and chest. I would definitely try a sample before buying.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall the product is good. I love the coverage and how it keeps my skin moisturized all day long. It also covers my light acne well. The only concern I have, whether it’s going to break me out or not. Will see...

reviews.review_title: Its a full coverage foundation Whit sunscreen
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all you must know what this product does and how it is used.  IT IS NOT A SUNSCREEAM ONLY and IT IS NOT A CC CREAM NOTMAL, IT IS A FOUNDATION with full coverage.  The product description is not very clear and that is why there is so much confusion.  If you only want a sunscreen or a natural look this is not the product for you but if you want a day makeup, cover imperfections and at the same time be protected from the sun definitely this is for you!  It is a product that is seen to be there, and another important point is the color, I check it online with the shade finder and it is a little clearer than the shade I normally use in other foundation (compare it with Mac) So  I suggest you buy it in a physical store to give the correct shade or choose a darker shade, it is not a big problem but it is not the shade exactly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Too my surprise I really love this foundation! It gives a nice full coverage without looking so dry and cakey. Enjoy the fact it’s not so matte and looks more natural vs most full coverage foundations. Btw a lil goes a long way!!!

reviews.review_title: Wanted to like but it fell short
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using another CC cream in the past (which I loved but it was discontinued) I thought this would be great. Wrong! It went on pretty smooth but I have to use a good bit to cover my redness and other trouble spots. I left the house thinking it looked pretty good. However within an hour I could already tell were the makeup was breaking down. My face was looking cakey and the makeup was starting to separate in places. Also my face got so shiney that nothing was making it better. The best part was taking it off at the end of the day. I kept trying to give it a chance but after a week I was fed up.

reviews.review_title: Apply with fingers for best results!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is wonderful.  At first I couldn't see what all the fuss was about because I had been applying it with brush.  In comparison to my Fenty foundation I didn't really see any amazing difference.  BUT once I applied with my fingers and worked it into clean freshly exfoliated skin the result was beautiful.  With any face product you need to make sure you canvas is prepped and clean - so if you find it's not looking quite as smooth as you want I would suggest using your favourite scrub or peel and then moisturize WELL.  This product really does look like my skin but better.  It can be as full coverage as you want it - but I like to apply just a little to even out my pigmentation.  Highly reccommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this foundation for almost 4 years. Recently I wanted to switch up my foundation because I was tired of the easy transfer/ smudging of this foundation and couldn’t find anything to replace it! I have dry acne prone skin and nothing makes my skin look better than this. So little is needed because it’s full coverage. Lasts a long time too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to try it because of the good reviews, However it made my skin dry for some reason, and I don't like the feel of it on my skin... I wish I'd stick to my go to tinted moisturizer from Shiseido (it feels good and moisturize my skin well!) I won't buy this product again..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for daily use....  I have ordered my third recently and I am happy with a natural look and hydrating effect of this cream

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a make-up newbie. So I was very hesitant to start using foundation or BB or CC. After looking at the products, reviews, and shades, I finally decided to try my luck with this one and I am so glad that I did. I wanted something very lightweight on my face and light but strong enough coverage to cover my easily blushing face and blemishes. And let me tell you that this product satisfied every single expectation and wish. It is super light and it gives such an amazingly natural look. If these are the things you want out of a product like this, go for it. You would not be disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this - natural dewy finish, medium coverage. Works well on my dry/combo skin. Needs occasional touch-up to make it through the day (concealer/powder).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have rosacea, and this has just enough coverage to look and feel natural, neutralizing the red without being cakey or heavy. It has a dewy finish, and I have received compliments on how nice my skin looks when I wear it (which is a big deal for redness sufferers!) Love that it is my SPF and color coverage all in one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Silver glitter face mystery finally solved !!  To be fair, I love the coverage, hydration, and texture of this CC cream.  HOWEVER, over the last month, I have been noticing flecks of silver scattered all over my face.  I’ve washed sponges, brushes, etc but problem remained so I tossed these items and purchased new.  Unfortunately, my perpetual state of rush to put on makeup and get dressed leaves little time for small observations.  Also, I do not use IT CC cream every day so I didn’t notice an obvious pattern here that it was the paint on the outside of the CC cream tube that has been rubbing off and getting all over everything.  This is crazy.  The paint flecks are tenacious when applied with makeup so they’re on until total total makeup removal and face wash occurs.  Very sad packaging problem for IT Cosmetics to have since this is a great product.  However, I’m done being embarrassed with friends starring at silver paint all over my face.  I’ll get over it but I sure hope IT Cosmetics is embarrassed enough to remedy this pathetic packaging ASAP.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the BEST ever!! I use a few small dabs and blend it with the IT brush and it’s perfect. You can go more full coverage but it’s blendable and really gives a nice flawless finish. I can’t imagine using any other foundation. I’m 44 and it doesn’t settle in creases or anything

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best everyday foundation I've ever used.  Gives good coverage with a natural finish.  Hydrating without being too greasy.  Love!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I used to love this stuff but then I switched to Laura Mercier and came back to this and realized it makes my face look so fake and cakey. By the end of the day it settles into my creases and feels heavy. Can’t believe I didn’t notice before.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really wanted to like this! Bought after speaking with an associate in store. Went on really nice and looked great at first! Don't like the smell much but whatever. Halfway thru the day my face is SO dry and it is so noticeable!!! It's aged me, accentuated ALL of my wrinkles and fine lines, and bits of it are flaking off!! Really don't know how this could be 'best for dry skin' as the sales associate said.... I will definitely be returning this!!

reviews.review_title: Great coverage but emphasizes dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a full coverage product to wear in the summer and was happy to find this. The only downside was that it emphasized dry patches so I have to make sure my face is super hydrated before using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Okay listen, I have been a die hard Estée Lauder double wear foundation girl for YEARS now... I have insanely oily skin (I’m talking oily within 30 mins of applying makeup) and I’m super prone to breakouts AND I have rosacea -_- I recently started incorporating a strong retinoid from my doctor (tretinoin .5%) which is making my skin have dry patches along with somehow still being oily so my trusty Estée Lauder has sadly been failing me, it clings to dry patches and just overall looks awful now... I desperately searched for something to take its place. I was drawn to this product because of all the anti aging goodies but was nervous because it’s only a CC cream and I got some nasty acne scars and pores that need to be covered. I picked up the mini size of this with low expectations and y’all....... the coverage on this is INSANE! It goes out smooth as silk, covers all imperfections and redness AND HAS SPF?!!! Am I dreaming??????? The only semi-con would be this is a littttttttle too dewy for me so I’m gonna order the oil free matte one and hope it takes care of that. BUT honestly I think this is better than the double wear..... it makes my skin look airbrushed and tbh my skin is trash so I know it’s the product putting in work. I’m just beyond happy with this product. I can’t believe it took me this long to try it. I ain’t sponsored nor did I get this product for free. I bought this with my own money and I ain’t lookin back... Estée Lauder who?! Can’t wait to try more IT Cosmetics products :)

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised with this product. A very small amount provides the perfect amount of (medium coverage) that you build up or down as needed. I also love that it stays on all day. The spf is also nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've gone through 3 tubes of this product. It's not heavy and it's pretty moisturizing. This shade is darker than my skin tone in the winter and closer in the summer so I mix it with my lighter Giorgio Armani foundation and create the perfect shade. I always put spf on separately but the 50  spf on this makes me feel like I'm being extra protected from the sun.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect option for those people who want to use SPF AND makeup. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the creamy texture.   It fella light yet has great coverage that is not cakey.   I like that it also has SPF.   It is a great everyday base for makeup.   Also wonderful for older skin as it is moisturizing without being too oily.  And doesn’t creasy into lines.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A must have beauty product! It’s easy to apply, great texture, just enough coverage, gives a natural glow and smells lovely.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Its full coverage, it wearing all day, i love it, i recomended it

reviews.review_title: 1 year of using It Cosmetics CC  cream
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is a versatile product, the coverage is impressive and doesn't look cakey at all. I love the fact this product got SPF in it, I've been using it for 1 year now (third tube on its way) and haven't developed any redness or pimples, although my skin is sensitive to other types of foundation. I wouldn't say it is moisturizing like the product claims, but it definitely doesn't dry out the skin. It stays in place throughout the day, but if you have an oily t-zone -just like me- you might need an extra powder to do touch ups during your day.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect coverage no matter what age you are! I’m 44 with the typical mid 40s issues. I use a drop on each quandrant and blend with the it brush and it gives me a smoother complexion. The best foundation I have ever used and I have bought much more expensive spray foundations. Buy it, you’ll love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for something new way back after YSL changed the formula of Touche Eclat and killed my Holy Grail. I tried it alone. I tried it with Porefessional. I tried setting it with Laura Mercier setting powder. I tried setting it with Fix  AND All Nighter. NOTHING keeps this stuff from breaking up and sliding down my face like a freaking mudslide. I wanted to like this because of the built-in SPF and skincare ingredients, but it just doesn't perform for crap. I have combo skin, and it breaks up on my oily areas, clings to my dry patches, and settles in lines I never knew I had. 4 hours after applying it, I'd look in the mirror, and to my complete terror, I looked like some creature out of a horror movie. If you only need something to perform for like 2 or 3 hours, and your skin is already completely flawless, then it'll probably work great for you. If you are, however, a normal person with any type of expectations when it comes to an almost 50 dollar face product, don't waste your time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product colour and feel are very good but I don’t find the coverage to be adequate. I’m quite disappointed actually and wish I would have stuck with my previous brand. I totally wasted over $50.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for an alternative to foundation that could even out my rosacea while providing sun protection and this was recommended to me. I absolutely LOVE this product. Brought it with me when I recently went to Australia and it performed really well.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am really torn about the way I feel about this product. I bought this to try and achieve a more natural looking finish, which I think might've been a success? It applies really easily and provides decent, buildable coverage without looking cakey. On the flip side, this photographs extremely poorly. My skin looks matte in real life, but will look oil-slick in pictures. It sometimes makes me look like I'm wearing a mask. Although this looks great at the time of application, it tends to flake off around dry patches on my skin and accentuates the dryness of these problem areas. Kind of unrelated, but I love the way this smells (however, it contains essential oils which can be problematic for people with sensitive skin). Glad I tried this, not sure if I'll be purchasing again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Though I really love this product in summer time because I dont mind it getting a little darker, this does oxidize and it’s not cute during winter months. It’s really hydrating though and I really like the finish of it. I’m usually NC 25 in shade and I think medium is way to dark for me and when it oxidize it I look NC 35. I wish it has wider shade range

reviews.review_title: Great look, but doesn’t last long enough
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how my skin looks with this product on. It minimizes my pore, and gives a natural glow to my skin. However, it’s not long lasting and just disappears after 5 hours wearing. I mean, if u wanna wear this to work, it’s not gonna last until 5pm. I still recommend it if it’s not for full day wearing, and the SPF is pretty good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this foundation  Does not leave a chalky look when applied.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favourite foundation so far! It feels so light and I love the smell. Coverage is buildable and I love how it just makes my skin look glowy and healthy. I blot myself during the day because I'm oily, but this is the perfect product to slap on when you don't want to do TOO much but you still want to look like you did something.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I despise this product. After hearing amazing things about it both my mom and I went to purchase. BUT its the actual worst. It slides around my face all day, if I touch my face at all or anything touches it, it transfers to my hand or clothes. At the same time, I have to use two makeup wipes to get it off at night, its SO hard to completely remove. I also have immediate cake face when I use it and the finish is awful. My mom returned hers, but I waited too long and couldn't. I wouldn't recommend this to anyone.

reviews.review_title: Good product, but not for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am pretty low maintenance when it comes to makeup and I like something SUPER lightweight and sheer. This was a little too heavy for me. I gave it to my sister and she loves it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation!!  It covers all of my flaws and the color is perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product. The coverage is medium and can be build up to full. Very light on the skin and gives natural glowing skin look. Love it love it love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m 49 and I love this product.  It is the perfect coverage and wears well throughout the day. My only complaint is the packaging that is why I deducted a star.  The pump is great until it’s half done.  I know there is still lots left but it’s hard to come out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! It covers as much or as little as needed. I mix it with a bit of lotion as I like lighter coverage. It stays on well and washes off easily. But most of all it covers my redness!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Looks better on TV. Little disappointed with the coverage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have previously owned this in both Fair and Light, and always mixed the two (I wear Light on its own or mixed with liquid bronzer in the summer, and never get quite pale enough for the Fair on its own).  I bought Fair Light, thinking it would be the perfect match, and the colour is great, but the formula is completely different than the ones I was using just days before.  It's bordering on full coverage, and it clings to any dry patches that I have in a terrible way.  By the end of the day, my skin looks like a desert.  If I use my old mixture, it gives me a lovely medium coverage with a natural finish and wears comfortably throughout the day, so I know that it has nothing to do with my skin or the weather.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s perfect for dry skin. Very good coverage that lasts longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is great for sensitive skin! My skin reacts badly to a lot of products (especially foundations) but not this one. I don’t wear a lot of makeup for work, but I apply this every morning and it not only evens my skin tone, it also keeps the moisture in my skin, especially in winter. I also love that it has SPF, so I don’t have to worry about that in summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a foundation junkie, but I keep coming back to this. I’m so glad that they extended the shade range because the light always dried a bit dark for me. I love that it’s hydrating, applies smoothly and lasts all day. The coverage is good! I’d say medium and build able if you need more. Definitely looks best with a primer but not necessary. If I’m in a hurry, this and some mascara are all I need.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! It is an excellent color match.  I like the creaminess, too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Bonne couverture pour une CC crème, facile à estomper

reviews.review_title: If you can’t find a foundation you like, try this.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My go to... foundations are so hard to review since everyone’s skin is so different. This is a medium coverage that goes on beautifully with a damp* beauty blender. The tube will last a long time if you are applying It as such. I have oily skin but a lot of other foundations seem to look cakey. This is a very nice smooth application and stays put with some setting powder.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best foundation I have ever used.  Evens out my reddish skin tone and stays put all day without looking/feeling heavy.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It seemed like a good product at first, and it was, but the day after wearing it, I had a serious breakout. Not my finest buy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really hoped I love this product like most people, but I just don’t like it. I apply and just feel thick. . It enhances my wrinkles. I’m just not enjoying it. I’ve even washed my face right after to take it off. My sister in law loves it and only uses this and it looks so good on her, but it’s not for me

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Works great for me, even as foundation, and the color is spot on. I love this product, especially because it has a high spf but it doesn’t feel as weird as other spf products on my skin. I will definitely be purchasing it again.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Right color. A little expensive but worth the price

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have white spots on my face because of Vitiligo, this product gives me great coverage

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color matches perfectly. But even the one for oily skin leaves the skin super oily. I will give a try during the winter season since the skin tends to be more dry during those months. Believe that for dry skin should fit perfectly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A friend gave me her sample to take with me on vacation. I got home and immediately ordered the full size! I used this in place of my morning moisturizer. It goes on so smoothly (I use a brush to blend) and stays put ALL day and night. Be careful to blend fully so that it doesn't transfer to clothes. Great coverage, feels light, and does triple duty as a foundation, moisturizer, and sunscreen. I wear it every day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: J'adore ! Protection solaire élevée et camoufle bien comme un fond de teint !

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Giving 2 stars instead of one just because the shade is perfect for my skin tone, but everything else about it is awful. Super oily and never settles into skin or dries. I use a little amount and still have to dab my face with a towel after just so my face isn't super shiny and sticky. I decided to buy this after receiving a sample in the mail and loving it, but when I purchased the full size it was like I got a completely different product. Very disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this CC cream!  I use it as a foundation and it works beautifully.  My skin is very sensitive and I usually can't use products that have SPF in it, however, this doesn't bother my face at all.  It goes on easily, doesn't look cakey, and has a pleasant citrus smell.  The only thing I don't like is I can't find information online about the undertones in each shade, so it's difficult for me to buy a new shade online.  I just had to buy one for my lighter fall/winter skin, and I just guessed at the shade - hopefully I chose the right one. I really can't say enough about this product though - so glad I purchased it a couple years ago!

reviews.review_title: Good for combo/ dry, reactive acne prone skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good for sensitive acne prone skin in the winter. I’ve tried many skin products and this one worked wonders for me to the point I felt I should write a review. My skin is oily in the summer but gets dry in the winter when I use retin a. This is hydrating , doesn’t break me out, covers my old acne scars and I believe is actually helping to fade them somewhat. The physical sunblock is a must for anyone who breaks out easily. I like the high SPF. I have yet to workout in it so I don’t know the staying power there but I have not issues with it not staying on during a regular day of sitting in the office and going about errands. Color selection could be better, I mix deep with rich honey for my optimal color.

reviews.review_title: Good for combo/ dry, reactive acne prone skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good for sensitive acne prone skin in the winter. I’ve tried many skin products and this one worked wonders for me to the point I felt I should write a review. My skin is oily in the summer but gets dry in the winter when I use retin a. This is hydrating , doesn’t break me out, covers my old acne scars and I believe is actually helping to fade them somewhat. The physical sunblock is a must for anyone who breaks out easily. I like the high SPF. I have yet to workout in it so I don’t know the staying power there but I have not issues with it not staying on during a regular day of sitting in the office and going about errands. Color selection could be better, I mix deep with rich honey for my optimal color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So what can I say a friend said hey try IT Cosm. CC cream I was scared at first. But let me say I was surprised with this product will recommend for age 40 up using a small amount natural look.

reviews.review_title: Better than Clinque CC cream for long wear!
reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This works so well covering my hyper pigmentation. Evens the skin tone while providing a glow. I set it with Laura Mercier translucent powder and Urban Decay setting mist for long days. Does not settle in lines and pores, looks like your not wearing anything. Smells like tea tree oil but it's not over baring. Colour match is spot on!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was all for buying this product until I read the ingredients and the second ingredient is snail secretion filtrate. I read how the secretion is extracted and I’m disgusted and horrified. 2019 and companies SHOULD know better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Do not wear this if you are oily. It looks awful on oily skin and only makes you look like you’re sweating. Would not wear again or recommend to anyone with oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you’re a low-medium coverage person, this is for you. I’m obsessed. I hate how so many light/medium coverage foundations tend to cake up and appear heavier than I expect but this feels more like skincare than makeup. I love the inclusion of skincare ingredients and the SPF! This goes on beautifully and blends beautifully. I am disappointed however in Itcosmetics for their lack of shade range. Unacceptable. Broaden it to include everyone!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My go-to foundation! I apply this with an It foundation brush with great results. It’s easy to apply and blends well into my skin tone, evening out redness and provides great coverage as well. I like to think my skin is getting benefits wearing this with the SPF daily. In the winter, I typically need a moisturizer under this, to be expected. This is one of the few foundations which I have actually stuck with for more than one tube - I’m on my third now! A little goes a long way with the coverage - I only use one pump per application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This CC cream has been the most consistent thing in my life over the past 2 years. This slides perfectly on, doesn't pill, doesn't leave a greasy finish or dry me out. This is seriously my holy grail makeup product and I don't know how I'd leave my house every day without putting it on!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this after receiving a sample and have bought two full size tubes since then. It covers well without the mask or heavy look. I apply it with a beauty blender which keeps it light. I’ve also applied it with a brush or even with my hands in a pinch. I noticed it can go on much thicker with a brush so if you like a lighter application I’d say go with the beauty blender.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Disappointed. I expected more from an allure winner. This is very cakey, WAY too full coverage and heavy to be a CC cream. It’s also not moisturizing at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried a wide range and never given up on finding the one for me but this is it. Shade matches perfectly, stays all day, spf goals, perfect natural coverage. Absolute must have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I went in to repurchase Supergoop's cc cream and was talked into this instead. It somehow makes me oily and cakes at the same time. I have very easy skin and most products work well on me. I'd return it, but don't want to deal with the hassle.

reviews.review_title: No idea what people are raving about
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Heard all the hype, read all the reviews, threw my money at it. The instant i put it on i hated it. The coverage is waaaay more than medium, its hard to blend, super cakey for how oddly thin it was, pilled and did weird textural thing after a few hours, and the SCENT just never dissapated. Even though I hated it, i tried it a few more times over the course of 6-7 months. Once when my skin wasnt overly dry, again with just minimal skin prep, when i had no breakouts, and then with ultra moisturization. Spoiler, it was still the worst thing I have ever used. Just use an oil free SPF under your foundation (that has no spf) and you wont have any of those weird pilling, flaking issues.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: got this as a sample size, too pigmented, sticky and made me break out, and the smell is AWFUL.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is not the color fair. This is too dark to be fair. If you have pale skin this product doesn’t cater to you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have really mixed feelings about this. On the one hand it's great to slap on for days I'm feeling lazy and am not really going to be up to much. But it doesn't work for me as a standalone foundation as others suggest, because the coverage is just not there for me (I tried different shades but found it to be a consistent problem). I would have to use a really large amount to get decent coverage. I've tried it as a sunscreen below my makeup as well, and it seems to do an okay job at that. I find it feels kind of lightly tingly on my skin though when I go out in the sun while wearing this. I'm on the fence as to whether I'll be re-buying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was in the market for a foundation with SPF, and this was suggested by a clerk. She applied this to half of my face, and my jaw DROPPED! No more redness, no imperfections whatsoever. My naturally pink cheeks were gone.  I've tried MANY other foundations, but I have no need to try another. I'm absolutely sold on this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This gave my skin a burning sensation and I couldn't get over the faint smell of vomit. Maybe I got a bad sample? The coverage is nice but it makes my skin look oily.

reviews.review_title: The best foundation I ever tried!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE it!  Pros: Not cakey, stay all day (but it tends to shine a little on the T zone when I wear it for 10+ hours, I have greasy skin so it's a miracle!). Super soft for my sensitive skin. It takes a little to cover all my redness and it does not smudge in the pores. I suggest you apply it with a sponge (like a beauty blender) because the texture is a little sticky (probably because of the sunscreen formula) so to avoid patches and to assure a smooth finish, it's better with a sponge.  Cons: The cost :'( BUT, it really takes a little quantity to cover the face so it lasts a long time! You pay for the quality! And also, I have a very fair skin, and even the lightest shade is a little to dark/orange for me! But I apply it on the neck too to assure a soft  transition.   Also, it didn't give me pimples so it's a nice thing! :')

reviews.review_title: Great coverage but feels like I have nothing on my
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love, love, love this foundation!  I didnt start wearing foundation until my late 40’s.  I always found it to heavy and oily and felt like it caused breakouts.  This foundation feels like I’m not wearing anything.  I barely need to use any and it gives a great even skin tone.  I actually feel like it has improved the condition of my skin.  Love it!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very good coverage for a cc cream. Also love the high spf. Took a few tries to get the correct color. Also will go with the matte version in the summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This CC Cream provides medium to full coverage because it's so buildable.
