Its not only great at covering dark spots it provides an SPF 50 to help protect the skin from damage and dark spots! I highly recommend this to everyone and I think it works for all skin tones. It's not only a color correcting cream it's got anti aging skin care properties in it making it suitable for all ages. It also really hydrated my skin which is not to say that it won't work on oily skin. It improves my skins texture and leaves it feeling and looking flawless with an overall brighter and more radiant skin tone. I highly recommend this because it is so easy to use and to blend onto skin with its pump dispenser. I use either my fingers or a special CC Cream sponge I purchased at Sephora which works wonders at applying and blending the product. I can usually skip my Concealer because it has such great coverage. So don't hesitate and know that it's worth every penny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. It is the best foundation I have ever had. Great coverage plus sunscreen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loving this foundation. Applies nicely by sponge or fingertips and melts nicely into skin with a light powder to set and a double mist of setting spray. Some separation at my laugh lines but wears great otherwise and is easy to touch up!

reviews.review_title: Use as a low maintenance concealer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing as an under eye concealer and for blemishes. For my under eyes, I tap it on with my ring finger and blend blend blend. For blemishes, I use the build up of product around the cap/nozzle since it's more concentrated. I  dot it onto the blemish. Wait a few seconds to let it set, then very lightly blend the edges out. It leaves a luminous finish and you can apply it it a rush with a flawless finish. Love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: The coverage on this product is really lovely and it is feels light on the skin. Due to the sunscreen it does have a thicker consistency which is difficult to remove from foundation brushes, so whenever I wear this, I have to use an alcohol brush cleaning solution to clean it. Oddly, I also find that this product appears to disintegrate the material of a beauty blender, as tears and cracks in the blender always happen whenever I have used this product a few times in a row.

reviews.review_title: Amazing product but shades run dark!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how the product feels like skin, it truly feels like you have nothing on and it doesn't look like you have anything on either but in a good way. The only complaint I have is that the colour range runs soooo dark! I got light but its still too dark, I have read it in the comments that you should get a shade lighter than you expect and I did.  If you arent buying online get some samples from Sephora and really test it out before buying since you will be surprised to the shade that actually works for you. But its a great product and I love all the good stuff in it plus the sunscreen (its physical sunscreen not chemical so its not going to give you that sunscreen smell nor will it be bad for your skin or your body) My number 1 thing is to make sure my foundation acts like good clean skincare and I do love that this does that!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Looked blotchy on my skin.  Did not blend easily, and felt sticky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Horrible for acne prone skin with large pores... made breakouts worse and accentuated large pores after an hour. Also the fair colour is still orange tinged.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: hands down the BEST foundation out there! love love love full coverage easy application just so perfect for my skin

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful coverage and finish, but I do find it begins to wear off after only 3-4 hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, it gives you natural look, no need to wear heavy makeup, it contains SPF, I always gets compliments for my good skin. I already used three of these tubes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love love this product! Awesome coverage and quick to apply. I have dry skin but I feel it makes me look really oily sometimes. Will try the matte finish to see if it works better!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this a couple months ago because I love tinted moisturizers but hate how foundations make my skin look. The Sephora employee who put it on my in store made it look wonderful, however when I got home and tried it, it looked awful. I’ve been trying for months but i just find that it accentuates my dryness and looks cakey, even when applying like less than half a pump with a sponge. I’m giving it three stars only because I still have hope and am still trying to make it work. The only way I’ve found that it looks decent is when I apply about a drop or so of my DE Marula Oil to my skin before applying (after applying all of my skincare). I was color matched in the store as well and found it to be a little light for my skin in sumner but better now moving into winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely beautiful coverage. Looks super smooth, & dewy. My only issue is the color choice. I got the shade fair. The color shown in the photo, & the swatch photo look nothing like the actual shade. I use Maybeline Fit Me in porcelain. The shade finder matched me to fair. The color of this product is NOT fair. I would call it light, then it also oxidizes some. I love the formula too much to return it, but very disappointing that I can only strategically wear this foundation or else I’ll look orange.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells wonderful and has the perfect amount of coverage. Makes my skin look wonderful and smooth without looking like I have makeup on. And it smells wonderful.

I fell in love with this product since it is everything I could hope for in a foundation.  I absolutely hate the packaging.  It uses too much plastic to make it seem there is a lot in that tube. I'm sure the amount is what is listed; but, the package could support almost twice as much.  Do Not toss this when it stops pumping out, cut it open and use a flexible spatula!  I'm on my 15th day of application after having to cut open the tube because it wouldn't pump out.  Thank goodness my time of believing a product is empty because it won't squeeze out is over.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked that it covers imperfections and is super pigmented, but it sits very thick and feels like I’m wearing a clown mask. It rubs off easily, even with primer and setting powder. It also creases terribly. I would even get creases in the foundation on the sides of my cheeks from smiling. I ended up throwing the rest of the tube away after giving it a chance for a month or so. I would have given it fewer stars than three if it weren’t for it doing a decent job at color correcting. Don’t buy if you’re wanting something that feels or looks natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the texture of the product and how long it stays on my face. However, like all BB and CC creams, the lightest shade is not light enough!! I have such fair skin and this is not light enough for me to wear. I got it as a sample so thankfully I did not spend money on it, but it it came in a light enough shade I would definitely purchase. For reference, I wear the shade 100N in Anastasia Beverly Hills Luminous Foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tried this out when I found out the shade was an exact match via Sephora's shade matcher. It's nice -- a little goes a long way and it feels nice on the skin -- but I am knocking off a star since I have a hard time blending it evenly. Blender sponge, brush, fingers... looks good in the mirror, but when I go out into the sun it's a bit patchy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first, I was nervous when I bought this product because I was worried it would not have the full coverage a normal foundation would. I was totally wrong! The cream is light and airy on the skin, but still provides full coverage at the same time. It is also great for covering up acne

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I tried to find the right shade, medium was too dark and light medium was too light. Sits super heavy on the skin, would not recommend for sensitive skin prone to breaking out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Favorite full coverage product!!! Flawless amazing skin. Perfect for my dry skin in winter and I use the darker shade in summer using setting powder but it still keeps a nice glowy skin

reviews.review_title: Liked it, but had to discontinue, not oil free
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this CC Cream as it give a nice dewy finish and gave me and also even skin tone.  The SPF 50  is also an added bonus. The only reason for 3 stars is this is not oil free.  I used it too close to my eyelash line and developed a milia seed. I had to discontinue for fear or more showing up.  I think if you don't use it too close to your lids and also make sure you take if off well at the end of the day, you will probably not have a problem with acne or milia.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Got it as a sample and loved it, so I bought it. It looks natural but still gives coverage, and has spf. The only thing that bothers me a little is that it transfers easy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So originally I absolutely hated this product because I bought this in the wrong shade and applied a full pump with a beauty blender. The shades are darker than they are described I am in the shade fair when I originally bought fair light. Now I apply half a pump onto the back of my hand and dab small amounts all over my face with my fingers and really work it into the skin with a foundation brush. This product is the best CC cream it covers all of the redness in my face, doesn’t cling to dry spots, and is very blurring and dewy. I use this as my everyday foundation with NARS creamy concealer in problem areas along with glossier cloud paint and Charlotte Tilbury Hollywood flawless filter in the lightest shade and people literally compliment my skin every day. My skin type is combo with extremely dry patches and redness all over. I by no means have glass skin but this is my key to creating glass skin! Absolutely try this out!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been VERY happy with this product.  I switched over from Urban Decay and this has worked much better for me.  I use it with my philosophy moisturizer, smashbox primer, and Laura Mercier setting powder.  Honestly, I just apply it with my fingertips and use a makeup sponge to smooth, then use my NARS concealer as needed.  I’ve noticed that my skin is a lot healthier with this foundation. I work long hours as a bartender and I never stop to reapply. (7-12 hours) I REALLY like the design of the tube. You get EVERY. LAST. DROP. Out of this container.

reviews.review_title: GREAT COVERAGE for ACNE-PRONE   COMBO SKIN
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all this does not break out my skin which is a blessing! Does not make my skin oily, with or without powder. It looks like my skin, the shades have a nice range and feels lightweight. So creamy as well, and comes off like nothing. With a month of using it, I don't need foundation and it has SPF. The tube is just low key small, but It last for about two months, maybe even more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE!! So I was using the It Cosmetics CC Oil free Matte and decided to change it up to this one. I am liking this one way better even though I have combo normal to oily skin. This formula gives you more of a natural look the Matte was a thicker consistency and heavier look. I wear this on top of my sunscreen although this has spf I always layer my spf. I find myself reaching for this more than my higher end foundations. I also use my nude six with this for a more natural look and love! I finish off with Laura Mercier translucent powder. Will be repurchasing again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I swear by Georgio Armani luminous silk foundation, however, I wanted something lighter and less pricey for everyday use. I wanted to like this product because of all of the reviews I saw and recommendations from friends. I don’t know if my skin is sensitive to an ingredient or if it’s the primer I’m using (REN), but my skin instantly became itchy and irritated when I wore this. Not only did my skin become irritated, but the appearance was uneven and became oily instantly. I could literally wipe the film off of my face by the end of the day. I will be returning this product tonight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Highly recommended. Nice finish, nice coverage. Makes my skin feel healthier as opposed to other makeups that make me break out. Glowing complexion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My new favourite! I was looking for something that would be easy on my skin but also full coverage and this is the PERFECT thing! I thought it was pricey at first but there is so much product inside that it is TOTALLY WORTH IT

reviews.review_title: works well for dry skin and great price point
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve searched long and hard for a decently priced foundation that is full coverage, lasts long, and works well for red, dry skin. This meets all of my qualifications

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage, blends well, and having built in SPF is a plus! The shade I went with matches my skin perfectly. My skin complexion also showed improvements after using this product. I’ve bought this 3 times already and will continue buying this!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product!! I was using NYX foundation before and hated how it made my skin look. I purchased this in store as I tried on two different shades and found my perfect shade. I moisturize my face with coconut oil before I place this on. Great coverage ! Doesn’t look like I’m wearing any makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This CC  cream possesses the skincare benefits I would typically want in a foundation, but the shade range is terrible. The color I selected, Rich, pulls gray; I'm a Black woman with tan to deep skin with warm/golden undertones. I find that the  formulation works well with my oily skin, but I find this product makes me look ashy. I'll not be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: great for teenagers! light to medium coverage and works well with combination skin. blends well, and almost makes you look naturally perfect because it doesn't make you look like you have makeup on. It also is a great base for any powder products to go on top.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this and used this product but didn’t enjoy the feeling of it on my skin. The texture although creamy and provides good coverage was sticky in my opinion. I will give 3 stars for the dewy look of it which I like and the decent coverage it provides but take off two stars for the sticky feel. I would not repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It looks natural like skin. I mix shades light medium and medium to get my perfect shade. I have oily skin so I use milks makeup primer and it last more time. The longest I’ve had it on was 12 hours and it looked glowy, but beautiful at the same time. It is is very comfortable to wear, and it doesn’t have an awful smell. I would love that they had more shades because I hate that I have to buy 2 shades to get the perfect one. It’s my go to cc cream and really full coverage. If you easily brake out because of spf I don’t recommend to use it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It has been breaking me out, Ive used it for long enough to know I break out while wearing it and dont when I dont wear it. Im finding the coverage great but the finish is undesirable unless its set well and you use a very light amount. I loved it over the summer when I needed SPF without full makeup but the ingredients are not great, despite the claim that it is a skin care product. Yes, some helpful ingredients in here, but also some harmful ones from what I can tell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this but every single one of the lightest colors was too dark and yellow toned for me. I even got color matched by Sephora associate, and tried on Fair in the store. It looked okay in the store so I bought it. When I got home I had streaks of yellow on my jawline (where they have you test it).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Was great for awhile but it gets suuuuper oily after a couple hours, especially when working on your feet. This gave me bad texture and small bumps all over my face. If you find your face easily clogs up, I don’t recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great full coverage cc cream I wear it everyday I have dry sensitive skin and it makes my face look with a glow within totally recommend it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Way overpriced for what it is. I don't understand why this is rated so high.  It's not bad for an American CC cream but it's not great either. Definitely does not provide enough moisture even with serums underneath. Another bad thing is their lack of shades. They are so limited! I have to mix it with my foundation. Also, like someone else said, I think the colours are darker than before. Mine was way more orange than when I tried it last year.  It does smell nice though, and the coverage and SPF is good. But it's not good for acne prone skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After trying tons of products this is the foundation I have settled for ... gives you such a natural finish with full coverage. Excellent product. Changed my life

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The best cc cream ever! Perfect base for a night out with full coverage, but can also be used as a natural layer for just wearing out and about! Depends on how many pumps you use, I personally love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! It only takes a little to get excellent even coverage. My face feed moisturized without feeling oily - I’m not sure what the difference between a BB cream and a CC+ cream are, but BB creams I have tried feel heavy and oily, where as this feels more like a foundation. The 50+ sun protection is an awesome bonus too! I wear this every day during the winter, because it DC it is very cold, dry and often sunny. This product helps to keep my skin feeling moisturized and protected!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried so many foundations and BB creams and this one by far exceeded my expectations. I have dark circles under my eyes and some redness and it is all evened out after I apply this. My dark circles also look much better with just this on! I highly recommend it and it is worth every penny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Best foundation for me hands down. I have discoloration and an oily T zone and fair skin. It covers like a dream , feels great on my skin , lasts and offers an Spf 50 which is a major plus living in Florida. Its comes on a little dewy , but with a setting powder matted beautifully.  I bought the mini size and them immediately bought the full size.. dont think I will go back to another cc foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really really dislike this. It seems to sit on top of my skin and not soak in. It is going back tomorrow. I have used it maybe 10 times and it makes me look terrible. I am going back to my tinted moisturizer

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to try this because I have heard so many great reviews. I tried it with different primers. I gave it a fair shot. But unfortunately, it settles into my pores and looks cakey at that point. I was very disappointed I didn’t love it as much as the reviews I read. Or the influencers I’ve heard talk about it.

reviews.review_title: I can see why this is a best seller!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this because it was a best seller, and I am not disappointed! The coverage is perfect, the color matches my skin tone nicely and my skin has gotten prettier over this past week or two of use. I would highly recommend this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used Amorepacific tinted moisturizer for several years and l loved it. But it was discontinued, unfortunately. I tried IT Cosmetics Cream because it had Allure stamp on it. Wow, I was so disappointed...it goes on as a white paste and rolls of skin if you try to spread it with fingers. I will keep looking.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I liked the product . But was not happy with the shade . I exchanged for the next shade and it was too light on my skin . More shades for brown skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am not a big fan of cc creams but this brand I like it. This is my second  tub. Full coverage, spf 50, it doesn’t dry my skin, the finished is not matte, perfect for my skin tipe. I used it every day. For special occasions I use other foundations.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to love this foundation considering my skin was very dry and this foundation is very dewy. I switched because I did not like how easily this foundation rubbed off of my skin. I did like how this was a full coverage CC cream though. Overall, I would not recommend if you are searching for a long-wearing CC cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Too dark. since store light is too bright, it is hard to match my skin tone in there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how lightweight this is! Covers all the imperfections without feeling overdone.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not what I expected. The lady who told me about this said it was a foundation. I was in Sephora looking for a full coverage foundation. It’s very creamy and oily, not too bad but wouldn’t purchase again.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Tan - light brown shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with this product! I get so many compliments on my skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love, love love! It stays on and the coverage looks very natural!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: CC  Cream with SPF 50  I love it the best product I find it

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, I  have been using it for 2 years.  It leaves a dewy feel to your skin and provides good coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a one and done product. You need to wear nothing else but this for a perfect looking skin. I have received comments that my skin looks glowing.

reviews.review_title: Love CC , my most warn foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My most used foundation. Love it. THE first thing - it protects my skin, the second thing it looks like my skin but better. And I can build it up if I want more coverage.

reviews.review_title: Worth it if you have short days.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I overall liked the finish of this product. It didn’t cling to my texture and paired with the appropriate color correctors it actually gave me nice coverage! It looked very much like healthy skin so I did appreciate that as well. My only negative thing to say is that it didn’t stay on my skin longer than 4ish hours even with a primer.

reviews.review_title: Not For Dry Skin - Very Drying
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this to see for myself what all the hype was about. Prior to this, I was using Laura Mercier Tinted Moisturizer. I was looking for something with a little more coverage. My skin type is dry and sensitive and I burn easily in the sun. I use Cover Fx Mattifying Primer With Anti-Acne Treatment under the CC cream and set my makeup with Urban Decay's All Nighter Long-Lasting Makeup Setting Spray. The color I used was Light. I noticed that the CC cream did oxidize slightly leaving me about a shade darker than what it was first applied. The texture is a little thick, a little goes a long way, but it can be a bit difficult to work with if you don't work it into your skin right after applying. Coverage was pretty good. It covered up my light pigmentation from acne scars that I got a month ago. Staying power - after wearing this all day at work (10 hrs), I noticed that most of it had worn off. I will say that the SPF in this worked well for my skin as I can get sunburn while driving. It didn't irritate my skin at all BUT left me SUPER dry. Dry to the point where my skin felt very tight. Because it made me feel so dry at the end of the day, I will be returning this and sticking to the Laura Mercier Tinted Moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love this CC cream. this is the only foundation I use for my face now because of how pigmented this is, and I love medium to full coverage. My mom is a fan of this cc cream, too (and she's been using her D&G creamy foundation ONLY for years and years.  but the packaging is so bad... all of this paint is on my hands each time I use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a bit on the dryer side. My dry flakes on the nose are usually emphasized more when I use this. Other than that, I think it still looks nice in general, creates a natural look. The color range can be a bit off though. I’m usually light to fair-light on other foundations, but I had to use Fair for this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Did not like at all.  So heavy/thick and made me greasy.  Now I have to try and use it for a concealer.  Even when using a tiny amount, it is very full coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I agree with a lot of the other reviewers. It goes on wonderfully smells great very moist but for some reason as you’re wearing it, it becomes dry and sinks into the fine lines around your eyes. Personally for me,  I wouldn’t purchase it again. Everyone’s skin is different. It’s just not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Streaky when applied, made my skin look dry. I bought for the 50 spf but thanks but no thanks.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful coverage, great SPF, and feels natural
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: IT Cosmetics CC Cream, where have you been all my life? I resisted the hype for awhile, then I got a sample from Sephora and fell in love. I love this product because the coverage is amazing, yet it feels so light you forget you have makeup on. The coverage is SO good with this CC cream that I now use it all the time. Everyday at work and for more high-profile events such as parties or work functions. It's truly amazing. It's not cheap but for the small amount you use (I use one pump per morning, and that more than covers my entire face), it's much more economical than what I used to use (Bobbi Brown's BB cream or Skin foundation = $50/bottle!). Plus, you've got the SPF 50 and all of these ingredients that are great for your skin.  I typically do use a facial oil underneath this, but as it has hyaluronic acid and other goodies in it, I guess you could get away with not doing so? I have combo/oily skin, and I've tried both the original (this product) and the matte formula. Even though my skin is on the oilier side, the matte formula feels chalky and leaves a strange cast on my fast as opposed to the brightening and blurring of this formula.  I literally have a gallon-size Ziploc bag at home filled with different expensive foundations, BB creams, and foundation drops (I'm looking at you CoverFX), all aiming to get at what this product does with one little pump. A product that has SPF 50, beautiful coverage, is good for your skin, and feels light on your skin? I should probably just throw everything else away and stock up on this forever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely LOVE! Skin looks flawless, yet not cakey.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Mix a little bit of the ILLUMINATION CC  Cream with this and it makes for the perfect foundation. This combo provides just the tiniest bit of illumination

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked It, too bad I was allergic. The coverage is medium, could build to more, highly moisturizing, and has a natural glow to the skin. It wasn't cakey at all and no breakup or creasing. One of the most natural looking foundations I've ever tried, pretty much everything I was looking for. It's unfortunate it gave me dry scaley patches. Also their sales person is realllyyyyy pushy. Like, girl I told u I was allergic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So, I really wanted to like this product. However, I have acne prone skin, and this product tends to look a bit too cakey for my liking. It's definitely full coverage, but can look a bit like a mask. I get around this by mixing the tiniest drop of this with my lighter BB cream and it helps add coverage without caking up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This has such rave reviews and people in real life have been recommending it to me forever, so I finally caved. I have to say that I don't understand the hype. I feel like its SO heavy on your face, like the ultimate cake face. It also really bothers me that whenever I touch my face its instantly all over my hands, but at night I have to use TWO makeup wipes to get it all off? This product is so bizarre to me, I wish I could return it, but alas I've waited to long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product because it had so many great reviews. The coverage was perfect but after wearing for a short period of time, the product started flaking off and made my skin look really dry and oily in some areas. I tried different application methods and primers but the same thing continuously happened.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation, the finish it’s absolutely amazing, it last all day!!! I been using this everyday, and the best thing it’s SPF 50!!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - natural beige shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I suffer from light Rosacea and this product works great for me. However, if I apply powder my face because very dry and flakey so I stopped using powder just follow with blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This thing is amazing! Full coverage, light, good price! What else could you want!

reviews.review_title: I dont like foundation and I love this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I rarely wear foundation because of the way it feels on my face so I love having this as an option on days when I do want to smooth out my complexion. it gives full coverage but somehow doesnt feel heavy/greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've gone through a whole tube of this foundation, and while it's not the worst I've tried, it's definitely not a fave. If you have oily skin like me, you'll make it about 4 hours before everything starts slipping and sliding in your tzone. Even when freshly applied, it just sits so obviously on the skin no matter how much you try to buff it in. Unfortunately I won't be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m never buying this product again. It’s a mess and gets on everything. It does not stay on well and comes off on everything my faces brushes up on. Just holding my toddler always leaves my make up smudged on her. It feels oily. It does not stay put and makes every wrinkle and crease 10x more noticeable. Don’t use this product if you don’t have time for extra products to help keep your foundation in place.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It was not great for my dry skin. I wish it was more hydrating and more dewy finish.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - natural beige shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing coverage. Lightweight. If you sweat a lot or go clubbing, probably not for you. But everyday wear with some good setting powder you are looking snatched. Do yourself the favor. My daily GO TO

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this as a sample months ago and finally decided to give it a try. Well, I should have tried it sooner. It goes on so smooth and very little is needed. I've used the sample twice now and there is still some in there. I used a DRY beauty Blender to apply it. Definitely going to purchase the full size.

reviews.review_title: Never looking back - I have found my soulmate
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a love-hate relationship with foundation. I need it, but sometimes it does me so damn dirty. I've tried them all. I have gone through periods of looking caky, oily, patchy, peely, pock-marked and oxidized. I haven't been able to find a foundation that stayed put, looked fresh all day and didn't settle into my pores and make me look 20 years older. Until, that is, my mom gifted me a bottle of this. I buff it on with a dense brush, over a thin layer of primer, and once it's on, it isn't going ANYWHERE. Super flexible, full coverage and super natural looking. It isn't matte, which is something I actually prefer, as my days of looking like a powder puff are behind me. I blot away the oil halfway through the day and this stuff powers through to the end of my day, sometimes even through spin class and happy hour. Plus, SPF 50!!! I only have 2 complaints. 1. It does transfer quite a bit. Definitely needs to be set with a bit of translucent powder, and a setting spray couldn't hurt. 2. It is so challenging to get off at night. My double cleanse has turned into a triple/quadruple cleanse just to get all this stuff off my ears and neck. Not sure if that's even a legitimate complaint. Stop lollygagging and just BUY IT already! You won't regret it!!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Tan - light brown shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately, over time, this product started to break me out. I think I was allergic to something in the formula. The finish also left me looking kind of shiny (I have oily skin).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this full coverage foundation. It’s the perfect one for me!!! It’s illuminating and gives me a beautiful healthy glow. I highly recommend it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This smelled really horrible to me, and had a strange consistency. Ultimately, I returned it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: SNAIL SECRETION? You read that right. Not on bottle but listed as an ingredient on the box. Hey, this foundation is good.. don’t get me wrong, but I always have to follow up with a powder because it definitely leaves my face looking a bit on the greasy side. I can never seem to get rid of the slimy look and feel. I may stick to the powder alone, or something that is Leaping Bunny Certified, like Smashbox.

reviews.review_title: Good for smoother skin and small pores
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the idea of having 50  SPF in a CC cream. However, since this is full coverage, it settled into my pores (on the bigger side) and fine lines (mid-30s). I'm new to the tinted moisturizer/BB/CC cream world, so it'll take me a bit of trial and error to find the right product. The only other thing I've tried is Avene tinted sunscreen (which worked well for the outdoorsy stuff but a little too orange for the office setting). I don't like the heavy make up look and prefer something that looks more natural, which means I should go for something less full coverage and more sheer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great product! Very dewy! Maybe not awesome if you have oily skin! Fantastic coverage. Stays on! Minimal creasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This CC cream works great on my dry skin. I get full coverage that doesn’t look like a mask. I let it set on my face for few minutes and then I add setting powder for a flawless finish. My makeup looks natural and skin looks good all day long. No dryness or flakiness and it doesn’t settle into my fine lines. Also like the spf 50+

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It took me a little while to get used to using this product. At first it was looking too heavy and shiny. I tried applying with a brush, fingers, and sponge. I think I've found the key for me is to dot a tiny amount of product on my face with a finger, bounce it in with a damp sponge, and add a couple more tiny dots with my fingers if needed to build up over problem areas. With this method, I've come to like it. It does still tend to be just a tad more shiny than I prefer.

reviews.review_title: Not for those prone to dry skin.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have purchased this product twice and both times it made my face dry and patchy.  I returned this the second time.  I wouldn't recommend if you are prone to dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this CC cream.  Great coverage. Doesn't break me out.

reviews.review_title: Good Coverage, Oily Product, SPF yayyy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I realllly liked this product! It has a quite a full, smooth coverage.   I am mixed and my skin is generally normal-combination with hyperpigmentation and hormonal zits. I didn’t use to wear make up on a daily basis, but this products allots me a moisturizer and coverage in one so I really like that.   I had to remove stars because it reacted poorly with my skin about halfway through my day. It became extreeemly oily like I’ve never experienced before lol. Downfall. So I switched to the oil-free version and I’ve had more success and less oil throughout the day with that one :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff! I use it over primer for light coverage, and it makes me look like I'm not wearing much makeup, if any at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This CC cream is AMAZING. It not only has SPF it also has great coverage but it is not too heavy. I highly recommend this product! I can't wait to try the matte version.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was so disappointed by this product after hearing so many good reviews. The lightest shade is way too dark for me, but I thought I’d keep it from my purchase in April and try it again in the summer. This product is too dark because it’s practically orange, very greasy and caked, and makes my pores look so much bigger than they actually are. I’ve never had a product settle into my smile lines so bad. I wish I would have returned this immediately after purchase, but it’s been too long for the return window so I’ll just leave this review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this CC cream!  An absolute fave of mine for a buildable long lasting foundation.  Great for dry and sensitive skin too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this tinted moisturizer!! 5 Stars! It is a little heavier than most tinted moisturizers I've tried (Laura Mercier and YSL) but it has the full coverage that i'm looking for everyday without using foundation on my skin. PLUS SPF 50  HUGE PLUS!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Was very disappointed. The tube was practically empty when I got it. Perhaps a manufacturing defect but only got 3 uses out of it because of the amount of foundation actually in the tube, which was hardly anything.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Blends nicely and gives good coverage without looking heavy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

If you have very dried and very, very, very sentivie skin like me (cetaphil burns my face within 3 days usage), I highly recommend this foundation. This is the only one so far that makes my dried skin looks very nice (after some moisturizer) and didn't break me out (no allergic reaction). Coverage is pretty good I think. I didn't focus on it very much. I only focus on if the product hurts my skin or not.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous product. Wore it once to work (saving it for a couple vacations later this year) and literally everyone at work complimented me on my glowing skin. Has awesome coverage, keeps your skin moisturized but not oily and lasts all day. The spf is an added bonus. Highly recommend. Only downside is I feel there’s not a lot of product for the price however one drop does go a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My go-to. Maybe it's because of the SPF, but it goes on like a  glowy dream. I usually use about a 1/2 pump or less blended over my whole face with a damp sponge, or I'll just use it under my eyes and around my nose for spot-evening -- but if I'm going to be photographed or on camera the fuller coverage is really beautiful too. Lasts all day and the bottle lasts forever. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_text: Try IT! Everyone I know that uses this, is totally in love with it. It has a thicker viscosity, which usually means more coverage. It has great coverage and presses into the skin well. Not cakey! Very luminous and “wet”. Makes my skin look youthful and fresh! I have super red skin on my face and it covers it soooo well. I don’t have to keep adding more to cover the red. Just half a pump on each cheek. The bottle lasts a long time. I wish they have my colors but I’m able to just mix if I’m in between colors. There’s a reason this has the allure readers choice award.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

I find it lasts super well.. But in humid climates I really need to set it and even then it can get a bit slidy. In humid climates I prefer my fenty pro filtr

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones

reviews.review_text: LOVE THIS!! It’s so difficult to find the right shade and this was perfect! Blends well - not too thin, not too thick or cake-y. Perfect, natural blend.

reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this...but glad I got a sample before I bought it. Very strange citrusy fragrance and a heavy, mask-like texture.  It wouldn't set, irritated my sensitive skin, and slid all over my face. I didn't keep it on for long before I had to wash it off Don't understand the hype I heard about this product - I guess it just wasn't for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for about 6 weeks now, including on a vacation to Spain and at work. Some pros and cons I've noticed.  Pros: -Great SPF coverage without eye irritation (other BB/CC creams and sunscreens I've tried have really irritated my eyes) -Looks amazing for several hours -Blends well -Covers acne scars well  Cons: -Needs to be set -Even with setting powder, begins to collect after a few hours (for me it was by my frown lines, ymmv) -Even with full coverage, I needed concealer for light discoloration on my forehead -1 pump is a little too much for face and neck and may cause cracking, try 2/3 of a pump -Hard to shade match with Color IQ  I was shade matched way too dark with color IQ on this one compared to swatching in a store. I recommend the latter. I like this now enough to wear on weekends, vacations and outdoor events because the SPF works so well but not when I work indoors. When I first started using this, I found it was a little drying, so now I wear it on top of my regular day moisturizer (IT Confidence in a Gel Cream)

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The cover was amazing and covered all my uneven skin tone but it dried out my skin like crazy after an hour of wear. Do not recommend for ppl with dry or sensitive skin

reviews.review_title: Awesome but shade range needs further improvement
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice full coverage cc cream.  Easy to apply. One pump is all I need and I blend with my fingers which works best for me.  The warmth from my fingers basically melts the product into my skin and leaves a natural finish.  Feels nicely moisturizing on the skin and the spf is really great!  Have never burned when outside while wearing this.  Has a nice light lemon grass scent and works well with different concealers and setting powders and sprays.  I use a Beauty blender to apply concealer and powder over this product - product does not lift when sponge is used.  Knocking off a star because the shade I use (light) is a little darker than I expected and it has a tiny bit of a grey cast.  My Mom who has fair skin uses the shade fair/light and finds it to be too yellow.  Although the shade range has been expanded I think it could be further improved to accommodate all skin tones.    Also, maybe it’s just me but this product does not work well with my Bobbi Brown powder bronzer.  The bronzer looks patchy.  I do not get the same effect when I use it with other foundations and on the flip side can use other cream and powder bronzers with my IT cosmetics.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - natural beige shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new favorite foundation! I love it. This is the best for combo oily leaning skin. Looks so good even without a primer, holds on throughout the day. You just need some powder. Love love love !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I should of done more research. What I was looking for was an easy tinted moisturizer. What I got was an extremely thick foundation. The product sat on my face and really accentuated my dry spots and pores. I found it difficult to blend and I had to put powder on top to help it blend in more as my colour was too light. Way too much work for what I wanted. Not for dry skin is an understatement.  I liked the pump dispenser and the +50 SPF. I am returning this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my everyday, trusty foundation. With all the recent foundation launches I’ve been tempted to branch out and try some others. After being utterly let down by the fenty one, I decided just to stick with It. This foundation ALWAYS works for me. It works to mix in with other foundations that might me too dry, for example my Too Faced peaches and cream. If I get fed up and take all my makeup off because I’m trying a new foundation I always end up using this and it works every time. Probably my only gripes are shade range which is trash and longevity. Other than that, this is perfect for my dry combo skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really appreciate the SPF in this product. It’s also very moisturizing to my sensitive/ normal-dryish skin. It goes on nicely with a damp beauty blender and it is a level of coverage I like. What I really don’t like about this product is the smell. It’s like one of those lemon scented moist towelettes you used to get with takeout or on airplanes. Anyways the smell is gross and is what held me back from purchasing a full size of this. I’m going to find something just as good that doesn’t reek.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Won’t be repurchasing. 2 stars because I love the SPF but after a couple hours it starts to look orange and it gets very oily/separates around my t-zone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing coverage in a light-weight cream plus SPF! Holds up to heat, sweat, and water unless you wipe your face on something (smears easily).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used this concealer/CC cream for about two years now. I don’t like heavy makeup/foundation and I tend to breakout when I wear sunscreen, so the combo of a light coverage + sunscreen that doesn’t make me breakout is a double win. The “light fair” color is perfect on my skin even though I’d consider myself fairly tan for a Caucasian woman. I highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Have been using this since January 2017 and it's so wonderful!  I use it every day and the coverage is medium.  Before using it, I use Makeup Forever concealer on problem areas then after it dries, I use this everywhere.  The coverage is perfect for me.  On the weekends, I only use this, mascara and blush.  One tube lasts me about 5 months and I use it every day!  I have some dark spots/melasma on my cheeks and above my lip and this helps to cover (with concealer) and just makes my skin look smooth and bright.

reviews.review_title: Decent finish but limited shade/undertone range
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this CC cream because it is very easy/quick to apply when you are running late. It goes on a little cakey/heavy, so I like to use blot paper to blot down. Unless I have a really severe acne blemish I typically do not need any concealer as this is full coverage. I also sometimes use this as a concealer when wearing more sheer products. One of my main gripes about this is that the shades/undertones do not make any sense and are extremely misleading on the models in the picture. I will say, for example, the Light runs a little Mediumish and that the undertone selection is a severely limited. I would definitely try to get a sample before you buy because what you think might be a close match is likely to be very far off. Just so you can make a more informed decision, I've listed out all of the undertones for the entire line here: Fair Light is cool pink, Fair is warm yellow, Light is warm yellow (but is a shade darker than what most would consider light), Light Medium is cool pink (but is what most would consider a medium), Medium is warm yellow, Neutral Medium is neutral but with a very very slightly orange tinge to it. The next four shades, Medium Tan, Tan, Rich, and Rich Honey are ALL warm yellow, and then Deep is neutral. Hope that helps. I mix two parts Light Medium with one part Fair Light and have been able to get close to a decent match but it's a bit of a struggle given that I only use this because it's convenient and quick. It's quite a shame they don't find it necessary to make cool undertones for medium to deep skin. This really would be a decent product if they got the shades right.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is on every must have list, and when it was recommended to my by a sales associate in-store I decided to drop the cash ($52 CAD) and prepare start the next chapter of my life: the dewy, multi-purpose, no-nonsense chapter.   As a redhead, I'm no stranger to sun protection. However, a lot of make-up products that offer sun protection usually don't go higher than SPF 30. Which is not enough, especially for my face. This is the only tinted-moisturizer with SPF 50 (and an array of other multi-purpose claims I used to justify the price tag). But truthfully? The shade range sucks (fair works only when I am at my most freckly in the summer and can pull a bit orange if you aren't careful) and it makes my t-zone super oily. Moreover, the shades seem different depending on the variation of this product you try. The fair shade in the matte formulation is lighter, the fair shade in the illuminating formula appears darker.  Where is the consistency? Certainly not in the tube. It can also get a fair bit crusty if it goes too long without use.   I'm going to try my luck with the new Laura Mercier formulation in the future, but in the meantime I have been using a gel-sunscreen instead with a light layer of liquid foundation on top.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The absolute best. Very happy with this. Love that it has sunscreen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really great foundation for a snatchural look (snatched but natural). When I use this is very light weight that my freckles still show through but still covers any blemishes or uneven tones. My new go to for light weight foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this product. It covers my mild rosacea and gives a natural look . I also don’t get sun burns

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The best CC cream I've tried !!!  Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to for my foundation for a while now. I love the coverage and the finish (though I do have to set with a powder, otherwise, I get too shiny) and I feel it makes my skin look better the longer I wear it (brighter, more even toned, dewier). I usually wear it to work, or if I'm not doing much that day, but I don't really take it traveling with me. It can transfer onto things easily, and can look too oily really quickly (I haven't tried the matte version, though I will be soon). I've gone through a couple of tubes of this, and don't see me NOT purchasing it again anytime soon. Also love the light citrus scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used Smashbox CC cream for years, but it seem to be discontinued, so I tried this. It looks great, but rubs off on all my clothing.

reviews.review_title: Not for combo or oily skin.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If I prep my face with hydrating skin care and primer, it slides off within a couple hours. If I don't prep my face (it boasts that it replaces 7 products in 1 incl. moisturizer & primer), it sinks into my lines and makes me look incredibly old.  However, at initial application it looks natural and smooth. Combo and oily skinned people beware. I thought in the winter when I have dry skin it would be good because of how hydrating it is but it wasn't any better.    *Note - even when I got a good prep and it stayed on for a little longer, it lasts max 4 hours.

reviews.review_title: Great Choice for the Natural and Light look!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I brought this with me to LA along with my sunscreen and moisturizer.   After I apply moisturizer and sunscreen this product  applies naturally and beautifully to my skin! I feel more protection from the sun however the only flaw I think it has is that the coverage doesn't last for an entire hot day in LA. Therefore I wouldn't recommend using only this product as your only moisturizer and SPF product. Better to use moisturizer and sunscreen underneath!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is good for my skin and wears nicely. The only downfall is the shade, which I’m the lightest one, is too dark. I think the shade range needs some work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin so I put on primer beforehand and set it with powder and even then, my face felt super oily within minutes. The coverage also isn't great, will need at least 2 layers for full coverage. Also feels very heavy throughout the day. Will definitely be returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: BEST FOUNDATION I HAVE EVER HAD...  Full coverage, sunscreen, lightweight, covers redness. This product is amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is not what it used to be.  I’ve used this in Light for the past few years and love it.  I’ve gone through at least 7 tubes.  The last one I bought looked cakey and the shade was more orange after it oxidized.  I exchanged it for a different one and the same thing.  I can no longer find a shade match in this and the formula is different.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this based off of a Sephora employee’s recommendation and I’m SOOO glad I did! Literally does everything: primes, moisturizes, color corrects, has spf, and gives me a nice dewy glowy finish! I have fair skin, horrible acne scars and acne prone skin. This covers everything with one pump. For major redness I add a little extra for coverage and it’s better than anything I’ve tried. I also don’t find that this breaks me out! Def recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is good BUT DO NOT WEAR IT DURING a event of pictures. LITERALLY I looked like some ghost that looked 10 shades lighter. u can thank me later. LITERALLY still really cant get over go terrible this product is during a event of pictures.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Switched from a product that I’ve used for 5 years to this and once I found my correct color I’m a fan! A little definitely goes a long way!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very good coverage for a CC cream and it lasted all day. It was a little too thick for me and I felt like you could see it sitting on my face after a while. It also did not look good powdered down. I could see people who like full coverage liking this though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a product that really does whatever job you needed it to do. I first started using it in hopes of finding a product with a high SPF and a reasonable amount of coverage to even complexion.  After trying it on, it was also able to minimize small amounts of acne here and there, and stayed strong throughout the whole day even with no setting spray on. However, I would suggest using a sponge to apply the product to the face because the product makes a makeup brush chalky, and is hard to wash out.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rich Honey - rich ebony shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very moisturizing, great light coverage to medium. Love the texture and feel but rubs off like no tomorrow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have a sensitive and oily skin, this cc cream is really good to cover all my redness and acne but its clogged pores and caused me a very bad breakout. Highly recommend this product for someone who has dry and healthy skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this product! I used to have very bad acne and skin. I never left the house without a full face of makeup and full coverage foundation. I started to take accutane (strong medication for my skin) which dried out my skin and foundation always looked cakey no matter what I did. That is when I bought the CC cream. It hydrated my skin and covered everything nicely too! After my skin healed from taking the medicine, I continued using the CC cream! I highly recommend it. It feels nice and light, doesn't look extra either. Looks very natural. I highly recommend this to anyone! On a day-to-day basis, I put this on, a bronzer, some mascara, and call it a day!!! (Takes my 5 min to put on a great makeup look!)

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this for when I was traveling because I wanted the SPF, and I was honestly pretty pleased with how it performed (lasting 10 hours in 100F  weather). This is definitely a full-coverage foundation, don't be mistaken by it being called a CC Cream. Somewhat bothered by the scent, though, to be honest.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was eyeing this cc cream/cover up for just over a month before I decided it's time to buy it. I read reviews, watched YouTube videos and couldn't find any reason NOT to buy it except the price made me iffy.  I really really wanted to like this because of the multi benefits but unfortunately that was not the case.  I used it twice and I started forming the cyst painful zits under the skin- which I never get! and this was the only new thing I incorporated into my skin routine :(  I was disappointed to be honest how my skin reacted.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product so much, I have such dry skin and I’ve never found something that gives me such good coverage but looks so natural. It gives a beautiful glow but isn’t oily, and evens out my skin tone beautifully but also covers blemishes. I wish it was a little less expensive because it’s hard for me to afford as I am a student, but I will never stop purchasing because it is my holy grail! The colour light is also such perfect neutral shade!

reviews.review_title: This is the best cc cream out there!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: color range inst the best but the formula is EVERYTHING if you have dry skin. I had no cracking or dry patches, it gives a very dewy affect. I dont think i would call this full coverage its more on the sheer-medium coverage side which is perfect if your going for a natural look. The one bottle only lasted me the summer and i didnt wear it everyday so beware that you will run through this foundation faster than others. But buy it u wont regret!!!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and this doesn’t work for me no matter what primer or moisturizer I use prior to putting it on. Waste of money! I have it two star bc it’s spf 50.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love their concealer and i thought this would match up but sadly it doesnt. color match was good and it didnt feel heavy. those were the only good things. my face isnt super dry but this makes it look like i have crazy dry patches all over! especially in my t zone and it breaks up badly on my nose.  i really waned something dewy with sunscreen for every day but this is a hard pass!  tried with moisturizer, primer and a clean face and nothing worked!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best foundation/CC cream that I’ve ever tried. I have normal to oily skin and this cc cream looks very natural and stays in place all day. It’s great for covering redness and is buildable depending on how you want to use it.  This has been a great addition in my skincare for helping reduce my acne.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Tried this multiple times. It’s soooo pretty but it broke me out. I loved the more natural looking finish and way it wore throughout the day even on my oily skin. But terrible breakouts immediately after each use.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product, however it is a no go for me. After just 3 wears it clogged my pores and I had break outs on 3 parts of my face. I am not at all acne prone and rarely break out. The coverage this cc cream provides is nice and it does feel weightless but it just did not work for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I went to the gym with this stuff on and when I got back to my boyfriends house his mom asked me if I just did my makeup and that I looked nice and glowy. Was exactly what I was looking for days when I want to put on a quick layer of foundation and still get all the skincare benefits, especially in the summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this after watching a review on Youtube about how it was good for combo/oily skin.  I tried to like it.  I wore it a few times.  I prepped and primed and set.  But it was still STICKY.  Also, the shade I was matched to at my Sephora store was way too dark.  I will be sending this one back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It does the job, but its just to sticky for me. It doesnt set in even after a setting powder

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product provides great coverage and doesn't feel too heavy. My only complaint is that it does start looking a little dry after a full day of wear. Other than that, I love that it provides 50  SPF.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i love this product! easy to blend and not too full coverage but just perfect for everyday wear. i like to use this with other foundations and it layers amazingly and gives you SPF. Use a dense brush, i find a sponge doesn’t give you enough coverage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This isn't a foundation, but it's perfect when I don't want to do a full face. I work in an office, but I don't want to do a whole face of makeup every day just for my small office (I would rather sleep in) and this is exactly what I needed. If I use one full pump, it's slightly too much coverage for me. I don't even need to use a full pump to cover my face and neck. Then I just use a translucent setting powder. Because this is not a foundation, it doesn't give you that unfinished look if you don't do a full face. It just evens out your skin tone really nicely. With a good moisturizer this will stay all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been using it for the past 3 years and I'm satisfied!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fabulous product ... absolutely love it .. great creamy like coverage , easy to apply

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: When I first got this I HATED it. It was heavy and cakey, not good. After working with it for a while I've changed my mind - sort of. I still don't LOVE it. But I do use it, and I'm not completely unhappy with it when I do. The thing I like most about this is the SPF 50 which is great for when you're going to be outdoors in the hot sun. This is not natural coverage, it is FULL coverage. Which could be good or bad depending on what you're going for. What I don't like about this is that it gets greasy as the day progresses. Especially if you are in the hot sun, which, as I mentioned, with SPF 50, is probably the reason you're wearing it in the first place. Also, it might be my imagination, but I feel like it makes my face itchy sometimes? I'm not 100 percent sure of that. Bottom line, I will definitely use this bottle up. I'm not sure I would purchase again. I feel like using a sunscreen under my favorite foundation might be better.

reviews.review_title: The only foundation I'll ever need
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly do not know how I have not heard about this product earlier. A coworker recommended this to me and while I've only been using it for 3 days, I am completely obsessed. It goes on so light, but the coverage is unparalleled. It covers up all the darker sun damage areas on my face, makes my complexion completely smooth and I love the fact that it has anti aging serum, high factor SPF, AND primer all right in it. I will definitely be buying this in my winter shade once summer is over as well. This is a truly fantastic foundation alternative.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for a year, I barely ever wear my mac foundation anymore thanks to this, I find it builds easily for when my hormonal acne acts up, and the fact that there is SPF makes it an all around winner, at least for me. I mix in a few drops of drunk elephant D-Bronzi, and am good to go. I always buy a backup so that I never run out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am in my early 20s. This foundation is very heavy and cakey. Not natural at all. I just prefer a natural dewy foundation over a matte foundation. The color selection isn't great either. I borrowed this foundation from my mom and she likes it. I feel like if you have more mature skin you might like this because of how full coverage it is and the other benefits this product has. For me, it's a pass.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve always had very problematic skin. Makeup seem very notorious on my skin. This makeup looks wonderful on my face I couldn’t believe it! The SPF50 is such a plus!!!
