reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. It feels light and almost feels like you are not wearing any makeup. Yes it is dewy but when you put on lose translucent powder on top works great and lasts! My only issue is that my dark circles under my eyes were a bit visible so I will be buying the concealer from this brand and mixing it in. It is worth the extra step as this makeup looks super natural nothing like I have ever tried before.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised by this. it covered up my acne scarring, and my skin still looked natural and smooth. Best of all, it wasn't cakey on my dry combination skin like most foundations are, and the shade was a match. It makes my skin look like skin while still looking super healthy, clear, and glowy and I'm obsessed because I've really never felt that way about any foundation. The only downside is, it's a tad bit oily for my combination skin (not too oily though), but I'll combat this with a good matte primer. I'll definitely be purchasing the full size of this at the Sephora sale.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff. For a CC cream I did not expect so much coverage.  This was perfect for my dry skin, though I don’t think it would be great for someone with oily skin.  Coverage was great, did not cause any skin irritations or breakouts and hardly no scent.  Would definitely buy again.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Tan - light brown shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Its a great product my skin doesn't feel dry at all

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this foundation.  I use it in conjunction with the primer and they make a great pair.  It really does last all day in a high humidity climate.  It stays on and does not rub off.  Coverage is great without the feeling of a heavy base.   It has also improved the health of my skin.  Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color is too dark for my sking but OMG the coverage and light feel of it? Unbelievable! My skin looks flawless

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my go-to for two years now and it can’t be beat. I don’t love wearing a lot of makeup because I tend to sweat a lot throughout the day, but recently I have developed dark spots around my eyes that I want to cover. This does the trick! It’s not too heavy and provides the perfect amount of coverage to give the appearance of even skin tone. And the SPF is an added bonus!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: An incredible full-coverage solution that has replaced my Fenty and Dior foundations. In addition to being a moisturizer with a high SPF, it leaves you with a perfect texture and a beautiful finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product. It feels like tinted diaper cream on my face and I had to remove it immediately. I don’t recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love it! A small amount can cover your entire face. It can be a little thick, so I after applied, I use an oval circle brush to buff it out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff! The coverage is great and it doesn’t feel heavy. My skin can get pretty oily so I just set it with a powder and I don’t get shiny at all throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a great value for money & has very nice coverage and extremely light.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: the product is absolutely amazing. Only problem is I was given the shade tan at sephora and didn't realize it was too dark. But its great for those who want full coverage and SPF

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love IT cosmetics! This CC cream gives me full coverage leave my face smooth looking! Also love there bye bye eyes coverage!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product gives you a full coverage & natural look. I am so amazed by how good this foundation looks on my skin. I’m even more impressed by the ingredients. It’s talc free; also, it contains zinc, snail secretion filtrate, and vitamin c - all good for the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A staple in my makeup routine! Great coverage with an added bonus of being a great sun block!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for a couple of years and love it. Fair is the colour for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin and most foundations make me breakout. This one is perfect with a setting powder. I love the colors weather I’m tan in the summer or more fair in the winter the match is flawless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cause me to breakout all over my face! I have combination sensitive skin.   Too bad, I actually liked this. I only used half to one pump and made my face look so smooth and even toned. Covered blemishes & dark spots nicely. But it also sat on top of face, it felt a little greasy. Made my t-zone oilier. When I touched my face the product smudged to my hand or anything my face touched.   Just when my skin was doing so well, I tried this thinking its great for sensitive skin but it broke me out completely. Red bumps & blackheads all over my face. I used it for 2 weeks and I noticed I broke out every time I used this. I’m so upset! Will be returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: REALLY like this make up!  It stays on very well and hides my imperfections. I live in Florida and do a lot of sweating but this has staying power and doesn't wipe off.   Some foundations make me break out but this has no effect on my skin.  I can apply it with a brush or with my fingertips and it looks well either way.  Doesn't take a lot for coverage either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I heard good things about this product so I decided to try it

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - natural beige shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation. It has a smooth application. Hydrates has spf which is a huge plus. The only thing I don't love is the staying power. I would prefer longer wear but this is a great foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love that this gives you great coverage and also has anti-aging ingredients. Sometimes I need to sheer the formula out a little for best application, and the staying power is not as great as other full-coverage formulas (e.g, Double Wear, Teinte Idole). Otherwise great product!

reviews.review_title: best cc cream since ole henriksen discontinued his
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is a great cc cream-  good coverage-  not greasy- spf- no breakouts from this and lasts all day.  I wear studio gear mineral make up over it and flawless finish!  they added a lot of shades which was very helpful also.

reviews.review_title: Color range needs to be expanded; amazing product!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love all of the benefits of this product, and it shows! However, the color range is a bit too dark and oxidizing, even after shaking it. A little goes a long way. It is easy to spread and apply, and not to mention soft on the skin, as if you have nothing on. I’m on accutane and found this to be a little too ‘wet.’ I am a minimalist when it comes to makeup, and this you would need a setting powder after applying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Irritated my skin. Looked ok, but did not feel good.

reviews.review_title: Most natural looking foundation I've tried
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this product. At first I wasn't crazy about the coverage, but after using it for a little while I noticed a major improvement in my skin. I no longer need as much coverage as I was used to because my skin loves this product so much! I do use a shine control primer with it and a light setting powder, otherwise I have more shine than I'd like, but not an unbearable amount.  My favourite part about this product is really how it feels on my skin and how natural looking it is. Until trying this, I have not been able to find foundation that looks this much like my skin. It's so lightweight and actually feels healthy and clean on my face - not that heavy / clogged feeling of most foundations.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product.  It is very easy to apply and goes on smooth with just the right amount of coverage. Went to a Sephora store and had an associate help me find the right shade for me and teach me to apply it with a foundation brush. I was instantly sold. Having the sunscreen is a bonus. I would highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My best cream I Iove the effect I also recommend that cream to many peoples

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Awesome coverage without creases! A little goes a loooooong way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This used to be my holy grail summer product... but not anymore. My current tube seems to oxidize to a weird red tint on me (I’ve been using this product and colour for 4 years!) not sure if it’s a bad batch or if IT cosmetics changed the formulation. This one might be going back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using the Laura Mercier Tinted Moisturizer for as long as I can remember, and still love it. However, recently, my skin has been acting out a bit and I’ve needed a bit more coverage. This It Cosmetics CC Cream is the real deal... it gives a good amount of coverage but still looks very natural and somehow manages to even make my dry skin look dewy... a look I’ve been trying to achieve for years! I’ll continue switching between the two products for the days that I need more or less coverage but seriously, this stuff is AWESOME. Also, a little goes a long way... I normally use one pump for my whole face and that even feels like too much, sometimes. I’m sure other people who are better at makeup have some high-tech way to apply, but I just use my fingers and then sometimes blend a bit with a beauty blender. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: Limited color selection and not flattering for por
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for an everyday 'foundation' that I could just swipe on for light/medium coverage. The Sephora consultant suggested this to me, and I loved the thick feel of it and was matched with a color. But upon coming home, I realized it was WAY too orange for my face and the other colors are pretty limited if you have yellow undertones like I do (these all skew orange and pink). The cream also CLINGS to the pores on my nose like no other and accentuated them -- it made the few clogged pores I have on my nose look like sky scrapers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot find a primer, setting spray, or setting powder combination that will keep this from separating and settling into every mark or imperfection on my skin. It's so embarrassing to wear this anywhere.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! Been using it everyday for past 12 months. One tube lasted me for 10 something months. Protects from sun, hides the scars perfectly. Best cream for everyday use.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: recieved a sample of this on the my last order. it gives great coverage and starts out kind of matte, but then my face gets oily. the reason I knock off a star is because it calls itself a cc cream but really should be called a full coverage foundation. I've been using a different cc cream daily for the past 9 months which I love. but this stuff makes me look like I'm wearing a mask. I probably wont buy a full size since I prefer to let my skin shine through. dont get me wrong, this isnt heavy feeling or a bad finish/formula, it's just not what I want. it doesnt irritate my sensitive breakout prone skin either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This CC cream made my face itch like there is no tomorrow. I developed bumps all over my face and it clogged my pores. The product is so thick and cakey no matter how less I used. It also emphasized pores like crazy which I had no idea even existed. Awful experience!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never been able to find a good shade match for my fair, very yellow-toned skin. I haven’t found matches in 30 and even 40-shade foundation lines, so I was weirdly shocked when I finally tried this CC cream in Fair and it was a near-perfect match. Um. How?  If you have huge pores like me, you still need to apply primer beforehand or else it will settle in. I apply with my fingers and then tap it in. It is natural looking, but covers my acne marks and redness (and believe me, I have a lot). I’m on Accutane right now, and this doesn’t dry me out or accentuate any dry patches. Seriously, amazing. It’s expensive but worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample and I found it to be very drying. It lasts an okay amount. I’d say about 6 hours and it has an okay amount of coverage. It’s great for a minimal make up day but I prefer more medium coverage for day to day wear that can be built up if desired. It’s worth a shot to try but I wouldn’t purchase a full size do to how drying it is.

reviews.review_title: When hubby notices, we know we have a winner
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This does a myriad of things. It's a must for travel. Thank goodness there's a mini size available. While you're traveling it's your daytime serum, moisturizer, BB/CC corrector and foundation. Since I personally did not require a primer or concealer with this it acted as those too. What is that, like 6 in one? First, the coverage is amazing. It covered as well as my full coverage foundation and clung to my skin with no problem. I'm light-medium in most but Light worked best for me. I'm normally wear 220 Claire II in Lancome Teint Idole and in the Lancome Dual Powder, both also here at Sephora. This CC is so amazing, I just can't tell you...it's a different animal. It's as thin as water and binds directly to the skin, I don't feel it on, yet it covers literally everything but yet so thin and natural. Even my hubby noticed how amazing my skin looked so when he says something, we know we have a winner!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was awful. It says “your skin but better”... not even. It’s thick, makes my skin look cakey, the color is weird even tho it’s supposed to be my color, just awful. I wanted to try a new bb or cc cream but I think I’ll just stick to my maybelline bb cream. It’s less expensive and actually makes my skin look good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! I’m not a big reviewer but after just getting off of FaceTime with my sister who asked me “are you getting work done on your face?” I knew I had to make a review. I’ve gotten SO many compliments about my complexion looking great since wearing this!! I really want the brush to apply bc I feel like a sponge isn’t the best applicator. My fingers work better but then i have to clean my hands every time after. But get this!! So goood!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite CC cream for every day use! I didn’t  break out or have any bad reaction while using this.  I would definitely recommend this!

reviews.review_title: Been using for 2 years solid.. but
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Alright I have been using this foundation for 2 years and I absolutely love it. For a cc cream, it is quite full coverage, but for a foundation I would call it medium coverage, which is my preference. It is a satin finish and great for dryer skin as it lets your natural oils come though during the day.   My ONLY downside is that I find after 6+ hours, it starts to break up on certain areas of my face (chin, nose). Admittedly these are areas I touch a lot. This is something I had never really noticed or been bothered by until lately - I am in a wedding this month and said I would do my own makeup. Because of this, for the past couple months I started studying how my face looked throughout the day and how certain products wore (a usual day is a day at the office and often a weights based workout at lunch) and that’s when I noticed it breaking up.  I tried different primers, application tools, and setting powders, and nothing could keep it fully ‘stuck’  I still love it for day to day, and will continue to use it. But I will go for more of a true foundation for special occasions.   I am a fan of the MUFE ultra HD foundation and find the coverage similar with a better wear time for days where you need to look picture perfect for hours.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - natural beige shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Hate it I’m not good with applying make up but it didn’t work even for my make up artist

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it. This stuff lasts all day, makes my skin look even, and did I say it lasts all day?! I mean it really lasts. I never had an issue with it looking cakey, but I do mist with a dewy spray after I use my setting powder and that helps big time. I wish it looked a tad more natural, but overall no complaints and I will definitely repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE! My everyday go to. Leaves your skin looking soft, fresh and glowing! Not full coverage but I like that. It's not heavy - you don't even know you have makeup on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to summer product. I already use sunscreen every single day so having it already in my “foundation” is even better. I love full coverage hence why i called this a foundation. It cancels out everything. I usually hate CC creams bc they usually slip and slide off my already oily prone face but this stuff lasts even when I’m sweating or in water. Very happy with this product I’ve repurchased multiple times.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finally after decades I've found a foundation that feels lightweight but covers

reviews.review_title: Amazing!! Will always continue to purchase
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing everyday use product! I was so tired of wearing foundation everyday so I thought I would try this out, and this has an amazing medium to full coverage cream. Definitely recommend this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The first couple of wears was not terrible however I did notice the cc cream settling into my creases. The third time wearing it, my chin broke out. :/ then I noticed that the color doesn’t really match my skin tone very well. Not the best for dark skinned girls.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favourites. I'm around a MAC NC20 and Light Medium is a pretty good match. This doesn't dry out my skin and blends in pretty flawlessly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I saw this as the new holy grail... but it was a fail for me! Made my skin dry and I also noticed it made my wrinkles stand out more.. eek!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Awesome low-med coverage CC cream with amazing SPF scores. Doesn’t smell like makeup and applies like lotion. This would be enough for people with minor discolouration, but if you have pigmented acne scars or moles those would need concealer, but still a great daily item.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this product for two days and have several issues.  1. It's almost paste-like in consistency. Very hard to spread; 2. It settled into my lines within an hour of application; 3. It doesn't cover as well as foundation, just too much to wear under it, but not enough coverage to replace foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have repurchased this over 5 times and will continue to purchase. This is perfect for every day wear I get skincare, good coverage and SPF all in one. I never notice any flashback in photos. Love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited when I saw this, I really wanted to love it. But for a foundation with 50spf they really do not cater to the fair-skinned crowd. The shade Fair has yellow undertones and is surprisingly dark. As someone who wears foundation shades with names like cloud and porcelain I was excited to try a foundation with such high spf. This is so dark and yellow there is no way I can wear it. If you have fair skin with pink/cool undertones this may not be the right choice for you.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Worst foundation I've ever tried at Sephora. To thick and cakey, seeps in to skin and brings out wrinkles

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you’re on the fence about purchasing this, do it! I am beyond pleased with this foundation. It’s the best I have ever used. Recently, I started struggling with hormonal acne that has left my jawline scarred. This is the only foundation I’ve found that not only covers my scars but looks dewy and natural! I wish I had purchased it sooner. Plus, I love that it has such a high SPF. It truly has changed how I feel about my skin. Thank you IT cosmetics for making me feel confident again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This really is your skin, but better.  I don't like a full coverage (I like my freckles to show), and I'm not fond of heavy foundation.  This was perfect for me.  Matches my skin beautifully without making me look made up.  I use about 1/4 of a pump and it's enough for my whole face.  It's a bit pricier than other foundations I've tried, but with how little I have to use, it's totally worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute go to for my everyday look. I have used this product for about 4 years now and don’t see myself changing any time soon.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been trying out this CC Cream as a Foundation for the last 10 weeks. It’s so good that my ride or die Nars Foundation has only been touched once. I will say though, if you are looking for a full coverage foundation that this is not for you. This is for when you want a little coverage but you still want to look like yourself. The “Your Skin but Better” claim is so true. When I did an in depth look after applying I noticed you can still see some freckles but what this does is balance out the coloring in my face. I have a lot of redness in my face so this was the perfect thing to just give an enhanced look to my skin. I’m still playing around with this product but so far it’s great. The one draw back I’ve had is that it doesn’t play nice with my favorite concealer, still not sure if it’s the application or maybe if it’s the concealer but that’s why it’s 4 stars vs 5.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: way better than expected. covered like a dream and lasted all day.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the best foundation/cc/bb cream I’ve ever used, a great match to my skin tone and makes everything look so smooth and even!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I look for foundations that will cater to my excessive oiliness and provide me with a blurred finish. This one develops more of a dewy look which I never thought I'd like but I suprisely do! It definitely gives a natural finish as intended. I think it has great benefits, the only complaint I have is when I initially apply it and set it with powder, it feels kind of sticky on the skin for at least 15-30 minutes. It is a full coverage foundation, which I already knew from reading reviews. I got this as a free sample for one of my orders that was $25 .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This CC+ Cream has changed my makeup routine for the better. I apply it with my fingertips and it easily glides on. One and a half pumps covers my face and neck and the product melts into my face like a second skin. It looks so natural and has a flawless finish with a natural glow. I’m absolutely in love and will be buying it again the minute I get close to running out. Another thing I love about this product is that when you sweat, somehow the sweat beads nicely on top, and doesn’t make my face look gooey like my old foundation did.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to not like it when I had oily skin, it looked cakey and thick. However, my skin changed and now I am combination/normal and OMG! This is amazing, it leaves my skin looking flawless and is great for everyday use. I love the finish it gives when applied with a sponge or with my fingers, do not really like it with foundation.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: While I like the coverage and the lightweight feel of this foundation, it does not stay on well. Throughout the day I notice it on my phone or on my hands and other object I touch. Also, it pools in and exaggerates fine lines, especially under my eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I would not recommend this product to anyone who has dry skin like myself. I thought I t was a weird consistency almost like clay or something, which made it difficult to apply and blend, even with an awesome moisturizer and primer. After a couple of hours, my skin was visibly dry and patchy. Obviously less than ideal, especially for the price point.

reviews.review_title: A double-edged weapon   tips and tricks
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It great product with incredible coverage and the fact that the FPS doesn’t flashback it’s amazing. my problem with this product it’s that you need to be careful with how you apply it.  TIP AND TRICKS first of all you have to be aware that a little bit goes a long way, so try not to go so heavily handed.  My best advice would be to use a wet beauty blender for blending it, but If you feel like using you fingertips is a better idea after you finish applying it, dab a little bit the sponge so make sure there are not un even lines  Finally if you want to apply brush and bronzer it’s easier to use if you put cream products, but it you really don’t want to use them make sure your face is completely set before using powder products other wise the product will be moving around and the brush will eventually make some patches

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best BB cream I’ve tried ever. I love the fact it’s SPF50. It provides great coverage without looking like makeup (as the name suggests!) and on its own works really well. I have oily t zone and I don’t even feel the need to powder (maybe it’s mattifying?)

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it. Perfect spf and Great coverage! It feels like you’re wearing hardly anything!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 3.5 stars really. Tried this because I was looking for a foundation alternative that was better for your skin and suitable for everyday wear. This makes my skin look really good and lasts a good amount of time. Plus has SPF but doesn’t have a white cast. I would give it more stars if the shade ranges included maybe 3 more colors and if the color transfer wasn’t so extreme. It was really hard for me to find the shade I liked, and even then I felt like I was in between two. You can’t touch anything with this stuff on, it will 100% transfer. This was extremely annoying. Lessened with setting spray but was still bad. I would rate this 4.5 if the they changed these things. Would still recommend despite these negativities.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing!! Great lightweight solution for a hot trip this summer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Only product I’ve found to perfectly match my skin tone and give me a natural looking perfect complexion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, it is sheer genius with adequate coverage. As a melanoma skin cancer survivor the SPF factor is paramount with me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i purchased this bc i needed a summer color (yes, this is my summer color) and i had heard good things about IT cosmetics.  I got this particular formula bc i wanted a glowy summer look. BUT instead of GLOWY i got GREASY. Even with a matte primer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted so baby to love this product but i can't find a match. too lights looks as if my pores are under a microscope and too dark looks worse than a fake tan which I don't care for, at. all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it was okay. I had really high hopes after watching the video that's posted on this item's page of the woman putting it on her face.. I was like WOW WHAT cause she looked so good. I ordered it, tried it on, and it was too yellow-toned for me. maybe I'm too pale as well, but it was definitely not the shade for me (I'm 110 in fenty foundation). it went on nicely, but I'm back on the hunt for a holy grail. gonna return.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like that it is full coverage, but it sticky and it does not last long...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Pros: high SPF, good coverage   Cons: cakes into facial lines, oily enough to make eye makeup smear (even waterproof!), runs dark, rubs off on clothes easily

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried many foundations but I keep going back to this as my all around foundation with SPF. it’s easy to apply and reapply, it stays on pretty well and it has moderate to full coverage if you build it. I have older, dry acne prone skin and it does not over dry or clog.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: “Fair” is much too dark and too yellow. Formula was good though, would love to be able to wear it. They need to expand the shade range!

reviews.review_title: Great CC Cream for Keeping Moisture
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the coverage of this CC cream. I am able to use it as my foundation and it doesn't dry out my skin. In Michigan, my skin flakes in the winter due to dryness, but this has been keeping in the moisture well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Goes on nice and like the spf but i don’t like how you have to reapply every 2 hours, especially because it is 40$.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wore this everyday on vacation, spent lots of time outside and on the beach and didn't burn once! Just like sunscreen, you need to reapply. I used a dense foundation brush for a smooth application - with reapplying throughout the day on sunny days, you definitely need to wash that brush often though. It does feel slightly heavy but it provides amazing coverage for just one layer of one product. I would set it with a setting spray instead of powder, which can make it look cakey. I found I needed a lighter shade than I thought I would - I wear Fair Light. I don't know that I will wear this all year round though, as the ingredients are far from clean. But if you're needing SPF 50 with decent coverage and want to streamline products - like during traveling - this is a great option.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product! Long lasting (even in TX heat), SPF and good coverage:)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: breaks appart on your skin after a small amount of time even with primer, powder and setting spray. heavy on the skin. waste of 50$ in my case

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice everyday product.  It is full coverage, which I enjoy and takes very little work to blend in.  The only things I am not pleased about is are that it will settle into fine lines and it transfers.  It transfers everywhere. Slightly touch your face? Your entire arm will have foundation on it. Want to hug someone? Pull away and your entire face will be on their shirt? Wear glasses? You’ll be cleaning them for days to come.  I still give this product 4 stars because I do enjoy it for everyday, I just have to be mindful of the cons.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love it, goes on smooth and leaves my skin feeling and looking amazing.

reviews.review_title: weightless, beautiful coverage lasts all day
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this on a whim after a period of only using concealer on my face because I found every foundation/ bb cream far too heavy on my face. I wanted a little more coverage than just concealer and picked this up and I’m so happy I did! I was so surprised by how little product covered my whole face, and how it feels like I’m wearing nothing. I even used it on a night where I wanted to do a full face of makeup and normally would use a heavy, full coverage foundation. This held up way better than any foundation I’ve ever used, stayed flawless ALL NIGHT through dancing and multiple drinks. I have applied it with my fingers, something that would make me cringe typically, and it STILL looked good. Day to day I apply it with a rounded brush from elf then pat it with a damp beauty blender and I love the outcome every time. This is also the one product I have found that completely covers my dark circles. I don’t have to pack on extra concealer or anything! Since I’ve started using this I have been getting compliments on my skin all the time. Do yourself a favor and buy this product. Looks great, has spf and anti-aging serum in it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is in my everyday routine. So lightweight, easy to blend, & color matches perfectly. Looks great with concealer blended on top and I think it lasts longer than it says. I don’t ever have to reapply. And love how this has sunscreen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve loved and used Estée Lauder’s Double Wear foundation for over a dozen years. After trying this - I have to say it’s my go to for the summer. The one step application makes it easier in the mornings and it’s a good medium to full coverage. I like this formula better than than their shimmery version, as I find the coverage is a bit better and it stays on better through the day. I’ve already purchased a second one to use after I go through this one!

reviews.review_title: phototoxic citrus oils plus the irritant eucalyptu
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start by saying that I did like the texture of this product. I liked how it went on and how it stayed on and the way it made my skin look upon first application. But man oh man did I break out in the worst rash and pimples I have ever had from a product before.   I did some digging into the ingredients and I just want to know why they included phototoxic citrus oils plus the irritant eucalyptus oil in the formulation. This may not irritant everyone the same way, or as dramatically as it did me since i do have an allergy to citrus - but those two things cause long term damage to your skin even if you do not notice it right away.   I wanted to love it. the 50 SPF and the way it went on had me at first but I just wanted to warn others that may be seriously sensitive to those citrus oils plus the irritant eucalyptus oil. The phototoxic citrus oil basically means that even tho you have 50 SPF on you are going to have a MAD reaction to any sunlight hitting your face. Which is why people think they are getting clogged pores from it.   Oh well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my daily go to -- quick to apply, provides sun protection, and sits well on my face. If I want a heavier coverage for an event or special occasion, I reach for something more heavy duty, but this is my daily to go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This might be my new favourite face product. I hate wearing foundation in general because it can feel so unbreathable on your skin. This however has a really nice coverage and doesn't feel like its clogging my pores. It's easy to blend with either a brush, a sponge or even just my fingers. It has lasted all night on some pretty late nights!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely hate this product! I was excited to try it because of all the great reviews I read, but was immediately let down the second I applied it. The coverage of this product is FULL coverage. I was thinking with a CC cream it would be on the lighter side of the coverage spectrum, or maybe I’m confused on what a CC cream is supposed to be. Either way, I hated the finish and even though the shade said neutral, it was definitely oxidized a pink tone. I was on spring break and got out of the pool and my friend told me I absolutely had to go to the room to take off the foundation because my face was horribly patch. Mind you, I had no setting powder on but I also was not really swimming in the pool either. I hated it but it seems to be great for others!

reviews.review_title: Heavy and Makes My Pores Look Worse
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not for me, returned after second use. My skin type: dehydrated combination skin. Issue: Asian with large pores and unevenness. But overall good skin, no major issues. This product is dry and heavy for me, and worst of all, it makes my pores looks larger and worse. Returned and will not recommend.

reviews.review_title: Not bad coverage and protects your skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is creamy and gives you pretty good coverage, the only thing I have trouble hiding is blackheads if I have any at the moment, which I totally want to hide. I also wish they had more shades because the lightest shade is still a bit dark for me, or maybe I just need to get a tan. They should try to make lighter and darker shades in the future and have a better range! But I love creams that protect me from the sun! I didn't see any wrinkle lines or dry patches that stood out for me, it was very blendable and not cakey or heavy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best concealer I have ever used.  Best consistency; melts into my skin.  Corrects under eyes shadows,

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE THIS CREAM, I FEEL COMFORTABLE WEARING THIS ITSELF.  VERY CREAMY, AND FULL COVERAGE

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is soo good! I love it, it has a great coverage

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Pricy but worth it. Best coverage of any foundation I’ve tried.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Here’s the thing...I’m very much a matte girl. I bought this for beach days and pool days. Not for everyday. I can’t believe how much I love this product. The coverage is insane and I love the dewy fresh look on cheeks so I only set my tzone. I’ve gotten more compliments on this than any of my high end matte foundations. I am so surprised to be honest that I’m making this my everyday go to!

reviews.review_title: Perfect coverage that leaves a natural glow
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The past few years I have strictly used Este Lauder Double Wear, but I have been searching for something that gives me coverage without a makeupy look. This is GOLD! I am in love. First, it smells amazing. The application is smooth and even. I do not wear any primer and I have had zero issues with this foundation moving around on my face like I had with others. It looks so natural on and makes my face legit glow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to product every day and will keep using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Easy to put on and great for every day or a a night out.  Works well with a primer and setting spray or powder!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I found this gem after noticing how amazing my friend's face looked and she recommended the product.  SO GLAD I purchased it - it's truly amazing.  It feels so nice on, doesn't smell weird, has 50 SPF (that actually works - I wore it boating!), stays all day and provides a perfect amount of coverage. I am in love.  I have spent my life trying to find a product like this - so glad I did!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Tan - light brown shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so looking forward to getting this product. I was a little disappointed in that the color was off for me. But I can tell you that it is a very good product to use when you are in the sun and in water. I am going to use it- but wish that it was a tad darker. Or I'd give it a 4 star for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Had to return it made my skin sensitive and dry out my cheeks

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: just awful. super ashy and it sits right on your skim. highlights any hair you may have...even the thinnest fuzz...i honestly dont get what the hype is all about.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination acne prone skin. Very oily on my t-zone and dry on the rest of my face. This CC cream made me break out, it looks nice and dewy on my face, but, it irritated my face at the same time.  I stopped using it for a while just to see if it was actually the CC cream making me break out and in reality it was.  I would not recommend this CC cream for those that have sensitive acne prone skin. But, then again it depends all on your skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this but found it was just okay.  It feels drying and it wears almost as heavy as my foundation but with much worse coverage.  I wish it was lighter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried for the better part of a decade to find a complexion product that works for me. I have tried every drug store product, as well as every high end product. Not once, in 8 years, could I find a foundation/tinted moisturizer/cc cream that did not separate, flake, or look cakey and disgusting on my problematic skin. That is, until I tried this. This product applies beautifully to the skin, and wears well all day long. It does not separate, the (full) coverage is fantastic, and it does not contain any ingredients that are likely to aggravate sensitive or acne prone skin. I have gotten so many compliments on my skin since I’ve started using this, and I personally feel it looks better every day that I wear it. Well done, It Cosmetics. This one’s a major win.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I Love this product! I have rosacea and it's so hard to find a foundation that covers up all my redness, but at the same time, doesn't dry me out. With this CC cream I only need to use have a pump to cover my whole face and all my redness! I am so happy with this product and recommend it to anyone with hyperpigmentation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not sure what the hype is all about. This is definitely not suitable for normal-dry skin despite being a CC “Cream”. It has a flaky finish on my skin almost immediately after application despite prepping with a rich moisturiser and doesn’t last all day even if the coverage is decent for a product in this category. Also not a fan of the fact that it has a fragrance to it. Will finish up the tube with the aid of a tonne of dewy setting spray but will not be purchasing again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like how well this blends and how lightweight it feels on. Perfect for a natural look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best foundation! I can honestly say I think it has made my skin visibly better. I have some redness and this evens it out and looks super natural. I don't think I will ever stop using this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best foundation/cc cream I've ever used. I tried dozens of foundations before finding this one and never plan on switching! I've probably purchased this 5x by now. I constantly get compliments on my skin when I wear it. It's very light, but also buildable. My skin has definitely become more healthy since wearing this. Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product and the formulation - great coverage but super easy application. I find a full pump is more than enough for a full face of full coverage (my skin is usually pretty clear). I spreA ad with my fingers first and then buff in with A brush. I like to set with Laura Mercier loose powder and then add all my extras. The sparkly formulation (pink tube) is also really nice for summer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my all time favorite foundations. I especially love this in the summer because of the spf and I find it does a really good job at protecting my skin. Other people say it’s full coverage, I don’t find that to be the case but it is good coverage that somehow manages to maintain a skin like finish. Love layering this with other cream products on my maturing skin and it just always works for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i really like the texture and tone what i dont like that its really oily likeee really

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! It's great for the summer since there is SPF in it and it's very lightweight. It provides great coverage without it feeling heavy on my skin which is what I love. It applies very smoothly to my skin and it blends very well. I highly recommend trying this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first cream foundation-been using bare minerals powders since I was a teen and I don't like the heaviness of a lot of makeup so I keep makeup minimal. So yesterday I used only powder and was checking out my pore size in disgusted resignation. Today, I applied the IT cream and then my powder and checked it out. My goodness, I was shocked and pleased to see my pores looked less noticeable! I don't know if this is normal for all cream foundations, but it's made me a believer. It's also light on my face and blends well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not sure why people rave about this product so much. I’ve used it many times and tried to like it, but it doesn’t do much for me. The coverage is pretty good, but I don’t like the way it looks after being on my face over an hour. Could be that it’s not good for dry skin, although I see people with oily skin complaining it’s too greasy for them, so not sure what kind of skin it’s good for. This seems to cake in and accentuate fine lines, as well as clings to dry patches. Overall it’s just not very flattering after being on your skin for the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Goes on nice and easy with your hands or a beauty blender sprayed with setting spray or toner.  Gives a nice summer glow and can be used for every day or going out.  A little bit goes a long way for every day use.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As with every single foundation, it matters what time of skin you have; oily, dry or combo, and whether or not you're using a primer or a setting powder. I tried this a few months back and hated it. I wasn't using a primer or a setting powder and my skin was recovering from a really dry winter/bad breakouts. I decided to give it another go. I've tried it a few different ways (with primer, without - with setting powder, without, or both.) I find it works best with a primer and no setting powder - the setting powder can mattify it, which I don't want since this one isn't matte. I really like the natural finish of this and how easy it is to blend and move around. It matches my tanned skin really well. It is important for my foundations to have good coverage and color correction, which I believe this does. It hides redness from blemishes and smooths the surface. It feels nice, too, like a moisturizer or sunscreen would. It's not too thick or gloppy. Love that it has such a high SPF, too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I still do not know if I like this foundation... because of the high SPF it has a sunscreen-like finish to it which I don't love. It has ok coverage. I am in between colours, so I feel the fair looks a little too pale, yet the next shade is a bit too dark. Would I recommend this... maybe. It's the ingredient list that got me to purchase. Just not sure if I would buy it again.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The best my skin is extremely dry and all the foundations I’ve used in the past made my skin look extremely dried out this by far has been the best foundation I’ve ever used

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this cc cream has been my go to for the last year and a half. I love the full, long lasting coverage. Fortunately the fair shade is a good match for me as the shade selection really leaves something to be desired, but if there is a shade that works for you, you are in luck! The finish is really beautiful and looks natural, as well I find that I have zero fading throughout the day (up to 18 hours).

reviews.review_title: Silver color on the tube flakes and gets on you
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product itself is great and covers well, but the silver on the tube has begun to flake off—it’s glittery and it got all over my nose yesterday! For such a pricy product i would expect better packaging. It wasn’t near water, heat or anything that would cause such deterioration. I have only had the tube since mid-April of 2019.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage is nice and looks pretty good on the skin. I did have higher expectations due to everyone raving about this product but it is decent.  If you have super dry skin I do not recommend.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was wary of ordering this because some of the reviews stated it turned their skin orange. Fortunately this is not true. Believe the hype, this product is amazing. An extremely friendly and helpful beauty adviser helped me pick the perfect shade. A must have.

reviews.review_title: Looks great at first, but always separates.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like the way it goes on and the way it feels on my skin. But for life of me... I cannot get it to stop separating around my cheek bones/under my eyes and around my nose. I have tried countless different primers, setting powders, brushes, sponges, moisturizers, baking, not baking... I’ve tried allowing it to dry before applying other products on top. I’ve asked so many times at the store what I can do differently to get this stuff to stay looking nice on my face... but it just always separates. I don’t know what to do. I like it but I’m frustrated with it. :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't know if it's just me but this foundation didn't really work out for me, which is a bummer because I really wanted to like it. It's a shame I bought the full size and not the mini. I ended up giving it to away and even then .. they didn't like. The application at first is very full coverage - it evens the skin tone and covers blemishes beautifully but after an hour or so of settling in the foundation begins to oxidize and cake, looking extremely thick it creases into the fine lines, flakes on the dry patches and begins to melt on my oily areas. From far away, the finish looks very glowy but close up I can see specks of glitter. The SPF aspect is great though!

reviews.review_title: If i could give this a 0 i would
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin that never really breaks out. This foundation made my face covered with whiteheads. A couple of hours after application i looked like a grease ball and the foundation had fully dissappeared.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best thing that has happened to my face. I read the bad reviews but I still wanted to try it.I love how light it is, I don't even feel like I have something on my face, so if you don't like having pounds of make up on your face this is for you. It covers the redness of my nose, chiks and chin area with a tiny bit. It also leaves my skin so smooth at the end of the day, which never happened with the expensive foundations that I tried before. I never leave reviews on products but I'm so happy with the results I got from this one. I'll be purchasing it again within months cause it feels like that tube is going to last forever since you just need to put a little bit on your face. I LOVE IT.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this product based off of how good the reviews were. I used the cc cream for about 3 months in total, January to March, along with the matte powder. For starters it was a little heavy and cakey on my skin, and the undertones were too yellow for my skin tone. But since I paid a good amount of money for both the cc cream and the powder I made it work. And depending on which lighting, the makeup could either look okay or straight ratchet. The powder definitely helped smooth it out. It was going great at first, but after the second day of using I noticed, while taking my makeup off, a pimple on my forehead that wasn’t there when the day began. Now my skin was not super clear I am prone to pimples so I did not think anything of it. The next night I noticed another pimple hard and slightly painful. And it seemed every night I would wear the makeup I would have another pimple or sometimes two on my forehead. When I say this cc cream broke me out soooo bad, I do not even know how to describe it. After using this my skin was the worst it has ever been in my whole life. My forehead was covered in pimples and I can’t believe it took me so long to realize it was the cc cream breaking me out. As it was the only thing I had changed or added into my face routine. After realizing I didn’t really care to find out if just using the powder would break me out, I just threw everything I bought from it cosmetics in the trash. It might work for some, but be careful because it definitely didn’t agree with mine.

reviews.review_title: I have re purchased probably 3 times?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Awesome CC cream. SPF protection at 50 is really awesome. It lasts all day. It is a bit shinier finish then I normally prefer but I just set with powder! Highly recommend. Always keep some on hand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was out in 90 degree heat for 5 hours and this looked great to the point where people were asking how my makeup still looked good. This has a nice smell and is medium coverage. Not took heavy but gets the job done. Worth the money and will continue to purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this because of all the good reviews and people that recommend it ... but!... Every time I wore it it started breaking up where I got oily so by the end of the day I looked like a cakey creasy mess. The coverage was decent and it didn’t break me out which was a huge plus and I LOVE that it has SPF- but it just looked terrible by the end of the day. Would not repurchase. Maybe someone with drier skin would really like this but normal/oily skin probably not.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loving this CC cream gives great coverage and the SPF protection perfect for the summer

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I use it whenever I feel like wearing makeup. It gives me a nice natural look while still covering my redness. Also it doesn’t seem to negatively impact my sensitive skin which is always a plus!

reviews.review_title: use a setting powder if you're oily!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this a few years ago and hated it because I was too oily for it and no primer helped. a few years later I discovered setting powder and gave this another try. SO MUCH BETTER!!! it stays in place with a natural finish. great for the summer especially with the spf. I love it! just too pricey

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_text: It protected my face, but the pigment collected at my pores which looked awkward. And it has ingredients that aren’t the best.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ever since I’ve had this it cosmetics foundation I haven’t gone back in pairs well with the color corrector as well as other beauty products for a classic vegan, eco friendly look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for an easy foundation to apply that doesn't look cakey, and this product delivers! It stays on well and provides nice coverage--not too thick, not too sheer. It is buildable and holds up well over time.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This works well for me in winters but come summer, it melts all over , tried various primers, finishing powder and oil blotters through out the day but dint help. I have combination skin and it also dried the area around my nose further instead of moisturizing it. NOT for combination skin and not full coverage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this cc cream as I like other IT Cosmetics products.  However, the cream would settle into the pores on my nose and on my cheeks no matter what primer I used.  I had NEVER had that happen before with other foundations.  It would also break after a few hours of wear. Ultimately, I returned it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have extremely dry skin, so when I tried this product I hoped that it would help! It made my skin look so cakey!!! I don’t recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Wore this to the beach for 6 hours, and got zero sunburns without reapplication! The product goes on kind of tacky, and much less matte than I want, but it’s nothing a light dusting of powder can’t fix. It also somehow makes my skin look healthy after wearing it? It doesn’t feel too thick, but doesn’t feel weightless either. But it’s definitely a great buy, when you want good coverage and decent spf!

reviews.review_title: Greasy and smudges off with slightest touch!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have super dry skin and every foundation quiz I did in the app said I would love this. it goes on extremely shiny and smudges off at the slightest touch. it is almost completely gone after 8 hours! I had high hopes because their Bye Bye Undereye concealer is amazing but it makes me look greasy and has almost no stay power past when it is applied

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Sooo I don’t know what is going on with this...pre summer heat/weather I LOVED using this. It looked perfect on my skin when I didn’t want to be super made up. Now this like skins into my pores even with a primer and just just moves around my face and I don’t understand whyyyyyy! Even with a powder over top it just moves all over. When I look close in the mirror I can just see every single pore because it’s filled in with the cc cream but the cream is no where else. My skin looks like an old school comic strip! When my skin was much drier it’s my favorite so that’s why I give it 4 stars but I wish it would work for the summer for a lighter look especially since it contains spf. Maybe the matte kind would look better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Looks cheap and cakey, feels kinda gross and transfers a lot. I would not recommend

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very full coverage but has no staying power. Doesn’t matter how much coverage you get if just tapping your face after applying can coat your fingertips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I. LOVE. THIS. PRODUCT! I wasn't too sure about it at first but now...it makes me radiant and covers so well. I am a 'woman of a certain age' so I am very careful with products that can make me appear that I'm trying too hard. I'm so glad my Sephora consultant introduced me to the  IT CC  line.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use this product everyday! I have acne prone skin and I think it’s a great way to cover up my spots! I love that it has  SPF as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this. I have VERY oily skin and I would only recommend this cc cream for someone who has dry to normal skin. It feels quite heavy on your skin and doesn’t dry down. I have dark acne scarring and I would say this only conceals about 75% aka not full coverage. This also immediately creased on my eyelids. This has a luminous finish so it will make textured skin and acne more noticeable. I would recommend getting matched in store as the Sephora color match was not accurate.

reviews.review_title: it cosmetics is quickly becoming one of my favorit
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cc cream!  It has the coverage of a foundation but is lightweight like a cc.  this is the second time I've purchased this product, which says a lot because I love trying new products.  it blends into my skin beautifully, doesn't exaggerate dry patches, and never looks blotchy or streaky.  It's one of my favorite face products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has medium coverage which is enough to cover the dark spots from acne on my face. It's so easy to blend and doesn't look like you're wearing foundation. It makes my skin look healthy and even. The SPF is just icing on the cake.

reviews.review_title: Gave me acne and dried my skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I give this a 2 star because this product gave me a rash , I guess I got an allergic reaction. Specially on my chin area , I started getting a bunch of mini bumps , mini acne on my chin that it started drying my skin. I normally have normal , healthy skin. I fell in love with this product when I first got it, but then my skin started getting really bad , I stopped using it the order days and I can feel my skin getting back to normal , maybe for others it works but for me it doesn’t.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: its really good product, but if you have dry skin like me, you will need to prep skin well before using it as it is quite thick and requires some effort to blend well. for cc cream, i was hoping for a lighter texture. i do like the spf component.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff!  The coverage is great.  I use this instead of foundation.  I bought the light shade in winter and loved it so I bought medium for summer when I’m tan.  The tube lasts a long time and makes my skin look like mine, but better.  Plus great sunscreen coverage

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Makeup is like a cream and its really hard work with it. So creamy and doing maps. Im giving 2 stars becausw I didnt get burn.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great bb cream. Goes on like a moisturizer. the only downfall is that it runs off very easily. Rest your face on your arm, you'll have a forehead mark on your sleeve. Otherwise great coverage and great bb cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great initial application and dewy look. But after a few hours of wear product felt like butter on my face. Completely melted off and looked as though I never had anything on in the first place! Not “full coverage, light weight” CC Cream as it advertised.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The finish was more matte than I expected than I expected for a natural, and it greatly emphasised the hairs on my skin. Won't bother with this one again.

reviews.review_title: In League with the Most Expensive Brands
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been wearing CC  Creme with SPF 50  for almost a year now and it's just great! It covers beautifully with a very minimal amount (a full pump is too much!). At the rate I'm going, I could get two years of daily wear out of it (like I have the it concealer). In addition to using it on my face, it is so highly pigmented that it also does a great job of covering my zipper scar from OHS. For the life of me, I don't understand how this moist and creamy product could flake as some say; maybe they are using too much?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The best, i love it! It’s light but covers amazingly.

reviews.review_title: Not a good foundation for Oily/combination skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to try a new foundation, so I went to a Sephora store, with my sensitive/combination skin, the salesperson recommended this. It does provide good coverage, and covers redness, however I found it to be heavy on my face, and as the day went on, my face felt like an oil slick. This foundation would be great for someone without oily/combination skin and it does provide sun protection, it is just not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I always find myself coming back to this foundation/cc cream. I have rosacea and this stuff covers my redness better than anything else I’ve tried. The spf 50 is a mineral sunscreen but they somehow formulated it so that there isn’t a white-cast from the zinc. I am sensitive to most chemical sunscreen so the fact that this has mineral sunscreen is a huge plus. Doesn’t clog my pores and it makes my skin look marvelous. The formula is buildable. I do find that I need to set it if I’m doing a more glam look because it stays tacky for awhile... but I don’t mind just applying it without powder on normal days. Plus, the ingredients are so good for the skin that you feel like your applying skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product works wonders. I was a little skeptical when i first bought it cause i just didn't know how well it would go with my other face products but it was amazing. Very full coverage. Within a week of using it i noticed that my face has cleared up and i have other people tell me it cleared their faces up as well. One of the best foundations i have used.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
