reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used to use this for years but believe they may have changed the formula and color base.  It is now very very yellow tinged and thick as paste.  Back to Dior I go.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very disappointed. I love IT cosmetics and this product is trash!!! This product stays on top of your skin and slips off your face. If you set it with powder it crumbles on your face. It has really irritated my skin and I’m breaking out like a teenager. I really tried to figure out how to get a long with this product and I can’t.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Tan - light brown shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly such a fan. I really wanted a face cream that offered sun protection as well as coverage. This fit the bill perfectly. Super low maintenance, I use a moist sponge to apply. Stays on all day. Would recommend

reviews.review_title: beware if you’re sensitive to smells.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Color changes throughout the day and the smell is too strong for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is mediocre.  It is good but not fabulous.  It is a bit heavier than I expected and doesn't stay put very well.  (More on my phone than my face.)

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the worst foundation/ cc cream I have ever used. I was super excited about it because of all the positive reviews, but it is terrible. It immediately looks powdery and sticks to any imperfection. It made my skin look like it was peeling and I don't even have dry skin. Do not buy this.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go-to work foundation and I absolutely love it. It actually gives me almost full coverage throughout most of my work day. I wear it to the pool every weekend and I find it easily applies whether I'm using a sponge, brush or my hands (desperate times call for desperate measures). I am comfortable wearing this by itself it just mascara for a completed look or as a base for a fuller face of makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff! Doesn’t cake up my face and it has spf which I need every day, been using it for a few months now

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I originally came in for a different foundation but the Sephora didn’t carry what I wanted so I went with this Foundation. Within a couple of hours of wearing it I could feel my face breaking out. I will not be purchasing this again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It went on like goo, then the top of my face was dewy while the bottom was chalky. I also think Medium is the wrong shade; it should've been Medium Tan. The concealer is too light also; my freckles seem highlighted.. I have better luck online than when I visit the store.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was unsure about the colour when I first put it on but it melted into my skin and created the perfect match. I have dry skin currently (pregnancy) so all my other foundations were separating. This feels so light yet offers the perfect amount of coverage. Added bonus that it has sunscreen and smells amazing. Definitely my new go-to!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pros: it’s full coverage and has sunscreen  Cons: it’s very wet and oily even with powder

reviews.review_title: Glides on and covers like a dream
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you’re looking for full coverage and an spf, look no further. This foundation applies so smoothly and covers all my imperfections. I do wish their shades were a little more nuanced as I do have fair skin with red undertones, but I didn’t find that this was too yellow for me, as I feared it might be. I have combination skin that tends towards dryness, and it glides on like a dream. A little bit of flake around blemishes towards the end of the day, but nothing too obvious.

reviews.review_title: Great for skin with larger pores, discoloration.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. I'm 40 yrs old with some melasma. This has great coverage even with not using corrector. It's full coverage without looking cakey. Use half a pump with a brush or whatever you are used to and work in small layers to achieve the coverage you want. Great natural finish, doesn't settle in my pores, stays well put in humid weather. Plus it has sunscreen! Amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not a fan of CC or BB creams, but the is awesome! Very buildable coverage and lovely finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this because it stays on all day, is a true match to my skin and it has SPF. I also like my skin to look like skin (ie not too much coverage) so it’s perfect for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very beautiful product. Medium to full coverage, and very natural looking. The SPF50 is definitely a bonus! I highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_title: Way too yellow on my skin looks scary
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Probably right for someone with yellow undertones. I need pink.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My holy grail, everyday foundation. I was always a full coverage everyday person until I tried this. It is super lightweight but still manages to even out skin and looks really natural. I have slight rosacea so it is hard to find a product that can cover my redness but this does a great job. It also lasts all day on me which is a plus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a decent product, a bit oily (I have normal skin) and too yellow.  I have three different shades to wear depending on if I have a tan or not and I have to add pink to all of them just to make it more neutral.

reviews.review_title: Love the SPF and delicate coverage
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this for outdoor use because of the SPF 50 but now I use it for all occasions. I start with a watery toner and restorative infusion so my face is slightly damp. Also I apply with a moist Beauty Blender which lets me roll and blot it on. I get natural looking coverage with no caking. People keep telling me how good I look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brunette hair

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it, although I haven’t been able to find the right shade for me; i have bought 2 different shades and still I feel It is too light for me. I love the feel and look of it on my skin, though.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product! Covers all my flaws and looks natural

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After watching YouTube videos and researching online and by friends’ word of mouth I purchased CC  cream. My first impressions were not positive but I continued to use it for several weeks to be fair. While I apply the same way every day (brush) the results are not consistent. Even using a setting spray, some days it looks acceptable and other days it’s embarrassing when I discover the makeup has accentuated dry patches on my chin and jaw line and appears “melted away” in places. It has noticeably made my pores smaller and my skin softer. But spending the money and time to apply it for hit and miss results is not a win.  I will keep looking for a new alternative.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. I have been using it for a couple years now and it has great coverage. It doesn't cake on the skin and stays in place, even in the heat.  And it takes the place of several different products and made with ingredients that are good for your skin.

reviews.review_title: Not what I was hoping for
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This wasn’t exactly what I was looking for in a cc cream. I found the coverage to be a bit heavy

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried many different types of foundations, light, medium and heavy coverage and all felt cakey and looked horrible. I tried Bobbi Brown's BB cream but it was not enough coverage. This CC cream is great! Just enough coverage- not too much but not too little. I will always buy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love it.  Wears well all day.  I work up to 12 hours some days and still look great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this cc cream years ago and i loved it. I was in a wedding so I decided to purchase it since i loved it before. Tried it the day of the wedding and it made my face look very ashy. I couldn't wear it. Had to return it unfortunately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never believe the hype when the commercials or marketing tell me that a product is full coverage yet feels weightless. This product actually lives up to that!! After ALL the foundations I've tried, it covers well, goes on so smoothly and it feels weightless and evens out my skin tone. It stays on for HOURS without caking and I’m committed to itCosmetics for life! So impressed!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this product after my previous CC foundation was discontinued. Didn’t like at first but found if applied with brush instead of fingers worked much better. Now that I have figured out the best way to apply would recommend for coverage that feels light yet covers well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new fav.  Really does a great job providing coverage and actually looks better as it oxidizes during wear.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this for coverage. It takes only 1 pump for face coverage. The tube lasts about 4 months. I'm 35 starting to see fine lines.... Sun wrinkles are also popping up. This does the job for me.

reviews.review_title: My favorite CC cream so far
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Simply love it ! Is not so heavy but covers everything and I also like the smell.

reviews.review_title: Great coverage, good for sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite foundation. Love the coverage, it's light to medium in weight and doesn't break out my sensitive skin. I blend it with tarte timeless smoothing primer in my palms and then apply as foundation together. Love, love, love these two together. I hope they keep making it forever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this on the recommendation of the sales clerk.  It goes on really chalky - maybe she sold me a color too light.  Weird how in a picture my face looked ghostly.  Returned it - no problem @ Sephora.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Always like IT CC Cream, plus it has UV protection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love that it has SPF. Very full coverage. Only need one pump for my face so it lasts forever.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really want to love this CC cream. It does not exactly keep my oily skin at bay, but it makes the oil look more like a natural glow than nasty oil.  I have hard time having this blend into my skin, with or without a primer. I use a sigma brush, yet the cream always seems streaky.   After a few hours, it looks like some of the product fell off my face.   I am still using it but combine it with another foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great light coverage (not necessarily full coverage, as advertised. more like buildable) when applied with a brush! I have very sensitive skin prone to rosacea and this covers redness nicely without making my skin act up. Not cakey or flaky, just feels like a moisturiser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like it for the SPF 50  but it was not a great fit for my combo/oily skin. Even with a setting powder, it still moved around and it seems like It has a white cast when I take pictures.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best purchase I have made in a very long time. I have been wanting to try this CC cream and very happy I finally bought it. It doesn't feel heavy or caky on my face at the end of day; I don't feel like I have loads of makeup on. Very satisfied.

reviews.review_title: Not for dry skin or use with any other product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I can't wear it with any of my other makeup because talk makes the formula separate. It shows EVERY single dry flake of skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect coverage, glowy look, spf all in one! Love it!

reviews.review_title: Great if you're looking to wear a mask of makeup.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did not like this product.  It was too heavy and looked like I was wearing a mask. I wanted something that evened out my skin without being too thick and cakey.  This wasn't it. Returned for something else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tried this one vs the illuminating CC cream, and didn’t like it as much. Much more thicker and dryer on my very combo skin (very dry/very oily) compared to the Illuminating one, but still lasted a long time. I think this is better for normal to oily skin types! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this oxidized horribly on  me. it became full on orange and the lightest shade still was barley light enough. also the foundation felt it had a weird film over it after it settles in. I was very dissatisfied in thai foundation sadly.

reviews.review_title: Mixed Feelings About This CC Cream
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off, I’m a light-to-medium skin tone so I have no idea why fair light was my closest match. Second, hydrating??? This CC cream was not hydrating for me, and I have combination to oily skin. Throughout the day, (I don’t even set it with powder because of how drying it is) it just gets drier and drier. I have no idea why and I work in an office environment, but it’s a comfortable temperature so it’s not like my skin is drying up because of cold air. When you first apply it, it looks good because i spray it with a ton of moisturizing setting sprays. I also apply it with my fingers because that seems to give the best look. I’m very conflicted by this CC cream. If you match one of the two trial sizes of the foundation, definitely buy the smaller version and try it out first.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have repurchased this product 5 or 6 times and this used to be my holy grail. I have fair skin with freckles. This product always made my face look flawless without looking cakey. Unfortunately I think they changed their formula. I recently repurchased and no amatter what I do this product seperates and looks flakey and dry. Not a good look. I am so disappointed and now and struggling to find something comparable to the old product.

reviews.review_title: Didn't love the coverage, packaging or smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I usually like a full coverage and I struggled to get that from this item. I really hate the packaging.  It is annoying to try and empty the tube.  Overall I didn't get the effect I wanted.  I eventually threw it out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have always used bare minerals but my friend recommend it cosmetics to me.. I had been having a lot of breakouts and felt in the mood to shake up my routine since I had been using the same make up for 8+ years.  I purchased the oil free cc cream and I absolutely love it! It covers so well and my breakouts have actually lessened. I have been getting so many  compliments from friends and family on my skin lately and I feel like I owe it all to this cc cream :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! It’s quite full coverage. I find a full pump is almost too much. It dries pretty quick so I recommend doing one part of the face at a time instead of going back over places because that can look cakey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this product so badly, I was hoping it would replace my current foundation. I love when products have SPF in them, however, this product continuously separated on my skin. I tried using primer, not using primer and setting with a loose translucent powder... but nothing worked. Since it was not working with my skin I ended up returning it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t get it... I have used many products from this line that successfully resolved many issues like dark circles and redness. I saw so many positive reviews for this cream and even bought the recommended brush to apply it. It sits on your face and does not blend in well. The brush exacerbated the caked on appearance. I had better results with my beauty blender. The color oxidized somewhat into a discernible orange color. This is almost like applying acrylic paint to your face- it doesn’t blend or help your skin in any way. I will go back to my Dr. Jart.

reviews.review_title: Officially made me convert to CC cream!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will not be returning to foundation. I've officially been converted to CC cream. This CC cream gives more coverage than most foundations. Not to mention - it smells like skincare (amazing)! I will say, the only complaint I have it that it is more of  a dewy finish. I'm a matte girl. As soon as they come out with a matte version, you know this girl will be all over it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Just the Best ,very easy to apply exactly the right shade that I was looking for . It smells so nice as well very good for dry skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn’t sure I was going to like this since products with spf make me breakout, but after I tried this I fell in love with it! It’s more full coverage than I thought it would be and it feels great on the skin. I wore this all day with no touch ups and it stayed the same throughout the day.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Coverage is great, little dewy though so powder is a must. I love it :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE THIS STUFF! It’s the best CC cream out there! This CC cream covers your face while actually helping your skin recover throughout long-term wear! I have been using this product religiously for the past two years since near its release date! I just wanted to let y’all know about it’s miracles! I literally only wear this, no foundation plus the concealer of my choice for the day, depending on how much coverage I want. Thanks IT, love the products from this brand! Really works well and has SPF and anti-aging serum in it! Never too late to start taking care of your skin! Highly recommend! ❤️

reviews.review_title: IN LOVE! USED FOR A MONTH WITH ACNE PRONE SKIN
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this product for a month and I am in love!! I use it on top of murad’s oil mattifying moisturizer and I apply it with a beauty blender so I get medium coverage (not full like you would get if applied with a brush) which is perfect for me. I find that it oxidizes to be darker than it applies so keep that in mind when choosing a shade. I was able to skip half of my morning routine because this is both moisturizing with spf! It goes on really well and stays on amazingly well. I am living in a humid climate with over 30 degrees everyday and it stays... even when I go swimming it stays quite well!! I am also acne prone with sensitive skin and this does not aggravate my skin at all. I don’t have to delay putting on my make up to the last second in fear of not clogging my pores for so long. I am able to put it on and feel beautiful in my skin and know that it will stay that way. Personally found it better than the bare minerals tinted moisturizer which would disappear in a few hours... which felt horrible midway through the day. Will definitely buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s hard for me to find foundations that doesn’t break me out. This has great benefits, full coverage, dewy Finnish, doesn’t break me out.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this soo much! Gives me coverage leaves my skin with a  natural dewy finish! Also, can we talk about the built in  skincare and SPF ! ♥️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this a lot. I have a cystic acne scar and this does a good job at covering it. I get a good 12 hour wear with this before it starts looking cakey. It’s light and doesn’t feel like I have makeup on .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this in an Ipsy bag and tried it again when I ran low on my usual Clinique CC cream. I felt like it gave me better coverage and looked good plus a make up savvy coworker told me it was gorgeous. I've been wearing it daily for about a week now and I can already tell a difference in my skin texture and the little wrinkles I was starting to see on my forehead are less noticeable. This is the first time I've used a foundation other than Clinique in about 20 years but I think this switch is permanent :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Looking for something lighter for everyday with radiance I picked this up. I tried this a couple times this month and it broke me out every time in abnormal places.   It also has weird radiance finish, unlike any other. Couldn’t decide if it was flattering or not in personne, but definitely not as flattering in picture compared to my other foundations.  Creases around my mouth and nose, which never happens. Returned

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So thick and unnatural! I don’t normally wear face makeup and I was hoping this would just blend and smooth but it was almost opaque. Will not buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have gone through at least 3 or 4 tubes of this. A little goes a long way, one tube usually lasts me a full year. This is my go-to base year round, super versatile, never cakey. You can apply half a pump to the entire face for the most natural coverage and thinnest layer, or a full pump or two for more higher coverage. Lasts all day, never looks cakey, and has good-for-you ingredients. This is a cult favorite product for a reason.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this CC cream. It looks good and feels good. I appreciate that it has SPF and skincare benefits. It’s definitely been my go to “foundation” in the Summer. HOWEVER, the shade “Fair Light” is straight up ORANGE. I used “Light” a few years ago and it was a bit dark, but I was tan at the time so it was okay. I went for “Fair Light” this year because I am not tan. This shade isn’t Fair in the slightest. It’s so orange I was literally shocked when I got it in the mail. It seems darker than the Light shade. I’m going to exchange it for the fair shade and pray that it works. It Cosmetics needs to work on their shade range. The jump in shade range is ridiculous. I would recommend this to anyone who can find their shade. (Photos attached are without and with flash.)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So I never take the time to write reviews but this has to be one of the best products I’ve ever purchased. It blends seamlessly, looks radiant but not oily, and stays put all day. I chose this to replace my regular nars foundation for the summer but I’ll never look back. Love it!!

reviews.review_title: love my glowy kbeauty like skin with this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Had my eye on this for years and finally caved and got it. I mix in one drop of oil and it gives me the most perfect glowy my skin but better look!!! Ive been looking for the best natural glowy foundation and this is it. It applies amazing with my fingers or I use a beauty blender sometimes. Using it alone provides full coverage but it's too cakey for me so I always mix a drop of oil :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely worth the purchase. Hands down best cc cream I've ever seen! This completely replaces my foundation, and has sunscreen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this based on reviews...Weirdest texture for a product , not smooth then looks like cakey make up face and dull , definitely returned it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wore this on vacation and by the end of a long day of walking- it still held up. Love the high SPF in it, too! Found it went on best with a beauty blender and setting spray.   Sometimes felt tacky, but dried after 10 mins or so.  Can’t use this throughout my work day though as I wear masks and glasses (healthcare) and it comes off after my first mask use.   Overall- good for a weekend spent running around or in the sun for a few hours.

reviews.review_title: All day full coverage, extremely satisfy.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased the product a couple weeks ago.  The product I have used in the past have discontinued.  For weeks I was looking for something similar with the same coverage.  After purchasing and having to return some of the brands due to break outs and such, I finally found this product.  It provides an all day full coverage.  I do use the urban decay primer prior to applying the cream.  I am glad I was introduced to this product.  On a side note, less hassle, the gal was able to match my color by using a device to my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use it everyday. It gives great coverage and I can just use a little bit of concealer and I’m good to go. I love that it has SPF too. I keep repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this while trying to ‘clean’ up my make up routine. I had used the Smashbox BB Cream faithfully for years, but I was looking for something just as good with a mineral based sunscreen in it. I would have preferred something without silicones in it too, but I couldn’t find anything with decent reviews, so I went with this.  This stuff is actually the best BB/CC/Foundation I have ever used. It doesn’t break me out, it lasts all day when I set it with powder and it looks very natural. If I apply it with a damp blender sponge, no one can even tell I’m wearing make up. The color is nice and neutral. I don’t find its too pink or too yellow so it should work for a lot of people. If your skin is really oily, I would go for the matte version, which I found to be too dry and cakey for me. I have combo skin so it does get a little oily around my nose after a while, but I prefer the dewier look this formula provides. With powder/blotting papers/primer, this foundation would work great for anyone from oily combo to dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells SOOOOO good ! Like lemonade? Surprised this is a full coverage because it's a cc cream. Works well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: my skin loves this! I look fresh all day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Slides around and cakes after regular 8 hour office workday. Color and coverage are nice but it comes off way too easily. Tried for a week and will return.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was expecting to love this with everyone recommending it to me.. but I did not.  It doesn’t matter how it’s applied, it’s cakey and shows my wrinkle lines quite boldly.  It’s very thick, and even with whatever kind of primer I try to use with it, it just doesn’t look good at all.  I have sensitive skin and this did not cause any break outs, but I very much disliked the way it looked on my face.  With that being said it might work for others, but for me it did not.  Thankfully I only got a (very large) sample.  I will not be purchasing this product.

reviews.review_title: Natural go-to product for nice skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I do love this product. I'm not a huge makeup user, I am not a morning person and definitely won't wake upp early for a full and elaborate makeup. I have mild rosacea and stress-related breakouts. I also have a somehow picky and sensitive skin. This CC cream is really great. Easy to apply, moderate coverage, leaving my face healthy looking and even. I do put some moisturizer, with a hydrating primer, before putting it. Otherwise, it has a drying effect on my skin.   After 2 months of applying monday to friday, no breakouts occured because of this product, no reaction either (little bumps, ichy or redder skin). My first tube is approaching its end and I bought a second tube; that is how satisfied I am. I did try it with a small sample before buying, and I strongly suggest you do the same. It fits me pretty well, it may not be for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new holy grail! This is not a CC cream, it's a FULL coverage foundation and it's exactly what I was looking for! The color is a true medium neutral color and the coverage is beautiful! This foundation is full coverage, blends effortlessly, hides my pores, still looks like skin, lasts all day, can be sheered out easily, and best of all it has skin care properties, which a lot of foundations do not. There is a faint citrus smell to this and it fades after you put it on. I love the smell! The only thing I'm trying to work out still is a small area just around my nose where the foundation tends to break up a little after a full day. It's not very noticeable to others, but it is to me. I don't mind it so much, I will still continue to use this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOOOOOVE This CC Cream so much! It's light weight and covers up all my blemishes and dark spots. It's perfect for the summer and beachwear as it has spf 50! I recently wore it to the beach and my shoulders were burned but not my face!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using it cc cream for a couple of years.  the last one i bought i thought was just a bad batch since it was flaking and caking on my skin.  bought a new one and it's just awful.  i dont know if they changed the formula but I'm not purchasing it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I originally loved how effortless this foundation was. I washed my face, applied my skincare then applied this CC.  As the day goes by I noticed that this product isnt doing me any favors. There are a ton of dry patches and its not really as buildable as its marketed. Once you applied more products, your pores really show. I had to add a primer cause the foundation emphasized the pores. I threw away my foundation and have to find another one that wont cause my skin to look 50 years older.

reviews.review_title: Do not buy this unless your skin is Sahara Dry!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This by far has been one of my worst investments. This product leaves a very oily base, as it does have maximum coverage for being a CC cream it is extremely heavy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: things to note:  - goes on lighter and settles a tad bit darker - used sunscreen before applying and the cream went on nice and smooth.  smelled clean and had a nice sheen finish,  - throughout the day, dried up and got cakey.  cakey by my nose and creased on my lids.  not into this and will be returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage! I put this on using my hands and a buffer brush and it covers everything perfectly. The only thing I dislike a bit is that it has that high quality kind of floral scent! The scent goes away and doesn't linger on your face so not too much to worry about!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The ONLY reason I am giving 4 stars

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Went to Sephora looking for a light feeling foundation that also had decent coverage and staying power fully expecting to be told I was looking for the impossible. I was recommended this guy by an employee but was skeptical because CC creams have never been my bag. Let me tell you, was I ever wrong! Beautiful dewy finish that can be easily mattified with a powder, super buildable, and stays on with little to no blotting during my sometimes 15 hour days. The ONLY issue I've ever had is some buildup around the nose where my glasses sit on days when I'm a little more oily.. that being said, I just run over those spots with my fingers lightly after removing my glasses and that does the trick! Will be repurchasing this guy again and again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I think it’s pretty good. I don’t have much experience with foundations or CC cream, as I don’t typically wear more makeup than a moisturizer, mascara and a discreet eye look, but I thinks it’s good!   It is full coverage though, so a little goes a long way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this has so much coverage, yet doesn't cake or emphasize  texture, the lasting power is nothing amazing but good and got a travel size in medium fades nicely doesn't become a greasy mess or fade off in patches. I would have bought this in full size as I really liked it but it broke me out in small pimples probably the oils and or spf. planning to try the matte version

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this product to take with me on vacation and I loved it! Initially I got it just for the vacation because I didn't want to take a very heavy foundation and I fell in love with it! It gives a great amount of coverage and lasts all day! I highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE LOVE THIS. However, I am very pale and even the lightest shade is far too dark for me. I have to get like 3 spray tans before its dark enough. Lucky for me I self tan a lot but it would be nice if it was lighter. But the application is so easy, a little goes a long way, the finish is beautiful. For tanned skin, I would give this 5 stars however I'm very pasty lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great product if your just looking to even out your skin tone. It’s not really a full coverage. It also doesn’t last all day, even if you powder and set. It’s expensive for a light coverage foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this product! The finish is so natural looking, that it really does look like your skin! Everyone gave me compliments when I wore it, and I got all my friends hooked on it too! If you’re looking for a foundation that is not cakey, and skin like, this is the way to go!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ugh, very annoyed with this. I want to love it, I don’t like foundation so I stick with tinted moisturizers, BB or CC creams. The coverage from this is perfect, enough to give you a nice finish without looking like a cake face from a YouTube “makeup tutorial”. I have oily skin, but the weight of this felt fine, didn’t feel heavy or like it was clogging my pores. I was also attracted to the high SPF as well as the claims of the benefits you should see over time. That said, I gave this 3 wears, used my regular moisturizer under it, second time used a primer under it, third a serum. Each wear this product just seemed to bead up and lay “on top” of my skins. It looked nasty, even a beauty blender couldn’t give this and even finish. I see that a poor experience with the texture of this product is mentioned in almost all of the 3 star and below reviews, so it’s clearly something  about how this is formulated or reacts to certain skin. Too bad, sucks to finally find a BB/CC cream that’s the right color and hue for my skins, feels good, not too much coverage then not have the texture of it work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So good!! This was the gateway product that introduced me to IT! Cosmetics. I’m on my fifth tube of this stuff. A little goes a long way. The coverage is amazing, yet it still manages to feel so light on the skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This CC cream cancels redness and is very full coverage. I docked a star for the fact that this looks very textured on my dry skin. I also wasn’t able to find a perfect color match.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My every day foundation. I love the high spf, although it does make the product really thick. I sheer it out with a wet beauty blender. And I have to be careful around my eyes, as it can crease if you use too much. I get a good medium coverage from it and I use a matte setting powder. The slight yellow tone helps me correct a lot of redness I have in my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Aside from the fact that it is almost impossible to find a decent match for most skin tones this cc cream look horrible on my skin. It made my skin look more textured and cakey than some matte full coverage foundations did. Also even though I do have oily combo skin this cc cream made my t-zone the oiliest i’ve ever seen it, it looked like it was about to slide off my nose.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVED this product, but the only problem was it was extremely hard to pick a color because they are all much darker then they appear to be. If you are a very light skinned person with a cool undertone I would definitely not go with this CC cream. But for otherwise I LOVE this!! ❤️❤️❤️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used and loved this product for years, but I'm wondering if they perhaps changed the formula in the last year or so? It used to go on beautifully and stay all day, but the last two bottles I've gotten have been a disappointment. I was thinking it might just be my own skin changing, but I have a couple of friends who have said the same thing (e.g. melting off, getting cakey, etc.). Unfortunately in the process of looking for a new go-to now.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_text: I am so happy with the cc cream. It works like a foundation without being Cakey and without making me break out!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Well, I kinda loved it at first but now it’s cracking. I don’t know why it’s separating from my skin and after 2 or 3 hours it doesn’t look good on skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This just makes my skin look so even toned and all the imperfections go away. I can’t stop won’t stop

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rich - golden brown shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I don't like the smell it has on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I gave this 5 ⭐️ as it WOWED me!  It not only has skincare ingredients for healthier skin, aging and dryness, primer, concealer and mineral SPF 50+ but it ALSO is a MIRACLE in a tube as it hides every imperfection.  Redness, signs of aging, dark spots, acne spots, pores ALL VANISH!!!  THIS IS FULL COVERAGE!  I’m very impressed.  I unfortunately ordered color: Light and when I first applied it whoa was it yellow!  The craziest part was it adjusted to my natural undertone and turned out looking completely perfect.  I’m 40 and I have tried so many foundations with no luck.  I look dry, cakey, gross... everything I’ve tried stick to my dry skin and outlined every dry skin cell on my face.  My skin was thoroughly prepped and they all made me look HORRIBLE.  ItCosmetics CC+ Cream SPF 50+ made me feel beautiful again like when I was in my twenties.  It’s awesome.  Caveat:  it feels heavy for a CC Cream and it stayed tacky to the touch so I need to lightly powder my face in which I’m not a fan as it highlights my dry skin.  Even powered my skin still looked flawless.  I used my fingers for application and blending.  I find that a damp beauty blend or quality blending brush takes the product and smears it around and a uneven application.  Try this is what I said sounds like you!  It’s worth every penny!  I’m in love!

reviews.review_title: not for textured skin or all day wear.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great color initially but it doesn’t stay at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the coverage and staying power. I like how my skin looks when I have it on.

reviews.review_title: Nice finish, but causing me minor breakouts.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this because I was looking for a foundation with less coverage, just to even everything out (I am realizing now that it's medium coverage which was a mistake on my part). I actually like the finish and the smell (a pleasant surprise for a foundation) however, I've been breaking out for the first time in my entire life since using this product. I don't know what the deal is with that, but I have pretty sensitive skin in terms of irritation and allergies. Maybe that's the problem

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I previously LOVED this CC cream.  So much that it is one of only two foundations I have ever finished a full bottle on.  I am in my 30's with occasional acne and some sun discoloration.  I wasn't looking for a foundation to give a flawless complexion; I don't like anything too heavy or make-up-y looking.  This was awesome!  It blended nicely, had great coverage (especially for a BB type cream), and didn't get greasy or creasy even when worn for the whole day.  I work outside a lot and the SPF was perfect.  I really loved everything about this.  Fast forward to April 2019 when I tried to resupply and it just isn't the same.  I am highly suspicious that they have changed their formula.  The product I got was cakey and heavy, didn't blend well, and was not very matte.  I thought maybe I had gotten a bad tube of it; maybe it had sat too long on a shelf somewhere.  Sadly, I tried a new tube from both Sephora and Ulta with the same results.  I would even have been willing to venture that maybe my skin had changed except I had just finished a previous tube of the 'original' and it worked great for me.  I loved the product before but am super disappointed that they seem to have made some changes. I wouldn't say this isn't worth trying at all, but wanted to share my experience.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff! The best out there. Makes my skin look really great. I don’t know what I even did before getting this!  I definitely recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I keep trying this product because of all the reviews, I loved that they increased the shade range for me but overall I was not in love with the product. For something that had a dewy finish, it made my dry patches more noticeable. It also never fully absorbs into my skin and sits kinda funny on the surface. I actually highly prefer the Bareminerals clear skin powder foundation over this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This broke me out after the 2nd use. I literally have lil bumps all over my face. Sigh. Please be cautious. This product has snail secretion as the 2nd ingredient. Many react to that. Now I know I am in that list. Other than the lil bumps the CC cream to me didn’t settle well on the skin. Tried it with 2 different primers and nothing worked.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was using the Bare Minerals tinted moisturizer for years and recently purchased this product.  I would say that the colour matches my skin better than Bare Minerals and that there is more coverage.  My boyfriend has made comments some days that he can see makeup on my face so I need to be careful about applying too much makeup.  I honestly don’t even use half a pump on my entire face and I blend down my neck as well.  I do find this product a bit drying so I dab some IT Cosmetics Miracle Water on my face, apply moisturizer, CC Cream, and then spray my face with the Evian face spray for extra hydration.  The dewy version of this CC Cream (purple packaging) just looks glittery to me so I will definitely stick with the original version.  I will repurchase as I have very sensitive skin and it is hard for me to find products that don’t irritate my skin.  This is also a good product with great coverage.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this foundation, although it can look a bit much on my nose and chin, so I'll just use my beautyblender to absorb some of the extra product.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has a nice tone for the my light, cool skin, and love that it has such a high SPF. I do, however, wish it had cleaner ingredients (especially for a brand that claims to provide skincare benefits) and better staying power. This is great for a few hours of casual errand running or brunch, but not for a full work day or important event when you need staying power.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the ULTIMATE foundation. I love the feel, the look, the texture, literally everything about this. What I don't love is the shade range. I wish I could rate this higher but if I wanted my exact shade in this foundation, I would have to buy two and then mix them together.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! My skin looks amazing Everytime I use it, the coverage hides most of my blemishes. The fact that it has spf is just an added bonus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The best foundation ever! i tried a lot of different foundations and nothing makes my skin looks healthy and radiant as this one! what i like about it is you don't need a lot of product for full coverage look, 3 pumps are all i need. summer is here and I'm happy this foundation has spf 50!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This would be fantastic IF it stayed on and did not transfer.   I tried for weeks to increase wear and decrease transfer. I tried different primers and different powders to no avail. Love the way it looks and all the protection it has but unless I reapply, it disappears. I have dry skin and this is still slick on my face. A makeup smear is left on whatever touches the face-fingers, phone, glasses, clothing, paper, etc.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect!!!!Love it!!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rich - golden brown shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Easy application, perfect match for my skin tone. Just wish it didn’t crease around the crevices of my nose. Other than that perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this saved my life. cleared up my skin. deserves 5/5

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Was really hoping to love this to simplify my summer makeup routine. My skin hates layers of products so was happy to see this has spf. However it does not live up to its coverage claims. It did not cover the redness of my rosacea, in fact it made my face look already sunburned because so much of my redness peeked through. Also it is very orangey and cakey once you apply it, so it made my face look red and orange lol. Will be returning sadly and continuing the hunt.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: New product for me, easy application with the recommended brush. No streaking, no oxidizing, lasting stay. It's perfect. Pretty packaging, too. One pump is all you need.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Giving this a five star cuz my auntie loves it..! She has good things to say about it

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Tan - light brown shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for those no makeup, makeup days or if you just are out running errands and just want a little something. Makes your skin look so fresh

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - natural beige shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not oily. Stays on for over 12 hours. Smooth and light coverage.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using IT CC+ cream for a number of years.  It covers and blends nicely and never breaks my face out...even when I fail to wash my face at night.  I’ve tried numerous other foundations (thinking I’d find something better) but always find myself rebuying this.  I vary from light to light- med to med depending on the time of year.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: WOW! So I have serious issues with foundation clinging to dry patches or dotting into my pores, really bringing them out! I also had issues with foundation cracking/forming wrinkle lines. This, is a freaking miracle! It really does look like my skin, it covers redness, and covers just the right amount. Doesn't look cakey at all, and feels so freaking comfortable!! Plus spf, do not underestimate the anti-aging power of sun protection! Always recommending this to my friends and family!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has become a “I can’t live without” product for me. It truly colour corrects my skin, it does not look like I have ANY makeup on and not to mention it’s also a strong SPF (2 in 1). Highly recommend this product for those who want a daily base / SPF. Just remember this is not a foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I heard great things about this product before I bought it. I was excited to give it a try. I wore it for an entire day- when i washed my face at night, I realized that I had broken out in hives all over my face. It took weeks for my skin to go back to normal.   With that being said- it works for others- just be careful and test things out before you commit to wearing new products for an entire day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What more can you ask for in a foundation! Great coverage to even out freckles and discoloration. Moisturizing and feels light on the skin. Awesome SPF coverage that actually works and doesn't sweat off in the heat. Definitely use with the IT brush, a little goes a long way!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My go-to foundation.  Creates a natural look, feels light and offers full coverage.  I love the added nutrients and the high spf rating.  I also like the extended color options.  It guarantees a perfect match.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product had very good coverage and looked as though I was wearing barely any makeup /however/, because of the spf my pores got clogged and I have now been dealing with a break out for a week+. I wish I could love this product because of its performance but make up that makes more make up necessary is a no from me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Coverage is decent, but not thrilled with the wear. I have dry/combo skin and have utilized multiple primers, switched up my moisturizer and it continues to separate and enhance fine lines. I also have acne scaring and it does nothing to mask or minimize their appearance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is glowing!! This product is a must have for any tired mommy.   I get so many compliments when I wear this foundation, best part is I almost never have to put on concealer.

reviews.review_title: Not good for super fair skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Everything about it is perfect except that it is a touch too dark and because of that, daytime use is out. It didn’t turn orange, but it’s definitely not pale enough for the palest people. The finish and coverage is perfect. They need at least one shade lighter for the fairest fair though.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a little heavier than I was expecting and does settle into fine lines, even with setting powder. I don’t think I’d try this again unless the formula was improved.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Couvrance quand même assez légère. Peut être trop légère pour camoufler les rougeurs. Confortable sans effet gras. Odeur très agréable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried this CC cream multiple times, and unfortunately it hasn’t worked on my skin. I’ve tried applying with a beauty blender, brush, and my hands. Either way it ends up looking cakey, streaky and starts melting after a few hours, even with setting powder. I really wanted it to work, but had to return it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product, I love using this everyday and it work wonders, The thing Sephora people recommend wrong  shade kind of to dark but i like to buy it back in 2 shades light.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation and so does my skin. The only problem I have is that when I don't set it - it wears off and smudges around in under 6 hours. If I set it - I end up looking dry and crumbly after 6 hours. BUT before you hit the 6-8 hour mark it looks glowy and GREAT.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was searching for a new foundation with SPF, so I tried this product. After 1 week, I have good and bad points:   Good points: I'm a brunette but my mother is a redhead so I have very light skin with a bit of freckles. I have more redness in my skintone, but I think the Fair was perfect for me...even if, yes, it is more yellowish. I love the finish and it has a slight glow. Overall, I like the look on my skin; looks a healthy skin!  Bad points: I hate the texture, it is so firm for a cream! I think it is very difficult to apply and feels like it dries instantly...I guess it's because of the SPF. I've never tried other foundations with SPF so I can't compare!  Also, is it me or it smeels like lemon!? But not so fresh lemon haha not sure I like the smell!  So overall, I'm not sure if I will rebuy yet! Maybe I will have to try other SPF foundations to compare! Someone know a better product?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My fav for summer for sure!!! It is very light, not high coverage but thats good enough. It seems last pretty long to me so far. My skin is oily

reviews.review_text: I use this as my everyday foundation. I love that it gives me a smooth complexion without looking too heavy. It's moisturizing to boot. I feel like I've tried 100s of foundations, but this is one I keep coming back to. I wouldn't suggest it for full coverage, but it's not just a tinted moisturizer either. It's a great balance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Didn’t like it the first day I wore it. I used my Clarisonic foundation brush head instead of a beauty blender and now love it for daytime light/medium coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best foundation I have ever used, and I am now on my fourth bottle. The coverage is a solid medium, but can be sheered out or built up effortless, without ever getting patchy, or cakey. The light lemon scent is pleasant and dissipates quickly, and it never breaks me out. The most impressive part of this product is that regardless of how much you put on, IT LOOKS LIKE YOU AREN'T WEARING FOUNDATION! Even when I get up close with my magnifying mirror after layering it up, I still cant see it on my skin. I would say that this foundation lasts pretty well on me throughout the day, and wears excellently under my other products. I keep trying samples of other foundations just because I love to try things, but nothing has ever come close to this one.

reviews.review_text: Love the coverage it gives me. My skin looks flawless eventho it’s not.

reviews.review_text: I love this product so much.  I am 40 but don't wear a ton of make-up.  The level of coverage is exactly what I am looking for, it provides great colour correction as promised, and it feels great on my skin.  Its amazing.

I used to have to mix a couple different ones today to get the coverage and texture I liked. I use one small coat of this and it does everything I've always looked for! It doesn't feel heavy, covers everything without making it look like you're wearing a ton of makeup. I will be buying a lighter shade for summer to throw on while at the lake!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

If I were to name it I would call it medium, possibly medium-light, but there is no way the word fair should be anywhere in it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect shade and undertone

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A bit dark and undertone too golden

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive skin that can't handle most products (especially if they contain perfume/parfum) without going red with irritation. My skin also burns really easily. I went on the hunt for something with good coverage and good SPF since I have several summer weddings to go to and this beat all other options. It is comfortable to wear, offers great sun protection, and looks really nice on. It has a citrus blend scent that is subtle and fades as you wear it; fortunately it didn't cause my skin any irritation! Would recommend asking for a sample first to try at home and to help you color match (I didn't find any oxidation or discoloration occurred after 8 hours of wear). Will buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best CC cream I have ever tried.  Great coverage, last all day, dont break me out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Have been using this product for over 5 ears and will not use anything else. Tube last for a long time and stays on all day!! Plus it has SPF50!! Goes on very smooth and don't need a lot and blends well will my skin,  I do change colours especially in the summer months. Hides blemishes and wrinkles are less visible, Great product!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a holy grail. It has multiple benifits with its added serum sunscreen ingredient that provides hydration for smooth texture, and enhances the look of brightness. I'm not kidding when i say this literally has made my skin clearer. When i take it off at the end of the day my skin is refreshed, hydrated and clearer. BUY THIS if you have sensitive skin like me, it has caused 0 problems. For me this product works as makeup, acne care, and skin protectant. It looks flawless on, this stuff really is your skin but better!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new holy grail foundation. I love that it has so many anti-aging ingredients and one of the highest SPFs that I could find, all while providing flawless, all-day, full coverage. It smells lovely, goes on like a dream, dries to the perfect natural matte finish, and lasts all day long. I have oily skin so I have to use a fair amount of setting powder and setting spray, and I still notice it settling into my creases at times. But, I'm convinced that with my oily skin, this is probably a necessary evil and this one is far better than any other foundation or tinted moisturizer I've tried. It still looks flawless at the end of the day with no touch ups required!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan - warm to neutral undertones

reviews.review_text: Love this foundation. It has full coverage, it doesn’t cake. It doesn’t pull on the skin and it has a good spf.

reviews.review_text: I really love this product.  I tried both other finish versions and this was my favorite. The matte felt a bit drying and the glow version just had too many sparkles for me. A little bit of this product goes a long way, I only need half a pump to cover my entire face. It applies well with a brush or my fingers, I have not tried a beauty blender yet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy using this product during the summer because of the SPF and the consistency. I use my fingers to apply this over my moisturizer, and even though it takes forever to blend out, the final finish looks nice. This CC cream has nothing unique to it and I would not necessarily say that it’s a must have.

reviews.review_title: Can't go back to anything else
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love it so much. It seemed to shrink my pores and reduce fine lines over time using it. I love the SPF in it and I love the tone (more yellow and neutral).

reviews.review_title: the product name says it all
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product for several reasons 1)weightless texture on the skin 2) blends seamlessly  3)protects my skin and improves texture as I’m wearing it 4) great for people who don’t like foundation but want a more even tone. 5) SPF is always a good idea and now I don’t need to buy a separate SPF for my face this summer. 6)it lasts all day with setting powder/mineral powder on top. 7) you don’t need an exact colour match as it seems to colour adjust as it melts into your skin. 8)the finish is very natural, a Demi-Matt and non-drying...it really looks like “my skin but better “ 9) a little goes a long way- half a pump can cover your entire face, a full pump requires a little more blending 10)brush, blender or hands all work the product in beautifully, hands are the best though-really melts the product in. 11)good for any age-because SPF and anti-aging is always a good idea even in your 20’s.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

It has cleared up my acne, redness, discoloration, and covers all blemishes with out suffocating my skin. It has just worked true wonders for me, and it leaves a dewy finish and even being oily (which I am) it does not leave me greasy throughout the day, truly an amazing product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolute love this product! Full coverage, hydrating, and leaves my skin dewy and not oily all day long!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

Flash Forward and I dont know if they changed the formula or what but its gross now. Its thick and cakey and it cracks and looks bad. I really just wish I could get into a time machine and buy every single one because I loved it.

reviews.review_title: Looks great but broke me out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
