reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing full coverage, blends easily and looks natural. Super easy to apply and lasts all day! Love that it has skin care build into it. Amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: People around me commented that I look different, positively, but they hardly tell what's it, because my face looks bright with even tone very naturally!   It's easy to apply, the only offset is the brush is expensive to get, I'm still looking for any other suitable brush to use.  Suitable for me as I'm so lazy to apply too many layers like sunscreen, foundation etc early in the morning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this product. my friend uses it and her face looked amazing! I tried it out, at first it looked good but it def doesn't last the whole day. idk if its because I have dry skin but now it looks terrible when I wear it. My face looks like its cracking and emphasizes how dry my face actually is instead of hydrating my skin. I do like this foundation and recommded it to people who have oil/combo skin. It applies very nice, it just wasn't for me. I just don't think I have the right skin for it which sucks :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was a long time Tarte user and recently decided to try to branch out. I first tried Hourglass but it was not for me. Sephora recommended this one and I absolutely love it. Great coverage, light finish and not heavy. I also feel good that it is anti-aging and SPF 50 . I am so happy with it. It also will last for a long time as you don't need much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample and I really liked it. It has a citrus smell to it which I love. It does not break me out. Very gentle on my skin. Medium coverage. Stays all day with a primer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage is nice. Only thing is that it has a really limited shade range. The lightest shade they have is too dark for me :(  Gonna have to return and I’m so sad. It’s impossible to find a cc/bb cream when you’re super pale or super dark.

reviews.review_title: Pretty (if you aren't allergic to it)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I truly wish this worked for my skin. I've tried it a couple times (once when it first launched and again recently) and have always had the same results. It looks beautiful on the skin-- it has great coverage, adds moisture, but doesn't feel heavy. It's an easy product, you don't have to work to hard to blend it and get it looking even and smooth. But every single time I apply this, by the end of the day my face is broken out in hives and it takes upwards of a week to recover afterward. Every IT Cosmetics product does this to me and I keep trying them and hoping something will change. I do have somewhat sensitive skin but very few products have irritated my skin the way their entire line does. Such a bummer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I previously used Tarte Foundation, which I still love and recommend however I heard this is one of the best foundations for your skin.... and it is. It makes me look natural and beautiful! Not a single breakout in two weeks. I was skeptical about it being CC since I am a full coverage girl, but it is full coverage! Love Love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this but it looks horrible on me. It looks cakey and emphasized every pore on my face. The color is also orangey.  Definitely not for me.

reviews.review_title: AWFUL, NOT FOR THOSE WHO HAVE ACNE   VERY OILY
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly, I've tried this product a few times now a few weeks a few months ago and again a few days ago. With that said, I can confidently say that this product is not good for those who have ACNE!!!!! It causes me to breakout instantly --> LOOK AT HOW MANY INGREDIENTS ARE IN THIS PROUCT GUYS, THIS CANNOT BE GOOD FOR YOUR SKIN REGARDLESS OF ITS PROMISES! Additionally, it makes you SOOOO oily, I do not like this product and would never reccomend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have light (not fair, not med) skin with a yellow undertone, and I got this in light. When I first put it on, it looked like a very opaque mask, although I used just a pea sized amount. Had to wipe off half of it to look human, then wondered if I had true SPF 50 coverage with so little of it on.Within a couple of minutes it turned dark and very orange, with a dry, cakey look and feel.  The only reason I gave it 2 stars is because it has SPF 50 and might work if you like heavy coverage and a heavily made up look. Order a shade lighter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Light-weight, yet full coverage PLUS SPF +50! Perfect for the summer! So many different shade

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love It cosmetics! Amazing coverage with glowing finish, and I swear it looks the same at the end of the day as it does when I first apply it. This product has also eliminated a lot of steps for me. Now after I cleanse I just use the First Aid Beauty face serum and apply my It foundation.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Did not work for me. I have oily skin and it separated on my skin and looked horrible.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is *the bomb*. I have found that my skin has improved tremendously since purchasing this product. This is the one foundation I find my myself purchasing again and again.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Your Skin But Better CC+ Cream with SPF 50 is a decent product. Its buildable, has good coverage, a nice consistency, blends well, and makes a good canvas for other products. Additionally, it is a good all-color corrector, without needing separate products for redness, dark circles, etc.  However, it transfers terribly without setting powder. It starts out a bit powdery if you're not well moisturized, but then ends up at the end of the day looking cakey and a bit oxidized. It spreads if you put too much on and are very oily. A really good primer helps, but doesn't solve all the problems.   Also, SPF 50 seems a little excessive (and is part of the powdery problem). Sunlight is good for you, but such a high SPF blocks out ALL the good stuff!  I probably won't buy this one again. It's decent, but there are better foundations at the same price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: my face looks great wearing this cc cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far the best CC cream I’ve tried. I have fair/light tone, rosacea history, blemish-prone, sensitive skin with fine lines upon smiling. I’ve previously tried smashbox CC cream, neutrogena CC cream, benefit CC cream. None have worked as well as this. It lasted all day, even with my oily t-zone, and through my HIIT gym session which was extra sweaty. I was so surprised it stuck. I haven’t noticed any breakouts since using it and it also smells great and feels dewy. SPF 50 is a plus plus!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Decent finish and I love the sun protection but this stuff oxidizes terribly and I look orange every time. I’ve tried light and fair light and both make me an oompa loompa

reviews.review_title: The one and only product my face will ever need!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am in awe of this product. A blogger recently recommended this so I immediately ordered and I am shocked at how amazing my skin looks and feels. I have super rosy cheeks and wear estee lauder double wear most days to hide the redness. I love that now I can wear a much lighter product that fully COVERS the redness and has 50  SPF! This is a holy grail product that I now cannot live without! Run do not walk to get this product ASAP!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Pros first: I love the SPF and the blurring quality this product has. CONS: I did the color match on the Sephora app and got Medium. I also went into a store and had an employee color match my face and got Medium Natural. I bought both figuring I could rotate them in summer/winter but honestly both come across really fake tanner orange on me. The biggest issue is that the cream does not “set” at all and stays wet on the skin. I swatched the back of my hand and even 4-5 hours later, I could touch my other arm to the back of my hand and the color transferred over and could be smeared around the back of my hand. If you hug someone or blow your nose, this stuff will come off of you. And finally, the coverage isn’t awesome being that it’s a CC cream, so don’t buy it for that purpose.  Neutral: Also it smells like sweet lemons??

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only foundation I have tried that lasts a full shift in dry hospital air while still providing great coverage and without drying out my skin. Amazing!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation! Perfect amount of coverage, yet feels like you’re not wearing foundation at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this CC cream since it's such a cult classic, but it just doesn't agree with my skin. I have tried every combination possible with different primers and moisturizes, and no matter what I do I can't seem to make this work. It immediately looks cakey and emphasizes texture and after 2 hours of wear it completely wears off on my cheeks and around my nose and clings to every single pore and dry spot - it looks terrible.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this is my go to cc cream. i used to always wear foundation but i switched to a cc cream and it’s the best. it’s so light but has a good amount of coverage and has a rlly nice glow. it works well when it is applied with a beauty sponge but i prefer it with my fingers

reviews.review_title: Best CC cream I have ever tried
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this CC cream on a whim before a vacation to Jamaica - I was looking for something with high SPF and the sales associate recommended this CC cream over my usual. I tried it out at home before my trip, and noticed the difference in quality immediately.   The product comes out as a buttery cream that feels fantastic on the skin (you really notice the moisturizing effect after a few days in the sun, too). The coverage is great and it stays in place all day, even in splashing water. I did find it can start to look a little bit shiny in the sun, but that's easily fixed with some powder.  I'm almost done my bottle now, and one thing I have noticed is the pump. Most CC creams come as a squeeze bottle, but this one has a pump located at the bottom of the tube, which makes it easier to get out every last drop.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a sunscreen that would even out my skin tone.  However, on my skin, this product feels more like a mask. If you want heavy foundation to cover discoloration it might work for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered this product to moisturize and guard against the sun this summer but it just didn't perform like it should on my dry to normal skin. I have small pores but when I put this on they were huge! It also clung to all of the tiny hairs that I didn't even realize we're on my face. I tried applying it with a brush, my fingers, a damp sponge. It made my face look awful. Definitely returning it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down my favourite tinted serum hands down. You can control the coverage and dewiness easily. I personal apply it with my fingers and it always looks so natural!   But one thing to keep in mind is if you want to apply a setting powder after, wait a bit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I use it every day now instead of any foundation. It gives me good coverage and I just use some concealer where I need a little extra. I like that I can just use a little and it'll give me some coverage and even out my skin tone and I'm good to go... Or if I'm going out then I'll just put it on a little thicker. Love that it's SPF 50  too so it's perfect for every day protection.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Really enjoying this product. I don’t wear a lot of make up and this is light enough to get good coverage and can still be layered on to provide more if needed. I also love the sunscreen and color correcting properties. I tend toward red tones in my skin and this evens me out. Smells slightly of menthol to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product!! After years of trying different brands to find the right amount coverage for my skin, in my skin colour- this is it! I’ve finally found it! Please don’t ever stop making this. The shade “Light” is a perfect match for my skin. I find with a lot of foundations you can often tell where the makeup begins on my skin... I don’t get that with this. Plus, it’s very natural looking too. It’s not cakey and my skin doesn’t feel heavy with it on.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Suchhhh a must have! It’s perfect for dry skin, and while it’s full coverage, it has a smooth natural look! Lasts throughout my day & I couldn’t brag on this product enough!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the light coverage and brightness

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the coverage this gives and it feels very lightweight! It covers all my acne scars and any redness I have. I usually don’t put concealer on after this unless I’m feeling extra. The only con would be the fact my face gets oily and i don’t like a matte finish so when I do wear this for a very long period of time my oiliness shows but its definitely tolerable in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Probably the only person in the world to hate this CC cream, but I do. It is soooo sticky, feels like a mess in your face. Hard to blend and for it to look natural, very oily.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love love this foundation. I am seventy three and this foundation makes my skin look fresh and dewy.  I have very dry skin  it does not cake.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: SPF definitely works. Got sunburned everywhere besides my face. I like this on my uneven acne prone skin, and enjoy the look of the finish more than Fenty Beauty. Fenty beauty is too drying. This gives a natural finish. Have been using about a month now. Foundation looked even better on me when I was travelling to a location that had a warm climate. Random but true

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Three stars for the SPF and the formula but not for the shade! A Sephora employee suggested i should get the shade “fair” and I tried it on in the store on my face thinking it was okay. When I got home I tested it in natural light and it’s really not made for people who are super pale/ghostly like me. May work for you in the summer if you tan but i don’t, sadly. Wish it was lighter!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm really shocked this is so highly rated. There is nothing I like about this product. Coverage is thick and I despise the strong smell. Not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first product I've ever returned to Sephora. I gave it a good run, tried it on and off for a few weeks. I have combination skin, and this made me look and feel oily. In addition, it started clogging my pores and by the end of the day was doing a weird separating thing (separating into blotches, especially on my forehead). I ended up layering it with powder and concealer, which completely defeated the point since I chose a tinted moisturizer so I could wear less makeup in warmer months. I gave it two stars instead of one because initially it looks great on. It also might be better for dry or mature skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this was a good color match for me. I use Chanel beige 30 aqualumiere foundation. light/med skin with yellow undertones. however the product is too dry for my skin and accentuated the texture at the end of the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Liked this product. Looks natural but covering blemishes at the same time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Matches my skin tone, very light, smells perfect. Only downside is not very long lasting. Still better than most of the products in the market.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pros: Coverage, spf, color Cons: Broke me out, got cakey mid day

reviews.review_title: Use it everytime I wear make up
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I used to buy bb creams from CVS and target and when I upgraded to Sephora Makeup this was my first staple. I feel in love with them cc cream! It's great for a natural look and covers all skin redness, freckles, and other discolorations. I like using this as my foundation because it isn't too heavy or cakey, it is buildable and a good base for adding contouring/bronzing ect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell and coverage! I will definitely ditch the foundation, been using BB

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I stay pretty neutral and natural with my makeup, so this was a perfect match for me! I don't really have acne or anything, so my skin really just needs a more even color (I have some acne scars and broken capillaries on my face). I love that this is light and not cakey feeling or looking. If you want a more full coverage look I suggest using a beauty blender or beauty sponge, especially with a drop or two of a face oil you like. For my everyday look, I prefer to use it with foundation brush from the uncomplicated brush set from sephora. It gives me exactly the look I love of natural but more airbrushed and pore-less looking. It can give you whatever look you're going for, stays smooth and feels clean on the skin. It doesn't rub off on clothing which is a major bonus for me! Plus I love the SPF and antioxidants that are in there too. I will be purchasing again!

reviews.review_title: This is the best product ever
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best product ever  Just amazing coverage, blends easily, and so light on my face! I’m obsessed!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is perfect for sensitive skin. It has a little shine to it so recommend using a powder to set it a bit other than that it has a light to medium coverage. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! Has great coverage and feels so light weight on my skin!

reviews.review_title: I hope they get a better shade range :(
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to try this one out because so many people love it so much but unfortunately even the lightest color is way to dark my ginger skin.    It's very orange.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this product for many reasons.  First, it provides SPF without feeling heavy and greasy.  The smallest amount of this product goes a long way.  Originally, I received a sample of this so I was not sure how much one pump would cover.  I used a full pump this morning and had WAY too much product.  I only need half, if that.  I have found that when I apply it with a primer it tends to look cakey, which is strange so I have found it looks best on moisturized skin without a primer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love! This product can be put on with your fingers and blends so smoothly into your skin. It literally looks like your skin but more even. I mix it with thicker foundation if I want more coverage but most days it’s perfect on its own. Does have a dewy finish but it’s easily buffed out with powder if you want more matte. It has a really good selection of shades as well. I love using this with the waterproof IT concealer! Gorgeous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect everyday foundation. You can use it during any season, preferably use it during winter when my skin is super dry. The only bad thing it is that it makes my skin greasy after a few hours, but only when I use it over 14 hours in a day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I gave it 2 stars because it really is incredible coverage, however it sadly caused my skin to develop a very bumpy and uneven texture and even caused me to breakout. I so badly wanted this to work, but at the end of the day my skin was not happy with something in this product. So buyer beware. Took my skin some time to get back to normal after I stopped using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing!! A must have!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pros: great for dryness and oiliness (if you set the oily spots) buildable coverage hydrating your skin, but better long lastingt low maintenance   cons: shade range is way too small.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I did not like this product.  It made my skin break out and often looked chalky by the end of the day.  It didn't help that the lady matched my skin color wrong.  This went back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's exactly what a needed: a light-coverage cream. Just evens out the skin while adding some extra moisture. It's not going to be full coverage like a foundation but that's what I personally like, I like to have my freckles show through and not look like I'm wearing a mask of foundation. It's very skin-like.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Tan - light brown shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the coverage! Blends in well, and feels very light on my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay i really do love this product. It is definelty not full coverage (I'd say its natural/medium) but layering it will help. A little does go a long way! My face is not really broken out but it is oily and this product works well with my skin. This product helps my face look even and soft. It doesn't crease if you set it! I really do recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very full coverage product but I like to just use a little bit and rub it onto my face with my fingers and it looks very natural and feels light.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For a CC  cream this has a solid medium coverage with one layer. When I use this product, I'm using it solo as my base product or I mix it into a more sheer product (tinted moisturizer, etc.) to create my own blend of coverage. Sometimes I use this as a concealer too. It works!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If could give this 10 stars I would. I love the coverage that it provides while not feeling heavy or looking cakey. It's a must try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product applies nicely and if you blend it out with a beauty blender you can get more of a natural look which is pretty. However, I've tried both shades fair and light and for some reason no matter what I do or how I applied it, after a few hours I notice it looks pretty ashy on my skin and makes me look quite dull. I'm light skinned with a light golden to neutral undertone. I understand this is a CC cream and has SPF but this ingridents list is ridiculously long and I personally don't want that on my face almost daily.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best CC cream ever!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this product. I’ve seen a lot of positive reviews about it. Unfortunately it did not work well on me at all. It sat on top of my skin instead of melting into it, if I touched it the product would slide right off. I tried it without primer, with different types of primers and nothing helped it stay put. To make matters worse it gave me the worst breakout I’ve ever had in my life. Idk why but this just did not agree with my skin at all, which sucks because I was really excited to use it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The sephora make up artist matched me with a color that ended up being too dark for me. I broke out within 2 days of using it. I continued to use it for 2 weeks and the acne worsened. Highly disappointed. Unfortunately threw away my receipt and don't know how to return now.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So thankful that i don't have to wear heavy foundation anymore, this CC cream is my go to. As a skin junkie, I appreciate the sunscreen in here!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of my two favorite foundations. Perfect coverage you and sheer out or build up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: All I can say is wow! I've used Mac Matchmaster for years, and I've always liked the finish. I got a gift card from my daughter, and since I was out of foundation, I thought I'd go to Sephora and see what my options were. The girl who helped me suggested this after I told her I wanted something with medium to full coverage, buildable, offered sun protection, didn't dry my face out, and doesn't look cakey. She came back with this and I loved the way it made my face look and feel. It gives such a natural finish that it looks great on it's own. I don't use powder, and my skin is combo with my main concern being aging. I bought a tube of it, but thinking I may get the kit next time.

reviews.review_title: Previous fav. product, but recent color change?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this daily for about a year and a half, and am only now starting my third tube! I love how highly pigmented this is, and therefore how much coverage this offers, without looking like a full face of foundation. The SPF 50  is a huge bonus too. If you're looking for a matte finish, this isn't the product for you, but I prefer a dewy finish and this is great—plus, despite its finish, it has great staying power without needing a setting powder. I removed one star because I think the formula was tweaked since my last tube. I have porcelain skin with yellow undertones and Fair used to be a great match for me, but my new tube is a bit deeper and warmer in color than my previous ones and no longer matches my skin well, which is a major bummer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I struggle with acne and dry skin and this is the very first foundation I have found that gave me beautiful glowing skin! I found it to be a nice, medium to full coverage. The only thing I didn’t like was it gave my skin a little bit of a sheen, but I just used a mattifying setting powder and it looked fine.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Didn’t do anything good for my skin, it transfers really easily and creases a lot.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like the coverage, but this goes on very thick and I'm not sure how great it is for skin that tends towards dryness. I have normal skin most of the time but sometimes dry, and it's not very hydrating. Just a heads up! It does have great coverage though, and looks good on fair skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: While I love IT cosmetics I can’t give this purchase 5 stars. It was a bit cakey and lighter in color than the illuminated version.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this CC cream for well over a year and I love it. I must have tried a dozen different foundations, BB creams and CC creams at Sephora before finally landing on this one in one of the classes. The colour matches me perfectly and doesn't irritate my skin. I found that other ones either felt oily, caked on to my skin, had visible streaks, melted off partway through the day or caused me to breakout. I have light, sensitive skin prone to redness and this product caused no issues and created an even tone covering the redness. I also love how it has the 50spf.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combo skin with an oily t zone and dry cheek area. I DID NOT LIKE that it sets in a weird way onto craks and pores, making the skin look super fake up close. It's not as natural finish as I expected from a CC cream, more like a difficult-to-blend foundation. It does make you look flwaless in selfies and pictures from afar, so... silver lining I guess. I mix it with a drop of a face oil to make it more blendable. That seems to help with application.  I do apply with a brush.

reviews.review_title: Almost Perfect but poor color selection
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my fourth tube of this stuff, so obviously I love it. I love the SPF and added skincare benefits. I use 1 pump and spread on with my fingers then set with hourglass translucent powder. Covers redness, discoloration and melasma. It works great under the eyes. I stopped using concealer. The only problem is the color selection is HORRIBLE. Please make a fair/light shade with olive undertones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect CC Cream. Blend nicely.the color is a perfect match and no breakouts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent product!  I apply with a brush and alittle goes a long way. Gives a natural finish

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The foundation looked okay when first applied but after only 2-3 hours was separating on my face around my t-zone. I applied mainly with my fingers because it looked best that way. I found that using a sponge just took off product when I tried to build up any coverage. Using a brush (that I normally use for foundation) made it look streaky and didn’t have as much coverage as with my fingers.  It smells pretty gross. When you first apply, it smells kind of lemon-y (but not in a good way), and at the end of the day, it has a weird latex kind of smell like an old balloon.  I picked the color based on a foundation shade matcher, but it was a bit too dark coming off of winter. It would probably match during summer though.  I will not be repurchasing this product, but I might try the matte version.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the coverage! It also doesn’t require very much product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I decided to give this foundation a go 2  years ago and haven't looked back! I have tried some others just because of hype and keep going back to this one. It's smooth, gives great coverage, and blends well. The fair/light matches my skin tone perfectly. It's just dewy enough to give you a nice glow, but not so much so that it makes my combination skin look oily. Some setting powder will take any shin down though. I have used different ways of applying (brushes, sponges, fingers, etc.) and I find a damp beauty blender is the best. My only downside is if you don't use a good setting spray it can crease a smidge in my smile lines and around my nose. But it's not too bad and would never stop me from using this foundation. I would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Keeping moving! This product causes your face to be oily shortly after even with the best primer. Does poor coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect coverage for my uneven skin tone!  Finally found a base that I love thanks to a fantastic Sephora employee that listened to me explain what I wanted and delivered!

reviews.review_title: nice coverage but settled and oxidizes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like this foundation but it does settle into my lines especially the forehead and around my mouth. the smell is a bit like sunscreen and stays strongly throughout the day. it did slightly oxidize on my skin but the finish where it doesnt settle in very nice!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and I didn’t like this product at all but, heard rave reviews so I had to try - it looked like a mask on my face.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is too thick. Unless you like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This covers beautifully with my blending brush, conceals minor blemishes and discoloration perfectly without making me look like I have a lot of makeup on. Just really like the natural finish of this medium weight foundation. Love that it has 50 spf, too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this for sunscreen mostly. Really like it. Can’t say it works getting rid of my hyperpigmentation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this to replace my beloved Smashbox CC cream that has been discontinued at the salesperson's suggestion.  It does not compare.  It is thicker and not glowy.  It is more like a base than a CC cream.  Would like to take it back - but too much trouble.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love and love some more !!!  Matches perfectly ! Is very light weight. Which is perfect for me because I hate heavy coverage. Doesn't make me break out. I am just so in love!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is good foundation / CC cream.  I mix it with primer before applying.  The tube lasts a long time!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really don’t like it way too oily for my skin

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It was too heavy for me... it did blend well, so for someone who is used to heavy foundation they would LOVE this product it has good coverage and lighter then foundation, but just not right for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to love this foundation but it was SO ORANGE! I’m not sure if the formula changed.  I tried to use the smallest amount possible but it just didn’t work.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Comparable to MAC Mineralize Moisture liquid foundation but better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My mother and I both use this product. I’m in my 20s while she is in her 50s. Provides great coverage that is buildable. I usually use 1 pump and find the coverage to be perfect for that no makeup, natural look (I don’t have issues with acne though). Can be built up for a more full coverage look.   The SPF in it is fantastic! My mother wore this on her face and forgot sunscreen on her chest. Her chest was quite burnt while her face was completely fine. This is not to say you shouldn’t use sunscreen, always use sunscreen.   I just wish the shade range was better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Applies well with full coverage but is very Carley very quickly. It looks very patchy and dry

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been struggling with finding a good foundation since my skin chemistry changed and all of my old foundations make my skin look dry. I've only used this twice now but wow I love this! My skin looks healthy and no cakey and dry and the coverage is just what I need.

reviews.review_title: It’s okay.. comes off super easy. Too easy.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This actually sat decent on my skin but I noticed it rubbed off really easily. I’m talking so easy that if I had an itch (it’s allergy season), it would come right off!!! I was also matched wrong via the online matching tool. So the product I tried was actually way dark on me. I ended up having to return it. The Sephora employees I had worked with were amazing and such great help. I might try this again one day but as of right now I’m good. I need something that will actually stay on but I do love the consistency of this product. I just wish it actually stayed on.   I’m technically supposed to have the fair instead of neutral medium and have neutral toned and combination skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been in search for a foundation that I actually liked for several years. A few months back, I started getting eczema flare ups on my face (which has never happened before), so all my other foundations (which are more matte) started looking bad on me. I started using this foundation and it looked a lot better than my other foundations. This is still my everyday foundation, and I haven't touched my other foundations in a long time, despite not having any serious flare ups within the last two months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love was recommended by a Sephora worked when I told her what I currently used which was a mix between Dior Airflash and Chanel ultra longwear and Armani luminous silk but some reason my skin was still dry so she had me try this on with some primer and you can no longer see my dry skin patches on my face and looks Natural and beautiful coverage !!! Will be buying again

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: This foundation was ok. Used the shade finder but it came and was dark on my face when I didn’t have a tan. Blends well. Doesn’t smell good and also if you touch your face at all after you apply it, it wipes off super easy. Not a huge fan and won’t buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I think it does best with oilier skin than very dry. Even though it is supposed to be a cc cream, it does settle in fine lines if you are already dry. I can double moisturize and get away fine with it. The coverage is thick, so apply much less than you think you’ll need at first. I did not do that and looked cakey due to the level of full coverage it gives. Using half the amount was perfect coverage. I think one full pump was too much for my face. I do apply it so lightly I’m probably not getting the sunscreen benefit to the fullest so I am thinking of getting a new sunscreen to go under it. If you use like me a tube will last forever. I think normal, combo, and oily should try this since I have to have my skin almost greasy looks prior to application. I learned I cannot use my fingers for this as it goes on too heavy. I use a foundation brush from real techniques and it’s very smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It really is your skin, but better! It has good coverage and is the only thing I have found that really evens out my skin tone and covers redness. When I have a breakout, it really reduces redness and acts as a nice base for concealers. It’s also really great on its own. It has a nice natural and dewy finish- never cakey. I do mix two shades to achieve my shade, but that’s not a big deal to me at all

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This CC cream is amazing. It really does make your skin look better. I hardly ever use any foundation anymore and just stick to this. The only reason i didn’t give it five stars is because it says it’s full coverage and it isn’t.

reviews.review_title: make sure you have the option to exchange

I.later had an oxygeno facial and waited 2 weeks for my skin to heal up and applied this product and inflamed my skin moreso than before. I have combination skin and it was not a good fit for me

reviews.review_title: great for folks with dry skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who has horrible dry skin in the T-zone area and has struggled to find something that wouldn't make my face look cake-y, this is my holy grail! It applies flawlessly and feels light on the skin. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: Perfect for Long Wear - NEW HOLY GRAIL!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing! I used it all weekend during Coachella and it stayed on throughout the whole day! I used it with the Tatcha Silk Canvas Primer to prime and I used the Milk Makeup Setting Powder and the Urban Decay All Nighter Setting Spray to set my face. I used a lot of powder and my foundation did not budge at all. My skin usually dislikes any foundation I put on it and it separates or crusts off (ew) but this stayed in place for the entire day with 0 touch ups. When I used a lot of powder, this foundation appeared more matte than before. The coverage was medium to full depending on the amount of powder used. My skin felt like it could still breathe when I had this on. Lasted through 12  hours of excruciating heat, lots of dancing, sweating, and singing. 5 Stars!! (Pictures taken at 2pm and then at 1am!)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Was extremely drying on my (dry) skin : had patches and dry skin or product leaving my face at 10AM, product did not last on me at this time. Did not lile the smell but at least it disapear after application. Was also too liquid, difficult to apply and mask red zones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation!! It gives great coverage, without feeling heavy, or greasy.   I apply with the brush

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I switched to this product and replaced two others in the process (Clinique CC cream and UD All Nighter Foundation). I explained how my foundation was separating after an hour or two of use and the Sephora employee recommended I use something more hydrating. I am loving the it Cosmetics CC+! It spreads so nice and provides me with a flawless coverage that Urban Decay products couldn’t even though they were full coverage. This CC+ truly is light as butter. You hardly feel anything on your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this CC cream. I primarily use it alone as a foundation on my non break out days (I wear foundation overtop on those days). It has amazing coverage and the smell is fantastic. It wears well alone although I usually do have to do a powder overtop to make it stay all day. This I my 3rd tube and I think I'm a lifer on this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried several of these types of products including La Mer (which is great but lesser coverage), and this one is the best. It’s a nice balance of light but not too light coverage, and looks natural. I use it immediately after my La Mer moisturizer because I have dry/aging skin, and it doesn’t sit on my pores like some similar products do. I also really appreciate the sunscreen.

reviews.review_title: Love it soft natural look with mature skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really love it , feels good on my face. I have mature skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Blends beautifully and sits great on my skin. Definitely would recommend for anyone with dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this but it broke my face out. Goes on really nice and has excellent coverage for a CC. Unfortunately, my face just wasn’t having it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for more than a year now. It's definitely one of my go to products. First, I rarely ever give five stars to ANY product because it's not realistic. There's no perfect foundation. Second, this is NOT your product if you have very oily skin. Just don't do it. Combination skin will be fine. Third, LESS is more! I can't stress this enough. It's the best Tinted Moisturizer out there as far as offering extra coverage, however, if you add too much it can look cakey after it sets. Fourth, prep your skin well first, meaning wash it and add a thin moisturizer if you have really dry skin (esp. winter months), if you are normal to combo, cleansing skin is just fine. You know your skin best, prep it accordingly.  How I use mine: I'm combination skin but lean more to the dry side (especially in winter months). I use a moisturizing cleanser first, then I moisturize lightly (gel or thin cream). After it is absorbed, I use half a pump or less of the cc cream. And spread it all over my face with clean hands. I've noticed my warm fingers work best when using this product, especially if trying to achieve a more natural look. I will then finish with my favorite concealer and touch up the undereye area and any blemishes if needed. I will set under eye area with a light powder and I'll dust lightly all over with my butter bronzer (Physicians Formula or It cosmetics pressed powder). Remember less is more, add more only if needed. :) Hope this helps!

reviews.review_text: I really like this product. The coverage is great but my face feels very oily at the end of the day

It can be cakey and thick so I apply 1-2 drops of Argan oil or moonstone drop for extra glow and it’s an absolutely perfect combo!! The oil help thin the CC cream without loosing coverage at all.

reviews.review_title: It works, but it is not long lasting
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have a skin condition called Rosacea and it affects almost my entire cheeks, my neck and my chest. I am bright red. This was recommended to me because it's supposed to be gentle on your skin and it's ok for people with sensitive skin types.  I can put this on in the AM and everything looks ok, my rosacea is mostly covered, but by midday it has worn off or started to almost separate and the redness starts showing through again. I wear hydrating primer and I moisturize so I'm not sure if I'm doing something wrong or if the product is just not that long lasting.  I haven't found a better product than this one for rosacea, other products I've tried either irritated my skin too much or didn't cover the redness enough. Overall I'd get it again just because there's nothing else better out there yet that I've found.

reviews.review_title: the holy grail for my sensitive, combo-oily skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is basically my holy grail foundation. I’m pretty fair with combo/oily skin, large pores, and lots of red post acne scarring. This covers it all FLAWLESSLY and it lasts without caking into fine lines, separating throughout the day, or getting greasy. I have really sensitive skin as well and this doesn’t break me out in the slightest. It’s just fabulous coverage with a natural glow! I will seriously cry if they ever stop making this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Superior quality product. I think I found my forever foundation. I will buy it as long as they keep selling it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not sure what happened, but when I first applied this, as a test patch to my skin, the product it looked decent and was a good color match for me. Then as time went on it went from being a warm undertone to turning pink on me. I don't know how or why, but it was not a cute look. I also tried another shade and the same thing happened. I'm not sure what is going on with this product, but it just doesn't work with me what so ever. I didn't even get the chance to fully wear it and see if I would like it or not, because it just ended up turning pink on me. I don't recommend this for the ones who have a warm undertone like I do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

I took the shade-finder quiz and confidently ordered the product in “fair light” based on previous purchases. Unfortunately this shade was way too light and made me look like a ghost. It’s a shame because the coverage and consistency were great.

reviews.review_text: Based on the reviews I thought that this product would be great for my dry skin but I was disappointed. The product will not cover my dry spots (cheeks & nose). If I do not set with powder it rubs off easily, I have dry skin, I prefer to not use powder. Not full coverage.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rich Honey - rich ebony shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the skin I'm in and this CC cream gives me the look of my skin. I like the weight of it on my face. Its buildable, best sometimes I need it to be a little heavier in some places. Love this!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this with the brush. I wanted to like it so bad! I’m 37 and my skin is changing so I thought this would be the answer.  I tried with the brush and found it was streaky so I would follow up with the beauty blender. It looked gorgeous for a bit but if I touched my face it moved on my face. I set it with my translucent Laura Mercier powder and thought that would do the trick. No matter how little or much I put it just came off my face. You know how it comes off the tip of your nose and bunches up around the tip? Did that. Creased in the sides of my nose and under eyes to where I’d have to pat it with my fingers. Came off around my mouth up to my nose so there was visibly no coverage there. TOTALLY BUMMED. NEXT.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Though the cream was full coverage, for some reason it looked like I had poured oil all over my face after I applied it, which is weird considering I have dry-combo skin. I had to matte it down with some translucent powder, and even then it constantly moved throughout the day AND it oxidized horribly on me. Don’t know what happened.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh my goodness! This is such a nice CC cream! It makes my skin look so nice, AND IT SMELLS LIKE LEMON CAKE

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The thing I don’t like is that the makeup slides around on your face. I do I fact love the light weight non heavy feeing on my face. I kinda feel as if it settles into pores and my fine lines.  I applied it with a wet sponge, foundation brush and fingers- I found my wet sponge works best. I have tried a setting power, but it cakes up and looks patchy. So, now I’ve found a setting spray- it helps but the cc cream still slides around my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is indeed a full coverage CC Cream wanna be foundation. I really thought this would be a groundbreaking experience for me but it really wasnt. I was especially excited about the spf part and well, i think because of it, it really comes on a little lighter than the shade you see on the tube. Also, if you, like me aspire to use it as an everyday foundation, skin prep, of any sort, I know because I have attempted from a whole morning skin care routine to primer alone, it will quickly fade, and expression lines are going to show no matter how much your primed and no matter how much setting powder you use. It definately has a beautiful finish to it but there is something about it that doesn´t quite please me, but again that´s my personal expirience. Since I work in an office and I am not always on the move, it settles just fine and stays on well for long but I wouldnt recommend it for people with more active jobs or maybe use it just as a cream and not attempt to build it up to a full face of make up because I feel like although they tried making it sort of a foundation, it is still not one.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones

reviews.review_text: I decided to try this product because it had so many great reviews and I really do love it. It provides great full coverage for a CC cream and is buildable. I only need to use about half a pump and a little goes a long way. I also work as a server so I can get pretty gross and sweaty but I have not had a problem with this product caking or settling into any fine lines. It seriously lasts all day. I do use a primer and set with the It Cosmetics bye bye pores. The only con is the color match I used on the site matched me with a shade that is a bit too dark. Definitely a perfect shade for summer though so it’s okay. I’d just recommend trying the shades out in person of course.

reviews.review_text: I don't think I can go back to any other foundation! I originally tried this out as a sample before deciding to buy because I have been very wary on wearing foundations due to my extremely dry skin. But after a co-worker's recommendation, I went for it and it is my favorite product! It adds this amazing glow to my skin when I apply the CC cream with a beauty blender, like a nice natural glow. It also has this subtle, but nice citrusy smell to it. Would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First...let’s talk about the “pretty” iridescent tube. Over time, the silver finish flakes off into the entire contents of your makeup bag. Every time you grab anything from your bag, your hands are covered with little silver flakes which in turn get transferred to your face. Not impressed. I now get the pleasure of cleaning each and every item in my bag and the bag itself in order to stop the packaging flakes from getting all over my face. The tube is now being held in a ziplock bag in an attempt to contain the glitter flake party happening in my bag.   The product itself covers nicely and feels nice on my dry skin however I’ve noticed that every time I use it, I break out. Prior to using this product, I would get a breakout 2-4 times a YEAR max. After using this product, it’s breakout city any time I use for more than two days straight. Also, it breaks apart around the creases on the side of my nose. So disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Didn't meet up to my expectations and made my pores look more visible than before. With this product, it's also super noticeable when you have it on and looks like dried out clay on your face. It's not worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this BB cream, light with good coverage - looks natural on the skin and smells great!

reviews.review_title: Keep coming back to this wonderful product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried so many foundations for my combination skin prone to breakouts, and continuously come back to this one. It covers well and can always build the coverage, but doesn’t magnify the dry areas. I am not one who has time to reapply makeup throughout the day, so I need something to last. IT Cosmetics recommends this to be applied with a brush, so I do that, but have to use a beauty blender to hide some brush strokes. Easy and great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In my almost 20 years of wearing foundation, this is definitely the worst one I've ever tried. It cakes terribly, pills, and is a bit on the orange side. It makes me look so much worse than I do without makeup. Unfortunately, I missed the 60 day return policy because who has time for that? But seriously, save your money and use any other foundation. I'm so confused by all these positive reviews.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This makes my skin look soooo glowy and dewy I absolutely love it. With my skin being so dry, it’s hard for me to find foundations and such that won’t cake up. This is such a good investment. LOVE LOVE IT

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is soo much darker than it appears. I'm a ginger so I am very pale and unfortunately, after trying out numerous shades. none of their shades fit me. However, I don't know if I would use it even if it was the correct shade. I expected full coverage with a light texture but I got full coverage that definitely clogged my pores, even after using a pore filling primer. It just felt heavy to wear all day; great for stage performances but not for anything else. This made the textured areas of my face stick out (don't get me started on how bad my nose looked) and moved around when I put on powder contour, even after setting it with setting powder. A lot of people love this, but I don't get the hype. There are a lot of tinted moisturizes that have the same amount of coverage with a great shade range for half the price. This just didn't work for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This does the job! It covers perfectly and stays on, and the fact it has SPF 50, it's a bonus.  I have pigmented skin and have tried many different CC creams to cover the pigments without looks caky or totally made up, and none compare to this product.  It truly is IT.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Despite being nearly 30, I still struggle with acne. I diligently wear SPF but I find it breaks me out. However despite being spf 50, this product does not break me out. It also blends easily, provides a light-medium coverage that is perfect for daily wear and keeps my skin feeling hydrated. FYI, it runs on the deeper side of shades, so if you are very fair like myself, stick to the lightest colours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It would make my skin look cakey & very oily after a few hrs and I have normal skin that doesn’t usually get all that oily. Also, the light shade looks very grey.. weird

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this product about three months ago. I don’t wear it every day. Only when I go out on dates and meet up with friends. I find that I only need half a pump. Otherwise the product gets very wet and makes my face look super oily. And it shows that I’m wearing the cc+ cream. Doesn’t look good. But if I only apply half a pump it looks great. Smells really good too. Not over powering. I love all the properties of the product especially the spf. Exactly what I’m looking for. My suggestion would be to start with less than half a pump and see how much works for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh my goodness, this has been a wonderful product so far!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I finally tried it cosmetics, and after a week, it has been placed in my junk drawer. I’m in my early 30s, and this makeup settled in lines I didn’t know I had and exaggerated them! From a distance I looked fine, but up close or under lights, I looked 10  years Older...who wants that!?!

reviews.review_title: Finally the perfect one for me!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For the past few years I have been using Armani CC cream which I love. I use #5 but right now its a bit  too dark and the #4 is too light. I went to get samples and found out its been discontinued so I went on a mission to find a replacement. I wore full coverage foundations for most of my life but these past few years as I get older (65) I cant stand the feel or look of a foundation. A CC cream is just right for me, it evens out my skin tone but doesn't have that heavy mask like look or feel. I googled The best CC Creams and IT came up as #1 so I went to Sephora to get a sample.The sales person took a picture of my skin and said I was a medium neutral. I am olive skinned, I tan easily and can get very dark which I try not to do anymore. My natural tone is beige but its always been so difficult for me to find a foundation that matched my skin tone. In the morning when I wake up Im pale ( for me lol) very beige-y but as I get going, take a shower I get more color in my  skin. I have a red undertone but yellow too.  I have tried every brand under the sun. because there is not a line for darker-than-a -white-girl- but lighter-than an-African-American-girl I usually have to buy two colors and mix them. Bobbi Brown is the closest I have come to matching my skin color but I wanted a different formula. So off I went to Sephora and got 3 samples. First I tried my sample from Nordstroms, Chanel CC cream # 30 and it was too light! I washed it off and tried IT Medium Neutral CC cream. Im wearing it today and so far I love it!! it matched my skin which is amazing and maybe a first. my skin is normal to dry and  I live in the desert so when I say dry I mean DRY lol. I went on my break and checked my face and it  looks the same as when I put it on 7 hours ago. Im going to wear it for a few days and see how I feel also trying the illuminating sample as well. If this product is what I think it is I have finally found the one for me! it looks natural, feels natural !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. I have very oily skin but this stuff just works so well. I usually take one pump and add in khiels oil free moisturizer and apply them together first with my hands then blend out with a damp beauty blender. Then bake very lightly with Laura Mercier setting powder on my t zone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried so many foundations, BB, CC creams and this is by far my favorite. The coverage isn't heavy, but full. It covers the freckles I prefer to conceal, and feels silky smooth when being applied. The SPF and included skin benefits make it so I don't feel awful if I fall asleep and miss my evening facial cleanse! I've been using Light for two and half years and will continue to do so as long as the formula stays the same; I will not be shopping for any other foundation; that alone is SO relieving (there are so many foundations out there, it's overwhelming!). So happy to have found my staple. Keep it up, IT Cosmetics, this foundation is a godsend!  I often use with Chanel Multi-Use Illuminating Base primer and the result is truly a flawless finish.

reviews.review_title: Packaging Nightmare flecks Silver foil everywhere
reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This truly bums me out. Great product, horrible cheap packaging that flecks off silver all over your other makeup and in turn ends up on your face. I have bought this 4 times because I love the actual product but I have to stop buying it because I swear each tube is worse then the last in terms of essentially flaking silver foil that’s so hard to remove from other makeup, my hands and through out the day when I catch a glimpse of myself I see that little pieces of it have ended up on my face. Then trying to wipe/pick it off your face messes up your makeup. The packaging is truly a nightmare. So only buy this if you want a mess of silver fleck all over your stuff and yourself. Not a good look. Get it together It Cosmetics

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING. Wanted a bb cream that had spf and didn’t feel cakey or heavy on my skin yet still wanted medium coverage... this fits the bill!! It is so perfect and has lasted all day without any sort of setting spray. Perfect coverage. So happy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I felt like this cream just sat on top of my skin like a coat of paint. It faded and flaked (or sort of pilled) by the end of the day.  The color was too yellow for me as well.  It covers discolorations nicely, but I didn't like the way it went on at all.  I have dry, mature skin and it just didn't work for it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing coverage! Goes on very smooth.

reviews.review_title: WORTH THE PRICE AND THE HYPE
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is THE best product  I bought recently, it works even in the hot weather (I live in Brazil and in the summer the heat is insane), I wear this cc cream everyday and is definitely my go to foundation. Total approved!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It covers your blemishes, but it is way too cakey. I bought this to use as a sunscreen and it sweats off really easily. I have to use a setting powder on my face with it just to absorb the excess oil. Even in a covered outdoor environment it sweats off easily.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rich - golden brown shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is absolutely amazing. It’s last 10 hours plus looking flawless. Why four stars?  The color range is not good. I’m biracial and I have to mix tan with rich. I thought tan would do it but this cc cream runs really light. I wonder if the zinc oxide is the reason why it runs so light. The color range is my only complaint.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I rarely wear any kind of BB/CC creams or foundations, because I always feel like no matter how much I prep my skin, they just never look very good. A few months ago, I bought some MAC Strobe Cream to add a little shimmer to my cheeks, nose and chin. I later received this CC cream in an Ipsy bag. I didn't try it right away, until I had a small breakout, and wanted to cover it up. I used the MAC Strobe Cream first, and then used a foundation brush to apply the It Cosmetics CC Cream, and OMG! Not only did it perfectly cover my breakout, but it also made my skin look absolutely flawless, and dewy. I still have the sample, and the really awesome part is that it only takes a tiny bit with the foundation brush, I just buff it on my skin, and the coverage is perfection. I highly recommend this CC cream. I'm definitely going to buy the full sized bottle as soon as I'm done with the sample, because I have never found anything that could compete. I have normal skin that is usually oily in my t-zone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! Good coverage yet feels light and dewy! I have sensitive skin and it didn’t make me break out! Gone through 2 bottles! Is my new go to!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really don't know why I retried this product. I kept thinking why I stop and now I remember, it applies nicely like every cc/bb cream sheer to med coverage But after 2 hours my T zone and cheeks look super dry and patchy it was horrible & it oxidized. I left the house without considering looking at the mirror first. oh well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite summer foundation, medium coverage but doesn't feel heavy or greasy and it feels hydrating on my dry skin, plus there's spf which is a bonus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this Product. One of the girls in store recommended it and I am so happy. Great coverage, a little goes a long way, smells good, and lasts all day!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly amazing. I've always been a full coverage kind of girl, and I've had my fair share of Foundations. I remember trying a sample of this one time and I was absolutely floored. Now that I have my skin and check and my breakouts are few and far in-between this is my absolute go to. Half of a pump to a full pump will cover absolutely everything. It Glides on so smooth looks so natural when it's Blended, and I swear my skin is in better shape from using it. My acne scars have lightened and my skin just looks radiant. I honestly feel like this is my Holy Grail and I will use it forever and always.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of Sephora’s employees did a foundation match on me.. and she took me to this awful product.. in the store it looked like it matched. But once I took it home and in normal lighting... it was probably 3 shades darker than my skin color. I looked like a pumpkin. The shade range is AWFUL.. and also the employee that “matched” my skin tone was WRONG!! You’d think an employee would be more helpful and less misleading. Other than the color and the employee.. it’s a good product... but if you’re very fair... STAY AWAY

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I found the colour was okay, but the range is limited so I need to mix with my other foundations. As far as this one on it's own, I'm not a big fan. With my oily skin I find it doesn't set well and pools easily. I have trouble blending my concealer without a lot of shifting. I think on drier skin it would be a really nice product with a nice dewy finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to never wear make up to work for fear of it clogging my pores and making me break out. I can honestly say my skin is now better than it ever has been since I started using this cc cream everyday!! Sooo happy I found it
