reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! Runs fairly dark to me, I was shade fair. Not too heavy, beautiful finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was a bit skeptic at first because of the hype around this product but GIRL, IT COSMETICS IS NOT PLAYING! It gives you so much control over the coverage that you wish for and sits so well on the skin! Anti-aging ingredients + SPF  just makes it even more of an HOLY GRAIL!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My issue isn’t with the product itself, but with the fact that the lightest color option is still too dark. I wanted so badly to love this but will never really be able to try it out unless they provide a lighter option.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was expecting the fair to be a bit lighter, but it still worked for me. Definitely not as light as other brands have (it would not work for someone with porcelain skin). I LOVE the citrus scent and the pump format!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is very cakey on me and I it looks very ashy/powdery. I have an olive skin tone and it just does not work for me. The coverage is very thick.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this stuff! I switched to this from bye bye redness because of the spf and anti-aging serum, and this actually dispenses which is nice. It's buildable but does tend to break apart after a long day which is why I gave it 4 stars. Not a problem if I use setting powder or really bake. The light was pretty dark and fair light, while being just one shade lighter, is a huge difference.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the coverage but this did not work well with my oily combination skin.

reviews.review_title: Great for high coverage BB cream
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this for the effects of coverage and wanting skincare perks - delivered both. However, their shade selection did not work with me, none were cool toned for me to wear. However, when I had acne this was a great alterative to look as natural as possible while getting those skincare benefits. I have since cleared up my acne and found better products so will not repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Fantastic! Nice coverage, can easily replace my tinted moisturizer in the summer. Evens out skin tone and makes perfect base for foundation. Skin appears flawless. Little goes a long way. Will definitely repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really wanted to love this as it applies beautifully initially. A light coat gives off a very natural and radiant glow. However it's not compatible with my combo skin as I'm a greasy mess within a couple of hours.

reviews.review_title: Good for Oily Skin in Winter
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin and I mostly use this product in the winter when my skin is dryer. Goes on smoothly with beauty blender. Once summer hits, I put it in hybernation. Definitely won’t use it in the summer because it is a glowy finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This acts as both foundation and concealer. I literally skip the step of concealer now for the pesky breakouts. It is a bit heavy and shows in the creases if laid on thick, but it doesn’t make me break out more, and for that I am very grateful. Plus, who doesn’t want sunscreen?!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed this for a couple of days, but realized that it was just too thick and transferred too easily. If you're into a full coverage product, than this is great. But if you want something lightweight that you don't notice on the skin, keep looking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Feels good applying a multi function foundation on my face. Love the nourishing ingredient list, spf, and coverage. Lack of colour selection is a tough one to deal with. I usually wear lighter coloured foundation and I have yellow undertones so went with Light but it was pretty orange. It also oxidizes a lot so will purchase Fair and mix it with Light and see if its good for summer/winter skin colour changes. Haven't seen any difference in my skin over the course of a month but feels nice knowing I'm putting something nice on my skin. If I can get a good mix to match my skin tone I'll continue to purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: went to Sephora in desperate need of help...I'm 48yrs old with skin that is blotchy with broken blood vessels on my cheeks and sun damage so I needed a full coverage foundation that would also moisturize my dry skin. I have tried EVERY SINGLE  foundation under the sun with no luck until now!!! I use this in conjunction with Too Face born this way concealer and it is a winning combination! each product provides me with flawless full coverage and wears so well, both alone and together! I get compliments all the time about how great my makeup looks!!! never going to change again!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it it covers my dry skin well. It does transfer though and is a dewy finish more on my skin. It does make me look younger and I like that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been looking for coverage that didn't feel heavy or cakey and this is amazing. I used very little, got full coverage, and at the end of the day, I'M NOT SHINY (for once!). I have uneven skin and some redness and this was perfect. I'm in love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Turned orange on my skin also dried my face out and flaked. It was so nasty after just an hour of wear. Plus it set into my fine lines and made me look at least 10 years older. No thanks. Returned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this cc cream, I alter between using the Giorgio Armani drops and using bare minerals tinted moisturizer which are both very blend able (by hand) and natural looking but I was looking for something that had a little more coverage. I honestly haven't used a foundation this bad in so long.. from the very start to pumping it out of the tube its very thick, once you apply it it accentuates all of your pores.. and after you apply your bronzer and concealer it still looks like a lot - wait a few hours and the cakey look gets even worse as the day goes on

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this product... it has great coverage and a nice natural/slightly dewy finish. Unfortunately it irritated my skin... I felt my entire face start itching about an hour after I put it on. It caused dryness in some sensitive areas around my mouth and those areas started flaking really badly by mid-day.   Also, the packaging is HORRIBLE. I only had it in my makeup bag for about 1.5 weeks, and I kept finding little silver flakes over everything from it rubbing off the tube.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't like it at all. I don't understand the hype about this product. I usually use it all mornings since it has a lot of SPF. All this time that I have tried it, my skin looks like I have a really bad make up day. It emphasize all my pores and set on my lines. I also have realised that it doesn't last that much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Best CC cream I have ever had or used. I've been using this CC for over 2 years and I love it. Don't use anything else. This  has enough coverage to cover up some pesky pimples and it also is light on the face. Never made me breakout and I also like the fact that it doesn't make me breakout either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I looked into this after a coworker waxed poetic about the pink version - I went in store and got colour matched by an employee who explained the different versions to me.  I went with this one and am super happy with it. I've never been into foundations but I feel like I sometimes need coverage so this is a good solution for me. It's not heavy or cakey and has enough coverage for what I need.  I also LOVE that it has SPF 50, which has made me use it even more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this product after going to an It cosmetics master class. I was blown away with the product at first. I have baddd hyperpigmentation and scarring, plus redness. This product covered EVERYTHING. Purchased this along with the concealer and matte foundation powder. Unfortunately, what I thought was the best foundation/cc cream, concealer and matte foundation powder ended up being my worst nightmare!!!! The next day I woke up and started my make up routine; my room has a lot of natural sunlight from large windows so it’s a perfect spot to do my makeup. I realized that the color I was matched with was off- I didn’t notice this under the indoor lighting the previous day. The problem is that my undertones are pink, and this product is very very yellow. I had to blend the makeup all the way to my collarbone so I didn’t look  like I had a yellow mask on.  After applying, the makeup had settled into all of my creases and enlarged my pores within minutes- even with a primer. Thought I had applied too much but even with small amount (next day tried half as much) I still had creasing like crazy. Next issue- coverage was amazing, but after an hour my skin was EXTREMELY oily. Like more oily than it is without makeup, even though I applied the matte powder from It cosmetics after the CC. I thought to myself, “well, I’ll  just blot my face every so often to control oil- I am so insecure about my skin and now I feel like I don’t have to hide from the world.”  I live in San Diego so it’s quite warm and humid year round. Went on short walk and the  product started separating on my nose and chin and my face started itching. My skin felt like it was suffocating as well; felt like I had painted my skin with acrylic paint, not foundation.  I finally gave up on all the products except the concealer. There were too many cons just to have an even finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Legit best foundation I have ever used.  You don't feel that you are wearing anything and it smooths out your skin.  Just love this

reviews.review_title: the devil works hard but this stuff works harder
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this amazing it cosmetic has saved my skin this summer in many ways. I work a HOT and heavy job in the trades that requires me to be outside and sweating for long hours in the sun however with this on I don't get a burn! I have sensitive skin and even all natural sunscreen seems to bother my fair complexion but not this. a bonus is it makes my skin look so healthy and luminous so I don't look like I'm dying on the outside. seriously this stuff is made to protect gingers everywhere. THIS IS MODERN SCIENCE IN ACTION LADIES AND GENTEMANS !!xoxooxox Gossip girl

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product, I really did. It has amazing coverage and looks great. BUT it breaks me out and the day after I wear this my skin feels TERRIBLE. I can see pores all over my face and feel so much more texture...it takes almost a week for my skin to recover and I finally realized it was because of this product. i have dry skin, so maybe that's why...?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For reference I wear shades Mac NC20, urban decay naked skin foundation 3.0 and Armani silk cream foundation 4.0. The it skin CC in light worked best for me and if needed I warm it up with a touch of bronzer. I'm a licensed Master Esthetician who loves physical spf! I recommend this product to my clients often! It's a great light weight day time foundation with spf of 50! It blurs flaws nicely, doesn't seem to break me out and isn't drying! Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have rosacea on my cheeks and contact dermatitis on my forehead. This is the first CC cream to even my skintone without making my forehead itch. I love it. Please don't ever stop making this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product !!! Best CC cream I have tried. It evens out my skin tone. It stays out all day even on my oily t-zone. Love the packaging too. It’s easy to get all the product you need without wasting any. A very small amount goes a long way. I love that it has a sunscreen and a serum already in it. No breakouts ever. My only wish is that they had pink undertones.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this product to wear during the summer months. The lightweight finish on my skin, with the medium coverage was perfect. I am the type of person that doesn't like to set my face with powder because my skin is so dry. The name your skin but better is highly accurate.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Tan - light brown shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have extremely dry skin and have tried so many foundations and although I have found ones that work I haven’t found one that I LOVE... until now! This is quickly becoming my holy grail ❤️

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - natural beige shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pros:  Coverage is great Gives me a nice dewy complexion, doesn’t leave me looking powdery Very moisturizing Cons: Lemon scented (might not be a con for some, I personally don’t like it)  Sometimes goes kinda orange  Overall a good cc cream. I will probably purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finally found the perfect foundation for my combination skin. Perfect colour, covers acne but looks like my skin, doesn’t cling to dry patches, easy to apply and only takes 1 pump to cover my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t love full coverage, however this one is really easy to apply lightly and a little really goes along way! I love how it feels throughout the day and I never feel like I need to reapply like other foundations. I like using a beauty blender with this rather than a brush (just covers betters).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Incredible shade, the first that matches me as an Indian American on the lighter end of the spectrum. It’s very olive toned and that’s rare for Sephora. The finish is beautiful. It’s medium coverage but buildable and has a dewy finish. You definitely need to set this foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My skin has gotten very pale and dry over the long Canadian winter, so I’ve been on the hunt for a new foundation for a good months, I have done so many researches and testing on my own face (I’m a bit of a fuzz when it comes to buying cosmetics) and I’ve finally settled on this particular one.  My requirements for a good foundation are: reasonably priced, natural, moisturizing, radiant/natural glow, Good coverage, long lasting, and most importantly, made for sensitive skin.  The foundations I’ve tried were tarte, Lancôme, Dior, G.Armani, Charlotte Tilbury, and Makeup4ever, most of which were either too cakey looking, or way too watering and thin, I didn’t go for the fancy foundations at all because they are just too expensive.   I’ve used this CC everyday for at least 2 weeks now, it has spf 50 and I just moisturize with FAB repair cream then put it on, set the foundation with a wet beauty blender sponge and voila! Natural and flawless skin! I work as a waitress for 10 hours a day, the foundation lasts! I’ve been receiving compliments about my skin ever since I used this one.   Attached is a no filter photo of me at the end of my shift, only the mascara melted, nothing else!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product, but it oxidized horribly on me and my face looked two shades darker.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for years and I use it every single day. I either wear it as a light layer for daily wear or I use it for my foundation as it is definitely a buildable product with full coverage. When I wear it as my foundation I do dust a little bit of bare minerals original over it because it leaves my face quite dewy (which I love for daytime but don’t want to look wet when I’m out and about at night). I recommend this product to everyone! It’s really wonderful and at a great price point considering it also has anti aging additives in it. I apply this product with a beauty blender but I know some people who use their hands. My one complaint was that the color choices were not always easy to match because there were not many choices to begin with. I always have purchased the shade “light” and the shade “medium” and mixed them or just wore light on its own. Now I see they have created a “light medium” color along with a few other additional colors so I’ve purchased that and am eager to see how this works with my skin tone. Attached it a picture of me wearing just a light layer of this product as well as one when I wear it for fuller coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was hesitate on buying this but I needed something for everyday work and not glam makeup. This did a great job!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s pretty average for me. I have oily skin and i need to touch it up every few hours because shines started to peek through my forehead and cheeks( where i live is -30c ).  Coverage sheer but buildable, it oxidized a little on mh skin.  I don’t think I’ll use it anytime soon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this so much! I’ve applied it with my fingers, a beauty blender and the IT Cosmetics brush...and it doesn’t work for me at all. I have larger pores on my nose and it just settles right in there. The coverage would be good but my skin doesn’t like it. A real shame considering how much people love this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was exactly what I was looking for — a light, smooth moisturizer with a high spf that doesn’t leave any sort of greasy feel. And the color blends well (medium Asian skin), too! Just a terrific product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice finish - until it settles then it seems to dry out my skin, highlight dry patches and emphasize fine lines.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: found the product I'm absolutely in love with!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the coverage, need the SPF 50 from high altitude sun damage and this is amazing! My fave illuminates and moisturizes my dry skin. I will invest in this product again. My new fav!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After everything I read about this product, I couldn't wait to try it and shelled out the money for this and the matching powder.  This cream actually emphasized my pores and lines more than necessary and I felt very self-conscious wearing it.  I gave it a week and it kept doing the same thing.  I was not impressed with it and went back to my other foundation, which did not do that and I was happy to use it again.  I wanted to love this product, but sadly I do not.  Maybe it works better for people who already have perfect skin and although I don't have bad skin at all, I just felt it emphasized my flaws too much instead of making me look better.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So dry out on the skin during winter days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't know what the rave about this foundation is! This foundation makes you look cakey and dry no matter what primer, moisturizer, or setting spray I use. It only looks good for the first hour.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best CC cream out there. Amazing coverage, it blends seamlessly. It has SPF which is a great plus. A little goes a long way. It covers my redness as well which surprised me the most. It’s good for my dry skin as it doesn’t cling to patches and it’s long lasting. Great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great light foundation, provides excellent coverage and is buildable. It’s difficult finding a foundation with such a high SPF which is very important to me.  I also love the great scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great full coverage foundation. I got the shade rich. I now use it as my daily foundation. I don’t wear any concealer with this I just use a primer and I’m good to go.

reviews.review_title: Exactly what I was looking for!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly, it's a holy grail product for me. I have decently clear skin but it is a little discoloured and I have some scarring. This gives me the perfect amount of coverage for my preference. Also this colour is an exact perfect match for me and I almost never find it because I have a tan/olive complexion! Definitely getting this again once I run out!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been looking for something to perfectly match my skin tone whether I’m inside or outside and not look like I have makeup on. I have worn foundation for years so I know them well, and this is the best I’ve used. It’s buildable but also gives great coverage with a small amount. Perfect for my no-makeup look. It gives me the confidence that my skin has never been able to do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice CC cream. It’s light with good coverage. Mixes well with moisturizer also.

reviews.review_title: Decent, but leaves something to be desired
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My shade is usually fair neutral and I found that Fair was a great color match for me. It did not get orange, and stayed true to color throughout the day. The product itself provided medium coverage (not full) -- Unfortunately it did not completely cover some old acne scarring on my cheeks. It does not play nice with texture either. I had some hormonal acne on my chin/mouth area and this emphasized them by caking and flaking in that area. I did not notice a difference in longevity when using this by itself or with Hourglass primer, Mac setting spray, Colorescience sunscreen, etc. Overall it does give a beautiful lasting finish if you have good skin already. I would not recommend if you have active acne, as this will clump and cake in that area and won't cover them completely.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A little bit goes a very long way.  This product goes on so smoothly and gives my skin a very natural appearance.  I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love that this is a foundation and sunscreen. Great coverage - I prefer the natural finish, as opposed to shine or matte. A little goes a long way, though, so don't overapply or you will be needing to use a sponge to remove the excess.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product, every time I use it I get complaints on how wonderful my skin looks. People can't believe I am wearing something. It feels light and blends perfectly with me skin. I would purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this foundation. I do wish they had a few more shades but it is really good overall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect amount of coverage. It really does look like my skin but better. Stays put for the whole day and does not make my skin oily/shiny at all. For those considering purchasing, one note is to be wary of going too deep in color. I purchased Light based on a recommendation but normally I would have gone to the next level. Very glad I didn't, would have been much too dark.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: my skin feels dry and my pores are not minimized

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love it. Goes on great, doesn't look streaky or caked on. Great coverage. I'm a new fan and will continue to use it now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Words cannot describe how much I love this stuff. I struggle with adult acne but I haven’t had a single breakout since I started using this. When I don’t wear any makeup at all I will breakout. It’s almost like this is an acne medication in itself but it moisturizes your skin instead of drying it out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it shouldve got a darker color tho

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fairly decent product as far as appearance goes, easy to apply, the downfall is, if you touch your face, it will come off and make your hands greasy, and leave residue on items, just be mindful while wearing it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this product works very well in hot climate of caribbean... cant wait to confirm the great results riding my motorcycle this summer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it! It covers beautifully and doesn't feel heavy on. It doesn't require a thick application to do its job and I like that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Though I honestly love It Cosmetics CC+ Cream, I absolutely hate this colour!  I bought it because I thought that it would be between fair and light.  It is not!!...It is very peachy and makes me look orange.  I will go back to blending fair and light to get the right tone for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This worked really well for my dry acned scar-ed skin. Straight out of the pump it’s thick but once I spreaded it out with a damp makeup sponge it evened out my skin and hid blotchy-ness. It lightened the appearance of my acne scars. The formula didn’t break, crack or looked caked on after a full day of wear. Not sure how it will work out in the summer and in humidity though but it’s a good winter option for dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not a fan of foundation AT ALL so i’m very excited to try this one after i’ve read reviews about them. I have a sensitive skin. It is sure very light and feels very good in it. It covers very good too. The only problem is each time i scratch my face ONLY a bit, it comes off and i got some in my nails.it gets really easily on white tops and doesn’t really last too, 7hrs or even 6 it starts getting oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Awesome product.  Great coverage but feels light on the skin.  Love that it has an SPF of 50. One of my favourite products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great colour match, horrible product. I've used many cc and bb creams but this was the first that severely broke me out. Not to mention half of it transferred to my phone after answering a call...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I prefer CC creams over foundations. This is surprisingly full coverage for a CC cream and doesn’t have an orange hue as some CC and BB creams do. Feels very light going on and lasts me for hours. I have acne prone skin but this did not break me out. It’s not very moisturizing so I like to use a primer underneath to keep from getting dry patches. Would definitely purchase again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is almost perfect except that it does not cover hyperpigmentation very well. I live the radiant finish and feel it gives on your face, but just wished it would cover all my dark spots also.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product - covers well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a well loved product, but I just couldn't make it work for my preferences. Honestly, I thought it would be lighter, but the coverage was too high for my taste. And the color was off (my fault). I purchased the mini in light since I didn't want to buy a full size, but I'm fair and ended up mixing this with moisturizer to try and help that. It was still just too much coverage for me.

reviews.review_title: Staple item in my makeup bag!
reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product takes my skin from dull and patchy to bright and even! It's perfect for every day wear - the 50 SPF is a blessing for my fair skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this, it feels light and stays on throughout the day

reviews.review_title: This product is amazing! Highly recommend!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I have been blessed with very dry and oily skin, which is difficult to manage. I can't use anything matte and I really need to keep my skin hydrated to avoid dry patches and breakouts. I found CC creams helped, but they oxidized and made me look like I had a bad spray tan at the end of the day. I decided to try this brand (having nothing left ro lose) and I had less dry patches and skin irritation. It's buildable, full coverage, and a little goes a long way! I REALLY love the light dewy feel, making it feel nicely moisturized! It's also not cakey, which is important for someone with my skin type and problems! I always get good compliments on my complexion now, by friends, family, and strangers! No need to filter my photos anymore! In the future, I will be trying more of their products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this in mini size, and it was a great product, a year later I repurchased the big size, and it does not compare. Not sure if it has been re-formulated, but it does not perform as well as the exact foundation I had a year ago.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE IT! My skin feels amazing, it's so lightweight but it feels like the perfect amount of coverage. I feel like I'm having a no make up day until I look in the mirror and remember I'm so covered. Great buy, will be buying again. Plus the smell is so nice and fresh!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never use foundation because I always get dry patches even if I use a primer and hydrating foundation. But this is my new holy grail. Literally melts into your skin and makes you look flawless. Does not oxidize and is buildable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this product! It melts into my skin, doesn’t seem to be either overly dry or overly greasy (My skin is oily though drier in the harsh Canadian winter). I usually just dust some Hourglass Veil translucent powder over top.  The coverage is more than adequate for me. I feel it makes me look fresh without being overly covered up.  I am prone to breakouts, especially with sunscreens. So far they have been minimal compared to when I used Clinique’s City Block.  I will definitely repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent product for my very light skin with rosacea: it hides redness naturally and gives a beautiful glow to the skin. I am using it for two years now and I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This isn’t as good as I was told it would be. It’s pretty thin which is what I wanted but if your skin is dry at all it will show each flake. I also bought a medium because I normally fall under that tone but it was very light and came out very cool toned. I feel like I should’ve done some swatches but this is the first time I was wrong about the tone matching mine.  I want to be someone that loves BB or CC creams but it doesn’t seem to work for me.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such an amazing product! Before I found this I was never able to find a foundation/cc cream that I enjoyed. I decided to try this one after being recommended it. I have combination skin and i find that it doesn't get oily but it also doesn't stick to my dry spots. Now, this is all I use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I break out from everything. But NOT THIS CC CREAM! My skin is better and happier when I use it. And year round SPF keeps my sensitive skin calm and protected. LOVE!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly love this stuff so much! This is the only thing I use as foundation every day and it never disappoints. I’m acne prone and have a ton of post acne marks left over from an insane few months of stress breakouts so I need something that will cover everything but not look heavy. I also have dry skin and fine lines so I want something that won’t settle into fine lines or look like it’s cracking on my face. This stuff does everything I’m looking for! Plus I love that is has SPF 50 so I don’t need the extra step of putting a sunscreen on before. I put it on at 7AM and don’t take it off till anytime between 7-9PM and shockingly it still looks good. For long days at work I make sure to set my whole face with translucent powered so it doesn’t move around but on weekends I like to only set my under eyes and T-zone and leave the rest bare because it gives you such a healthy glow. The only thing I don’t love is that it transfers like crazy even if I set my whole face with powder. If I talk on my cell I always have to wipe it off after. But the pros outweighs the cons for me so I deal with it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this product. I couldn’t believe the high spf along with the great coverage and light formula. However, this completely ruined my skin. I used it for a week and my skin brokeout like it hasn’t in years.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves my skin moisturized without clogging my pores! Wish there was more of a color range, but really love this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is solid. It is extremely extremely full coverage like way more than I thought with just one pump. One pump is all you need! The coverage is phenomenal and so natural and the glow it gives you is beautiful !! This foundation is absolutely beautiful on the skin. The only negative I can give this foundation is that the transfer is horrible you can not wear this alone you absolutely need a setting powder and that does take some of it’s beautiful glow away. And also keep in mind everyone that even though this does have spf which is a huge bonus to actually the full benefit of the spf you would need about 5 to 6 pumps so an spf underneath is still needed. I’m a huge advocate of using brushes and sponges but the best way that I’ve found to apply this for the best application is with your fingers.I would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_title: The tag line is spot on
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Despite owning many foundations, I reach for this CC cream almost everyday because it’s pretty much perfect! It’s not too glowy or too matte, it just looks like my skin but better. I will never be without this stuff!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Read great reviews about the CC cream so decided to try it out. I broke out in dry red patches. Thought maybe I'll give it a week. I tried it again and my skin dry out so bad, the make up just sinks in my pores. You can see fine lines even more than ever. I keep up with my skincare regimen daily and it's always on point. I threw away the box so can't even return it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not good. Never stays on my face. The color turned to gray after a few hours. I’m try combination skin. Not works for me. Have to return it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s weird because the light color is a five star for me but then I noticed it was a little dark so I got the fair light one and the consistency was completely different and looked caked on my face.    I’m not sure why the change or how the other colors perform but I’m sticking to the light color because I hated the fair light one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this as an everyday foundation and have used it for about 2 and a half years. However as I am getting older I found it has become a bit to heavy looking on my face and sinks into my lines around my mouth. Would repurchase if i could make it stop doing that.

reviews.review_title: No for fine lines and dry skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First off, I have been a fan of IT Cosmetics for a long time and will continue to explore their products, but this one was disastrous for me.  It found every dry patch, fine line, and crepey area and accentuated it. Additionally, it was very patchy and settled in unflattering ways irregardless of setting spray or application method.  I would advise staying away from this one if you have fine lines and dry skin. I will be returning and looking for a new product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it looks amazing right after its applied but that lasts for about an hour. Even if i used powder setting spray it doesn't last. It makes my shape tape wear off too so my skin looks better if i only wear concealer. not worth the price, but it might work better for you.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product does provide full coverage, but after only a couple times using  it my skin started breaking out.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you blend this with a sponge or other blender, application is a breeze. Otherwise, the product streaks and feels tacky, even when you use the It brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product because I feel like it makes my skin look beautiful. It does a great job of hiding scars and imperfections and it keeps my dry skin hydrated throughout the day. The only reason I give it 4 stars is because of the shade range. I wear the lightest shade, fair, and it is still too dark for me. My best friend who is much tanner than me is only the second shade.. definitely needs work here! Otherwise amazing product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good product, although it does make dry patches noticeable. I have breakout prone skin and have used spot treatments to dry out pimples. This product clung to those areas. Although that’s what most products would do, it’d be helpful if they formulated it in a way where that wouldn’t occur. Other than that, I like the product.

reviews.review_title: IT, we know you can do better.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Y'all, here's the tea - this formulation is where it's at. Texture is slightly liquid-y (i.e. easy to apply and blend for an even finish). Offers outstanding coverage, layers well, AND sheers down nicely with a damp beauty blender or applied after a facial mist. Wears well without a primer, but would definitely recommend a setting powder for areas prone to creasing. Bottle contains a LOT of product. Airless pump is easy to control, and keeps formula fresh. All great, but listen, IT, WHAT IS THIS SHADE RANGE? You basically have 10 shades in the Medium range, and 2 in the Deep range. I am very fair skinned with neutral undertones and the Fair is a weird-looking peachy orange on my skin. Way too dark for anyone who actually has fair skin. Disregard the swatch model photos; they're not remotely accurate. This is such a great product when it comes to performance, but IT, get it together and MAKE A FULLER RANGE OF SHADES. Would I recommend this product? Sure, but only to anyone with medium toned skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage is beautiful, it does a great job of masking any texture that I have. My only real cons are that it is not long wearing at all, and does not hold up against oils. The product actually kind of started pooling up around the sides of my nose where I tend to get oily, which is kind of gross. Other than that, I like it for a short day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite makeup products. I reach for this on my natural days and/or on my full face glam days. I love the skin benefits this product gives and the amount of sun protection it has. By far one of the better CC creams I’ve tried as far as coverage too. It claims to be a full coverage but I find it to be more of a medium slightly buildable (which I don’t mind). For a sheer natural coverage I apply with my fingers, for a more built in coverage I use my Beauty Blender or the It Cosmetics brush they recommend for it. Even with combination skin I enjoy the healthy glow the product gives and set with powder on areas where I get the most oily. On days I’m doing a full face I love to use this as a primer under my foundation. Highly recommend to someone who’s new to makeup and wants something easy to use or someone who wants to switch up their current beauty routine.

reviews.review_title: The best base for your face
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this when my skin is more dry and when it is oily and under both extremes this CC cream (with the coverage of a foundation) out preforms the majority of other foundations I've owned. You have to try this product out. Coverage of a foundation, light weight feel of a BB cream- perfection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has become a rediscovered favourite! I love how this looks and wears on my normal to combination skin. My only complaint is the shades... Colour IQ (I’m around a 1R05) suggested Light but it’s a fraction too warm/yellow and about a shade too dark. I went back to find another shade and purchased Fair which was too light so I ended up mixing them together for the perfect shade. There is a middle shade but I found that colour to be too orange-y for me. Regardless I love this and don’t have an issue mixing the colours together.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This CC cream does not agree with my skin. The finish is a natural, creamy/dewy finish, and it looks pretty when freshly applied, but it doesn’t “set,” so any bump or smudge will smear your makeup. The IT CC cream settled into fine lines I didn’t know I had, settled on every flake of skin, and melted off around my pores. I’m giving it two stars instead of zero for looking nice when it first applied, for having SPF 50, and for a small amount of product efficiently covering my face.

reviews.review_title: Makes skin look soft and full
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favourite CC cream for days when I want full coverage. It is deff a thicker cream. It makes my face look so smooth when applying with a beauty blender. And wow.. SPF 50... can it get any better? It is so moisturizing and in no way feels like sun screen. I also have the Illuminating type and it is even better. I would recommend getting the one with the glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the coverage this provides. Originally I bought it for the day since it has spf and save my Makeup Forever one for night but I keep going back to this one and the coverage it provides. Always makes my skin look better than it is. Never oily or drying. Just my skin but better

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately, I had high expectations for this from the hype, however it transfers very easily. It's hard to touch your face because you'll end up having foundation marks on your fingers and it gets everywhere. This also broke me out after every application. It creases under and over eyes and although I have very dry skin, it made me look very oily. It's sad that it costs almost $40.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this cc cream because it does not settle into fine lines and the key is to use it sparingly and follow it up with a setting powder (I personally like Givenchy or Laura Mercier). It's easy to build if you need to but the creamy consistency makes it very easy to blend and I rarely need to use more than one pump. However, like all products, what works for me will not necessarily work for someone else. *I have very oily, sensitive skin that is prone to break outs if I am not careful and with this specific cc cream, I did not break out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this so much! It has great coverage that you can also layer. It has spf so you save the sunscreen step. Its great for dry/combination skin as its quite moisturizing. my only thing is that the colour changes a little because of the oxidation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect light foundation. Not too heavy looking or feeling but still covers pretty well. Also, love that it has SPF!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never went out of my way to review a product but i just wanted to make it known how much i LOVE this product. I was never able to find a foundation that gave me the coverage i wanted while still looking nice throughout the day. Typically i gravitate towards full coverage products because i have a lot of redness and texture so when the idea of using a CC cream was mentioned, i was a little hesitant but i can now say this is my holy grail. Gives me the full coverage i need while still feeling very light, I don’t have to worry about touching up or constantly looking in the mirror to make sure my makeup hasn’t separated and the best part is it ACTUALLY LOOKS LIKE SKIN. this is the ONLY product that does not settle into my smile lines or look likes it’s sitting on top of my skin!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Ok y'all I've always struggled with acne.. oily skin, dark spots, allat. This product literally works so well and a little goes a LONG way. I just apply it with any beauty blender and it covers my dark spots extremely well. The only con is it kinda rubs off throughout the day and I don't reapply makeup throughout the day, so if that's your thing, you'll love this product. It has sunscreen in it too and it's very lightweight, but the coverage is A1. I would use a primer before applying if you have oily skin tho or a mattifying powder afterwards, but y'all should definitely buy this.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really want to love the IT Cosmetics CC  cream (it would make life so much easier!), but there are a few things holding me back.  1. They're greasy and need setting powder. I have dry skin and don't usually struggle with shine/oil, but with these I definitely do. I find they break up a good amount as the day goes by. I've tried the regular and the illuminating versions and have the same issue with both, but naturally more so with the illuminating one.  2. I have yellow undertones - these become darker and pinker as they oxidize. I always look well-matched when I first apply and then the color shifts.  The product might work better for people with different skin types and undertones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Every time I use this cream, my skin literally glows. I never wear foundation. I wanted a cream that is lightweight and something that would make my skin look natural while at the same time would hide my imperfections. This is the one. Even after washing my face, I noticed a natural glow on my face which just blew my mind.. I would recommend using a moisturizer first to hydrate your face before applying this cc cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not quite the right shade for me, especially in the winter.  I have a hard time colour matching in most brands.  Higher coverage than what I like/need,  but I've been mixing a small amount in with my moisturizer and love the result.  I dislike most foundation type products, this one is one of the better ones and would be even better if I could get a closer colour match.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product for my combination skin.  It goes on silky smooth and does not separate.  I use a beauty blender for application, and the coverage is quite decent over my serums and moisturizer and then I apply a setting spray to help it last longer (not a fan of powders).  The only reason I did not give 5 stars is because the shades are somewhat limited...fair is too light and light is too dark...so I had to buy both shades and blend to get a good color match.

reviews.review_title: What perfect skin dreams are made of
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m 32, with some hormonal acne (ugh), mild signs of aging, redness and uneven skin tone. This covers it ALL. It definitely seems more full-coverage than expected, which is a major added bonus, but doesn’t come with the heavy, caked-on look of a full-coverage. I apply with a beauty blender and top it off with Kat Von D translucent powder. Stays all day long. Can’t recommend this enough!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not sure if I got a bad batch or my skin just didn't accept this product, but it is not for me.  Out of all BB/CC creams, this is still one of the better ones out of there, but I was NOT digging the finish on my skin. Not the greatest coverage, which is okay if you don't want much anyways, but my problem came with the actual appearance on my skin. It looked... flaky? Patchy? Uneven? It moved around a lot on my skin. I tried 3 different primers and no primer at all, and I just couldn't get it to work. The shade itself (Light) made me look pinkier and pastier than I already was (lol). Sorry IT, gonna have to pass this time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I decided to try this out because it was the highest rated BB/CC cream- and I'm glad that I did!! I got the medium tan shade based off of the Sephora shade matcher tool (I also use the Charlotte Tilbury magic foundation); however, I think next time I'll go a shade lighter. Irregardless, this formula is amazing! It is heavy enough to be able to layer if you want thicker coverage, but goes on very light and is very breathable. I live in a cold climate and this keeps my skin looking dewy and fresh all day, as opposed to dull and flaky. I will definitely buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really dislike this product. the smell is awful and it just melts on my skin, no matter how I set it. it really didn't work for me. I gave it to my mom. she likes it, so I gave it two stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My absolute favorite cc cream. It gives just enough coverage without feeling cakey. This is the only CC cream that hasen't caused my oily face to become greasy and shiny through out the day! I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve traded in all my foundations for this CC+ cream! It gives me just the right amount of coverage while still looking natural. It’s hydrating on the skin and is comfortable all day long.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very mouisturizing and covers redness very well, doesn’t last as long as i wished though, but is still amazing. Does have a bit of a scent, sort of like sunscreen but it’s actually quite enjoyable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the way it looks but my online problem is that it never sets. Anything that bumps my Face will ruin the foundation. And putting powder on top made it too cakey. No matter how much of it that I applied. Didn’t look natural at all

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - natural beige shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was a no for me. It’s 2019, the shade range should be WAY more inclusive. I’m biracial so I have unique undertones but this foundation made me look straight up green. I gave it the benefit of the doubt and tried other shades but it was never a match. In my opinion, it’s a great foundation but the company is cutting themselves short by excluding a large number of consumers because of their limited shade range. That’s unfortunate.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage, moisturizing, dewy finish.  One tube lasts me a long while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't find that this product held up to the claims made.The texture of my skin was not smoother; in fact the pores seemed more noticeable.  It does apply nicely though.   It could be my skin, but it doesn't seem to last the whole day.  My rosy cheeks come through and texture is uneven again and it looks like I have no make up on halfway through my day.  A good thing is that I have sensitive skin that tends to break out easily, and this product did not seem to do that to my skin.  It's a nice everyday kind of cream, but I wouldn't use it for going out or anything fancy.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This just wasn't what I was looking for. I desperately wanted the SPF 50 , but it took too long to work the product into my skin with a Beauty Blender in order for it to look natural to me. It also felt quite heavy to me. As time went on, it began to look oily, but somehow it would latch on to any area on my face that had the *slightest* of dryness, even when I put on lotion beforehand. Additionally, there was transfer. All that being said, I did not use a setting powder (nor do I want to) and I don't necessarily like the amount of work that comes with making medium-full coverage concealer look natural. So this didn't work for me and I didn't like it, but someone else more used to heavy makeup might.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this foundation. It’s so light and creamy like a moisturizer but still has light-medium coverage which is exactly what I need. Also, I tend to have dry skin so this definitely helped my skin and made it look much better! And I didn’t breakout after using it unlike other ones.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My go to foundation, great coverage without being too heavy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my top HG item. I ALWAYS go back to this. One pump covers the entire face. Great coverage without feeling heavy or looking cakey. It's very moisturizing but not oily. I don't need concealer when I use this. I just haven't been able to find anything that even comes close to comparing to this stuff. I am not a fan of foundation, so this is the perfect product for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I adore this CC cream - especially the full coverage it provides. It's my go-to daily (and night out) foundation and random people think I'm 10 years younger than I really am! It's even better when you set it with Bye Bye Pores powder:-)

reviews.review_title: GREAT! Will try a different shade next time.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I think next time I would maybe try the medium-tan, but when I bought this the past two times the new shades weren't available... so, medium is the slightest bit too yellow for me, but I really love this stuff, you can sheer it out super easy, the coverage is great if you want, it smells nice, sits nice, sets nice... and the spf is a bonus. I really love this stuff!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love how light it is and full coverage this is!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this is my go to face product every day. it wears like a foundation and is definitely full coverage, unlike most bb/cc creams i’ve tried in the past. it oxidizes which is a bit annoying but typical of foundations/skin tints. overall i’m very content with this product and i don’t see myself switching any time soon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product based on all the good reviews but I didn't. I have dry skin and this CC cream is very thick (not a cc cream) more like a full foundation reminds me of L'Oreal Infalliable foundation. Anyway, it looks nice on the skin, dewy etc, but for some reason gives me dry spots and itchy skin. Consistency is so thick, I prefer lighter, foundations CC cream etc. Probably better suited for oily skin. I'm glad i purchased the travel size first or i would have been stuck with this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Incredible, dare I say lifechanging! Full coverage but blendable. Has been preventing me from getting new freckles. Love it and will surely be wearing it for years to come!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation, like really love it. I work a busy job, as I'm always walking and moving aka sweating. I've been wanting to switch to a lighter and nicer foundation for my skin, and i picked this. Very happy I did.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing, I hate buying foundation of any kind but with recent breakouts I NEEDED something for my face. I normally hate foundation since I can feel it on my face, but this stuff was weightless and made my skin look flawless! a little does go a long way so I would use sparingly. amazing product so happy i bought it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Really great coverage without looking cakey. Looks very natural and provides a flawless finish

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This looked horrible on my dry skin. It clings to dry patches and it has a strong fragrance. It feels super heavy and by the end of the day it breaks apart and I look like a cakey mess. My skin gets tingly every time I put it on I think it’s reacting to the fragrance. It transfers like crazy no matter how I set it. Although it looks good from a distance and has good coverage, I will not be buying this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I give it 4 outa 5 stars because it turns grey on me the second I put it on so I have to use a different foundation with a golden undertone to warm it up to my color.The finish is beautiful it applies smoothly and even melts into my skin I do recommend this product but have a more yellow or golden foundation to warm up the foundation.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so hesitant to try this parodic because I thought it would look greasy. This has been the only thing that has helped my skin to survive Chicago weather. Has amazing coverage, long lasting and makes your skin look beautiful and healthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is everything I was hoping for!  lightweight but has incredible coverage without looking caked on.  Doesn't settle into fine lines.  I apply with my fingers and it's easy to blend out with a foundation brush.  Lasts all day.  High SPF so no need for a layer of sunscreen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing. Very light and smooth. covers very well. I don't like heavy makeup, i am a mascara and a hint of blush kinda girl. My sister in law talked me into this CC cream, came in for a sample and absolutely loved it. I was hesitant at first, i have sensitive skin and combination skin. Thought it would break me out, it's been a month of me using it and no breakouts. My oily skin does not even show through. Went back within a few days and purchased the bigger size. I was very impressed with this product and i have been raving about it to all my friends and family since.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite CC cream. I have combination, acne prone, huge pores skin and I am always so shocked at how good this CC cream looks on my skin. It’s not oily, provides perfect medium coverage, and reduces the look of fine lines and pores on my skin. I have to set it with powder, but this CC cream works well with all kinds of primer and powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is amazing, will continue repurchasing. Wonderful full coverage while looking natural and not feeling heavy. I don’t even need to use concealer. Does not irritate and truly helps balance my combination skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This used to be my favorite foundation I used for years. They've recently reformulated/changed the lightest shade to be darker and more warm toned. I can no longer use it. SO BUMMED! Change it back IT Cosmetics!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Still my favourite cc cream. Great to mix in with other foundations as well. Never breaks me out!

reviews.review_title: Needs deeper darker shades them I would buy again
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is really a nice cc cream and I love the spf in it and it does help a bit improving the health of your skin.  However I am in the shade deep that is the darkest shade and It could be a bit darker for it to really match me but I am  able to make it work.  It feels nice on the skin and it gives the skin a real nice radiance not a greasy or overly dewy look. I have normal to dry skin so I cannot speak for oily skin.  Because of the shade range I won't purchase again.  This cost a pretty penny for me to have to make this work for my complexion.  So I will stick to my maybeline  fit me were I can buy 5 to 6 bottles for the price of this foundation.  So if you can find your match in this foundation depending on your skin type I would recommend.

reviews.review_title: I want to like it... but it’s so hard to
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I just cannot get into this product, and I really want to love it. It looks ok on initial application, not the best but not the worst either. It settles into my smile lines almost immediately and separates and breaks up after maybe 4 hours? I have other products that look better and last longer. I can only wear this if I plan for short errand trips or something. I have normal/combo skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! It has great coverage and it covers up my dark spots. I love that it includes SPF 50 in it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Full coverage looks too much makeup on my face, a little dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! As a male, with combo skin and redness and a 5 o’clock shadow, I reapply this 2times a day. this works wonderfully without that matty makeup look. Perfect for a fresh light look. But i am switching brands because its way too pricy for me. I go through it in two weeks.  So IT Co. needs to double the size or bring the price down.  Too bad. I really enjoyed it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this product! It is so light weight yet full coverage. Every time I wear it I get compliments on my skin.

reviews.review_title: I always come back to this foundation!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product was recommended to me by a MUA. I have very oily skin with large pores. At first I was a little skeptical but once she tried it on me I was sold! I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this foundation. I always get so many compliments that it looks so natural and that you cant even tell I have foundation on. you can build this up as well which I also love. I will alternate with my foundations but I always keep coming back to this one. My friends have now tried it with different skin concerns and they love it as well. DEF a must try!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great product. I have been through so many foundations and correctors but finally I found one that sits beautifully in my skin. The coverage is perfect and it blends really well. I am so glad I found this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I would give this product 5 stars and reorder if they would reformulat without retinyl palmitate-an ingredient that I long ago isolated as one that makes me break out with continued use. If not sensitive or of unique skin tone, it would be a wonderful multi use product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this product BUT the fair shade is too dark for me. I really wish they would come out with more shades, including a shade or two lighter. If they did, this would be my holy grail! I love how smooth and skin-like this looks. I love that it's moisturizing and has a great SPF!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Coming from a powder based foundation, I was not sure what to expect...but made the switch to this and have been liking it for sure. Great for the entire face including under eyes, and bit of neck too!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried a lot, I mean a lot of light coverage face make up. This one is the BEST I've tried. I tend to like natural finish and I have very sensitive skin. It took a while to figure out how to use this product but I finally figured out layer it on top of a primer is the best for it to not cling to skin. It's a beautiful finish that last for a long time if you set it properly. I have fair skin with a yellow undertone and usually more fair skin products are tinted with a pink undertone, and this one is a perfect match. It really does not disturb my skin at all and is very easy to take off at the end of the day to not cause more irritation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to love this CC (in color light). After going through 2 tubes of it I decided to get the light fair color thinking it would be a better match for the winter months. Did they change the formula in the new color???? It’s terrible, makes the skin oily, settles into fine lines and sticks to dry patches. Easily rubs off the face and doesn’t settle into the skin like it used to before.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I rarely write reviews but always read them – so it’s time to return the favor!  To start, I have combination skin with oily T-zone. This CC cream/foundation looks gorgeous, covers well, gives my skin a luminous glow and is impressive in terms of SPF rating. A little also goes a long way, so it will last awhile. Packaging in a pump tube is nicely thought out, too! It does however have a very dewy finish, so I absolutely have to apply setting/blotting powder right away – and I tend to still get shiny 5-6 hours later and have to resort to blotting papers. This makes it a good wintertime choice for my skin, but for the summertime I’ll have to look for another option that’s more matte... Which is unfortunate because of this product’s appealing high SPF.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I initially kind of liked this product, I thought it had great coverage although the consistency was super thick and sticky-like (definitely need to use powder with it). However it started making me break out SO bad when I began wearing it to 8 hour workdays. My forehead is breaking out like no other.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is very thick and emphasizes my pores. Disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this about a month and a half ago. I am not a big foundation wearer so when I tried this, I was really excited. It was light and absolutely felt like I was not wearing anything. It looked natural as well but I began to notice that I would slowly break out.
