I thought it could possibly be something else but every time I wore it, I would break out, especially around my chin. I really wanted to love this but unfortunately, it did not work out for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly, was expecting a totally different product. I feel that the consistency of this was way to thick, heavy, and feels a bit drying on the skin. Also, the product comes off on everything; earbuds, sweatshirts, and hands. When I look for a BB/CC cream I want my skin to breathe but still have a bit of coverage to even my skin tone, this product did not do it for me.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Tan - light brown shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it. Makes my face look moisturized and lasts all day

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff! Barely need to use any, and pairs super well with the CoverFX dewy primer!

reviews.review_title: SPF is just an added bonus
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not used to wearing anything more than lipstick and eyeliner and shadow.  This evened out my complexion.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage! It goes on smoothly and really matches my skin without masking it. Loving it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love th foundation, great coverage

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So happy! As a women on the other side of 50 I have found less IS REALLY more. This CC  Cream is perfection.

reviews.review_title: Amazing but you might still need moisturizer!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Does everything it claims to do! I do feel that it's not super hydrating, I have to apply moisturizer generously or even primer underneath before applying this otherwise it looks a little cakey. It is definitely full coverage, color correcting and leaves my skin looking dewy. Just one tiny pump does the trick for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to really love this CC Cream, but I think it has changed. The shade I have (Fair) oxides really bad and settles in every single crease/pore on my face. When I go to touch up midday, I just have to take it off because of how terrible it looks. It doesn’t set either, it always remain tacky and rubs off on everything, so you really have to set it with a powder. I wouldn’t recommend using it as a full coverage foundation for pictures either as the flashback makes you look ghostly due to SPF. All in all, this is terrible but it really used to be great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I am such a rookie, I had been using concealer all over my face without knowing any better. Insert shame here. This product is so easy for me to apply, I’ve created a quick everyday routine that makes me feel confident and pretty thanks to this. Love love love it I couldn’t be more pleased.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Why do people like this CC cream so much?? I have combination skin, and I think it just made my face look waxy, made my pores look bigger, and emphasized fine lines. Not sure what I'm missing here.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been on a non-stop hunt for the perfect foundation for the last 3 years AT MINIMUM and still haven’t found the holy grail, however this is a good contender. It’s the dead of winter ATM and I don’t look like some ashy reject with this applied. I used a beauty blender for application but I feel it really doesn’t cover my pimple marks completely, so, still looking! I’m just happy it’s not another hideous matte foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never used a 'CC' cream before so I thought I would try this one. I love it! It goes on easily and does an admirable job of hiding my 'sunspots'. The fact that it also has an SPF of 50 is an awesome bonus; I am looking forward to using it this product in the summer as my job is an outside one and I am getting tired of the pigment that comes up in blotches. Thank you for showing it to me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve completely stopped using foundation, and that is HUGE for me. The coverage is amazing. This product completely evens out my skin tone and my skin is honestly healthier from using it. I’ve gotten lots of compliments from my coworkers who are all really big on skin care.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cc cream, has very good coverage and the best is the ingredients, and SPF 50.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best makeup I ever have tried. It feels soft and natural and is full coverage. My relatives asked me if I had a plastic surgery on my face and I laughed and said it’s my new makeup cream. I am so happy to have it. I would wear it every single day. By the way I am a no makeup lady but this changed my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s messy packaging - I find the product gets on the lid very easily.   I does have good coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: BEST CC cream EVER. Absolutely in love with this product!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I do really like this as my foundation but I don’t find it to be above others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Light colour is not light in my opinion. I have Northern European skin and this was  a bit too tanned for me. Am keeping it as it may match my summer skin tone. I like the coverage and spf. It has a slightly citrus scent and I am not sure if it makes my skin a little red as I have problems with citrus on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it. It is easy to apply with your hands and has great coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Super produit et prix abordable

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am oily with acne prone skin. So this product was never on my radar as it has a more moisturizing finish. However, I recently purchased it to use as my foundation during a tropical vacation. It is amazing! I can never get my makeup to look good after a day in this sun. This looks awesome. Yes it leaves me a bit shiny. But I am on vacation. Bring on the glow. Doesn’t look heavy at all. Super quick to apply. Covers all my acne concerns. I can’t get over how awesome it performs after sun compared to my normal go- to foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased this as I was wanting something super simple to put on that will even my skin tone when I’m running out the door but not wanting to put on a full face of foundation. I’m blown away with the coverage and how well it wears - I applied it with my hands and it covers my scars / evens my skin tone. I will definitely be repurchasing and this might even be my new day to day foundation. Highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a beautiful foundation but if you have dry skin make sure you moisturize. I wouldn’t recommend for very sensitive skin because the citrus in the product can make your skin peel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Local Sephora store only had five shades, and they were either too light or dark. I bought what seemed to be my closest match, and it was way too light. The product is too thick and hard to blend. It was not natural at all, and it actually broke out my skin. My skin is normal, and I almost never break out. Please do not buy this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok coverage, but makes my skin look a little greasy. I have to put a powder over it to help set the makeup. I don't love it, but keeping it as a backup foundation when my main one runs out or is low.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: No doubt this product had great coverage. A little went a long way. However I think it aggravated my acne. It also leaned a little too yellow on me (I’m neutral leaning cool undertone).  It’s worth a try if you get a sample as it did not seem to affect others the same way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was desperate for a product to help hide my dark circles and many people told me to try this. I ordered the mini size, since I wasn't sure if I'd like it. I don't know if they got their formulas mixed up or what, because the light made me look like an Oompa Loompa. It was so dark. And then when I took it off, it stained my makeup remover pad. Since Sephora has a good return policy, I'm going to try a full size in a lighter shade. With any luck I'll be changing this review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok. I did a lot of research on this product before purchasing it. I am a 49 year old concerned with many problems now. Eczema, acne, dryness, oily eyelids and wrinkles hitting me all at once. This product is simply amazing! I have to say the coverage (and I do not use a lot) is light, but takes little to cover with. I use about 1/2 a single pump to cover lightly my entire face. Using my finger tips, it spreads easily and blends flawlessly! I paired this with the Bye-Bye under eye in light and Bye-Bye press powder in light and in 5 mins I am done applying!! After a week my skin is softer, more even toned and the dryness has cleared up. My eczema has cleared up and no color change through out the day. Highly recommend for mature skin, this is my new go-to! I figure the tube will last past 4 months so money well spent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love a dewy medium to light coverage foundation, but it always makes me look cakey. This cc cream gives me spf, a lightweight coverage with colour correctors, and a little product goes a long way. My face doesn’t crease or get into my pores. does the exact same as a full coverage foundation but better!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the coverage this cc cream provides! It’s very moisturizing and feels great and light on your skin, with the coverage of a true foundation. I have acne and scaring on very pale skin, so it really stands out in contrast and is hard to cover and blend. I still use concealer on tops of this, but I do feel like this cc cream covers it very well and I’m able to use less concealer than I used to. Added bonus to any skincare/makeup it smells really good!

reviews.review_title: Not a good fit for POC
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Both of the dark shades were just a grey undertone! It's really a shame because I watched the amazing before and after videos, but there was just nothing I could do to make it work. I also was not a fan of the scent, and it just didn't have a natural looking finish on the skin overall. I like IT Cosmetics, but this was a huge miss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This gave me lots of texture and red bumps everywhere. It made me look super shiny and oily looking. The color seemed to match but still kind of looked off. I have dry combination skin. This really ruined my skin. I returned but my face is still recovering. The only good thing about it is the sunscreen and the coverage seemed nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful product I prefer to use it with a brush it surpasses any high end foundation

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cc cream has a blurring effect on my skin, which hides my pores and dryness and looks flawless. It has a really pretty satin finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how natural this foundation looks on my skin! I would say it’s  more of a medium rather than full coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product provided amazing coverage even on my dark acne scars ! I’m also really picky about the finish of my foundations but this is a perfect balance of radiance meets matte some how ! It’s my new favourite product and would tell anyone to give it a shot.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this cc cream has really good coverage, but very dry on dry skin. it made the pores around my nose area look larger.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this product based largely on the testimonials, but I was super disappointed when it arrived. I have applied this product by itself and with every single moisturizer I own, and it doesn’t make a difference—this product absolutely refuses to blend into my skin!! I wished I had tried it on in the store. I wish I hadn’t run out the 60-day return window, thinking it was something wrong with my skin and not the product. It hovers over my skin in patches, giving the appearance that my skin is dry... but it isn’t dry at all.  Be wary. Get a sample first.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: NOT WORTH THE MONEY maybe if it was like 10$ it would be great but it’s super expensive for very little quality it doesn’t cover it correct any discolouration

reviews.review_title: Great coverage and finish, but OXIDIZES!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this stuff. In the summer I use the Illuminating version and decided to try the original for an everyday foundation for winter. The light shade looked like a perfect match in the store but when I wore it for the first time, it turned at least a whole shade darker!!! Definitely oxidizes, I'm not sure if it was just my shade or all of them. Definitely test it on your hand and walk around the store to be sure it's the right shade. But other than that, great product! Buildable coverage and leaves a semi-dewy finish. Smells nice too.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great medium to full coverage, and I love the way it makes my skin look, but it doesn’t stay put and is constantly getting on my clothes and papers when working if I touch my face. Still transfers even after I set with translucent powder. That’s the only reason I stopped wearing it :/

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have very dry, sensitive skin and am prone to sunburns. This provides great coverage without irritating or drying out my skin! It's definitely a fuller coverage foundation which I don't usually go for but this makes my skin look great

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this stuff a few weeks back before a trip to the Bahamas.  I wanted something that had sunscreen in it and was more skin care focused than a foundation would be.  So far I have been using this as part of my daily makeup routine and it has replaced my Born This Way foundation for my day to day makeup.  I will say I feel like it comes off throughout the day, but if I set it I really don't have any issues.  Also, I can tell that my skin is looking healthier and happier after using this just a few weeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely adore this product, it’s worth every penny. It feels great, after wearing this CC cream for several hours I don’t want to wash my face which was the case with almost all tinted moisturizers and foundations I had. The SPF is a great plus for me as I’m afraid of photoaging. My skin has a healthy glow when I use this CC. I previously had BareMinerals tinted gel and it was awful, biggest disappointment in my life.

reviews.review_title: Lasts an entire shift as a CNA
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combo skin, apply this over a clinique moisturizing jelly and a bit of pore filling primer for reference. a couple cons, it looks darker in some spots, by my eye for some reason though ive never had issues with other foundations doing this. it doesn’t bother me enough to ditch the product. Another weird thing that happens is no matter how moisturized my skin is, if i do have a pimple the product will crust over it, kind of how the maybelline “better skin” concealer will do. when i remove the makeup the pimple is gone which, is cool, i guess? Nevertheless, this foundation is so amazingly comfortable through an 8 hour shift as a CNA sweating in my resident’s 80 degree rooms. It looks great all day and doesnt come off in spots!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination sensitive skin and I love this. It looks amazing on the skin. You can use this alone and get full coverage. Or, What I do most times, for a more subtle look, I mix a pump with my gel moisturizer and spread it with my hands, it’s a light to medium coverage and looks super natural. I’m a man, and I don’t like to go to heavy, this product is awesome you can really make it work so it seems you aren’t wearing any makeup. You can also use it as concealer, just blend a small amount with your fingers. I always set it with some powder and it looks flawless for a long time. Highly recommend it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best CC cream EVER!  I am in love with this product and it has changed the way I feel about my skin.  I have suffered from rosacea flare ups in the past but since changing my face products (after a lot of trial and error) this is one of the products I can use which does not irritate my skin in any way.  I actually think it helps improve it.  This goes on really nicely and I use it with their air brush perfecting powder as well to set it.  I get compliments all the time on how good my skin looks now.  IT cosmetics...don't ever change this formula!  it is perfect

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely amazing, makes my skin look smooth, lasts all day, not cakey, matches SO well, love it so much 10/10 would recommend

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m all about looking as natural as possible and this definitely gives me that. It’s shear and extremely comfortable to wear. This is my go to. I do set it with a powder and it lasts all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it is okay kind of cc cream, o understand that it is a cc cream so the coverage is not going to be full, it is more like a moiturizer with light tint that fades away 60% in 5 hours or so, i did not like the color of the cc cream, my shade was ashy or orangy kind, it is great for me when i have crystal clear skin other than that m not a big fan of this product and will not repurchase once i am done with the tube.

reviews.review_title: loved it in the summer, not so much for winter
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: At first I loved this product, worked really well on my skin in the summer. I repurchased the product in “light” for the winter months and I found it was patchy and that it did not cover my acne scarring.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Tried it first as a sample and then I got it almost immediately! I love this product. I have dry dehydrated skin and this just made it feel very comfortable and hydrated! Love the SPF and serums within the product ❗️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I suffer from acne and from hyperpigmentation. This is the best! It’s light weight- it’s full coverage and i love that it’s has SPF and Essential serums. It’s smells great and is buildable. Get it, i promise you will love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I haven’t purchased this in a couple of years, and I forgot how much I love this! I have dry combination skin, and this is great to help moisturize my skin. It goes on and blends easily while giving me a bright, even look. I don’t think I’ll go back to regular foundation for a very long time! Plus you don’t even need much.

reviews.review_title: Definitely not as advertised! Still need lotion!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Makes my already dry skin look drier. I actually have to add a moisturizer on top after it dries to make it bearable to look at.  Also makes lines more visible. Doesn't work as advertised.

reviews.review_title: The best CC cream out there
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product!! It’s so gentle on my skin I can wear it everyday. It feels thick, by once applied, irs nice and light weight. I’ve been searching for a good bb or cc cream for awhile and this one is the best!! Will be reordering!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product. If using as a base for my makeup, I mix it with my moisturizer and it creates a beautiful tinted moisturizer. I also use this product as a concealer because I like my concealer to be light and match my skin tone. This product is perfect for any skin type. It keeps my skin hydrated in the winter and oil free in the summer. I totally recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Found it hard to blend and heavy on the skin. Had other cc creams that have been fantastic, this is just like foundations

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is perfect to use as an every day foundation. I agree that a little goes a long way and provides about medium coverage. I usually apply concealer or a bit of stick foundation to the areas that need a bit more. I apply this product with a beauty blender and it goes on smooth. It has a shiny finish because of all the SPF so I usually pat on a bit of translucent powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: after wearing it for just like 3 hours it just looked rly powdery next to my nose and forehead even after putting a moisturizer underneath but i have normal-dry skin so maybe it would look good for someone with oilier or combo skin ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ love the coverage tho

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It looks very nice when you just put it on, but it oxidizes really fast and turns to an orange color in the matter of 5 hours or less. It smells very nice but it cannot stay long. Also, this is not what you should go for for coverage.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best CC creams I have ever tried. Makes my skin look healthy and you can hardly tell that your wearing anything on your face at all. The price is pretty steep for a CC cream but because of the quality it is totally worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've almost switched over everything to this brand.  My skin is looking fantastic to the point people ask what I'm using daily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE THIS CC CREAM! My skin has been so dry and most other foundations have looked patchy and shown dry texture. The it cosmetics cc cream makes my skin look flawless. Gives good coverage and is buildable but looks like nothing on the skin and les your skin show through a bit. So upset I’ve waited this long to buy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that they have expanded the shade range. I i i I can easily be applied with fingers and absorbs well. Use a light hand because it can feel heavy. Beautiful medium to fill coverage that is rare for a cc cream but make no mistake this is a dewy finish NOT natural like it claims. Only downside is this wears off at the 4 hour mark

reviews.review_title: It will cover E V E R Y T H I N G
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really was not expecting the amount of coverage of this CC cream, I’ve tried Bobbi Brown BB cream & that was the coverage that I was expecting a light/medium one, but this thing is impressive, it lives up to what you would expect a full coverage foundation would give you without the cakey look, it is a little oily if you don’t set it & it oxidized a bit on me, but even with that I really liked the finish once I set it, I used Coty Airspun for it & it worked like a charm. Will be buying again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: OMG! Finally found my base! I even use it as concealer and it doesn't crease as much as all tried concealer, at 40 this is a miracle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: IT Comestics' CC Cream has become the only face makeup I use! It's light and hydrating but still give you that medium coverage. I've tried higher brand CC creams or tinted moisturizer, but I had to come back to this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried so many CC creams and this is by far the best!  Great coverage while still allowing my freckles to show through, blends amazingly well, a little bit goes a long way and it eliminates any redness.  It is a bit dewy so a little finishing powder helps lock things down.  It's honestly better than any full coverage foundations I've ever used and doesn't feel heavy either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product. I previously used Too Faced Born This Way and thought I loved it until I started to notice more and more how much it would slide around and rub off during the day (even with powder and setting spray). This foundation looks beautiful on both me and my mom (young and older skin) and LASTS all day. Literally it doesn’t move. I’m hooked!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation for days when I want light coverage! Very thin moisturizer texture but can be build able for more coverage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage and feels good on the skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this product after all the hype I heard on youtube but I was very disappointed. It clings to all the dry patches around my mouth and nose. For reference- I am not very dry, more combo. It also broke up around my chin after around 4 hours of wear. I would have returned it but it was the only thing I took on a long vacation so it was fairly used. The only reason I gave it 2 stars instead of 1 is that it does have full coverage as it claims.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I switched to this when my L’Oréal pro glow ran out and I felt it was time to find something new. this foundation is absolutely amazing. I love the more dewy fresh natural look and this definitely does the job for me.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my HG foundation. I've been using it for probably 4 years now. Color match is about as close as it's going to get for me and the pigmentation is wild. When I first got it, I had pretty severe acne and would use almost a full two pumps on my face. Now, I use about half of one. It goes on evenly and smooth either way. I tried the illuminating version, but the glitter (people claim there's no glitter in there, but I swear) drove me nuts. This one still works well on my dry skin. I also really trust the SPF in it. I've actually used it instead of other sunscreens on vacation before, even when I didn't care about having coverage, just because I knew that I wouldn't get any sun on my face with it on. Also worth noting that I have extremely sensitive skin and this has never broken me out. I wouldn't recommend this for oily folks, as it doesn't set on its own. I set mine with Laura Mercier's setting powder and love the finish I get.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best coverage, best ingredients and best feeling on the skin! It’s perfect for an everyday look.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful finish, great coverage and lasts as long as I set it with powder. Love this in the summer with a tan since it has an olive undertone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Personally I just find this foundation ok. Honestly the finish seems kind of dated. It feels and looks heavy on the skin and it doesn't blend out as well as some other foundations that i've tried. Personally 1 pump gives out way too much product and it's difficult to get a half/ quarter pump. It also has a citus smell which can be a positive or a negative depending if you like it or not.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Très déçu de ce produit, on me l’a conseillé comme fond de teint, mais ne tient pas toute la journée. Celui-ci migre même s’il est poudré. Pas top pour 47$.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My GO TO!! I have such dry skin and I find a lot of foundation makes me look cakey. This is literally my life saver! It’s not very full coverage so you would have to apply 2 layers (I personally don’t mind a medium coverage). It also doesn’t break me out at all!!! love love love

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: great coverage.  SPF 50. I use a drop of marula oil with it as my skin is dry. lasts all day. I finish with the It white powder for a perfect, glowing look.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage, I found this one to be the best of many concealer solutions I've used throughout the years for my undereyes and acne scars. I'll be honest - I originally got some samples of this because I considered buying the limited edition set, but then that stopped being on sale. After that I just kept getting more samples of this product, trying different shades and whatnot. I finally purchased it though, and am very happy with it! It doesn't get too caky or oily which is appreciated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have super dry skin, but this works for me, not all the time though. It’s not full coverage, but does a great job covering pores, which I think it’s the best part of it. I use it with my fingers, and it can be done beautifully. Super nice and convenient for travelling! Definitely will repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really liking this foundation! I have dry skin and this product makes me look dewy and gives a natural glow. 4 stars because it should come in more shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation. I would say its medium coverage but buildable. It goes on very natural and mimicks real skin. I would not recommend for people with dry skin or patches as I noticed it did cling to my dry areas.

reviews.review_title: Nourishing with coverage like that of a foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first tried this CC Cream a few years ago when I received a sample. Since then, I've repurchased several times. It's got ingredients that are great for the skin, including SPF. Makes my skin look nice and hydrated. Though a CC cream, the coverage is more like that of a foundation. If you have very oil skin, you mightn't like as much. For the rest of us, it's a great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the coverage and smoothness! However, it transfers sooo easily! It gets on my clothes and if i touch my face it gets all over my hands making me need to constantly wash them throughout the day. I wish this didn’t happen because it looks so good on!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you are pale this is not for you, I got the shade fair expecting it to be fair... I was wrong it is yellow/golden and more of a “light” shade. Product it self worked great but can only wear it at night or in dim lighting

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My face actually hurts after I applied this on my skin.... I have never had this reaction ever but I do not recommend this product if you have sensitive skin.

reviews.review_title: Amazing for dry to normal skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I swear by this stuff. I've gone through 4 tubes of this. I have rather dry skin/combo around the t-zone, but the coverage is buildable which makes it easier to concentrate coverage on certain areas. A little goes a long way and doesn't clog your pores/break out your skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical at first about the hype that surrounded this Foundation. I am a full coverage girl and most full coverage foundations tend to dry my skin out. I was pleasantly surprised at how great this was when I first tried it. I love the added bonus of the SPF 50.  I would totally recommend giving this foundation a try.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage was pretty good but not good enough to cover a few of my dark acne spots. I really like the finish, it gives you a nice glow. I would recommend it to someone who likes a nice glowy finish :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this because of all of the influencers I saw using it. I have combo oily skin. I wanted coverage, but not cakiness. This began breaking apart and settling into smile lines, around my nose, and around my chin about 2 hours in. It also felt super greasy and was very shiny. Any touch ups would just spread the product around even more. It has a pretty good medium coverage, but I found if you tried to build it to full, it would start to look cakey. For some reason, when paired with my Tarte Shape Tape, it would move around and cause the concealer to look awful. I did love the tube and the color though, the forumla just didn't work.

reviews.review_title: The best coverage that is also good for your skin.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I discovered this product about 2 1/2 yards ago. It made my complexion look flawless. I have always suffered from drier more dehydrated skin so foundations can make it really break me. I love that it has spf in it (one less thing for me to worry about layering) I live in Florida humid weather. Yes this will transfer bad IF you don’t set it. I never used to set my foundations until recently and discovered what a huge difference it makes. I paired this with the Becca’s hydro-mist setting powder. I stopped using for about a year because I was just being cheap is all and also I just love discovering new products that hopefully work better than the first. But let me be very clear, I’ll probably never be without this product again. My skin looks younger fresher and more radiant when I use this it’s better for your skin than other foundations as it is a cc cream. Also like I mentioned before, the spf just adds to making the price point worth it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I heard and read amazing reviews about this product, which I so badly wanted to love! It gave me an amazing healthy glow to my skin which I really liked. However, it did not work well with my dry skin. I found that regardless of how much moisturizer I put on, the foundation still dried out my skin and looked patchy. I ended up returning it because I couldn't find a way to make it work.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the BEST CC creams for dry skin. Would not recommend during warmer months or climates as this would look oily on the skin. This is the perfect “foundation” for a no-makeup look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this due to it's popularity but I am a little disappointed. This is a bad CC cream for dry skin and the undertone is too yellow for my skin tone. I might give it a second chance in the warmer months when I have less dry patches because it does feel okay on the skin, it has medium coverage (which is what I go for) and I love the amount of spf in it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This used to be my all time favorite CC cream, and I even used it in place of foundation. I stopped using because the old one only had five colors, none of which matched me exactly, and I got sick of blending on my neck. HOWEVER. Apparently there’s a lot more shades now, so I’ll be giving this one another go! The actual formula is great, so I’m betting I’ll be pleased.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I first purchased this because of it's high SPF. Since then, I've done a lot of research and realize the flaw of my assumptions with this product --my own fault. I minus 2 stars because 1) I don't think the packaging is very practical as there's still a lot of product left once you've squeezed/use all you can (for the price I don't want to have to cut it to get the last couple drops) and 2) I wish there more shades were available. Overall, the coverage is natural making it perfect for everyday use but I have no intention of purchasing again.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful finish... but broke me out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product because it made my skin look flawless! My cheeks are extremely red and the foundation made my skin look flawless, however, I broke out pretty bad after a few uses.(I am assuming because of SPF)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The name is perfect. This does give such a natural healthy skin look. I tried the glow version of this and I like both but I tend to stick to the original since it still makes skin look super dewy but without the glitter. I also go darker with this since it's pretty sheer and forgiving. This will perfect uneven skin tone, but it does not cover blemishes. I would not recommend for dry skin. When I have dry patches it will be a bit flakey at first, but improves over time with my natural oils.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing coverage and so light...  also SPF 50!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! Perfect foundation, feels light and natural,will buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this because of the hype. First try my face was not cleansed and not that clean. I primed and applied the foundation with a foundation brush. After 10min my face looked caked and powdery and dry and cracky. I tried it again another time with a full cleansed face and primed and applied it with a damp beauty blender and OMG it was flawless. So stunning!! I used a $8 dollar concealer that usually makes me super oily and I set my face and I baked and after wearing for 8hours I looked amazing and barely any oil, I did not have to touch up. Its incredible!! I even matched my color perfectly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. I have combination skin and it works extremely well for me, providing great coverage with light weight.  This is my favourite CC cream.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I saw this inside a store near me and decided that fair would probably be the best color to use, but it was way too light, and ended up washing me out. Even blush and bronzer couldn't fix the weird white cast that it left on me. This doesn't seem to oxidize either. If you're a fair/light-skinned olive with neutral undertones I would highly advise you to approach this product with caution. I do like how it hydrated my skin though and went on smoothly without it drying up too fast like other full coverage foundations.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried so many foundations and will search no further as this is the perfect foundation for me! I have fallen in love with all It products after starting with this foundation. It provides excellent coverage while looking very natural. It applies smoothly, reflects light nicely and has excellent staying power. I have also had the best colour match with this cc cream for my fair skin. The spf is very effective as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! This covers my rosacea super well and lasts all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. Covers well, easy to apply and a little goes a long way. Love the SPF too.

reviews.review_title: Orange tint -  still a very limited range
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Given the lack of diversity in the shade range for IT foundations,  I was excited when they came out with additional colors. This is the only new shade between the IT colors I currently mix to get my foundation color (IT Light and IT Medium), but unfortunately, this shade was way more orange than I expected it to be.  I’ll be returning it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the way it makes my skin look dewy and smooth. Has pretty decent coverage for a CC cream and love that it has SPF. Overall, great looking cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS!!! It looks like you have nothing in your skin yet covers perfectly. Will re-buy forever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Coverage is light and although it promises no breakout, I broke out.  It does stay on all day but I found the colour to fade to lighter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Feels like I’m not Wearing anything at all. No breakouts. Decent coverage for my preferred natural look. Great value for cost.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite CC cream. My only issue with it is sometimes it doesn't last nearly as long as you would want it to. I use it on days where I want to look like I put SOME effort in

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Above and beyond! This is by far the best CC I have used. I walk into a room and people say I'm glowing. Previously I used Philip Roth CC (meh!) and tried a L'oreal brand. This one is creamy, and smooth and just perfect. I feel that it is a bit oily, so I set it with a couple strokes of powder. Go to see the gals/guys at Sephora and try it!!! PS I live in Florida so the fact that's SPF 50  is heavenly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation! Feels so light and you need so little for great coverage. Plus it includes SPF

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rich - golden brown shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My grandmother (same skin type and tone as mine) wanted a base product that would give her the coverage she desired without making her feel dried out during the colder seasons and I recommend this - she hasn’t put it down since!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Combo skin 25-30 age. I cannot stand this product. At first it’s really pretty and natural medium coverage. Within 2 hours it’s all broken down and Cakey. Really not worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is so easy to apply! I use it even when I'm just working around the house and yard to keep my skin protected from dust and dirt and sun damage. For evenings out it keeps my face looking great and I love that it doesn't fade. Adding more coverage is easy .. never looks cakey!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: its my go to CC cream but i treat it as a foundation. Has full coverage and i get so many compliments when i wear this product. It gives me a dewy look and i'm on the dry side. I constantly repurchase this product!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the feel and how it looks . Not too heavy very natural look

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love all of the skin benefits I receive from using this formula.  It acts as a mosturizer, sunblock, anti-ager, serum,

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Light coverage that lasts all day and conceals sun spots.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really have been liking how natural this product looks on the skin yet covers up redness extremely well. Only thing I can’t seem to figure out is the best primer to use under the cream.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked it, but I prefer the Shiseido 50sports better for my skin. Maybe it work better for younger skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like that it is an all in one product with SPF, anti-aging, and moisturizer. Easy to throw on in the morning before work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation looks very natural on the skin, its light-medium coverage. Its probably buildable but it'll look cakey.  I like to pair it with a concealer to conceal any spots and blemishes so my entire face doesn't look cakey with too much foundation. It stays all day and doesn't feel heavy at all

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The shade is very orange. The product is extremely shiny if you don't set it with powder. I almost looked greasy. Full coverage. Sort of leaves a pretty finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is not terrible but I would not repurchase. I have combination skin that is quite dry in the Canadian winter months and this CC cream collects along dry patches and in larger pores. The colour fair is a perfect match and I am a pale olive so it is still probably too dark for the porcelain skinned people.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lightweightfeel but it’s light coverage  and transfers a lot for a high end product, I like that it smells like citrus though. I notice the product cost $50 when I used it and since then it’s gotten cheaper

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Ive never written a review in my life but this product seriously is worth buying. Nothing but good things to say about this product my skin looks so smooth

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Over the MOON about this...I have extremely dry skin and have problems with foundations looking matte on me. This keeps my skin looking and feeling dewy, gives me just enough coverage, and still shows my freckles. Telling everyone to go get this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good grief, I tried this on in store one pleasant evening...I purchased it on the spot, because obviously I’m easily influenced, and the sales lady saw that a mile away. The next day I wore it outside where three different adults did a double take, and at least two small children ran to their mothers crying after they spotted me. I was ORANGE. It oxidized so furiously on my face, I was glowing orange. I was able to return the product. Thank you, next!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried sooo many different foundations and always go back to this one. I have super dry skin and this goes on light and dewy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty good and I like the SPF factor.  Good not great.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is great when you first apply it...but not even an hour later it gets all cakey and settles into my pores! Plus it gives me acne like whoa every time I use it!... I’ve tried it many times with different primers and what not. So sad because it’s so expensive!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Got this cream for Christmas and it's by the best one I've ever tried. It's light but still has good coverage for a CC cream. It does help with any imperfections your skin might have. And the SPF50 protection is a nice bonus. If you're questioning the price like I was before splurging on this product, it is worth the investment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this foundation. Feels so light. Smells SO good. Doesn't feel like it clogs my pores. Looks so soft on skin. I even bought some for my mom and she loves the way it looks on her skin, which is more mature and has lots of wrinkles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tried this product for a second time, and still don't like it. It goes on very heavy, and then melts off my face hours later. Even with using a primer and setting spray, it just won't stay on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first I loved this stuff, I find now that it fades quick and makes my skin look tired. I'm wondering if they changed the formula...?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. Everything at once . It saves me tons of time from doing several separate steps for getting ready to go out. Its just a little bit dry and creamy for somebody like me that does not need coverage for their face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this CC cream. I have really pale, really dry skin as well as rosecea and this works so good with all of those issues. It's called a CC cream but it's more like a foundation. It's buildable so you can apply with a damp beauty blender in sheer layers (my preferred daily application) or even used as a concealing base under another foundation for fuller coverage. But the thing I love most is that it feels like my skin, I never feel like I'm wearing foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finally found the perfect in between of light and full coverage. It is so easy to blend and a little goes a long way! Gives a dewy look without being overly shiny. I have definitely felt N improvement in my skin after switching to this product.   I am a hair stylist and it is the only foundation that doesn’t melt of after a 10  hour day. LOVE.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing!!  It takes the place of your primer, moisturizer and foundation and puts it in one product. I usually put one pump on as I would moisturizer and then a second pump with a budding brush then finish with a powder - end result is beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this product so bad, but it's an absolute NO for me. It gave me closed comedones on my forehead and broke me out in places I typically never break out (like on my temples). Looked cakey and settled into dry patches. Beware if you have combination / acne / sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go-to foundation. I have oily skin and this product really works well with it. I’m also glad that they made more shades.  Which is perfect for people that are in between shade range like me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The reviews for this cc cream can be misleading! Having oily skin this did not cake up on me throughout the whole day , also I have prone acne skin and this did not emphasized my acne blemishes. This made my skin look flawless. I did not use any primer with this because I don’t feel that it’s needed

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this CC cream! I have been searching for a lightweight foundation for a while, and I fell in love with this! It works so well with my combination skin. I have been using it for about 6 months now, and I am still in love! I will be purchasing again.

reviews.review_title: light, takes years off, easy to apply
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect! Definitely use with a primer and it will keep your skin from breaking out if you end up having that happen. Light feeling on the skin and it stays all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: FAVOURITE CC CREAM EVER. I use this as foundation and nothing has ever made my skin look this good. A little bit goes a long way, you can easily sheer it out. I love the extra SPF and anti-aging ingredients. Such a flattering finish and love that they have quite a decent colour range.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very light but good coverage matches my skin tone well very easy to blend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve purchased this product more than 5 times I absolutely love the way it leaves my skin looking dewy and healthy. I work at Sephora and the amount of clients that come in to the store and compliment my skin is unreal! Love love love i recommend to all my clients and friends especially because it has spf in it.

reviews.review_title: Foundation for people who don't like foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don't like to wear a full face of make-up, but I really wanted to even out my skin tone and have the dewy, flawless look that I see all over the internet. So, at the age of 32 (!!) a friend recommended IT's CC  as foundation for people who don't like foundation. I adore this product. It's very lightweight and blends super well. It wears beautifully all day and doesn't need a primer (but if you want one, the IT Cosmetics Bye Bye Pores is uh-mazing). I highly recommend. For comparison, Too Faced Born this Way makes all of my flaws and imperfections stand out.

reviews.review_title: Pure magic! I love this stuff.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes a long way. It is a fantastic full coverage. I am acne prone and this covers all of my breakouts and imperfections and makes me look flawless.  I replaced my bareminerals cc cream and foundation for this. I love that this CC  cream has a lot of great skin benefits as well. I hope they never stop making this stuff or change the formula.

reviews.review_title: Fair is Perfect for Light with Yellow Undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an update to my previous review.  In that review I mentioned that the product is wonderful, but the shades are difficult.  I went to exchange for a different shade and the fair shade was perfect for me, in that it matches my neck perfectly.    They actually gave me a sample to try first so I could be sure before I exchanged it, which was very helpful.  The fair is light enough and with the yellow undertones that I need, unlike the light shade which has a lot of pink/beige to it.  I am very happy with it now.  I would just caution everyone that the sample pics they provide which look super light are not accurate, or the lighting is intense indoor lighting, which makes it look really different.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice texture, but as others have noted, the light color is pretty orange. I was going to save it for the summer when I get a little more tan and get the light fair for now, but I started to realize that it's probably breaking me out. I haven't started any other new product so this I'm fairly sure this is it. This product could be good for people who aren't acne prone, but check the ingredient list on cosnda to see if one of your triggers is on there.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was my holy grail until I discovered NARS but I will still continue to keep this and buy it. I’ve tried dozens of foundations but this one I will always continue to come back to. I have freckles and I like them to be covered without my face looking super caked on. This is so amazing and I really like the illuminizing one as well. Also- their tube concealer is the best concealer I’ve ever used in my life.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product however after 2 weeks of having it the pump piece came disconnected from the tube part and won't go back together, so the product leaked all over my makeup bag and there's no way to keep it together and from spilling anymore. Really disappointed as this faulty packaging means this $50 product is now useless

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the product.  It goes on nice and provides just the right coverage I’m looking for.  The packaging on the other hand is terrible.  The first time I used it, the entire pump top broke off and I can not get it back together.  I travel a lot so it’s essentially useless to me now as I can’t bring it anywhere as well as how much product I’ve wasted just trying to get the pump back together.  So frustrating spending the money on these “better than drugstore” products and having the packaging being so poor! Sad thing is this is the SECOND time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this product in both ‘Fair’ and ‘Light’.—both shades have a weird undertone.  The ‘Light’ is very yellow and the ‘Fair’ made me look grey.  It’s so strange.  The product is thick and difficult to blend on my combo skin.  However, I do enjoy the scent—it’s lemony!  With the SPF 50 factor, I wish I loved this product, but I look ill when I wear it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the fourth or fifth foundation I've tried (I'm a noob), and when I went to apply it, in the car, right after I bought it, I was shocked. The coverage is good, its easy to put on (I bought the brush too), it's a simple wow. I might should have gotten the matte one, but that has more to do with me not understanding my own skin. I think a setting powder will tone down the shine for me.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this it's amazing. Sometimes my skin is a little sinsitive and this doesn't agravate it at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am giving this product a two star not because I don’t like it because I order it and when it came in and I used it the pump on it would not stop running and it wasted product . Drove to nearest Sephora store which is 40 miles away to exchange it ,back of my receipt it said return to any Sephora store . They would not except it because they did not carry it ,even damage it out they would not do . Call Sephora they put me on hold for awhile then I got disconnected. So product is good but will not buy again because of pump and really don’t know if I will buy from Sephora again

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised by how full coverage this Is! I am falling in love with this product, it's perfect for my skin. My mom commented about how radiant my skin looks when I wear this and I agree! It's a great product!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It has a nice coverage butt.. the only thing i don't like is that this product is transferring sooooo... easily on my clothes.

reviews.review_title: EVERY COLOR TOO MUCH PINK UNDERTONES
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this but none of the color selections matched me. I am Asian with yellow olive skin tone and every single one of these had too much pink undertone which was noticeably apparent. Even my husband said it didn’t look right. Wish they could come out with warmer yellow tones in the future!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great all in one product for daytime and night time looks. It gives a pretty good SPF coverage during the day and looks pretty matte for night time pictures.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I can't decide if I like this yet. I'm not sure this is my correct shade so that might be why. It also smells a little funky to me.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really want to love this....it looks beautiful when it goes on and the color matches so well. However, it just slips off my skin before the day is even half over. There is no staying power

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t get the hype.  I was excited since this is always described as having high coverage and closer to a foundation.  However, this has no coverage for me.  I found myself building it up so much and having to add so much concealer that it undid the point of using a bb cream.  I also have oily skin, so this did not last on me at all.  By the end of the day I looked like I had nothing on.  Surprisingly, the bare minerals bb, which caused me more concern because of the reviews, worked much better for me.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Fascinant! Really, just a lilbit more darker than mi skintone but I can fix it hahaha

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best CC and one of the best foundations at Sephora. Buildable Coverage and looks amazing. Skincare benefits (anti-aging and hydrating serums) along with a high SPF. You can apply with brushes, sponges, and I even love it with my hands!!! They extended the shades so you can easily find a match.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product! Looks very natural on the skin and gives the right amount of coverage.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a MUST HAVE for my makeup routine.  I NEVER go anywhere without it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect everyday cc cream for a quick running out the door makeup routine. It gives amazing coverage and your really don’t have to use much. And to top it off it has SPF in it to protect your skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This matches my skin color perfectly and the coverage this cc cream gives is amazing a little goes a very long way and the tube is huge so this product should last you a very long time. It includes a controllable pump feature which makes for a very clean application process. It has many skin benefits including a high spf and doubles as a serum. I must say if you have dry patches or dry skin I highly recommend using a moisturizer and primer before applying or it will get flaky and cakey in those specific areas. Other than that it blends perfectly with a damp makeup sponge. It does have a light scent which may bother some but goes away once applied.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t know if this shade is just perfect for me but I love this stuff! It’s hard to find low coverage, and I would say this is medium. it looks, smells, and feels beautiful. it’s just a fresh breath of air compared to foundation.

reviews.review_title: Don’t look anywhere else for foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A friend recommended this to me a few years ago and I have never been disappointed .  The coverage is Shear and goes on easily but covers anything that needs to be covered.  It has SPF 50 sunscreen and lasts all day . love it

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this CC cream from IT. It’s the best CC cream I’ve ever used. Been using this and I don’t think I want to change. :)

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shade range is awful. The fair is too light but the fair light is too dark! It goes on nice and looks pretty but by the end of the day it sunk into the pores around my mouth and chin and looked awful. Returned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I swear by this. I use this as part of my everyday routine. The coverage is buildable and you can customize it as needed. Even with light coverage it smooths the complexion and colour corrects nicely. I have a couple shades I use depending on whether I’m tanned or not. I find the colour is easy to match and blends nicely to your skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Go to Foundation - easy to build light to heavy coverage - 2nd time purchasing! Also goes a long way!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing coverage! Smooths out skin and lasts all day! You don’t even need to touch up because the foundation already had your face looking flawless!!

reviews.review_title: GO-TO product for natural looking skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It doesn’t feel like I have anything on my face! My husband despises “Makeup” but when I wear this he always compliments me and says that it looks natural but it smooths and adds a nice glow. Doesn’t clog my pores, doesn’t seem to rub off onto my clothes like foundations and powders tend to do, I don’t even need to use a setting spray/powder with this. I’m 34, 3 kids and have treated my skin like crap my entire life and this formula is beautifully crafted with me in mind. Lol. It doesn’t settle in creases and it works to disguise my fine lines on my forehead and around my mouth. I recommend this products to anyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Seriously.  I like it.  I'm not in love, but I like it and I've been trying to find a foundation or CC or BB cream for weeks.  A LITTLE GOES A LONG LONG WAY.  Reason for not 5 stars is that I no matter what I can't find the perfect color, each shade is just off a smidge! Dang it.

reviews.review_title: Need decent coverage without full face. This is it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Medium coverage with SFP?!?! Yes please. I tend toward full coverage but for those days, I want light or know I'll be in the sun all day, I turn to this product. Btw I lean toward oily skin with occasional breakouts and had no issues with this product. Recommend for light makeup days or short stints in the sun.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the way my skin looks flawless and has a healthy glow with this foundation.  When I switched to it foundation, I got lots if compliments from co-workers.  A little goes a really long way.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my second one. No one believes I’m wearing foundation when I wear this. It lasts a long time. A little goes a long way. People always ask at work, how I get my skin so flawless. It’s this. It lasts through at 12 hour work day at the hospital.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t know why I waited so long to try/ buy this. Been using it every day for 2 days straight and I’m obsessed. It has a natural satin finish to me at least and really does look like your skin but better. I’ve never gotten so many compliments on my skin. I do wish they had a better shade range though.
