Fair works for me but can still be a little too dark but I just run it down my neck and it’s good.

reviews.review_title: If you haven’t tried this your living under a rock
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is made of pure gold I swear. I’ve tried so many foundations and this one wins by miles. It just looks so flawless yet natural. My husband prefers when my makeup looks natural and he loves this on me. It also has an anti aging serum, it’s a serious no brainer to try this if you’re on the fence. You won’t regret it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using Smashbox camera ready BB cream for a long time I wanted to switch up and get a little more coverage.  Really like the way the It CC goes on.  Covers basic flaws like sun damage and small veins.  A little hard to get off but worth the effort. Also like that there’s no fragrance.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: very natural and good for skin as it does not make it burn or dry out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff! I love the lemony scent when applying it. I love how it makes my skin feel plump and hydrated. I love how it gives the perfect amount of coverage. I just feel like this is such a good product, the coverage, the SPF is everything I'm looking for in a CC cream. My only gripe is the shade range I have a difficult time finding my shade so I can't imagine how difficult someone of deeper skin tone would have.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: if you like full coverage you must try.  love love love!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this stuff! It occasionally makes a few dry spots look cakey in the winter, hence the four stars instead of five, but I otherwise look flawless! It doesn’t break me out, but is definitely medium coverage for someone like me. If you like full coverage or light coverage I wouldn’t necessarily recommend this for purchase, but I’d recommend it to get a sample to try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just got this a few days ago.  Love the texture and coverage.  It lives up to its promise not to accentuate wrinkles, which is a huge plus.  I have  dry skin with an oily t-zone and I am able to use alone daily, and I get lots of complement's on my skin.  The only problem is I have fair skin that is very yellow/olive toned, and the light shade has too much pink-beige tone to it.   It looks nothing like the sample photo. If you have yellow undertones but are fair, I'm not sure which shade would be best, but light won be it. Despite some photos and videos that make it look like it's very yellow, it's really not.  (Hard candy glamoflauge in olive is the perfect shade for me.)  Not sure if I'll try to exchange it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am amazed by how good this product is! I just had laser treatment (IPL) for my sun/age spots and still had the brown spots visible and this really covered them! I used also some concealer, in the same shade and set with powder and the spots are practically invisible. Thank you so much!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is very light coverage for me, and the color is way off. The other colors would be too light or dark as well so hard to know a proper match with such small options of colors. Too much money for the low results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this for my everyday foundation! Gives the perfect light/medium coverage, is glowy and blends in wel with just my fingers! I used the shade light when I had a bit of a tan and it continued to work until my tan really faded. Now I mix in a bit of fair. Wish there were more shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Coverage is very good, feels light on my skin too.  Recommends

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this product for about 4 years now actually. I swear it has helped the appearance of my skin, even in the first couple of weeks when I had first started using it. I have fair and really dry skin and it’s the only foundation I have found to actually work, and not look cracked at the end of the day. One squirt gives me enough coverage. I have freckles so I don’t like to completely cover them and have more of a natural look but still have evenness. Honestly, I can’t say enough great things about it for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this CC cream! It is light weight, with medium coverage which is awesome because I don’t always like to do a full face cake. It’s has the right amount of coverage, a little goes a long way which is always a good thing too. I have dry skin and find it doesn’t crack or crease with or without setting. I would definitely recommend this product....over the year I have tried a handful of BB and CC creams, this takes the win!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I came into Sephora clueless about foundations /BB Creams / CC creams. I have been wearing a powder foundation on its own for years now, but as my skin ages, I find that powder alone isn’t doing it for my skin in the winter time. I’m getting dry!!! I went into Yorkdale and asked a lovely lady to help me find something with minor coverage but that will even out my skintone and moisturize my skin. She bee-lined it directly to this product, and now, a few weeks later, I don’t think i’ll ever go back. I am so happy with this product. I love how little it takes to feel balmy, even, and protected from the sun. A      :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product so much...have been using it for a year or more and love the coverage... I live in a city with a very dry weather (really low temperatures-40 -50) and my face Feels so moisturized

reviews.review_title: Beautiful product... until your skin break out!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is SUCH a beautiful product but NOT for all skins... I don't have a sensitive skin and I totally broke out after one single use. If your skin doesn't break out you will love it, beautiful coverage, lightweight, hydrating and sooo natural!

reviews.review_title: Great CC cream but oxidizing smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample and really love it as a BB/CC cream on days where I don't feel like wearing foundation. Will be purchasing the regular size and mix it into my regular routine. It blends into my skin nicely and gives good but not heavy coverage. I removed a star because it gives off an oxidizing smell as I wear it through the day. Not sure if it was a bad sample.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best!!!!! I heard about it from a friend and now all of my friends are using this instead of foundation. Beauriful and natural result!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not sure how people say its drying? I have dry skin and I find it moisturizing. Also NOT like a mask. My skin breaths and looks natural yet covers the redness that I have. LOVE this product and paired with Bye Bye Pores setting powder a spritz of setting spray and voila perfect skin that looks beautiful. Have turned this product on to many of friends and co-workers... they thank me over and over :)

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rich - golden brown shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a good product and it last all day and I really like it. If I can’t find something better I’ll be repurchasing for everyday makeup. However if you have oily skin this product isn’t for you,and it also rubs off easily as well.

reviews.review_title: Great product, but wish it came in lighter color
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this CC  Cream! I typically just wear concealer without foundation, but this foundation changed my mind. It covers redness and imperfections without looking or feeling like I'm wearing anything at all. I sometimes mix it with moisturizer to thin it out even more and apply with my hands, or apply it with a beauty blenderr. My one issue is that the shade Fair is slightly too dark for me. I would love to continue to use this product, but don't think I can buy it for the winter months because of the color issue. I would give this makeup 5 stars if it came in a lighter shade.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked the coverage of it. But after a day of wearing it there were little bumps on my face. Its comedone forming for my oily skin. Sadly i wont be buying this product again. All i can say is give it a try if it works, it works and if it doesn't try another product that does.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this CC  cream so I was disappointed when it's lightest shade was too dark for me. I'm pale but not abnormally pale so I hope IT Cosmetics will make a lighter shade so that other people with my skin tone can use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love it!! This is my second time buying this CC cream and I have to say I like it better this time than the first, but I think it’s because my skin is better now than before. Anyway...this is definitely my fav cc

reviews.review_title: good coverage for a CC cream
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I pick up the shade through the ‘shade finder’ tool on the Sephora app, I have been using NARS sheer glow foundation “Santa Fe” for 2 bottles, and also used Clarins BB cream on “don’t feel like make up days”. But I have to say neither of them can beat this CC cream for the coverage. This is especially friendly to dry skin on winter days, so far I am very happy with this purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Did they change the formula on this? Bought my first batch in the USA 5 months ago. Loved it so much bought another batch in Canada at home.  It is not the same. The coverage in the new container is no where near full coverage. The entire formula seems to be off.  Sad as I enjoyed the first purchase of this. Don’t think I’ll buy again after this is used up.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i would give this 1 star but it really is a good product. however, the deal breaker for me is how the spf makes the shade even LIGHTER than it seems. the shade range is horrendous... if they had my shade, id be giving it 5 stars. it cosmetics do all of your poc women a favor, FIX YOURSELF!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cc cream, coverage is great, its not cakey, and it doesn't dry out my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this product for about 3 years at least, and always used the “Light” shade since their range of colors was much smaller but still looked ok. I loved the coverage and the dewy appearance it gave to my face. I was thrilled when I saw they started making new shades so I bought the “Fair Light” and was extremely disappointed. I’m not sure if they recently changed their formula along with adding new foundation shades but my usual dewy fresh look I used to get from wearing this makeup, now looked dry, heavy, and cakey with the new foundation. I tried to wear more moisturizer and a nice hydrating primer underneath and wet my beauty blender more but still had the same result. I’m going to try Laura Merciers Tinted Moisturizer next, as it always has great reviews as well. Maybe this will work for some people with different skin types, so I would still recommend it but from what I’ve experienced, it’s not hydrating like it used to be.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this. I have oily/combination skin and didn’t realize the formula I was using from MAC for years was actually working against me and was constantly frustrated that my makeup was wearing off after a few hours. This formula is long-lasting, offers pretty full coverage, and is just a really lovely texture. I also find it helps reduce my red areas. I pair with the it bye bye pore setting powder to make my make up last longer.

reviews.review_title: Mixed review -- wrong for my complexion
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I went through 1.5 of these and eventually conceded that it just. wouldn't. work. (for me, at least). The biggest issue: the color. I am extremely fair with neutral-rosy undertones and this reads very yellow on my complexion.   A few other things that didn't work for me:  - While it didn't feel heavy on my skin, it was hard to take off and seemed to linger everywhere it touched (fingers, hands, face, etc.)  - Application was often streaky. I used a brush, but had to reallllly make an effort to make the appearance even. (Most often, this meant going over it with a brush that hadn't touched any product.  The bonuses, worth noting:  - My skin is sensitive and acne prone. This miraculously didn't irritate it. - Loved the coverage.

reviews.review_title: Used to be my go to
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for a good year or two and on my most recent purchase I've noticed the formula has changed. The new formula is not the same coverage and leaves my skin with an orange tint

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This made my skin look very dry and I do not have dry skin. My skin type is on the oily side. I tried it several times; after exfoliating, after using different moisturizers. The only way it did not make my skin look dry is when I mixed it with my mointurizer then applied it to my already moisturized skin, but then it did not have the coverage I wanted. It does have nice coverage when not diluted.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation!  You only need a little bit for complete coverage. It's also has a dewy glow which I love!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite cc creams, makes the skin look healthy and gorgeous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product gives great natural coverage, easy to apply, and has a comfortable wear.  I took off two starts because there need to be more shades ranges available without question. (I am between shades so that is one reason I will be returning this product.). Another star off is the price point-this foundation has a great concept-but there are other foundations that are not as expensive that last longer than this product.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: great look at first but it doesn't last long even with powder...gets all smeary and completely comes off any place you touch. also seemed to make pores on cheeks look more pronounced.

reviews.review_title: beware before you spend the money!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This did not work on me at all! I was so excited to try this, its everything I waa looking for on paper. This product broke me out! it gave me little tiny white heads! i know for a fact that it was this that made me breakout and not anything else in my skin care routine. on days I did not use this product I didnt get any whiteheads, as soon as i used it again, at night I'd have new whiteheads!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot believe how much I love this. This makes my skin look so flawless and dewy. It lasts through an 8 hour shift at work and I come out looking as good as when I went in! It’s so lightweight, and theres no perfume scent...it’s just great coverage and a perfect color match. I will definitely be repurchasing this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite foundation. It's dewy, good for your skin and has extra spf. This foundation always stays put on my skin. (I'm combo.) I've repurchased it three times now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I only use BB creams and I found this one does so much in one. It is so easy and efficient. Recommended for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One of the only foundations that doesn't make t-zone area look dry (doesn't separate easily). Can use with a brush or a beauty blender and both give a glowy, smooth coverage for dry/normal skin without any primer needed. Not the longest lasting foundation/CC but beautiful on the skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Streaky, oily, will not set and grey caste on brown skin

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Super creamy and doesn’t set into pores! The texture is great for blending out powder contour!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! My go to year round! Such great coverage and makes beautiful skin!

reviews.review_title: Looked great but caused a break out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved how this looked on my skin and really wanted to like it but it felt heavy and broke out my skin so badly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ordered light but it WAY TO DARK. Very orange colored. I normally love IT cosmetics products

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage is nice but I HATE the feel when I'm applying it. Its very thick and STICKY - not smooth to apply at all. The smell is ok, and it covers very well, so Im going to finish up this bottle but I probably won't repurchase. It doesn't seem to last as long either, but I do like that it has sun protection.

reviews.review_title: Not for me, terrible with glasses
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I dont know how this is a beauty award winner.  It is SOOO HEAVY.  Goes on like a mask and does not blend out well.  Wears unevenly and after a few hours you have visible smudges by your nose and chin.  And dont get me started on the wear with glasses.  UGH.  I looked like a mess.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this! it's very mattifying, and a bit more full coverage. the fact that it has sunscreen in it is fabulous. it dosnet feel heavy. all around fabulous!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product!!! It did not irritate my sensitive skin or aggravate my acne prone skin. It’s perfect to give your skin an even finish. It gives me a nice dewy glow despite my dry skin in the colder months. I’m about ready to order a shade lighter because my tan is fading. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very beautiful foundation. Looks great on my dry skin. Wish the shade range was more diverse though. Light is too dark for me, so I use fair light which is a tad too pink/orange but I make it work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Doesn’t cover like promises. Left skin feeling like even when I washed it the product was stuck on. my acne got worse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product. You can put a little on for minimal coverage or layer it on thicker for full coverage. I have dark spots so that is where I put it on thicker but keep it lighter on my forehead. The trick is finding the right shade. I use the medium and it matches my tan look in the summer and pale look in the winter with no problems. I have sensitive/combo skin. I love that it has SPF already in it. People tell me all the time how young I look but this is truly my secret to young, bright looking skin! Also love that it lasts me over a year! It does not wear off so I don't have to reapply. I use it with a finishing powder. I have used lots of foundation that were more expensive than this (make up forever, dior, etc.) and this is the best product for the price.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just got my second tube! I use about a pea size or two every morning and one tube has lasted me around 3/4 of the year. I have to say this thing stays on! If you sweat a lot like me or happen to get water on your face, simply pat your face with a napkin or tissue to to avoid taking the cream off your face.  I have never used a beauty blender or a brush to apply this because applying with fingers are simply perfect. There's no streakiness and you don't need to worry about your applicator soaking up product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is definitely not working well with dry skin. I've been using it for a month now. My skin gets really dry in the winter time and somehow I feel even more dry after I applied it. Also, I noticed I'm getting more acnes. ( I did all the routines to moisturize my skin and all that before applying it, but still patchy on my face, especially around my nose area, and areas where there are larger pores) Maybe someone can help me with this...Thanks!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this because everyone seemed to love it and it got great reviews but I honestly hated it... it is so so drying on the skin and just accentuates all fine lines and wrinkles and I don’t even have that much.. your skin but better?.. I think my skin looks better without it..I will definitely not repurchase again.. I was so disappointed.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for 50  age seeking minimal makeup fuss
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My sis-in-law recommended this product after I told her I was looking for an easy-to-use foundation for when I do public appearances/photos. I have a minimal skincare regiment (usually just moisturizer) but wear some makeup for public work events and other occasions where I'm likely to be photographed. I love this product because it's (1) super-easy to apply (I just use my fingers, don't use any primer/powder), (2) it's not heavy, just smooths out my complexion, and (3) slim tube convenient for travel (I do week-long book tours with just carry-on). Highly recommended, esp for others who are 50 .

reviews.review_title: Best for light to medium coverage
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It is thick and doesn't absorb well into skin if put on over moisturizer. A little goes a long way, and it has a good, medium coverage. It is not buildable.  More just looks cakey and thick

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this because I was looking for something easy and simple on the days where I dont wear a lot of makeup but still want some coverage. Unfortunately this was not it. I have normal and get a little oily through the day but I do have larger pores.. genetics... this CC cream made my entire face look oilier than a product I’ve ever used and accentuated my pores. I tried a couple more times after the first initial time but it is never going to work. Maybe for people with dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this after seeing Makeup by Tiffany D on YT recommending this for the longest time. I think I got it sometime in Jan 2018.  I wanted something that would make my skin look wow! with little effort and this CC cream did the trick. I really like how i can get some good coverage without looking like i piled on too much product. My freckles still show through but it does a good job at evening out the rest of my skin.  I only powder the t-zone and i do get some shine by mid-morning. When i blot, there is some transfer but not so much where i see blotches on my skin. As the day goes on, i notice my skin looking more glowy but not in a way that I look greasy.  This doesn't feel heavy or sticky on my skin and I like that it lasts fairly long. I've even exercised with it and it did stay on pretty well. I love how this is in a tube with a pump which makes controlling the amount I need very easy. I took one start off because it does transfer a bit when i'm blotting and I wish it was a touch less glowy later in the day (i don't like to touchup with powder to avoid looking cakey).

reviews.review_title: Get the oil free version if you're acne prone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the finish of this, it made my skin look so healthy and glowy and plump. Sadly it made me break out in five or six spots around my chin and mouth... it has been the only product to make me break out since starting accutane, which is pretty extreme! There are a million different oils in this product and it's not non-comedogenic. I stopped using it and my breakouts stopped right away. Can't imagine the damage it would have caused if I wasn't taking accutane.  I just exchanged this for the oil free version so hopefully I will have better luck with that!

reviews.review_title: Great coverage, but settles into wrinkles.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m 31 but I have aging skin and wrinkles (thanks sun damage and young me for not wearing sunscreen). Anyway, I overall really like this CC cream. It gives me nice coverage and the color matches my skin very well. My only complaint is that it sometimes settles into my dry patches and wrinkles, even when using the expensive brush that is supposed to go with it. I use a setting spray which helps a little, and I moisturize a lot! Still, it’s one of the better cc creams I’ve used and it has great SPF coverage so I’m sure I’ll keep using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So far I love this!  I have Fair - light, dry (with some redness) skin. This product provide a good coverage for my red spots, very comfortable to wear even with my heater on! :)  my skin looks healthy with this. I would recommend this product for people with dry skin, who wants natural/radiant finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really wanted to love this product because the shade was perfect. But it made my dry skin even more dry and clung to dry spots. It also made me breakout.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used lots of different foundations.  I received the most compliments after switching to this one.  It is slightly heavy so only use a small amount.  It cover red well and doesn't settle into my small lines.  Not sure how other reviewers are ending up looking pasty using this foundation.  My guess would be they aren't using the correct shade because I found I did not look pasty using this foundation and was one of the first comments my daughter made.  I guess they probablly used too much too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice semi-sheer coverage. Love the high SPF!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This made my skin super cakey :( I was so embarassed talking to people with this foundation on because it cracked and emphasized every dryness I have. Definitely returned it. Also I have combination skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great foundation. It is easy to apply and also easy on the skin. I constantly have red spots because of exposure to cold weather. The color correction feature completely covers them up. It makes my skin looks fabulous.

reviews.review_title: Could be a bit more moisturizing!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been trying to find a moisturizing and full coverage foundation for a while. I've been using this for a few weeks now and I'm impressed. Although it is not as moisturizing as I had wished the coverage and finish is great! Will recommend!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using the IT CC creams since 2016 and it’s so hit or miss. I have very sensitive skin and I’m on Retin A so I need a high SPF for my face and I’m too lazy to fuss with a primer + foundation routine. This stuff looks great for about 5 minutes but I never completely absorbs into my skin. It sits on top and gets progressively more oily throughout the day. I use the IT finishing powder and that controls most of the shine, but only for an hour or two at a time. I mean, we are not talking about a little oil. We are talking, my face stays so dewy that if I run my finger GENTLY across any part of it, I’ll take all my makeup off with it. The transfer is unreal. If I touch my face and then anything else, I leave behind fingerprints. It gets everywhere. I’m honestly kind of over the headache, but there’s so little else out there with a high SPF that I don’t know where else to go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely adore this product. It has improved the look of my skin even when I take it off. I used to use a concealer for my problem areas but now use this all over with a brush and it gives a flawless look. My skin but better.

reviews.review_title: Great Product; Not so Great for Dry Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When I was looking for a foundation, the sales associate at Sephora recommended this one. I was looking for something with medium coverage and this is a fairly light coverage so it wasn't what I was expecting but I still like it for daily use. I have very dry skin, especially in my t-zone, and I wouldn't say this product is good for dry skin. It does, though, match perfectly with my skin tone and definitely looks like my skin but better. I also love that it is SPF 50 . I recommended it to my friend who doesn't need a lot of coverage and doesn't have dry skin like mine; I think she will really enjoy it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rich - golden brown shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It made my face feel really greasy and even with a high quality setting spray, if I touched it with my fingers it came off. The color matches my skin perfectly and the coverage is beautiful, I just wish I didn’t feel like a buttered turkey while wearing it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing medium - full coverage base for dry skinned people. Very glowy, so i find it's best to set this with a light powder or you will get transfer. Applies beautifully with clean hands, brush, or sponge. I personally start with my hands then blend out with a sponge so it doesn't soak up too much. Lasts all day on me, does not crease in my smile lines or my crows feet.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was not skin but better. This was my skin, but greasier. This settled into my pores as the day went on and made me super greasy looking within a couple hours. I really wanted to like this since everyone raves about it but ultimately returned it.

reviews.review_title: best summer foundation for dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this foundation for the summer, it’s dewy and hydrating and gives me sun protection. It also lasts really long but never feels crunchy or greasy after wearing for several hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This made my face break out so badly that I thought I became a teenager again. As a woman in her 30s, I have never had a foundation that had such a disastrous, terrible result.   At first the foundation seemed fine. Color was great, and coverage was awesome. The spf 50  was attractive too, so I wore it the day after I bought it  However, 1) The color darkened on my face so significantly that it looked at least a couple shades darker than my neck by the end of the day. 2) my face was oily and shiny in a few hours 3) when I took off the foundation, my face (which previously had no problems save a couple freckles and a mole) had started breaking out EVERYWHERE. Small and large pimples everywhere the foundation touched. I took it back to the store and returned it right away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can’t explain why i detest this foundation. I’m not super picky but want a foundation that goes on smoothly, stays on, and gives good coverage. This was sold as that but it does none of these things AND the color Sephora sakes woman suggested is just wrong. So disappointed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing coverage for it being a cc cream! Made my skin look like my skin but better truly, the only reason it’s not a 5 star product is that it does transfer but a little powder and that is all it needs! Leaves you with healthy natural/even skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Not impressed - I’ve only used it one day though. Even the fair was WAY too orange for my skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I found this to be heavy for a CC cream. I use as medium-full coverage foundation unless mixed with an oil or serum. It sits really nicely and doesn’t highlight my dry patches but the colors lean towards yellow.

reviews.review_title: Nice consistency and color, have to reapply.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t love wearing face makeup, but I have since switching birth control methods as I’ve had some hormonal flare ups. This stuff is awesome. I’ve tried the illumination kind and this kind, and I have to say I like this one better. The illumination has more of a sparkle which is kind of nice but not practical for every day use. This stuff smells great and has a nice creamy consistency. Had to remove a star though, because it doesn’t last all day. You need to reapply after about 6-8 hours.

reviews.review_title: shade range leaves a lot to be desired
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this. lots of pros... natural look and feel on skin, high spf, easy to apply and light coverage. However the shade range really leaves a whole lot to be desired, both in depth and skin tone. I am using the light and it really isn't a great match, I mostly overlook it due to ease of use when I am in a rush to get out the door

reviews.review_title: Great coverage, not enough range of shades
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the coverage and the SPF however there are not enough colour option for me and this doesn't match my skin in the winter.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this for use on a daily basis. I stopped using it and then all other foundations were just looking cakes on me. I went back to this because it is lightweight, buildable, has SPF, and is enough coverage to wear day to day. I feel like my skin is getting a break from heavy foundation.

reviews.review_title: HOLY GRAIL, I CANT LIVE WITHOUT IT.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My everyday go-to! Provides great coverage and looks like skin. I apply with a brush for full coverage and a damp beauty blender for medium/light coverage. Absolute holy grail.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love how this looks and applys on my skin, but if I put it on my chin that area will break out within an hour or so. I don’t know why as it is supposed to be good for your skin but it just does on me. My close friend used some during a visit and she loved it and it didn’t do that to her. I do think if it will not break you out you will love this. If you can get your hands on a sample do that first.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Full coverage, doesn’t sink into pores/fine lines, plumps up skin, basically just makes your skin look amazing!! The SPF is definitely an added bonus too! I don’t think I can live without this stuff again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. It's the best CC cream that I have EVER used and it's tough to find good products like this in darker colors. My mom gave me this in Rich Honey because it was too light for her. Works perfectly with my skin tone! Doesn't dry me out or anything. It mimics your skin sort of. It totally perfects it. It's like your skin but better. I can't wait to try the illuminating version next! I apply it with their foundation brush and it comes out beautifully.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'd say this is definitely one of the top products that would instantly cover your redness. It's nice when you want to do a quick something to your face. What I did not like is that sometimes I feel that it would enhance my pores, even when I wear primer. It also does not last that long in the heat.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I currently have 2 different products I use for foundation; tarte's BB cream for casual days and then also Lancome's Teint Idole for more put together days. I was just considering switching out the BB cream and had heard great things about this so I picked up a sample last time I was in. The first time I put it on I felt like I belonged in a wax museum. It went on incredibly thick and it brought out the worst in my skin texture. I thought maybe it just did not pair well with my beauty blender so I tried again when I got a new brush in the mail. Still, absolutely not. I tried to limit the product, but you need a decent amount as it does not spread easily and will look patchy where it is too thin, and when there is enough it looks like I caked on some cheap oily foundation from the drugstore.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Y’all. This is the best foundation everrrrr. It makes your skin so flawless and looks photoshop smooth I can’t stop staring at my skin in the mirror cuz it looks uh-mazing!! It gives off the perfect finish too. Not too dewy or matte

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hard to cover your spot. I wish it could stay longer in my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is so far the best foundation I’ve ever used. So lightweight and the spf doesn’t show on flash photography! It’s smooth and creamy and gives the skin a nice natural healthy sheen which is what I love! Also the coverage is really good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this CC cream. Its sinks in your skin like a DREAM. Im on my 2nd one and its deff in my holy grails

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a huge BB cream user. But cant find the BB product that i normally use in the country where i travel to. So i bought this. First its very hard to find the right shade for me. I had fair skin with yellow/warm undertone like most asian with fair skin. So i choose one that actually closer to m y skin which is fair light and its just doesnt get it right. Aside from the finding right color.... the coverage i like... but honestly there are BB cream product from other makeup line that actually works as fine with rather much cheaper price.  It smells ok, not so chemical, or harsh. Overall i feel ok about it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Good coverage but it is not very long lasting. It gets very cakey on my chin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This CC cream has a lot of pros, but they were seriously outweighed by a major con. POSITIVES: color options for pale girls, more coverage than your typical CC cream, a little goes a long way (giving you more bang for your buck). NEGATIVE: after a couple of hours, this cream developed a weird texture on my face and no longer looked smooth. I’ve tried it with multiple primers and moisturizers to see if those were the culprit, but it’s just the CC cream. I even tried diluting this product with another brand’s lightweight CC to see if That helped, but nothing solved this texture issue.

reviews.review_title: Great for oily or dry skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin but I don’t like to use matte foundation every single day so it’s hard to find a happy medium between natural and oily mess. I’ve loved this so far! It blends great, has spf, and looks natural, I don’t even using powder sometimes and by the end of the day I’m still not an oily mess (and I don’t blot). My mom uses this as well and she’s extremely dry and it looks great either way. I’d actually compare it to my Armani luminous silk but with a better price tag. The only thing I wish they did was bring out more shades on both ends of the spectrum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cc cream is amazing. The only negative thing I can say about it is they don’t have a shade light enough for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best CC cream ever! My skin feels so hydrated whenever i put it on, and it blends so nicely into my skin! Use a beauty blender for optimal results. You may have to touch up and reapply a few times a day, but setting spray always helps!

reviews.review_title: Not for normal/ oily skin types.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It has a beautiful finish but it going to last around 3 hours max. Covers really well my acne but at the end of the day it looks horrible.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing! The coverage is great, and you can build it for better coverage. I have acne scarring on my chin and cheeks and some redness on my nose and cheeks and the color correcting is amazing! It also has a flawless smooth finish that I haven't found with many other foundations. Set it with a setting powder and it looks airbrushed. So happy I found this foundation!

reviews.review_title: Hands down, the best, every time.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Never disappoints, I love this CC cream because it's lightweight but also can give you full coverage. I use it as a foundation everyday whether I'm going to work or going out. If you have not tried it yet, now is the time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My sister recommended this product and I am so glad she did.  I love it.  It really evens our my skin and it is super comfortable.  It also lasts all day.  I have dry skin and it doesn't cake up, nor does it go greasy.  It's a bit pricey, but I think that this will be my go to foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: There is not enough I can say about how much I love this CC cream!!! After only one use my dry skin feels smoother and more hydrated.  The colour looks very natural and it feels weightless but still has full coverage.  One squirt and my face is flawless.  I set it with a HD powder and have not had a problem of it wearing off at all.  My other favorite thing about this make up is that I can apply it with my fingertips!  I love that there is no waste in a sponge or brush.  I do prefer to wear this after I have applied a primer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gives such a radiant look and covers all the little imperfections for those no-makeup makeup days. Only con is sometimes I've noticed it makes pores stand out more.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I seriously never write reviews but I just had to for this. This is so beyond great for my dry skin and it’s so light weight and the benefits just top it off

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a foundation that would last all day - mostly at work - without clogging my skin (I have oily skin) and this cc cream is it! I’ve had it for about 6 weeks now and love it. I have dark spots so I want a good amount of coverage, but I don’t like feeling as if I’m wearing a ton of makeup (or that cakey feeling), especially while at work. I also never write reviews but thought I needed to share! I’m definitely buying another when mine runs out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Here's the thing. This CC cream has a beautiful finish, formula, and wear time.  But my pale face cannot wear a shade this dark at all.  Yes, I understand that CC cream are not meant to match you perfectly because they are meant to be sparse. However, even when I use it sparsely, it looks entirely too dark.  I wish I could love this, but sadly I cannot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Two words... LOVE IT!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage but dries out my skin. I wish it was more moisturizing

reviews.review_title: It made my skin oily and break out - disappointing
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was hoping to find an alternative for Dr Brandt’s BB Flexitone Cream and the lady at my local Sephora recommended this product. I have only used it a couple of times and my skin has broken out really badly and has madr my skin super oily. I never break out! I feel terrible and I’ve never looked this awful. Even though it’s super cake, it doesn’t cover up the redness in my skin. This product is unfortunately my worst purchase at Sephora ever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. I'm in my 40's and am starting to see some uneven skin tone/ large pores. I wear it alone on most days and use hour glass oil free primer underneath on long or hot days. It gives a natural light coverage and does not cake. It makes skin look nice and healthy!! My friends asked if I got a facial when i started using it :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have super dry and aging skin and I am a lazy person too!  It is easy to apply (I just use my fingers rubbing and dapping on my skin), gives me great coverage, very healthy skin finish. I like it has SPF 50 so i don't have to put so many products on my skin! If you are dry skin and have some fine lines, you will love it!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is currently my favorite. It’s light yet buildable, great for a natural, everyday look.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it!!!! I’ve went through like 10 tubes of this stuff!  that’s how long I’ve stuck to one product for. I’m one to always experiment with different products all the time but I always ended up back to this one. I use this product everyday. And I build up some more coverage for full face makeup. I have combination and sensitive skin and this covers all redness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this for the SPF factor, but like the I.T. powder, I do find it makes my pores and fine lines show up more. I think that in this product its the brighteners add that does it. I purchased I.T. powder from the shopping network a few years ago and I lied that product way better. They have changed the formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! I would usually use the maybelline B.B. cream but I decided to pick this up during the sale. This lasted all day!! Paired with the bye bye under eye concealer is the perfect combo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's like GLUE!  Conceals everything - looked like paste on my skin.  Way too heavy - had difficulty washing it off my hands!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product but I didn't. I cannot get it to look good on my skin at all. I've tried mixing it with other products, applying with my fingers, applying with a blender sponge, and no matter what I do it looks patchy and settles into my fine lines and looks so dry. Disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for about a year now and I can honestly say I don't see myself using anything else. Ever since I started using this product, I've stopped using foundation, and it works better than any foundation I've ever used.  At first I was skeptical about using it because my skin can be sensitive to new products, but I haven't had any issues with it. It has the coverage I've been looking for and all it takes is one pump! It also has SPF which it's a bigg plus. I'd definitely recommend this to anyone that's looking for something light on their face with great/build-able coverage!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my go-to when I was on accutane. It's full coverage but also super hydrating and doesn't cling to any dry patches. My skin was combo-oily before so I had to try a bunch of new foundations when my skin started drying out. If you're on accutane and looking for a new foundation I highly recommend you try this one! The only downside is the limited shade range and it also doesn't flawlessly blend out when your skin is dry/flaky. It didn't look bad but you could also tell I was wearing makeup. BUT it's the best I could find that worked with how awfully dry and red my skin was on accutane.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really believe this is the BEST foundation/cc cream ever. everything about it is perfect. It’s the only foundation that has amazing coverage, looks natural, and matches me perfectly. The only negative thing i have to say about it, is that for the price you do not get so much for it. I’ve had it for about 2 weeks and it’s becoming empty quickly, and I don’t use too much product. Other than that, this is amazing and I will continue to keep purchasing it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was hesitant on buying at first but it is my absolute favorite CC Cream. It makes my skin flawless and reflects well in photos without leaving my skin feel heavy and does not make me break out like other creams I have used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my FAVORITE face base! It looks SO natural. I love it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A favorite of mine. Always get compliments on how good my skin looks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Like it a lot! Looks very pale when you put it on but blends perfectly in a couple of seconds

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage! Natural looking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: wow this product is amazing... I'm so in love... the coverage is beyond amazing and it doesn't feel like you have anything on your face... I love it for everyday and also for night if you have somewhat clear skin... it does reflect the flash light though because of the high SPF!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! It hydrates and feels nice in my face!

reviews.review_title: It’s exactly what it says, My SKIN BUT BETTER! :)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Looks like my skin but better! It’s so smooth and I love the slight sheen/glow it gives to my skin. A friend recommended it and I can’t thank her enough. It’s amazing that it has SPF 50 inside it as well. I highly recommend it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super cover CC cream. Very nice smooth consistency. But I Have one big concern about it - you have to have very smooth skin before you put it on otherwise you look like your skin pell out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A bit too heavy and ‘oily’. I wear foundation daily so thought this CC  would be a great alternative- coverage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my winter shade.  We cruise a good bit and this is perfect to take with me to hot climates.  So easy to use.  Good coverage but light weight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product for over three years, and I help me with mine complexion making it even, I love it. And makes my  skin tone even covers my imperfections .

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love, love, love it!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shade is a little too light for me and the next shade up is a little too dark, but this is the best CC cream I've ever used and it has a wonderful citrus scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The color, texture, finish, and coverage, is amazing. So easy to use and every time I use it gives me a good makeup day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have soooo many foundations but this is one of my faves. I have normal to combo skin and it works well on my face. It helps after I Apply the foundation to pat it down with a tissue ever so lightly and the “slip” feeling goes away.  Med to full coverage...light feeling...lasts all day for me...great color match.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin has recently been changing due to hitting 30. I have more combo dry skin. This is so amazing! It’s extremely hydrating but also lasts a long time with the right primer underneath. It’s a my skin but better look! I had to buy other shades for if I get a little paler during the winter months.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Full coverage that lasts, without being heavy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Really SUPER happy with this foundation/CC/whatever it is cream. I put it on with a super dense brush. It goes on and blends out super quick, had medium coverage, and looks great all day. My sensitive skin has had no issues with breaking out, and it emphasizes neither dry spots nor oily spots on my combination skin.   It only gets 4 stars because the shade range is actually shameful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this on the strength of a sample i received in my ipsy glam bag. I loved the full coverage and the 50 SPF. The full size is a little lighter and more yellow than the sample (and I made sure to get the exact same shade). So I need to blend it more, which is easy. A little goes a long way - would buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is very sensitive and dry, other foundation broke me out but this one is amaaaazing. Enough good coverage, dewy finish and my skin looks flawless.   But not enough shade range. I'm using tan but still bit light... but rich is too deep.  I really really hope they will expand more shade range in the future

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is the perfect coverage! It creates an even tone without looking too caky. It does get a little shiny at the end of the day and I have dry skin... I'd love to try the matte version to see if it helps with the shininess because overall I love it!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love this but definitely more of a foundation than cc cream

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: okay... so I don't know what magical leprechaun made this foundation but it is AMAZING!! I never wear foundation because it usually makes my face (especially my nose) itchy because I have very sensitive skin. Now that I have this I will definitely wear foundation more often. It covers so well and I actually forget I'm wearing makeup at all! Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_title: Not for oily or sensitive skin.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product, but the spf made my face breakout and even with power, it never really set and transferred if i touched my face to anything. A  for packaging, great coverage, pleasant lemony scent, but the CC  just didn't work for me. I would recommend for people with dry skin that are not sensitive to SPF.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product, great coverage and does not set into wrinkles, clear looking skin and last all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage and not thick, great colour too.  Like that it has primer in it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! Light and covers very well The best!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It does cover well, but for me it appears too dry on the skin and accentuates fine lines. I felt really self-conscious when I was using this makeup. I had to stop using it.

reviews.review_title: Worst CC Cream I've Ever used
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Worst CC cream I've ever used. Even though this is the correct shade for me, this product doesn't 'sit' nicely on my skin, and so it looks like a mask on my skin when I just put it on. It also doesn't last a long time: after a couple hours, when I look into the mirror, I can see clear unevenness of color due to this product peeling off here and there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this company really needs to focus on expanding they're shade range. I love the product and feel very protected during summertime. it truly is a foundation though. I wouldn't consider it a tinted cream.

reviews.review_title: Be careful it you sweat, literally at all
reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So I was pumped about this the first day I wore this. I was looking #flawless. The issue came the second day when I had to speed walk to get to work on time. I was wearing a heavy sweater and a jacket, so I got a little toasty on the walk. No big right? WRONG.   I knew I had a few beads of sweat on my forehead when I came into the office, but didn't think much of it. I'm not a sweaty lady, probably average. But I say hi to my boss and she looks at me kind of like wtf. So I decide to go to the bathroom and inspect my new CC cream and OMG.  My few beads of sweat had melted once flawless coverage into several small streams of makeup descending down my face. You know how during storms the rainwater turns into little rivers and picks up mud and carries it. It was like that — but on my face. The river overfloweth, ya feel?   Anyway, I freak out and start dabbing it off with a paper towel because I had to go the whole work day like that. I could fix it a little but I looked patchy. So the lesson here, folks, is that you need to be careful wearing this if plan to sweat.  Two stars because it looks bomb if you don't move.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this in the light medium color.  I love it.  It matches ands makes skin flawless. Smooth. It works for concealer almost to where I don't have to add more on top but I have dark circles so I do.  I use whatever concealer I have at the time but want to try theirs.

reviews.review_title: Learning curve, but will be loyal
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After hours and hours of research, I selected this foundation.  The colors lean a tad darker than standard. So I am normally pretty fair, but have been tanning with isle of paradise tanning drops. After a few more applications it will be fine, but for now the neutral medium is dark and I should have gotten medium or light medium.   I have combination skin so my t zone is oily while my chin is dry. This foundation didn’t irritate any part of my face, didn’t start feeling tight or itchy throughout the day. I did use a setting powder and/or spray as well, which I normally don’t do, but my skin seems to like it. I am acne prone, but it doesn’t seem like this is going to cause irritation.   This has excellent coverage, I used very little and it went a looong way. I did not like application using a brush due to the thicker nature of the product so a damp blender applicator was my go to.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have red bumps along my lower cheeks/jawline and this covers it up without feeling heavy or cake-y. The only non-full coverage product I've used that can actually hide the redness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I somewhat like the finish, but I definitely recommend checking this product out in stores, if possible. I'm pretty fair and even their lightest shades pull super orange/yellow on my skin, and I have a neutral tone. I was super excited for this one but it was a let down

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I desperately wanted to love this cc cream. It just doesn’t live up to all the hype. It is incredibly drying and makes my pores look huge. I’ve tried layering several different kinds moisturizers underneath, which I shouldn’t have to do with a CC cream. No combination of products prevents this from making my dry spots worse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently went into the store and asked for help to find a good CC cream. This was the first and only product I was recommended by the sales rep. When I got home i was applying it and it was kind of thick and kinda of orange so I looked at the box to read the instructions and then noticed in the ingredients list it says snail secretion filtration so i googled it. I’m so disgusted by the snail gunk that I’m returning it haha i know some people can get over it in the name of beauty but I’m not one of them. I immediately washed it off my face and put it back in the bag. I ordered supergoop Cc instead. I know a lot of people love this product so if you can get over that it might be good for you.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Did this undergo a formula change? When I used this over the summer in Medium, I was very pleased with the glowing coverage. Recently purchased this in Fair as my skin is quite pale now and I want to throw it in the garbage. First of all, this wears very differently. It’s breaking up on my skin within hours and not playing well with my blush. Worse yet, the FAIR shade is awful. I cannot get it to blend. It goes on like chalky paint. I’ve been able to make it work by adding a pump of Drunk Elephant’s D-Bronzi but a. I really shouldn’t have to do that just to make this shade wearable and b. it feels like a waste of my precious DE. One positive I’ll give this is it’s definitely full coverage and a little goes a long way. Also, no break outs. However, it irks me that this has essential oils in it. For a company marketing this as an all-in-one makeup/skincare product, they should know better than to include essential oils. This product is heavily marketed to people with skin issues (like rosacea) and the essential oils can seriously worsen sensitive skin. Perhaps the Medium shade isn’t as bad as the Fair, but I would not recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Have purchased this three times already. Got shade “fair” as my first tube, and the colour was just too light for me, but I ended up using the entire tube anyway. I remember the first few days when I started using this product, perhaps my skin wasn’t stable, I felt like it was drying my skin out and left dry patches. Unfortunately, I gave it a few more tries and ended up loving this product that I’ve recommended to many friends and purchased one for my mom.  I’m not a foundation girl and have always preferred BB/CC cream for its light weight and good coverage. I love applying this CC cream with my beauty blender, it leaves a really nice finish on my face. I find “light” to be the perfect shade for me, but I know it has recently added more shades in between the original shades. I also think this original formula works great for both summer and winter, even though there’s now the oil free version, I might just stick with this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If I could give this product a zero star rating, I would! It caused my skin to violently erupt in horrible acne!  If you have any skin sensitivity whatsoever I would steer clear. Just awful! I believe the YouTube reviewer Tati had the same issues with this product. Use at your own risk!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cakey, heavy, muddy, and way too dark.

reviews.review_title: Not so great on oily skin, but otherwise!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have very oily skin and started using this product in the summer, so at that time I didn't like it too much because it slipped around a lot and honestly came across as very greasy, no matter how much I powdered it. Now, however, during the fall, I love the way it looks, but my skin has turned pretty combo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how it feels fresh and soft and pretty lightweight, while still providing coverage. It's fantastic for school everyday and is pretty long lasting. It did used to cake up around my chin, but I figured out that's because of the oily foods I eat during lunch. I usually blend a light layer to even out my skin tone, then go it with a concealer brush and add more coverage where needed. Amazing, my only qualm is that I need to buy a yellower shade! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive combination skin, and I need moderate to full coverage since I get acne. This is excellent and feels light on the skin. I apply setting powder and layer powder foundation over the spots that show through. I find it's best to use a beauty blender to apply it... and I use it over my serums and moisturiser. If my skin is extra dry that day I'll also have a thin layer of jojoba or rosehip oil underneath which to give a more dewy look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product looks amazing when you put it on.... but the good review stops there. It slides off within an hour. It is supposed to be primer, sunscreen, foundation, blah, blah, blah, all in one. Obviously the primer doesn’t work AT ALL as it does not stay in place, so all other functions of this CC product are useless. Don’t waste your money.

reviews.review_title: Too yellow, doesn't set well. Great coverage.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is so yellow and does not set well. The coverage is good but because of that it does not settle in to match my skin tone well. Does not set well. I will try this once more with a different setting powder (laura mercier translucent couldn't be worse for me, I bought a sample size so maybe it was a bad batch). I hope I can still return it. I have been using bobbi brown skin longwear foundation and it obviously doesn't have the same purpose but it is better for me. I am 29 years old, fair cool/neutral undertones, oily/combination skin, textured skin, blond hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this foundation, but it will NOT stay on my skin!  I have combination skin and I've tried everything... applying with a beauty blender, foundation brush, fingers, several different types of primer, no primer, setting powder, no powder, etc and nothing works.  It looks fine at first, but after a few hours it is horribly patchy and blotchy.  Not a good look!  I'm not sure what is causing this for me, it seems equally blotchy on dryer and oiler parts of my face.  I have not had this issue with other foundations.  Too bad because I like that it has high SPF and the color match was good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this, and have been using it for a couple months now, but it’s just not the one. I use a primer and then apply with a damp beauty blender, but it still takes a lot of work to apply and blend—the formula goes on thick and tends to look blotchy and textured as the day goes on. I will say that it hasn’t made me breakout at all, though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this all of Summer and it’s still going strong. Easy to blend, evens out my complexion and provides a radiant finish to my skin. Will be my go to ‘lighter’ foundation along with the Nars tinted moisturizer.

reviews.review_title: beautiful, but made my skin go nuts!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
