reviews.review_text: wanted to love this SOOO bad due to having sunscreen incorporated into my base makeup, but within an hour of wearing it my skin started itching so bad and turned bright red. nothing in my routine is new except this so ill sadly be returning and trying something else. i gave two stars bc the finish was truly beautiful and blurred my pores, but definitely spot test in store if you have sensitive skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff! Lightweight and it feels like I’m not wearing makeup

reviews.review_title: Probably better for normal to dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the consistency and sheer to medium coverage. I had to switch to the matte version, however. This one simply made me too oily, but otherwise I loved everything else about it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - natural beige shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Most horrible experience with this....it made my eyes and nose run all day....caked on my face...especially under eye...got it as a sample so was stupid enough to try it out b4 going to work....

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use this as my everyday foundation! I love how it’s not full coverage but still give me a nice even skin look and love the sunscreen in there!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think this is more of a foundation than a CC cream. It gives such full coverage I actually dilute it a bit with a face oil, it helps give a more natural look that way. It wears really well throughout the day, it doesn’t slip off much and I usually only need a small touch up by late afternoon. It also seems to wear better when I remember to put a setting powder on, I have one from Cover FX that works well. I will definitely repurchase once the time comes.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first product that I bought that matched me 100% completely, and I swore because of this, it was going to be my holy grail. This covers all the redness I have which is amazing!! So why the two stars? Unfortunately, this product broke me out badly, especially my chin and forehead. I had big zits and a bunch of tiny little ones. I initially thought I was breaking out due to the new skincare products I was using, so I went back to my trusty regular simple skincare routine. But that didn't work, I was still breaking out, and my skin looked more irritated than it did before. I just kept breaking out for the entire month, and it felt like a never ending cycle. I eventually decided to stop using the It's Cosmetics CC Cream not thinking it was the reason for my breakouts, but to my surprise, it was! My skin cleared up tremendously once I stopped using it. It's unfortunate because I really wanted this to work out, but this is just one of those products that I'm scared to go back to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect CC! I love the light coverage, easy application and moisturizing. The spf is a huge bonus since I spend a lot of time out of doors (FYI... IT’s sweat proof too!) The only downside is the packaging. The silver print labeling flakes/chips off so I find silver flecks on my face as well as all over my other make up.... I’m a little old for that much sparkle.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this cc cream because everyone raves about it. I've tried several different primers and moisturizers but for some reason my skin just doesn't agree with it. It separates in an hour on me and it looks as if I applied powder instead of a cream. I prefer the matte version of this product because it seems to go on more smoothly on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to love but caused severe breakouts all over my face and left my skin oily within a few hours.

reviews.review_title: No hives, no break out, no itching? I'm in love.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Buying this product was a little bit of a battle trying it out. When I first went in to sephora the woman working there put it on me. I hated it. It was streaky and way too dark. However, it didn't make my skin itchy and I though my may be the product wasn't to blame for my negative outlook on the product.  I went back to sephora and applied it on myself. using my fingers and only applying where I felt I needed it, omg I was so impressed and happy. The colouring though still a bit dark for me and a little on the yellow side but it works out. I have developed some redness here and there and I've notice with a little bit it really does even my skin out. I don't put it all over my face. I use it around my eyes, touch on my nose and a wee bit on my forehead and a dab on my chicks. I don't even use a full pump. Maybe less than half of a pump and my skin even outs. The yellow tone works wonders for my blue purple bags and red bits. If I use it all over my face turns full yellow.  With the amount I put on, i am still able to see my freckles which I am happy about. I like my makeup to look natural.  I really wish they had a tone lighter than fair, but Its not noticeable if used sparingly. But seriously OMG first cream I've ever used with out any itchy or break outs! No hives, didn't dry out my skin. I am in love. It cosmetics, if u see this. please make one shade lighter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product. Saw a difference in pores in a week. I have the oil free in light medium for the summer time and the original formula in light for the winter when my skin is dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used to use a BB cream from MAC that I loved but the product was discontinued and I was mortified. I tried all kinds of other options, but find the color or texture wrong every time. When I finally tried this, my search was over! The weight and texture are fantastic and it has a great SPF in it without it feeling heavy or sticky. My skin is pretty dry, so I generally moisturize before applying this (and then my IT under eye cream, which I also use to cover other spots). Those two products make for a quick makeup routine with great results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Formula didn't work for my oily/combo skin. It looked flaky and dry after about 4 hours of wear. Didn't set well with any poderes either. Was very Cakey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combo skin, and by the end of the day, I usually have some level of shine on my T zone. This CC cream made things look 3x worse. It applied nicely, but turned super shiny a couple hours in. Maybe this is good for someone with super dry skin, but it was a hard pass for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love how smoothly this product goes on and that it has SPF 50 to protect my skin for sun damage. I have been using this product for months and don’t think I’ll ever need to try something different. It’s definitely worth the price.

reviews.review_title: Amazing! (at least for the first half of the day)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE the way this foundation looks and feels. The undertone is perfection, I cant find anything that matches me quite as well. I actually do feel like it makes my skin better after wearing it, so its my go to choice when I am braking out. BUT unfortunatly it does start to brake apart on my conbonation skin after 5-6 hours. Bummber...this would be my holy grail if it look just as good at hour 8, as it does when I frist apply it. Still worth the $, still a soild 4 out of 5 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I use makeup forever normally but wanted to switch up my make up for work. This sits on my skin and doesn’t blend in.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I gave this two stars.  One star because this product has good coverage, and one star because it has good SPF.  Unfortunately, those two things were not enough to override the extreme rolling/pilling, making it a NO GO for me.  It has way too much silicone for my liking.  Once applied, if I would accidentally brush my face with my hand, there would be rolled up bits of CC creme on my face.  I did an experiment in which I rubbed all over my face with my fingertips.  Not extremely hard, but with the same amount of pressure that I would use to apply moisturizer.  I was left with rolls and rolls of product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I get compliments on my skin every single time I wear this foundation. I have combination skin (normal in summer and dry as a desert in the winter) and on days when I feel like I need a little more moisture in my skin without compromising the coverage, I reach for this. It is so hydrating and covers up any nasty redness or dry patches I have on my skin. I loved it so much that I bought it in 3 other shades to match how tan I get through the year.   However, I took off one star because it does transfer like crazy. If you put on any type of glasses or touch your face in the slightest, it will rub off. But that won’t stop me from using it because I love the coverage and hydration it provides.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation!  It does feel a little dewy, but im giving it 5 stars anyway.  It leaves my skin feeling and looking healthy.  Nice buildable coverage.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am using this for the past 3 years. Love the texture, coverage and finish. Easy makeup for busy moms. I am in between shades and I have to buy 2 each time but I love it so much that I am not bothered by that. I pare it with Hourglass powder and bronzer. This one is a staple in my makeup bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve never been a big fan of full coverage foundations for daily wear, but I do have a bit of presistent mild redness/irritation from having sensitive skin that I like to keep covered. This cc cream perfectly covers my redness and builds up coverage in the places where I need it without looking or feeling heavy/cakey/full coverage.  The very first time I put it on, I hadn’t used a moisturizer in a loooong time (I was trying to figure out what I was/am allergic to) and I noticed the cc cream oxidized mildly on my skin. Not enough that anyone else would ever notice, but just enough that I could tell it was a touch too dark. I love the texture/finish of this cream so much that even with the oxidizing I was willing to just blend it further down my neck from then on and call it a day.  The next time I applied it I moisturized the night before and the morning of, and the oxidizing issue went away completely. Now it’s a perfect color match and it looks flawless even after 8 hours of wear at work where I’m scrubbing and cleaning all day. I set my under eye with powder and the rest of my face with Urban Decay “Chill”. The UD setting spray definitely plays well with this CC cream and the powder kept it from creasing on my lower eyelid. No makeup rubbed off on my phone today, either, so the staying power of these two products combined is impressive!  If you are on the fence about buying this and you have dry skin and don’t like wearing full on foundation on a daily basis- take the plunge. It’s so worth it. Be sure to pick up the IT Cosmetics “Bye Bye Under Eye” Wayerproof concealer, too, because my goodness is it super full coverage and heavy duty- perfect for touching up blemishes that this cc cream won’t cover.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I typically like a very natural look on my skin-- usually I'll just throw on a good coverage concealer on spots to look more put together. I work 12 hour night shifts as a nurse and don't like for a product to be sitting on my entire face for that long. I also liked that it had anti-aging serum in it. The product is true to the name: Your skin but better! I find that even after running around all night it stays put. I get off work and my foundation holds up incredibly well. Extremely versatile product. It provides a great base for my bronzer and blush too for days I want to add a little color to my face. Even though its a CC cream, it really has the staying power of a full coverage foundation. I've completely replaced my concealers with this product-- something that I never thought I'd say as someone with chronic dark circles! Highly highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I can’t say enough good things about this foundation. I have dumb wrinkles that crease pretty easily, but this foundation is so moisturizing that it doesn’t crease at all! I’ve never found this with any other foundations. And on top of that, you need so very little but you get such good full coverage. I have a lot of sun spots and this makes me one even perfect canvas for the rest of my makeup. It’s long lasting and the fact it has SPF 50+ is the cherry on top! I’m fairly certain this is the only foundation I’ll be purchasing from now on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: this product is my favourite! the coverage is amazing without feeling heavy. it also doesn’t look cakey and has SPF 50 which is great. even though it has SPF, it doesn’t smell/feel like sunscreen like some other cc creams. it really does look like ‘your skin but better’

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Formula is lightweight and long lasting. The coverage, SPF and color match have me in love! I’m never a fan of scented face products as they generally break me out or give me headaches, but this gave me neither.

reviews.review_title: Brilliant for a quick morning routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don't have a ton of time for foundation in the morning, and this is a lifesaver. It goes on so easily and smoothly, and even thought it feels more like moisturizer, it gives excellent coverage. I get compliments on my foundation all the time. Bonus: it has SPF 50  and has a light fresh scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: BEST FREAKING CC CREAM! MORE LIKE A FULL COVERAGE FOUNDATION WITHOUT THE CAKINESS! I wear this more than my regular foundation

reviews.review_title: Not for people who wear glasses or oily skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the second time I have purchased this product, I wanted to give it another try. After using Laura Mercier setting powder and All nighter setting spray my glasses pushed the product off the sides of my nose. I do not have this issue with any of the other foundations I have used. I also don’t have an issue with oily skin but it made my face oily and gross after 3 hrs. It has great coverage but this isn’t even close to being the best. I would definitely go with cliniques BB cream over this any day, it has never caused me these issues.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this one, but the more I wore it the less I liked it. I loved how it had spf and I loved the look it had on my skin at first, but the longer I wore it the more it felt drying and looked a tad flaky/powdery on my chin and forehead. That being said, I'm sure it would work wonderfully for those who's skin isn't on the drier side

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Every time I try to use another foundation I always regret it and come back to this one! Good build and blends great with cream products. The only real problem is the transfer, but I don’t see that big of a deal since every other foundation that’s not super cakey does that!

reviews.review_title: Everything I wanted it to do, it does
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great CC cream. Good coverage, not flaky, blends well, and lasts through my day. The fact that it has spf is a bonus for me! It's not as moisturizing as a non-makeup moisturizer, however I usually just dab a bit of serum before I apply this and my skin feels perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had a colour consultant match my skin tone and wow, it’s an awesome product. At first I thought she picked too light but after walking around the store and constantly touching my face, I quickly fell in love. It feels super natural, light and covers my uneven skin tone extremely well. It’s like having a full coverage but without the heaviness. I had some redness in the cheeks, a massive zit on the chin and some visible pores on the nose. Next morning I went through my usual routine of prepping the skin, including Hourglass primer and it was easy to apply with my fingers, using minimal product. Lasted all day long and even got a couple compliments on how nice and healthy my skin looked today.  Highly recommend especially for the mature skin that needs the extra boost in hydration.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tried, but it ended in the trash. That silver from the package gets all over your hands. The foundation breaks apart, looks cakey, settles into every pore and line on your face, lasts for all of an hour, and within an hour it looks so terrible that I scrubbed it off my face at work. Worst product I have bought from Sephora.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This did not at all work on my skin. I purchased it in-store after having it sampled on me; however, after multiple uses it looked super chalky and did not look smooth at all

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It clung onto my dry patches and broke me out. I would not recommend this to people who have dry and sensitive skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I use the medium shade with a beautyblender and it covers all my hyperpigmention spots beautifully. I have oily skin and have to set it though but makeup lasts all day. A little bit goes a long way

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this cc as it leaves my skin looking great but doesn't feel heavy. The only issue i have with it is that the fair seems a bit too dark (or oxidizes darker) and the light is too light (or has different undertones then my skin does). More shades/range would make this perfect.

reviews.review_title: Not full coverage, could use more shades.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This evens out my skin tone nicely so if that's all you're looking for than this would work for you, however I can't build this to a full coverage foundation like it claims. I have very light skin and the lightest shade is still a little to dark for me.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love, love this bn cream I had tried so many this is perfect. I gives me a lot of coverage, and stays one for hours. I don’t like the smell and that the container is really cheap. It peels and It look old. I like container that look feminine and luxurious but the product is good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favourite cc cream/foundation ever. I have always had a problem with my skin being too dry for foundation and it would get cakey and flakey on my nose and between my eyes. Not this holy grail! Perfect for my extremely dry skin. I will buy this OVER AND OVER again 100%. I have been using this colour in the summer but I will have to change to the lighter one during the winter. Let’s hope it matches just as perfect with my winter skin. Love. Love. Love!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: hate this !! makes my pores cry ! everytime i put this on ( i have acne prone skin with tons of acne scars and large pores ) it makes my skin look even worse ! maybe this will suit someone with less troublesome skin but for me , this was a huge no

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The ONLY reason why I give this 4 starts is because I think it's more medium- high medium coverage. It is gorgeous otherwise. I am usually nc15-nc20 and fair is a perfect shade. Beautiful natural finish, it doesn't transfer or oxidize. No issues with the SPF. I have visible pores, texture and peach fuzz, and it doesn't highlight any of those. It literally looks like my skin, but better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am overall very in love with this product and keep grabbing on it everyday.  Pros: - convenient, 3 in 1, I don’t have to apply primer or sunscreen individually anymore long lasting as a CC cream, I find that 8-10 hours is the max for this CC cream, being said you prime and set the skin. If cc cream is used solely, probs last 4-6 hours - coverage is medium, still need to use some concealer for blemishes   Cons: - limited colour selection, I am fairer in winter so I have to mix both fair and light together every time to get my shade - during summer it does get oily pretty quickly so I have to bring powder with me to set it every 3-4 hours  I would highly recommend if you are someone that’s always short on time. This product saves at least 5 minutes of my makeup procedure everyday!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this!!!! Works great with my dry skin and I am she will do great with other types as well!!!!! I have only tried samples but I am asking for cc cream for Christmas and I get WIAT to get it!!! Would recommend this light coverage foundation that dose wonders for skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this after a few attempts at a tinted moisturizer/similar products carried by Sephora were too dark or orange. The Fair shade is ok on my skin though it appeared too dark at first (I'm a MAC NC-15), but it may have been my lighting at home. Ironically I had been looking for a lighter coverage and didn't realize it was full coverage until I opened it. A little goes a long way since it is full coverage, but it still feels a bit heavy and greasy to me, despite using primers (which cancels any skin benefits to those areas?), setting powders, and spray. I didn't return but I won't repurchase. I didn't go for the oil-free version because that often is too drying on my combination skin.
