reviews.review_text: It feels very heavy, but as long as you use the right amount it'll feel good and lightweight on the skin. I need the smallest amount since it has a very heavy coverage. I tend to get very oily throughout the day but this works perfectly fine with oily skin! Very happy I purchased even though I expected a little more. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favourite CC cream ever. I don't use any strong foundations so this is my go-too. It allows for the right amount of coverage, just touching up any small redness. Feels like nothing is on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t think I’ve ever written a review for any product in my life but this product is a GAME CHANGER. Earlier this year I broke out in terrible hormonal acne that left scarring all over my chin and cheeks. Thanks to this product, those scars are hardly visible anymore. Aside from its color-correcting powers, it is perfect for my every day use. It gives me a very natural look and makes my morning routine very quick. It provides buildable coverage, has anti aging and hydrating ingredients, and has SPF 50. What more can you ask for?! I have oily skin and I feel that with a bit of primer and setting powder, I do not feel super oily after a few hours of wearing this. Do yourself a favor and go buy this!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for about four months and I love it! Exactly what I was looking for. I use and adore Make Up Forever Ultra HD Liquid Foundation, but wanted something lighter and easier to use for every day. Also, since having a baby my skin has changed, my face is now drier but I get breakouts in the t-zone. This does a great job of not making me feel oily while not drying me out. And LOVE that it has SPF! I was sceptical as to whether this was actually making any improvements to my skin, but after a couple weeks of use my sister commented on how great my skin looked so, yay!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Blends wonderfully and has amazing skin care ingredients

reviews.review_title: One of the best cc creams
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite cc cream. Gorgeous coverage that wears beautiful and is comfortable. No breakouts, no irritation, no itchy skin. I can wear for 8 hours in dry heat with minimal touch ups with just a blotting powder. With a setting powder I can get another 6-8 hours wear looking great late night dancing away. I’ve worn this poolside in Vegas and without a touch up my pics looked great. I do set with either the it cc powder or bare minerals original powder. For a long or sweaty day I use smashbox original primer but it’s not needed for everyday use. This is holy grail level

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve never been so obsessed with a foundation in my life! It lasts me all day, corrects redness and covers perfectly

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Your skin but better! - The name doesn’t lie.  I have a little bit of acne scarring, sun spots, and just overall uneven skin tone and I’ve been struggling to find something that is light and natural, but also has the coverage I was looking for. Some medium-coverage foundations I was using before gave me the coverage I wanted, but it just sat on my skin. This CC Cream is perfect. It completely evens out my skin tone and sinks into my skin perfectly; you can’t even tell I have anything on my face but my skin looks flawless! I wore it all day and it didn’t feel like I had any makeup on, didn’t get oily, felt light and natural and stayed that way all day. I was really pleased about how I didn’t have to put on SPF and that I was covered with this. It alI wasn’t really quite sure how I would feel about this but I am totally sold. Will definitely be repurchasing this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: No doubt it is a great product with high UV protection and full coverage. Although when you have acne/ the left red spot, a concealer will still be your best friend. But to me, it is a great product for summer when I have combination to oily skin, it looks the best when your face starting to be oily. While it is almost winter, it looks a little bit cakey on my face (especially the cheek) as I become combination to dry.  Anyway, I would still give it a 5 star for its lemonade scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty great stuff! Ordered a darker tone for tanned skin and impressed with the product. I am 54 and this works so well to add a nice lovely soft glow and covers all imperfections. Looks natural, glides on the skin nicely and helps make my skin look young, dewy and even toned.  Ordering more for the fall/winter months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This CC cream is amaaaaaaaaazinggggg!!!!! I have combination skin and am prone to breakouts but this product does not make my skin super oily nor does it trigger pimples. I like that it provides some sort of coverage and can be worn instead of foundation

reviews.review_title: Took Awhile for me to love this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It took me some time to really like this product.  When I first got it, it was good but not something I found myself reaching for every day.  However, the more I have used it, the more I like it.  It sort of creeps up on you.  Part of the issue was the shade.  I initially got the shade Light.  This ended up being too dark for me, even in the summer when I have more color.  I then purchased the shade FAIR in the Illumination CC cream.  This was not a great shade match either and had too much glitter in it for my taste.  I like a nice dewy foundation but I don't like the appearance of specks of glitter on my skin.  I will say that the FAIR shade works pretty good as my winter shade.  I started mixing both the FAIR illumination and LIGHT regular CC cream and this is a better shade match and tones down the glitter in the illumination.  Once I figured that out, I started using this product more and find that it has really good coverage and it feels really good on the skin.  It is comfortable and I don't have an issue with it transferring or slipping.  In cooler seasons, I do not need to set this with a powder if I don't want to and products blend nicely over top of it.  You get better coverage going in with a brush but you can easily sheer this out by adding moisturizer or going in with little product and a damp beauty blender.  I prefer to go in with a beauty blender as I don't always need much coverage but I like that this is buildable and you can get the coverage if needed.  I also really like the packaging.  I know a lot of people don't like a tube as they feel product is wasted.  I prefer a tube with a pump.  They are easier to travel with as you don't have to worry about them breaking and you can always cut the tube when you get low and can no longer pump it out and transfer the product to a jar.  I took one star off because of the shade range.  I have to purchase two of these just to get it to work for me which ends up being pricey.

reviews.review_title: Medium coverage, but needs better staying power
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and was hoping for medium coverage and staying power. The coverage looks very natural, but i find that after a few hours my skin becomes extremely oily and always find a lot of product on my hands when I accidentally touch my face. I wish it stayed on my skin better. Additionally, I see lack of coverage in my wrinkles because the color transfers to other areas.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Seriously what can I say about this product! It is by far my favorite foundation. I have very oily skin so am always careful about what I put on my skin, especially when it comes to liquid foundations. This gives my skin an amazing coverage, with just the right amount of glow. Doesn’t leave my skin oily even throughout an entire 8 hour shift at work. Doesn’t break me out! I love this product and highly recommend to anyone.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is convenient for me to put on in the morning when I am in a hurry.  It eliminates the need for me to apply sunscreen and foundation separately.  However, I find that it breaks down on my skin after a few hours, so it is not the best for long days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product, the undertones were perfect for my coloration and I loved the fact that it stayed on all day without transferring, piecing apart, or looking greasy. After several tests, I did discover that it was the sole cause of the bumpy texture and mild acne on my face, especially on my nose and chin. I’ve owned plenty of other foundations and tinted moisturizers that didn’t cause the same issue. Not exactly a must-have for acne prone or others with enlarged pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite CC cream.  I used to wear lighter coverage tinted moisturizers for day but I often felt like they slipped off my skin and got greasy after a few hours.  The first time I put this on I was a little scared of the thickness/coverage but after I blended it out (and learned to apply less) I absolutely love this.  it covers everything and it lasts all day.  Doesn't settle into fine lines, lasts in heat.  Now I love having my full-coverage look for day too.  I get so many compliments on my skin when I wear this!

reviews.review_title: One of the best CC cream out there!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I keep my makeup at a minimal don't like to wear foundation, so BB/CC creams are my go-to makeup. This CC cream is one of the best I ever try. It goes on so smooth and practically melt into your skin. It blends so nicely and give you a dewy finish that does not become oily at all throughout the day. Tremendous staying power! I would classify the coverage as medium. For everyday wear it does a wonderful job of evening out your skin. You can build layer to cover the darker area, but for extremely stubborn pimples it is probably better to use a concealer with this. My skin is usually very good with occasional pimple so this CC cream does the job fine. It does not break you out and it has SPF! What a deal for those who love skincare like me?!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of this products that I always come back to. CC cream is one of those products that I never knew I needed. My skin feels so much nicer after using this. Even with oily skin this works. I lightly set my t zone with Laura mercier powder. It gives you a nice glow and even texture. A little goes a long way. I warm this my fingertips and it melts into my skin. After taking it off my skin feels much plumper and soft. Truly a game changer.

reviews.review_title: Good but not for dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gives really nice smooth coverage, but very drying and made my skin break out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I needed a new BB/CC cream after running out of my favorite. I decided to try this one and used it today for the first time for an interview. My skin looked so good!  I also like that it has sunscreen. I really felt pretty with this CC cream. I even met friends for lunch who told me how good my skin looked.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: At first I was a little hesitant that a CC cream could be full coverage but omg I’m so happy I was wrong! It really is full coverage and doesn’t disappoint. It lasts throughout my whole day with is amazing because I have fairly dry skin and it doesn’t look powdery at the end of that day.  And it’s perfect for summer because of the spf but the nice part is you don’t get that overwhelming smell like you’re wearing sun screen but rather has a nice settle lemon smell I find that doesn’t last!!

reviews.review_title: Great for dry skin, easy to apply, good coverage.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go-to foundation. I love that it has SPF 50, but doesn't have the SPF smell that many do. It's very blendable, and allows you to build coverage. I have dry skin and it doesn't stick to my dry areas like many foundations do. My only complaint would be that it's difficult to set this foundation - it is slightly oily so it smears off easily throughout the say (i.e. if I scratch my face, that will completely remove the foundation). Because it's oily, it will sometimes become cakey in the creases under my eyes over the course of the day. However, all that aside, this foundation does the trick and it's the best one I've found yet. It's very good for dry skin, and a good amount of coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was not a fan of this. It was extremely thick and cakey, and it wasn’t good for my sensitive skin. Though it was light enough.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, and if you've been eyeing it for a while, definitely give it a try. As a cream, I don't really feel like I am putting a lot of heavy product on my face, which is really important to me. Especially in the summer, I found this product was reliable without clogging my pores.   I love adding a few drops of beauty oil to this product to thin it out even further for a very natural application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff but find it hard to wear everyday. I thought it would be lighter coverage (I was looking for my skin but better) but I do think if you’re looking for easy, medium coverage I recommend!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like the product, but surprisingly for a CC cream it can look little cakey if you try to apply little more for more coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I took the foundation quiz and this was my result. It’s perfect for my skin and actually works as a better sunscreen than a lot of my face sun screens. It’s light but a nice coverage it stays on all day and lasted me a long time! Totally recommend this product.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Feels like it’s healthy for my skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_text: This is the first foundation I’ve tried that doesn’t feel heavy and gross on my skin! Love how smooth it is and that you can make it look natural or dramatic!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! My skin looks vibrant, dewy without being shiny, and it lasts all day without looking heavy.  I had used Smash Box Photo Ready for years and liked it but wanted to try something new and I am so glad I did!  Love that this has anti-aging properties as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have pigmentation issues from cystic acne on my fair skin and this does an excellent job covering even my darkest spots. I got the light but it’s still a little too dark and I’m pretty pale, so I just blend in some concealer and it looks much better. This doesn’t get cakey and the coverage is great! I get oily by the end of the day, so I set it with powder and it still looks good. I won’t use any other foundation after this!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Full coverage and not that heavy

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used to love this cc cream. I would use it every winter when my face got super dry and it was so hydrating for my skin. I recently picked this up again after noticing parts of my face starting to dry out and the cream made my face so much worse. I was drier than before I used it. I’m really sad this doesn’t work for me anymore because the application of this cream is so smooth and I only had to use a little product to get full face coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tried a lot of CC creams in the market and also the most expensive one from Dior. I am honestly satisfied with the coverage for this one compared to the others. It has become my everyday go to for natural look. The product eliminates the step for applying sunscreen. It is similar to the foundation coverage, comes with sunscreen protection. Concealer is not required and gives a natural dewy look.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful Finish, Too Expensive, NEED OLIVE SHADES
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used 2 tubes of this since October 2017. Absurd price for the small amount of product you get. I am a very green-olive toned NC25-NC30 depth woman, depending on the time of year. If I apply this product in a sheer layer, I can get away with this in the winter. The Light shade is a touch too light and notably too gray-not enough green or warmth for me. But the finish is *beautiful*, lightly dewy, smooth, and even. It covers my PIE and active acne nicely. The trick is to apply over a slippery, freshly (and thoroughly) moisturized base, or it can be tricky to blend. I find after I remove it, my skin feels smoother

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great for SPF protection and light coverage when I don’t feel like wearing my foundation.  Applies easily & evens out my skin tone/corrects my redness. Also good to uses under my foundation as a primer too!  Wish it just had little more staying power by the end of the day when I wheat it own it’s own (I do set it with powder).  Will continue to repurchase when I run out.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Didn’t like it! Didn’t cover any of my skin issues: my dark spots, red spots, pores, wrinkles....etc, it didn’t do anything for my skin! Totally over priced! And it doesn’t do any of the claims listed on packaging, thankfully I bought it from Sephora so I was able to return it with no issues.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample from a previous order.  I decided to finally try something different from my holy grail MUFE foundation.  I will admit that I was a little skeptical at first, since I tend to have a reaction to products containing SPF.  Thankfully, this was not the case.  I immediately fell in love with this (and was very lucky that the sample shade [medium] was a perfect match).  I found that when I applied this using my Artis brush, this gave a very natural (your skin, but better) look.  The only thing I do not like about this product is that it has a dewy finish (I prefer a more matte finish, as my skin can be oily), however, a little setting powder and this is perfect!  I would highly recommend this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: sheer skin like coverage, which is really good for everyday school makeup look

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product completely broke me out with tiny bumps all over my face. I used it 1 week ago and the bumps/acne still haven’t cleared. I do not have acne prone skin and this is the only new product I used. Also, throughout the day the product seemed to slip off my face and when I looked in the mirror I had streaks (I used a setting powder). Perhaps the sunscreen in the product didn’t agree with my skin. I will not be using it again.

reviews.review_title: Good all in one for travel with SPF 50
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I needed an all in one for travel.  The fact that this has a 50 SPF was a bonus for me as I spend a lot of time walking outside when I travel.  The foundation does feel sort of sticky, no doubt due to the SPF, but I've found that if I finish with a powder it's perfect.  It's more a full coverage which I like also, covers lots of sun spots, redness, ect.  Like one review said it does seep into my fine lines around my eyes, so I don't use it too heavily there.  For an all-in-one for travel, this foundation fits the bill.

reviews.review_title: For Your Go-To, Everyday Natural Look
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this for a summer trip to SE Asia—I wanted a “foundation” with light-medium coverage, a light feel, and >SPF 50 because I was going to be under the sun, sweating, all day. This was the perfect pick! I was surprised by the great coverage yet lightweight feel, for being a CC cream. The finish gives you a dewy, healthy glow. I got so many compliments on my skin! It stood up against sweat, humidity, and water while swimming, although it does transfer if you don’t set it with powder. My favorite part was the SPF 50+ (it’s a physical/mineral sunscreen, which is great for those with sensitive skin). I just bought a lighter shade because I plan on wearing this in the fall/winter—honestly, all year-round!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product. Feels light on the skin and its plus that it has SPF. Wear it everyday!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far my favorite coverage. It’s light enough to not be cakey and obvious but also effective enough hide any blemishes or pigmentation. The small amount you need and the amount you receive makes it last along time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation! It makes marks and imperfections disappear like magic! Coverage is medium/full. If you’re on the fence about it, don’t be.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It Cosmetics writes Cruelty-Free on the box and yet second ingredient is Snail Secretion. This is not cruelty-free! I'm returning.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I do enjoy this foundation quite a bit, but it isn't my #1. I do like the dewy finis, sometimes. It doesn't last me all day, but it did help improve my skin (acne, dark spots, etc.)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I do not wear make-up. Never have and at this point I know nothing! Never had skin issues but at 30, boom, I’ve got regular breakouts. I wanted a product that was not make-up, which would make the problem worse and require too much effort and time. I stumbled into Ulta looking for a tinted moisturizer and was introduced to this. It is awesome. It could cost more than it does and I’d pay it. A little goes a looooong way. For everyday use you need like less than a pea sized amount. It has a higher SPF than I’ve seen in CC or B.B. creams and the sunblock is a physical sunblock, so it actually helps breakouts. This isn’t oily, comes off easy at night and if you want you can add more for a more make-up feel/coverage. I love this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin LOVE IT. Really light on the skin, good coverage and my skin look moisturise and fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got the shade fair for my skin and it was kinda orange! But besides the colour, it was fairly okay for my dry skin. I would suggest swatching in store before buying. I'd kinda suggest it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Right off the bat, I need to say that for a full-coverage product, the range of shades is absolutely embarrassing. I have an NC15 skin tone so I'm pale, but not the palest person around and the shade Fair is about two shades too dark for me. Other, similar multi-tasking products are typically more sheer to medium coverage so there is more forgiveness for lack of shade choices. Not with this.   Now with that rant over, I'd like to say I do enjoy using this CC cream. It is full coverage which is great for my redness and post acne marks. When wearing this, I do see a lot of texture on the dry areas around my mouth and nose which is disappointing to me, but it doesn't cause creasing in my smile lines which is amazing. One last negative is that it is most certainly not transfer-resistant. However, most, if not all, natural to dewy finish foundations will transfer.   I appreciate the inclusion of zinc oxide for its UVA-filtering abilities. Many makeup products that tout an SPF rating don't have a UVA filter which is a major cause of skin cancer and photo-aging. Please keep that in mind if you rely on your makeup for sun protection.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this for about two years now - I’m trying to use less “actual” foundation and so I use this with some concealer to cover dark spots/acne scars. I love that this product is lightweight, has good coverage, and the SPF! The one star I deducted was because of the packaging.  EVERY single tube I’ve used, the silver part/writing area has rubbed off. The most annoying part is that the silver residue from the tube will rub off onto my hands.  PLEASE change the packaging on this product!!!!!!!!!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very good for normal skin with high coverage. I love this product.

reviews.review_title: IT CC with SPF 50 - smoother skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this for an outdoor wedding I attended - not much of a foundation girl because seems like most things make me break out. I'm allergic to good for your skin type mineral foundations too like bare minerals. I have oily skin, especially in the T zone, hyper pigmentation and dark spots (dollar size ones) over my cheeks; therefore SPF is important. This CC cream goes on somewhat heavy, feels a little oily at first, but buffs in nicely with the IT Heavenly #702 brush. The coverage is medium - still needed the Smashbox peach color correcting pencil to achieve full coverage. Used Laura Mercier translucent powder to set the CC cream. I was very happy with the result as the CC cream did not cake up or crease by the end of the night. I would have given it 5 stars; however it does transfer a bit - probably because its a little oily (and imagine that has something to do with the physical spf). Big reason for this review is that I applied this cc again yesterday (same with the smash box cc stick and Laura Mercier setting powder) in the morning, and had a long day - and too tired to wash my face last night (gasp). When I washed my face this morning my skin was visibly smoother, no break outs. Not suggesting you sleep with this but if you do, its not the end of the world and you make find smoother skin in the morning. Side note: I also tried the IT CC w/ spf Matte version which turned yellow and grey hue on my skin. It even turned grey on the beauty advisor who helped me with it - don't recommend the matte version - stick with the original formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked the product until I realized it started changing my skin type. I’m usually dry, but after using this almost every day for two weeks, I noticed my T-zone and the sides of my nose was getting oily after a couple hours of wear. I had to stop using it. But I loved how it looked on my skin, and I loved the light coverage it gave. It was an amazing cream, I just wish my skin wasn’t so sensitive to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely one of my all time favorites. If you want medium-full coverage that feels like nothing and your skin looks like skin this is it. Stays on ALL day and looks amazing, extremely easy to blend. You can have any skin type and this does wonders; I have truly combination skin with a very oily Tzone and dry on the rest of my face and it looks gorgeous. Not only is it amazing as a foundation but it has so many skincare benefits in it. This is my 3rd tube.

reviews.review_title: Woow this stuff is AMAZING well worth the price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Never thought id love a CC or BB cream soo much! This stuff is amazing perfect coverage without being to thick. This product smells amazing aswell it is slightly citrusy and helps to get me going early in the day. Now that I  have started to notice fine lines on my face foundation is to thick and seems to always exasperate them and make me self conscious where as this product hides them, makes my skin look flawless, and makes it look near natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product to travel around Italy and other European countries in the dead of summer. Not only does it stay in place when you sweat, it provides great coverage that is buildable. I have very sensitive and red-prone skin so this product saved my life. I HIGHLY recommend, I am very loyal to this product now.

reviews.review_title: Just what I was looking for!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a light foundation for summer and came across this on the Sephora site. I really like it. It applies smoothly and quickly with fingertips, and buffs up perfectly with the IT brush. I chose the Medium color, figuring I could always return it for the Light, but I didn't need to. Medium matches amazingly with my light-to-medium skin tone.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage, light enough for everyday use. Use with the CC  cream brush and application is easy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shade is perfect and it stays for whole day and only one concern that it goes to your shirt collar too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent produit couvrant sans plâtrer bonne tenue et FPS.

reviews.review_title: One step sun protection/foundation like coverage
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to start with an SPF 50 cream on my face, followed by foundation. Too time consuming and heavy. This gives me the exact flawless results. LOVE IT, no pun intended. :-)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this CC cream, it gives a natural glowy look. It has very good coverage. I like the minty feeling when I apply it on my face. I usually apply with a sponge. I will restock for sure.

reviews.review_title: my go to for everyday wear
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Has been my go to for almost two years.  Apply in the morning and don’t worry about it the rest of the day.  It really makes your skin better over time.  Not sure what some people are saying about to being sticky.  It absorbs into my skin very nicely, but I am dry.  Stays on all day- even makes it through sweaty workouts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Awesome coverage, feels awesome on and lasts all day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It does make my skin look MUCH better but my face gets shiny really fast when I use this. I've never experienced this level of shine before. I have rosacea so my skin is often sensitive and red. It does not irritate my skin and I feel I does help camouflage the redness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: HG foundation!! It has improved my skin! It looks amazing!!! I cannot recommend this foundation enough! Been using this foundation and this foundation alone since Sephora started carrying it!! Love it!! Best applied with a BB!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Bought the smaller size version from beauty on the fly instead of ordering the full-size version. Would definitely recommend asking a color consultant for a shade match as I just went off the shade chart. I bought the medium (which looks almost the exact same as light and fair) due to me being the same skin tone as the lady in the picture. It comes out of the tube super runny

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s okay but nothing great . I was so excited to try this CC cream . It is sitting in a drawer !!!!

reviews.review_title: Amazing Base with Added Skincare Benefits
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go-to! It blends well and works great with other products. I will sometimes build up for more coverage. I love the SPF and skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really like this product! Its stays well all the day, and doesn't crease. As the name says, it really looks like i don't have any foundation on! Just my imperfection goes away magically. However I don't think this product is full coverage as it is supposed to be. It's a perfect day to day foundation thought and I really love my purchase. I would prefer if there were more shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! Super light coverage for people who like to see their real skin underneath. It doesn’t feel like you’re wearing foundation at all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this product. The texture is perfect for my very dry skin and I recommend it for anyone with a sensitive and thin skin. it is perfect for winter time but summer I recommned sth. stronger than this to protect skin from the sunlight.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Wouldn’t say this is the best for oily skin even with setting powder but it’s not horrible if you don’t mind some dew at the end of your day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm on the fence of buying this because of the mixed reviews but finally decided to try the travel size. This gives you the perfect meduim coverage, a littlr goes a long long way (at least for my skin) i love love the dewyness it gives my face. The scent doesn't really bother me. It doesn't break me out or cause any irritation. It stays on my skin for a good 8hrs (setting it with powder). If you have a dry skin and you do not need much coverage this one is for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love it! great coverage, fits well to my skin. i loved it an bought another one to my little sister as well!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used another department store CC cream for years before this, and the moment I put this on I could tell a difference in the coverage. And it's great because it's so hydrating that I do not have to apply moisturizer before hand, and it has an anti-aging serum. Totally worth the money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this product. Such great coverage  for my rosacea, I like the fact that one product moisturizes and covers.  The only problem is I find the color to be a little sallow (yellow).    That’s why I can only give this product 4 stars. I wish there was a more neutral color in the light and then this would be absolutely perfect, but for now it really has been the best product I have found .

reviews.review_title: Great on this 50 yr old face!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! I'm a 50 year old who has some fine lines around my mouth, this does not settle into those lines like a lot of other foundations do plus SPF 50- what's not to love!

reviews.review_title: Very popular, but not for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is not what I was expecting. The CC cream is very thick (it reminds me of Kat Von D makeup). I feel like it clogs my pores and makes me break out. I really wanted to love it because it has skincare benefits but I definitely want something lighter.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really good full coverage foundation. While most people think that CC means light to sheer coverage this product throws all that out the window. Super full coverage applies beautifully to the face. I like the high spf factor too, great for everyday.   Only four stars because I don't reach for as much as other products, but still really good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this for the skin care aspect, and yes, it really does makes you look flawless, both with makeup and without. My HG  foundation has always been MUFE's Ultra HD foundation, and after a few tubes of this stuff I made the foolish decision to swap back. IMMEDIATE REGRET. I almost immediately noticed a difference in my skin. After using IT Cosmetics for almost a year, I really didn't need foundation anymore - it transforms your skin THAT MUCH. My best kept beauty secret, and my new Holy Grail foundation.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Medium coverage. The color is a little off. It leaves a oily finish. I usually put a translucent powder so that I can have a matte look. But it’s nice. It not too thick and heavy. It’s breathable

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered this after a friend raving about it. I was sooo disappointed. This DOES NOT stay on or go on smooth. By lunch time it is splotchy and that is With using the powder. I feel like I wasted $40.

reviews.review_title: Love this product, but increase the shade range!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Please increase the shade range for this product! It's incredible for sensitive skin, has great SPF, and if you can find your match, it's a dream come true. This is medium coverage, but can easily be built up to full.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product is lightweight and works well in the summer, however don’t expect it to be one of those magic “a little goes a long way” creams. Personally I needed 4 pumps to cover my face. It also feels pretty sticky upon application. For the price you pay it just doesn’t last long enough to be worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I switched to IT cc from Dr. Jart BB after Dr. Jart changed their formulation.  I was not digging the sun block smell and extra greasiness.  The IT cc seems to be working as a decent replacement.  It doesn't seem to break out my sensitive skin and it has a great spf.  The smell is okay, somewhat citrusy.  I prefer a decent coverage and this does it without being a full on foundation.  If you're on the fence , I'd give it a try.  The only downside I've noticed is the color selections.  I'm not quite a medium, but the shade down seems a little too orange for fair/light skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I went in for my color IQ to purchase a foundation and left with this instead. The coverage is just enough for my redness and the skin benefits are an added bonus!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Fair was way too light for me, and no one has ever said anything but that my complexionis fair.  It highlighted evry skin imperfection that was textural (wrinkle or uneven texture) and did't cover up red spots because the whole thing was too light.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I bought this, I didn't realize it was a full-coverage CC cream.  I wanted more of a light/medium coverage.  That doesn't make the product bad, though.  It really does feel pretty light on the skin, and evens out my skin tone.  I would still use my foundation for fancier events, but this is good for everyday.  You do get a lot of product in this tube, but it doesn't fit in my makeup organizer cause it's so big! Oh well!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Color was not a good match for me... a bit on the grey side.  The coverage was also heavier than I was looking for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I have only been using for about 3 days but already this is an all time favorite. It gives me the coverage I want without much product. Have used other higher end and drug store foundations but nothing gives me this kind of coverage. It takes minimal effort to blend and looks great   on my skin.

reviews.review_title: The Shades Suck.  The Product is Rad.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go-to everyday jam.  Everything is awesome but the shades.  Sloths have more fingers!     Nice coverage.  Lasts all day.  Easy to make even.  A little buildable.  Nice SPF.  Smells good.  I have to use 2 tubes and mix them but I like it enough that I keep doing it!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i am loving this product! it has a smooth finish and doesn't have a SPF smell like some others i have tried. i have dry skin, this leaves me feeling hydrated. i apply moisturizer, your skin but better, and some concealer under my eyes and i am good to go!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like it because it’s light and it lasts me all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect perfect perfect for everyday easy. The coverage is definitely medium. Flaws do shine through but did not settle in the fine lines or pores. Did use the Winky Lux Whipped primer on my pores and Bobby Brown Vitamin Enriched Face Base. The finish is natural and pretty. I do love this CC Cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to love this product.  I have repurchased many times, but the last time, it seems that the formula is different.  It doesn't blend into my skin.  Before, I would have given it 5 stars.  Blended perfectly with enough concealer to hide anything that needed hiding.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this CC cream. The finish is natural and the color was a great match. The SPF 50 was a bonus. I have started to have melasma on my face and I can put this on without a seperate layer of SPF!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Awesome product light coverage and can build up! Fairly light can barely feel it on and I feel everything on my face. Love the face it has spf!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Second time I get this. I love the texture, the way my skin feels using it and the amazing 50SPF. Win win with this CC cream

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have fair skin, a mild case of Rosacea and I was looking for a higher SPF foundation (I used Loreal Visible lift for years).  I will never go back, this CC cream feels light on the skin, but covers my skin redness.  In addition after 1 week of use, it has reduced the redness on my face!  Great product, I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am giving it 3 stars because I don't think is fair that just because it does not work for me I should give it a totally bad review, because everybody else seems to love this product. But its not for me, I used to have the shade Fair, and it was wayyyy to pale for me, I thought that was the reason I didnt like it but I got the shade light which is perfect for me, but the in less than 30 minutos my skin looked so nasty. I have dry skin but I prep my skin to look shine and hydrated but I had almost no color in my face in less than nothing, it looked like I sleep with foundation and I even have foundations that looked better than this after sleeping in them all night, wrong I know lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this CC cream! Doesn’t break me out. Covers up all my old acne scars!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s really good full coverage for an everyday look. Also easy to use. Didn’t give it a complete 5 star due to how my pores looked. Didn’t minimize the look of them but other than that it was good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it!!!  Goes on silky smooth. No cakey look. Great color and coverage. Very small amount is needed. Have gotten complements since switching. Totally recommend!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing best CC cream it leaves your skin velvety smooth and I was surprised how full covered it is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like that the CC has more color options. I tried the BB version but the color didn’t match as well. It’s easy to apply with fingers for on the go and gives nice coverage considering. I usually have to do heavy concealer and full coverage foundation with my pigmented scars and acne but I can feel confident enough in this CC foundation to run errands or wear to work if I’m in a hurry. I’ve used the IT primer with this in key spots and stays in place a bit longer that way. It does crease under my eye but I just dab it away. It’s good for someone like me with combo skin and some overly dry areas. With that said I wish it was marked as “clean”.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have never worn a full coverage anything until this CC cream and I love it! I switched from the Bare Minerals Complexion Rescue to this cream when I wanted a bit more coverage but was still unsure.  I loved it right away with it's light citrus scent and how easy it went on my skin. I use my fingers, nothing fancy, and get a great cover and finish without losing any of the product. I set it with the Makeup Forever HD powder and i find it lasts all day and even through a workout and doesn't break me out which is amazing! The packaging lets you use every last drop which i also love! and the color selection, though small, seems to be really versatile and it can be built up very easily.  It sits very light on the skin as you only need 1 or 2 small pumps tops and it's exactly what I was looking for!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I highly recommend this product if you're looking for something light, easy (ie: don't need to worry about extra layers of SPF or even primer) and still provides coverage. I've tried a lot of CC creams and this is by far the best for coverage - it's build-able so you can have a subtle amount or add more for more coverage without looking cakey. I have combo skin but mostly dry and I apply this with a sponge so it's not drying but I'll use a settling powder to reduce the shine/dewiness a bit as I find it too much for me. I will say that the shade fair is not quite perfect for me though, I have neutral undertones and this has slightly pink undertones so if you have mostly yellow undertones this shade might be too pink for you - hopefully they release more colours soon.

reviews.review_title: A little heavy on the skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Good coverage...love the sunscreen.  Just makes my normal skin oily

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm actually surprised how good of a foundation/cc cream this is.   It's definitely full coverage but looks pretty natural and glowy on.  It's a thicker cream but it blends very well and is never streaky or cakey.  I use the Sephora Pro Flawless Airbrush #56 with it every day.   It keeps my face pretty hydrated throughout the whole day but at the same time doesn't cause breakouts.    Definitely give it a try if you're on the market for a new foundation.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite CC cream , and i have tried more than 7

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best face makeup I have ever used. I have very dry skin that will randomly get grease and this is the perfect makeup for it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have used both the radiant foundation and this one. Both are fantastic. These are great products for dry skin and offer a good medium coverage that applies like a moisturizer. I love the colors as well. The light is a great tone for light olive skin. This does have a dewy/natural finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite! I use medium during the summer and light during fall/winter. Right now I’m mixing light and medium. Love the texture and application of this- I use the IT airbrush with it as well as I find it applies better.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used to use lancolm and still do sometimes but this has become my favorite.  It doesn't take much product for good coverage and it is 50 spf!  I get dark spots in the sun and this has really helped with those this summer. Plus, it is easy to get the right color.  It seems to take on the shade of your skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As make up it has really good cover up, is not greasy and really easy to apply, I love that is  50SPF, my only recommendation will be to choose a really good moisturizer.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the way this product makes my skin look. Youthful and covers my age spots. Since I am oily I need to use primer, powder and a spray and viola I look 10 years younger.

reviews.review_title: where has this been all my life?!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never fully understood the term “holy grail” until I started using this product. I have dehydrated skin that becomes oilier throughout the day as well as fine lines and large pores. EVERY foundation I’ve tried has accentuated texture and forced me to blot/reapply powder countless times and I always still came home looking like a patchy mess. Then this hydrating, natural looking, beautiful CC cream came along. Just a few dots of this followed by Cover FX setting powder and I’m good to go - and I actually still LIKE how I look after a 12 hour shift. No dry spots, no makeup meltdown, just my skin but better. It can definitely feel heavy if you over-apply, so use with restraint. Definite recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has to be my favorite to go cream/foundation/concealer. It's one thing that has it all and to top it off SPF 50. I have recommended this to all my friends and they have loved it as well. Like it says, my skin but better. I use this as a foundation to built up coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite everyday CC cream I've tried Kiehls, Josie Maran and Origins. This one is by far the best. It goes on smooth, has an SPF of 50  and makes my skin look flawless the whole day. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect foundation it’s not heavy at all and it really helps even me out. I recommend this to everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this CC cream more than any foundation I've used. I have dry/combo skin and this doesn't stick to dry patches (actually helps to moisturize) and doesn't cause me to breakout. This is a fairly high coverage CC cream when compared to most. It is perfect if you like a dewy look rather than a complete matte look. Sets well with powder if you want a more satin finish!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not big on wearing foundation but I love this one! It feels so light on your skin, like nothings there. Leaves my skin soft and refreshed. This is the only foundation I will buy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: looks so natural, extremely full coverage and still light weight. Has a subtle glow and looks like nothing is on your skin. Colour match is perfect, formula does not cake all day. Spf is a huge plus, cant imagine life without it

reviews.review_title: ONE OF THE BEST FOR DRY SKIN
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is such an iconic foundation for me. I enjoy the tube/pump packaging, as it makes it easy to use and travel with! I was afraid the shade was going to be too dark for my light skin, but the colour is awesome. However, it is very unfortunate that there is not a larger colour selection.   I usually use this foundation in combination with my NARS radiant foundation to get the benefits from both products! My skin is normal to very dry, and this one makes my skin look very radiant - but not oily! If you have combination skin, I'm sure this foundation would also be great for your skin as it works well with powders.  In my opinion, this foundation all lives up to its hype and claims. If you're looking for a foundation that is medium to full coverage, looks great ALL day, then definitely try this one out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I´m defenitley using this for ever! I dont want to try any other  make up/spf, since I found my exact tone, amazing texture, high sun protection, a litlle goes a long way, I love it!

reviews.review_title: Good coverage, feels soooo good on the skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage is pretty good. I aply it with the Heavenly Luxe Flat Top Buffing Foundation Brush #6 and it gives it a nice finish.  It cover all the redness of my skin and the scars on my face. I've been wearing it for a week now and so far I've nothing to complain.   If you can go in store for a match, you should though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A friend of mine was using it on a trip and it looked as if she was wearing nothing on her face! We were walking around in Downtown Disney and there was a HUGE Sephora, as we then proceeded to give them my money for one of these. I love how light it feels on your fake and than you can build it up! I wear it everyday for work. Plus it has SPF 50. Would recommend!

reviews.review_title: Perfect Match, but Watch Out Dry Skin People!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thought I'd try the CC  Cream, based on the reviews and what I've seen on YouTube, people kept raving about it. I moisturized, and then used a primer on my face before applying. The foundation, in the shade Medium, was a perfect match for me, and the application/ blendability was great with my sponge. Unfortunately, after about 5 minutes of it setting, it started to extenuate my dry skin on my forehead, nose, and bottom of my cheeks. I gave it a chance, but I just couldn't handle the way it looked, and returned it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this formula. It delivers a gorgeous glow especially for the spring. It really is a your skin, but better kind of coverage and finish. It never feels cakey on my skin. My biggest problem with it is the lack of shade variation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage but makes my face look oily within one hour :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage and texture. Found the color that fits me in a second :)

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff made my face feel like an oil slick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It totally made me forget about my foundation. I am obsessed with it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best tinted moisturizer I've tried yet. Gives enough coverage but blends naturally, my boyfriend get amazed watching me put it on. SPF 50 is amazingly ideal, the smell did catch me off guard a bit. Smells slightly medicated but is subtle enough to not throw me off and doesn't last past application

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love this “foundation”. it covers all the flaws BUT the downside is that it comes off with one touch of a finger, kiss, rubbing nose, etc. Also, the foundation starts off looking fantastic but as the day goes on, probably about 7 hours later, i notice the foundation starts to look separated. I will buy this foundation again because it’s so easy to apply and a little goes a looong way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite cc cream

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Actually has great coverage. I have oily skin and I feel it holds up well to this. It goes on very strange, thick texture and smells like lemon. Dries very nicely, you just have to get over initial texture. A little goes along way with this and you can build more coverage as you blend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best foundations I've tried. I used to swear by matte finishes, but they're just too drying for me now. This wears like a moisturizer, but provides medium, buildable semi-matte coverage. I look a little glowy without the micro glitter of the Radiant CC Cream (which I also like). I experimented with my old matte foundation after using this and felt like a raisin! This keeps my skin breathable and moisturized even when the air/heat is running at work all day.

reviews.review_title: Love for everyday, accentuates pores some
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the protection it gives with the spf 50 and the dewy look. My only thing is that it is not very friendly for pores so if you have a primer I recommend using it and try not to use too much powder after you apply otherwise it gets patchy and does the opposite effect. It is really nice everyday when you are just running around.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! Perfect sheer coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately this product was too oily for me. It does cover, but leaves the skin too greasy. This product will be a perfect one for someone with severe dry skin in the winter. The consistency was too sticky.

reviews.review_title: Streaky for Oily Skin or Warmer Months
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Initially, I really liked this product. I thought it covered nicely and subtly without being over the top, and it had a nice feel. However, as I moved into the warmer months, I became more disenchanted with it. After only a few hours, it bunches up on my skin and leaves weird streaky marks. I probably won't be repurchasing. I may try again in the winter months when my skin is dryer, but for now I am not the biggest fan!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wish I had this product sooner, so many disappointments with foundations this product is heaven sent. Covers all with no thick cake like feel. Awesome!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have this in both light and medium depending on what time of the year it is. This is my go to for a quick and easy face or full face night out, it never disappoints. Lasts all day for me and I get so many compliments on my skin when I have this on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I must be the only person that this product didn't work for. The color fair was too dark/ golden for me, which is fine... I am very pale. My real problem is that it never sank into my skin, it just sat on top getting greasy and sticky throughout the day. I wore it a few times and it never settled on my skin and began breaking down very quickly. Maybe it isn't the best for oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this!!! Give a great coverage and it’s lightweight. I also like it because it gives a slight dewy look

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: absolutely awesome! skin looks flawless and light. it blurs my imperfections and redness and leaves a healthy natural look. will for sure be buying more when I run out.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product it is the perfect amount of coverage and it lasts all day. This is perfect for my dry skin because it is very hydrating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this CC cream. I bought light & that ended up being a little to dark/orange for me. Exchanged it for fair & fair is the perfect color for me. I have too faced peachy foundation, Huda, urban decay & so on but this CC cream is BY FAR the best foundation I have used. It stays on all day, hydrates, & actually does look like your skin.. but better! I’ll always be using this from now on, I don’t see me switching anytime soon. I don’t use a primer under it either, where it is already so hydrating. I do set it with spray & it’s amazing. I could not recommend this product enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first I loved this product. My goal was to even out my skin tone without looking caky. I wanted to look natural. It works well, except after just a few hours of wearing it, it rubs off of my cheeks and nose. Also, my forehead and chin also get super greasy very quickly with this product. Trying something new this month.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely my holy grail foundation/CC cream!  I've just purchased my 3rd tube.  I love that it has such a high spf, it gives more coverage than any of the dozens of other CC creams I've tried, and I love that it's not perfumed!  I have very fair, neutral to cool toned skin.  My biggest problem is that most foundations, BB creams, CC creams, tinted moisturizers etc. are far too yellow or orange for me.  I buy the fair, and it blends so perfectly, gives me a nice healthy color, and feels good on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I first loved about the fact that it has SPF50. The scent is fresh. The texture is a heavy moisturizer which felt not drying on the face. I suggested to my daughters in highschool and college. It's their holy grail foundations as well. I featured it at Sephora Recommendation video on MyTopthingsss channel. https://youtu.be/KkzqKoHPvw4

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have some acne scars that I was tired of applying concealer to every single time. I needed a full-coverage foundation that will cover these scars in one layer. I used very little of this foundation and voila! I can hardly see them anymore. So happy with this and the shade matched my complexion perfectly! I lightly brush a setting powder on top and I'm ready to go! It contains no parabens which makes it my forever foundation from now on!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: gives coverage and doesn't even look like your wearing anything!! Super light and easy to blend into the skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: On the risk of sounding corny it is truly your skin but better. It has a dewy finish, and every time I wear it I have gotten a compliments. Down side is that it rubs off your nose and forehead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love! Wish it didn’t make me as oily but it is light to medium coverage and makes me so dewy. BUT PLEASE IT COSMETICS I am a medium in this product and I’m not that dark. The colour selection is awful and you should formulate some lighter and darker shades so everyone can enjoy this product. I would rate this 5 out of 5 but I can’t for this reason. A lot of my friends wouldn’t even be able to try this product out because of the colour selection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

The only reason I'm not giving it 5 stars is because the very limited shade range, otherwise it was perfect for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

It feels so light! I love that it has an SPF 50. I usually use this as a base and then use a powder foundation to set it because I prefer full coverage. Overall, I couldn't be happier with it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product! Of course I still use a primer but this works as full coverage for my skin type! Hydrates and looks natural. I use the IT CC+ airbrush perfecting powder on top for a matte finish. Love love love

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this foundation after reading such good reviews, but it was TERRIBLE on my oily skin. I usually don’t wear foundation for oily skin because the oil isn’t too bad, I usually just look dewy, but this one made me SO shiny in just 4 hours. It went on so smoothly, looked really nice on my skin, smelled great, but then the oil started shining through crazy. It’s also not transfer proof at all, I barely touched my face and foundation was everywhere. I use one oil blotting sheet at lunch time in the middle of my day for the small amount of oil on my face, but I needed two sheets when I wore this foundation and the sheets were soaked with oil and the foundation came off almost everywhere I blotted. It works great on skin that isn’t oily because it looked fine the first few hours after applying it. Unfortunately I’ll be returning this.

reviews.review_title: Better than ANY foundation ! GREAT COVERAGE
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried every foundation and decided to give this a try. I was instantly impressed on the coverage, how natural it looks on the skin, stayin power, PORES GONE, hydrates really well ! AND SPF 50 ! This will always be my staple and new it when I went to an event and HAD to wash the estee lauder off due to heavy feeling and creepey lookin skin. ANY AGE can benefit from this and its also really nice to mix in with foundations ( for extra hydration and SPF ) For instance I can only wear my Dior forever perfect foundation with this mixed in it . Undertone is very natural / neutral too !

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones

I'm 54, I have good skin minus those darn dark spots! I use the the IT concealer as well. NOTHING beats IT concealer! NARS is a close second!

My skin looks healthy and the subdued shimmer allows imperfections to reflect off with lighting.

reviews.review_title: Perfect match for my dry NC25/NC30 skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a person with dry skin who also only uses mineral (physical) sunblock, this product is a holy grail item. After reading all the raves on this CC cream I wasn’t sure if I wanted to try yet another BB/CC cream after riding this wave multiple times. This product is called a CC cream but, whatever you want to call it, to me it’s a moisturizing base product with sunblock. It does have medium to full coverage and moisturizers my dry skin all day. It wears well, 8 to 10 plus hours, and the fact that I can skip a step in the morning for applying my sunblock makes my AM routine easier. I use this over Too Faced Hangover primer and it gives my dry skin a natural, satin-to-dewy finish. Was pleasantly surprise by the product and I love that the shade Medium matches my NC25/NC30 skin perfectly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love Love Love this product! Great long lasting coverage with tons of spf. It will be a staple in my make up bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Simply perfect. It covers imperfections and nobody notices it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing.  It's got great coverage without feeling heavy plus it's got good sun protection. I had been using the Nars tinted moisturizer but I find this has better coverage plus the added bonus of the spf. I wear it alone without my usual foundation, because I don't like a lot of makeup in the summer. One pump goes a loooong way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tried this bad boi out after reading the reviews and it's now my HG, it's honestly miraculous - FULL coverage but feels super lightweight, love the SPF 50 aspect, it blends beauutifully and gives you a dewy glow. I have oily skin so to say dewy instead of greasy is frankly, a miracle. A little goes a long way I find, so the tube lasts long enough to justify it's expense. Worth noting that it does need to be set with powder to last aalll day, and in my experience it doesn't oxidize or change colour after application.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
