reviews.review_text: Ah-mazing. I used to use a CC cream from Chanel, and then switched to a BB cream from Kiehl's, but it didn't have enough coverage. My sister-in-law recommended this IT Cosmetics CC  cream, and I was dubious at first, but since ordering it, I'm absolutely obsessed. It goes on very smooth, and with the matching brush, application is easy, even, and uses minimal product. The result has a natural finish that works well with setting powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

Highly highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: Works for all sorts of looks
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It took me a while to find a good foundation for my makeup, and after finding this one, I won't ever need to look for another one. It makes my skin look flawless but also very natural. If I'm going out to an event, I can use it for a very made-up look, but if I'm just going out for the day and want something natural, I can also use this. It works for literally any makeup look. It was also really hard to find a foundation that matched my skin exactly, and this one is color-correcting so it kind of molds to your skin tone. (Also yes, I know it's not a foundation, but I use it as such.) This is a great addition to anyone's makeup drawer :)

reviews.review_title: My go to cc cream, wears the longest.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my longest used face product. I’m very prone to scarring and redness so I tend to use foundation or CC creams everyday. However, wearing foundation every day was too much and was causing my breakouts so i needed to switch to a cc or bb cream and i found this. To be honest, the color match isn’t for everybody. But I have pale to medium complexion, during the summer time I’m tanner in the face and this product definitely oxidizes to match my skin. In the winter the lightest shade is too light and the medium is too dark but I mix it with my paper foundations and it’s just right. What I really like about this product is that it’s the longest wearing out of all the other cc or bb creams. Its definitely no foundation but I can wear this all day with my combination skin and still feel like my skins not cracking too hard if you know what i mean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

My only negative comment is on the limited colour range. The Fair colour matches my tanned summer skin, but would be too dark for me in the winter or spring. One lighter shade would help.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan - warm to neutral undertones

reviews.review_text: I have forehead wrinkles and some large pores and thought I’d never find a foundation that didn’t emphasize them. Even supposedly hydrating or dewy finish foundations would still cake up and crease and make my wrinkles look 10 times worse. Then I got this product in an Ipsy bag and it changed the whole game. I love it the finish is perfect and it’s super affordable. Plus it has SPF 50 and is supposed to hydrate your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: gray hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I have acne prone skin and always wear foundation to work. I bought this specifically for the summer because I knew I'd be working in the city and was worried about my skin having foundation on while I walk/take the subway to my job. Since it's a CC cream I wasn't stressed wearing it in the INSANE heat throughout June-August and I can honestly say that after 3 months it's been better on my skin than if I had been wearing normal foundation.   Few things you might find annoying though: -It doesn't set well. I found that even when I set my face with Laura Mercier I would still have to be careful because it would transfer. -It likely won't last in the summer for over 8 hours. I worked 7 hour shifts and after work would walk a few blocks to shop or get food and by the time I got home the product was hardly there. I personally didn't mind because I only wanted to wear it to work but others might. -Also its pricey and one tube literally only lasted like a month and a half so be wary.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I don't get the hype around this product. I've tried applying different ways - beauty blender, brushes, fingers - and no matter what I get a greasy looking result. It highlights fine lines in my skin I didn't even realized I had and probably ages me ten years.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking around this product for a long time. Really disappointed. Look cakey and oily, just fake and unatural. Maybe this is a good cream for older skin. I have redness, dryness and dark circle and this cream make me break out without even correct any of my problem. It feel like a cheap liquid paper. Even with a primer it doesn’t look any better. This is the first time I retnurn something at Sephora. Won’t buy again.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this. It has great coverage and since getting tanner in the summer, it matches beautifully. But I took away a star because initially, the fair was too light and the light was too dark. So I needed more colors. Also, my face is oily, so I have to bake this on my chin and t zone with Kat von d lock it in to make sure I don’t look too shiny when wearing it. Overall, will buy it again but maybe I’ll try the new matte one

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: the product itself is great, the packaging is terrible!  the silver rubs off onto your hands, which then appears as glitter on my face when i rub the make up in.  i've solved for this by holding the tube in a paper towel while squirting the make up into my hand, but, annoying!  otherwise, thumbs up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First tried this in my ipsy bag and have been wanting to purchase it for years. I love that it has spf in it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There wasn’t a colour that was light enough for my skin tone, my skin is dry and this just made it worse. It’s okay coverage but definitely feels very Cakey on my dry skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this was yellow and went on patchy with a beauty blender.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Pro: truly lasted ALL day (including an 8 hour barista shift with stuff splattering on my face AND a 3 hour nap) Con: Wasn't as smooth or light as I imagined. Felt a bit sticky and made my face look shiney, so I needed to use a fair amount of powder to get the matte look I prefer.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did not match my skin color. but, cover is very good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I seriously don't understand why people are raving about this product. It makes my skin look ugly and uneven no matter what kind of primer/tools/setting powder I use. I just don't get it or maybe it doesn't suit me at all.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Best CC cream out there. Only downfall is the shade selection, but other than that. It is a must have!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: while the product does have a nice finish to it, it had way too much of a yellow undertone, and didn’t hydrate my skin as much as i would have liked it to. for the price it is, i wouldn’t buy again and much rather prefer the too faced born this way foundation, that has 40 shades. another issue, not for me personally, but for a lot of other people, is the shade range! we need more than 1 deep shade! 8 shades just isn’t going to cut it in 2018.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I first put this on, it's beautiful. It never feels like it ever dries down. It's very dewy. Everytime my hair touches my face, it sticks in the foundation and makes me extremely frustrated. I set it with powder, and within 2 hours, it's broken up on my chin and nose. Looks awful. It settles in the fine lines under my eyes too. The color does, however match my skin perfectly, it didn't make me breakout, and it feels relatively light on face unlike my longwear foundations. Needless to say, I'm not impressed in the slightest.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been waiting to get this product for a long time because I've heard nothing but good reviews on it. However, it doesn't really work with my skin very well. I'm not sure if it's my primer or what, but it doesn't blend very well in my skin. I usually have to use 1/4 of a pump at a time to make sure I don't get too much product and it's easier to blend without looking cakey. However, it works for my friends and will probably work for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this based on the great reviews, but it did not work for me.  It does come in a shade light enough for my fair skin, and the SPF is appreciated, but the finish was cakey and made my skin look very dry and old.  I made sure to exfoliate and use my favorite primer, but it didn't help at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My go to foundation. So good if you have combo/dry skin. Gives medium coverage but is buildable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this product at first, but it really doesn’t stay on for long. Almost an hour later, it almost dissolved. I ended up returning it... but maybe it’s just because I have oily skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's okay. I don't think it's worth all the hype but it does provide good coverage for a CC cream and I like the finish of it but it looks really unnatural around my nose. Also the SPF 50 is a plus - I almost never remember to put sunscreen on my face so it's nice that I don't have to when I wear this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me begin by saying that this product is NOT a foundation so don't expect full coverage, however as someone who has acne i find this product amazing for every day use , if you like a lighter coverage feel and a smooth look then you will really like this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff. I’ve struggled forever to find a foundation that doesn’t settle in lines or separate or make me shiny. This is it! This cream has great coverage but looks really natural... I can never see it on my skin, it looks like my skin (just like the name). If I put it on in the morning and then go out at night, I may need a touch up, but that’s a mild complaint. Plus, the SPF is great to have, AND it smells great.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Probably my favorite foundation I have found so far.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have very fair combo skin that tends toward the dry side. I had been using a moisturizer with SPF, followed by a tinted moisturizer, concealer, and a powder over top. Bought this as a treat to myself based on the reviews and WOW! This is all I need now! My skin absolutely glows and no longer do I have to worry about the dreaded dry patch showing through! My coworkers commenton how good my skin looks. This covers dark circles, cheek redness, and the occasional menstrual breakout. LOVE, LOVE, LOVE!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is the best of its kind that I’ve found!  I use it to cover only what I need it to and it blends quite naturally.  I don’t feel it on my face all day long and it doesn’t rub off, which are both things that I hate about most foundations.  I love that it contains SPF.  Best of all, a little goes a long way so the tube lasts FOREVER and it’s a great value.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love this product! I have dry skin and it keeps my skin hydrated and looking bright and fresh. In the winter I mix this with a few drops of the Tarte Radiance drops - it compliments this product well and gives my skin an intense glow and an extra boost of hydration! I highly recommend for anyone looking for something natural/light to medium coverage

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: it has an orange color to it. maybe i should have bought fair. will exchange.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently purchased this in “Light.” I wear a light in just about everything (Estee Lauder Double Wear 1N1, usually), but It’s “Light” is very, very dark. I have a feeling that the lighter color will be too light. So, I’m hanging on to this product and am purchasing the next shade lighter to mix. If the fairer shade works better, I’ll return “Light.”   I really like the coverage, the SPF and the finish, though, so I want to figure out the shade. Probably should have read more reviews and not have purchased this online.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I ended up returning this. I did not feel like it ever absorbed into my skin - felt like it was just sitting on top and it felt much easier to rub off because of that. I didn't like the pump because it dispensed too much product. The coverage was pretty good but in my mind a CC cream is one you can apply with your fingers, and I had to use the beauty blender to blend this out to avoid streaking. I would not recommend this product.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After experimenting with any number of BB and CC creams over the years, I discovered this beauty. The texture provides outstanding coverage, and I don't feel like I'm wearing a ton of make-up. Perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve only used this foundation once or twice. I love the fact that it had spf in it but when I applied it it was just very splotchy and it was just so wet on my dry skin. I tried to set it with some powder but it was just so wet that I had to use so much powder that my face just ended up looking cakey. It says it’s full coverage but it’s definitely like barely a medium coverage foundation, it could almost even pass for a light coverage foundation. For the price you could definitely get a much better foundation for that price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: beautiful feel, look, coverage, anti aging, spf...It's perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go-to foundation. It's medium coverage and dewy without looking greasy. I like that it leaves my skin looking like skin while still covering up my acne scars, active acne and redness. It doesn't cling to any dry patches. I do notice that around hour 9 or 10 it starts to get oily in certain places, and I have dry skin. So if you have oily skin this may not be the best product for you. I love that it has SPF 50 in it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So the color options kind of suck so I had to buy fair and light but it's really really worth it! I used to be a die hard dior airflash person but this beats the longevity, not the color options... but I'll take longevity over color since you can mix it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: gives decent coverage. but i used it in china and it looked rlly oily unless i used to powder to set it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is just okay for me. I have oily skin and this goes on looking very dewy and I absolutely have to set it with powder. On me this is not long-wearing. It breaks down after a few hours and feels oily before that. I use this for the SPF. If it weren’t for that, I wouldn’t have continued to use it. This goes on best with my fingers - I didn’t like how it looked with a sponge (very little coverage) and I don’t tend to apply foundation with brushes.

reviews.review_title: great but not super long lasting
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a great formula and love the spf given my skin tone but would prefer it to be more transfer proof.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Such an airbrushed finish and feels so light on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Its okay... If you're oily and looking for light-medium coverage foundation, then this may work for you. But if you have dry or even combination skin, this will show every dry spot on your face. Its almost like the moisture disappears as it sets and its just a thick layer of a powder like substance on your skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this product is stunning, it really is and i love it. it lasts through humidity and sweat and it looks great throughout the day. but i’m a white person who wears the third darkest shade and that is unacceptable. this shade range is so limited for a company that can afford to extend this shade range a TON. if they did, i’m sure that this product would be even more popular than it already is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from BzzAgent in the mail the day my dad and I were starting to convert our garage into a family room. I live in Oklahoma so the weather was muggy and hot when I received the product. So I figured it would be a good time to test it out. I sweat like a man at the gym! I figured it would be running down my face or clumping, but no not at all! I’m so impressed by how it stays put on your face! Not oily at all! And my sweating didn’t matter! Would definitely buy and recommend this product to friends and family.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - warm to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: not my cup of tea. :/ it’s very oily to me and it’s not wearable as foundation. it’s good for a quick cover up for blemishes though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A great CC cream that leaves a healthy glow. Medium coverage - I use one pump for my whole face. Covers my redness well! It holds up well on my oily skin after setting it. My only complaint is the colouring. Fair is quite yellow. Light was orange. I wish they came out with a lighter colour with pink undertones. But I still love this CC cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This looks amazing in photos & indoors, i’m super fair but got a little tan since it’s summer so it’s my perfect shade. You guys need to expand your shade range! You would make double the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Let's get real: I wear this because I'm 34, I have two kids, and I have five-ish minutes in the morning to slap makeup on my face to look like the dang beauty queen I am. This is forgiving, moisturizing pigment that evens out my skin tone without looking fake, doesn't settle in any tiny wrinkles I may or may not possess (ha!), and above all else, doesn't require a crapton of time to perfect. It doesn't oxidize and it stays on all day.   I have vague memories of a time when I could spend fifteen minutes swirling, tapping, and buffing my face to perfection - I don't live on that planet anymore so this CC cream is my jam.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: not good for my skin. it doesn't last long and moves around after a little while.

reviews.review_title: Best Foundation Ever For This Fl Girl
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first purchased this in the shade medium. It was way too orange for my skin. I have pink undertone to my skin. I ended up giving the medium color to my mother who has more of a yellow undertone to her skin than me. I then repurchased this in the Light shade and wow, this really is the best foundation I have ever used. Feels amazing to my skin. I am combination oily and dry, this does the trick. I show horses here in Florida and it is very hot and humid during summer months, this stuff doesn't transfer as long as you use a good quality setting powder over it. I use Laura Mercier setting powder over it and it doesn't budge. No transfer onto my expensive white show shirts and is husband proof because it doesn't transfer onto him either. I also have a full time job and when I work 10 to 12 hour days it stays put until I take it off. I have even fell asleep with it on and it still looks great in the morning with no transfer onto my pillows. Hands down the best foundation ever. I am 32 years old and this doesn't set into fine lines and wrinkles which I unfortunately have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This CC cream is good but not great for me. It's consistency lays a little too much on the skin and the correction was a tad yellow and noticable. The cream does not melt inti the skin like higher end products and feels slightly heavy. What I like, it covers well for a CC cream and it's applicator is convenient.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best foundations I’ve used. This gives my skin the appearance of a healthy glow & makes it look flawless throughout the day. Later on I started using Estee Lauder DoubleWear with it since I wear it to work and try to avoid looking too shiny at the end of the day as my skin is naturally dry & oily. This combination still looks good after work giving my skin this nice dewy look. It’s SPF is indeed a bonus for summer season right now.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this product so much but I think it’s just okay. It’s a really good color match for my skin but I don’t think it’s so great for oily skin. I found it comes off after a few hours. I use a really good setting powder and spray too so I’m a little disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This made my face look so shiny and feel greasy. The color oxidized into a weird color and looked really horrible after about an hour. I made me breakout too. I just can’t do CC creams. I would not recommend for people with combination or oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! It gives you buildable coverage that doesn’t look cakey. I will never go back to a traditional foundation because I can use this product for any kind of look I need! I need less than a pump and I’m good to go!

reviews.review_title: So happy I switched to this CC cream!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had been using Bare Minerals for years, since i used to struggle with acne. My skin is much more clear but i have dark spots and some acne scars i like to cover, but the bare minerals made my skin look more dry and easily showed fine lines.  I wanted to switch to a liquid makeup, but my skin is still sensitive and breaks out easily with makeup, especially when I occasionally fall asleep in it by accident. My friend who is an Esthetician recommended the IT cosmetics CC cream and I love it! I have even fallen asleep in it a few times after long days and still didn’t have major breakouts like I used to with other makeup. I have even noticed a difference in my skins texture since using it. It does make my face a little oily at first, but with a setting powder and the Urban Decay all nighter setting spray it looks great throughout the day. I was matched with the Light color in store and it is a little too dark, but I am always in between colors so I may try and get the Fair and mix for the perfect match. I like that it has buildable coverage so I can put on a little for day wear or cover up more when I go out at night. I definitely recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cc cream! It’s so light and makes you look bright and fresh without getting too oily. I’ve stopped using foundation and have been only using this. It also has spf which is a huge plus especially in the summer. Id say it’s light - medium coverage. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Feels and smells good but turns green on my skin and even with the lightest tone it's way to dark for me.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Looked great for an hour and then Separated:/ not a fan!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is the best thing I ever used.luv my skin more after its use

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently bought this at my Sephora (Mainly because Summer Mckeen talked about it) and I loved it!! The formula feels very light weight on your skin, but it still gives you medium coverage. It feels really hydrating on your skin but not oily which is good because I have combo skin. It also stayed on all day without breaking up at all on the areas I get oily!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This gave me the worst breakout of my life I used it 2 days in a row and it gave me the worst acne of my life. It looked ok when I put this on but my skin reacted so horribly. I don’t know why.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Felt amazing on my skin and still looked great by the end of the day!

reviews.review_title: Heavy coverage goes a long way
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This has become my irreplaceable foundation. I keep coming back to it. Heavy coverage so you can apply a little. I use a sponge to remove the excess, it keeps its from caking or creasing. The packaging is a bonus, no heavy glass bottles

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lasted through an outdoor concert and a 3 day camping trip.  I often use it as concealer since it has amazing coverage and It  isn't cakey. It is very lightweight and blendable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the smooth,silky,great coverage. Must take caution not to use too much,as a little dab will do.Dont think I reapply enough to get full sun protection,but its nice not to need another product for sun protection.

reviews.review_title: Blendable and Full Coverage BUT Transfers
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very easy to blend and covers all my redness! Helps with keeping skin look luminous throughout the day if you have naturally dry patches from sun damage. I think this is the most full coverage CC cream I’ve ever used so kudos there! Oily skin? Try setting the powder on your T Zone to matte things up to last  throughout the day!  Downfall is it is NOT transfer proof. VERY transferable. Don’t touch your face for any reason once you set it. The setting with powder helps with that oily grease pan look but it does not set the actual cream!   All in all, good for a day in the sun with minimal makeup. Would recommend if you’re not doing flash photography also because that SPF flash back is intense!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Basically sat on my skin but it didn't blend in and became one with my face. It would never set, it just moved around. I used a mattefying Moisturizer... Also the shades are very orange.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tried this product because of the rave reviews, but no. Super disappointed. Didn't work with my combination skin. Too thick. Greasy finish. I would recommend getting a sample before purchasing. I'm bummed because it really does sound like others have found great success with this product, and I was really sold on it having SPF 50, but it just didn't work for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My go to foundation for days where I don’t want to wear heavy makeup and also want SPF protection. Works well with my oily skin and a little goes a long way. I would say the coverage is more medium and I need to follow up with a bit more around my nose after application due to redness. Other than that, I have zero complaints. When purchasing, I was between a light and medium when looking online and I’m super happy I went with light. The colors in this formula run dark so it might be best to go to the store for this purchase. I’m on my third one BTW.

reviews.review_title: Dewy perfection for combination oily skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has become my holy-grail. I have combination oily skin and many products have made me look like I dunked myself in a bucket of Kentucky Fried Chicken after a few hours. Not this bad boy. This CC cream allows me to embrace a dewy look without going through the drive through. You get a good amount of coverage, and 50 SPF but it doesn’t feel like you’re wearing anything on your face. Before I bought the full size, I purchased the travel size at Sephora for $15, which lasted probably 2-3 months. Although, if you aren’t the light or medium shade then the travel size won’t be an option.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This has proven to be the best Summer foundation ever. It is full coverage, stays and doesn’t appear cakey. I’ve really enjoyed this and know this will become a staple in my beauty routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like using bb or cc creams versus foundation nowadays. The past couple years I’ve been so much more diligent about my skincare and be what goes on my face and my skin is the best it’s been for years and I think this cc cream is the perfect compliment to my routine! It had SPF 50, which is so great, and has the softest texture when applied with a sponge or even just my hands. One pump is more than enough to cover my entire face, mask my redness (I have a lot) and give me a nice little glow to kickstart my day. This is super hydrating and light so it’s a perfect summer cc to try! I am only giving it 4 stars because it does have an interesting lemon-cake smell and I typically try to avoid products with fragrance, but I have yet to have an adverse reaction.

reviews.review_text: Basically sat on my skin but it didn't blend in and became one with my face. It would never set, it just moved around. I used a mattefying Moisturizer... Also the shades are very orange.
